[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bzhin no zhes pas tshig snga ma bzhin no/_/pi pak+Sha te/_yi yak+Sha te/_ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o/_/sa na'o/_/sa'i sa ya byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la ta'o zhes pas sa yig gi ta yig go/_/bi pat+ba ti/_bu d+ha/_byings kyi gsum pa
[\[57a.2\]]dang po'i g+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha mtha'i dang po sa d+h+wa dag la bzhi pa nyid do zhes pas dang po bzhi pa nyid do ba yig gi b+ha yig go/_/dang po nyid do d+ha yig gi ta yig go/_/pu b+hut+sa ti/_ra b+ha/_rtsom pa la'o/_/san la mi mI zhes sogs kyis is su bsgyur/_a b+h+yAs dbyi ba yang ngo /_/
[\[57a.3\]]brtsegs pa dang po'i sa ka dag gi mtha' la 'ang ngo zhes pas sa yig dbyi'o/_/dang po nyid do/_/A rip+sa ta/_Du la b+ha Sha/_thob pa la'o/_/A lip+sa te/_shakl-i/_shak+Shi ti/_ba t+l-i/_i yig dang r-i d+ha zhes sogs kyis san la yang na iTa'o/_/pit+si ti/_bi ba ti Sha ti/_
[\[57a.4\]]pa da/_'gro ba la'o/_/pat+si te/_i yig dang r-i d+ha b+h+ras+dza dan+b+h+yu shri yu Ur+N+Nu b+ha radz+nya bi sa ni ta ni pa ti da ri drA rnams kyi yang na'o zhes pas iT yang na'o/_/i ldan pa di bu/_de bi Sha te/_iT med pa'i phyogs la che ba dag gi lnga po la'ang sha U Ta dag go zhes pas U Ta'o/_/
[\[57a.5\]]Ta yig ni a yig las U Ta'i 'phel ba'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don to/_/ya nyid do/_/gnyis brjod do/_/gsal byed lhag ma'o/_/du d+yU Sha ti/_shi bu/_stau ti in mtha' nyid dag gi Shan la'o zhes pa'i nges pa las Sha nyid do/_/si se bi Sha ti/_su s+yu Sha ti/_
[\[57a.6\]]tiSh+Thi bu/_tiSh+Th-i bi Sha ti/_tuSh+N+yu Sha ti/_r-i d+hu dbyangs dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o zhes pas gnyis brjod do/_/na ba da ra rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ya ma yin pa la ma yin no zhes pas re pha'i gnyis brjod par mi bya'o/_/a d+hi d+hi Sha ti/_iT med pa'i phyogs la
[\[57a.7\]]r-i d+hi dz+nya bi dag gi Ir dang Ita dag brjod par bya ba dag go zhes pas swan la I ra'o/_/a b+h+yAs dbyi ba yang ngo /_/Ir+t+sa ti/_b+h+ras+dza/_bi b+h+radz+dzi Sha te/_bi b+h+ra kA ti/_b+h+ras+dzi'i b+h+r-i dzi 'dir nye bar mtshon zhes bas b+h+r-i dza ru bsgyur ro/_/bi b+har+k+Sha ti/_bi b+hardzi Sha ti/_dan+b+h+yu/_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]di dam+b+ha Shi ti/_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_dan+b+ha'i iT 'ang ngo zhes pas i nyid do/_/'ang yig las ring po nyid kyang ngo /_/san la'ang iT med pa la'o zhes pa'i 'ang yig las kha cig tu nA min gyi yon tan med pa nyid do/_/ita rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid la
[\[57b.2\]]las a nu Shang+ga dbyi'o/_/dang po'i bzhi pa nyid do/_/dang po nyid do/_/d+hap+si ti/_/d+hip+sA ti/_Sha Nu/_sbyin pa la'o/_/si sa ni Sha Ti/_iT med pa'i phyogs la/_d+huT la kha ni sa ni sa ni dza na rnams kyi'o zhes pas A nyid do/_/si ShAs ti/_ta nu/_ti ta ni Sha ti/_iT med
[\[57b.3\]]ba'i phyogs la/_ti t+'aM sa ti/_ti tis ti zhes yang na bar brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na u pa d+hA ring po nyid do/_/ti tI sa ti/_an+dzu/_sming pUng ri an+dzu ya shu kr-i gr-i d+h+ri pra ts+tsha rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas iTa'o/_/an+dzi dzi Sha ti/_a shu/_a shi shi Sha te/_prats+tsha/_praSh+Tu mits+tsha ti
[\[57b.4\]]zhes pas sana'o/_/gra hi swa pi/_prats+tshe rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/bi prats+tshi Sha ti/_gra ha/_gra ha gu ha dag gi san la'o zhes pas iT bkag go/_/gra hi swa pi prats+tshe rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/ha'i D+ha'o zhes pas D+ha nyid
[\[57b.5\]]do/_/dang po'i bzhi pa nyid do/_/Sha D+ha dag gi sa la ka'o zhes pas ka nyid do/_/dzi g+h-I k+Sha te/_gu hu/_dzu g+hu k+Sha ti/_nyi Sh+wa ba/_gra hi swa pi zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/su Shup+sa ti/_dze nI/_dzi dza ni Sha ste/_ya nu/_yi yaM sa ti/_ra mu/_ri raM sate/_na ma/_ni naM sa ti/_
[\[57b.6\]]gam+ne/_ga ma las sal pa ra smai la'o zhes pas iTa'o/_/dzi ga me Sha ti/_si las gam r-its+tshi prats+tshi zhes sogs kyis At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/pa rasmai la'o zhes pa'i tshig las At+ma ne'i tshig la iT med do/_/sa dzi gi sa te/_san la iN ing dag gi ga mi'o zhes
[\[57b.7\]]pas ga mi ru bsgyur ro/_/dzi ga mi Sha ti/_saM dzi gaM sa te/_gal te gam+l-i rtogs pa la san la mngon par brjod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'di yang ngo /_/i 'gro ba la'o/_/dbyangs dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o zhes pas gnyis brjod do/_/san la a yig gi'o
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]zhes pas i nyid do/_/sar+thA na bra tI Shi Sha ti/_in bzhin du i ka'i yang ngo zhes pas ga mi ru bsgyur ro/_/a d+hi dzi ga mi Sha ti i nga'i ga mi ru bsgyur ro/_/ha na dang i nga'i ga ma dag gi u pa d+hA'i 'o zhes pas ring po nyid do/_/a d+hi dzi gAM
[\[58a.2\]]sa te/_ha na/_u pa d+hA ring po nyid do/_/a b+h+yAs las kyang ngo zhes pas g+ha nyid do/_/dzi g+hAM sa tI/_ang /_a de'i san a bya ta nI dag la g+ha sl-i'o zhes g+hasl-i ru bsgyur ro/_/sa yig gi ta yig go/_/dzi g+hat+sa ti/_da ha/_da dang po'i g+ha'o zhes pas g+ha nyid do/_/
[\[58a.3\]]dang po bzhi pa nyid de ka nyid do/_/did+d+ha k+Sha ti/_bi da rnam par dpyod pa la'o/_/ba da yod pa la'o/_/bi d+li/_rnyed pa la'o/_/bi sit+sa ti/_bi bit+sa ti/_ru di/_mchi ma 'dzag pa la'o/_/ru da ba di mu Sha rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/_/ru ru di Sha
[\[58a.4\]]ti/_bid/_shes pa la'o/_/di bi de Sha ti/_mu Sha/_rku ba la'o/_/mu mu Shi Sha te/_d+yu ti swa bi dag gi a b+h+yA sa'i 'o zhes pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/_/san yang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na yon tan no/_/di d+yu ti Sha te/_de d+yo ti Sha te/_de bzhin du/_ru ru tsi Sha te/_
[\[58a.5\]]ru ro tsi Sha te/_li li Shi Sha ti/_li lo Shi Sha ti/_lu lu b+hi Sha ti/_lu lo b+hi Sha ti/_shu sho b+hi Sha ti/_shu sho b+hi Sha te/_tsuk+Shu b+hi Sha te/_tsu k+Sho b+hi Sha te/_o po dzI/_'jigs pa dang g.yo ba dag la'o/_/bi dzi'i iT la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/_/bi bi dzi Sha te/_ku
[\[58a.6\]]Ta sogs kyi in i tsa aT rnams ma yin pa la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/_/uts+tsha ku Ti Sha ti/_ut+pu pu Ti Sha ti/_mu ha/_mu mu k+Sha ti/_mu tsa/_mu mu k+Sha ti/_ki ra sogs nyid las At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/u tsa'i las can ma yin pa'i oT yang na brjod
[\[58a.7\]]par bya'o zhes pas o nyid yang na'o/_/a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba yang ngo /_mok+Sha te/_mu mu k+Sha te/_br-i tu/_br-i d+hu/_shr-i d+hu/_s+yad+nu 'di rnams kyi At+ma ne ma yin pa'i tshig gnas pa las ni/_pr-ita sogs kyi iT s+ya dang san la ma yin no/_/shwasta nI la yang kr-i bi/_las ma yin
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa kho na'o/_/kr-ita sogs kyi sa la yang na ba yang ste si tsa la ma yin no zhes pas iT bkag go/_/pa rasmai'i tshig la yang ngo /_/b-i br-it+sa ti/_shi shrit+sa ti/_si s+ya s+t+sa ti/_At+ma ne'i tshig la iTa'o/_/bi bar+t+ti Sha te/_bi bar+d+d+hi Sha te/_shi shar+d+d+hi Sha te/_si s+ya n+di Sha te/_
[\[58b.2\]]de bzhin du kr-i pU/_tsi kl-ip+sa ti/_tsi ka lpa Shi te/_de bzhin du kro tI/_tsi kr-it+sa ti/_tsi kar+t+ti Sha ti/_tsi ts+rit+sa ti/_tsi tsa r+t+ti Sha ti/_tsi ts+tsha t+sa ti/_tshits+tsha r+d+d+hi Sha ti/_tri trit+sa ti/_te ta r+d+hi Sha ti/_nr-i tI/_ni nr-it+sa ti/_ni nir+t+ta Sha te/_pr-i dza/_dr-i shir/_si sr-ik+Sha ti/_smr-i dang dra shi dag kyang san
[\[58b.3\]]mtha' dag ni'o/_/ru tsa sogs las shru Ang dang pra ti med pa'o/_/a nu med pa'i dz+nyA'i 'ang rnam par shes par bya ba ji lta bar bshad do zhes bya ba'i tshig las At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/de dr-i k+Sha te/_yon tan dang 'phel ba gnas pa la zhes pa'i tshig las/_sr-i dzi dri shi dag
[\[58b.4\]]gi a yig A ga ma ma yin no/_/A slaM/_dbyangs dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o zhes pas gnyis brjod do/_/Ab+no ti'i I'o/_/a b+h+yAs dbyi ba yang ngo /_/A p+si ti/_un+di klas pa la'o/_/na ba da ra rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ya ma yin pa la ma yin no
[\[58b.5\]]zhes pas gnyis brjod par mi bya'o/_/un+di Sha ti/_ar+Da/_mngon par brtson pa la'o/_/ar+Di Di Sha ti/_ar+ts+tsha/_mchod pa la'o/_/ar+ts+tshi tsi Sha ti/_Du yA tswi/_yi yI tshi Sha te/_smar+d+d+ha/_yang dag par dga' ba la'o/_/pi sarbar+d+d+hi Sha te/_kr-I dI/_gnas
[\[58b.6\]]pa la'o/_/tsi kr-I Di Sha ti/_ku dza/_tsu kU dzi Sha ti/_Du ba br-i/_bi be bi Sha te/_au yig u pa d+hA rnams/_D+hau kr-i/_Du D+hau ki Sha te/_trau kr-i/_tu trau ki Sha te/_na yig u pa d+hA rnams/_sran+su/_d+h+wan+su/_si pr-i/_si Sha te/_di d+h+wi si Sha te/_du ha/_du d+hu k+ShA ti/_du d+hu k+Sha te/_li ha/_la lik+Sha te/_
[\[58b.7\]]I sha_/i shi shi Sha te/_As/_A si si Sha te/_/de bzhin du dngos po dang las dag la yaNa'o/_/a'i dbyi'o/_/tsi kIR+Sh+ya te/_dzi hIR+Sh+ya te/_de bzhin du gzhan la yang blta bar bya ba rnams so/_/sab+ta mI/_tsi kIR+She ta/_pany+tsa mI/_tsi kI R+Sha tu/_h+yasta ni/_a tsi
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]kAR+Sha te/_a d+ya ta nI/_a tsi kI R+Shi ta/_pa ro k+Sha/_tsa kA sa dang kA sa dang rkyen gyi mtha' rnams las pa ro k+Sha la A ma'o zhes pas A ma'o/_/A ma'i kr-inya rjes su sbyar bar bya'o zhes pas kr-i nya rjes su sbyar bar bya'o/_/tsi kI R+ShaM tsa ka ra/_shwasta nI/_
[\[59a.2\]]tsi kIR+Shi tI/_A shiH_tsi kIR+Shi ta/_b+ha bi Sh+ya n+tI/_tsi kIR+Sha Sha ti/_kra yA ti bat+tiH_a tsikIR+Sha Sh+ya ta/_de bzhin du yul thams cad la bstan ba'o//_//tse kr-i yi ta brjod par bya'o/_/yA/_thob pa la'o/_/'das pa'i don thob par byed pa'am yang nas yang du thob par
[\[59a.3\]]byed pa'i don brjod par 'dod pa la/_byings las bya ba yang dag par mngon par sdud pa la ya sgra ste tse kr-i yi ta'o zhes bas ya rkyen no/_/tsa No pa rok+Sha zhes sogs kyis gnyis brjod do/_/thung ngu'i zhes pas thung du nyid do/_/A ga ma med pa'i ring po'o zhes
[\[59a.4\]]pas ring bo nyid do/_/lA yA ya zhes pa gnas pa la de rnams byings rnams so zhes pas byings kyi ming ngo /_/tse kr-I yi ta'i mtha' las kyang ngo zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/yA yA ya te/_bA/_bA bA ya te/_Du dAnya/_dA mA gA ya ti zhes sogs kyis I nyid do/_/
[\[59a.5\]]tse kr-I yi ta la yon tan no zhes pas ab+h+yA sa'i yon tan no/_/de dI ya te/_de bzhin du Du d+hAnya/_de d+hI ya te/_mA/_me mI ya te/_gai/_A nyid do/_/dze gwi ya te/_pA/_be bI ya te/_s+thA/_teSh+ThI ya te/_Sha/_mtha'i las la'o/_/seShI ya ti/_o hAka/_/dze hI ya te/_
[\[59a.6\]]grA d+hA dag gi I'o zhes pas I nyid do/_/dze g+hi ya te/_de d+d+hi ya te/_dz+yA/_gra hi sogs nyid las sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/dze dzI ya te/_byenya/_swa bi s+ya me benya rnams kyi tse kr-I yi ta la'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/be bI ya te/_hwe nya/_a b+h+yA sta'i 'ang ngo zhes pas
[\[59a.7\]]sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/dze hU ya te/_shwa ya ti mA'i yang na'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/shi shwI ya te/_sho shU ya te/_nA min mtha' rnams kyi yaN A yi zhes sogs kyis ring po nyid do/_/tse tsI ya te/_hi/_'gro ba la'o/_/hi las tsaN ma yin pa la'o zhes brjod par
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bya'o zhes pas g+hi ru bsgyur ro/_/pra dze g+hI ya te/_i yig mtha' rnams/_tInya/_ne nI ya te/_shIng /_ya la I ni a ya'o zhes pas I yig gi gnas la A ya ru bsgyur ro/_/sha sha y+Ya te/_u yig mtha' rnams/_hu/_dza hU ya te/_Sh+Tu nya/_toSh+Tu ya te/_yu/_
[\[59b.2\]]yo yU ya te/_ru/_ro rU ya te/_nu/_no nU ya te/_U r+N+NU nya/_gsal byed dang po'i zhes spyir btang ba las dbyangs dang po'i ya'i rkyen khyab par byed pa ma yin no/_/r-il sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo zhes pas ya'i rkyen bsgrub par bya'o/_/pro r+N+No nU ya te/_kung /_sgra la'o/_
[\[59b.3\]]ka ba ta'i tsa kr-I yi ta la ma y+na no zhes pas a b+h+ya sa ka sde'i tsa sde nyid bkag go/_/kro kU ya te/_ka be ti'i zhes nges par bstan pa las/_kau T-i/_ku ba ti dag gi 'gyur ba kho na ste tsa sde nyid do/_/tsa kU ya te/_lunya/_lo lU ya te/_bo pU ya te/_r-i yig
[\[59b.4\]]mtha' rnams/_r-i ta'i tswa kr-I yi ta yin A yin rnams la I ta mtha'o zhes pas I yig A ga ma'o/_/tse krI ya te/_dze hrI ya te/_r-i/_'gro ba la'o/_/r-i la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo zhes pas ya rkyen no/_/ar+t+ti dang brtsegs pa dang po dag gi yon tan
[\[59b.5\]]no zhes pa rjes su 'jug bzhin pa la/_tse kr-I yi ta la'ang ngo zhes pas yon tan no/_/a rA pya te/_r-I yig mtha' rnams/_kr-I/_r-ita mtha'i yon tan med pa la i ra'o/_/ra ba dag gi u pa d+hI'i ring po'o/_/tse shIR+Ya te/_gr-I/_ni sngon du'o/_/gir ti'i tse kr-I yi ta
[\[59b.6\]]la'o zhes bas la nyid do/_/ni dzi gi l+ya te/_pr-I/_mchu gyur u pa d+hI'i yang u ra'o/_/ra ba dag gi u d+hI'i ring po'o/_/po pUR+Ya te/_prI/_po pUR+Ya te/_gsal byed mtha' rnams/_ba tsa/_bU ba ts+ye te/_ya dza/_yA ya dz+ye te/_pa Tha/_pA pa Sh+ya te/_ba da/_bA ba d+ya te/_
[\[59b.7\]]nyi Sh+wa pa/_swa bi s+ya me bya nya rnams kyi tse kr-I yi ta la'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na'o/_/Sha nyid do/_/so Shu s+ya te/_se si mya te/_ba sha mdzes pa la'o/_/gra hi so nyid las sam+p+ra sA rA Na thob pa la/_ba shi'o tse kr-I yi ta la'o zhes pas sam+p+ra sA ra Na bkag go/_/bA bA Sh+ya te/_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]tsA spr-I/_tsa ya'i tsa kr-I yata la ki'o zhes pas ki ru bsgyur ro/_/tse kI ya te/_spA yI dang o byA yI 'phel ba la'o/_/pA s+phA y+Ya te/_tsa ya'i tse kr-I yi ta la ki'o zhes pa 'jug bzhin pa la/_byA ya'i pa rok+Sha la pi'o zhes pas byA ya'o bi'i
[\[60a.2\]]dngos po'o/_/pe pI ya te/_d+huT la kha ni sa ni dza ni rnams kyi'o zhes pa rjes su 'jug bzhin pa la/_ya la yang na'o zhes rnam par bshad pas A nyid do/_/tsA khA ya te/_sA sA ya te/_yA yA ya te/_gang gi tshe A nyid med pa de'i tshe/_rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi
[\[60a.3\]]Ata'i mtha' rjes su nga ro'o zhes pas rjes su nga ro Ag ma'o/_/tse kha n+ya te/_si sa n+ya te/_sha mu/_sha sha mya te/_da mu/_daM de mya te/_ta mu/_ti ta mya te/_gam+li/_dzaM ga mya te/_ri ma/_ri ra mya te/_ya ma/_yaM ya mya te/_na ma/_ni na mya te/_ha na/_dzaMg+ha n+ya te/_ha ni'i 'tshe ba
[\[60a.4\]]la g+h+nI yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas g+h+rIr bsgyur ro/_/dze g+h+nI ya te/_'gro ba'i don las gya gyu can nyid la'o zhes pas ya rkyen no/_/kra mu/_ku ti laM kra ma ti/_tsi kra mya te/_dra ma/_daM dra mya te/_lu ba sogs las gar+D+hi las so zhes pas ya rkyen no/_/gar+D+hi taM lum+ba ti/_
[\[60a.5\]]lo lu byA te/_sha d+l-i/_shA sha d+yu te/_tsa ra pa la dag gi pha rol gyi A'i uT 'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro A ga ma'o/_/pha rol gyi a yig gi u nyid kyang ngo /_/ra pa dag gi u pa d+hA'i ring po'o/_/tsaM tsuR+Ya te/_bi phu l+ya te/_dza ba sogs rnams kyi 'ang ngo zhes rjes su nga ro
[\[60a.6\]]A ga ma'o/_/dzaM dza bya te/_daM da h+ya te/_daM da sh+ya te/_b+han+dzo/_kun tu nyed pa la'o/_/iT rjes su 'brel pa la yin pa rnams kyi yon tan med pa la a nu Shad+ha dbyi'o/_/b+haM b+ha dz+ya te/_pa sha_/mdo las byung ba'i byings so/_/pi pa sh+ya te/_pany+tsi sri si d+h+waM si b+h+raM shi ka si pa ti pa
[\[60a.7\]]di skan+da rnams kyi mtha' nI'o zhes pas nI A ga ma'o/_/a nu Shang+ga dbyi'o/_/ba nI ba ts+ya te/_sa nI swa s+ya te/_da nI d+h+wa s+ya te/_ba nI b+ha sh+ya te/_tse nI ka s+ya te/_pa nI ba d+ya te/_pa nI ba d+ya te/_tsa ni ska bya te/_b+hi da/_be b+hi d+ya te/_bu d+ha/_bo bu d+h+ya te/_br-i tu/_br-i d+hu/_r-i ldan pa'i rI'o zhes
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pas rI yA ga ma'o/_/pa rI pr-i t+ya te/_pa rI br-i d+h+ya te/_dr-i shir/_da ri dr-i sh+ya te/_dza rI dzrim+b+h+ya te/_sa rI sr-i bya te/_nI ri naM d+ya te/_shA rI shr-i d+h+ya te/_dzA rI gr-I d+h+ya te/_pa rI pr-i sh+ts+ya te/_pa rI pr-its+tsha te/_D+hau kr-i/_Dau D+hau kya te/_trau kr-i/_to trau kya te/_sU tsa/_sU tra/_sUtra/_mU tra/_tsu ra sogs nyid

[\[60b.3\]]yaNa'o/_/a'i yang dbyi'o zhes pas a yig dbyi'o/_/ya'i an med pa la'o zhes pas ya yig dbyi'o/_/bA pa Sh+ya te/_bi b+hi d+ya te/_de bzhin du thams cad du blta bar bya'o/_/sap+ta mI/_lo lU ye ta/_bany+tsa mI/_le lU ya tA ma/_h+yasta nI/_a lo lU ya ta/_

[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]tso kru sha ti/_mu da dga' ba la'o/_/mo mu dI ti/_mo mot+toH_mo mut+taH_mo mu da ti/_sap+ta mI/_mo mu d+yA ti/_pany+tsa mI/_mo mu di tu/_mo mot+tu/_mo mut+tA ta/_mo mud+dA ma/_mo mud tu/_hu d+huT dag las hi'i d+hi'o zhes pas d+hi'i dngos po'o/_/mo

[\[61a.3\]]daSh+TI ma/_a mo mo di ShuH_a mo mo dIH_khA dr-i/_a tsa khA dISh+TAm/_a tsA ShA dI ShuH_A tsA ShA dIH_gr-i d+hu/_mngon par 'dod pa la'o/_/r-i ldan pa'i rI'o zhes pas rI A ga ma'o/_/dza rI gr-i d+hI ti/_ri dang ra dag kyang tse kr-i yi ta zhig pa la'o zhes pas ri dang ra dag tu
[\[61a.4\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/dzA ri gr-i d+hI ti/_dza r+g+r-i d+hI ti/_dza ri gar+d+hi/_dza ri gar+d+d+hi/_dzar+g+gir+d+d+hi/_h+yasta nI/_a dza rI gr-i d+hI da/_a dza rI gr-i d+hI ta/_a dza r-I gr-i d+hi ta/_a dzar+g+raM d+hI ta/_a dza rI g+har+t+ta/_a dza rI g+har+t+ta/_a dzar+g+gar+t+ta/_a dza r-I gr-id+d+hA ma/_a dza ri gr-i d+d+hAm/_a dza r+g+r-id+d+hA ma/_a dza
[\[61a.5\]]rI gr-i d+huH a dza ri gr-i d+huH_a dzar+g+ra d+huH_sa'o/_/yon tan no/_/phyis pa la'ang di si dag la'o zhes pas dang po bzhi pa nyid de ga yig gi g+ha yig go/_/tshig mtha'i si la zhes sogs kyis brjod par byed pa'i phyir ra nyid do/_/ra'i ra la dbyi zhing dbyangs snga ma'ang ring po'o/_/a dzar+g+hAH_

[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]yA ba ya ti/_in mtha' nyid las gnyis ka'i tshig go/_/yA pa ya te/_Du dAnya/_dA pa ya te/_Du d+hAnya/_d+hA pa ya taM/_d+hA pa ya ti/_d+ha ba ya te/_san+ni d+hA pa ya ti/_sho/_phra mor byed pa la'o/_/tshi/_gcod pa la'o/_/Sho/_/mtha'i las la'o/_/hwenya/_'gran pa la'o/_/

[\[61b.4\]]ma'o/_/rgyu byed pa la b+hi smi dag la in la'o zhes pas At+ma de'i tshig go/_/bisma ba ya ti/_rgyu byed pa po'i 'jig pa la sming mngon par brjod pa'i phyir 'dir rgyu las 'jig pa la mi 'gyur ro/_/kuny+tsi ka yi ni bi smA ba ya ti/_dzi/_rgyal ba la'o/_/Du kr-Inya/_rdzas 'tshod pa

[\[62a.1\]]ra ya ti/_rnam par 'phro bzhin pa la rab tu sbyor ro zhes pas rgyu la ina'o/_/bi s+pho ra ya ti/_tsa pa rgyud la ste/_sogs pa la yang ngo /_/tsA pa ya ti/_tsinya/_tsA ba ya ti/_Tu ba pa/_rab tu skyed pa la yang ngo /_/bu ro bA to gaH_pra pA ba ya ti/_

[\[62b.1\]]prI N-I ti dag gi zhes nges par bstan pa las 'dir na yig A ga mar mi 'gyur ro/_/d+hU/_rnam par bskyod pa la'o/_/prIng /_dga' ba la'o/_/bi d+hU ba ya ti/_brA ba ya ti/_bi lI naM ka ro ti/_in mtha' las slar yang rgyu brjod par 'dod pa la ina'o/_/kA ri ta dpyi'o/_/
[\[62b.2\]]g+h+r-i taM bi lI na ya ti/_la la/_'dod pa la'o/_/g+h+r-I tI bi lA ya ti/_sna ha/_zhu bar byed pa la li pa'i kA ri ta la 'jug pa yang na yod par mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro/_/pA dza 'gro ba la ste 'gul ba la yang ngo /_/phyogs kyis u pa bA dza ya ti/_yang na byis las

[\[62b.5\]]g+hA ta ya ti/_nyi Sh+wa pa/_swA pa ya te/_a di dang p+sA/_za ba la'o/_/a di ShA di dag la dgag pa brjod par bya'o zhes pas in mtha' byed pa po las kyi ming bkag go/_/A da ya ti/_/bA da ya ti/_b+hi daM ra/_b+he da ya ti/_tshe dir/_tshe da ya ti/_u r+hA/_kun nas 'khrug

[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]la'o/_/sha di'i 'gro ba min pa la ta'o zhes pas ta yig tu bsgyur ro/_/pha lA ni sha ta ya ti/_gzhan la/_gAH_shA da ya ti/_'gro bar byed do zhes pa'i don to/_/skye ba'i don la yang ru pi'o zhes pas/_br-I hrI ni ro pa pa ya ti/_kA R+Ya ma d+h+ya ro pa ya
[\[63a.2\]]ti/_ar+thaM sa mA ro pa ya ti/_ru hi las ni/_A ro ha ya ti/_hasti hasti pa kaM/_ma rjes su 'brel pa brjod par bya'o/_/g+ha Ta/_byed pa la'o/_/g+ha Ta la sogs pa rnams rjes su 'brel pa rnams so/_/a'i u pa d+hA'i ring po'o/_/ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi thung
[\[63a.3\]]ngu'o/_/g+ha Ta ya ti/_bya tha/_sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa g.yo ba dag la'o/_/bya tha ya ti/_pra tha/_rab tu bshad pa la'o/_/pra tha ya ti/_mre da nyed pa la'o/_/mra da ya ti/_s+kha da/_za ba la'o/_/s+kha da ya ti/_k+Sha dzi/_'gro ba la ste sbyin pa la yang ngo /_/
[\[63a.4\]]dak+Sha 'tshe ba la yang ngo /_/g+ha Ta la sogs pa klog pa'i stobs las u pa d+hA'i 'ang ring po nyid ma yin no/_/k+Shany+dza ya ti/_da k+Sha ya ti/_kra pa/_kra ba ya ti/_kan+da ya ti/_kran+da ya ti/_kra da ya ti/_kla da ya ti/_nye twa rA/_twa ra ya ti/_gzhan la/_twA ra ya ti/_dz+wa ra/_
[\[63a.5\]]dz+wa ra ya ti/_ga Da/_ga Daya ti/_he Da/_bskor ba la'o/_/mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi thung ngur bsgyur te e ta uta dag go zhes pas e yig gi e yig go/_/hi Da ya ti/_pa Ta yi ti/_b+ha Ta ya ti/_na Ta/_'gro ba la'o/_/na Ta ya ti/_gzhan la/_nA Ta
[\[63a.6\]]ya ti/_Sh+Ta ka_/thogs pa la'o/_/sta ka ya ti/_tsa ka_/_tshim pa la'o/_/tsa ka ya ti/_ka khe/_dgod pa la'o/_/ka ga ya ti/_ra gai/_dges pa la'o/_/ra ga ya te/_la ge_/_chags pa la'o/_/hra ge_/_h+la ge_/_Sha ge_/_s+tha ge_/_kun nas sgrib pa la'o/_/la
[\[63a.7\]]ga ya ti/_hra ga ya ti/_h+la ga ya ti/_sa ga ya ti/_s+tha ga ya ti/_ka ge_/_brjod par mi bya ba la'o/_/ka Sha ya ti/_a ka dang a ga_/gya gyu ru 'gro ba la'o/_/a ka ya ti/_a ga ya ti/_ka Na dang ra Na/_'gro ba la'o/_/ka Na ya ti/_ra Na ya ti/_tsa Na dang shaN
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dang shra Na sbyin pa la'o/_/tsa Na ya ti/_sha na ya ti/_shra Na ya ti/_sbyin pa las gzhan la/_bi tsA Na ya ti/_shA Na ya ti/_shrA Na ya ti/_sU tha dang kU tha dang kra tha dang kwa tha/_'che ba'i don rnams so/_/su tha ya ti/_ku tha ya ti/_kra tha ya ti/_kla tha ya ti/_tsa na yang ngo /_/
[\[63b.2\]]tsa na ya ti/_ba nu/_yang brjod par mi bya ba la'o/_/ba na ya ti/_dz+wi la/_'bar ba la'o/_/dz+we la ya ti/_hwa la dang h+ma la/_g.yo par byed pa la'o/_/hwa la ya te/_h+ma la ya te/_smra klog par byed pa la'o/_/smar ya ti/_gzhan la/_bi smAr ya ti/_drI/_'jigs pa la'o/_/dar
[\[63b.3\]]ya te/_'jigs pa las gzhan la/_dAr ya ti kASh+thaM/_nr-I/_tshul la'o/_/na ra yA ti/_shrA/_'tshed pa la'o/_/shra ba ya ti/_'tshed pa las gzhan la/_shrA pa ya ti/_'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dz+nyA'o/_/'chi bar byed pa la/_saM dz+nyA pa ya ti pa shUn/_
[\[63b.4\]]'chi bar byed do zhes pa'i don no/_/dga' bar byed pa la/_dz+nyA pa ya ti rA dz+wA naM/_mnyes par byed pa'i don no/_/rno bar byed pa la/_dz+nyA pa ya ti sha rA na byA d+haH_rnon por byed do zhes pa'i don no/_/'gul bar byed pa la tsa li'o/_/tsa la ya ti/_gzhan la tsA la ya ti/_
[\[63b.5\]]stobs byed pa la tsha di'o/_/tsha da ya ti/_gzhan la che da ya ti g+ho ShA na/_lce sgril bar byed pa la/_la Di'o/_/la Da ya ti/_gzhan la/_lA Da ya ti/_dga' ba dang na ru 'jug pa dag la ma di'o/_/ma da ya ti/_gzhan la/_mA da ya ti/_je nI dang dzrI Sha dang k+ne su dang rany+dza
[\[63b.6\]]rnams dang a la'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo zhes pas ma rjes su 'brel pa nyid do/_/ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi thung ngu'o/_/dza na ya ti/_dza ra ya ti/_k+na pa yata ti/_'di nyid las ma rjes su 'brel pa'i stobs las rany+dzi'i mr-i ga ra ma Na la a nu Shang+ga dbyi'o/_/ra dza ya ti mr-i gA na/_gzhan
[\[63b.7\]]la/_rany+dza ya ti pa stAM/_a ma'i mtha' rnams/_sha ma ya ti/_b+h+ra ma ya ti/_ra ma ya ti/_ga ma ya ti/_ga mi na/_bzod pa la'o zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/A ga ma ya swa tA/_bat+kiny+tsit+kA laM/_bzod par mdzod cig ces pa'i don to/_/dz+wa la dang hwa la dang h+ma la dang na ma
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]rnams nyer bsgyur med pa la yang na'o zhes pas yang na ma rjes su 'brel pa nyid do/_/dz+wa la ya ti/_dz+wA la ya ti/_hwa la ya ti/_hwA la ya ti/_h+ma la ya ti/_h+mA la ya ti/_na ma ya ti/_nA ma ya ti/_nyer bsgyur

[\[64a.3\]]'brel pa nyid yang na'o/_/gla pa ya ti/_glA pa ya ti/_sna pa ya ti/_snA pa ya ti/_ba na ya ti/_bA na ya ti/_ba ma ya ti/_bA ma ya ti/_nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa rnams kyi ji lta ba thob po/_/pra glI pa ya ti/_pra snA ba ya ti/_u pa ba na ya ti/_

[\[64a.5\]]shA ma ya ti ru baM/_ya ma'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o/_/ya ma ya ti/_gzhan la/_yA ma ya ti/_brAh+ma NA na/_yongs su 'jug tu 'jug go zhes pa'i don no/_/s+kha di'i a pa dang ba ri dag las kyang ngo /_/a ba s+kha da ya ti/_pa ti s+kha da
[\[64a.6\]]ya ti/_nyer 'dir gong 'og 'gal ba cig snang ste/_rgya dper 'di kho na bzhin snang bas dpyad par bya'o zhes phyi mo na mchan bur byas snang /_bsgyur gzhan las/_pra s+khA da ya ti/_u pa s+kha da ya ti/_'ba' zhig pa'i ni/_s+kha da ya ti/_pha Na/_'gro ba la'o/_/pha Na ya ti/_gzhan

[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]i d+hI ga ma pha ti/_zhes kha cig tu'o/_/'dir ni rtogs pa nyid du grub pa ma yin no/_/rab tu dmigs pa la gr-i d+hi dang pany+tsi dag la'o zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/shwA naM gar+d+ha ya te/_a hiM pany+tsa ya te/_a b+h+yAs log par sbyor ba la kr-inya'o zhes
[\[64b.2\]]pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/ba daM mi th+yA kA ra ya te/_bu d+ha/_yu d+ha/_na sha_/dzi na ing /_bru/_sru/_dru/_rnams las in la'o zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig go/_/kho d+ha ya ti/_yo d+ha ya ti/_nA sha ya ti/_dza na ya ti/_a d+h+yA ba ya ti/_prA pa ya ti/_srA ba ya
[\[64b.3\]]ti/_drA pa ya ti/_Ni min pa las can ma yin pa las sems bzhin du byed pa po can las so zhes pas pa ra smai'i tshig go/_/A sa/_nye bar sdod pa la'o/_/a sa ya ti/_pA sa ya ti/_pA/_da ma/_Ang ya ma/_A ya sa/_ba ri mu ha/_ru tsi/_nr-i ti/_
[\[64b.4\]]pa da/_ba sa rnams kyi ma yin no zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig bkag go/_/ru tsa/_sogs nyid las At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/pA pa ya te/_d+heT tshig kha skong ba'o/_/d+hA pa ya te/_da ma ya ti/_A yA ma ya ti/_A yA sa ya te/_pa ri mo ha ya te/_ro tsa ya te/_narta
[\[64b.5\]]ya ti/_pA da ya te/_bA sa ya te/_dngos po dang las dag la ya Na'o/_/kA ri ti'i Am iT bi kA ra Na ma yin pa la'o zhes pas kA ri ta dbyi'o/_/kAr+ya te/_hAr+ya te/_las byed pa po las bzhin no zhes pa las bzhin du 'gyur ba med de ki ra sogs
[\[64b.6\]]nyid kyi phyir ro/_/kA ra ya te ka TaH_swa ya me pa/_sap+ta ma'i/_gA ra ye ta/_pany+tsa mI/_kAr ya tu/_h+yasta nI/_a ka ra ya ta/_a d+ya ta nI/_shi dru sru ka mi kA ri ta'i mtha' rnams las byed pa po la tsa Na'o zhes pas tsa Na'o/_/Na yig ni/_Na yig

[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]gnyis brjod do/_/in la mtshungs pa phyis pa min pa'i u pa d+hA'i tsaN la thung ngu nyid do zhes pas thung ngu nyid do/_/mtshungs pa ma phyis na yang ba la in dang tsaN pha rol la san bzhin no zhes pas san bzhin du 'gyur ba'i
[\[65a.2\]]phyir e nyid do/_/yang ba'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po nyid do/_/kA ri ta dbyi'o/_/a tsI ka ra da/_de bzhin du/_a dzI ha ra ta a pa'i pa Tha ta/_a pa'i pa tsa ta/_a dzi dza ya ta/_a pI pa ba ta/_a lI la la ta/_a yi ya pa ta/_shru/_
[\[65a.3\]]sru/_dru/_pru/_blu/_ts+yung rnams kyi yang na bar brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na i nyid do/_/a shi shra ba ta/_a shu shra ba ta/_a shu shra ba ta/_a si sra ba ta/_a su sra ba ta/_a di dra ba ta/_a du dra ba ta/_a pi pra ba ta/_a su pra ba ta/_

[\[65a.5\]]ta'i rtag tu'o zhes pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/_/a dzU ha ba ta/_hwa ra sogs rnams kyi yang a'o zhes san bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dmigs bsal/_a ta ru bsgyur ro/_/a ta twa ra ta/_a sa sma ra ta/_a da da ra ta/_a pa pra tha ta/_a ma mra da ta/_

[\[65a.7\]]ngo zhes pas yang na a b+h+yA sa'i nyid do/_/a dzI ga Na ta/_a dza ga Na ta/_mtshungs pa phyis pa la san bzhin du 'gyur ba med do/_/a tsa ka tha ta/_ba ra 'dod pa la'o/_/a ba ba ra ta/_ing /_in la san dang tsaN dag la'o zhes rnam par bshad pas ga ru
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bsgyur ro zhes kha cig go/_/'dir ni in la san dang laN dag la yang /_gA ya ti'i glog par byed pa la 'jug go/_/a d+h+yA dzi ga pa ta/_id/_a d+h+yA bi ba ta/_a Ti zhes pa gnas pa la in la mtshungs pa zhes sogs kyis thung ngu nyid do/_/dbyangs

[\[65b.4\]]aun+di data/_un+dza/_gnam pa la'o/_/aub+dzi dza ta/_a D+ha/_mngon par sbyor ba la'o/_/a D+hi Data ar+ts+tsha/_mchod pa la'o/_/Ar+ts+tshi tsa ra ta/_br-i d+hu/_mr-i dzU/_kr-i pU/_kr-I ta/_in dang tsaN la ri yig gi r-ita'o zhes kha cig go/_/'dir ni yon tan
[\[65b.5\]]gyi ming sngon ma can gyi phyir ro/_kAr+t+ti i Sha dag gi k+ti'o zhes shes par byed pa'i rtag tu ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir na yon tan no/_/yang na kIr+t+ti ru bsgyur ro/_/a b+hi br-i d+ha ta/_a bar+b+d+ha ta/_a mI mr-i dza ta/_a ma ma brdza ta/_a tsI kl-i pa ta/_e tsa

[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dzi dzI pa ta/_a dzI dzi ba ta/_a mi mI la ta/_a mI mi la ta/_a pI pi Data/_ba pI pa Da ta/_a tsa kA Na ta/_a tsI kA Na ta/_a ra rA Na ta/_a rI ra Na ta/_a pa pA Na ta/_aM pI pa Na ta/_shra Na/_a sha shrI Na ta/_a sha pri shra Na ta/_

[\[66a.3\]]d+hA dbyi'o/_/a b+h+yA sa'i I ta'ang 'gyur ro/_/a pI pya ta/_a pI bya tam/_a pI byan/_tiSh+Tha ti'i i ta'o zhes tiSh+Tha ti'i u ba d+hA i ta ru 'gyur ro/_/a tiSh+Thi pa ta/_a tiSh+Thi pa tam/_a tiSh+Thi ba na/_dzi g+h+ra ti'i yang na'o zhes pas dzi g+h+ra ti'i u pa d+hA i ta ru
[\[66a.4\]]'gyur te yang na'o/_/a dzi g+h+ra pa ta/_ma dzI g+h+ra pa ta/_dngos po dang las dag la'ang ngo zhes pas i tsa'o/_/kA ri ta dbyi'o/_/a kA ri/_gnyis tshig la sogs pa la si tsa nyid 'gyur ro/_/a kA ra yi ShA tAm/_A kA ra yi Sha ta/_g+haT/_i tsa la
[\[66a.5\]]yang na'o zhes pas u pa d+hA A yig gi a yig go/_/a g+ha Ti/_a g+hA Ti/_las byed pa po la las bzhin du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir byed pa po a tsaN nyid 'gyur ro/_/a tsA kA ra ta ka TaH swa ya me ba/_pa rok+Sha/_tsa kA sa dang kA sa dang rkyen gyi

[\[66a.7\]]shwa sta nI/_kA ra yi ta/_A shiH_kAR+Ya ta/_kA ra yi ShISh+Ta/_b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/_kA ra yi Sh+ya ti/_kri yA ti pa t+tiH_a kA ra yi Sh+ya ta/_de ltar in mtha'i yul bstan pa'o//_//in mtha' dang san mtha' brjod par bya'o/_/kA ra yi tu mits+tshi ta/_sanA+o/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gnyis brjod do/_/san la a yig gi'o zhes pas sri nyid do/_/tsi kA ra yi Sha ti/_dzi hA ra yi Sha ti/_dzi g+h+ra pa yi Sha ti/_dza dang mthar gnas dang /_pa sde pha rol gyi u yig gi a yig la'o zhes pas a b+h+yA sa'i i nyid do/_/li lA ba yi Sha
[\[66b.2\]]ti/_pi pA ba yi Sha ti/_bI b+hA ba yi Sha ti/_shwa ya ti'i yang na'o zhes pa rjes su 'jug bzhin pa la/_kA ri ta la'ang san dang tsan dag la'o zhes pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/_/shi shwa ya yi Sha ti/_shu shA ba yi Sha ti/_twenya/_hwa ya ti'i rtag tu'o zhes

[\[66b.4\]]d+hi dzi gA pa yi Sha ti/_ing /_a d+h+yA pib yi Sha ti/_tse kr-I yi ta'i mtha' las kyang sana'o/_/lo lU yi Sha te/_po pU yi Sha te/_a b+h+yA sa med pa'i zhes pa'i tshig las/_gnyis brjod pa byas pa'i slar yang gnyis brjod par mi 'gyur ro/_/

[\[66b.7\]]gi'o zhes pas a yig gi a'i nyid do/_/pu trI ya zhes pa gnas pa la/_de rnams byings rnams so zhes pas byings kyi ming yod pa/_byings las rkyen pha rol tu 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma las/_byed pa po la pa rasmai'i tshig go/_/byed pa po la
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]a na'o/_/pu trI ya ti/_ku TI ya ti/_kam+pa lI ya ti/_prA bA rI ya ti/_kha T+wA mits+tsha ti/_kha T+wI ya ti/_na dbyi ba'ang ngo zhes pas na yig dbyi'o/_/rA dzI ya ti/_ta k+ShA ya ti/_rta dang 'o ma dang glang dang lan
[\[67a.2\]]tshwa rnams kyi bdag dga' ba la su ka A ga ma 'dod par bya'o/_/rta dang glang dag gi 'khrig pa 'dod pa la/_a shwa s+ya ti ba Da bA/_br-i Sha bya ti gauH_gzhan la/_a shwI ya ti/_br-i ShI ya ti/_'o ma dang lan tshwa dag thob par 'dod pa
[\[67a.3\]]la/_k+ShI ra pya ti bA laH_la pa Na pya ti gauH_gzhan la/_k+ShI ri ya ti/_la ba NI ya ta/_tshig so so ba can thams cad rnams las/_za bar sred pa rnams la/_as brjod par bya'o/_/da d+h+yA pya ti/_ma d+h+wa pya ti/_'ga' zhig
[\[67a.4\]]sogs par 'dod pas/_su brjod par bya'o/_/da d+hi pya ti/_ma d+hu pya ti/_zas 'dod par byed pa bza' ba dang /_chu 'dod par byed pa 'thung ba dang /_nor 'dod par byed pa sred pa zhes pa'i ngag nyid la/_a sha nA yang dang /_
[\[67a.5\]]u da n+ya dang /_d+h+ra nA yA rnams ni/_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_'dod pa rnams la/_tshig phrad du grags so zhes pas ji lta bar rigs pa la/_A nyid do/_/ka'i yang na nyid do/_/a dbyi ba yang tshig phrad du bya'o/_/
[\[67a.6\]]a sha nA ya ti/_u dan+Ya ti/_d+ha nA ya ti/_gzhan la/_zas 'dod par byed pa sbyin pa ni/_A sha nI ya ti/_khrus chu 'dod pa ni/_u da kI ya ti/_nor 'dod par byed pa sbyin pa la/_d+ha nI ya ti/_'dir ni/_a sha nA ya'i
[\[67a.7\]]byings/_bkres pa la'o/_/u da n+ya/_skom pa la'o/_/d+ha nA ya/_'dod pa la'o/_/zas 'dod par byed pa bza' ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag nyid la yan mngon par brjod par bya'o/_/kA mya yang ngo zhes pas/_kA mya rkyen du
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i don la'o/_/pu tra mits+tsha ti/_pu tra kA mye ti/_i da mits+tsha ti/_i daM kA mya ti/_swa r-its+tsha ti/_swaH_kA mya ti/_nye bar 'jal ba las kun spyod la'o zhes pas yin rkyen no/_/bu lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa
[\[67b.2\]]ni/_pu tri yA ti/_mA Na ba ki/_byed pa po la A yis te/_sa dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A yis rkyen te/_sa dbyi ba yang ngo /_/khra lta bur spyod par byed pa ni/_A yi'i mtha' las kyang ngo zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/sh+ya nA ya
[\[67b.3\]]te/_sA ra sa i bA tsa pa ti/_sA ra sA ya te/_si yig dbyi'o/_/mo dza ya te/_a p+sar ya te/_pa/_yas las ni rnam par bshad pas sa yig dbyi'o/_/pa yA te/_pa ya pya te/_de la yang na'i sgra'i 'dod pa'i don gyi phyir A li'i ya
[\[67b.4\]]dbyi'o zhes kha cig go/_/bong bu lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa ni/_garta b+ha ti/_a shwa ti/_de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/_o dzas dang a spa ras las rtag tu'o/_/pa yas las ni rnam par bshad pa'o/_/A yi dbyi ba yang rnam
[\[67b.5\]]par shes par bya/_a shwa dang gardi b+ha ti la yin pa yang ngo zhes so/_/gal+b+ha dang klI ba dang ho Da rnam par bshad pa'i zhes kha cig go/_/ru tsa sogs nyid las At+ma ne'i tshig go/_/gal+b+ha te/_gal+b+ha ya te/_kli ba te/_klI ba yA te/_ho nA
[\[67b.6\]]te/_ho DA ya te/_de bzhin du/_tswi'i don la b+h+r-i sha sogs las ta dang sa dag gi dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A'i rkyen no/_/ta da sa dag gi dbyi ba yang ngo /_/lhag pa ma yin pa lhag par 'gyur ba/_b+h+r-i shA ya te/_uSh+ma nA ya te/_
[\[67b.7\]]durma nA ya te/_pe ha ta/_pe hA ya te/_sha shwa te/_sha shwa ya te/_yang na'i tshig las tswi yang 'gyur ro/_/b+h+ri shI b+ha ba ti/_lo hi ta la sogs pa rnams las tswi'i don la DA tsa'o zhes pas A'i rkyen no zhes kha cig go/_/
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'dir ni pa Tat+sa Tat+ka ro ti zhes pa'i tshig la/_mi gsal ba'i rjes brjod byed pa'i DA tsa'o zhes pas/_DA tsa'i yul la gnyis brjod do/_/ta dbyi ba yang 'dod do zhes pas ta dbyi'o/_/phyi nas mi gsal ba'i rjes brjod
[\[68a.2\]]byed pa las dbyangs gcig ma yin pa las a ni ti la/_DA tsa'o zhes pas DA tsa'i rkyen no/_/tsa yig ni ma gsal ba'i rjes brjod byed pa'i DA tsa'o zhes dang /_Da yig ni Da rjes su 'brel pa la mtha'i dbyangs la sogs pa dbyi'o zhes pa'i khyad
[\[68a.3\]]par gyi don no/_/'di nyid kyis mtha'i dbyangs la sogs pa dbyi'o/_/snal bu snam bu lta bur kun du spyod par byed do zhes pas byed pa po la A yis te sa dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A'i rkyen no/_/yadza la sogs pa phal pa'i tshogs nyid kyi phyir
[\[68a.4\]]gnyi ga'i tshig go/_/pa Da pa DA ya te/_tsha ma Ta/_tsha mats+tsha mA ya ti/_tsha mats+tsha mA ya te/_r-i Na ta/_r-i Na raM NA ya ti/_r-i Na r-i NA ya te/_dmar po lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa ni/_lo hi tA ya ti/_lo hi tA ya te/_kaSh+Ta ya
[\[68a.5\]]kra ma Ne kra ma ti/_kaSh+DA ya te/_de bzhin du/_pA pA ya te/_ka k+ShA ya te/_sat+t+ra ya te/_ga ha nA ya te/_sdig pa'i 'jug pa rnams las gzhan la mi 'gyur ro/_/kaSh+Ta ya ta pa sa krA ma ti/_ro man+thaM bar+t+ta ya ti gauH_rlangs pa
[\[68a.6\]]gyen du 'byung bar byed pa ni/_pASh+pA ya te/_de bzhin du/_USh+mA ya te/_phe nA ya/_bde ba la sogs pa rnams la rig par bya ste/_su ShA ya te/_de bzhin du/_duSh+khA ya te/_sgra la sogs pa rnams byed pa ni/_shap+dA ya te/_
[\[68a.7\]]de bzhin du/_bairA yA te/_ka la hA ya te/_a b+h+rA ya te/_kan+ThA ya te/_me g+hA ya te/_su di nA ya te/_durdi nA ya te/_nI hA rA ya te/_na mas dang ta pas dang pa ri pas rnams las ni yina'o/_/phyag 'tshal bar byed pa ni/_na ma
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]s+ya ti/_de bzhin du/_ta pa s+yati/_ba ri ba s+ya ti/_na dbyi ba 'ang ngo zhes pa'i nges pa las 'dir rnam bcad du mi 'gyur ro/_/tsi tAng /_ngo mtshar ba la'o/_/nga yig ni At+ma ne'i tshig gi don no/_/ngo mtshar ba la ri mor byed pa ni/_
[\[68b.2\]]tsi trI ya te/_kaN+hu la sogs pa rnams las yaNa'o/_/kaN+hunya/_g.yan pa byed pa ni/_nya yig ni gnyi ga'i tshig gi don no/_/Na yig ni yon tan med pa'i don no/_/kaN+hU ya ti/_gaN+hU ya te/_ma hIng /_pa hI ya te/_zhes
[\[68b.3\]]pa la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar bya ba rnams so/_/ha liM/_ka liM 'dzin par byed do zhes pa la/_byings don la in te kA ri ta'o zhes pas in rkyen no/_/na yig ni/_in la rtags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi don to/_/ha
[\[68b.4\]]la ya te/_ka la ya te/_de bzhin du/_kr-i ta ya ti/_bar+N+Na ya ti/_twa tsa ya te/_tU stA ni bi han+ti/_bi tu sta ya ti/_ke sha na bir lI ka ra ti/_sgra rnams la grol bar byed do zhes pa'i don to/_/gos kyis kun tu 'gebs par
[\[68b.5\]]byed pa ni/_saM bas+t+rA ya ti/_go cha gyon par byed pa ni/_saM bar+m+ma ya ti/_phye mas kun tu 'joms pa ni/_a ba tsUr+N+Na ya te/_de byed pa dang de'i tshe smras pa la'o zhes pas ina'o/_/mgo bo byed pa ni/_muN+Da ya ti/_de bzhin du/_
[\[68b.6\]]mi shra ya ti/_sh+la k+Sh+Na ya ti/_la ba Na ya ti/_sU tra ya ti/_brtul zhugs las zas la dang /_de ldog pa la'ang in rkyen du 'gyur ro/_/ba yo bra ta ya ti/_longs spyod zhes pa'i don no/_/br-i Sha lAn+na pra ta ya ti/_mi za'o
[\[68b.7\]]zhes pa'i don no/_/des 'da' bar byed do zhes pas ina'o/_/glang po che'i rim pa las 'da' bar byed pa ni/_a ti'i sgra sngon ma ni tshig phrad do/_/a ti ha sta ya ti/_byed pa po dang byed pa'i don la/_pi waM gis nye bar glu len
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]par byed pa ni/_u pa bI Na ya ti/_shing bal rnams kyis nges par 'gugs par byed pa ni/_a ba tU la ya ti/_tshigs su bcad pas nye bar bstod par byed pa ni/_u pa sh+lo ka ya ti/_sde yis mngon
[\[69a.2\]]par 'gro bar byed pa ni/_s+thA dang se ni zhes sogs kyis Sha nyid do/_/a b+hi She Na ya ti/_'ga' zhig gi tshe mthong ba la/_rU paM pa Sh+ya hi/_rU pa ya ti/_mang po 'di rnams nges par mthong ngo /_/i nid/_yan lag mi gnas pa la yang ngo /_/yan
[\[69a.3\]]lag mi gnas pa'i don la i nid rkyen du 'gyur ro/_/ha stau ni ra s+ya ti/_ha sta ya te/_de bzhin du pA da ya te/_mi gnas pa la yang ngo zhes yang gi sgra mang po'i don nyid kyi phyir/_rnga ma las 'degs pa la/_puts+tsha mu t+kI ba ti/_u t+yuts+tshu ya te/_de bzhin
[\[69a.4\]]du/_rnga ma yongs su g.yob par byed pa ni/_pa ri puts+tsha ya te gaH_snod kun tu sogs par byed pa ni/_/saM b+hAN+Da ya te/_chos gos la yang dag par nyug par byed pa'am yongs su 'jog par byed pa ni/_saM tsI pa ra ya te b+hI k+ShuH_shwe ta
[\[69a.5\]]a shwa dang a shwa ta ra dang ga la Di ta dang /_a hwa ra ka rnams kyi a shwa dang ta ra dang ita dang ka dbyi ba yang ngo /_/yang yig gis byings don la in ning yang dag par bsdus par 'dod do/_/rta dkar po brjod pa la/_de yis 'da' bar byed
[\[69a.6\]]pa'o/_/yang na'o/_/a shwa'i dbyi'o/_/shwe ta ya ti/_rta mchog brjod pa la/_ta ra'i dbyi'o/_/a shwa ya te/_gA lo Di ta brjod pa la/_i ti'i dbyi'o/_/gA lo Da ya te/_A hwa ra ka brjod pa la/_ka dbyi'o/_/A hwa ra ya te/_
[\[69a.7\]]mang po nyid las ina'i rkyen la yang ngo /_/shwe ta ya ti/_a shwa ya ti zhes pa la sogs pa'o//_//man+tu ban+tu bin rnams kyi 'jig pa la yang ngo /_/'dir slar yang a nid bshad par mi bya'o/_/I sha_/mchog gi dbang phyug
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]la'o/_/I sha na la ITa'o/_/saM pa da la sogs pa nyid las kre sra'o/_/'di'i yod pa la ITa'o zhes pas lhag ma rnams man+tu 'dod do zhes pa'i tshig las man+tu rkyen no/_/de in+ma n+taM brjod pa la zhes pas byings don la in byas pa
[\[69b.2\]]la man+du 'jig go/_/rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po med na rgyu mtshan can gyi yang dngos po med do zhes pas rang bzhin gyi rang gi ngo bos nges par gnas so/_/I sha ya ti/_ldan par brjod pa la/_ga ba ya ti/_srug+ban+haM brjod pa la/_d+huTa'i
[\[69b.3\]]mtha' las man+tu 'jig go/_/sru tsa ya ti/_mA yA dang sne d+hA dang sra dza las bin 'gyur ro zhes pas/_sra g+bi NaM brjod pa la/_sra dza ya ti/_pra sha s+ya shra'o/_/pra sha s+ya la/_brjod pa la zhes pas in byas pa la shrA ru bsgyur ro/_/dbyangs
[\[69b.4\]]gcig pa rnams kyi ata'i mtha' rnams kyi 'ang ngo zhes pas A pa A ga ma'o/_/shrA pa ya ti/_br-id+d+hi'i yang dz+ya'o/_/yang yig las pra sha s+ya'i yang ngo /_/'phel bar smras pa las/_pra sha s+ya'i yang na'o/_/ina'o/_/dza ya ru
[\[69b.5\]]bsgyur ro/_/snga ma bzhin A ba A ga ma'o/_/dz+yA pa ya ti/_an+tI ka dang /_ba D+ha dag gi ne dang sA d+ha dag go/_/an+ti kaM brjod pa la/_ina'o/_/ne da ru bsgyur ro/_/ne da ya ti/_bA D+haM brjod pa la/_ina'o/_/sA d+ha ru bsgyur ro/_/sA d+ha ya ti/_
[\[69b.6\]]yu ba dang alpa dag gi kan yang na'o/_/lang tsho ldan pa brjod pa la/_ina'o/_/kan du bsgyur ro/_/ka na ya ti/_phyogs gcig la/_s+thU la dang /_dU ra dang /_yu ba dang k+Shi pra zhes sogs kyis mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang
[\[69b.7\]]yon tan yang ngo /_/ya ba ya ti/_chung ngu brjod pa la/_ka na ya ti/_phyogs gcig la/_a lpa ya ti/_s+thU la dang /_du ra dang /_yu ba dang /_k+Shi pra dang k+Shu drA rnams kyi mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang yon tan yang ngo /_/sbom por smra ba
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]la In no/_/mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang /_nA min gyi yon tan yang ngo /_/s+tha ba ya ti/_thag ring bar smra ba la/_da ba ya ti/_lang tsho dang ldan par smra ba la/_ya ba ya ti/_myur bar smra ba la/_k+Shi pa
[\[70a.2\]]ya ti/_phra bar smra ba la/_k+Sho pa ya ti/_ba hu'i ya la sogs pa dang b+hU yang ngo /_/mang po smra ba la zhes pas ya yig Da dang ina'o/_/ba hu'i yang b+hU ru bsgyur ro/_/b+hU ya ya ti/_pr-i ya dang s+thi ra dang spi ra dang /_u ru dang gu ru dang /_ba hu la
[\[70a.3\]]dang tr-i pra dang /_drI r+g+ha dang hra sba dang /_pr-i d+ha dang br-in+dA ra ka rnams kyi pra dang /_s+tha dang s+pha dad ba ra dang ga ra dang baM ha dang /_tra ba dang drA g+ha dang hra sa dang baR+Sha dang b+r+a-in+da rnams so/_/dga' bar smra ba la ina'o/_/pra ru bsgyur ro/_/A pa/_A ga ma yang ngo /_/

[\[70a.5\]]hras ya ti/_br-id+d+hAM smra bal/_par+kha yan ti/_tshogs pa smra ba la/_dr-in+da ya ti/_bden pa dang don dang rig pa rnams kyi mthar A pa ni kA ri ta nyid do/_/bden par smra ba la/_ina'o/_/'di yis A ba'o/_/sa t+yA pa ya ti/_de bzhin du ar+pa ba ya ti/_pe dA pa ya ti/_dbyangs gcig
[\[70a.6\]]pa rnams kyi ata'i mtha' rnams kyi la'o/_/shA ba ya ti/_kA ri ta nyid do zhes pa'i tshig las 'dir mi 'gyur ro/_/shreSh+thaH_shre mA/_shre yAn zhes pa'o zhes pa mkhan po dga' ba'i grags pas mdzad pa'i tshig gsal rdzogs so//_//'di ni dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang po'i phyag
[\[70a.7\]]dpe'i rgya dpe las/_shAkya'i dge slong d+harmA shrI b+ha dras mkhan chen lo tsA ba chen po bu ston zhabs kyi bka' drin las bod kyi skad du bsgyur ba'i gnas ni/_paN+Di ta dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nA'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos gnas chen po ri phug go//_//
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]{D4453}]@##/_/mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal ba zhes pa ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs//_@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_a b+hi d+hA na shA s+t+ra bi shwa lo tsa na mi t+ya sa rA b+hi d+hA na mu k+t+ya ba lI nA ma/_bod skad du/_mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal rab
[\[70b.2\]]zhes pa ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba/_bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dang de'i chos rgyal bar gyur cig dbyangs can rab tu dang bar mdzod/_/skye 'gro rnams la bde ba 'byung zhing dregs dang mi dge ba las drang bar mdzod/_/bdag
[\[70b.3\]]gis gang zhig legs par sbyar ba'i bum pa mchog las byung ba'i chu 'dir yang /_/ci zhes lhags par byed pa don la mkhas pa rnams kyis kun tu 'jug par mdzod/_1_/sde tshan don du mtha' dag snying stobs la dad dpal/_/dpal ldan snyan ngag mkhan po thub pa'i sde zhes byung /_/
[\[70b.4\]]bdag gi rig pa'i gnas ni tshig ldan ngag snyan bcas/_/grags ldan bstan bcos mtha' dag las ni rjes su bsdus/_2/de phyir ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pha rol gzigs gyur pa/_/sa gzhi la gnas 'dren pa rnams kyi yid brtan snod du gyur/_/dpal ldan dpal 'dzin
[\[70b.5\]]gyis ni snyan ngag mkhan mchog mtha' dag gis/_/sbyar ba'i de nyid bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'chi med dbyangs can ldan/_3_/de ni phul byung snyan ngag mkhan gyi lam skyes brling ba can/_/blo yi mig ldan bla mas bstan pa'i mig dang ldan pa yis/_/sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang gis
[\[70b.6\]]bkod mngon brjod mdzad rnams las/_/drangs te mig dang 'dra ba 'di ni sgron me'i mdzod lta bu/_/rtog ge dang bcas snyan ngag mkhan gyi lung skyes brling ba rnams/_/kun tu snang byas rig gnas rnams kyi grong du nges gnas shing /_/spobs pa ldan pa rnams kyi blo yi lam
[\[70b.7\]]dang 'dres byas pas/_/da ni 'di yis skye ngan rnams kyi tshig kyang bcom par 'gyur/_5_/'bad pas dal bar gyur dang ma gyur ma lus rig pa dang /_/rig pa 'dzin pa stobs ldan rnams kyi blo la nges sbyar ba/_/dri med rin chen kaustu b+ha 'dir slar yang rlom dor nas/_/dpal
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]mo'i dpal yon bzhin du rgya chen kho lag mchis 'di la'o/_6_/klu yi dbang po yang dag gnas pa'i mdzod gyur rgya mtsho'i dbus/_/sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang kha yi nya phyis las byung ba/_/mkhas pa 'chi med kyis sprul dar gyi srad bu la
[\[71a.2\]]brgyus nas/_/mu tig phreng ba bkod 'di snying la yang dag gzhag par mdzod/_7_/'dod chags bral ba'i dri bzangs kyi/_/snyan grags me tog ra ba ni/_/bsten las 'di yi zhabs gnas pa/_/gang yang klu shing lta bur lhags/_8_/gang zhig sgra la mkhas pa rnams dang
[\[71a.3\]]mngon brjod 'dzin pa rnams dang 'jig rten pa/_/de dag gis kyang deng nyid mthong na yid la dga' ba lhag par skyed par byed/_/des na bdag gis 'bad pa 'di de lhag par gzhan gyi ched du bstan par 'gyur/_/bdag gis rgol ba rnams ni dga' ba'i ched du dregs pa
[\[71a.4\]]'joms byed byas par gyur/_9_/dang por mang du mkhyen rnams kyis/_/sgra la 'bras bu gang bzhed pa/_/de 'dir 'chi med lugs rnams kyis/_/bdag gis sgra rnams nges par dgod/_10_/mtho ris mi zad gnas bzang dang /_/gzhi gsum pa dang /_gnam
[\[71a.5\]]dang /_mkha'/_/ro las dang ni/_bde ldan/_mkha'/_/'bras bu 'byung dang /_dal 'dzin dang /_/lha yi gnas dang /_kun tu skye/_/skyo med/_skabs gsum/_mtho ris dang /_/mkha' mthor sil ming sum cu/_dang /_dbang po'i gnas/_/bde 'gro/_/dga'
[\[71a.6\]]byed/_na b+ha/_lhas rtsen/_rol pa'i sa/_/steng rod sI/_gi 'jig rten lha yi grong /_/lha yi 'jig rten/_sai ri ka_/ta bi Sha dang /_tA biSha/_/ri rab steng dang /_mkha' gnas so/_30_/de nas lha dang /_yid bzang dang /_/bde 'gro can dang /_/'dod gzugs
[\[71a.7\]]can/_/legs bris/_tshigs mda'/_mis byin skyes/_/tshigs bzang dang ni tshe ring dang /_/tshogs bzang bcud ldan rmi lam med/_/bi na swan+ta/_gzhal med can/_/skabs gsum pa dang /_lha la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/_/r-i yig skyes/_/bsgrub bya/_'chi med/_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]bdud rtsi zas/_/mis byin bu dang /_a di'i bu/_/sum rtsen dbang dang mkha' khyim can/_/bdud rtsi skyes dang mkha' la gnas/_/sbyin sreg za dang mchod sbyin za/_/mkha' 'gro mkhar gnas gnam la gnas/_/rnam sad dang ni bdud rtsi za/_/na lim+mA dang rgas
[\[71b.2\]]med a mr-i tan+b+ha ba/_dang /_/dge skyes mi 'chi sbyin skyes dgra/_/mkha' spyod sbyin dgra gzhi gsum gnas/_/me zhal lha las skyes dang lha/_/swAhA b+hu dza/_/mtho ris gnas nab+haHsa daHdang mig mi 'dzums/_/pU dzi lA dang ma hi la/_/pu pA nA dang ba bu nA/_/pai twA lta ma tu ra/_
[\[71b.3\]]dang rje btsun zhabs/_/dang po'i lha dang /_a ma raH_dA na bA ri/_rgyal byed dang /_/det+yA ri/_tshangs pa 'phrog byed rdo rje can/_/nyin mo'i/_deb ta/_'byung gnas bar ma gsum/_/gnyid swa lha las skyes zhes zer/_/mchod/_'dzin/_nyi ma sna tshogs/_ma tUta/_nor lha
[\[71b.4\]]dang /_/dga' ldan dang ni rgyal po che/_/grub pa rlung lha 'od gsal dang /_/drag po 'di rnams tshogs kyi lha'o/_/chu skyes rig 'dzin mi 'am ci/_/dri za gsang ba pa sha za/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang /_/grub pa 'di rnams lha las byung /_/r-i zhes bya ba dang mi
[\[71b.5\]]sbyin ma/_/lha yi ma'o sngon skyes pa/_/zla ba'i sbugs gnas mtshon cha bkod/_/bdud rtsi zas dang mtshun gyi ni/_/gzhon nu la sogs de rnams kyang /_/sbyin skyes dang ni mchod sbyin dgra/_/sngon gyi lha dang sbyin ma'i bu/_/sbyin skyes dbang po'i dgra sbyin byung /_/
[\[71b.6\]]pa sangs slob ma sa 'og gnas/_/bcud mi ldan dang lha la dmod/_/kai ke ya dang ku tsa dang /_/di te skyes dang pra g+ha Sha/_/lha mi pho zer ba 'dra/_/iSh+Ti yu zhes lha ma yin la ming bco lnga/_de rnams so/_15_/sbyin ma sbyin skyes ma dang ni/_/sbyin skyes skyong ma di ti'o/_/
[\[71b.7\]]sangs rgyas la mtshan bdun cu rtsa gnyis/_4_/kun mkhyen bde gshegs ston pa dang /_/gnyis med gsung ba de bzhin gshegs/_/kun tu bzang po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thub pa sangs rgyas thub pa che/_/dpal stug thugs rje mdzad pa dang /_/bdud 'dul rgyal ba 'jig rten
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'dul/_/skyob pa thub dbang bcom ldan 'das/_/mngon shes drug ldan rnam par 'dren/_/byams pa'i stobs mnga' stobs bcu mnga'/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal ba dang /_/mchod 'os bcu pa spyan bcu gnyis/_/thams
[\[72a.2\]]cad gzigs pa stobs chen ldan/_/chags bral skyabs gsum sku gsum pa/_/'og min bzhugs dang chags 'joms dang /_/chos kyi rgyal po mun pa 'joms/_/mkha' mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa/_/rtogs ldan yon tan 'byung gnas dang /_/rnam shes
[\[72a.3\]]tsam pa mkhyen lnga pa/_/ma hA ba la/_chos sku chos dbyings chos tri mu tri/_'khor ba/_/shin tu nges pa bde chen pa/_/stobs chen sems chen stobs chen pa/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po 'ba' zhig pa/_/rdo rje can dang yang dag sbas/_/dgra bcom pa dang bzod
[\[72a.4\]]mang ba/_/'jig rten mgon po dus gsum mkhyen/_/pha rol phyin bcu 'chang ba dang /_/nam mkha' mtshungs dang tog dkar po/_/byang chub sems ma hA ba la/_dpa' legs gsung ba/_/gnyis med pa dang rtsod pa bral/_/sku gsum yon tan 'byung gnas
[\[72a.5\]]dang /_/dri ma mi mnga' byams chen ldan/_/byang chub pa dang sa bcur son/_/thams cad rtogs dang dgra las rgyal/_72_/shAkya seng ge gau tam/_/zas gtsang sras dang shAkya thub/_/rdo rje gdan pa sa 'tsho'i bdag_/don kun grub pa don grub dang /_/
[\[72a.6\]]bla ma lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras/_/lhas byin rnams dang sgyu 'phrul sras/_/nyi ma'i rigs 'khrungs nyi ma'i gnyen/_/don thams ston pa thub pa la mtshan bcu drug/_cad pa dge sbyong che/_16_/'di yi longs spyod rdzogs bstan sras/_/grags 'dzin skyes dang sgra gcan
[\[72a.7\]]'dzin/_1_/gtsug ni lhas byin sgyu 'phrul ma/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum+bi nI/_3_/rang sangs rgyas la mtshan drug_/bse ru lta bu rang sangs rgyas/_/legs 'dul dang ni gcig pur spyod/_/rang byung dang ni bse ru rgyal/_6_/nyan thos slob ma'i ming can no/_/byams pa la mtshan bzhi/_2_byams
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa rgyal tshab dpal ldan dang /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas mi pham pa/_/'jig rten dbang phyug chu skyes can/_/phyag na pad+ma mkha' spyod pa/_/ral pa 'dzin dang brtse ba can/_/'jig rten mgon dang spyan ras gzigs/_/rdo rje nyi ma brtson 'grus che/_/'jig rten dbang
[\[72b.2\]]dang pad+mas mtshan/_/bdud rtsi'i char ldan yid bzhin nor/_/gzugs spyan ras gzigs la mtshan nyer gsum/_mang ha la ha la dang /_/bde ldan dbang phyug bu mo dgyes/_/'od dpag med pa'i thod can dang /_/za ma tog bkod mnar med gzigs/_/gru 'dzin ri
[\[72b.3\]]la dgyes pa dang /_/yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas so/_13_/sgrol ma sgrol ma zhi ba dang /_/sgrol ma dpal chen oM mdzad ma/_/rgyal ma 'jig rten dbang sras mo/_/yangs pa can ma sgrol ma che/_/bzang mo mtha' yas yid 'ong ma/_/mkha' la ring du bzhugs ma
[\[72b.4\]]dang /_/legs sbyin ma dang dung can ma/_/dpal mo dang ni /sgrol ma la mtshan bco brgyad/_/dbyangs can ma'o/_18_/spyan gsum ma dang spyan ma'o/_2_/nor rgyun ma dang nor sbyin ma/_3_/'od zer can ma zhal gsum ma/_/rdo rje phag mo dkar mo dang /_/rdo rje nag mo rdo rje
[\[72b.5\]]nag_/rnam gtsigs phag gi shing rta ma/_/'jam dbyangs 'jam dpal 'jam mgon dang /_/'jam pa'i rdo rje 'jam pa po/_/de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_/gzhon nu dang ni 'od zer can ma la mtshan brgyad/_gtsug kau rA+e/_phud 'dzin/_/badzra kA li mA badzra kA li/_
[\[72b.6\]]'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan pa do trir thA dang /_'jam dbyangs la mtshan nyer bzhi/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba gaN+Dis brgyan/_/byis pa'i brtul zhugs ral gri can/_/ye shes me long blo yi bdag_/zung phud lnga pa ngag dbang phyug_/smra ba'i rgyal po shes rab sku/_/ut+pal sngo ldan rgyal
[\[72b.7\]]chen dang /_/seng ge sngon po bzhon pa can/_/brtan pa'i 'khor lo seng ge rtsan/_24_/dzam+b+ha la la mtshan drug go/_nor bu bzang po rmugs 'dzin dang /_/sngon gyi gnod sbyin chu'i thub pa/_/chu yi dbang po chu la gnas/_6_/kye rdo rje la mtshan dgu/_dpal ldan khrag 'thung kye rdo rje/_/rdo rje
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]gri gug he ru ka_/he ru rol pa'i rdo rje dang /_/de bzhin dpyid dang ri khrod pa/_/ru la ru la zhes pa yang /_9_/bde mchog 'khor lo sdom pa dang /_/dpyid dang dpa' bo ri khrod pa/_/zla ba'i thod can he ru ka/_/lha dang rdo rje thod pa can/_/
[\[73a.2\]]rdo rje mkha' mgro nges gnod mdzes/_11_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/gsum po 'di ni dkon mchog gsum/_/mi yi srid pa bde mchog la mtshan bcu gcig/_pa rnams la/_/de dag nor gyi rin chen gsum/_/dpal stug_/dge sbyong /_dge slong dang /_/
[\[73a.3\]]phyag 'os/_bsam 'os/_chos gos can/_6_/shra ma Na ri/_tsa lu ka_2_/gnyis po 'di dag rab tu byung /_/dge bsnyen chen po go mi'o/_2_/bdun sbyar ba dang /_don byed pa/_/rma bya'i mjug ma can pa'o/_3_/bsnyen dge slong la med drug/_gnas dang ni gso
[\[73a.4\]]sbyong ngo /_/'khar gsil khad+khi rA dang ni/_/khi khI ra ka khe khI ra ka_'ga' zhig dge slong dang dge tshul zhes/_'khar ba sgra ldan zer/_/btsun pa/_dge sbyong rnams kyi khri la ni/_/rkang gsum pa dang chos kyi khri/_2_/byed po rnam byed pad+ma'i gdan/_/kun byed sna tshogs sgrub
[\[73a.5\]]byed dang /_/bde skyes nyes can skye dgu'i bdag_/dbyig gi snying po yang mes po/_/mes po rig byed 'dzin skyes dang /_/rang byung tshangs pa bdag skyes dang /_/mchog gnas lha rgan gdong bzhi pa/_/pad skyes/_tshangs pa la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/_ma skyes 'byin byed dang /_/
[\[73a.6\]]'jig rten dbang dang pad+mas mtshan/_/rig byed snying po rig byed dbang /_/sna tshogs shes dang rnying pa dang /_/sngon du gnas dang sna tshogs bzo/_/'gro ba'i byed po sna tshogs tshangs pa'i ming /_gtong /_/sna tshogs byed dang lte ba skyes/_/sngon skyes dga' ba brgya pa dang /_/
[\[73a.7\]]chu skyes brgya 'dzin mig brgyad pa/_/byed po pad can ngang pa bzhon/_/sna tshogs sgrub dang skyon can dang /_/bde 'byung gnas byed srog byed dang /_/rna ba brgyad pa snying stobs can/_/bde shes dang pa'i shing rta tshangs/_52_/dbyangs can ma la mtshan dgu/_tshangs pa'i bu mo ngag lha
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]mo/_/tshangs ma dkar mo shA ra dA/_/dkar mo chen mo dbyangs can ma/_/so ma l+lu ra'i rgyas byed ma/_9_/de nas rang skyes skra can gsod/_/sbrang rtsi'i bu dang mi 'dzag dang /_/khyab 'jug lag bzhin ba so skyes/_/'phrog byed nye dbang glang rdzi dang /_/rdeb byed 'gro
[\[73b.2\]]'joms gom gsum gnon/_/g.yung drung can dang dpal gyi bdag_/dpal gnas dkar ldan dpal be'us/_khyab 'jug gi ming brgya don lnga/_mtshan/_/dpal gyi lag pa dpal phag pa/_/dpal 'dzin sa gzhi 'dzin pa dang /_/sngon gyi skyes bu rwa gzhu can/_/
[\[73b.3\]]a shwat+tha thos rtul mo'i bu/_/tha gu'i lto can dbang po'i dbang /_/mkha' shI ni bA ya/_gau riH_lding rgyal mtshan skra can gsod/_/sbyin skyes dgra bo pad dkar mig_/na rA ya Na sred med/_shI bA rA haH_shrI d+ha raH_bu/_/me tog phreng ldan stobs ldan 'joms/_/'khar
[\[73b.4\]]ba'i sgra dang briShA ka_piH_/sna tshogs sde dang be con can/_/'dug gnas lha dang nor lha'i bu/_/swa ya mu na sna tshogs 'gengs/_/shes gsal 'dul dang skyes bu dang /_/skye mchog dga' ba brgya pa dang /_/rtag tu dga' dang dga' byed dang /_/lha mo dga' byed gang
[\[73b.5\]]dga' byed/_/gnas sbyin mchog sbyin lha min dgra/_/pad+ma'i lte ba sbrang rtsi'i sgra/_/rtag tu sbyor ldan dbyug rtse skyes/_/thig le drug pa dbang gzhan skyes/_/gser gyi thig le 'og dbang skyes/_/gos ser can dang 'khor lo'i lag_/ma pham pa dang 'dam bu'i
[\[73b.6\]]dbang /_/dbyig gi lte ba mchod 'os bcu/_/dpal gnas gzhan gyis mi thub dang /_/sbyor ba brgya pa dmyal ba 'joms/_/chur nyal sgra gcan lus 'joms dang /_/dpal be'u can dang dpal gyi gter/_/zla ba'i snying po dpal gyi snying /_/yA da ba dang mthon po'i
[\[73b.7\]]lha/_/'gro mgon dus kyi mu khyud dang /_/'phrog byed/_brtan pa/_gzhung phyed dang /_/ngang pa can dus/_char pa'i snying /_2_/rgyal dka'/_skye ba'i dus/_sngo chen/_/'dam bu'i lte ba rab gsal dang /_/mun 'joms/_mdas 'dul/_'bigs byed dang /_/rnam
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'byed stobs ldan bslu ba dang /_/e ka pA dA d+hi las dang /_/sbyor gsum/_phyogs gsum/_gom gsum pa/_/ran+ti'i lha dang /_me tog bzhad/_/chu gnas khyu mchog lto ba dang /_/spyan dmar/_/mu kun+ta/_legs bzang /_/phyag dar khrod kyi
[\[74a.2\]]dra ba can/_/sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba'i tog_/mdung thung sar ldan/_'og gi khang /_/mi gsal pAN+Da pa 'jigs dang /_/kaustu b+ha ldan/_pAN+Di'i bu/_/rgyal byed/_sngon rabs/_sa li ka_/sa mi ti rgyal/_mArdza dang /_/mA rany+dza ra/_/sa 'dzin 'joms/_/
[\[74a.3\]]smod skyes/_mtha' yas/_gser mdung can/_mkha' la gnas dang /_zhi bar grags/_/skye bo 'jigs pa/_skra grol brtan pa/_/'dzin byed dang /_/sems skyes/_chu sbyin/_/bkod sbyin dang /_kob sin+d+hU'i 'bras/_/char 'bras/_/dgra bo/_mi yi
[\[74a.4\]]seng ge dang /_/gtsang byed/_'jo ba/_a riSh+Ta/_/skra can/_rdul 'dzin 'joms byed dang /_rwa gzhu can dang /_dung gi lag_/'phel byed dang ni mi zad pa/_/rta dang kaustU b+ha 'chad 'gyur/_/rtse byed dang ni dga' ba 'dzin/_/rwa gcig 'khyil pa brgya pa dang /_/
[\[74a.5\]]rdul phran lus dang /_ser skya dang /_/dga' ba'i dbang po dpung bzhi pa/_/rtag pa sbyor ba brgya ldan dang /_/ba b+h+rU/_ya ma na'i dgra/_/char skyes/_mda' dang /_gtong byed dang /_/gzugs mang can/_dang kun la lta/_/kun shes pa dang /_thams cad mig_/
[\[74a.6\]]lnga skyes 'dzin dang /_rgyal byed dang /_/thos pa'i snying po skyes bu mchog_/mi yi seng ge/_mchod sbyin skyes/_smin can dad gshin rje/_/rgya mtsho'i zla ba/_ri bong thig_/mi'u thung /_'jug pa bcu pa dang /_/dang po'i/_phag dang /_dang po'i lha'o/_175_/'di yi pha ni nor lha
[\[74a.7\]]ste/_1_/dun+du ra dang /_a na ka/_/dun+du b+hi dang /_b+hu kA'o/_/rnga bo che dang bug can no/_/shing ldan dang ni/_shing rta 'dren/_2_/blon po/_rgod dang /_rlung nad can/_/shi ni'i tsha bo bden pa can/_/brag skyes/_yu yud+hA na'o/_3_/khyab 'jug_/khyab 'jug gi pha'i ming sogs/_'khor
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]lo legs mthong ste/_/be con ko mo ki'o/_/gzhu ni rwa gzhu gi dga' byed/_/dung ni lnga skyes/_rgyal ba'i dbyangs/_/'di yi nor bu mtha' byed lag_/de ni kostu b+ha ru bshad/_/stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyad gsod/_/stobs lha gshol mtshon gos sngon can/_/thod
[\[74b.2\]]ldan gshog can tA las mtshan/_/sa bdag byed/_gtun shing can dang stobs can dang /_/nam gru dga' byed/_dga' ba can/_/'dod skyong /_sbrang rtsi dag pa dang /_/legs 'gugs dang ni thod khyab 'jug gi phu bo'i ming sum cu so lnga/_pa'i lag_/legs dga' mthong ldan/_tA la 'dzin/_/
[\[74b.3\]]ha yi/_rna rgyan gcig pa sngon rabs pa/_/gshol ldan gser can 'joms 'jigs byed/_/mchog sbas dang ni snar ma skye/_/mi 'dzeg ston skyes kun dga' dang /_/bzang stobs/_gshol 'dzin/_gshol la dga'/_/kA li nid+hI 'joms/_
[\[74b.4\]]lhag ma dang /_/kA lin+d+hI 'gugs mtha' yas so/_35_/'di yi chung ma nam gru ma/_/sbrang rtsi dmar ser can ma'o/_1_/'joms byed pa dang thong gshol la/_2_/legs dga' byed pa gtun shing brjod/_/yid las skyes dang /_myos byed dang /_/chu
[\[74b.5\]]srin rgyal mtshan yid las byung /_/me tog gzhu can/_dga' ma'i bdag_/me tog mda' can/_gzhan min skyes/_/mi bzad mda' dang /_zhi mthar byed/_/bde 'joms/_'dod chags bsgyur byed dang /_/gshol bdud 'dod lha'i ming brgyad cu gya dgu/_gyis rtse bar 'dod
[\[74b.6\]]pa dang /_/rol rtsed dga' ba/_rtsed mo ku sum tsA ba/_can/_/'dres byed gsod byed 'dor byed dang /_/dga' byed/_dran pa/_tshangs bcom dang /_/dregs byed/_lus med/_rab stobs dang /_/me tog gzhu can/_me tog tog_/'dod chags zam pa
[\[74b.7\]]dga' ma'i bdag_/bdag skyes/_mi zad/_nag po skyes/_/mda' lnga pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dga'/_/pad+ma can dang /_lang tsho 'byed/_/thams cad 'dul dang /_rgas byed dang /_/'dod duHd+ha na/_chags phye ma/_dka' thub dgra/_/yid sred yid las
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]skyes pa dang /_/lus 'khogs gzhi dang na tshod skyes/_/'chi bdag gtsug phud snying la nyal/_/dbang phyug bde skyed yon skyes dang /_/'dod spyod dga' ma'i bdag skyes dang /_/i ming can dang kun sbyor can/_/sbrang rtsi'i kha lo nyi ma'i mda'/_/
[\[75a.2\]]mi bzad mtshon cha mtshon cha'i gzugs/_/sbrang rtsi'i sgron ma rnam byed dang /_/'dod pa dang ni 'dod pa'i lha/_/gzugs mang po dang rab dga' byed/_/mtshon cha lnga pa bdud lnga pa/_/'gro rtsen 'gro ba'i shing rta dang /_/bdag gi skye gnas/_kun mad+hu sA ra thiH_rabI ShUH_rtog
[\[75a.3\]]skyes/_sgeg pa'i skye gnas/_rgyal dka' dang /_/nya'i tshigs rgas byed/_'jigs byed dang /_/nyin byed dgra dang /_'dres byed dang /_/dus rtsen/_dga' byed/_sgrib bya dang /_/sred byed pa Tu Ta gzhon dang /_/sgra byed dga' ma dga' byed dang /_/yid la nyal
[\[75a.4\]]dang /_sdom pa'i dgra/_/chu srin mtshan pa lus skyes dang /_/'khor ba'i bla ma/_kun rtog byung /_/yid la skye ba rnams yin no/_29_/'di yi bu ni tshangs spong dang /_/sna tshogs tog dang /_ma 'gags pa/_/u ShA'i bdag dang /_nya yi tog_/bu yi dga' ma/_
[\[75a.5\]]dga' byed 'dod/_2_/'dod pa'i mda' ni lnga yin te/_/kun tu rmongs byed brgyal bar byed/_/smyo byed/_rgod byed/_sred byed do/_5_/dga' ma/_rtse byed ma/_rtsen ma/_/sgeg pas 'gro ma/_re nA dang /_/'dod chags 'khri shing /_'dod ma dang /_/i bcas/_
[\[75a.6\]]dran pa'i ba lU ba/_9_/'di yi sring mo gnas tshogs ma/_/dar dur sa zhes pa yang /_2_/'phrog byed dga' ma dga' byed ma/_/dpal mo/_pad gnas/_pad+ma ma/_/mi g.yo/_g.yang mo/_dbang mo dang /_/chu gter skyes ma/_chu rgyan ma/_/sA dang ShA zhes bya ba'o/_12_/
[\[75a.7\]]'dod ma/_/to/_br-iShA/_ka pA yI/_/rdo rje 'o ma'i chu gter ma/_/g.yo byed ma dang skyod byed/_khyab 'jug chung ma'i ming bcu gnyis/_ma/_/sred ma/_sin+d+hU skyes ma dang /_/rgya mtsho'i bu mo rnams yin no/_9_/bden pa'i b+hA ma/_b+hA mA dang /_/bden bcas ma zhes bya ba'o/_/rnam 'dul khyab
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'jug gi bzhon pa'i ming po gsum/_skyes dang dug 'joms ldan/_/mkha' lding /_'dul skyes/_skar mig bu/_/mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug_/klu mthar byed/_/khyab 'jug shing rta bdud rtsi za/_/'dab chags seng ge/_/'dab bzang dang /_/gser 'dab shAm+bA lI la
[\[75b.2\]]gnas/_/u lU ti'i bdag ltos 'gro zas/_skya rengs nu pho/_zhing bzang skyes/_/rnam gsal rnam 'dren/_mig yangs dang /_/bcud len za dang /_dug 'phrog dang /_/'dod pa'i tshogs gnas/_pak+Shi saM g+ha/_rdo rje'i mchu/_/ri la gnas dang /_klu yi dgra/_/'dab
[\[75b.3\]]ldan/_dpal chen/_gser gyi lus/_/phreng ldan/_'dab bzang ma yi bu/_/lha rgyal 'dul dang /_'od srungs skyes/_33_/'di yi chung ma u lU ti/_1_/bu ni bzhin bzang zhes par dran/_/rgyu skar ji bzhin zhes bya ba/_/rgyal byed ming ldan de'i mtshan mo/_/
[\[75b.4\]]yud tsam rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/_/gang la skyes pa 'gro ba 'joms/_/aSh+Ta karma pa ti b+h+raSh+To 3_rdan+to dzi na sh+tsasaH/_/zhi ba skyo med gzhu can dang /_/'phrog byed dbyig ldan bde byed dang /_/ri dbang /_ri rmod 'di 'brel med pa brtags/_ral pa bcings/_/bde 'byung u mA'i bdag po
[\[75b.5\]]dang /_/mdung can tshim byed/_dbang phyug che/_/gtsug na zla ba thod pa 'dzin/_/mig gsum/_gnas byed/_du byed dbang phyug gi ming brgya nyer drug/_dang /_/phyug bdag dang ni zla ba 'dzin/_/dbang bo/_dbang phyug_/dbang ldan dang /_/'byung po'i dbang dang /_tsan+dan
[\[75b.6\]]'od/_/ri nyal thod ldan/_dgra sta'i dum/_/b+ha ga lI brgyad las yongs 'joms 'os 'os rgyal ba yang de/_dang rab 'joms bdag_/'chi las rgyal dang stag gos can/_/srid pa 'jigs dang /_mig gsum pa/_/kun mkhyen me yi khu ba dang /_/ral pa'i khur can
[\[75b.7\]]sngon dmar can/_/dpal mgrin drag shul grong bskal bzang phreng /_khyer dgra/_/mgul nag nam mkha'i sgra can dang /_/la kun+da la/_gang+gA 'dzin dang /_bran 'joms dang /_/rgyal byed grong gsum mthar byed dang /_/g.yon gyi lha dang /_lha chen po/_/sna tshogs
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]mig dang ga las g.yo/_/ri yi gzhu skyes/_long ba'i dgra/_/khyu mchog rgyal mtshan/_mchod sbyin 'joms/_/nam mkha'i skra can/_tA las mtshan/_/zla ba 'dzin dang gar mkhan che/_/srid bsrung 'dzin dang skra sbas dang /_/'jigs byed
[\[76a.2\]]'byung po can b+hang+g+ya/_/mgrin nag_/mi zad/_thun mtshams su/_/gar byed pa dang /_gar la dga'/_/ka ka TI ko/_/b+ha ru dzoTI/_dmar ser byam ke sha/_/mig dang /_dzo TI ka/_/char 'bebs/_i Di hA r+Na dang /_/lus srul ga se sha mig sman/_/ka TA TaM ga
[\[76a.3\]]ral pa can/_/ral pa'i tshogs can ral pa 'dzin/_/dal 'bab/_nor bu/_u lin+da/_/gzugs mang po dang gar bas bskor/_/phur bu/_rnam 'jigs mtho ba'i dbang /_mig gcig_/tshangs 'joms/_'gro la 'tshe/_/mtshams smra snying byed/_rkang
[\[76a.4\]]gcig dang /_/steng gi khu ba mi zad mig_/gzhan gyis mi thub gdong lnga pa//gsang ba'i bla ma/_rab byed dang /_/gtsug phud rgyal mtshan/_sbrul 'ching dang /_/sbrul gyi gdub can ri khrod pa/_/sbrul gdug rna rgyan/_dpral mig pa/_/zhi 'dzin/_mchod sdong /_byin 'phrog dang /_
[\[76a.5\]]rtsub po/_steng 'phur dbang po dang /_/mig rus phreng ldan/_tshogs kyi dbang /_/hiN+Da kAn+ta glang rdzi dang /_mig yangs/_zhi bar gnas/_sprin zhon/_/mun sel/_bzang po gcod byed dang /_/khyu mchog ser skya khyu mchog tshigs/_/rtag tu 'byung dang /_'byung
[\[76a.6\]]po 'dzin/_/dam pa'i don ni gsal byed dang /_/klu yi lus sbyin ri la gnas/_/las byed pa dang /_'gro ba 'dzin/_skya bo/_bzang po'i dbang phyug dang /_/long ba 'joms mkhas phyogs gos can/_/'tsho byed khyu mchog mig sman dang /_/'chi ba bslu
[\[76a.7\]]dang /_dga' ba 'phel/_/rig byed 'don dang /_nag po che/_/khyab bdag_/g.yon dang /_brtan pa dang /_/rgyal dka'/_bde skyes/_lha'i nor bu/_/khyu mchog mchog ldan ba lang bdag_/mig gsal kun 'gro blo ldan dang /_/dpal mo'i bu dang /_g.yung
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]drung ba/_/dus kyi rga dang /_dran 'joms dang /_/rtsegs byed/_chos kyi gzhon pa can/_/rab tu rgod dang gad rgyangs can/_/grong 'joms grong gi yan lag sbyin/_/'byung po'i mgon po 'byor pa ldan/_/nam gru skyes dang /_yang mes po/_/grong gsum bsreg dang
[\[76b.2\]]ha ming can/_/shaM ku/_khyu mchog mtshan pa dang /_/khri rkang can dang u ra bi/_/khyu mchog zhon dang /_mig gsum pa/_mgrin pa khra bo rnams yin no/_126_/ral pa bcings pa ka brta/_/khyu mchog rgyal dka' can dang mkhas/_/a dza ka zhes bya ba'o/_7_/
[\[76b.3\]]gzhu ni skyo med/_phur bu/_'gro ldan no/_2_/bde ba'i khu NA/_kha T+wAM ga_/phyag dar khrod dang /_rngon pa'i gos/_/sil snyan/_cha lang /_DA ma ru/_/'khor ni 'joms byed 'byung po'i tshogs/_/ma mo rnams ni tshangs ma rgyal dka' dang /_/lus
[\[76b.4\]]ngan ma dang /_khyab 'jug ma/_/dbang mo dang ni/_drag mo dang /_/phag mo dang ni gzhon nu ma'o/_/phra dang /_yang ba/_rab thob dang /_/rab 'dod/_mchod 'os/_dbang phyug nyid/_/dbang du gyur dang /_'dod dgur bsgyur/_/dbang phyug 'byor pa rnam brgyad
[\[76b.5\]]gyur/_/de nas b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti dang /_/b+h+r-ing+gi dang ni/_pags pa can/_/kI kA sha yi lus can dang /_b+h+r-ing+gi rI Ta/_sham dang /_/'dam bu'i lus dang /_zhi bar grags/_8_/dga' ba'i dbang phyug dga' ba can/_/sgo srung /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang /_/shAlang+gA yan
[\[76b.6\]]sgo yi dpon/_/gar mkhan phreng ba can rnams so/_/de nas grol bum/_rol rtsed mkhan/_/tshogs bdag dga' ba rnams/_hadzI/_saM ca/_yin no/_3_/nag po chen po lus chen po/_/br-iShA NA ka 'jigs byed che/_4_/dka' bzlog ka ti'i bu mo dang /_/dkar mo/_ri skyes/_
[\[76b.7\]]ri'i bu mo/_rtag ma dang ni lo ma med/_/dga' ba'i bu mo/_rig byed 'don/_/gtum mo/_ma ma zhi ba ma/_/gsod ma seng ge'i shing rta ma/_/kun la bkra shis/_ser nag ma/_/dus kyi dga' ma/_rgas byed ma/_/dbang phyug gi chung ma'i ming dgu bcu go gsum/_dbyig ma/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]gtsug phud gnas 'o ma/_/srid ma/_drag mo/_'tsho byed ma/_/bzang dus can ma/_du byed ma/_/ser mo/_rgyal byed/_grul bum ma/_/mang ldan/_sa ga skyed ma dang /_/dak+Sha'i bu mo/_srad med ma/_/rgyal ma/_shes gsal shes
[\[77a.2\]]gsal ma/_/drug ldan hiN+DI gser ldan ma/_/dbang phyug_/dbang mo/_nga b+h+ra ma/_/gsal ba'i bu mo/_tshim byed ma/_/ma la yar gnas/_mchod ldan ma/_/grangs skyes/_rtse mo/_tshogs gtso mo/_/pr-iShA'i sdig ldan/_rnam rgyal ma/_kaiT+b+hA kai Tab+hI/_/zhi ba'i
[\[77a.3\]]sring mo/_yA da bI/_/rdzongs ma nag mo/_sde gzhon ma/_/zhi ba'i pho nya phreng ldan ma/_/lha mo/_sgra can/_tshul 'chos 'phreng /_gau ta mI dang /_mtshan mo che/_/phreng ba ma tshogs/_gcig pu ma/_/cha shas med ma/_yon tan ma/_/stobs lha'i sring mo/_
[\[77a.4\]]nus ma dang /_/lha yi bu mo ma mo'i ma/_/mtha' yas ma dang durdu rA/_/rma bya'i rgyal mtshan/_mai ne sI/_/khyab 'jug sring mo/_kar+b+ba rI/_/bung ba can ma/_ngan spong ma/_/'phyang ma/_dge ma/_gtum mo dang /_/mai nA/_ka yi sring mo dang /_/ma dang
[\[77a.5\]]gangs ri'i bu mo dang /_/lha mo chen mo legs ldan ma/_/mun can ma dang be bA sau/_/dga' ma/_rig pa chen mo dang /_/dug sel ras gos can/_ma dang /_gos gcig ma/_93_/tsartsI ka dang tsA muN+DI/_/rna ba chen/_skra 'dres ma/_mo 'jigs med ma/_/'dor
[\[77a.6\]]ma byi la'i rna ba ma/_/'phrog byed rnam sgeg ma rnams so/_/gau rI'i seng ge tA ma'i yi/_1_drag mo/_rgyal ma/_rnam rgyal ma/_2_log 'dren bgegs rgyal bgegs byed dang /_tshogs rgan byed ma/_gtum ma'i mgo/_bdag byi ba gser ldan dang /_/lto ba 'phyang dang /_
[\[77a.7\]]ha la gnas/_/glang po'i gdong dang /_so gcig pa/_/ma gnyis pa dang /_/khams gsum pa/_/lus gnyis pa dang /_rdo rje'i tshogs bdag la ming bcu bdun/_mchu/_/pr-iSh+Ni'i rwa can glang po dang /_/tshogs mchog rje dang dgra sta 'dzin/_19_/byi ba 'dod pa'i
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]lus can no/_2_/smin drug bu dang /_sde chen dang /_/dmag dpon/_me skyes/_skem byed dang /_/ri sras dga' byed sa ga skyes/_/gtsug phud can zhon khrung khrung 'joms/_/gang+gA skyes dang /_'dam bu skyes/_/gdong drug_/ma drug_/mdung thung 'dzin/_/rje bo
[\[77b.2\]]sbad byed/_sgrol smin drug bu la ming sum cu so gcig_/byed 'dul/_/gzhon nu dang ni mang po skyes/_/rnam par rgyal byed/_bde byed bu/_/lha yi dmag dpon/_grub pa'i sde/_/sde dpon/_byis pa'i spyod pa can/_/tshangs par spyod ldan/_rnam par gnas/_/bcu
[\[77b.3\]]gnyis mig ldan gang+gA'i bu/_/bya gag rgyal mtshan/_gzi brjid che'o/_31_/de lta bu la sogs pa lha'i rab tu byed pa'o//_//dbang po lha bdag_/grong khyer 'jig_/lha yi rgyal po char sprin can/_/rgyal byed stobs 'jigs/_rgyal ba dang /_/skyo med
[\[77b.4\]]mgon po pa t+ya n+ya/_/dbyig ldan/_lha dbang /_dbang chen dang /_/gnas kyi bdag po/_brgya byin dang /_/bcud ldan bdag/_brgya byin gyi ming brgya dang bcu gnyis/_dang /_legs brjod bdag/_/prA bI na brdi/_ra hi b+hi ta/_/mchod sbyin can dang /_lha ldan
[\[77b.5\]]dang /_/mchod sbyin brgya pa/_prA bI'i bdag_/khyab stobs/_rgyal po/_'phrog byed dang /_/'phrog byed can dang /_'phrog byed zhon/_/'phrog byed/_rta can yang dag bu/_/char 'bebs pa dang /_rdo rje can/_/rmugs byed 'joms dang /_stobs ldan
[\[77b.6\]]dgra/_/pu lo ma'i dgra mchod 'dzin dang /_/gtsang byed mgon po mtho ris rgyal/_/gzhan snyems gsod dang /_sprin la zhon/_/dka' thub skyes dang /_bzod dka' dang /_/smin pa 'joms dang /_kau shi ka_/kun 'joms mig stong /_shis brjod ldan/_/legs
[\[77b.7\]]stobs g+ha nA/_g+ha na dang /_/ri 'joms dang ni rgan la nyan/_/grol med 'joms dang /_rta ser skya/_/ki Ni lA ta mchod sbyin mchog_/mchod mchog_/ri skyes/_'phel 'joms dang /_/'phel ba gzhu mchog_/gang po 'bod/_/gtsang ma'i mchod sbyin
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]la lA ma/_mdo 'dzin/_mchod sbyin brgya pa dang /_/so mang bu dang /_so mang skyes/_/lha yi rnga can legs bris gtso/_/bde ldan/_'joms byed/_grags mu khyud/_brgya 'dzin 'chi med grong gtso bo/_/pha rol mu khyud/_bcud ldan che/_/

[\[78a.3\]]ba thob ma rnams yin no/_7_/khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed dang /_/grong khyer 'chi med ldan pa ste/_/sngon gyi skad dang /_lha lha mo/_/bA ma rA dang /_legs mthong ngo /_9_/chu klung mtsho dang /_rtse ba'i mtsho/_2_/tshal ni 'dres tshal rtsub 'gyur dang /_/mkha'
[\[78a.4\]]rgyan dga' tshal dga' bas brgyan/_5_/rgyal ba dang ni 'gro ba'i rgyud/_/rgyal byed dang ni smin par 'joms/_4_/dbang po'i bu ni rgyal byed do/_1_/nor ni dbang skyes/_nor char 'bebs/_2_/lha yi 'dun sa chos bzang po/_2_/lha yi dmag dang /_legs brjod bu/_2_/sprin
[\[78a.5\]]gyi glang po/_sa srungs bu/_/sprin glang /_legs dul sa 'tsho skyes/_/so bzhi pUrba b+hA ShA su ta pu ri/_pa dang /_rtag tu sbyin/_/sgra chen/_stobs ldan glang po dang /_/glang po'i rgyal po/_brtul bzang dang /_/nyi ma lto bcas/_gnyis 'thung dkar/_13_/

[\[78b.1\]]ces pa rnams su 'gyur/_26_/'di yi 'bar ba dang po 'jigs/_1/gzhal med khang dang mkha'i theg pa/_/mi sbyin bu dang ma mtshan dang /_/tum+bu ru dang /_rgyas pa dang /_/mchu las skyes dang lha'i drang srong /_/mi sbyin bu dang rtse byed dang /_/lha yi tshangs pa/_ca co
[\[78b.2\]]byed/_/ka re Na skyes/_shu na dang /_/ka pi ba dz+nya/_rnam byed bu/_/bde 'byung rtsod dang /_tshogs skyong lha'i drang srong /_dang /_/'byung gnas thub pa slob ma rtsod/_12_/kun 'gyed gzhon nu/_rnam brgya byin gyi 'khor thub pa/_byed skyes/_2_/lha yi sman pa/_
[\[78b.3\]]tha skar bu/_/glang mo/_tha skar khyi/_sna skyes byin ma skyes/_/ga dA ga dA/_tha skar skye/_/mchog mthar byed dang /_rgod ma skyes/_/sbyor ldan lha yi gso dpyad pa/_/gzhon pa mchog ldan sna skyes dang /_/sman pa'i gos can rnams su 'gyur/_13_/bi shwa karma/_
[\[78b.4\]]sna tshogs byed/_/las bzang can dang /_lha'i bzo bo'o/_4_/dri za lha yi glu mkhan dang /_/dbyangs sgrogs pa dang /_dri za skyes/_4_/dgra ngan spangs dang /_dbyangs ldan dang /_/sna tshogs shing rta/_dga' byed dang /_/sa skyes/_mi sbyin skyes dang po/_/lha'i bzo bo/_

[\[79a.1\]]chu skyes/_reg dga'/_dga' bas dregs/_mtho ris chu klung /_nam mkha'i klung /_/dal 'bab nam mkha'i gang+gA dang /_/mtho ris gang+gA bcud ldan rigs/_/zla ba'i rgyun dang /_bdud rtsi 'bab/_/sI tA dang ni/_lam gsum 'gro/_/

[\[79b.1\]]par la zhon/_/slu byed/_'gro byed/_mang po 'dzin/_za byed/_'bar ba'i lce ldan dang /_/sna tshogs za dang /_'od kyi tog_/kun za/_lce bdun/_za ba po/_za phod/_nag 'phro/_mun pa sel/_/sngags bdun/_mar ldan/_gsar ldan dang /_/

[\[80a.1\]]'bar ba'i me ni/_des sbyin sreg_/1/me lce/_rnyed za 'bar ba dang /_/phur bu/_hi ti/_shi kha'o/_5_/me stag_/mkha' skyes/_me'i zegs ma/_3_/mgal me dang ni/_sol ba 'bar/_2_/kun tu gdung byed tshad rims so/_2_/lus

[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]med phrad/_1_/skyed tshal mya ngan med pa'i stobs/_1_/ral gri zla ba dgod pa'o/_1_/'di yi sbun zla chung ba dag_/bum pa'i rna ba 'jigs byed do/_1_/dmag dpon lag mchog 'byang ba po/_2_/blon po 'gro byed dang ne tso/_2_/slob ma/_zhib ma/_mkha' rjes skyes/_2_/sring mo'i

[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]rab 'joms byed/_/ma mos 'phel dang /_mkha' la rgyu/_/myur byed/_rtag de/_gnas med dang /_/myur 'gro longs spyod mdzes pa dang /_/g.yo byed rdul gyi kha lo pa/_/rgyal mtshan rab g.yo/_rdul rgyal mtshan/_/mtsho ldan dang ni/_

[\[81a.3\]]dang /_rgyug byed do/_52_/pr-i Sha rda ri 'di yi d+ha/_1/srog dang /_thur sel/_mnyam gnas dang /_khyab byed dang ni/_gyen rgyu'i rlung /_/'di rnams snying ga_/bshang lam ste/_/lus kun dang ni mgrin par gnas/_5_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor/_pA tA li/_/bA t+yA/_A si gi nI'o/_4_/
[\[81a.4\]]bA tu la dang /_rlung phran no/_1/pA t+yA dang ni/_rlung gi tshogs/_2_/d+ha bi traM ni/_'degs pa'i rlung /_1_/ka ruH_gyen rgyu 'degs pa'i rlung /_1_/phu lU hra sa//_sprul gyi rlung /_1_/lha yi rlung ni/_ku the ra/_/dz+ha ny+dza ni la/_char 'bebs skyes/_1_/hi ma dz+hA ni/_kha ba'i rlung /_1_/ma
[\[81a.5\]]d+hU/_ma ru ta dri yi klung /_/ma la ya rlung /_bA san+ta/_4_/gzhi las skyes pa/_rgyu ba'i rlung /_/de la skem byed kun 'gro'i rlung /_2_/rgyug dang /_shugs dang /_'gros skyod byed/_/bang dang /_rang 'gro/_mgyogs rta 'dra/_2_/mgyogs par la gor/_myur cig
[\[81a.6\]]car/_yang dang /_myur ba/_myur du g.yo/_dpyid/_/myur dang /_myur ba ma thogs pa/_/maM k+Shu/_ardza sA/_skad cig_/mi 'gor ba dang /_dar tsam mo/_16_/rtag tu/_rgyun du/_skabs med dang /_/rgyun mi 'chad dang /_rtag pa dang /_bar med pa dang /_
[\[81a.7\]]shI g+hI/_gI sra/_a shu/_ltos med dang /_res 'ga' tu taM/_ru ru/_min dang bar ma chad/_9_/de nas rab 'bad shin tu'i don/_/nges pa mtha' gcig_/nges 'bad dang /_yongs thob/_tshad med/_shin tu lugs/_/nges 'dod/_'dod dang /_rab 'dod
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dang /_/rtag tu bor dang nges par dang /_/nan tar/_brtan par/_shin tu gzhungs/_/shin tu drag por/_te bor dang /_/phul byung dang ni 'bad pa'o/_/dpal ster/_lus ngan/_mi la zhon/_/rgyal po'i rgyal po gnod sbyin dang /_/rna rgyan gcig pa nor gyi bdag_/
[\[81b.2\]]gnod sbyin rgyal po 'dod pa'i nor/_/nor sbyin mi yi chos ldan dang /_/'od yangs/_tsha bo/_rnam thos sras/_/bsod nams skye bo'i dbang phyug dang /_/byang phyogs bdag po/_kun raH/_lus ngan dang ni mig gsum grogs/_/nor rtsen dang ni sha za can/_/zhi ba/_mig skya/_
[\[81b.3\]]i la'i rgyud/_/gter can/_mi 'am ci'i dbang phyug_/lto dkar bug ldan/_rtag bde byed/_/gsang ba pa'i dbang /_byang phyogs bdag_/nor bdag nor ldan pad+mas mtshan/_/ku da nu/_rin chen snying po snying stobs che/_/rtsa gsum pa dang mi ci'i rgyal/_35_/'di yi pho
[\[81b.4\]]brang lcang lo can/_/shing rta sna tshogs/_'di'i skyed tshal/_/gzhal med khang ni/_me tog can/_/'di yi rtsed gnas/_/kai lA pa/_/bu ar+tha ba ri/_ni nA la ku be ra/_/rna ba'i snyan dag_/mi ci'i rgyal/_2_/lto ba ngan dang nyer bzhag dang /_/des gnas/_
[\[81b.5\]]stan 'dzin/_gter du gyur/_/dung dang pad+ma pad+ma che/_/'byin byed/_chu srin/_rus sbal can/_/rnga can/_sngon po/_dga' ba can/_/'di rnams gter gyi dbye ba dgu/_/mtha' med rgyas byed/_khyab 'jug gnas/_/kun 'gro/_sgra sgrogs/_lha yi lam/_/
[\[81b.6\]]rlung lam/_sprin lam/_mkha'/_nam mkha'/_/bar snang /_mi g.yo/_kun gsal dang /_/rnam 'gro/_lus med/_mi 'gyur dang /_/kun khyab/_gnam dang /_nam mkha'i ming /_'gro med dang /_/lhas rtsen/_rol gnas/_rgyu skar lam/_/skye med
[\[81b.7\]]gnas dang /_gsal gnas dang /_/de ri hA NaH_zhes pa rnams/_25_/phyogs dang nyi ston/_gsal gnas dang /_/kun khyab/_'phrog byed/_ston byed do/_6_/nyi ma shar las snga dro dang /_/gung dang /_phyi dro'o/_/a bA tsi/_/lho'o/_/nub phyogs pra tI tsI/_/de
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]yang zla ba gnas pa'o/_/byang gi u dI tsi ru 'dod/_/'ga' zhig zla ba de gnas so/_/dmyal ba 'og dang /_a bA tsI/_1/tshangs pa steng gi phyogs su dran/_1/u ba riSh+Ta/_u barmu/_a bA gad+ha ad+h+ya steng /_2_/prA tsI na/_a pa tsI
[\[82a.2\]]naM/_/pra tI tsI naM rim pa bzhin/_/u dI tsI naM/_a pA tsI naM/_/shar phyogs de dngos la gsum rnams/_/prA ka dang /_a pA ka_/pra t+yaka_/sogs/_/yul phyogs dus las mi zad pa'o/_/de dngos brjod steng bya'i rtags rnams 'og ni/_/shar ston lho
[\[82a.3\]]la phyogs dngos gsum rnams so/_/pra ts+yA/_a pA ts+ya/_pra tI ts+ya/_de dngos u dI ts+ya bzhin gsum/_/shar/_de yis lho/_nub/_skad cig sogs bshad la/_/phyogs dngos bstan pa bzhin du 'gyur/_/shar sogs kyi phyogs mgon po ni/_/dbang po me
[\[82a.4\]]lha gshin rje dang /_/bden bral shar/_chu lha lho/_nub/_rlung lha dang /_/nor sbyin bde byed go rims bzhin/_/sa srungs glang po bu dang pad dkar can/_/g.yon phyogs pa dang sa la dga'/_/gsal shar ram sngar/_lho byed nub/_me tog so can dang /_
[\[82a.5\]]sa kun sa dang legs grags dang /_/brgyad po phyogs kyi glang po'o/_8_/glang mo rim bzhin sprin grol ma/_/dmar ser ser phyogs srungs/_skya/_dpe med ma/_/zangs sna ma dang /_so legs ma/_/yan lag mdzes dang gsal ldan ma'o/_8_/nyi ma dang ni ngan
[\[82a.6\]]spong bu/_/sa skyes/_mtho ris snang byed dang /_/nye skyes sgra gcan/_phur bu dang /_/lhag pa 'di rnams phyogs bdag gza'/_/phyogs bral phyogs par phyogs mtshams so/_3_/bar dang /_a n+ta rA laM la'o/_/'khor yug dang ni dkyil 'khor ro/_2_/tshangs
[\[82a.7\]]'joms/_char sprin/_dga' byed dang /_/chu khur/_rgyun 'dzin/_chu 'bebs dang /_/chu 'dzin/_chu 'gyed/_mkha'i rgyal mtshan/_/du ba'i skye gnas/_nam mkha'i gling /_/mkha' yi glang po mkha' la rgyu/_/'khrud byed/_sgrogs byed/_sprin gyi ming /_
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]chu sbyin dang /_/glog ldan/_nam mkha'i ta mA la/_/rgyun sbyin/_chu gnas/_chu'i bzhon pa/_/rgyas byed nam mkha'i du ba dang /_/myos byed lha gnas rlung gi shing /_/rlung gi shing rta chu 'dzin dang /_/gsher 'dzin/_chu bskyod/_grA bA dang /_/lags 'dul/_char
[\[82b.2\]]ldan/_sa la 'bab/_/nags tshal skyed dang /_chu g.yo'o/_/g+ha na g+ha na char ldan sprin/_/sgra ldan sprin ni pad+ma NI/_1_/sprin phreng dang ni/_sprin nag dang /_/chu skyar gnas dang /_kA li kA/_4_/mi yi lus sgrib kA li kA/_/nges sgrogs/_chu 'thor/_sgrogs byed
[\[82b.3\]]dang /_/sgra sgrogs/_'ur sgrogs/_sgra ldan dang /_/grags sprin bye brag pa'i ming /_stug dang stug med/_byed dang ni thog sgra can/_/bcud 'bebs ma dang /_sgrogs ldan ma'o/_10_/'khrud byed chu 'dzin rtags gsum pa'o/_/sprin sgra bcas kyi ming /_legs 'dul/_'khyud
[\[82b.4\]]byed/_skyod byed dang /_/glog dang /_g.yo byed/_nyams myong dang /_/gnam gsal gnam lcags/_gsal ldan dang /_/sa 'joms sa srungs/_se gol 'od/_/skad cig pa dang /_skad cig 'od/_/'jug pa brgya pa sgra brgya pa/_/sprin gyi lcug ma/_sgrogs
[\[82b.5\]]byed ma/_/bde 'thung rnam bkra sna tshogs dang /_/gzhi sngon skyes dang /_lus phra dang /_mi brtan/_chu sbyin/_chu phran ma'o/_36_/thog gi sgra dang /_rdo rje'i sgra/_1_/sprin gyi me dang /_chu 'dzin skyes/_2_/sprin gyi thog ni/_uk+kaH'o/_/nges 'joms nam mkha'i tho ba'o/_1_/
[\[82b.6\]]dbang po'i gzhu dang /_rlung gi 'bras/_/bu lo ma skyes bdag mo'i gzhu/_3_/de nyid 'khyog pa ro hi ta/_/de nyid drang por shar laM/_2_/dbang po'i shing ba la/_rgan po'i thig_/rlung gi rgyal mtshan sos ga bzhad/_/ras bal rgyud dang /_rlung gi bal/_6_/char pa zhod dang /_char
[\[82b.7\]]'bab dang /_/sa'i mar/_bdud rtsi g.yo ba'o/_5_/de'i gegs/_then pa/_then chen dag_/1/thig le/_pr-i Shad/_pho yin te/_/pi 'ja' tshon drang 'khyog gi ming /_sruT/_bri ShaT/_bud med do/_4_/rgyun gyi myu gu char rdul dang /_/nges 'dor/_chu yi zegs ma'o/_2_/ser
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]ba'i rgyun ni drag char ro/_1_/ser ba/_rdo char/_sprin gyi rdo/_/sprin gyi ka pha sprin me tog_/sa la rgyun dang /_sprin gong bu/_sprin gyi Dim+maM/_chu Dim+maM/_/chu 'khrigs chu yi sa bon dang /_/rlung gi 'bras bu/_sprin rus pa/_/ka rA kaHdang ka raHdang /_

[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]nad can dang /_phyogs skye ba dang /_rgyal po'i rgyal/_/rnam par snang byed/_steng 'phur dang /_/sri sra/_rgyal byed/_dka' thub can/_/gsum dga' gsher ldan/_bi ku shra/_/sna tshogs za dang srung byed dang /_/kai ra bi NI dga' ba dang /_/blo bzang srid ldan na tshod can/_/

[\[83b.3\]]shas so/_/gzugs can dang ni dkyil 'khor ro/_2_/dum bu/_rang nad can dang 'grib byed sogs mar ngo'i cha la rtag par gsal lo/_/cha dang /_zhogs ma dang /_/dbye ba dang ni phyed ma'o/_5_/pa bsangs phur bu gnyis 'od che bas zla ba'i blon po lta bur dgongs nas bkod pa 'dra/_phyed dang /_mnyam dang /_cha
[\[83b.4\]]shas can/_3_/ku mud can dang /_kai ra bI/_snang ldan/_bsil ldan/_zla ba yi/_/ra ba zla 'od zla ba'i phreng /_7_/khang bzang rab tu dang pa'o/_1_/mdzes dang /_stug dang /_dang ba dang /_/grib ma legs dang /_/mngon par gsal/_/snang ba dang ni/_dpal rnams

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bsil ba'i 'gyur ba lhags pa dang /_/lhags ngar/_lhags ngar/_'khyags pa dang /_/bsil dang /_grang dang /_kha bas grang /_brtan pa/_rkang rten/_nyal/_bza'i rten/_/snang ldan/_shing rta/_lugs bzang skyes/_/
