[\[84a.5\]]byed do/_7_/gsal ba'i bu mo tha skar dang /_/rta ldan ma dang /_rta sbyor ma/_4_/gshin rje ma dang /_bra nye'o/_2_/smin drug dang ni mang po skyes/_2_/bod b+ha ba/_snar ma/_skye dgu'i skar ma spyi'i ming /_bdag lta skyes/_2_/ri dgas mgo can/_ri dgas mgo_/ri dgas mgo ma/_

[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dang /_/me dang dbang po'i lha ldan te/_3_/mdza' bo'i lha dang /_lha mtshams dag_/2_/lha dbang ldan ma dang ni snron/_2_/Sha nai ra ti/_rtsa ba snubs/_3_/chu stod dang ni/_chu lha ldan/_2_/chu smad/_sna tshogs lha ldan ma/_2_/gro bzhin/_'phrog byed/_lha ldan ma/_2_/mon gre dang ni

[\[84b.5\]]dpon/_tshig bdag_/blo ldan lha rnams bdag_/nyi ma'i rigs skyes/_tshig gi bdag_/shes ldan sna tshogs/_gtsug phud skyes/_/tshig ldan/_mig ldan/_dpyod ldan dang /_/rtsub ldan shin tu gsal ba'i gcung /_/mtho ris thob dang /_'bar ba ldan/_/
[\[84b.6\]]bcu gnyis 'od 'phro me bzhi skyes/_13_/dkar po/_pa sangs/_ngan spong bu/_/snyan ngag dang ni/_snyan ngag mkhan/_/lha min bla ma/_lha min bdag_/ngan sdong 'dzin dang /_kun dzi ta/_/dkar po 'od ldan/_tshig brgya'i dbang /_/bcu drug 'od ldan mchu las skyes/_/

[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]ba 'dzin/_/mtho ris snang byed/_bra nye skyes/_seng ge mo'i bu/_mun pa can/_/mgo zlum/_lam nag_/zla ba 'joms/_/nye bar 'phar 'gro/_sprin las ni/_/rnam rgyal dang ni/_sha za'o/_/du ba mjug rings sbrul can
[\[85a.2\]]dang /_/gtsug phud can dang /_skra gnyis pa/_/skag las skyes dang /_steng 'gro'o/_6/drang srong bdun te 'od zer can/_/rgyun shes/_'od yangs/_yan lag skyes/_/bu la ha yi mchod sbyin dang /_/gnas 'jog_/sna tshogs/_gtsug phud
[\[85a.3\]]can/_/khyim rnams 'char ba dus sbyor dang /_/khyim gyi sgo ste de dag ni/_/nyin dang mtshan du longs spyod pa/_/lug dang glang sogs shes par bya/_/grib ma'i lam dang lha yi lam/_/gza' yi mu khyud na ma mkha'i gnas/_/'od gzugs/_nyi ma/_'od 'byin dang /_/
[\[85a.4\]]nyin mo'i nor bu/_nyin mo'i 'dren/_/gsal ba'i nor bu/_nam mkha'i nor/_/so sor nyin byed/_nyin mor byed/_snang byed/_'od ldan/_dgu tshigs 'dra'o/_/ba ru NA/_/'od 'gro/_rgyas byed/_mkha' 'gro dang /_/rnam bsgyur/_snang byed/_pa ti ba/_/cha
[\[85a.5\]]ldan/_nges bsreg_/'od zer ldan/_/'od kyi rgyun dang /_phyogs snang byed/_/sgrol byed/_sU ra/_sU ra ba/_/gdung byed/_tshad byed/_rnam snang byed/_/mun sel/_haM sa/_ma ga dang /_/'od stong byed dang /_'dzin pa dang /_/lus skyob nyin byed
[\[85a.6\]]'dam skyes mtshan/_/nyin mo'i bdag po/_a sri/_pad+ma'i bdag_/ga ba sti/_phyogs bdag_/mchog 'dod/_char 'bebs dang /_/mchod ldan bdun gyi bdun pa dang /_/gza' yi bdag po/_snang ba'i bdag_/nyin mo'i bdag po/_'bar byed dang /_/'dzin
[\[85a.7\]]byed/_snang ba'i mu khyud dang /_/'od byed pa dang /_rnam gsal byed/_/sna ldan/_mig gzugs/_rta bdun pa/_/rta ljang can dang /_tsha zer can/_/'od 'gyed sUR+Ya/_bsten bya marta N+Da/_bdud las rgyal/_/ma zlum marta N+Da/_'phrog byed rtsen pa dang /_/
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]phyogs dgod byed dang /_gtum pa'i 'od/_/'od ldan/_'od kyi skra can dang /_/mi sbyin skyes dang /_'gro byed dang /_/snang ba'i mdzod dang /_nor gyi mdzod/_/rgyu ba'i brtul zhugs/_mdza' bshes dang /_/sna tshogs shing rta/_sna tshogs 'od/_/mchod 'os/_'od
[\[85b.2\]]kyi nor can dang /_/'gro ba'i sgron ma/_bcu gnyis bdag_/pad+ma'i lag pa rtag tu 'char/_/rig byed 'byung dang las sna tshogs/_/khyab byed/_nad med/_'thung byed dang /_/'od kyi phreng can/_'od ldan dang /_/'od snang 'od stong 'dzin pa dang /_/'od gtsang long ba'i
[\[85b.3\]]kha arka lo pa/_/lam ston/_srid byed/_shing rta mtho/_/dbyig gi khu ba/_zlum po 'dzin/_/dus kyi byed po/_bI ta ba/_/bI tha/_snga dro 'dul ba dang /_/srub byed/_rgyas byed/_chu'i chom rkun/_'jig rten mig dang /_nam mkha'i mig_/'jig rten dbang po/_rtag
[\[85b.4\]]tu 'gro/_/srung byed/_dus la dga' ba dang /_/s+yun/_gzugs ma lha kun spyod/_/nam mkha'i thig le/_mkha' lam pa/_/nam mkha'i go la'i nor bu dang /_/'od phur/_taR+Shu nam mkha'i tog_/'od gtsang ldan dang /_gsal ba ldan/_/phyogs kyi mu
[\[85b.5\]]khyud phan tshun byed/_ser skya/_rab gsal skems byed dang /_/las kyi dbang po mun pa'i dag/_/lo yi shing rta skyong byed dang /_/mun 'joms tshangs pa'i rta rnams so/_/130_//nyi ma'i btsun mo rgyal mo'i ming /_/legs 'dor ma dang /_rdul bzang ma/_/'od
[\[85b.6\]]skyes/_gshin rje/_kA lan+di/_/nam gru/_ma nu/_sbyin byed ma/_/skrag byed ma zhes bya ba'o/_1_/nyi ma'i shing rta'i grib ma ni/_/sa skyes ma dang /_gdung byed ma/_/spyod ma/_dal ba/_mdog bcas ma/_/ma ma/_dga' ma 'di rnams so/_/nyi ma'i yongs
[\[85b.7\]]bskor gnas byed dang /_/dmar ser dang ni/_dbyug pa'o/_3_/nyi ma 'khyims pa yongs dkris dang /_/nye ba'i nyi ma'i khor yug go_/nyi ma'i rta ni rgyal po rtsen/_/mchog tu 'jigs dang lte ba sngo/_/yid mgyogs rlung sems/_sems dbang dang /_/yid kyi theg pa
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]zhes bya'o/_7_/de bzhin rtsen pa'i 'od la sogs/_/nyi ma'i rta rnams bcu gcig ste/_/nam mkha'i gru dang /_gser gyi dbyangs/_/nyi ma'i shing rta ral gri'i breng /_4_/re kha'i grib ma lcags mda' dang /_/shing rta'i ba dan can zhes so/_2_/nyi
[\[86a.2\]]ma'i kha lo skya rengs dang /_/brla med/_'od srungs/_khyung sngon skyes/_/rdo ba 'dzin dang /_sgra sgrogs so/_7_/skya rengs pho bo ral pa can/_1_/'dod chags snang ba/_'od zer dang /_'od kyi to ga dang phyogs su 'gro/_/mngon 'dod/_'phro dang /_'bab pa dang /_'od
[\[86a.3\]]dang /_'od zer/_gsal dang snang /_/rang 'od/_'bar dang /_dang ba gsal/_/'od byed/_gsal byed/_glog sgron me/_/smig rgyu/_u sa/_twi go_/g+h+r-i Ni d+h+ri Sh+Ni/_me lce dang /_/me dngas dang /_gsal chen/_po tsi Shi/_/me skya rengs dang ni/_
[\[86a.4\]]'od/_rnam gsal/_brtsa sI/_/mdzes dang /_rab 'dzin/_s+yU nA dang /_/nye bar 'dzin pa zhes rnams so/_38_/snang byed/_snang gsal 'dam kha/_'od zer sbyi'i ming /_zhes dang /_rab gsal dang /_/snang ba/_ku gdung /_shin tu gsal/_6_/'od drag_/nges
[\[86a.5\]]sreg byed pa dang /_/tshad pas/_kun tu gdung ba'o/_/drod dang /_rab tsha/_tsha drag rno/_4_/shin tu dro dang /_tsha ba la/_/mi bzad pa dang /_/gtum pa'o/_2_/cung zad dro dang /_bag tsam dro/_/'jam dro can ni/_cung dro'o/_4_/tshad gdung rlabs ni/_dz+ha lA'o/_/
[\[86a.6\]]ri dgas sred dang smig rgyu'o/_/char pa 'dor ba'i nyi 'od ni/_/brgya phrag_/bzhi pa'i 'od du 'gyur/_/ba mo brgya pa'i kha ba 'beb/_/re zhig tshad pa 'dor bar byed/_/'od zer rnams kyi char 'bab pa/_/'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'o/_/kha ba 'bab pa sim byed pa/_/
[\[86a.7\]]dkar pos tshad pa 'dor bar byed/_/dus dang bgrang bya nyer 'gro dang /_/bstan bya/_slad byung /_'dor byed chos/_/gnas dang /_sI ra/_baSh+Ta dang /_/yongs 'dor zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/_11_/tshes gcig_/phyogs rtsa/_de sogs tshes/_/mun bsal/_nyin
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mo/_bya spangs bas la/_/nyi bcas/_skabs yod/_gnas pa dang /_/rnam bsal/_cha can/_snang ba can/_/nyin mo rtse ba rnams su 'gyur/_10/tho rangs dang ni/_nyi ma'i sgo/_/snga dang /_nam langs/_nang bar zhogs/_/rab tu snga dang /_/'od chags dang /_/'od
[\[86b.2\]]bcas dang ni/_tho rangs sgo/_/rnam par sad dang /_mtshan mo bral/_/sngar dang /_tho rangs zhes pa rnams/_14_/dus min pa dang /_nyi ma nub/_/gtor ma bcas dang /_nyin mo'i mtha'/_/mtshan mo rgyu ba can rnams so/_/srod dang thun mtshams sa sros dang /_/pha
[\[86b.3\]]mes rab tu rgyu rnams so/_4_/nyi ma 'das dang /_phyi phyed dang /_25_/snga dro'i thun dang mtshan mo 'das/_2_/nyin mo'i dbus dang /_nyi ma gung /_2/thun gsum nye ba'i bab laM/_bi na bi/_/mtshan mo rdul ldan sngo bsangs ma/_/thun gsum ma dang mel tshe ma/_/mun can/_nges
[\[86b.4\]]nyal/_nyal byed ma/_rgyal mo/_mthon mo/_dal sbyin ma/_/mtshan mor byed ma/_gdan 'dzin ma/_/bsam gtan ma dang /_bya spangs ma/_/rnam sgom/_gnas ma/_mtshan mo'i ming /_gnas skyes ma/_/thun ma/_dga' ma/_mun pa can/_/nges zhi/_zla 'od
[\[86b.5\]]mig brgya ma/_/skyon ma/_gnas 'dzin/_bu mo ma/_/ri dgas mig ma/_gnas byed ma/_/drag mo/_zhi gnas ma nag mo/_/mi bzad/_sreg ma srung byed ma/_/skyed ma mang ldan/_sbyor ldan ma/_'khor po 'byed ma/_chu ldan ma'o/_27_/nges gzhi gnas
[\[86b.6\]]ma/_/mtshan mo che/_/nges par kun nas nam phyed dang /_/kun 'gro thams cad pa/_zhes pa'ang /_/zla ba mtho dang /_mtshan mo'i smad/_2_/thun dang /_me la tshe zhes pa'o/_2_/mtshan mo'i tshogs ni mtshan mo'i phyogs/_/srod dang mtshan mo'i sgo dag go_2_/zla 'od ldan
[\[86b.7\]]pa snang ldan ma/_/mun pa can gyi mun ldan ma/_/'das dang ma 'ongs nyi ldan pa'i/_/mtshan mo'i de ni phyogs ldan no/_/tshigs mtshams bcad pa tshes gcig dang /_/bco lnga'i bar gang yin pa'o/_/mtshan mos mtshan dang mang 'dzin dang /_nag phyogs 3
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]dkar po nyi mas mtshan/_2_/phyogs kyi mtha' dang bco lnga dag_/tshigs can/_dga' ba/_'phel ba ste/_/de dag mchod sbyin dus su bshad/_/'byung po nag po'i bcu bzhi'o/_/zla ba/_gang ba/_'jal byed rdzogs/_/nya gang ba dang chos
[\[87a.2\]]gnas dang /_/zla ba'i ma'o de nas ni/_/rA kA gang ba/_ri bong can/_/zla ba gang ba zhes pa'o/_/cha yis dman pa rjes 'gro can/_/nyin dang de'i mtshan mo'o/_/gnam stong /_gnam stong gnas pa dang /_/mi mthong nyi zla 'grogs pa dang /_/gnam dang /_gnam
[\[87a.3\]]stong can dang ni/_/stong dang /_zla ba stong pa'o/_/zla mthong /_zla ba gzhon nu'o/_/zla ba nyams pa cha rnams so/_/nyer 'tshe dang ni gzas bzung dang /_/sgra gcan reg dang gzas gnam stong gi ming /_'dzin no/_4_/gza' 'di dag gis zla ba 'dzin/_/zos pa
[\[87a.4\]]dang ni/_me tog ldan/_/nye bar rgyug byed spangs pa dang /_/me yis bsreg dang rang bzhin bsgyur/_/nyin mor byed dang /_mtshan byed dag_/gcig tu sbyor ba me tog lan/_/gza' yi rab tu byed pa'o//_//mig 'dzums bco brgyad kaSh+Tha ste/_/de sum cu la
[\[87a.5\]]cha zhes bya/_/de sum cu ni skad cig ste/_/de nyid bcu gnyis yud tsam yin/_/de sum cu yis nyin zhag go_/de dag bco lnga phyogs yin te/_/snga ma phyi ma'i phyogs dag ni/_/dkar dang nag po de gnyis zla/_/mgo sogs zla ba gnyis gnyis dus/_/de dag gsum
[\[87a.6\]]gyis bgrod pa'o/_/lho byang gnyis su bgrod pa'i lo/_/nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i dus gnyis ldan/_/de yang nyi ma'i 'pho rim las/_/lug dang srang la shes par bya/_/rgyal dang ldan pa'i zla ba nya/_/rgyal gyi zla ba gang yin te/_/ming ni rgyal yin mchu dang ni/_/dbo
[\[87a.7\]]sogs rnams ni rim pas so/_/mgo zla ba'i ming /_ri dgas mgo dang bzod ldan ma/_/mgo dang lo yi thog ma dang /_/bzod pa'o rgyal rgyal zla ba/_dang tshim byed dang /_2_/dka' thub zla ba mchu zla'o/_2_/dbo dang dka' thub 'bras ldan dang /_/snying po med pa sel ba'o/_4_/nag pa
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]sbrang zla myos byed dang /_/nag pa can dang dbo rjes skyes/_/dri zhim ldan dang yid srubs po/_6_/sa ga sgrub byed sbrang rtsi skyed/_2_/snon zla 'dod 'phel rtsa ba can/_2_/chu stod zla ba gtsang ba'o/_1_/gro bzhin nam mkha' thos ldan ma/_2_/khrums dang nam mkha' rab gnas bzhi/_/bzang
[\[87b.2\]]po'i gnas rnams mtshungs pa'o/_4_/tha skar rta sbyor der 'dod pa'o/_2_/smin drug zla ba smin drug can/_/mang po 'dzin dang sag skyes/_5_/mgo skyes rnams so/_/de nas ni/_/dgun stod dang ni kha pa'i dus/_2_/dgun smad dang ni grang ba'i dus/_/dpyid dang me tog ldan dus dang /_/
[\[87b.3\]]dri zhim drod phebs tsha ba'i dus/_/sos ka nges sreg tshad pa can/_/drod 'ongs drod can/_/tsha gdung can/_6_/dbyar dang chu 'bab/_char 'bab dang /_/rab tu char 'bab sprin 'byung dang /_/k+Sha rI char ldan sprin skye'o/_10_/ston ka mda' sbyin dus snga ba/_3_/mgo sogs gnyis
[\[87b.4\]]gnyis rim pa las/_/dus tshigs 'di rnams drug yin no/_/mchod ldan ma dang dbo srang la/_/lho ru bgrod dbyar la ming bcu/_pa bi sha tshigs/_/brgya ko dz+'a ga ra dang /_/mda' sbyin gsal bar nyal ba dang /_/ku mud dang ldan phyi ma'o/_/nag pa ldan dang sbrang dga' ston/_/dran
[\[87b.5\]]pa'i dga' ston 'dod ma dang /_/dpyid ldan chen mo dpyid bzang ldan/_/kurd n+Ti zhes bya ba rnams/_6_/phyogs kyi mtshan mo/_/sI yA li/_/ston 'bring gi ming /_/dwI sa shring+ga lA zhes so/_3_/brgya byin dga' ston rgyal mtshan 'don/_2_/zla ba dang ni dpyid 'bring gi/_nyin zhag tshogs/_/
[\[87b.6\]]dbugs skyes lo yi cha shas can/_/lo yi mdzod dang lo'i yan lag_/6_/bgrang bya 'gro 'ong /_'dor byed lo/_/dus kyi gnas dang zla ba'i phreng /_/dus gling ga ga 'dzin ma/_kyi tshigs phyogs kyi nyin mo'i ming /_dang urba Ta/_/bat+sa dus kyi cha shas can/_/brla/_sam+ba ra/_shA ra/_
[\[87b.7\]]mi bzad pa zhes bya ba rnams/_10_/rdzogs ldan byas dus bde ba'i dus/_3_/bi sal+li kA gsum ldan 'grib/_3_/nyis ldan dang ni mchod sbyin can/_2_/sdug dus las dus rtsod pa'i dus/_3_/zla ba gcig gi yi dgas lo/_kyis/_/nyin zhag lo yis lha yi zhag_/_lo/_lha yi lo/_dus ni nyis lo/_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]stong gis/_/tshangs zhag mi yi bskal ba gnyis/_/tshangs nyin shed bu'i nyin bcu bzhi/_/shed bu'i nyi ma bu la ni/_/lha rnams dus ni bdun cu gcig_/de tshe dus des 'di yis ni/_/phyi ma'i dus su 'gyur ba'o/_/bskal pa'i mtha' dang /_'jig bskal dang /_/yongs
[\[88a.2\]]'gyur dang ni dpyad zin dang /_/'jig dang dus mtha' cher 'jig pa/_/zad dang sdud dang gnyid log dang /_/'gro ba zhig pa zhes bya rnams/_11_/'jig pa'i ltas dang /_nye ba'i rtags/_/nyer bsgyur nyer 'tshe mi bskyed dang /_/lugs ma yin dang rtsa nas 'don/_7_/rab tu nyams pa
[\[88a.3\]]zhig pa'o/_2_/zhes pa dus kyi rab tu byed pa'o//_//'dres pa nag ngo /_sdig pa dang /_/nyes pa/_ltung ba/_rnyog pa dang /_/nyes spyod/_nyes byas/_/a g+ha dang /_/aM ha/_dor bya/_pra pre dang /_/'dam dang /_sA Sh+mA zug rngu dang /_/ru staM/_mun pa/_mi dge ba'o/_18_/
[\[88a.4\]]chos dang /_bsod nams/_legs pa dang /_/legs sdig pa'i ming /_byas dang ni/_khyu mchog go_/rangs dang /_rab myos/_dga' rab dga'/_/yang dag dga' dang /_kun tu dga'/_/kun tu dga' 'gyur/_sdig pa/_shin tu dga'/_/smad bya/_/skyid dang bde dang /_shA ti
[\[88a.5\]]kaM/_12_/dge dang /_bkra shis/_dge legs bzang /_/ma twaM/_shu b+haM/_bskal pa dang /_/skal dga' ba'i ming /_ldan/_legs ldan ku sha laM/_/bde ba/_mtho ris mtho ris gnas/_/zhi ba/_b+h+wan+taM/_shaM/_bde legs/_17_/sdig dang /_sharma/_bsod nams
[\[88a.6\]]bde/_bde legs sogs/_/de dang ldan pa shes par bya/_/shin dge ba/_tu bzang dang /_rab mchog dang /_/ltad mo che dang /_phul byung dang /_dge ba/_/mchog tu gyur dang bsngags 'os so/_/brtse ba/_dge ba/_byed 'jug pa'o/_1_/'dod dang /_mi 'dod 'bras
[\[88a.7\]]bu ni/_/rnam par smin pa zhes brjod 'di ming gzhan yang /_do/_/gnam skos/_lhas bstan/_skal ba dang /_/dbang thang bsag rgyab/_sngon byas so/_6_/rgyu dang byed pa sa bon dang /_3_/gzhi dang thog ma'i byed pa'o/_/gtso bo/_bdag gi ming /_skyes bu/_zhing shes dang /_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]nang dang dbang phyug 'tsho ba bdag_/gso ba gang zag rang bzhin dang /_/rang dang yid 'dren/_A ba sha_/kun spyod dang ni/_sems pa dang /_/lus gnas dang ni/_mchod sbyin sbyor/_17_/yon tan snying stobs/_/rdul mun pa/_/khyad par dus can gnas
[\[88b.2\]]skabs so/_/bskyed bya/_skyed byed/_'byung ba dang /_/skye ba/_dzan+ma ma dzan+ma ma ru Sho/_/dza na naM zhes bya ba'o/_7_/skye ldan/_srog chags/_sems pa can/_/'tsho ba can dang /_skye bo dang /_/skye ba can dang /_lus can no/_7_/sems dang /_sems pa snying
[\[88b.3\]]po/_snying /_/nang gi byed pa li shu dang /_/yid byed yid skye ba/_skye ba/_skye ba/_dang /_skyed pa/_rang ming ngo /_9_/shes rab/_blo dang /_nyal slong dang /_/blo gros/_dpyod pa/_yid tshol dang /_/blo yi byed pa/_bud+d+hi/_mkhas/_/rig dang /_rab mthong /_kun
[\[88b.4\]]tu rig_/sems byed nyer dmigs/_kun tu sems/_/go dang dz+nya sti/_sems pa'o/_18_/yang dag_/rig byed/_tshor ba dang /_/gsal gyur/_so sor snang /_/nyams myong /_/rnam par rig byed nye bar dmigs/_/rab tu gsal dang /_yang dag tshor/_9_/thar
[\[88b.5\]]pa'i lus la khyab pa'i blo/_/ye shes gzhan ni rnam shes te/_/bzo dang bstan bcos 'dzin pa'i blo'o/_/blo dang /_gzungs ldan/_yid gzhungs dang /_/kun rtog yid la byed pa'i las/_5_/sems kyi rtsol ba yid la byed/_/rnam dpyod rnam par dpyod byed dang /_/bgrang
[\[88b.6\]]dang /_/dpyod dang /_rnam rtog dang /_/kun tu rtog dang gtan la 'bebs/_9_/rjes su 'jal dang /_rjes su dpag_/dpyod pa dang ni/_rigs pa yang /_4_/rtog dang /_rtog byed lhag par rtog_/3_/phyin ci ma log par shes pa'i/_/gtan la phebs dang /_nges pa
[\[88b.7\]]mtshungs/_2_/ne ma nur/_yid gnyis dogs pa dang /_/the tshom/_som nyi/_rnam par rtog_/rnam par 'khor dang /_gcig ma yin/_/bi tsi kat+si/_bi tarka/_10_/phyogs snga ma dang /_snga rgol lo/_2_/grub mtha'/_gzhung lugs/_rtsod ldan dang /_/byas mtha'
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]nus pa/_rA d+hA n+ta/_/phyogs phyi ma dang /_yang dag bzung /_/yang dag bzhag pa rnams su 'gyur/_9_/dam bca' so sor mnyan bya dang /_/khas len/_phyogs bzung /_yang dag 'dzin/_/nges pa mnyan bya/_bdag gir byas/_/khas
[\[89a.2\]]len/_so so'i shes pa dang /_yang dag thos dang /_mi bzad pa'i/_/mang+ga ra dang /_u ra rI/_/U ri/_U ra rI yang 'dod/_15_/log par lta dang med pa pa/_2_/gnod sems dang ni 'tshe ba'i sems/_2_/'tshe ba a ba bA ra'o/_2_/nye bar bzlos dang 'byed pa mtshungs/_/
[\[89a.3\]]2_thar pa grol ba zhi ba dang /_/bsil bar gyur dang mya ngan 'das/_/mthar gyur legs pa nges 'byung dang /_/ma 'dres pa dang tshangs pa dang /_/nges par legs dang bdud rtsi dang /_/rab tu tshim dang byang grol dang /_/dga' ba chen dang yang srid med/_16_/don dam pha rol sun
[\[89a.4\]]dpung gnyen/_3_/log pa'i blo gros 'khor dang 'khrul/_3_/ma rig mi shes rig min dang /_/nga rgyal blo gros rmongs ba'o/_5_/so sor snang min shaSh+yi'o/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/_/reg bya 'di dag yul rnams te/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dbang po'i don/_/dbang po'i
[\[89a.5\]]gzung bya'i spyod yul lo/_/'dir ni yon tan mar gyur pa/_/dbang po yul dang yid byed do/_/las kyi dbang po lag pa dang /_/rkang pa bshang lam nyer gnas dag_/blo yi dbang po yid dang mig_/rna ba sna lce spags pa'o/_/bska ba dang ni mchog tu bska/_2_/mang rab
[\[89a.6\]]lany+tsha tsha ba dang /_/kha ba dang ni skyur ba ste/_/'di rnams don ni drug rnams so/_/rnam nyed sbyang spos snying 'bab dri/_3_/bzhon pa can dang kun smos dang /_/shin tu ring nas 'gugs pa dang /_/brjod bya'i rtags nyid yon tan las/_ra dug gi ming /_2_/'gugs
[\[89a.7\]]byed ring du khyab pa mtshungs/_2_dri bzang dang ni sna tshim byed/_2_/'dod pa'i dri dang dri zhim mo/_2_/kha la bgos pa'i ga pur dri/_/legs 'thul dang ni kha la chags/_2_/dring ba dang rul dri'o/_2_/mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o/_2_/kha dog gi ming /_dkar po dge byed
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gtsang dang gsal/_/mdog dkar dang ba dkar snum dang /_/skyang ba chos 'ching gau ra dang /_/stobs byed dag byed ardzu na/_/skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o/_17_/cung zad skya dang 'ol kha'o/_/nag po d+h+yA ma/_shi ti dang /_/s+yA ma mang 'dzin dkar ming dang /_/nag lhang
[\[89b.2\]]sngon po d+h+ya ma la/_/kA la sngo bsangs dga' byed de/_12_/ser po ser shang yung ba'i mdog_/a ru ra mdog ser can no/_5_/ljang gu ljang ser pA lA sha'i/_/mdog ste 'di dag ljang gur mtshungs/_/nag/_3_dmar po ut+pal dmar ba'i mdog_/khrag mdog/_ro hi lo he ta/_5_/
[\[89b.3\]]mi gsal dmar ba skya rengs mdog_/dkar dmar 'dres pa pA ta la/_/ser nag dang ni nag ser ro/_2_/dmar nag dud kha mchin kha'o/_1_/ser nag ser skya skyer kha dang /_3_/ka drug sing+gi sing+gi la/_3_/sna tshogs 'dres ma zal po dang /_/khra bo sA ri shA ri ga_/a ta dang
[\[89b.4\]]ni sha ba la/_8_/piny+dza ra ni dmar ser ro/_1_/pa la k+Sha ni dkar sngon te/_/chu shing me tog lta bu'o/_/ardzun ni dkar po dang /_/nag po'i cha tsam ldan pa ste/_/ku mu da ltar dang ba'o/_/si tA rdzu na rnam rgyas pa'i/_/ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing gsal/_/pAN+Da rA ni
[\[89b.5\]]dkar ljang ste/_/mtshan mo'i ri bong can mtshungs pa'o/_/pAN+Da ri ni dmar ser te/_/rdul ldan tho rangs zla ba bzhin/_/pAN+Da ser po'i cha ldan dkar/_/ke ta k+Shi yi rdul dang mtshungs/_/d+hU sa ra ni dkar po la/_/ser po'i bag dang ldan pa ste/_/ut+pal ltar dngas
[\[89b.6\]]pa'o/_/ma tsa ka ni sngo nag ste/_/zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'o/_/gau ra kha dog dmar ser te/_/gi haM gsar pa ltar gsal ba'o/_/hi ra ta ni nag dkar ldan/_/tA la'i 'bras bu ltar gsal ba'o/_/ro hi ta dang lo hi ta/_/dza ba'i me tog dang mtshungs
[\[89b.7\]]pa'o/_/rak+ta thun mtshams ltar gsal ba'o/_/sho Na ban+tu'i me tog bzhin/_/ha ri tra ni dkar ngan ser/_/nye ba'i thun mtshams sprin ltar gsal/_/sh+yA ba rang bzhin ser nag ste/_/thun mtshams sprin dang 'dra bar mdzes/_/d+hU ma la ni nag dmar te/_/du ba
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dang ni sbur me bzhin/_/dkar ser dmar ljang ka DA ra/_/rtswa yi me dang 'dra ba'o/_/ljang gu'i cha yis dman gyur pa/_/de dang ldan pa pad rdul 'dra/_ka dru gser mdog ltar gsal lo/_/ki rmI ra ni dkar dmar ro/_/kal+mA Sha ni dkar
[\[90a.2\]]nag go_/karbu ra ni dkar sngon no/_/sing+ga na ni dkar nag ste/_/chu yi rnam pa mtshungs shing gsal/_/ka bar ni dud nag ste/_/dud ldan mar me'i 'od mtshungs pa'o/_/bA la dmar sngon dkar ser te/_/lci ba'i thal ba lta bu'o/_/yon tan dkar po la sogs pho/_/
[\[90a.3\]]yon tan rtags rnams de bzhin no/_/ri hi NI/_ro hi tA/_rak+ta/_/lo hi Ni dang /_lo hi ta/_ro hi ti kA/_lo hi ti kA/_rA gA ko NA zhes pa yang /_sho NI shi NA si shing+gA/_/sing+gA lA dang ha ra NI/_/ha ri tA+e zhes pa yang ngo /_2_/sh+ye nI sh+ya tA si tA yang /_3_/nI lA gos dang ldan pa'i
[\[90a.4\]]ming /_/nI lI/_srog chags sman dag go_/sh+ye nI/_ku mu da'i 'dab mtshungs/_/ne tso'i mdangs 'dra ha ri NI/_/tshangs ldan b+hA ra tI skad tshig_/ngag dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang /_/tshig dang /_gsung dang /_pA tsa dang /_/b+ha Ni ti dang /_pa tsa naM/_pa tsa
[\[90a.5\]]tha snyad smra ba dang /_smras dang /_pA kya/_'chad dang /_bshad/_19_/saM skr-i ta ni lha yi skad/_/pi shA tsi ni 'byung po'i skad/_/a pa/_b+h+raM sha_/zur chag sgra/_/rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni/_/ting dang /_supra kyi mtha' can tshig_/bya ba'am ni/_byed ldan
[\[90a.6\]]pa'o/_/pa ri sA Ta/_gsang tshig ste/_/rI ti tshig gi lam yin no/_/rab tu bcings dang /_sbyar ba dang /_/yang dag spel dang /_rgyus pa dang /_/sdud sbyor 'di rnams sbyar ba ste/_/sgra yi ma la ni gu m+b+ya ne'o/_/thos dang rig byed man ngag dang /_/sdeb sbyor dang
[\[90a.7\]]ni/_kha ton lung /_/rgyud dang /_yal ga nges 'gro'o/_9_/snyan tshig_/U k+ShaM/_dbyangs 'jebs dang /_/der ni u pa ni Shata rnams/_/rig byed dag ni gsang ba'i 'o/_/chos dang nges par 'gro ba yang /_/chos dang thos dang sgrub pa gsum/_/nges brjod dang
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ni snyan tshig dang /_/mchod sbyin 'di gsum rig byed gsum/_/bslab dang brda sprod sdeb sbyor dang /_/de bzhin skar rtsis thos pa dang /_/rtog pa dang ni yan lag go_/dran pa dang ni chos dang bcas/_2_/oM zhes bya ba rab bsngags dang /_/tshangs pa yi ni 'gyur med
[\[90b.2\]]sngags/_3_/u dA t+ba dang /_swa ri ta/_/a nu dAt+ta dbyangs gsum mo/_/de lta bu byung sngon gyi tshul/_2_/sngon rabs mtshan nyid lnga yin te/_/rjes tshol ba dang lugs kyi rgyud/_/rtog ge_/sa bdag bstan bcos dang /_/kun nang nye bar dmigs don no/_/bstan bcos rgyud
[\[90b.3\]]dang /_thos pa mtshungs/_/'bel ba'i gtam dang /_phan tshun bgro/_/rab sbyor tshig dang gtam yin no/_2_/gab tshig dang ni/_brda yis ston/_/dri ba'i pho nya shes dka'o/_4_/tshig bsdus pa dang bsdus pa'i don/_2_/bsdus dang /_legs par bsdus pa'o/_2_/
[\[90b.4\]]khyim pa'i gtam dang /_skye bo'i brjod/_/log pa'i glu dang /_smra ba'o/_4_/rab tu brjod dang /_ci zhes smra/_/rjod par byed dang /_skye bos thos/_4_/sgeg ldan skad dang /_nyams ldan no/_2_/gtam brjod pa dang /_de bzhin glu/_/lo rgyus dang ni kha skang do/_3_/ming dang 'bod
[\[90b.5\]]phyogs/_mtshan nyid dang /_/mtshon pa/_rigs dang kun gsal dang /_/kun gsal nA ma d+he ya dang /_bya ba de sha tshig bla dgas/_/brda dang /_'phral sbyar/_byas pa dang /_/kun tu 'bod dang /_mngon brjod do/_25_/gsal dang /_grags dang /_rab tu grub/_3_/
[\[90b.6\]]nye bar 'jal dang /_dper brjod do/_2_/nye bar dgod dang /_smra ba'i sgo/_2_/'di dang /_rjes sbyor/_shes 'dod dang /_/gtam dang /_sgrogs dang /_rjes sbyor byed/_5_/slar smra ba dang /_lan ldon mtshungs/_2_/log par mngon sbyor ngan brjod dang /_/log smra/_sun
[\[90b.7\]]'byin mngon sum spyod/_/spyo dang /_khro tshig_/rnam khros tshig_/8_/rnam par smra dang /_tha snyad dang /_/mna' dang /_khro bor/_shA pa'o/_3_/legs smra dang ni/_rjes chags skye/_2_/yang dag mkhyen ldan snyan grags dang /_/tshigs bcad dang ni grags pa'o/_4_/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bstod pa nu ti/_stu ti dang /_/na ba/_sta ba/_sta traM dang /_/bsngags pa dang ni/_rnam par brjod/_8/smra dang rab tu bsngags pa dang /_/mtho bar grags dang /_dbyangs su byed/_4_/skyor tshig dang ni gnyis gsum brjod/_2_/mya ngan 'jigs dang
[\[91a.2\]]rtse sogs las/_/cong skad dang ni/_yi ge bral/_2_/skal ba mchog dang /_yon tan lhag_/2_/'gran par byed dang /_yang dag dga'/_2_/smod pa/_nye bar spyod pa dang /_2_/nag gar+g+hA gar+g+hA NaM/_/mi bsngags/_dor bya nges smod dang /_/yongs smod dang ni skur 'debs
[\[91a.3\]]dang /_/pi taM ba dang /_ngan bya pa/_/smod dang /_smod par byed pa dang /_/rtsod pa ni/_g+h+r-i NA'o/_11_/de la g.yo ba gang yin pa/_/'khrig pa'i phyir du phan tshun smod/_/mngon par smra dang /_tshig rtsub po/_2_/spyo tshig_/gnod tshig_/bsdig tshig go/_/3_/smod pa dang bcas
[\[91a.4\]]nyer dmigs pa/_/sa ri b+hA Sha Na zhes so/_/u pA lam+b+ha rjes su sbyor/_/mgron gnyer 'bod dang /_'gugs dang bod/_3_/yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos/_/tshogs pa'i sgra ni/_/sAM rA bi Ni/_/sgra chen ko lA haM la'o/_/rjes su smra dang /_yang yang smra/_/smyo
[\[91a.5\]]tshig dang ni/_don med tshig_/'gal ba brjod dang /_'gog tshig go_/mya ngan tshig dang smre sngags 'don/_/khams bde dang ni/_'dri rmed do/_/shin tu smra dang legs par brjod/_/gsang tshig dang ni/_gsang ba'i gtam/_/a sa h+na ba/_a pad+t+ma ma/_/a pa dz+nyA na/_
[\[91a.6\]]a pa hA ya/_phal cher bsdus nas kun bshad pa/_/rkang pa las skyes rgyun chags yin/_/mtho bar brjod dang nges bcings so/_2_/tu mu la ni 'khrugs pa'i sgra/_1_/tshig gi skyes dang /_tshig spring dang /_/bstan pa dang ni yang dag smra/_4_/tshig gi dbye ba phyi ma gsum/_/
[\[91a.7\]]ngan smra dang ni/_ngan brjod mtshungs/_2_/sdig pa'i tshig dang /_mi dge ldan/_24_/dge ba dge ba'i bdag nyid can/_/snyan dang /_shin tu zhi ba dang /_/legs par smra dang snying la 'bab/_4_/tshig rtsub dang ni/_gya tshom dang /_2_/grong pa dang ni/_tshul min pa/_2_/myur bar brjod dang
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]brtabs te brjod/_2_/gra staM/_ngag tshig yi ge phyis/_1_/mi mngon pa dang /_mi gsal ba/_2_/kla klor gyur pa skad nyams pa/_/kun tu 'khrugs dang /_nyon mongs gyur/_/phan tshun 'joms par byed pa'i tshig_/_2_/don med pa dang 'brel med pa/_2_/yi ge bral dang brjod bya
[\[91b.2\]]med/_2_/chu 'thor gtam dang /_mchil gtam mo/_/zegs 'thor gtam dang gnyis brjod dang /_/don stong tshig dang brdzun gtam dang /_/de nas bden dang dga' ba dang /_/phyin ci ma log mi bslu ba'o/_4_/bden sogs bden par smra ba dang /_/bden pa de bzhin mi bslu ba/_/
[\[91b.3\]]yang dag 'di rnams gsum de ni/_/sgra dang nges sgrogs grags pa dang /_/lhang tsher/_ni swA na/_ni s+t+ra na/_/ding 'ur/_nges smra/_nges sgrogs dang /_/sgrogs pa ca co ku co dang /_/dbyangs dang /_grag dang /_skad 'don dang /_/hAs/_rA ba ba ra smos/_/ku ha ri taM/_brjod
[\[91b.4\]]pa dang /_/mngon par brjod dang rjod byed sgra/_/mgrin skyes/_mngon brjod/_nyams ldan yang /_26_/gaM gA'i sgra ni man+ma na/_/ca co ko lA ha la'o/_/shwar+b+ha Ti dang /_tsarba rI/_2_/sgra ldan dang ni brag ca'o/_2_/bA si taM ni/_dud 'gro'i sgra/_/gzhu yi sgra ni bis+phA ra/_/rnga chen sgra ni
[\[91b.5\]]Tu Tu ra/_/gos dang la ma'i ma rma ra/_/rgyan gyi sgra ni pany+dzi taM/_/pi wang sgra ni/_ni kwA Na/_/mi gsal kwo Na/_kwo Na sgrogs/_/khog pa'i ka la ka la'o/_/phug dang ni dbyangs sbed do/_/glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs/_/pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs la/_/pra
[\[91b.6\]]kwAN dang pra kwa Na/_/ka Na kwA Na/_saM kwa NA/_/saM ku Na dang /_sU ku Na/_/a nu kwa Na la sogs so/_8_/'khor nyan khyu mchog dri 'dzin dang /_/drug skyes bar ma blo gsal dang /_/lnga pa zhes pa 'di rnams bdun/_/rgyud dang mgrin las skyes pa'i dbyangs/_/'khor nyan gling bu'i
[\[91b.7\]]sgra lta bu/_/blo gsal rta yi skad lta bu/_/dri 'dzin ra yi skad ltar 'tsher/_/drug skyes zla ba can sgra bzhin/_/khyu mchog ba lang sgra lta bu/_/bar ma khrung khrung sgrogs pa bzhin/_/lnga pa me tog dus ldan 1/_/rma bya sgrogs pa lta bu'o/_/'di rnams thams cad myos pa yis/_/sgrogs
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]byed de yang lnga pa'o/_/kA ka li ni phra ba'i sgra/_/mi gsal snyan pa ka la'o/_/zab mo'i sgra ni sngags yin no/_/shin tu mtho ba tA ra'o/_/cha lang pheg rdob sa man+d+hi/_/pi wang dang ni bar+Na ki_/rnam par spyod dang dbyangs ldan no/_4_/bi wang rgyud ni lA su ki_/
[\[92a.2\]]rgyud rnams lha yi grangs rnams kyis/_/pi wang nyid ni yongs su bsgrags/_/pi wang srad bu ma ru kaM_/pi wang bu ga nA li kA_/pi wang khog pa pra bA la/_/pra pA+e ka_/rtse yi shing 'khyog_/ko lam+ba ni lus yin no/_/thag pa'i gnas dang 'ching ba'o/_/'dab ma'i rgyud rnams
[\[92a.3\]]de yi dbus/_/pi wang la sogs rol mo yi/_/skad thabs g+hu g+hu ri kA'o/_/pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra/_/rnga la sogs pa sbubs kyi sgra/_/gling bu la sogs bu ga'i sgra/_/sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs/_/rol mo rnam pa bzhi po 'di/_/bA ti/_tra mA ta zhes bya/_/sil
[\[92a.4\]]snyan dang ni sil khrol lo/_/mA hA ti dang /_a mA na/_pa Ta ha la sogs pa'o/_/ma hA na dang /_marda ka_/rnga zlum/_rdza rnga a na ka_/a ru ra 'dra'i rnga ang+k+ya/_/nas kyi dbus 'dra ur+d+ha ka_/a ling+g+ya ni ba lang gi_/mjug ma'i dbyibs 'dra 'di dag gi_/barma mu ra dza yin
[\[92a.5\]]no/_/'khar rnga/_dz+hang+gi pa dag mtshungs/_/D+hak+ka/_cha lang marda la/_2_/kA ha la dang sgra chen dang /_/kA ha'i sgra dang /_sbubs can dang /_/gtum po'i ku co zhes pa rnams/_5_/siny+dza la dang /_kA ha la/_2_/de nas D+hak+ka/_guny+dza dang /_/D+hak+ka rnam rgyal marda la/_/rgyang grags
[\[92a.6\]]sgra can/_rgyang grags kyi/_/cha lang /_snyan pa'i pa Ta ha/_/go byed pa Ta ha dang ni/_/lam+b+hA pa Ta ha ming can/_/A na ka dang /_ba Ta ha/_/guny+dza pa Ta hi kA ya/_4_/a na ka dang /_mr-i di ka_2_/'jigs byed rnga dang rnga bo che/_2_/rol mo'i rab dbye 'di rnams te/_/ma ha
[\[92a.7\]]na dang /_Da ma ru/_/muD+hu/_Din+Di ma/_rdza rnga/_/glu rnga/_'khar rnga/_ka ra Du/_na pa/_rang+gi teng+ga ri/_/g.yul du sil snyan sgra dang ni/_/rnga chung gnyis ka Di N+Di ma/_/g.yul 'thab nyin mo'i sil snyan no/_/mi bdag rnams kyis bza' ba'i mthar/_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bza' ba'i sil snyan gang yin de/_/'jig byed zas kyi sil snyan te/_/rlabs kyi 'gros can yin zhes bya/_/byis pa'i sil snyan gang yin de/_/rab dga'i marda la zhes so/_/'tsho ba byung ba'i go byed pa'i/_/sil snyan gaN+Da'i sil snyan brjod/_/thig pa'i sil snyan dag
[\[92b.2\]]dang ni/_/shing rta glang po gnyis ka yi/_/DiN+Di kA dang /_ung+ga ra/_/grong khyer dbyangs dang /_'khor ba'i rlabs/_/mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams so/_/chu tshod bum pa/_dbyu gu'i rnga/_/mel tshe 'dzin pa/_mel tshe'i sgra/_/thun gyi dbyangs dang /_thun gyi skad/_/dus
[\[92b.3\]]kyi sil snyan du yang bshad/_7_/zangs ma'i dbyu gu/_chu tshod dbyug_/bu ga'i tshad dang /_dus 'dzin pa'o/_4_/de nas sbubs can bum pa dang /_/thun gyi tho ba/_dbyu gu'o/_4_/de sgra thun gyi dbyangs dang ni/_/thun gyi traM gar zhes kyang /_2_/shid byed yi dgas rnga dang ni/_/shi ba'i
[\[92b.4\]]ung+ga ra yang ngo /_3_/glang po myos pa'i tang+ga rI/_/myos pa'i traM ga ra zhes brjod/_/na kA ta traM ga ri kA ni/_/dbul po'i pa Ta ha ru 'dod/_/khyu mchog dga' ston sil snyan gang /_/ba lang rnga yi ming can no/_/bum ston 'khar ba'i sil snyan ni/_/'khar ba'i cha lang zhes par
[\[92b.5\]]'gyur/_/ku Tu guny+dza/_shing rta'i sgra/_/lus ldan pa Ta ha yang de'o/_/kha yi sil snyan/_kha'i cha lang /_2_/ga lwa sil snyan sgra chen po/_/ka ra rdi dang /_pheg rdob po/_2_/kU rdza naM ni/_mig gsal sgra/_/tsa Tu/_pa Tu/_spya ba'o/_/gtam pa dang ni/_gar_1 pa/_/2
[\[92b.6\]]re mos smra dang /_rab myos pa/_/rig byed/_sil snyan/_gA ta ri/_/glu len pa dang /_glu mkhan ni/_2_/gar pa dang ni/_rol rtsed pa/_2_/dal dang /_myur dang /_bar pa la/_/tas+t+wam_o g+ho/_g+ha naM rim/_/cha lang /_/myur rdeg_/dus ma ni/_/la yaM zhes sogs
[\[92b.7\]]bya dus tshad/_/lag pa/_rkang pa/_dag dang ni/_/mig gis so sor blta ba dang /_/'dren par blta sogs bya ba'i tshad/_3_/lo bya ba gang gzhan de/_/phan tshun/_la yaHla yaHdang /_/sA mya zhes pa de 'dod do/_/tAN+Da baM/_na Ta ni/_/nA Ta byaM/_lA s+yaM/_/rang+ga/_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]na rta ni/_n+wi traM zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/_/bud med rnams kyi zlum po'i gar/_/hal+lI sa ka zhes par 'gyur/_/rnga gsum gar dang glu dang ni/_/rol mo gar bya 'di ni gsum/_/de nas b+ha kum bA dang ni/_/b+h+ru kum pa dang /_g+hu kum bA/_/b+h+ri ku sa
[\[93a.2\]]ni 'dra ba ste/_/'di dag skyes pas bud med kyi/_/cha byad bzung ba la brjod do/_/zlos gar la bshad rgyal mtshan ni/_/gzhon nu/_jo bo'i khyi'u'o/_2_/rgyal po rje btsun dang ni lha/_/bu mo rje'u'i khyi'u'o/_/lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba/_/gzhan rnams la ni rje
[\[93a.3\]]btsun ma/_/skyed byed pa ni/_A bu ka_/b+hA ba mkhas pa'o mA ri Sha/_/'phags pa am+bA skyed ma'o/_/sring mo che ba an+ti kA/_/sring mo'i bdag po A brti/_/rA dza swA la yul 'khor ro/_/tshogs can ma ni Ardzu kA_/byis pa bA su zhes bya'o/_/haN+Da/_ha ny+dze/_ha
[\[93a.4\]]las 'bod/_/dman pa/_g.yog mo/_grogs mo'o/_/'phags pa'i bu zhes bod bya ba/_/bu mo rnams kyi lang tsho'i bdag_/gzhan du yang ni 'phags pa mchog_/rgyal po che dang mi bdag go_/a pra h+ma N+ya pa sang bya min/_/niSh+Tha zin pa yin te mtshungs/_/
[\[93a.5\]]lus nyams lnga pa zin pa'o/_/ang+ga hA ra/_yan lag bskyod/_/gsal byed dang ni/_tshul dag mtshungs/_/gsal byed la sogs gar la ni/_/snga ma'i yan lag gnas dbye ba/_/gar gyi gnas dang zlos gar gnas/_2_/sgeg dang /_dpa' dang /_
[\[93a.6\]]snying rje dang /_/rmad byung rgod dang 'jigs su rung /_/mi sdug drag shul mnyes pa/_shin pa/_/zhi ba zhes bya nyams bcu'o/_/sgeg pa/_nyams ldan/_gtsang dang 'bar/_gsal ba can zhes pa yang ngo /_4_/sgeg pa'i dbye ba longs spyod rdzogs/_/pa prA lam+b+ha/_
[\[93a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin/_/spra pa/_'phel ba dpa' ba yin/_/snying rje/_thugs rje/_brtse ba dang /_/kr-i pA/_da yA rjes su brtse/_/rjes su chags dang /_shu ka'o/_/ngo mtshar/_'phags dang /_rmad byung /_mtshar/_4_/hA sa ya ha sa/_hA sa'o/_3_/tsa markA
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ra/_'dul byed dang /_/'dul du 'jug pa zhes pa yang /_3_/mi bzad/_'jigs byed/_dngangs byed/_/'jigs/_/drag po 'jigs rung /_'jigs par byed/_/so sor 'jigs dang /_b+hA mu rA/_/b+hI la/_b+hai ra ba/_b+ha yA ba ha/_12_/drag po drag
[\[93b.2\]]shul/_zhes pa dang /_/mi sdug pa dang /_bi bar+s+ha/_/dngangs skrag_/nyam nga /_bag tsha dang /_/pham par byas dang 'jigs pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam 'gyur dga' ba dang /_/zhum dang khro sogs kyis bskyed pa/_/nyams su myong dang rnam 'gyur rtogs/_/de yang nyams
[\[93b.3\]]myong longs spyod rdzogs/_/thob pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur/_/der ni mig bzhi las byung ba/_/smin ma 'degs dang 'dzum rnams 'khor/_/bkra bar nyams myong dag la sogs/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid 'dod/_/mngon 'dod de bzhin bsam pa dang /_/
[\[93b.4\]]rjes su dran pa'i tshogs su 'dod/_/de bzhin skyo dang rnam par smra/_/smyo ba dang ni nad nyid dang /_/dza b+ha 'dul byed kyang zhes pa/_/thob pa'i bdag nyid bcu yin no/_/dgod pa dga' bar byed pa ste/_/de bzhin gnyi ga spro ba'o/_/sbed dang ngo mtshar zhes bya ba/_/dngos
[\[93b.5\]]po bzhag par rab tu bsgrags/_/dbang du byed pa rnam shes kyis/_/dngos po'i lam la skyes pa'i las/_/yid kyi mdud pa ngar sems te/_/nga rgyal sems ni mtho ba'o/_/snyems dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_/ngar 'dzin/_rgyags dang /_dregs/_mngon zhen/_
[\[93b.6\]]bsgyings pa dang ni yang dag shugs/_/kun rtsom/_kun 'bebs/_yang dag bskor/_/rang dbang 'jug dang /_kun nas ldang /_2_/mngon par ldang dang /_zhe sar byed/_/gus byed/_gus par nyan pa dang /_/yongs su sbyong dang /_mchog tu byed/_/sten
[\[93b.7\]]byed/_rab bsten dang ba dang /_/nye bar byed dang /_nye bar gnas/_/kun tu bsten dang /_mnyen byed dang /_/nye bar spyod dang /_u pa sA naM/_13_/ma gus/_yongs smod/_zil gnon dang /_/ring byed/_mi rtsi nI kA ra/_/brnyas dang /_/kun brnyas/_zhum byed
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]dang /_gus med/_brnyas byed smos pa dang /_/pa ba naM dang a ba li/_/a b+hi b+ha bA zhes rnams so/_12_/zhum byed/_ngo tsha 'dzem/_mig dma'/_/hI/_na ti bi sha khrel yod/_2_/bzod pa/_k+Sha ma/_ti tik+Sha/_/sa hiSh+Shu tA zhes rnams so/_/
[\[94a.2\]]gsod dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'o/_2_/mi bzod pa dang /_phrag dog go/_/yon tan la ni skyon sgro 'dogs/_/a sU ya zhes bya ba'o/_/rab skyon 'gebs dang /_'chab ba'o/_2_/do Sha dang ni A dI na/_2_/le lo/_rmugs pa/_snyom las so/_3_/yid lag cags
[\[94a.3\]]dang /_rjes su gcags/_/phyi nas gdung dang /_rjes su gdung /_/bgod pa'o/_/brnab sems gzhan nor chags/_2_/nye bar longs spyod/_/ni rbi sha/_a byA d+hA na/_nye ba'i rims/_2_/'khon dang /_'gras dang /_rnam par sdang /_3_/khon du 'dzin dang /_der
[\[94a.4\]]'dzin pa/_2_/yid gdungs/_mya ngan gdung ba dang /_/niHsa ma'o/_4_/brtson 'grus dang /_sau TI R+Ya dang ma dang /_/su TI ra tA zhes pa'o/_/mi brjod/_khong khro/_khro ba khro/_/ru rta krut+ta/_b+hA ma ko sa/_3_/yongs su gdung ba a ba tha/_2_/'du byed dang ni/_bA sa nA/_2_/
[\[94a.5\]]ngal ba dang ni/_thang chad pa/_2_/ya mtshan dang ni/_ngo mtshar dang /_/dge mtshan dang ni ltad mo che/_/skyo ba sangs pa zhes bya'o/_5_/'dod rgyal/_rang 'dod/_rgyu mtshan med/_3_/yid ches pa dang /_dad pa'o/_2_/rab tu dad dang /_dad pa mtshungs/_2_/bud med
[\[94a.6\]]rnams kyi 'jo sgeg dang /_/rnam 'gyur/_rnam g.yo/_rol pa dang /_/de bzhin bskul dang zur gyis ston/_/'di rnams sgeg pa'i bya ba'o/_/bud med rnams kyi sgeg pa la/_/yid kyi rnam 'gyur las skyes pa'o/_/bya ba so so so so'o/_/rtsed mo'i dngos
[\[94a.7\]]skyes thams cad la/_/brtson par byas dang snying la bris/_2_/bzhad gad/_tshig 'don ca co dang /_/bde phyin/_ku re/_bkyal ka dang /_/bde ba'i dga' ston/_narma dang /_/rtsod dang /_rtsed mo rol pa dang /_/saM sa dang /_re Na kaH_13_/byis pa rnams kyis rtsed
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]mo la/_/be lA/_kan+pa ka_/kr-I Da/_/tUrda ni dang /_laDa naM/_5/lag pa'i 'khrul 'khor/_chu rtsed dang /_/lag 'khrul can dang /_byA rtak+ShI/_/ro ldan pa 'jo'i rtsed mo'o/_2_/shing rta'i sgra dang ko ha laM/_2_/zol dang /_zur ston/_mtshon pa'o/_3_/rang bzhin/_
[\[94b.2\]]bsam/_bdun/_a sha ya/_4_/skad smra/_rnam 'gyur sbed pa'o/_/'tshub pa/_stab stob/_'tshub pa'o/_3_/spyod dang /_spyod pa/_rnam pa dang /_/ang+gi/_ang+gi ta yin no/_/ga chad dgod dang /_kun nas dga'/_/yid dgod/_'dzum dang /_
[\[94b.3\]]bar mar dgod/_/tshang skyes/_rdul dang /_nges gdungs dang /_/nyis gdung /_rab 'bangs/_lus kyi rlan/_6_/ba spu byed dang /_ba spu langs/_/pags pa'i myu gu/_pags me tog_/bu la kaM dang /_tsher ma can/_/ba su'i rnam 'gyur/_ba su dga'/_ur+h+haR+Sha
[\[94b.4\]]NaM zhes pa rnams/_/g.yo dang /_ldeg dang /_'gul dang /_bskyod/_4_/dud mo/_cho nge /_mchi ma 'dzag_/3_/g.yal ba dang ni/_glal ba'o/_2_/yid brtan pa dang yid rton pa/_7_/'ching ba/_'gog pa/_biSh+ka m+b+ha/_2_/gtam 'gal ba dang /_bslu ba'o/_2_/
[\[94b.5\]]rang+gi Na dang /_'dres pa mtshungs/_2_/shes rab gsal ba/_gnyid sad pa/_/dzA ga ra zhes pa rnams so/_4_/gnyid dang /_nyal dang /_gzims pa dang /_/rmi lam legs phab ces kyang bya/_/snyom las dang ni sgyid snyom mo/_2_/gnyid yur ba dang /_mig 'dzums

[\[94b.7\]]chos/_/ngang tshul dang /_/skye ba zhes kyang bya ba'o/_9_/sdug bsngal 'jig rten/_srid pa dang /_/'khor ba rul gnas btson ra'o/_5_/nyin mtshan lo dang /_skad cig dang /_/dgod dang /_dga' ston rnams la ni/_/zhes pa dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis bkod pa'i
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]mngon brjod mu tig gi phreng ba ming gzhan sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba las mtho ris kyi sde rdzogs so//_//sa 'og_rkang 'og_/stobs ldan/_gnas/_bcung 'og_/'og gnas/_/klu'i 'jig rten/_6bu ga_khung bu/_/pad+ma'i
[\[95a.2\]]mig_/nir+b+ya tha naM/_/gsal mthongs dang /_/bi ro ka dang /_da raM dang /_/khong stong /_ts+tshi traM ku ha rAM/_/ran+h+raM ba pA/_shu Shi'o/_13_/sa dong /_gartA paT dang /_2_/bu ga dang bcas shu Shi raM/_/mun nag_/snang med/_mun pa can/_/mun pa nyin mo'i sgo nga dang /_/nam mkha'
[\[95a.3\]]'byor pa nyin mthar byed/_/phyogs gos/_an+d+haM/_mkha'i lpags pa/_/mtshan mo klu gnas sgra gcan gnas/_/sngon po'i phung po mtshan mo'i lpags/_/ta ma sa dang /_spyod skyo/_g.yo/_/mkha' dang /_gan chags/_sa sgrib po/_21_/kun khyab/_mun pa/_sa tha maH/_/
[\[95a.4\]]mun thug_/an+ta/_ta ma saM/_/mun zad/_a ga ta ma saM/_/ri gnas ku dru'i bu rnams te/_/de ni 'jog po/_nor rgyas bu/_/lhag ma stobs rgyu dung dang ni/_a shwa ta ra/_kam+pa la/_/sngo chen/_pad chen/_nor las rgyal/_/bzhin ngan/_bong bu'i spu can
[\[95a.5\]]dang /_/yul 'khor skyong dang stobs po che/_/e ra ba ta logs su gzhan/_/lhag ma/_mtha' yas de'i dbang phyug/_/nor rgyas bu dang sprul gyi rgyal/_2_/tshangs sprul hA la ha la dang /_/rta mchil sprul rgyal bzhin gnyis pa/_/sprul gyi sgra ldan zhes pa'o/_3_/gnyid mi sad
[\[95a.6\]]dang nyal ba dang /_/U lU ta dang /_myur 'gro dang /_/sprul nag dug chen/_chu sprul lo/_/tit+se/_glang sna/_ba lang sna/_/mA lu d+hA nA/_mA tu la/_/khri can dang ni/_rkang bzhi dang /_/rgyal rigs dug med sbrul dag mtshungs/_/khra 'dzin/_skra ldan/_khra bo can/_3_/

[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lto 'phye/_khu nyal/_bya rog lto/_/zas ngan dang ni 'khor lo can/_/ba lang rna ba b+hu dzaM ga/_/rkang sbas/_rlung gi zas can dang /_/rkang bral/_sa nag_/b+ho gI_/sam ko lA/_dug mtshon can/_lce sgril pa dang /_lce gnyis pa/_/sbrul gdug byed dang /_gdengs
[\[95b.2\]]ka 'dzin/_/kha dug can dang /_sbal pa za/_/da pI ka ra/_sAn+na ga_/mche ba can dang /_bum sna can/_dong nyal/_pra ba lA kI dang /_/zlum po can zhes pa rnams so/_41_/sa la 'khyil dang /_'khums pa'o/_2_/so sor sgo nga rul ba 'khyil/_2_/sbrul las byung ba
[\[95b.3\]]dug rus sogs/_/'gas byed/_darbI/_pa Na/_b+ho ga_/nirba pa Ni/_pags pa brjes/_/ro dang /_'ur sgrogs/_gaM ra/_rno/_/dzang+gu la/_ga ta laM/_be ShaM/_7/nag po brtsegs dang /_kA ko la/_/'jam ster/_snying po/_brgyad pa dang /_/sha gam skyes dang /_
[\[95b.4\]]tshangs pa'i bu/_/rab gsal ha lA ha la dang /_/be'u'i lte bu/_rwa can dang /_/me stag can de 'di rnams ni/_/dug gi dbye bar shes par bya/_11_/dug gi rig sngags dug sel ma/_/dug dang /_hA lA ha lam dang /_/hA la ha lam dang yang ni/_/ha la ha la zhes pa'o/_4_/dug gi
[\[95b.5\]]sman pa dug sel ldan/_/sbrul 'dzin/_/sbrul kha sdig pa dang /_/dug gi be con/_gtam rab chags/_5_/'di yi za ma tog la ni/_4_/sbrul gyi 'dun pa'i snod dang ni/_/bya gag 'dab ltar rgyas pa'o/_2_/dmyal ba/_dga' med/_'dod bral dang /_/ngan 'gro de yi dbye ba ni/_/

[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bu btsas skyes dang /_tshegs chen dang /_/dka' ba dang ni 'jigs pa lan/_15_/dbye ba 'di dag gsum du 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho chu gter chu klung bdag_/pA ri ri Ni arna pa/_/ka tsi ga la/_swa rasta/_/bArti/_chu rnams bdag po dang /_/a sA m+wa

[\[96b.1\]]rgyu ldan ma/_/nya lcibs ldan ma/_skyong ldan ma/_/dba' rlabs ldan ma/_sil sgra can/_/sgrogs ldan/_gzhol 'bab/_lha ldan ma/_/'bab ldan ma dang /_bcud 'dzin ma/_/chu yi zegs ldan/_lpags ldan ma/_/'jigs byed shing rta ma dang

[\[97a.1\]]ka laM ku ra/_zegs ma'i lte/_/'khyog po pang+ga zhes bshad de/_/rgyun 'khyog dang ni/_gya gyu 'gros/_/yur ba dang ni/_rnang ma'o/_2_/rgyun 'bab dang ni/_'bab chu'o/_/chu rgyun/_pa NI/_'gro chu dang /_/rab 'bab dang ni/_chu tshogs

[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]gi tog tsi'o/_/chu 'thor snod dang /_'thor byed do/_2_/shing gzhong dang ni chu yi snod/_2_/rting 'jug shing dang bsgyur ba'i shing /_2_/gru btsas dang ni/_mnyan pa'i gla/_2_/rna ba 'dzin dang /_gdos pa 'dzin/_2_/gling gzhan rgyu dang /_gru'i tshong pa/_/gru 'dren pa zhes

[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]tsiny+tsi kA dang ni/_/bA kA tsi zhes bya ba'o/_2_/go cha can dang /_sog ge'i rgyab/_2_/rgyal po'i sgeg pa mang+ga ra/_/de yi dga' ma rwa can ma/_/grong ni mang+ga ra ldan ma/_/shA la/_sha ku la gaN+Da/_/sha ku la yi byis pa dang /_/ga Da ka

[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]kum+b+hA ra/_/chu yi phag pa chu mgrin can/_/a pA da dang /_nya zas dang /_/'bab 'dzin chu yi 'bu zan dang /_/chu yi lcer yar lta bar bya/_11_/go d+hi kA dang /_ni hA kA/_/dza la/_gra ha/_zhes pa'o/_3_/hri dang chu yi bye ma dang /_/chur 'dzul/_chu la rgyal ba dang /_/nya
[\[98b.2\]]'dzin chu yi sre me'o/_6_/byis pa gsod dang /_byis pa can/_/ral gri'i mjug ldan pa la'ang+ga/_/chu yi rus sbal/_chu'i spre'u/_/skad cig dbugs dang /_dbyid/_bdag po can/_/ba shA g+ha zhes pa rnams so/_9_/rus sbal yan lag lnga pa dang /_/ka ma tha dang
[\[98b.3\]]kats+tsha ba/_/yan lag lnga sbas ko Da'i rkang /_5_/sa srin dang ni/_g+hA rgyu rI/_2_/karka Ta dang /_ku lI ra/_/kha gyen phyogs dang /_'phrog byed mig_/ti pa sha na/_lus spas dang /_/ba Di dang ni gya gyur 'gro/_8_/glang po la sogs/_thang la gnas/_/de rnams
[\[98b.4\]]sngon ni chu las skyes/_/kiny+tsa lu ka_/sa srin ta la/_/sa yi 'khril shing zhes pa'o/_3_/shI li dang ni sa srin mo/_2_/sbal pa mo dang dbyar skyes ma/_2_/rus sbal mo dang /_du li mo/_2_/maN+Du ka dang /_dardu ra/_/lus bral 'phrog byed/_b+he ka dang /_/rma yi gnas
[\[98b.5\]]dang /_char skyes dang /_/be ka dga' byed/_shA lU ra/_'phar bar byed dang 'phar ba dang /_/lce med dang ni bshang ba sbas/_13_/chu srin/_chung ngu /_ma k+Shi kA/_/chu'i bu chu yi ma k+Shi kA/_4_/'gron bu/_pa Ta/_hi ra N+ya/_/hi ra Na dang /_rin thang kun/_/za ma
[\[98b.6\]]tog can/_rus pa'i zong /_/cho lo'i sa bon/_zhes pa rnams/_/dung gi khyu dang dung can ma/_2/dung phran dung gi srin mo'o/_2_/dung dang kam+bu ra/_chu skye/_/chu yi ka raM ka dang ni/_/khab kyi kha zhes bya ba'o/_5_/mu tig skyes dang 'gas byed dang /_/be shI'i mdzod dang
[\[98b.7\]]nya phyis dang /_/sa TA lu ka zhes pa'o/_5_/ur zhes bya dang mdzod ring mo/_5_/phu Ta Ti ka_/'dam nya phyis/_4_/chu yi nya phyis 'bu skogs dang /_/spur ba'i bu dang /_sham+bu ka_/dza la Dim+ba/_shi bu ka_/kam+bu ra dang /_baN+Tha ra/_/'dam gyi sbal pa zhes pa'o/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]srin bu pad pa dza lu ka_/chu khyim/_dza lA yu kA dang /_/chu yi snang ba khrag 'thung dang /_/chur 'gro/_chu 'thung de bzhin du/_/pe Ni/_bo d+hi nI dang ni/_/pa Ta lu ka zhes pa'o/_10_/chu nyal dang ni/_chu yi gzhi/_/de la gting med chu sgra
[\[99a.2\]]sgrogs/_/lteng ka 'khyil dang /_chu skyang skyong /_/nye ba'i khron pa chu nyal lo/_2/khron chu/_brus chu/_kU pa dang /_/btung chu/_dus mchog_/kha 'chings can/_/gtsug phud can dang chu yi ma/_8_/rnam 'thor dang ni/_tsU Da ka_/tsuN+DI/_'dzag chu/_tsaN+Da'i
[\[99a.3\]]'dab/_/pa Ta zhes pa rnams yin no/_/a ra g+haT+Ta/_khron pa che/_/rkang pa 'jug pa'i paTa'o/_3_/tri kA/_khron pa'i mu khyud te/_/bI nA hA ni kha 'chings so/_/gyen 'dren bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang /_/chu gyen 'bab byed pra hi'o/_3_/mun nag khron pa chu nyams
[\[99a.4\]]pa'o/_/mun pa can dang 'bu srin gnas/_3_/rdzing bu dang ni brus chu dang /_/mthil can dang ni khron chu can/_/'og gi gnas can zhes pa'o/_5_/'og dang /_tal+laM/_bal+laM dang /_/tal+laM kaM zhes pa rnams so/_2_/kuN+Da/_lha yi rdzing bu'o/_/A khA taM ni/_lhas
[\[99a.5\]]bskos pa'o/_/rdzing bu/_rdzing rings/_logs ngos can/_/mchod sdong can dang /_nya sbal can/_5_/'obs dang /_yongs su brkos pa'o/_2_/gzhi can gong du chu 'dzin pa'o/_/btsugs shing chus bskor bkrun shing dang /_/phyag dang /_rdul skyes/_chu skyes
[\[99a.6\]]dang /_/ke dA ro dang /_shrI tra ha/_/bya yis bskrun dang /_bzhin can dang /_/gnas can/_shi rtsa chu 'dzin pa'o/_11_/pad+ma'i 'byung gnas/_mtshe'u dang /_chu yi snying po/_bzhad ldan mtsho/_5_/mtsho chung /_rdzing mtsho/_lteng ka'o/_3_/'dam skyes pad+ma chu skyes
[\[99a.7\]]dang /_/mtsho las skyes dang /_mtsho la skyes/_/'dab stong /_'dab brgya/_ka ma la/_/'dam la skye dang /_tA ma'i bcud/_/rtsibs 'bigs dang ni/_ut+pal che/_/dpal gyi 'dab ma/_am+bu dza/_/baM ke dza dang /_dza la dza/_any+dza ni dang /_bAM ra dzi/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]sa ra pAM dzaM/_mtsho las skyes/_/sa ro du ha/_sa ro dzaM/_/mi yi 'tsho ba/_dug rab 'joms/_/rgyas byed/_am+bo ru na dang /_/ge sar can dang /_sdong bu can/_/kany+tsi/_dpal gos/_nA li kaM/_31_/pad+ma dkar po/_chu skyes dkar/_2_/ut+pa la dang /_
[\[99b.2\]]ku ba la/_ku baM/_ku ba la ya'o/_4_/kaM sat+so la/_nags ut+pa la/_2_/chu skyes/_sngon po/_dbang mchog dang /_/'chi med/_dbang mo zhes pa'o/_3_/ut+pal dkar po zla ba'i dri/_/kai ra baM/_ku mu da/_ku mu ta/_/zla ba dga' dang /_zla mdzes dang /_/
[\[99b.3\]]kan+toT+Ta dang /_mtshan mo bzhad/_3_/kr-iN+No kan+di/_dpal gyi lag_/ut+pal dmar po bung ba dga'/_/dpal mo'i khyim dang /_ku muta dang /_/ko ka na dang /_mtsho skyes dmar/_8_/ka ta lA raM dang /_dri bzang can/_2_/thun mtshams ltar dmar ha lU kaM_/dug
[\[99b.4\]]gi lte ba pad rtsa can/_4_/sdong bu can ma ni la nI/_/rgyas ldan ma dang pad+ma can/_/puT ki nI zhes pa'o/_7_/ku mu da yi nags tshal ni/_/ku mu di nI'o gzhan mtha' yas/_/kun+di na la nI la sogs/_/sdong bu nA lA nA laM'o/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba tan+tu laM/_/pi si dang
[\[99b.5\]]ni bi ShaN+DaM/_/pad sogs tshal ni/_ka dam+ba/_/ka ra hA Ta/_shi kA/_kan+da/_3_/ze 'bru dang ni ge sar ro/_2_/lte ba dang ni/_sa bon mdzod/_/gdugs kyi sa bon sak+Shau raM/_4_/sam+ba rti kA/_'dab ma gsar/_2_/shA lu ni kaM/_'dab 'khrungs ldan/_/ka she
[\[99b.6\]]ru dang /_shA lu'i rgyal/_/'phags pa dge ba zhes kyang ngo /_3_/de nas shring+ga Ta ka la/_/chu yi tsher ma/_chu'i sgu ra 'khyog_/2_/pra sni bum pa can dang ni/_/chu yi rtsa ba/_chu'i bzhi mdo/_/mkha' yi rtsa ba chu yi 'dab/_/'dab ma chu yi shun pa dang /_/'di ni kar+t+ri
[\[99b.7\]]Ni du'ang blta/_/dza la sU kaM_/sbubs can no/_/she bA laM dang /_chu bal dang /_chu yi rngam/_chu'i len bu/_/kA tsA rAM dang /_chu'i sngon mo/_/chu yi lus dang /_chu yi rtags/_/chu yi skabs dang /_chu'i dra ba/_/chu yi 'dab ma zhes rnams so/_11_/rgya mtsho la sogs
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o/_/sa 'og gi sde rdzogs so/_/snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa'i mngon brjod sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las skabs dang po rdzogs so//_//
[\[100a.2\]]sa gzhi grong dang sa 'dzin nags/_/seng ge mi dang gnyis skyes sogs/_/rgyal rigs dang ni mi zad par/_/'di ni sde tshan drug tu byas/_/brtan pa/_'dzin ma/_nor 'dzin ma/_/dbyig 'dzin/_b+ha rA/_mi g.yo ma/_/k+Sho Ni rgya mtsho'i ske rags can/_/
[\[100a.3\]]i la/_k+Sha mrA dang ni/_k+Sh+mA/_/srung byed/_zhag ldan/_mchod 'os ma/_/mchod sbyin byed ma/_'gro ldan ma/_/sa gzhi 'dzin ma 'dzin byed ma/_sa sbyi'i ming drug cu rtsa gnyis/_sna tshogs 'gengs dang /_nor ldan ma/_/k+Shi te/_kun bzod/_bzod ldan ma/_/mtha' yas
[\[100a.4\]]bcud ldan/_'dzin byed ma/_/yangs ldan rgya mtsho'i gos can ma/_/chu skyob sa dang /_sa gzhi sku/_/rgyal byed/_'byung po 'dzin ma dang /_/d+hI dI/_chu ldan/_gling 'dzin ma/_/gling ldan ma dang 'od srungs byin/_/b+hU me/_urnI/_yangs can ma/_/dri ldan ri
[\[100a.5\]]yi rna can ma/_/rin chen snying mo/_klu yi gzhi/_/ri yi phur bu ma dang ni/_/mdzes chen ma dang /_lus ldan ma/_/sna tshogs 'dzin ma/_bzod ma/_gauH_thang chen ma dang /_ba s+thi lI/_/mi'i gnas/_bar yangs ldan ma/_ma'i 'jig rten dang /_/sa steng
[\[100a.6\]]ro dang ro dang sI/_/chu gter mu khyud dri skyed ma/_/sa bon skyed dang /_rang skyed ma'o/_72_/sa bzang dang ni yid 'ong ma/_/rab dang sa/_mr-it+sA/_mr-it+sa naM dang /_/mr-it+ta/_kA zhes bya mkha' thang /_ba'o/_/sa gshin/_'bru kun skye ba dang /_/ga Ni/_A ra
[\[100a.7\]]puSh+pa'o/_/tshwa sgo/_'gyur byed/_sa can no/_/tshwa sgo can dang /_ba tshwa ldan/_sa bye brag ba'i ming /_/da sha dang ni/_I ri Ni/_4_/sa bye brag pa'i/_ka tsa ga lA/_na ling+gA/_2_/tha dad yid 'ong /_skye ba/_rjes su zos/_2_/sa nag yul ni sa nag can/_/de bzhin sa skya la sogs
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa/_/brjod bya'i rtags can gzhan shes bya/_/s+tha la dang ni s+tha lI'o/_/s+thi Ni la ni/_thang gi mtshams/_/rig pa'i thang mtshams/_bye ma can/_/ma ru dang ni/_mya ngam thang /_2_/ma brkos pa dang /_ma rmos pa/_2_/skye 'gro/_'gro ldan 'jig rten dang /_/sa rten
[\[100b.2\]]dang ni/_gnas rten no/_5_/'jig rten 'di ni b+ha ra rta'i/_/yul te/_hai ma ba ta'o/_/tha ra ta dang /_mi yi sa/_/yi lA/_pr-i taM/_tog gi phreng /_/'phrog byed/_khyu mchog skyes bu'am ci/_/bzang po dang ni dbyig ring bzhin/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams te/_/
[\[100b.3\]]sa steng gi ni yul rnams dgu_/_9_/ku sha/_ngam skabs/_khrung khrung dzam+bU shing /_/pad+ma/_shaka_/shal+ma ming dang /_gling rnams su 'gyur/_/kla klo'i yul/_/b+hA ta nga yi mtha' 'khob po/_/pra mA ga dang /_sgra ngan zhing /_/gangs ri dang ni/_'bigs byed
[\[100b.4\]]par/_/'phags 'khrungs/_bsod nams sa gzhi dang /_/yul dbus dang ni dbus yin no/_/de nas 'dir ni Ad+hA ri/_/'bi dir ya ni 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/'bigs byed gangs ri dag dbus su/_/shar dang nub kyi chu gter ro/_/sha rA ba ti'i mtshams gang
[\[100b.5\]]der/_/'phags pa'i yul la sogs pa rnams/_/yul ni shar dang /_lho dang nub/_/byang dang /_nub byang rnams yin no/_/lha yi chu bo'i bar gang yin/_/dbyangs can tr-i sa tha tI dag_/de nyid sprul pa'i yul yin no/_/tshangs 'khrungs de dag pa Ta'o/_/
[\[100b.6\]]gaM gA ya mu nA dag gi/_/bar bar bzhi ni ri bong thang /_/pra hA sa dang /_zla ba'i 'gro/_/bat+sa'i tshong rdal/_kau shAm+bI/_/gauDI mda' ris suN+Da yin/_/puN+Das mtshan pa ba ran+t+ra/_/ka n+ya/_kun+dza/_g+hA d+hI'i grong /_/bu mo sgur 'khyog_/ku sha'i thang /_/char chen zhes
[\[100b.7\]]pa rnams su 'gyur/_5_/dzi sta ri dang nye ba'i thang /_/'khor mo 'jig dang zhi ba'i grong /_/gsal ldan 'gram dang rgyal po can/_4_/rang byung skyes dang yul 'khor che/_/yul gyi gnas mchog sad ma/_zhes bya ba'o/_3_/me tog dang grong khyer dang /_/skya snar bu zhes
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bya ba'o/_/gnas bcas dang ni ko sha lA/_/'thab med/_dga' mchog_/mdzod 'dzin no/_5_/gau ta ma/_stobs kyi rigs/_/zangs byugs/_ta mA li kA dang /_/dul ba byugs dang /_'phrog byed khyim/_/'khor lo gcig pa/_gnod
[\[101a.2\]]mdzes grong /_/glang po can dang /_lag ldan can/_/glang pos mtshan dang /_lag ldan grong /_/glang po'i yan lag ces pa'o/_5_/zangs g.yog pa'i/_nags tshal bre bo/_rgyal byed grong /_2_/nags tshal dang ni/_khaN+Da baM/_/ma ga d+ha dang /_ka Ta dag_/2_/bar+t+ta ni dang shar gyi
[\[101a.3\]]yul/_/bi ra dzA dang /_'od ldan no/_2_/yangs pa can dang /_'phags rgyal dang /_/srung byed me tog ze'u can/_4_/de yi skyed mos tshal gang yin/_/de ni me tog za ma tog_/lha mo mkhar dang mda' yi grong /_/ko Ta'i yul dang /_dka' bzlog nags/_/
[\[101a.4\]]dmar sdug bsngal bral/_po'i grong yang de nyid do/_5_/grong khyer/_tsam+bA/_phreng ba can/_3_/sgo ldan/_nor can/_grong khyer dang /_/sgo can tshal dang /_phreng ba can/_4_/ga yA/_ga'i rgyal po can/_tI ra/_b+hu k+ti/_lits+tsha bI/_8_/lus 'phags
[\[101a.5\]]grong khyer/_lus 'phags dang /_/ka mi thi la zhes bya ba'o/_3_/rnam par zhi byed/_sgra ngan zhing /_2_/mnyam yod/_chos kyi tshong rdal lo/_/grong gsum dang ni grong khyer ro/_2_/'bu len dang ni/_'bu yi grong /_2_/ma thu rA dang /_sbrang can dang /_/sbrang
[\[101a.6\]]rtsi nye bar 'joms zhes so/_3_/ku ku d+g+hi na/_de yi grong /_/legs mthong can dang /_ku sha'i thang /_2_/skye dgu'i bdag skyes/_pra yA ga_/2_/kI ra dang ni/_D+D+ha ka'o/_2/mtshon cha bzo grong bA hI kA_/tri ga ri kA/_kasmI ra/_2_/kA ma rU pa'i yul la ni/_/
[\[101a.7\]]prAny+dza to ShA/_prAny+dza ShI kA_2_/bang+gA/_seng ge gtsan pa can/_haM ri ka la ya/_2_/ma tA gi D+ha/_ut+ka la/_2/sha ka ma tra/_tu ru k+Sha/_/ma kha dang ni nye ba'i nags/_3_da shes ra dang /_kA mA ru skyes/_2_/phreng ba dang gsum can dang /_srung byed do/_2_/tI ra b+hu k+ti/_
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]lus 'phags dang /_/lits+tsha bI yul shes par bya/_3_/D+wa hA la dang /_rta la brtse/_/mchod rten can zhes bya ba'o/_/kA ru Sha dang /_khyim chen po/_2_/ya da bstu/_daR+sha rta/_shA lwo ta dang /_ku ku ra/_/ku ru pa dang b+ha d+hi'i yul/_/skye bo dang ni/_pAN+d+yA+o/_2_/mi ldan/_
[\[101b.2\]]dang ni/_hA h+nI k+sha/_/a ba d+h+wa ra/_kam+bo dza/_/dzA lan+d+ha ra/_twi garta/_2_ang+ga/_tsam+pa nye mtshan nyid/_2_/mnga' ris dang ni/_yul ljongs so/_/rgyal khams yul dang /_nye bar phyi yul/_gnas/_2_/gats+tsha/_mi dang skye bo mang /_2_/'dam bu can dang 'dam
[\[101b.3\]]bu mang /_2_/ku mud can dang /_ku mud mang /_2_/sba yi tshal dang /_ya mang can/_2_/'dam rdzab can dang /_'dam can no/_2/ne'u gsing can dang /_rtswa ljang can/_2_/gyo dum gseg ma can gyi yul/_/gseg mar bcas dang /_gseg ma ldan/_/de bzhin
[\[101b.4\]]bye ma ldan pa'o/_/yul gang char chus 'bru skyong ba/_/lha yi ma can zhes pa'o/_/chu klung chu yis 'bru skyod ma/_/de ni chu klung ma can no/_/rgyal po bzang dang /_rgyal ldan yul/_/rgyal po med dang /_rgyal ngan can/_ba lang /_mang ba/_ba lang gnas/_/
[\[101b.5\]]ba lang sngon bsdad/_ba lang lhas/_2_/gral dang /_kun spyod/_tshul dang ni/_/bsod snyoms len dang rgyun dang 'dzin/_6_grog tshang dang ni/_grog mkhar dang /_/brgya byin skye ba/_bstI brtsegs/_/bA ma lU ra/_'bu yi brag_/6_/sa yi khor yug 'khor
[\[101b.6\]]pa'o/_2_/lam dang /_rjes ldan rgyu sa dang /_/'jug bya gcig rjes bgom bya dang /_/bgrod bya 'gro sa rkang ldan dang /_2_/brta/_ba naM/_rdul can dang /_/pan+tha/_bA Ta/_sa tha/_ba ha/_/a d+h+ra/_mA Tha/_khu lu ma'o/_18_/dam pa'i lam dang /_mchod bya'i lam/_/
[\[101b.7\]]lam po lam gyi ming bco brgyad/_che dang /_lam bzang dang /_/dpal gyi lam dang /_rgyal po'i lam/_6_/lam bral/_lam ngan/_'jigs bcas lam/_/ka da d+h+ra dang /_ka pa tha/_5_/shriM ga Ta ka_/dbyibs dang ni/_/lam 'dres dang ni/_bzhi mdo'o/_4_/bar
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]stong ring po/_/lam stong dang /_/dgon pa dang ni/_bgrod dka'i lam/_/lam med pa dang a pa thaM/_na lta/_khru ni bzhi brgya'o/_/lcags khrog lam dang /_A la m+b+hA sa/_/rim pas bgrod dka'/_kun rgyu ba/_/ba lang shing rta
[\[102a.2\]]rgyang grags zung /_/dpag tshad lam dang d+ha nu kaM/_/rgyal po'i lam dang kun 'gro ba/_/de ni grong gi nye 'khor la/_zhes pa'i sde rdzogs so//_//grong dang skyong byed grong khyer dang /_/tshong rdal tshong srang gnas dang ljongs/_/smad gnas/_mtshams gnas/_
[\[102a.3\]]karba TaM/_10_/A raM ga dang /_a tri ba/_/raM ba/_pra ti/_rtsAr+b+ba kaM_4_/_grong gi rtsa ba'i grong las ni/_/gyis pa grong khyer nye ba'i grong /_/de la rgyun 'bab/_grong chung dang /_/urba sa su raM zhes so/_3_/'phrog byed zla grong bzang po'i grong /_/dri za'i grong khyer zhes
[\[102a.4\]]pa'o/_3_/'dul gnas/_chos kyi phur bu'o/_2_/mu dAH_trI dang /_dmangs 'gul gnas/_/sa brkos/_spyod pa'i phur bu'o/_2_/sin+b+hu raM dang /_dmar po 'chos/_/pa To li kA/_sbas phur bu/_/'ga' zhig phyag dar/_rdul la yang /_/grong ni bzang po bdun
[\[102a.5\]]brgya yi/_/dbus kyi gnas ni kar+b+ba TaM/_/gal te de grong bzhi brgya'i dbus/_/de tshe dro Na mu khaM'o/_/kun nas 'dam pa'i tshong 'dus dang /_/khyim dang /_dbang po'i tshong 'dus dang /_/grong gi 'gram zhes bya ba'o/_4_/tshong lam/_zong 'tshong ra ba dang /_/srang
[\[102a.6\]]lam/_tshong 'dus/_kun 'jug dang /_/heN+ta zong dang /_a dzi ra/_/thob pa'i sgo dang /_skyed dang ni/_/tshong lam/_dbyangs chen/_brje dang 'tshong /_/ka tsam ga lam/_ni rmu Ta/_/mig mangs yang dag tshogs pa'o/_3_/byis khyim/_khyim gyi sa dang
[\[102a.7\]]gzhi/_3_/'jug dang /_'jug bya/_skye bo'i gnas/_/rab bsngags gnas dang sa gzhi ma/_/rab tu dga' dang /_dga' byed do/_/gri ha/_gr-i haM/_be+e sha dang /_/besh+m+ra dang ni gnas pa yin/_/go haM kun dga'i gnas dang ni/_/gnas khang /_phibs
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'og 'dun gnas dang /_/mtshan mo'i nang gnas sgrib g.yogs dang /_/khyim dang bya ba'i gnas kyang ngo /_/nges gnas/_gnas dang /_kun tu gnas/_/skyabs 'og dang ni/_khang khyim dang /_/khang chung /_spyil po/_'dun sa dang /_/laM lA/_
[\[102b.2\]]ka k+Sh+ya 'jug gnas so/_27_/ra ba bzhi pa/_kun 'jug go_2_/kun gnas khyim dang /_bshes gnyen can/_2_/khang bzangs ra bas yongs bskor dang /_/zla ba'i ra ba/_spyi bo'i khyim/_/khang brtsegs dang ni/_ba Da b+hi/_6_/da d+hi TA dang /_nges byas khyim/_/
[\[102b.3\]]thub rnams lo ma'i spyil po dang /_/mchod spyil po zhes bya ba'o/_/bzo bo dang ni kun 'jug gnas/_2_/rta yi ra ba/_rta yi khang /_2_/'dab chags ra ba/_bya ldan no/_2_/chu khang btung ba'i ra ba'o/_/rgya mtsho'i khyim dang rlung yong can/_/chu yi 'khrul 'khor gnas
[\[102b.4\]]yin no/_/ba si ta pa yi las dang /_/a ba sa nI/_spra yi khyim/_/til mar ra ba 'khrul 'khor khyim/_/dud khang a la n+d+hu kA'o/_/btson ra dang ni 'ching ba'i khyim/_/gsod pa'i myu gu bya ba'i sbyor/_/dka' tshegs gnas dang byed pa can/_6_/tshang ma'i khyim dang
[\[102b.5\]]gany+dza'o/_/grwa pa'i khang pa la sogs la/_/gan+tI dang ni/_ma Tha'o/_/so so'i gnas ni de'i ra ba/_/thub pa rnams kyi gnas dang rten/_/grags pa'i phung po lha yi gnas/_/mchod rten dang ni/_mchod sbyin gnas/_2_/snying po'i khang pa/_kun spyod do/_/'dun
[\[102b.6\]]khang dang ni skye bo'i gnas/_/sa gzhi dkor mdzes 'dun khang mchog_/snying po'i khang pa/_gnas khang dang /_/longs skyod gnas su de brjod do/_/mtshan dang mtshan gyi bar dang ni/_/mdzod rab dang ni 'dun khang ngo /_2_/bang mdzod dang ni mdzod yin no/_/a

[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dang ni rgyal po'i khang /_/'du khang rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_/bde legs can dang kun nas bzang /_/mdog mdzes dang ni 'phel ba can/_/dga' ba 'khyil pa la sogs dang /_/gzhan yang sgo sgrigs sogs kyis phye/_/khyad par bkod pa

[\[107a.3\]]shug karka n+pa/_/bi ci la 'dog 'bras zhim dang /_/'bras ldum can zhes bya ba'o/_/ko la/_shin tu dpa' skyes dang /_/rgya shug g+hoN+Da/_sa stobs dang /_/sa la nges gnas zhes pa'o/_4_/'bras bu nag min/_bi gu 'bras/_/sde bzang dang ni lag 'joms
[\[107a.4\]]so/_4_/bil ba dpal gyi 'bras bu dang /_/shAN+Di l+ya dang /_mA lU ra/_/ha rI rta kI/_ka pi ta tsha/_/shelU Sha dang rab mchod mig_/mA gan+dA dang /_ma la kAM/_10_/'di mi sdong bu/_laM ga lI/_/nA li ke ra/_tsug ldan dang /_/bu ga byed dang /_chu ldan mgo/_/
[\[107a.5\]]'bras ba mi pa'i ming /_ldan mgo rgyan/_bu taM drang srong gi dbye bas/_ka_/_bA na'i chu dang /_'bras rtag dang /_/me tog rtags dang 'bras bu'i phung /_/sbyang ba'i piSh+ka/_me tog sgrom/_/gnya' shing gi ming /_ha DA'i 'bras can/_sa 'tsho'i 'dab/_/tA la'i rgyal dang bcud

[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]bya dang ni shing thog mngar/_8_/'bra go'i shing gi pung po la/_/sa skyong dang ni dzam+bU skyes/_/pr-i yang+ku dang 'bras ldan ma/_/sngo bsangs can dang /_kA ri b+ha/_/bud med ming can sna tshogs sde/_/dri yi 'bras can/_kun+d+ra dang /_/so la phyag 'tshal 'bras bu can/_/'khri

[\[110a.1\]]mchin dgra se 'bru'i me tog go/_4/gA la ba dang shA ba ra/_/lo d+h+ra/_ti rI Ta/_ti nyu/_/byi dor byed pa zhes bya'o/_6_/tsi ra bi lA mtshan mo'i phreng /_/lag skyes/_ka rany+dza ka'o/_4_/so sor byang skyes/_pra kIrma/_lA Ta byed skyes/_pa tI

[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]me tog go/_/sau ma ri ya ga ni/_dz+hiN+Di yin te/_de dmar na bu ba ka dang /_/se ban ku ruN+Ta ka ste/_dz+hiN+DI de dang lhan cig spyod pa gnyis so/_/dzIN+DI sngon po ni gnyis te/_nags kyi 'bangs dang /_tshogs can ut+pala'o/_/'di na rtig la'o/_/de nas klu'i lce dang /_ba

[\[111a.3\]]brnas te/_ku thi ra ka dang /_ku thil+la ka dag go/_/'di dkar na ardza ka dang /_dri'i su can dang /_bu thi ra ka'o/_/sa mI ra Na dang /_ma ru ba ka dang /_bras+tha puSh+ba dang /_ha nidz+dza ka dang /_dzam+bI ra'o/_2_/de nas hrI be ra ni lha'i sgra dang /_chu'i ming can to/_/dA la dang /_dri'i chu

[\[111a.5\]]byed do/_5_/shing za ba dang /_sri srid 'gro ba dang /_'tsho byed dang /_bya rog skyes dang /_shing skye yang de'o/_5_/de nas 'od ldan ma dang /_til ser can dang /_phug ron can dang /_ing+gu rI dang /_ro kha ba dang /_'dor byed dang /_dka' thub sbyar dang /_shing shun

[\[115a.3\]]ma dang /_sha ni 'dab/_4_/dArbi ka dang /_ba lang lce/_/da rbi 'dab ma can dang ni/_/gser gyi 'o ma can yang de'o/_/me tog brgya ba kA ra bI/_/a ka k+bu Sh+pi/_gdugs dkar dang /_/shin tu gdungs dang mi si dang /_/ma d+hu rA zhes pa rnams so/_78_/ra ba skyes dang si ba
[\[115a.4\]]dang /_/mngar ldan mi sI g.yo ba dang /_/ne ste ya zhes pa rnams so/_6_/kun tu reg dang /_dza tu byed/_/skyed ma bye ba zhes bya dang /_/mchod sbyin ma dang /_dzi rU kr-i ta/_/'khor los sgyur ma rnams yin no/_7_/sha TI sha thi kar+ts+tshu ra/_/mdud pa drug pa tri'i sha ShI/_/sa lA
[\[115a.5\]]sa dang spos kyi rtsa/_7_/sbubs ldan byu ru'i 'khri shing dang /_/phug ron rkang dang gar mkhan ma/_/don bzang rdzas kyi sdong bu'o/_5_/skye ba'i skra dang /_d+ha ma n+ya/_tan+ta haT+Ta bi lA dang /_/sbos rdzas sI nI zhes bya'o/_4_/nya phyis dung dang /_rmig pa dang /_/ko la'i 'dab dang sen
[\[115a.6\]]mo yi/_5_/na kha'i/_alba Ta ki dang /_/bya rogs dang /_sbyong byed ma/_/sa can yul 'khor skyes pa'o/_5_/'khyog po gang byed grong bcu pa/_/stobs skyes pa ra sa la kaM/_/rkyal 'gro/_sngon 'gro/_rkyal mchen pa/_/ke ba Ti zhes bshad 'di rnams/_/gla sgang ming du
[\[115a.7\]]blta bar bya/_8_/gcan gzan mtshon cha/_stag sen dang /_/lag skyes 'khor lo byed pa skyes/_4_/dus rjes 'brang dang gzhi 'dzin bsil/_/rdo yi me tog_/rgan po dang /_/brag las byung dang brag las skyes/_6_/tshogs bde dang ni srin mo dang /_/gtum mo nor 'phrog
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bde bam dang /_/bu ngan tshogs dang 'bangs mo dang /_8_/gaN+Di'i me tog/_Do ka Ta/_2_/gaN+Di ra dang /_mnyam gnas 'dzin/_/nye ba spyod dang /_sha maN+Tha/_/'di la chu yi rma bya can/_5_/dpal gyi lag ldan b+h+ru rU N+DI/_/'bras bu/_be b+h+ra/_ki Ta laM/_/ku ri bin+da sprin
[\[115b.2\]]ming can/_/masta dang ni/_musta kaM_/guN+Da/_rdul can/_se ru'o/_/gtsug phud 'dzin dang 'bras gang dang /_/skyong byed 'khor lo 'dzin guN+Da/_/kra ma ka dang mkha' yi grong /_/i tri ka dang /_shi lIn+b+hAM/_/i du lI raM dang /_kan+da laM/_/lus bral bcud
[\[115b.3\]]lngar/_sa dang ni/_/sgeg pa dang ni ba ka'o/_7_/yal ga nag po dus skyes dang /_/shA tha dzi hwar sA ta kaM/_4_/gzhi can dga' byed yal ga dpa'/_/tsan+di rA laM/_sprin dri med/_/Tak+ka'i yul can/_sAM shu'i 'dab/_/dngos po can zhes bya ba rnams/_8_/rtsa ldan
[\[115b.4\]]pa dang /_lte ba'i 'dab/_/zhing skyes dang ni dben par spyod/_4_/sA ta ki ni myos byed rkang /_/'khri shing mchu dang /_steng phur dang /_/mjug ma can zhes bya ba'o/_/shA li dang ni/_san+du ra/_/lcags gsod pa dang /_yul 'khor che/_/ba rA TI bris/_mA ri Sha/_/
[\[115b.5\]]pa To la dang /_sa bdag 'bras/_/tik+ta/_karka shi yi 'dab/_/ya Tu dang ni ka la kaM/_6_/'di yi 'khri shing /_kA li kA/_/rtsa ba dga' byed/_dI brin+ta/_/sen mo dang ni runy+dza la/_2_/ka Ta mab+ha rA 'dab ring dang /_/chu bo zhags ldan ka la mabI/_4_/hi la mo rtsI tshangs ma'i chu/_/
[\[115b.6\]]nya lus ma dang 'di rnams mtshungs/_3_/bi tun+d+ra rka/_'dab ma'i zhing /_/legs gnas dang ni tsu tsu'o/_/'dab bu can dang shog shing dang /_/pi spa lI dang /_bya yi zas/_4_/seng ldeng ba dang ni yid byed ma/_/mnyam lus 'dud dang /_dbu ba can/_/sdong nag_/shu ka

[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]mo/_/de nyid ljang gu sman chen no/_/sgog skya/_ke'u/_a riSh+Ti/_/rA pr-i hra ta siSh+Ta/_/rA son/_tsha ba'i rtsa ba/_rtsa ba cha/_/kla klo'i spros te 'di rnams dgu/_/de nas ma d+hA lu ka la/_/lha yi lo ma tsher ma med/_/'bras bu'i me tog_/pa raN+Da lu/_/gaM
[\[116a.2\]]gA ra gnas 'dzin yu ta'o/_/bde legs mau ta/_dpal gyi mgo_/su ra ki ts+tsha bar ma can/_/kab+dI'i rgyal dang /_gdugs kyi bu/_/thang gi pad+ma nga rgyal can/_6_/kab+dI/_kan+dA/_ya la ga'i khyon/_/bi taN+Da dang /_nga rgyal chung /_4_/'ded byed/_skem byed/_'brum pa
[\[116a.3\]]'joms/_/ka ra bel+la/_kA thi lU/_/steng dkar ba dang /_pa rA ru/_rang ro/_ba ku la'i sa bon/_/de ni rA dza ba ro li'o/_7_/'di rnams sa dza kuSh+maN+Da/_/lo rgyus ma dang /_mtshan ldan ma/_/rab tu tshugs dka'/_b+haN+Da kI_/'khyog po 'phel ldan chen po dang /_/bil

[\[116a.5\]]bI ru/_nya phyis rnams/_/shAr+Ni briN+ta/_bde gnas dang /_/mA lut+ti na/_te mi ShA/_4_/de nas ba lang mig dang ni/_/go du m+bA dang /_glang po tsi b+ha Ti zhes dang /_kaM ka chen mo zhes pa rnams/_5_/yangs pa chu lha'i dbang mo dang /_/dbang mchog/_ba las gzhan pa dang /_/

[\[116b.1\]]po dang /_/karmA dang /_shun pa'i snying /_/ki lA Ti na tshigs brgya pa/_/tshigs bzang rtsa'i tog_/rtsa'i rgyal mtshan/_/'od ma nas kyi 'bras bu dang /_/sa bon gyis 'chi 'gyur med dang /_/brjid ldan rnga zlum ba tI na/_26_/ka rI ra dang 'od ma dang /_/karka ra 'o gang yang

[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]ka'o/_5_/gdugs dang shin tu gdugs dang skyong /_/gdugs kyi rnam pa rtswa'i bye brag_/se g+hau zhes bya ba'o/_/phreng ba'i rtswa dang sa yi rtswa/_2_/sha Sh+yaM dang ni rtswa gzhon nu/_2_/rgyal ba nyer rgyas phyugs 'dzin no/_3_/thun mong ma yin rtswa skye ba/_/kun tu skye dang rtswa dmar

[\[117b.1\]]b+ha lU dang /_/b+hA l+mu kAl lu b+hal+lA ga_/b+ha lu kA dang /_ats+tsha dang /_/phug du nyal/_spu rings dang /_/a ba ba du/_ngan pa'o/_9_/de nas bsel/_khaD+ga dang /_/rwa can dang ni/_pr-I Ni dang /_/spro ba'i tshogs dang /_gtsigs pa can/_/de la ka ni mchog yin no/_/

[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]nad med/_/ri bong dang ni/_spu 'joms dang /_/nags kyi byi ba/_sgeg pa'o/_/zhum bu byi la khrus mkhan dang /_/byi ba gsod dang /_byi ba za/_/mtshan mo spyod dang /_byi zas can/_/kun tu la dang /_grong gi spre'u/_/'dor byed

[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]rtsangs pa dang ni/_mig sman rtsa/_7_/kr-i ka lA sa sog le can/_/nyin sa ba dang ral gri can/_/tse dA ra dang /_rtswa'i da byid/_/rtsangs phran dang ni khyim gyi rtsangs/_/mthu bo dang ni khyim ldan dang /_/mdung can ltas shes tsa TaM gi_/gshol ldan dang ni/_bkra ba dang /_/rgyal

[\[118b.3\]]bya'o/_/'dis bcings/_rgya dang 'dra ba'o/_/rta shig pa dang sdig pa'o/_/'bu phran dang ni sbur bu dang /_/'bu nar dang ni mjug ma can/_/ba mi/_za byed/_ka ba Ti/_/nye lus nye bar phyogs pa dang /_/skra 'dra/_nye ba'i lce can no/_/grog ma dang ni/_srin

[\[118b.5\]]dang /_/mkha' la 'gro dang /_mkha' la 'phur/_/pa ta 'ga' dang /_'dab gshog can/_/'dab skyob dang ni/_'dab mas skyob/_/bya dang /_sgro ldan/_sha kun+da/_/sha kun+ta ya bi ka re/_/bad+ki ra dang /_nam mkha'i rta/_/mkhar nyal/_tshong las byung ba dang /_/
[\[118b.6\]]'dab ldan gshog ldan/_nam mkhar 'gro/_/dge mtshan can dang /_lus mgyogs dang /_/'gro byed 'dab ma'i shing rta yab/_/mkha' la spyod byed me yi mgrin/_/spu can dang ni gnam la spyod/_/na tshod gnas dang /_mkhar 'gro dang /_/tsany+tsu dang ni dr-il+lI tsA/_/
[\[118b.7\]]dzA ne ka dang gnyis skyes dang /_/lce gnyis pa dang /_kI kI shA/_/steng 'gro dang ni shing la gnas/_38_/'dab ma'i theg pa na tshod gnas/_/br-i pa lA k+Sha ta ru sha_/dpyid kyi pho nya ngag snyan dang /_/yud+hAr+b+ha la bi ka dang /_/ku hU'i mgrin ldan phrog byed gtam/_/mgrin
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]snyan kha nas ku hu 'don/_/nags su dga' dang /_gzhan gyi gsol/_/khu byug dang ni gzhan gyis rgyas/_/'dod pa'i pho nya ma d+hu kaN+Tha/_/'dod pa'i tA la/_ku hU snyan/_/mig mdzes dang ni bya rog gsos/_/dbyangs
[\[119a.2\]]mkhas/_su tra rnga na dang /_/dbyangs snyan 'bras bus nam mkha' 'gro/_/nags la rag lus gzhan la sems/_/khu byug skad dang lnga pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi'i sgrar yang de brjod do/_27_/rma bya/_sa 'gro/_mdangs ldan dang /_bkra ba bkra ba'i 'og pag can/_/
[\[119a.3\]]gtsug phud can dang rtse mo can/_/ko ki'i sgra can rab g.yo dang /_/ki sha ra dga' mgrin sngon can/_/si tA sang+gA zhes bya dang /_/'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa dang /_/rna rgyan can dang sen mo'i gar/_/gtsug phud can rgya mtsho skyes dang /_/'dab brgya pa dang /_
[\[119a.4\]]sprin gyis sgeg_/me nA da dang mgul pa sngo/_/mjug sgro can dang /_legs bris sgro/_/sil sil sgrogs dang lag 'gro za/_/shed la brtse dang brtan par grags/_/gar mkhan ri mo dmar ser can/_/byi dor byas pa'i mgrin ldan pa'o/_30_/rma bya'i thig le u
[\[119a.5\]]ruN+Da/_/mjug ma mdongs ldan de bzhin du/_/gtsug phud dang ni rab g.yo'o/_4_/zla kham dang ni mdongs lon no/_2_/thod dang gtsug phud nyid kyang ngo /_2_/ko kI'i tshig ldan gtsug phud can/_/bya rog la ni gtor za dang /_/sgra ldan dang ni/_mau ku li/_/kha ta bo na ga 'chi med/_/gtor mas rgyas
[\[119a.6\]]dang /_brgya byin skyes/_/lhan cig skyes dang bdag nyid sgrogs/_/dga' bas/_rgyud dang thos sgrogs dang /_/'khrig pa sbed dang /_luN+DA ka_/dri pa sa dang /_kA na dang /_gzhan gso byed dang /_drod gsher spyod/_/bden pa'i ngag dang /_rab dga' dang /_/lte ba skyes dang g+ha kA sgrogs/_/
[\[119a.7\]]dbang skye sU trI/_dwika tra/_/Nau pa ra 'chi/_dpa' bo can/_/kA Nu nga dang /_kA ku shes/_/rilbA ta li gtam can dang /_/lan cig dga' dang tsher ma'i tshang /_/rdo rje mchu can mdog gcig pa/_/sgrogs ldan zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/_36_/bya rog chen po kA ko la/_/rag+ha
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bya rog mau ku li/_/bya rog mnan dang /_bya rog nag_/'chi ba slu ba zhes bya'o/_7/de nas 'ug pa nyin mo 'jigs/_7_/bya rog dgra dang /_be tsa ka_/mtshan mo spyod dang dri bAn+da/_/brgya byin bshad dang /_rna 'khyog dang /_/'phrog byed mig dang /_/bya rog 'jigs/_/sen mo shI
[\[119b.2\]]sI g+ha g+ha bo/_/mtshan mo za ba rnams yin no/_12_/dmar ser la ni se rtsi ka_/'ug pa/_tsa Ti kA yin no/_3_/kr-ik+tA/_gtum mo/_ri skegs dang /_/myos byed thur ma/_rjod byed ma/_mig bkra ma dang rkang bkram/_/mtshon byed brtod pa'i snyem pa'o/_9_/rnam par 'gro byed ku Na yI/_/
[\[119b.3\]]sa 'thor dang ni go rA Ta/_4_/bya gag_/sa gnas/_bA li ka_/kr-i mi dang ni ku ku sgrogs/_5_/ne tso/_'dab ma za ba dang /_/'thor byed yid gzhungs/_tsa sh+tsi mi/_/blo gsal shin tu gnas pa dang /_/'khyog po'i mthu can zhes bya'o/_/sau d+b+hA kI dang /_mi gnas dang /_/
[\[119b.4\]]ngag skyes/_dbang po/_3_sgra dang /_/spyod byed sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi 'dod/_/sbrang rtsi brtul zhugs/_sbrang rtsi byed/_/sbrang rtsi myang dang sbrang rtsi skyong /_/sbrang bu me tog zas can dang /_/bung ba nyam chung sbrang ma dang /_/me tog 'jug

[\[119b.6\]]spos dang ldan/_/ro myong mchog dag skad cig 'dres/_/snying por son pa zhes bya rnams/_33_/sI ba ba ta/_sgra snyan dang /_/skad cig 'dod ldan 'gyur dga' dang /_/rab tu dang dang /_ku k+ku Ta/_/dz+nyIl+lI sgrogs dang /_khyim phug ron/_/bA rA ba ta/_ka pa ta/_/ka pa ka ni
[\[119b.7\]]phug ron no/_2_/Dom+bI'i ba rA ba ta ni/_/kha cig khyim gyi phug ron no/_/khany+dza rI Ta/_ka NA TI na/_/khany+dza le kha/_kha ny+dza na/_/bzang ming gra dang /_ni Shi sta/_/rta lo gyu ni/_bu can dang /_/bya rog skugs dang /_mgrin nag dang /_/ni d+hi ra ta/_sha ra ta/_/ka rka ra'i mig_/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]ston ka spyod/_/tshang sbas/_raT tsa ra dang /_/tsa Ta ka'i/_rgyal char mtshon byed dang /_/char lha dga' ba'i sil snyan dang /_/khany+dza ri Ta lan cig dga'/_/lan cig tu m+bi zhes bya rnams/_/23_/hA yi bu mo/_yungs kar ma/_/bzang mo
[\[120a.2\]]khany+dza li kA dang /_/ma can/_sA rang+ga/_ban+di/_/thub pa'i bu dang /_si ta dang /_/khug rta dang ni/_chu nyung dang /_/sprin 'degs/_sprin rlong /_spri shaM ku/_/char la dga' dang /_dga' sgra sgrogs/_10_/khug rta gzhon nu tsA sI ha/_/zangs kyi gtsug phud kr-i ka sgrog_/
[\[120a.3\]]bya gag rkang pa'i mtshon cha can/_/snga bar sgra sgrogs mtshan mo rig_/mig zlum ka lA bi ka dang /_/sA la 'gro mkhas tsa Ta ka_/zung gi dbyangs sgrog mtshan mo skad/_/bde legs can dang yongs su mig_/dga' byed/_gso byed 'phel byed dang /_/pags pa'i
[\[120a.4\]]gtsug phud mya ngan med/_/nor bu'i mgrin can 'od kyi ste/_21_/_mchil pa ka la ping+ka yin/_/rgyab bkra/_khyu mchog bgrod pa dang /_/mgrin sngon bkra ba'i rgyal po dang /_/khyim du tshong byed/_khyim du nyal/_/rigs can dang ni/_nyer chags rnams/_10_/de yi chung ma mchil pa
[\[120a.5\]]mo/_/bu ni tsA Ta kai ra'o/_/bu mo tsA Ta kai ba hi/_/ri dgas dbang dang /_mchil ba sogs/_/gsod mkhas/_'dzin byed 'joms byed pa'o/_/tsi r+Na dkyil 'khor can spyod byed/_/mkha' spyod dang ni ring du smra/_/'pho ba mgrin tshang mkha' la 'khor/_/rlung gcod pa dang ring
[\[120a.6\]]'dor ro/_/de nas bya rgod/_dA k+ShA t+ya/_/ring du mthong ba zhes bya'o/_3_/khra dang ri bong za ba dang /_/ba TI bA dzi mkha' la 'gro/_/g.yo ba zhes bya rnams yin no/_/tit+ti ri da/_gshog bkra dang /_/sha chu ka biny+dza la'o/_4_/byang chub b+ha ra/_dwA dza'o/_2_/khrung khrung /_kruny+tsa 'khor la
[\[120a.7\]]gnas/_/biSh+Ta ling+gA mdog can no/_/lA ba ka dang /_'gro nyung ngo /_/kuk+ku b+ha ni ku lA la/_/ku kU Ta dang /_bu ga'i dbyangs/_/sdu mchan/_dud pa du ba/_sreg pa dang /_skyes/_/a Ta'i rgyal po/_gshog ldan dang /_/hing+ga ka zhes bya ba rnams/_6_/karka re Tu/_ke ra Ta/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ka Ta Tu dang /_ka rka rA/_4_/shing rta mo dang /_shing 'joms dang /_/mgrin ring dang ni 'dab brgya pa/_/kr-i ka Na dang /_kra ka ra'o/_6_/tsA sha/_kI ki di bi dang /_/gser gyi gtsug phud ma yi rtags/_/de bzhin mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po'o/_4_/shang shang te'u dug 'chi dang /_/'tsho ba
[\[120b.2\]]'tsho byed/_tAn+dA la/_4_/'od la dga' dang /_mchu g.yo dang /_/tsa ko ra dang /_dug mtshon byed/_4_/rA ti/_rA Ti 'dam bu'i dgra/_/mgrin ldan/_gzhon nu/_dA rgyu ta/_/mgrin dkar dang ni/_a t+yu ha/_/kA ko mang+gu/_/k+'a thA d+hu rA/_/gi gA tsil+mi/_de baT+Ti/_/sna tshogs
[\[120b.3\]]can chu'i bya gag_/4_/mat+pa ra ka_/dz+hA m+bA NAM/_/ma Ni tsa ka_/chu'i mang+gu/_4/TiT+Ti D+ha dang /_ka Tu'i sgra/_/steng 'gro dang ni/_nyal byed do/_4_/rgyang grags thos dang /_sgra sgrogs dang /_/ku ta rA dang /_nya 'joms so/_/dur pa 'khor lo/_'khor lo can/_/shing rta'i lus kyi ming can
[\[120b.4\]]dang /_/gnyis gnyis sbyor dang mkha' la gnas/_/'od ldan mtshan mo 'bral byed do/_8_/lcags rgyab dang ni/_kar+d+ha dang /_/rkang ring ko la'i mjug ma can/_4_/ga le gan+Da/_brka Da/_/chu skyar ka la haM ba yin/_/chu can rkyal byed mang+ga dang /_/ki kA dang ni nya 'bigs
[\[120b.5\]]byed/_4_/sprin gyi bya dang gtsug phud can/_/mchod stong can chu'i kuk+ku b+hA/_/go b+haN+Da ra/_'dam 'thor ro/_/rgyal po'i cod pan/_hA'i bu mo/_8_/bya dkar/_ba ka_/_kaM ka dang /_/ra ko ta dang /_ni she ta/_/kaM ka tu tra/_gtor ma za/_/zla ba'i gtsug phud mkha' 'gro
[\[120b.6\]]dang /_/khyim gyi gtor za/_rkang ring dang /_/bi na dang ni thob byed do/_12_/ka ke ru ka pa lA ka_/dug gi mgrin pa can rnams so/_3_/bzhad dang rdzing bu'i mtshan ma dang /_/sgra 'byin ka rtsing+gu ra'o/_4_/ngang pa mkha' lding dkar po dang /_/'chi med 'dzin dang /_ma dros gnas/_/dra
[\[120b.7\]]ba'i rkang ldan mtsho yi bya/_/'khor lo'i yan lag grong 'joms so/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po mchu dag dang /_/rkang pa dmar po/_lus dkar po/_/dri ma can gyi phreng 'dzin dang /_/yul 'khor skyong dang dang skya'o/_/pak+Shi rA d+h-Is ngang pa/_/ka la hi sa zhes kha cig_/ngang
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]pa'i chung ma ba ra Ta/_/bzhad mo dang ni dpal mo'o/_/bi kha'i khu byug de yi yang /_/khu byug gi ni bal+lu b+ha/_/rtsod pa byed dang tsu pr-i ti/_/khyim bzang muN+Da ka ser po'o/_/bcad nyams dang ni gang ba dang /_/gzhan spro dang ni/_til snum can/_
[\[121a.2\]]ga ro d+g+hA d+hI/_'bras bu'o/_/dbyangs ldan nam mkhar sgeg pa dang /_/bkra ba'i skad 'byin zhes pa'o/_/de nas zho can zho tshogs dang /_/zho yi gnas zhes bya ba'o/_/pha baM/_pags byi'u/_/b+had+kA rI/_/pags pa'i 'dab can/_dza tu nAM/_/khyim 'gro dang ni bya rog dgra'o/_/
[\[121a.3\]]bA gu li dang /_ba gu dang /_/ta ru hu ni kA ra Ta byAM/_/d+ha na ts+tsha kA zla ba 'jug_/btson lus bya rog mgo zlum spyod/_/'dab chags bye brag hA rI ta/_/kA raN+Da pa brta kA/_/tu ni kA dang /_spo Ti kA/_/mtshungs so gzhan yang phye ma leb/_/cha ga pa dang me khyer dang /_/
[\[121a.4\]]mun 'joms nam mkha'i mu khyud 'od/_/mkha' snang dang ni nam mkha'i 'od/_/mun sel/_/lam 'od/_'od sa bon/_/sa DA rbu dang zhes bya rnams/_/lci sbur sngon po ma k+ShikA/_/sbrang ma dang ni sbrang rtsi skyes/_/grog ma put+ti ka yin no/_/sbrang rtsi ches nyung sar sdu/_/
[\[121a.5\]]sbrang gi sbrang bu sbrang bu'i dbye/_/bi kaM dam sha b+ha m+b+ha DA/_/nags kyi sbrang bu b+hi ra DI/_4_/za byed sbrang bu de rigs gzhan/_/ba rA TI dang /_gan+d+ho li/_/ga ro l+li dang tshangs ma dang /_/bar TA dang /_dug rwa can/_/b+h+r-ing+ga Do la/_pa Da la/_/rtswa bra byed pa rnams yin no/_/b+h+r-ing+ga

[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dag 'phur/_rab 'di rnams ni/_/mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bya ba'o/_/sbubs dang /_mdzod dang /_shubs sgo nga /_4/mchu dang gcod byed/_nyer 'dzin can/_3/rigs dang /_lus/_yan lag_/gsar skyes/_byis pa/_bu phrug dang /_phrug gu/_/

[\[121b.3\]]bsags pa dang ni spungs pa'o/_/yang dag tshogs dang bsags dang tshogs/_/'dus pa sde dang /_dra ba skyes/_/br-in+da/_dkyil 'khor/_ku dum+ba/_/ni ka ra dang /_sto ma dang /_/bi sa ra dang /_prA sta dang /_saM m+mA dang /_saM na ya/_/khaN+Da/_sa mu da ya

[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]mtshams ldan ma/_/btsun mo/_yo ShA/_yo Shi ta/_/'ching byed/_zur blta/_g.yon ma dang /_/dga' ba'i sa gzhi mchod ldan ma/_/stobs med/_pA yA/_drag mo dang /_/stobs ldan/_dga' ma/_g.yon byed ma/_/gnas byed ma
[\[122a.2\]]dang /_skyed ma dang /_/bu mo/_snying po can ma dang /_/legs dga' ma dang /_gnod skyong ngo /_12_/dbye ma dga' ma/_dga' byed ma/_/'dod ma/_g.yon ma/_phul byung ma/_/'dren pa mo dang /_spyan ma dang /_/lus ldan ma dang la la na/_/'jigs ma/_sgom ma/_smad

[\[122a.5\]]byas btsun mo/_/longs spyod can ma mi bdag ma/_/lus ldan ma dang bdag ldan ma/_/lag pa 'dzin dang /_gnyis pa mo/_/chos bcas ma dang /_chung ma dang /_khyim na spyod ma ka la traM/_/'ching byed/_shin tu dam byed ma/_/'dzin pa mo dang skyed byed ma/_/khur ldan
