[\[122a.7\]]ldan/_bden ldan ma/_/legs spyod bdag po'i brtul zhugs ma/_/legs ma rnams so de nas ni/_/ma 'ongs rdul ldan dkar gcer mo/_3_/gzhon nu ma dang /_bu mo'i tshogs/_/nag dga' ma dang mchog sbyin ma/_/na ba pa ti kA rnams so/_/pho nya
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]bcas ma mthong bzlog dang /_/rdul bcas ma dang /_char ldan ma/_/rdul mthong ma dang /_bu mo dang /_/snying po can dang /_bar ma can/_/gsar bkod/_gsar pa mchog can dang /_/rdul gsar gser 'debs dang me tog gsar/_/me tog mthong bar
[\[122b.2\]]bar ma'o/_20_/cung zad lang tsho ldan pa la/_/gnas pa pha khyim nges gnas ma/_/khyim pa mo dang /_grong 'dzin dang /_/bu bza' can ma skyed ma dang /_/dga' ma/_bag gsar/_mna' ma dang /_/snyan pa'i pi wang sgra sgrogs dang /_/nges sgrogs/_de
[\[122b.3\]]bdag sa gang+ga/_/dA bi s+yA da dang pa ra ti/_7_/g.yo ma/_'phyon ma/_rang dbang ma/_/'ching ma/_bden ma/_phyag dar ma/_/mtshon byed/_rigs tshogs dum bu yi/_/ngang tshul myos pa'i phreng ldan ma/_/dubyash+tsa ng+gI dang /_mtshon ma dang /_/'ching ba sbyin
[\[122b.4\]]dang cha shas byed/_11_/'dod ma/_b+ho dza na/_d+ha na diShi ts+tshA ba sa/_ba tI kA/_'dod ldan ma/_pri Sha s+yA n+dI/_tu kA mi thu ne ts+tshA ra t+yam+ba kI/_kAn+t+wa n+wi nI tu yA yA te saM ge taM sA b+hi sA ri kA/_1_/bA d+hI na b+har+t+ri kA s+yata/_t+yak+t+wa nyaM/_yad+pa shaHsri ya yA su kalpi ti telpa snyi sun+da rI/_pa sa ba sh+mA
[\[122b.5\]]ni ma tra pa ka padz+dza bi yas mA ga mo tri bi prA lan+d+hA sa ma ya byAM/_du tI kA pre Sh+ya yat+ma taH_ba rA+e gaM krI ta saM/_ke to reH_na maM la ti pri ya/_4_/yA ba d+hirma pri ya ko pA ta tsA Tu ka rany+tsa nirga tA tI s+ya ta 3_nu sha yeH_pany+tsa t+ka la han+ta ri tA hi pA/_5_/u ta kiN+Tha tA tu pA ya s+yA bA pa/_be sh+ma ni shA ga taH_
[\[122b.6\]]pri yo nA ga ma ne hen+tu bin+tuM/_yan+ti pa mA ku laM/_6_/ku ta sh+tsi ta kAr Na ta ya s+yaH_pri yaud shAn+taM raM ga ta kr-i twa ba d+hI Ti naM pArtA pro ShI ta pre ya pI beta/_7/ku tash+tsa n+na ga ti kAn+te kun tu gdung ma dum bu ma/_/mdzes ma dga' ma rtsom byed ma/_/rnam par sbyangs byas mig ma'o/_/de ni dga'
[\[122b.7\]]ma'i gzhi dang ni/_/dga' ba'i phur bu zhes pa yang /_/bi pr-i k+tA dang skal ngan ma/_/bu bdun btsas bu/_bska rA/_/bud med gcer mo gos me ma/_/mthong ldan ma dang byis pa thob/_/lang tsho zhags ma theg bral ma/_/dpa' mo min dang rgyu mthun ma/_/so sor bdag
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]ma rjes bcas ma/_/byed pa'i gzhi dang rnam ston ma/_/yid ldan dra ma can ma'o/_/rang dbang ma dang gzhan khyim gnas/_/legs dbang ma dang bzo byed ma/_/bud med ces pa'i mtshan nyid ma/_/pe Ta sha dang sh+ma sha dang /_/'tsho
[\[123a.2\]]byed ldan ma thos ma dang /_/mi yi phreng ldan ma rnams so/_/ma ruN+Da dang dpral ba'o/_/ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa yi/_/rgan mo kA t+yA nI ya nI/_/rgan mo skra dkar dge ma'o/_/rgas dang 'khogs dang rgan mo'o/_/blon po rgan min btsun mo'o/_/phrin skyel
[\[123a.3\]]pho brang spyod ma'o/_/shes rab ma dang mkhas ma dang /_/shes ldan ma dang blo ldan ma/_/dmangs mo dmangs rigs chung ma yi/_/dmangs dang de yi rigs kyang ngo /_/dmangs rigs chen mo A b+hI rI/_/rigs dang skyes pa sbyor dag mtshungs/_/slob dpon
[\[123a.4\]]chung ma slob dpon ma/_/skyes sbyor sham shra sogs ldan pa/_/'phags ma rgyal rigs ma dang ni/_/rgyal rigs chung ma mkhan po ma/_/mkhan po'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o/_/rje mo rje rigs chung 'phags ma/_/rgyal rigs bu mo rgyal rigs ma/_/mkhan po'i chung
[\[123a.5\]]ma mkhan mo ste/_/klog dang kha ton byed par 'gyur/_/slob dpon ma nyid 'ba' zhig go/_/dpa' bo'i bdag ldan dpa' chung ma/_/dpa' bo'i ma dang dpa' skyong ma/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo skye dgu ma/_/rab tu skye dang rab skye ma/_/zla mo grogs mo na mnyam ma/_/pho nya
[\[123a.6\]]mo dang kun spyod mtshungs/_/mo ma mig mthong lta shes dang /_/de nas rdul dang ldan pa dang /_/bud med chos ldan dus ldan ma/_/dri ma ldan dang me tog ldan/_/skyed nad dang ni khrag ldan ma/_/rdul dang /_me tog zla mtshan no/_3_/phrug gu chags dang mig blo mangs/_/
[\[123a.7\]]rlog med ma dang zla mtshan sangs/_/mngal chags ma dang sbrum ma dang /_/bu che ma dang lus mi bde/_/tshogs can ma yi tshogs rnams dang /_/sbrum ma gzhon nu ma rnams tshogs/_/lan bu can ma re dma' dang /_/tshong kha bud med tshogs can ma/_/zug rngu byed ma
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]r-its+tsha lA/_/gzugs kyi tshor ma mdzes ma dang /_/'dod pas btsan ma ngan rol ma/_/rtags can re mos smra ma dang /_/phra mo myos pa'i sbubs can ma'o/_13_/gal te de byed skye bo yi/_/tshogs can re dma'i gtso mor 'gyur/_/lus bsgyur ma dang lcug ldan ma/_/bkab
[\[123b.2\]]pa'i tshogs can ma zhes kyang /_/mdza' mkhan ma dang sbyor byed ma/_/kha lo ma dang dga' byed ma/_/lta ba mo dang sbrang rtsi ldan/_/skul byed tshogs can bran mo yang /_/rab bsrungs dang /_rab byed/_/sa skyong zhal ba/_sped byed pa/_/yid gnas khang spyod 'brangs
[\[123b.3\]]mo byed/_/tshogs byed 'tsho skyes po TA'o/_5_/phrin skyel dang ni grong du spyod/_/nye grong 'bangs gtso/_tsha bcas ma/_/nges sbyor so rtsi byed ma dang /_/pha rgya ka dang /_k+ti kA'o/_/zung can ma dang /_zung bud med/_/rab 'phrog theg pa sbyor byed ma/_/kir ti dang /_bla ma
[\[123b.4\]]dang /_/gzhon nu rlung yab 'dzin ma'o/_/bu mo shing dang snying po'i shing /_/ku ruN+Di dang /_sdong po bstan/_/chu skyes sngo dang /_'dod ma dang /_/'di nyid thal ma byed ma'o/_/shUrmI lcags kyi ka ba dang /_/gzugs can 'phrog byed gser rang bzhin/_/lnga lan ma
[\[123b.5\]]ma dang /_bu mo dang /_/po dang gos la sogs sprul ma/_/gnyis grags/_slar byung de d+hiShu/_/de yi bdag bo d+hi d-i Shu/_/gnyis skyes bcas dang bu bza' ma/_/de la de mchog de d+hi Shu/_/gang las slar byung de dag go_/'bangs mo 'bangs las 'bangs med pa/_/
[\[123b.6\]]gang gi sba bya bi d+ha'i bu/_/bai d+ha ba skyes ma med skyes/_/phyi mo med dang /_be ma tra/_/bskal bzang bu dang bskal bzang skyes/_/gzhan gyi bud med skyes nal phrug_/gar mkhan bu dang gar ma'i bu/_/pha yi sring mo las skyes dang /_/ne ne las skyes rnams yin no/_/
[\[123b.7\]]ma yi nu mo las skyes dang /_/sgra gnyis bu mo 'dod pa'o/_/rigs 'chol dang ni byi phrug go_/slong mos 'tsho zhing skyes pa la/_/da ni ka lo Ti na ya/_/rigs sgyur dang ni bdag skyes so/_/bu mo'i bu dang ka pa'i na/_/pi shu dza zhes bya ba'o/_/ma gnyis bu dang ma
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]yang bu/_/ma mchog bu rnams mtshungs pa'o/_/d+ya mr-i ta dang dzA ra dza/_/kuN+Do mr-i ta/_go tsa dang /_/go na ka dang bdag skyes dang /_/lus skyes bu dang gnyis pa'o/_/kun 'dzin byed rang skyes dang /_/bu smad bu dang /_lto byung /_rgyu/_/
[\[124a.2\]]skye byed dang ni dag byed do/_/mo la bu mo smra ba ste/_/bdun 'dir bdag skyes ma la sogs/_/bu mo blo ldan btsun mo dang /_/mnyam byed lus kyi kun spyod ma/_/rang skyes/_zhing skyes brang las skyes/_/brang byung gnas skyes dbang gnyis pas/_/skye dgu/_bu rgyud/_
[\[124a.3\]]rgyud skyes/_bu/_/u ta na sha ya/_Dim+p+ha/_/'o ma'i mgrin bcas nu ma 'thung /_/'khyud 'thung /_khye'u/_bu byis pa/_/phrug gu/_gzhon nu/_gso bya dang /_/smin rgyu/_'o 'thung /_shA ba ka/_14_/nyal 'tsho/_bu mo/_'o 'thung ma/_/lus la 'thung ma rnams yin no/_4_/yab dang /_skyed byed/_pha dang
[\[124a.4\]]ni/_/a pha skyed go_/gsob po/_/skyed par byed pa po rnams so/_7_/skyed ma/_ma dang /_a ma dang /_/'dzin ma/_rab skyed/_mchod sbyin 'don/_/skyed byed/_/skyed ma/_zhing ma dang /_/mngal 'dzin ma dang bcas ma'o/_11_/ma gzhan ma ma 'dzin ma dang /_/
[\[124a.5\]]nye ba'i ma ma zhes pa'o/_/sring mo/_swA sA/_b+ha gi nI/_/pra dza pa ti/_spun zla'i chung /_/bdag po'i sring mo snying mo'o/_/chung ma'i spun zla skud po dang /_/yA ta ra ni tshig ma'o/_/bdag mo'i pha ma gyos sgyug go/_/de dag la ni gyos po'o/_/bu mo'i bdag dang mag_/
[\[124a.6\]]pa dang /_/bA ra kI ra sh+ya la ka_/sh+yA li kA dang ke ni ku/_/kA de bri dang de ba ra/_/chags rtsibs pra rgyu/_dan+t+ra dza/_/tra ya zhes pa rnams yin no/_/pha yi spun zla/_khu bo dang /_/ma yi spun zla zhang po dang /_/bdag can dang ni ma'i skra nye/_/de yi chung ma ne ne mo/_/
[\[124a.7\]]sring mo'i bu dang /_sring mo skyes/_/tsha bo dang ni/_spun las skyes/_/bu yi bu dang /_bu mo'i bu/_/bu dang bu mo'i bu ru 'dod/_/de dag tsha bo yang tsha'o/_/ma yi pha dang /_pha yi ma/_/de dag phyi mo yang phyi sogs/_/skyed byed dang ni skyed byed ma/_/gyos sgyug
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]dag ni/_shwa shrur/_/bu dang bu mo/_bu to'o/_/bu yi bu la sogs pa yang /_/spun zla sring mo ming sring dag_/khyo shug bza' mi bza' bo dag_/pha yi pha ni mes po dang /_/de yi pha ni yang mes po/_/ma yi ma ni phyi mo sogs/_/phan tshun gso dang /_rigs brgyud dang /_/

[\[124b.3\]]dang /_/gnyen 'brel/_'dzin byed/_dga' ba'i bdag_/gtso bo/_sbyin byed/_'tsho dbang phyug_/snying dbang /_dga' ba/_lci ba dang /_/rtsed 'jo'i rten dang /_dga' ston bde/_/srog mgon snying la phan pa dang /_/nga rgyal dang ni/_mngon 'dod shid/_/
[\[124b.4\]]mchog dang /_mchog byed bza' ston pa/_/a b+hI ta dang /_A b+hI ka dzi ra/_nye bdag_/sdig pa'i bdag_/nges 'dzin gtso bo sngon skyes dang /_/dpal dang /_thu bo/_sngon las skyes/_/de nas rjes skyes ka nI yang /_/mthe'u chung dang /_ya pI ya/_/phyis
[\[124b.5\]]skyes dang ni rjes su skyes/_/mngal gzugs dang ni na tshod gnas/_/gzhon nu/_thor bu/_lang tsho can/_/lo yi theg pa bcu pa dang /_/lang tsho nyams dang rgas 'khogs rgan/_/lang tsho yol dang /_gnas brtan rgan/_/brgya pa tshe song rgas chen po/_/thu bo/_rgan

[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]skyes pa'i tshal dang ni/_/skyes pa'i gnas zhes bya ba yang /_/mtshams mtha' 'dren byed snying po'i gnas/_/snying po can dang ldan pa'o/_/rtsa ba'i zla ba gzhan skyed do/_/mngal dang rum ste 'di dag mtshungs/_/mngal dang /_bu rogs

[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/dug gis btab pa'i mtshon cha yis/_/bsad pa'i phyugs sha gr-i ny+tsa nam/_/khrag dang /_dmar po rak+ta dang /_/rna skyes sho Ni rnga 'dor byed/_/mi ltung rang skyes/_sha'i 'gyur ba/_/lus skyes sha yi khu ba bcud/_12_/snying sha_/sha mchog_/snying po/_snying /_/
[\[126b.2\]]tshil dang /_zhag dang /_snum bag go_/mdangs dang /_rkang mar/_khu ba bye/_/mgrin pa'i phyi rtsa/_ltag chu ba/_/'bab ldan rtsa dang /_nA Di'o/_/thod pa/_bde mchog_/bde skyong ngo /_/pags pa dang ni khrag 'dzin dag_/klad pa dang ni/_klad rgyas so/_/b+ho
[\[126b.3\]]traM/_ka liN+Da ka'o/_/mtshor pa/_yA kr-ita/_kA le yam/_/mchin pa dang ni/_slI haM/_ti la kaM dang /_klo ma dang /_gar+b+ha Ta dang /_taR+Sha b+hU/_/kAN+Da rA dang chu rgyus che/_/rgyus pa/_chu ba/_chu rgyus so/_/rgyu ma dang ni/_gang ba can/_/mchil ma/_kha chu 'dzag pa'o/_/

[\[126b.6\]]khog pa pe raM dang /_/baR+Sh+ma/_de ha/_sha rI raM/_/piN+Da/_kA ya/_bi gra ha/_/mUrti/_ta nu/_tanU dang /_/phung po/_zhing dang /_bany+dza ra/_/saM ha na na/_gang dag dang /_/ba su/_shastaM/_pa raM dang /_/dbang po'i skye mched ang+gaM dang /_/mUrti zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/_22_/yan

[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]rkang pa'i rtsa ba zhes pa'o/_7_/byin pa dang ni/_phra pri ta/_/baSh+ThI/_ba daSh+ThI bAn dang /_/pus mo'i nye ba'i tshigs can no/_/brla dang /_pa k+thi'o de'i mtshams ni/_/paM k+Sha Na dang pA su raM/_bshang lam/_'og sgo/_thur lam/_rkub/_/ta nU/_hra dang /_
[\[127a.2\]]'og lam dang /_/bshang sgo/_dr-i ti/_paNI'o/_9_/lte 'og_/mdoms dang /_sked pa dang /_/shro Ni ka kurma ti'o'i/_/rked pa dang /_3_/rked pa ska rags yul dang ni/_/ska rags 'bras can/_ka ri haM/_/gser can gnas dang 'ching ba dang /_/ka TI/_pro tha/_s+phi Ta'o/_/bud med
[\[127a.3\]]rnams kyi 'phongs kyi ni/_/phyi ma'i cha ni ni tam+ba/_/mdun cha dza g+ha na zhes dang /_/rgyab kyi gzhung rten dri kaM'o/_/de'i sgo/_b+ha ga skyes gnas dang /_/masta ka'o/_/rkub tsos dang /_/ni tam+ba s+tho/_/kun tu reg_/lte 'og_/kU bi tuN+Di dang /_/tun+di rga ru/_skye ba'i gnas/_/

[\[127a.6\]]lcags kyu/_hang+gu laM/_/dran pa'i ka ba/_myos 'khri shing /_/mtshan dang /_chags 'khri/_rgyal mtshan no/_35_/sgro ba/_sgong /_mdzod dang sbubs/_/'bras bu'i mdzod dang /_lte ba dang /_/gsus pa/_dza Tha ra dang ni/_/dku dang /_tun+da zhes bya'o/_/brang skyes/_

[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bar/_/snying ga_/'tsho ba'i gnas dang gnad/_/phrag pa/_lag pa/_mgo bo'i cha/_/de yi mtshams ni dza tru NI/_/lag pa'i rtsa ba gnyis mchan gung /_/de dag 'og ni rtsib ma'o/_/spyod byed/_'bab byed/_'jug byed/_lag/_gru mo/_bar tshigs/_ka pha Ni/_/
[\[127b.2\]]gru mo'i steng ni bar lhu dang /_/gru mo'i 'og ni lag ngar dang /_/ki lA TI zhes bya ba'o/_/lag pa'i rtsa ba nor bu [(]'chid[,]'ching[)]/_/lag pa'i mjug ni karlu She/_/lag pa tha snyad byed pa dang /_/yal ga_/lnga pa/_sug pa dang /_/glang sna 'dra dang /_dpung pa'i 'dab/_6_/'khrig
[\[127b.3\]]ma lag pa'i mthe chung bar/_/ka ra b+ho dang lag gzhag go/_/sor mo lag pa'i yal ga ste/_/mthe bong sor mo'i thu bo'o/_/rab tu ston byed mdzub mo'o/_/gung mo dang ni/_ste ba can/_/mthe'u chung dang /_tha chung ngo /_/lhag ma ming gred du bshad do/_/sen
[\[127b.4\]]mo/_slar skye/_sder mo dang /_/myos byed/_lcags kyu/_lag pa'i dpa'/_/lag 'khrungs/_lag skyes/_lag pa'i tshigs/_/kha ru/_i la/_lag pa'i mda'/_/spyod byed tsher ma ka ra Ta/_12_/ston byed mtho dang /_ba lang sna/_/mdzub mo la sogs rnam
[\[127b.5\]]pa'o/_/mthe bong /_mthe chung /_mtho la ni/_/sor mo bcu gnyis zhes bya'o/_/thal mo/_thal lcag_/pra ti la/_/lag mthil sor mo brkyang pa'o/_/saM ha ta la gnyis tshogs so/_/pra ta la ni g.yas dang g.yon/_/lag pa cung thad skum khyor ba/_/de dag

[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]gnas so/_/a nu tsa na rab brjod kyi/_/rig byed yan lag bcas pa bslabs/_/bla ma'i bka' yi rjes gnang thob/_/sa mA br-it+ta zhes pa'o/_/su tA mngon par khrus thob bo/_/gcig pur tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs spyod/_/cig
[\[132a.2\]]shos tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod/_/sa tIr+th+yA ni bla ma gcig_/pra baM an+da bA da ni/_/mi ldan sbyin sreg mkhan du 'gyur/_/bsags ldan me ni id+ha cir/_/brgyud pa'i man ngag ai ti k+ShaM/_/bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis/_/man ngag yang dag rab sbyin pa/_/nye bar shes
[\[132a.3\]]dad dang por shes/_/shes nas rtsom pa nye ba'i rim/_/mchod sbyin gyis sreg a d+h+wa Da/_/mchod sbyin dang ni rgyud bdun pa/_/ma kha tra tu saM sta ra/_/gral dang /_rgyun dang /_thos pa'i las/_/bde ba'i chu dang /_bla re'o/_13_/rgyal po'i mchod sbyin bcos pa dang /_/mi yi
[\[132a.4\]]bdag po'i a d+ha ra/_/'don dang sbyin sreg mgron 'ongs mchod/_/mtshun gsol ba dang gtor ma ste/_/'di rnams mchod sbyin chen po lnga/_/tshangs pa'i mchod sbyin klog 'don pa/_/lha yi mchod sbyin sbyin sreg yin/_/mi yi mchod sbyin mgron 'ongs mchod/_/
[\[132a.5\]]pha mes mchod sbyin mtshun tshim byed/_/'byung po'i mchod sbyin gtor mar brjod/_/'khor dang yongs bskor tshogs pa 'du/_/sa mi ti dang si pa dang /_/sa mi ti dang saM mi dz+ya/_/kun tu gnas dang sa rda dang /_/na na dang ni 'dus pa'o/_12_/khyim dang dang po'i rgyud dang ni/_/
[\[132a.6\]]dang po/_sbyin sreg_/'dus pa dang /_/'phral 'dus pa dang /_tA ra dang /_/sa b+hA sad/_rab tu bsten/_/'dus dang cho ga blta ba'o/_/sdeb sbyor shes dang thos ldan mtshungs/_/shau ti/_shro ti ya tA'o/_/rigs tsam dang ni nyer 'tsho gang /_/de ni bram zer 'gyur
[\[132a.7\]]bar bshad/_/a d+h+wa sUd dang /_b+h+ra hri dang /_/sbyin sreg byed po mchod sbyin dang /_/snyan tshig rig byed rim pa las/_/a gnI d+hi sogs las phyi rol/_/dus mchod rig byed spyod byed pa/_/mchod sbyin zla ba'i bgrod pa dang /_/dbang po'i brtul zhugs mtshungs pa'o/_/
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]de ni sam stA pa'i mchod sbyin/_/bstod pa'i sa gzhi skye bos dben/_/rig byed sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs/_/thang mnyam pa dang bzhi mdo'o/_/sbyin sreg thab la ta ra ni/_/ma hA rI ro me ma khA/_/sbyin sreg du ba nges tshigs so/_/sbyin sreg thal ba beSh+Ta taM/_/phyugs
[\[132b.2\]]btags srog shing tsa ShA la/_/bum pa shin tu bskor ba'i khyim/_/srog shing rtse mo ta rma'o/_/rtsub shing rtsub stan a ra Ni/_/lho yi me dang /_khyim gyi me/_/ha ba ni ste me gsum mo/_/me 'di gsum la te ta'o/_/dri Na ta ni legs sbyangs me/_/sa mr-i k+ShaM ni yongs
[\[132b.3\]]su spyod/_/nyer sbyod me ni rab tu sbyor/_/gang zhig khyim bdag dA nI ma/_/lho phyogs me ni pra Ni ya/_/de ni A la s+yar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sdeb sbyor gA ya trI/_/uSh+TI ka la sogs kyang ngo /_/des brjod yam shing sreg rdzas dang /_/de ni me yi gter du brjod/_/a
[\[132b.4\]]mi k+ShA sA pri to Sh+Ti/_/'o ma zho dang sbyar ba'o/_/sreg rdzas smin pa tsa tu te/_/zas mchog dang ni 'o thug go_/ha bya lha zas 'o ma can/_/ka bya mtshun gsol zas yin no/_/de dag 'o ma ldan pa la/_/sU Sha byin sU Sha can/_/rlung yab dang ni bsil yab ni/_/ri dwags
[\[132b.5\]]pags pa las byas pa'o/_/dgang gzar blugs gsar la sogs dbye/_/blugs gzar bra d+ha ba nyer 'dzin/_/sru kar+thA hU sbyin sreg byed/_/gzar bu mar la 'dri byed pa'o/_/u pa kr-i ta dud 'gro ni/_/mchod sbyin ched du gsod par btags/_/phan tshun zhing dang gsang
[\[132b.6\]]gtor byas/_/gsod pa'i tshad kyi phyugs yin no/_/brjod bya'i rtags can pra mI ta/_/bsnyen rdzogs 'thor 'thung byas nas gsod/_/sreg rdzas sbyin sreg sbyin byas pa/_/zas ldan pa Sha Ta byas pa'o/_/de gnyis gcig ste mchod sbyin lha/_/sbyin sreg rdzas bAn+na m+mA/_/
[\[132b.7\]]de nas thub pa smra ba bcad/_/dik+ShI mtha' can mchod sbyin gtso/_/de dag gsod las byed ya dz+nyi yaM/_/mchod sbyin las 'dod pUrta'o/_/khA ta la sogs las rnams so/_/'dod pa'i pU rta la sogs las/_/a mr-i ta dang pi g+ha sa/_/mchod sbyin lhag ma'i bza' ba ste/_/mchod
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]sbyin lhag ma'i rdzas dag ni/_/snod can sbyin dang rnam par gtong /_/gtor ma 'bul ba sbyin pa dang /_/nye bar 'gyed dang rnam par gtong /_/rnam byin brims dang rnam par bkram/_/so sor byin dang mngon du bstan/_/'bul ba yon dang me tog go_/gshin don
[\[133a.2\]]ster ba sbyin pa ste/_/au dza de hi ka zhes bya/_/pha gshin sbyin bA ne ba sa/_/shing zan de las bstan bcos sbyin/_/'phags pa can dang bsod snyoms sogs/_/pha mes bya ba brgyad pa dang /_/nyin mo'i cha dang ku ta pa/_/dus ston zla dus mchod pa'o/_/lha yi sgo dang lha'i ltang
[\[133a.3\]]mo/_/gyad kyi ltad mo ma hUM ri/_/ko shal can yun ring dang /_/'don pa po dang chos smra ba/_/mngon par 'ongs dang mgron 'ongs dang /_/rab 'joms 'joms dang bi shi kA/_/tshes zad 'dzin byed mthun pa dang /_ba ku la dag mtshungs pa'o/_/mnyam pa rkang pa 'dzin pa
[\[133a.4\]]dang /_/mngon par smra dang nye bar 'dzin/_/gsong por smra ba rnam pa gnyis/_/nye bar kun 'dzin cho ga bzhin/_/mngon par smra bya mchod par byed/_/dag pa rnam par bcas mchod mtshungs/_/gtor ma'o gus par nyan pa dang /_/rnam par gnas dang nye bar gnas/_/yongs
[\[133a.5\]]su spyod dang nye bar spyod/_/spyod pa dang ni spyod lam gnas/_/tshol ba yongs su tshol ba dang /_/rjes su tshol dang kun tu tshol/_/gsol ba dang ni zhu ba'o/_/slong dang mngon par slong ba dang /_/don du gnyer ba zhes bya'o/_/mchod pa'i ri ni mchod yon te/_/zhabs kyi ched
[\[133a.6\]]du chu zhabs bsil/_/'gron po glo bur gsar 'ongs dang /_/legs skyes zhes pa rnams yin no/_/'gro dang 'khyam dang slar yang 'gro/_'chag pa dang ni 'gro ba'o/_/nye reg dang ni zhal bsil lo/_/ga N+Du Sha dang kha gang byed/_/mthar gyis pa dang go rims dang /_/
[\[133a.7\]]yongs su rim pa rjes su rim/_/shin tu gnas dang yongs su 'gro/_/nye bar dgod dang nges pa dang /_/brtul zhugs bsnyen gnas bsod nams can/_/shin tu gso dang nye bar gnas/_/bsnyen gnas kun nas sgrol byed dang /_/'da' bar byed dang brtul zhugs
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]mdzes/_/zla ba bsnyen gnas byed pa dang /_/gcig mtha' gsum mthar za ba dang /_/zas drug pa dang dus can dang /_/mchod sbyin gnas dang mchod sbyin brtan/_/dben pa tha dad bdag nyid dang /_/glu len pa dang rig byed 'don/_/tshangs pa'i rig byed 'don pa
[\[133b.2\]]dang /_/mtshan mo grub pa brjod par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa dang ni bi ra li/_/klog cing kha chu 'thor ba ni/_/tshangs pa'i thig le zhes par 'gyur/_/skyed dang rig byed klog pa ni/_/tshangs pa'i brtsa sa las byung /_/yon tan sparma sa ti ka'o/_/der ni mtho ba'i yan lag
[\[133b.3\]]kyang /_/bsam gtan rnal 'byor stan dang ni/_/tshangs stan rtogs pa'i cho ga rim/_/gtso bo dang ni rtogs pa'o/_/rjes kyi rtog pa rjes gcod pa/_/'du byed sngon du 'dzin pa ni/_/nye bar byed dang thos pa'o/_/tshangs spyod dbang po mtha' dag sdom/_/dbang po thul
[\[133b.4\]]dang grong du zhi/_/zhi dang sdom brtson sdom ldan dang /_/brtul zhugs che ldan yo b+hing+ga/_/gtsang gnas khrus kyi brtul zhugs can/_/gang zhig brtul zhugs dbang gis ni/_/thang nyal gcer nyal s+tha N+Di la/_/de nas chags bral ta ma pa/_/nyon mongs dang bral
[\[133b.5\]]gnyis las 'das/_/rtags dang spyod pa chos phreng ldan/_/gsal ba'i brtul zhugs bkram pa'o/_/gang zhig rmongs pas spun zla yi/_/thu bor bag ma byed de'i gcung /_/pa ri be rtar de shes bya/_/pa ri be ste de'i phu bo/_/bI ba ha ni rnam nyams med/_/brtul zhugs
[\[133b.6\]]skyes dang 'du byed 'dor/_/ro langs brtul zhugs can thams cad/_/mngon par dang byed gdur bar byed/_/dngos med dang ni du ni hA/_/gtong ba myur 'gro tshangs spyod can/_/pA ShA N+Da dang rigs ngan dang /_/kun gyi rtags can gsum po mtshungs/_/spyod byed dang ni
[\[133b.7\]]sgrol byed dang /_/tshul khrims spyod pa gtsang ba 'ongs/_/gtsang ma/_dag pa/_dri ma med/_/bsod nams dang ni yid gzhungs so/_/sA lA sha yi dbyug 'dzin dang /_/chu stod kyi ni brtul zhugs can/_/chu shing dang ni 'od ma 'dzin/_/g.yang gzhi dang ni ri dwags lpags/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]bud med brtul zhugs bstan/_br-iShI/_/spyi blugs/_chu snod bum chung ngo /_/mchod rten kha dang me tog can/_/ka ra ka zhes bya ba'o/_/bsod snyoms pa dang slong mo pa/_/'tshob pa dang bslang bya ba/_/slong mo can dang sbyin byar 'gyur/_/'di
[\[134a.2\]]yi bsam gtan ldan dang byed/_/kha ton dang ni bzlas brjod dang /_/khrus byas khrus chu sa ba ni/_/rig byed dang ni bzlas kun gyis/_/sdig pa 'joms par byed pa'o/_/mthong ba bco lnga gnam stong la/_/phyogs mtha' so so'i sbyin sreg byed/_/rtag tu lus sgrub ltos
[\[134a.3\]]pa yi/_/las gang de ni rtsol ba'o/_/rtag tu las ni yang dag sdud/_/gya tshom gcig gi TuM ka ta/_/nges pa gang zhig rtag tu las/_/glo bur ba la bsnyen bkur bsgrub/_/de nas lhag ma dag byed 'gyur/_/mchod sbyin sa rI bA ba ta/_/u ba bI ta mchod sbyin gyi/_/srad
[\[134a.4\]]bu dang ni gnyis skyes ldan/_/tshangs pa'i skud pa dag byed de/_/lag pa'i g.yas phyogs rab tu dkri/_/prA rtsI nA pI ta g.yon dkris/_/ni bA ta ni mgul bar 'phyangs/_/pany+tsa ba Ti brang dang sked/_/mchod phyir thogs dang yang dag ldan/_/mchan khung phur ma ko pA ni/_/
[\[134a.5\]]kats+tsha ngos su ldan pa'o/_/dpral bar thal ba'i re khA gang /_/sol ris gsum dang tiR+Ya ka_/be khI ta yi thig le ni/_/b+hA la dang ni ba dang gsum/_/sor mo'i rtse mor tIr+tha lha/_/mthe chung rtsa bar tshangs lha'i chu/_/gung mo mtheb mdzub mtshun gyi chu/_/mthe ba chen
[\[134a.6\]]rtsa bar tshangs chu sbyin/_/tshangs pa slar byung tshangs nyid dang /_/tshangs pa yang dag ldan pa dang /_/lha sogs skye ba de bzhin no/_/dka' tshegs dka' thub la sogs pa/_/mal med 'gro ba b+hA b+h+ya na/_/shes bya lta ba b+hi das grol/_/b+h+yu di to trau rim ji bzhin/_san+b+ya
[\[134a.7\]]sa ba t+yAn dang /_/sa ne phe re rnyed la sogs dang /_/'gro byed mkhas byung tshul 'chos dang /_/tshul 'chos pa yi bya ba'o/_/sde gsum chos dang 'dong pa nor/_/sde tshan bzhi pa thar pa'o/_/de stobs bzhi ldan tshangs pa yi/_/grong ba'i lam gyi mchog yin no/_/bden
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]smra shis brjod bstod pa rnams/_/'dun par drang srong chen po rnams/_/bram ze'i drang srong gnas 'jog sogs/_/thos sogs byas pa thos drang sogs/_/a tri 'dab sogs rgyal drang srong /_/skabs kyi drang srong rnams kyang ste/_/ji mi la sogs rig byed pa/_/
[\[134b.2\]]rgyas pa dang ni 'od srungs pa/_/dga' ba dang ni gling skyes bu/_/pr-i ta ko Ti bden ldan bu/_/pha rol 'gro dang gnas byed dang /_/bde ldan ma yi bu dang ni/_/bde ldan skyes ldan rgyas pa dang /_/pha rol gzhan dgra b+hA ra ta/_/hri ta kA ki rgya shug gu/_/17_/grog mkhar skyes
[\[134b.3\]]dang grog mkhar can/_/chu bdag dang ni ku sha'i rigs/_/bal+mI ka dang grog mkhar bu/_/snyan ngag thu bo grog mkhar sras/_/ku sha'i rgyud dang gnas ngan dang /_/sna tshogs bshes gnyen glang bdag skyes/_/gnas 'jog rgyu ni tI mgon dang /_/a dz+ya mA na brla
[\[134b.4\]]ldan dang /_/sha ta nA ku/_gau ta ma/_/gzegs zan 'od srungs mtshungs pa'o/_/thang la 'bar dang lha yi 'bangs/_/kA shi'i rgyal dang bdud rtsi skyes/_/skyong byed dang ni rnal 'byor can/_/glang mo skyes dang ring mo'i bu/_/khyab 'jug spas dang 'khyog mo can/_/
[\[134b.5\]]shA na kI dang rlabs ldan sor/_/nA sa ya na brgyad klu dang /_/phyogs ldan 'chang ba mi ni brjod/_/nye bar 'dam dang 'bras bu 'byor/_/byed ldan mtha' 'dzin slong ba dang /_/ra ba kA ya na'i rab/_/kin+dA k+Shi'i bu pA Ni Na/_/pA Ni ni'i bu sbrul 'dzin dang /_/skyes bu byed dang
[\[134b.6\]]gdong byed dang /_/yon tan byin dang pa ta li/_/dga' byed ldan dang dga' byed dang /_/byA Di yid gzhungs ldan pa dang /_/bik+Sha bA si skyes pa dang /_/nabs so/_mchog sred/_kAt+yA dang /_/kA t+yA ya na gtsang skyes dang /_/rnam spros b+hAr d+h+wa dza dang /_/'dab bzang skyes
[\[134b.7\]]dang ba g+hu byed/_/nag po'i 'bangs dang be d+ha' dang /_/drag po dang ni 'khyog po byed/_/b+hA ra bi dang sa rtal+la/_/srid pa'i 'byor dang gtsang mar brjod/_/sa yi snying po khog pa dang /_/'jug pa 'khyog dang 'di dag mtshungs/_/mchod sbyin balka la rnal 'byor/_/tshangs pa dga'
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]ba'i lugs gnyis so/_/de ni legs bsdus zhes byar 'gyur/_/gang zhig snga bar dran byed pa'o/_/bag ma dang ni nye zung dang /_/gnyis smra smra byed lag bsdams so/_/nye bar rtsol dang nye bar 'dren/_/byis pa las byed 'dzin pa'o/_/de nas
[\[135a.2\]]dril bu'i yan lag dang /_/na gu la dang bkra shis sgra/_/bkra shis phreng ldan rul+la lu/_/ku lu re tu lo la dang /_/yau ta ke dang yu ta kaM_/yon tan rkang bkra shis brgyad/_/tu ra ta rti ki dga' byed/_/sgo yi rgyan dang ka bar 'gyur/_/tsan+dan dang ni phreng ba can/_/rta babs
[\[135a.3\]]rtsa dang phreng ba dang /_/rtse mo sbyar ba 'di dag mtshungs/_/gu pa ka dang me tog can/_/gu he nges skyed mdangs ldan mchog_/spyod byed mthil dang rab tu 'phrog_/bu ga rtse byed 'dab ma dang /_/karka re To zla ba phyed/_/lha yi sor mo sgo yi rgyan/_/a buT+Ta por/_
[\[135a.4\]]pi ga sha_/grong khyer dang ni Ta ku ra/_/ka Ta ka dang yi ge gsum/_/ni saM chu shing bcud 'dzin dang /_/ra tar+d+hi ki bde dang khrus/_/kun sbyor nye bar 'dzin pa dang /_/lus dang btung ba sh+li Tha dang /_/kro Di bye ba 'khyud pa yang /_/yongs rtsom pa ri kun 'joms dang /_/
[\[135a.5\]]kro Da kroDa ci 'ga' zhig_/kun tu rab sbyor a ba ti/_/log spyod mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_/grong chos 'o byed dga' dang 'dzem/_/bde chen rol dga' mi tshangs spyod/_/ku no nA ti bzang ba dang /_/b+ha R+Shi ti dang dga' dang rmongs/_/skye ba 'ching ba dga' ba bsgrubs/_/
[\[135a.6\]]k+Sha pi saM ste sa naM dang /_/mi ba ti dang dga' ba'i sgra/_/gang du di sbas ya ti naM/_/de du ma no ra taM du 'dod/_/dben dang skye bo med dang bkan/_/gsang ba/_tshogs med/_dgon gsang chen/_/'di drug gsang ba zhes pa'o/_/u pI shu dang 'khyud pa dang /_/ni
[\[135a.7\]]sto ka dang nye bar lci/_/shes pa dang ni ra ba gsal ba/_/gsang ba de las byung ba'o/_/mchog gi tshig la seng ge dang /_/stag dang /_shar b+ha/_/khyu mchog go_/dpa' bo glang po rta cang shes/_/mkhas dang pad+ma dkar sogs smra/_/skyes bu gtso rjes rjod byed
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]dang /_/zhes pa paN+Di ta snyan ngag mkhan po dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba mu tig phreng ba las bram ze'i sde rdzogs so//_//spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal po'i bu/_/lag skyes rgyal rigs rnam par rgyal/_/
[\[135b.2\]]pri dza lin+d+hi mi bdag_/k+Sha ta ni gnam gyi rgyal/_/sa dbang /_sa skyong /_sa yi bdag_/sa 'dzin mi bdag sa 'tsho dang /_/sa gzhi skyong dang lha yi rgyal/_/k+Sha d+ha ra dang sa spyod dang /_/rgyal phran dang ni dum bu can/_/spyi bor dbang bskur mi'i bdag po/_/skye ba gcig dang cha shas
[\[135b.3\]]bdag_/rje btsun mi bdag skye dgu yi/_/bdag dang 'jigs pa sel byed pa'o/_/yul bdag mi dbang zas kyi bdag_/sa dbang bdag po zhes pa yang /_/gang gis rgyal 'dod mchod sbyin byas/_/dkyil 'khor dbang phyug brtan pa'o/_/gang gis bka' dang bstan pa dang /_/
[\[135b.4\]]rgyal po rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/_/gang dag rgyal po zhes brjod pa/_/rgyal po ma lus kun gyis ni/_/phyag byas lhag pa'i dbang phyug go_/'khor los sgyur ba sa kun dbang /_/mi bdag gzhan gyi rgyal phran no/_/rgyal po phal dang rgyal rigs tshogs/_/
[\[135b.5\]]rgyal po ldan pa sa 'dzin tshogs/_/dang po'i rgyal po pri du dang /_/bai n+ya ka dang bum pa can/_/gzhan las rgyal dang lang tsho can/_/mAm+na ta la sogs pa dang /_/ga TuM gi ka zhes pa dang /_/ya mad a g+ni dga' byed dang /_/ngan spong skyes dang rdul bzang skyes/_/
[\[135b.6\]]dga' ba can dang ra d+hu'i bu/_/shing rta bcu pa de yi bu/_/skyed pa po dang ra ma Na/_/tshul bzang ma ni r+d+ha sha dang /_/tshed ma las dga' byed zla/_/dga' byed bzang dang gu bi dang /_/shing rta bcu pa las skyes pa/_/mtshon byed dang ni lag ma Na/_/bshes gnyen bzang dang
[\[135b.7\]]sprin sgra rgyal/_/mdzod ldan pa dang mdzod 'dzin skyes/_/kai ka yi dang /_ka kI/_/lus 'phags can dang skyed pa po/_/me thi lI yi sar byung dang /_/ra ma'i bu dang ku sha sar/_/ha lU man dang 'od ldan dang /_/ti rA ni ni mya ngan med/_/kun tu 'dren dang spyod mchog dang /_/
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dga' byed pho nya srid sgrub skyes/_/ti Di kun tu dga' byed dang /_/skyob byed skyes dang seng ge dga'/_/sang skyes gzhon nu byis pa dang /_/mgrin bzang dang ni nyi ma dga'/_/e la gang dang rtogs byed dang /_/dbang chen dang ni yal 'dab
[\[136a.2\]]po/_/de nas sha kun+da yi bu/_/thams cad 'dul dang b+ha ra ta/_/sha kun+da skyes dauSh+man+ta/_/yang yang 'gro dang yong ba can/_/srid sgrub lus skyes gcod byed dang /_/brtson 'grus ldan dang 'byung po'i steng /_/'dam bu dang ni/_nai Sha d+ha/_/bsod nams grags ldan
[\[136a.3\]]rab dang ldan/_/thos ldan zhi pa 'jigs chen dang /_/pra b+hi ya dang dga' ba'o/_/bu mo yo dza na gan+na/_/gI ge yI dang bde ldan ma/_/rnam pa kra brtson 'grus lus bkra skyes/_/nag mo a Sho da rI dang /_/gan+na ba ti rgyas pa'i ma/_/shaM gA skyes dang ga gA ma/_/bu
[\[136a.4\]]ni lha yi brtul zhugs dang /_/zhi ba gsar dang gang+ga'i bu/_/gang+gA skyes dang 'jigs pa dang /_/mdzod gnas kla klo 'chi bdag dang /_/grong gi nor zhes bya ba'o/_/yul 'khor srung gi ma las skyes/_/shes rab mig dang ma can bu/_/skya ba'o mI Di so so yi/_/kAn+ta
[\[136a.5\]]kun+di 'di dag mtshungs/_/a mrA li ka las skyes pa/_/bin+d+ha ba dang a mra'i bu/_/'thab dka'i dgra ngan rgyal po ste/_/gAn+na ra skyes 'thab pa med/_/chos rgyal skyes ni mI D+hi ste/_/chos kyi bu ni dka' thub bu/_/ki ka rnams ni rjes su skyes/_/ma skyes dgra ni g.yul
[\[136a.6\]]ngor brtan/_/br-i ko da ri 'jigs sde'o/_/dpa' bo'i rdul dang ka Ta'i rma/_/tshogs skyes klu yi stobs zhes bya/_/rlung gi bu ni Di rma b+hi tA/_/ba ka kinI karmI ra/_/dza rI sbrang rtsi 'joms pa'o/_/a rdzu nal bu raM kra/_/stobs bzang dbang dang 'dam pa che/_/yAn+na cod pan
[\[136a.7\]]gAN+Di/_/snying po med dang brgya byin dga'/_/'jigs rung rnam rgyal rgyal byed dang /_/ma bya pA tsA d+ha na gang /_/gzhon pa dkar po bIr+t+ta g+ho/_/gsang ba'i rab dbye ka bi skyes/_/dga' ba'i dbyangs 'gyur gAN+DA bi/_/gaN+Di bi dang d+ha nu'o/_/trau ba dI dang ri skyes ma/_/nag
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]mo lnga len ma skye'o/_/skyed ma bsod nams grags ldan ma/_/mchog sbyin 'dren ma rig byed skyes/_/rtag tu lang tsho ldan ma'o/_/kra ya stobs bzang ma gnyis ma/_/srid sgrub ma dang lus ldan ma/_/rigs med dang ni lhar bcas kyi/_/ma las skyes pa
[\[136b.2\]]skye dgu skyes/_/sa'i rna ba la ang+ga'i rgyal/_/rA d+har skyes dang 'joms byed bu/_/nyi ma dga' ba rnams yin no/_/bum pa can la mthar byed dang /_/dus kyi phyi ma mun dbang phyug_/nag mo skyes dang sde bzang dang /_/bkra ba'i sa dang gcod byed do/_bre bo che la
[\[136b.3\]]rgyun gyi bdag_/b+hA ra d+h+wa dza'i slob dpon dang /_/chu yi bdag dang bla ma'o/_/bre bo che'i bu chu yi bu/_/skye bo mgul dang drang srong rgyal/_/yongs su 'phangs pa'i bu yang ngo /_/dza ra ku ru 'gro byed mchog_/ba the ta s+ya tshes bcas ma/_/dza ta ko ru ma na mA/_/lha mo
[\[136b.4\]]zhes dang e ta dag_/gnas pa can mi dang lus bdag dang /_/rnam snang bu dang stobs ldan dang /_/mngal can bin+da ba li'i bu/_/mtshon cha can dang br-i to pa/_/'dul dbyangs dang bu mchod rten dang /_/byis pa skyong dang tsi rI ra/_/shing rta che'i bu mkhar ba dang /_/dza ra sa
[\[136b.5\]]t+ya bde mchog skyes/_/rna ba can dang rtsa ba'i lha/_/rtsa ba bzang dang myu gu'i cha'o/_/bka' dbang gros pa blon po dang /_/gros kyi snod dang gzhung lugs 'dzin/_/blo dang bzod pa can zhes pa/_/gzhan ni las dang lhan cig spyod/_/slob dpon chen po gtso bo dang /_/
[\[136b.6\]]slob dpon chen po mdun na 'don/_/bde legs can dang lta thog pa/_/gnyer pa dang ni spyan gzigs pa/_/mig gi chos can spyan pa dang /_/rtog dang rtog par byed pa po/_/tha snyad rnams la blta ba'o/_/sgo srung ba dang sgo skyong ba/_/sgor gnas sgo ldan dbyug pa
[\[136b.7\]]can/_/sgor gnas pa la blta ba'o/_/pra tI hAR+Ya nyer gnas blta/_/de ni be ta byed pa dang /_/pe tra 'dzin dang to Da ka_/log sgrub skyes dang 'jug byed pa/_/snyems tshogs can dang dpya yi gnas/_/mkhar can dang ni rdzong skyong ba/_/dus bu skyong dang dum bu can/_/srung
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ma'i tshogs pa sku srungs pa/_/be tra'i sde dang bsrung ba'o/_/gnas brtan dang ni grong dpon dang /_/gzhis bdag gnyer ba hu ri pa/_/pho brang nang pa nang mi dang /_/nang na gnas pa'i skye bo'o/_/gser mdzod pa dang /_gser gnyer pa/_/dngul
[\[137a.2\]]mdzod pa dang 'dul gnyer ba/_/grong gnas pa dang gnas byed pa/_/spyan pa de nas sa bi ba/_/slob dpon gnong can 'gram dang ni/_/grol ba'i las dang gros byed pa/_/dung gi spyan pa dung pa dang /_/spyan pa dang por byed pa mtshungs/_/dar gu li ka so rtsi byin/_/rab
[\[137a.3\]]'jug byed dang 'jug pa po/_/'jug byed bu dang rgyug byed pa/_/dzam g+hA ka ri dzam b+hi ka_/_btsun mo'i sku srung kany+tsa ki_/gnas byed dang ni nyug rum pa/_/ma ning nyams pa za ma mtshungs/_/yang dag thob byed lus nyad ba/_/zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba pa/_/grogs
[\[137a.4\]]byed la dang spyid byed pa/_/yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/_/de yi pha rol bshes yin no/_/u pA shin bar gnas yul/_/rtsa 'dzin dang ni rgyal gnas so/_/dgra bo mi dga' yongs bgrod dang /_/dgrar 'dzin pa dang bshes mi byed/_/sdang byed/_zhe 'gras/_
[\[137a.5\]]'khon byed dang /_/mi mdza' ba dang pha rol rgol/_/mngon bgrod dgra byed rnam sdang dang /_/mi phan byed dang phyir rgol dang /_/yongs gnas 'gran zla mngon gzhom bya/_/dzi g+ha kun tu 'gran sdang byed/_/rnam sdang bzod byed mi dga' byed/_/bzhin mnyam mtshungs pa
[\[137a.6\]]'gran zla dang /_/grogs dang gros gnyen/_snag gnyen dang /_/sdug dang /_rtsed rol/_lhan cig spyod/_/sI shUr+tha nI zhes pa yang /_/dbang bcas legs spyod/_legs sdud dang /_/'grogs dang 'dun pa'i skye bo dang /_/bdun brgyud gnyen dang mdza' grogs
[\[137a.7\]]bshes/_/ljang gu'i mtshon 'dar brjod pa dang /_/skad cig tsam gyis mtshon gyur pa/_/sngon po'i chos bzhin brtan pa dang /_/dga' dang dor byas rjes su 'jug_/mkha' la rtsen dang rol rtsed dang /_/der ni nye bar gyur pa'o/_/lta nyul dang ni rtog mi pa/_/rtog dpyod
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]byed dang nyul mi dang /_/ldum bu pa dang so rtog mi/_/bya gtong dang ni nang yan no/_/lo shes rtsis mkhan lha zhes dang /_/lha yig pa dang shes ldan dang /_/dus shes yung tsam thang cig shes/_/gnas shes 'grangs byed lha 'dri ba/_/gus par 'dri dang sems brjod
[\[137b.2\]]'gyur/_/pra s+ya sha ka Ti zhes pa'o/_/der ni nges 'gro sbyin pa dang /_/lha la 'dri dang nye bar thos/_/rgyud dang grub mtha' shes pa dang /_/sbyin bdag khyim bdag mtshungs pa'o/_/bris mkhan dang ni yig mkhan dang /_/yi ge pa dang 'dri byed pa/_/kir ka dang
[\[137b.3\]]shAn+ti ka_/yi ge can dang snag tsha'i zong /_/kA k+Shi ka dang po li ka_/de nas me lA bu rma lA/_/dga' byed dang ni yi ge 'chags/_/snag tsha'i nor bu snag tsha'i nor/_/yi ge khron can bArta la/_/snag tsha chu ngang ma lA dang /_/mda' la mig sman snag tsha'o/_/myu gu
[\[137b.4\]]yi ge'i 'dab can dang /_/kA tsa na dang yi ge 'ching /_/yi ge'i pho nya khu tshur byed/_/phrin yig brjod dang rjod byed pa/_/yi ge'i gnas dang dri gtsang khang /_/rgyas 'debs rkyen byed 'dri byed dang /_/byi bya/_kun tu bri bya dang /_/yi ge'i rim pa rim pa gnyis rnams so/_/
[\[137b.5\]]la khI la ka 'phrin yig khyer/_/lhag par 'phrin yig spyod byed 'dod/_/yig mkhan las byed rkyen bcug pa'o/_/skyes kha dang ni pho nya ba/_/du t+yi de dngos las yin no/_/lam la tshong pa 'gron po dang /_/lam 'grul 'gron lam gnas spos pa/_/'gro byed
[\[137b.6\]]lam po de nas ni/_/sdud byed lam pa dang ni rgyud/_/mnyam pa sa mu na sA tha/_/dzang+ka 'dug gnas 'di dag mtshungs/_/dzA ga ma la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o/_/bdag po blon po thugs ches dang /_/mdzod dang yul 'khor rdzong dang dpung /_/rgyal po'i yan
[\[137b.7\]]lag gnyis yin no/_/khab dang pho brang zhes pa dang /_/dums dang 'thab dang chas pa dang /_/gnas dang nor gtong gzhan brten rnams/_/drug rnams yon tan zhes bya'o/_/nus pa dang ni mthu stobs dang /_/dga' bar byas dang sngags bzlas dang /_/zad dang
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]gnas dang 'phel ba dang /_/sde tshan gsum po rig pa'o/_/rnam par gnon dang skyes bu'i mthu/_/gzi brjid dang ni mdangs dang stobs/_/dpung dang mthu brjid can dang ni/_/bang mdzod nor gyis gang ba dang /_/dbye dang sdud dang dums dang ni/_/dpya 'tshal thabs ni rnam pa bzhi/_/khral
[\[138a.2\]]dang sdud dang dpyad dang ni/_/phra ma dang ni skyom mtshungs/_/de nas dbye dang nye bar 'gyed/_/u pa d+ha ni chos sogs kyi/_/gang zhig nye bar blta ba'o/_/drug ni lta bar byed pa ste/_/gang zhig gsum sogs spyod yul lo/_/mtshungs pa blo thub yid ches so/_/nyams na dman pa ji
[\[138a.3\]]ltar 'grims/_/ma nyams rigs pa rtog pa dang /_/gzugs ston pa dang mtshungs par gnas/_/rigs pa thabs dang thob pa dang /_/'os pa 'thad pa lugs bzhin dang /_/rigs pas thob dang gnas su brjod/_/mngags pa gang zhig la ma btsas pa/_/gang de
[\[138a.4\]]so sor bstan pa'o/_/des bstan kun tu bstan pa dang /_/mngags bstan gdams pa bstan pa dang /_/bstan pa dka' dang rjes su gnang /_/khrims lugs dang ni 'dzin pa'o/_/kun tu gnas dang yul chos dang /_/yang dag rab 'dzin kun tu 'ching /_/nges
[\[138a.5\]]gzung /_sdoms dang /_'ching ba mtshungs/_/nyes pa/_nongs pa/_skyon can dang /_/tuN+Di kA dang rigs bab 'gro/_/gnyis sogs chad pa nyis 'gyur len/_/thob bya dpya dang sdud dka' dang /_/khral bar thob pa sho gam mo/_/'di yi 'byor pa kun n+wa dang /_/
[\[138a.6\]]nye bar sbyin dang nye bar spyod/_/zang zing lany+tsa u kau dang /_/rab tu ston dang kun tu ston/_/mdzod 'dzin 'bul ba nye bar sbyin/_/skyes dang zhu rten zhes bya dang /_/rnam gzhag dang ni mdun 'jog dang /_/sbyin par brtsams dang dad rdzas dang /_/de yi dus la sbyin pa'o/_/phyi
[\[138a.7\]]dus la ni A ma ti/_/'di la mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_/phyi mar mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_/mthong med me dang chu la sogs/_/mthong ba rang bzhin dgra bo dang /_/sa skyong shin tu 'jigs pa dang /_/rang phyogs mthu yis 'jigs pa'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang ka Ta kaM/_/kun
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]tu gnas dang phung po skyob/_/nges 'jug dang ni khyogs can dang /_/byi dor can dang A ju byed/_/rab tu rtsom dang bka' lung ngo /_/rnga yab dang ni g.yo ba byed do/_/rnga yab rnga ma spu can dang /_/sa raM tsA ba tsU la kaM_/kra ye rlung g.yab lus gcig pa/_/bo ma guts+tsha kaM dang ni/_/
[\[138b.2\]]gaM ga r-i zhes bya ba'o/_/mi bdag stan ni bzang po'i stan/_/de ni gser gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/_/seng ge'i khri'o gdugs tshad skyob/_/pu po Ta skyes tsha ba sgrib/_/uT+kU Ti dang 'khor lo'i lus/_/sa bdag la gnas rgyal po yi/_/rtags mtshan gser gyi dbyug
[\[138b.3\]]pa dang /_/nye bar mtshon ces bya ba'o/_/bum pa bzang po gang ba'i bum/_/gser gyi ril ba b+h+r-ing+ga ra/_/so rtsi'i snod ni ka raM ka_/s+thA gi kA lu kA zhes so/_/phye ma lA ba phye ma ni/_/'gyur byed mtshon gyis bsgribs pa'o/_/khyogs dang 'degs dang do li kA/_/
[\[138b.4\]]bring+khA/_/bring+khA la ni dang /_/bring+kho la zhes bya ba dang /_/bring+kha ring+kho la ring+ga/_/breng+kha Na rang+kha NA+o/_/rgyal srid kyi yan lag gi rab tu byed pa'o//_//glang rta shing rta rkang thang rnams/_/dmag gi yan lag rnam pa bzhi/_/mi mthun lce dang glang mo skyes/_/glang po rwa can
[\[138b.5\]]nA ga dang /_/rdzing can/_/lag ldan/_/ri dgas che/_/pI lu mang 'thung gnyis 'thung dang /_/cher myos i b+ha/_kA ri TA/_/kA TI ral can/_'dus pa dang /_/rgya mtsho can dang bum pa can/_/ha sti/_ma taM/_ga skyes dang /_/skyob byed mche ba gnyis pa
[\[138b.6\]]dang /_/sdong po 'dzin dang sdong po dga'/_/pad+ma can dang 'khri shing can/_/pre tsi la dang /_pe tsa kI/_/so ldan mche ba'i stobs can dang /_/glang mo'i bdag dang dza la ka_/paN+Di pA dang /_bA dzI ta/_dI r+g+ha sA ru ta zhes dang /_/an+taHswo de te rA dang /_nirdU ra dang
[\[138b.7\]]mtshon byed rten/_/nyi ma thob dang 'khor lo'i rkang /_/stobs mchog Sha hA ya na dang /_/myos pa'i bri ku/_bur shing rtse/_/gnyis 'joms daN+Da pA la d+hi/_/lus chen dI hA/_'gram byin dang /_/sgrogs byed gnyis 'thung bu rnams so/_53_/lag ldan ma dang glang mo
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dang /_/rna ba 'dzin ma b+hA ba sA/_/gnas ma i b+h+ya ka tsA dang /_/gzhon ma/_tshogs can/_sgeg ma'o/_/khyu bdag chu yi mgon po dang /_/ka la b+ha dang glang po'i bdag_/bik+ko pr-I ta sa chen dang /_/so dbang u da gra da na/_/zab mo'i rigs
[\[139a.2\]]dang glang po bcas/_/gang 'gyur lcags kyus gdul dka' ba/_/g.yo ba can dang bya la ka_/shin tu gdug dang ma taM skyes/_/gcer bu rab bye mir+b+hin+na/_/sgrogs byed myos pa'i so ldan dang /_/glang po'i chang dang myos pa'i chang /_/glang po smyon pa glang po rgod/_/rgyal
[\[139a.3\]]po'i phyi yi glang po'i rgyal/_/mchog tu rnam par rgyal byed pa/_/gang 'gyur phal chen myos ral can/_/pU ri ShA sogs nges par dregs/_/glang mo spos kyi glang mo de/_/gang zhig khro byed khros pa'o/_/skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur/_/gal te mtshon pas b+hA sto/_/
[\[139a.4\]]'od zer can dang mchod sbyin gyi/_/glang po mchog rgyal rtags pa mtshungs/_/bi taM glang po phal pa'o/_/glang tshogs glang po 'dus pa'o/_/dud 'gro byin dang gdab pa dang /_/glang po'i yongs 'dren bi d+ha'o/_/bum pa'i 'og ni bA ha N+yaM/_/pra ti ma ni de yi 'og_/bum pa
[\[139a.5\]]can dang glang 'bur gnyis/_/de yi bar ni bid+ha'o/_/A rak+ta ni bum pa'i mtshams/_/gaN+Da sham kha 'gram pa'i mtshams/_/mche ba'i sha ni pra beSh+Ta/_/ka rI ra ka so'i rtsa ba/_/sna yi gong ni stu la'o/_/lag sor lag pa'i ze 'brul/_/dpral ba a ba grA ha'o/_/rgyab kyi
[\[139a.6\]]sha ni ta l+ya lA ma/_/phrag pa'i phyogs ni A pa ni/_/yI k+Shi kA ni mig 'bras so/_/mig gi zur phyogs nirlu dz+wa/_/san+da na ni mig rus 'og_/A ya skA ra byin pa'i rtsa/_/pro ha rkang pa'i tshigs la'o/_/pak+Sha b+hA ga rtsi ba ma'i cha/_/dan+ta b+hA ga mche ba'i rtse/_/rje ngar phyi
[\[139a.7\]]dang rtse mo'i ni/_/a pa raM dang yo gi ta/_/rje ngar bdun dang rtse mo'i cha/_/gA trar 'gyur ro so rtsa ka_/mjug ma'i rtsa ba dang ni mtha'o/_/gang po'i kha cha pad+ma'i kaM_/rna ba'i rtsa ba tsU li kA/_/ru ladz+dz+he lA rna ba'i nag_/myos pa'i sbyor ba bya stA ra/_/de nas sbyin pa myos
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]pa'o/_/glang po'i rgyan la/_shri ma gAT/_/glang po'i mgo dang lag ldan mgo_/_hak+ko gar+dz+dza 'bod pa'o/_/lcags kyu la ni shr-i Ni 'o/_/rna ba 'bigs pa kar+Na rA/_/'ching ma sa thag_/la lI'o/_/'dogs pa'i ka ba a la naM/_/shaM gar koSha Da zhes pa'ang /_/lcags
[\[139b.2\]]sgrog bA tsi hinyidza ra/_/lcags thag an+tu ka zhes pa'o/_/de nas pr-iShA ka k+ShA dang /_/ba ra tra ni glang po'i thag_/prA ga b+w-i ni glang po'i chings/_/nA rI glang po'i chings so/_/a pa ba ta 'ching bas 'dzin/_/glang po mchog ni gu Ta naM/_/rtogs ldan skye bo dam pa dang /_/
[\[139b.3\]]dze ga nin+da dza ga rdza ni/_/mkhris pa'i rims dang bA ka la/_/skyon bral brtsegs pa bA ka la/_/la ba khra'o/_/glang po'i g.yog_/kha dog stan dang /_ku tha'o/_/rta dang chu 'thung myur 'gro dang /_/'gro mgyogs/_mgyogs 'gro bdun pa dang /_/sin+ku skyes dang 'gro
[\[139b.4\]]byed dang /_/sgrub byed gshog ldan ha ya dang /_/'phrog byed dpal gyi bu dang ni/_/si naM rnam gdon rlung las skyes/_/rlung gi shing rta yang yang za/_/rnga yab can dang hi ShI dang /_/pI ti de ka sha ka dang /_/'gro byed phung po rmig pa can/_/ki m+bI sA li ho dra dang /_/
[\[139b.5\]]ral can tshangs pa rang skyes dang /_/mchod sbyin phyugs dang ku DU ra/_/rgyal 'dzin ri dgas ral pa dang /_/dzA nu ba d+hu rtsa gdong dang /_/rnga yab mjug ma can rnams so/_25_/cang shes dang ni rigs ldan dang /_/rlung dang kun shes zhes kyang ngo /_/rta mchog sin+du bA ra dang /_/
[\[139b.6\]]rang rigs dang ni legs brtson ldan/_/lhag par rgyugs dang bang ldan dang /_/rnam par dul dang legs 'gro dang /_/br-i ShA na la shugs 'gro dang /_/lhag spyod a shwa ta ra dang /_/kha ra dang ni skyob byed pa/_/turmiM/_sa m+wa/_/rta dkar dang /_/dpal gyi shing can gang
[\[139b.7\]]gi ming /_/shing gi rjes su mtshon byed pa/_/rta ni bzang po lnga re rnams/_/yan lag lnga rnams legs par rgyas/_/ma l+li kA mig dkar min rnams/_/nag dang dbang po'i gzhu lta bu/_/gshog ldan rta gtsang mchod sbyin la/_/gang zhig mchod sbyin thob pa'i
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mchog_/rlung gi rta dang sa yi phyogs/_/rlung tshogs/_'phrog byed/_tau ra bai/_/mdung can dang ni rnam par dul/_/dbye ba 'dar byed gling skyes dang /_/mi ldan yul du skyes pa dang /_/bA nA yu skyes/_pA ta sig skyes/_/bA ra Ta zhes pha rol
[\[140a.2\]]la pa/_/rgyab ldan dang ni gnas pa'o/_/shing rta 'dren byed ra tha s+ye/_/bde bar byed dang bde bar spyod/_/rte'u dang ni thu ru nyid/_/mo rta rgod ma bA mI dang /_/a shwA/_ha yI/_rab skyed ma/_6_/rta yi khyu dang rta yi tshogs/_/rgod ma'i khyu dang rgod ma'i tshogs/_/dpal
[\[140a.3\]]gyi shing can snying gar 'khyil/_/mdzes byed mgrin par gnas pa'o/_/ze rngog ru gnas gang 'khyil ba/_/de ni lha yi nor bur brjod/_/kaTh+yan rta yi sked pa'o/_/he ShA hA+e ShA de yi skad/_/'tsher 'gro/_/phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang /_/yongs skor mchod
[\[140a.4\]]'gro ring du 'gro/_/lnga po 'di rnams rta yi 'gros/_/rta yi gdong dang mtshul pa'o/_/ze rngog dang ni ze ba'i phyogs/_/rmig pa sha paM bergI'o/_/rta mjug dang ni rnga ma dang /_/rta rda lA gu la zhes dang /_/bA la ha sta rta snying ngo /_/ban+tA li kA tshogs su 'gyur/_/'dre
[\[140a.5\]]bar byed dang ban+de mtshungs/_/nye bar 'dre dang 'dre log dang /_/pha rol 'dre dang sa la 'dre/_/steng du gnas dang skyes bu can/_/rnam par gnon dang rgyug dang bang /_/rta yi srab dang ka ba ma T+yaM/_/ka pi kaM dang na na'o/_/ha yats+tshu Ta'i phrag pa/_/mgrin par dril bu g.yer
[\[140a.6\]]kha'o/_/rab bskul 'dzin dpyad/_srab par+Na/_/sa tU 'jug byed dang ni lcag_/yongs su 'gro byed/_'dod byed dang /_/rang+ga'o 'di yi rtse mo'i cha/_/pra Sha re dang ban+da ha/_/pags pas dkris dang ka Sha mtshungs/_/rta yis nyin gcig bgrod pa'i lam/_/gang de
[\[140a.7\]]A shwI naM zhes bya/_/mgrin par 'phyang la le nA sha_/zhags pa ne nA li kI_/theg pa 'khor los 'gro ba dang /_/g.yul gyi shing rta yan lag brgyad/_/rgyal byed sna tshogs shing rta dang /_/pha rol legs bgrod smra ldan no/_/'di ni me tog shing rta dang /_/rtsed sogs
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]rgyu can 'khor lo'i theg_/theg pa shing rta rnam 'dren dang /_/lam bgrod yongs su skyed pa'o/_/rna ba'i shing rta rab 'bab dang /_/rta can mtshungs pa gsum yin no/_/gnyis so stan g.yogs stag can dang /_/stag gi pags g.yogs shing rta'o/_/la ba dkar pos
[\[140b.2\]]g.yogs pa dang /_/'bab ldan la ba dkar pos g.yogs/_/shing rta lwa ba can dang ni/_/gos can lwa ba sogs kyis g.yogs/_/gnyis 'thung la sogs shing rta rnams/_/shing rta'i tshogs dang lam bgrod do/_/rnga mo ldan pa'i shing rta ni/_/lhag par rnga mo yang pa
[\[140b.3\]]ldan/_/gan+t+ri dI bes ra'o/_/a na shing rtar gyur pa ni/_/gan+tI lwa ba'i phyi rol can/_/khyogs dang de bzhin thag pa dang /_/lum+ba shing rta'o/_/d+hu ni shing rta'i gdong yin te/_/a ba skar shing rta'i lus/_/shing rta'i yan lag 'khor lo'i rtsibs/_/min dang de
[\[140b.4\]]nas bi t+Dika_/_'khor lo'i lte ba mtha'i mu khyud/_/pra d+hi'o de'i mig zer bu ni/_/a ni ra Ni zhes pa'o/_/'thab ra dang ni shing rta sgrib/_/yu gan+d+hAr gnya' shing 'dzin/_/a nu karko 'og gi gnas/_/gnya' shing 'ching zhing yug dang /_/bzhon pa lam
[\[140b.5\]]'degs theg pa dang /_/phyogs dang 'khrul 'khor mgyogs byed do/_/phan tshun 'bab dang rgyu byed dang /_/'degs byed zhes bya ba rnams so/_/bzhon pa ba dang glang po ba/_/glang chen steng na gnas pa'o/_/me mi N+Tha dang blon po che/_/rta yi steng na gnas pa'o/_/'di
[\[140b.6\]]rnams de ltar spyod byed pa/_/zhes pa skyong bar byed pa'o/_/kha lo pa dang mgo 'dren dang /_/sna thag sna khrid kha lo sgyur/_/g.yas sdong lho phyogs gnas pa'i ming /_/shing rta'i gnyen zhes bya ba'o/_/rta la gnas dang shing rta pa/_/'thab byed dpa' bo rtul phod
[\[140b.7\]]pa/_/bya ra ba dang mel tshe pa/_/dmag dpon dang ni dmag mgo ba/_/bde chen dang ni chen po 'dis/_/sde bsrung ba dang sde can no/_/dmag la mnyam par rig pa gang /_/dmag dpung dang ni dmag tshogs so/_/gang zhig stong gi stobs ldan pa/_/de ni stong
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]thub zhes bya'o/_/dpa' bo/_spyod byed/_shor ba dang /_/kur+b+ya/_slag can/_sas+ha r+d+ha/_/gon khrab dang ni mda' skyob dang /_/go bya dang ni tso la ka_/lus skyob khrab dang ya lang dang /_/brang khebs ka ba ta la nam/_/pags skyob kang+ga Ta ka dang /_/
[\[141a.2\]]dza ga ra dang ka ba tsa'o/_/sprul lto 'dra dang brang skyob dang /_/kat+tu la dang sgrib skyob dang /_/sor mo skyob dang sor skyob byed/_/byin pa skyob dang mang+khu NaM/_/mgo skyob/_mgo khebs/_tshem zha rmog_/lcags kyi rang bzhin dra ba can/_/dra ba phal cher lus bsrung ngo /_/
[\[141a.3\]]go cha gon dang go chas can/_/go cha ba dang chas zhugs dang /_/go cha dang ni parmi ta/_/go bgos/_sadza nar+d+ha dang /_/UD+ha dang ni kaM ka Ta/_/'di ni chas pa ma sogs skabs/_/thams cad mngon par 'gro ba dang /_/tshogs kun pa dang go kun bgos/_/go cha can sogs
[\[141a.4\]]go 'dzin dang /_/khrab can ba d+hun+ti dbus der/_/bdag can mtshon cha'i snying po mtshon/_/rkang thang rkang dmag rkang 'gros pa/_/rkang 'gros can dang rkang shar ba/_/pa dA be+e ka rA/_rkang rgyu pa/_/rkang 'gro rkang can/_dpung bu chung /_/rkang thang tshogs dang yan lag byed/_/
[\[141a.5\]]lus kyis 'thab par byed pa'o/_/mtshon chas 'tsho dang mtshon cha ba/_/mtshon cha blo can mtshon cha mtshungs/_/lag yang dang ni myur du 'bigs/_/myur bar 'phyogs dang bslab pa'o/_/lag sbyangs skyes bu sgyu rtsal can/_/dgos pa bcas dang myur bar bgrod/_/'ben
[\[141a.6\]]las mda' ni gzhan mi 'gro/_/gzhu can/_gzhu ldan/_gzhu thogs dang /_/dong ldan dang ni mda' snod can/_/gsal shing mtshon dang gsal shing ba/_/mdung can dang ni mdung mtshon can/_/ral gri pa dang gri mtshon can/_/mdung pa dang ni mdung can pa/_/dgra/_
[\[141a.7\]]sta bdag bcas gang yin pa/_/de na dgra sta'i mtshon cha can/_/pags ldan lag na phub yin no/_/ba dan 'byar dang rnam rgyal can/_/de gcod dka' spyod gzhu thogs dang /_/mda' pa dang ni mda' 'dzin pa/_/grogs byed rjes su spyod pa dang /_/rjes su rgyug dang
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]phyir 'brang ba/_/sngon 'gro mdun 'gro dang por 'gro/_/gdong 'gro ba dang sngon la 'gro/_/sna 'dor ba dang mig sngar 'gro/_/man+tha ra dang dal gyis 'gro/_/bang chen pa dang mngon par mgyogs/_/myur 'gro/_mgyogs pa shugs can dang /_/rab mgyogs rgyug par byed
[\[141b.2\]]dang mgyogs/_/'dod 'gro rjes su 'dod pa dang /_/kun tu myur dang shin tu myur/_/rgyal dang rgyal nus dze tuM ste/_/dze la rgyal bar sems pa'o/_/a b+h+ya mi ta/_grogs ngan dang /_/skya log zhes pa de brjod do/_/gang zhig sgra 'dun 'gro byed pa/_/rgyal ba gsal
[\[141b.3\]]byed rgyal brjod pa'o/_/stobs chen dang ni gyad mi dang /_/gang zhig shin tu rtul phod pa/_/brang sprod a ra si la'o/_/shi rta ra rta shing rta'i bdag_/rgyal byed rgyal ba rnam rgyal byed/_/dze tA rgyal can rgyal bar byed/_/dpa' bo rab stobs rnam gnon can/_/dpa' spyod/_shor
[\[141b.4\]]ba/_stag shar dang /_/g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang /_/rkang thang gzhan la thob byed pa'o/_/rgyal mtshan can dang bzhon pa can/_/dmag dpon ru dar sde dang ni/_/dmag dang dpung ni chas pa'o/_/stobs kyi sde dang 'khor lo dang /_/tshogs pa dang ni ba dan can/_/de
[\[141b.5\]]nas nA sI ri dang ni/_/'dren pa dang ni sngon 'gro mtshungs/_/dpung tshogs rnams kyi bkod pa ni/_/de dbye dbyug sogs 'khrug shoms so/_/zang dkar zlum pa'i dbyug par 'gyur/_/longs spyod rjes su spyod par brjod/_/dkyil 'khor kun sbyin zlum po ni/_/so sor
[\[141b.6\]]spyod pa 'dus pa'o/_/slar 'brang bkod pa phyi ma'o/_/dmag gi rgyab ni yongs 'dzin pa/_/glang po shing rta re re dang /_/rta pa gsum dang rkang thang lnga/_/pa dA ti kA zhes pa'o/_/so sor yan lag sum 'gyur gyis/_/se nI mu khA+o rim pas gzhan/_/sum 'gyur gu l+mi
[\[141b.7\]]ga nau dang /_/ba ha nI dang /_pr-i tA nAM/_/tsa mUM/_A nI ki nai dang /_/de bcu a k+Sho hi N-Ir 'dod/_/phun tshogs 'byor ldan dpal dang shis/_/phongs pa ma 'byor phun tshogs bral/_/dal gyis sa srung chen por 'gyur/_/dal gnas/_mtshon cha/_balpa ri/_/gzhu dang
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]tsA ba/_d+ha nu dang /_/mda'i 'phen dang ni karmu ka/_/mda' mo/_mda' dang /_mda' rnon dang /_/a ba s+t+r-i Na trA ti Na/_/tA d+hanu dang /_gu NI tA/_/gzhum chog dang ni/_a sha'o/_/gAN+Di ba dang gaN+Dib/_/chang zung dang ni rna ba dang /_/rgyab nag
[\[142a.2\]]mda' yi zas can no/_/gzhu yi mchog ma mu Ta nI/_/ta lam lag 'brag lag stan no/_/go bA dang ni lasta ka_/chang zung dang ni gzhu yi rgyud/_/gzhu rgyud srad bu rgyud yon tan/_/ga byaM dang ni tA ra baM/_/mda' 'phen mtshon cha/_la kAM dang /_/mda' bsnun dbug
[\[142a.3\]]bya 'phen pa dang /_/mtshan ma dang ni so so'i lus/_/drang lta rab 'gro mda'i spyod yul/_/g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i/_/gnas 'di rnams la lnga zhes so/_/mda' dang lam ldan shA ya ka_/bA Na/_tsher can i Shu dang /_/mi 'khyog dang ni mkha' la
[\[142a.4\]]'gro/_/sgro ldan skra ba skyes 'dra dang /_/sha ra nag phran ro pa dang /_/tshogs can dang ni/_pre Sha rka/_/rtse mo can dang myur 'gro dang /_/gshog ldan 'bab byed b+ha la dang /_/k+She la kaM ka mtshon cha'i 'dab/_/ka Ta ka ka rnam par 'don/_/'ben bsnun dpa' 'joms rab
[\[142a.5\]]'joms dang /_/bA dze na dang /_pi karka/_/de nas phyogs can 'gro byed dang /_/gsum khas sta dang gcod byed dang /_/'gro ldan 'dab ldan bkod pa can/_/b+hal+li/_b+hal+la la sogs mda'/_/lcags mda' sgra chen lcags sbubs can/_/mtshon cha'i gtso bo
[\[142a.6\]]zhes pa'o/_/rtse mo'i cha la tshol byed dang /_/mtshon cha tshad ldan mu Na ya/_/dug can li sta mda' phyogs dang /_/li sta ko zhes pa rnams so/_/ni ra ta ni mda' 'phangs pa/_/'gro ldan 'dor byed shA ya ka_/mda' dang grol ba rnam par gcod/_/'bar byed dang
[\[142a.7\]]ni shugs drag go_/zla ba phyed pa po can dang /_/bra sogs sgo dang d+hA rA'o/_/tU Na tU Ni ra dag mtshungs/_/nges chags dang ni mda' 'dzin no/_/nye bar chags dang tshogs can dang /_/mda' yi gnas dang bi pA tha/_ral gri dang ni dkyil 'khor can/_/rtse mo can dang
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]kr-i bA Na/_/a si gcod byed shA ya ka_/lag skyong zla ba 'dzum byed dang /_/sgrol byed skyob byed gcod byed dang /_/shad lang dang ni brdeg cha dang /_/bzang bdag skyes dang pha rol skyes/_/mtshon cha'i gzhi dang 'dzin byed 'dzin/_/dug can dang ni rnam 'joms dang /_/dpal
[\[142b.2\]]gyi snying po las rnon dang /_/rjes su gtse dang /_shis byed dang /_/phub dang phal ka zhes so/_/pags ldan drang po'i ral gri dang /_/ka TI ta la/_arga naM/_/'khor lo'i cha can g.yul du 'dzin/_/se ru ral gri'i yu ba ste/_/de yi 'ching thag mo kha la/_/prA t+yA kA ra/_ka
[\[142b.3\]]la ha/_/si d+ha na ka ral gri'i shubs/_/tho ba 'joms byed g+ha na'o/_/dbyug pa lcags bcings pa ri g+ha/_/skyed gri ka ra bA li'o/_/b+hin+di bA la mda' thung mtshungs/_/dgra sta sta ri gcod byed dang /_/sta mo zhes pa'o dgra sta'i 'og_/gcod byed/_gzod dang gri gri gug_/chu
[\[142b.4\]]gri gri thung ts+tshu ri kA_/mdzod kyi ral gri ral gri'i bu/_/mda' bo che ni to ma ra/_/mdung dang mtshon ring thag mdung dang /_/ka rA ba dang sha la rnams/_/mdung thung dang ni kA shrI mtshungs/_/'phang mdung /_sor mdung /_pir shang ga_/mdung dang mtshams can zhes pa'o/_/
[\[142b.5\]]rtse gsum pa dang mtshams gsum pa/_/phur bu/_brtan pa/_shaM ku dang /_/zhi ba me tog cha rnams mtshungs/_/sna mdor ko Ta ya zhes so/_/zur dang mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi/_/lag grol 'khrul 'khor grol ba dang /_/muk+tA/_pu ka_/muk+ta kaM/_/lag grol shak+ti
[\[142b.6\]]la sogs te/_/grol ba chu gri la sogs pa/_/muk+tA muk+ta gsal shing sogs/_/'khrul 'khor grol ba mda' la sogs/_/mda' skyong mda' ni ring ba la/_/phyi rol nges dang baT+Ti sham/_/dbyug pa/_gsal shing be con dang /_/'khor lo la sogs mtshon rigs
[\[142b.7\]]dang /_/mda' dang mtshon cha goms pa ni/_/u bA pa ni khu ra lI/_/rgyal pos dmag la mnga' gsol byed/_/dgra la dpung ni sngon 'gro dang /_/gang zhig dmag 'gro de dbang bskur/_/phyir rgol byed dang phyir sngon 'gro/_/'thab skyod shin tu 'gog pa'o/_/kun
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]tu 'thab dang 'khrug pa dang /_/dmag 'joms pa dang nges par 'jug_/dmag 'gro bskyod dang thegs pa dang /_/zhugs dang 'gro ba ga la'o/_/'jug dang de ru gnas pa dang /_/yul lta pra ti ra thar 'dod/_/brkyang ba dang ni ru brkyang dang /_/pha rol
[\[143a.2\]]dmag nang 'jug pa'i don/_/bai tA li kA go phyed pa/_/bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o/_/'khor lo can dang dril bu can/_/mnyam dka' dang ni sbrang can mtshungs/_/gcer bu bstod pa'i brtul zhugs dang /_/phyag 'tshal go ra ga stong 'don/_/tho rangs mdo ni rab 'don
[\[143a.3\]]dang /_/dbyangs dang bkra shis brjod byed pa/_/longs spyod stobs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed rgyal/_/phye ma dang ni k+Sho da'o/_/nye bar 'khrug dang 'gyed pa'o/_/'dzings pa dang ni phyogs med do/_/sngon gyi 'dzin pa mchod pa dang /_/
[\[143a.4\]]longs spyod tshogs dang yongs rdzogs nyid/_/ba dan rnam par rgyal byed dang /_/rgyal mtshan tog dang nam mkha'i snye ma/_/kad+ha lI dang kar+d+ha lI/_/bsags ldan mtshon byed b+ha dza yi/_/a ba tsU la uts+tshu la/_/'phel byin kha dang kurba ka_/dur khrod 'khrug pa'i sa gzhi
[\[143a.5\]]dang /_/shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu ster/_/nga sngang snga zhes pa dang /_/bdag ni snga'o zhes bya ba/_/mtshar can skyes bu dregs pa can/_/de ni nga rgyal can dang bdag_/nga nga zhes smra phan tshun 'gran/_/gang zhig 'gran par byed pa'o/_/shugs can thal 'gro rtul phod
[\[143a.6\]]dang /_/stobs ldan dpa' dang nyam nga med/_/'joms byed mthu dang brtson 'grus dang /_/nus pa srog dang pha rol gnon/_/rnam gnon dang ni shin tu dpa'/_/gnod pa'i gnas su 'joms byed pa/_/dpa' bo mchog ni gang zhig gi_/chang 'thung g.yul
[\[143a.7\]]gyi snga phyi ru/_/'khrug pa 'gyed pa rgyal byed pa/_/saMk+Sha/_mr-i d+hi/_sa lI ka_/du byed dang ni kaM da naM/_/rab tu rnam par 'joms pa dang /_/g.yul du 'thab dang rtsod pa dang /_/saM yu ga dang kan rab 'joms/_/g.yul gyi 'du byed rtsod pa che/_/rnam 'dzin
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]g.yul las skyes pa gang /_/mi bde g.yul 'gyed a dzi ni/_/sa mi yu d+ha zhes bya'o/_/g.yul du 'thab mos phan tshun dag_/mnyam du shi ba a naM ka_/dge bral saM spo Ta zhes 'dod/_/sAm+ba ra yi ki dang ni/_/mngon par nyid dang yang dag 'joms/_/
[\[143b.2\]]'khrug long rnams ni spyi yin no/_/du byed mi bzad 'thab mo'o/_/mtshon med g.yul sha tu mu la/_/dpung pas 'thab pa ni yur+ha/_/glang bo'i bum pa'i sgra dang ni/_/ngu sgra 'thab dang dgra kun 'phel/_/glang sgra seng ge'i 'ur sgra dang /_/'khrug rnga pa Ta/_ha yi sgra/_/
[\[143b.3\]]mtshungs so ta raT+Ta dang ni/_/mngon gsal rdzas dang a raT+Ta/_/snyems pa'i garga ra rnams so/_/dpa' bo'i brtson pa dpa' bo'i rgyud/_/dregs rtsom ma Ta ka Ti'o/_/g.yo sgyu ngan thabs na Tha'o/_/de nas 'khrul dang nor ba dang /_/'chi byed 'chir 'jug shi ba dang /_/
[\[143b.4\]]nges zin slar yang bskor ba'o/_/brgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa dang /_/mnar ba dang ni mtshir ba'o/_/rmas pa lus nyams ltung ba'o/_/'gras dang rtsen dang slar byed dang /_/'khon zhugs pa dang sha 'khon zhugs/_/'jigs dang b+ho lo snying stor dang /_/paN+Da
[\[143b.5\]]ga Ta zhes bya'o/_/bros dang byer dang nye bar bros/_/shin tu bros dang rnam par bros/_/phyir song ba dang phyir log dang /_/kun tu bros dang khyus pa'o/_/ce spyang can dang mche ba dang /_/'du byed dang ni rnam par 'phyo/_/dus mtshan 'jigs byed shing rta mo/_/g.yul
[\[143b.6\]]du bcom dang gzhan rgyal dang /_/'pham pa dang ni pha rol rgyal/_/yib pa dang ni bskyab pa'o/_/ma lus gsod dang nges par bsnun/_/gsod pa dang ni brdeg pa dang /_/brdung gtag dang ni rab tu 'joms/_/rnam par gnon dang 'jug byed dang /_/'tshe byed yongs
[\[143b.7\]]dor gnas med byed/_/gos med stan med gnas med dang /_/tsa ka dang ni nor 'joms dang /_/nges 'tshe nges gnod nges par sel/_/gnas spo gzhan nas nges 'gugs dang /_/sel byed dang ni brnab sems dang /_/ni shun+ta na/_nges par gtser/_/rab 'joms
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]mnar dang mnar ba dang /_/kun thob rnams 'gro shin tu bsrub/_/'joms dang 'tshed dang /_gnod pa dang /_/gnod byed/_'gro byed/_'tshe ba dang /_/rkyen dang rnam 'dor rab 'jal 'jug_/rnam bsnun srub byed yongs 'jal 'jug_/chud za byed dang
[\[144a.2\]]rnam zhi byed/_/'joms dang nges sel rnam 'tshe byed/_/de bskyed ces pa rnams su 'gyur/_47_/gnyid log mtshan mo sad pa shi_/sa dang me dang chu dag go_/mnyam pa dang ni 'bras bu bcas/_/lnga pa nyid du dus kyi chos/_/lta ba'i mtha' dang 'jig pa dang /_/shin tu 'gro
[\[144a.3\]]dang nges par thim/_/ring du/_chas dang /_kun tu gnas/_/lnga nyid mtha' dang zhig pa dang /_/'chi dang /_shi dang /_nub pa dang /_/nges par lhung dang sa thob pa'o/_17_/ro dang /_rab thob lnga pa nyid/_/tshe 'das nyer thob rab tu bkod/_/gzhan song /_rab thim/_kun
[\[144a.4\]]tu gnas/_/rab sod dang ni gzhan du song /_/bcu pa zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/_11_/ro dang /_phung po/_gnas son dang /_/ro sha_/sa 'phel/_gnas skabs lnga/_6_/mthar 'gyur dang ni/_bA ru tha/_/ro khri can dang /_bA Ti dang /_/ro yi shing rta shing gi gyad/_6_/
[\[144a.5\]]ka ban+d+ha dang /_byed ldan ni/_/mgo bo dang bral khog pa'o/_/dur khrod dang ni pha mes nags/_/drag po rol ba zhi ba'i gnas/_/'jig gnas bsreg gnas yi dgas gnas/_/ro thab sgong pug tsa ti dang /_/shing gi gnas zhes bya ba'o/_/ri mos bkra dang mchod
[\[144a.6\]]rten dang /_/rtag par ro khar byur bu'o/_/legs byas bkur sti dam pa byed/_/mchog tu byed pa rnams yin no/_/rab zung /_nyer bzung /_gzung bya dang /_/phyag byed pa dang ma ti'o/_/btson rar bcings pa'i khang pa dang /_/khri mon dang ni chad pa'i khyim/_/
[\[144a.7\]]shing gnas/_shing khyim/_chad can bcings/_/skyes bu'i srog ni prA Na'o/_/de bzhin 'tsho dang gson pa dang /_/tshe ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i dus/_/skyes bu 'tsho byed 'tsho ba'i sman/_/dmag gi yan lag gi rab tu byed pa'o//_//zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las rgyal rigs kyi sde rdzogs so//_//brla byung /_brla skyes/_/dzau dang /_/rje rigs sa 'dzin rje'u'o/_6_/kun 'tsho ba dang /_'tshe ba dang /_/son byed so
[\[144b.2\]]nam 'tsho tshis so/_/'tsho bar byed dang 'jug byed do/_/skye bo 'jig rten skye dgu rnams/_/zhing pa phyugs skyong /_tshong byed dang /_/'tsho ba'i chos zhes bya ba'o/_/zhabs thog 'jug byed/_lta ba dang /_/bden par brjod dang zhing las dang /_/bden dang shi po ny+tsa dang
[\[144b.3\]]ni/_/rmo rko dang ni phru rlog go_/ma bslangs pa dang /_a mr-i ta/_/bslangs pa dang ni mr-i ta'o/_/prA mi t+yi ni skyed kyis 'tsho/_/bu lon dang ni paR+Ya dang /_/bskyi ba dang ni g.yar ba dang /_/brje ba dang ni bsgyur brlog go_/so sor sbyin dang rnam par brje/_/nges pa yongs su
[\[144b.4\]]'jug pa dang /_/brje dang yongs 'jug cha gzhan dang /_/nor gyi rab tu sbyor ba dang /_/le lo can dang skyed kyis 'tsho/_/ma lA k+Shi kA ha zhes dang /_/ra Ni d+hA ba bden mi bden/_/bi shan ni/_bu lon gtong /_/skyed pa dang ni nor spel ba/_/'dzin pa can dang sbyor ba pa/_/
[\[144b.5\]]ut+ta ma ni rab sbyor ba/_/spel ba spo dang spel bas 'tsho/_/log min byed dang log 'tsho ba/_/legs pa dang ni nyis 'gyur ba/_/zhing pa shes pa so nam pa/_/phru rlog pa dang rmos pa dang /_/bram ze zhes pa 'di dag mtshungs/_/rab rje ba dang nus ldan dang /_/shor ba pa dang
[\[144b.6\]]'khor lo skyong /_/zhing dang 'bru shas pa le yaM/_/'bru dang sA lu 'byung ma'o/_/nas dang nas zhing dug thu ba/_/nas sogs 'byung ba'i sa gzhi'o/_/til zhing dang ni til skye ba/_/au mI ni dang sran ma skye/_/sran ma can dang b+hi gI ta/_/bcad bya gzhan lam rag pa'o/_/thog
[\[144b.7\]]gnyis mon gyi khri tshe dang /_/sran sogs skye dang bzod pa'o/_/sa bon btsugs dang bskrun pa dang /_/btab dang rmos dang skyed pa'o/_/gsum log dang ni lan gsum pa/_/gsum rlog gsum rmos de la yang /_/nyis 'gyur byas dang de bzhin du/_/thams cad sam+bA kr-ita mo/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bre dang bre bo che sogs tshad/_/bre can bre bo che can sogs/_/bA rI tshad can khA rI ka_/ma r+ha mar+No dang pa'o/_/zhing dang sa gzhi 'bru skye dang /_/'brum sa chu ma mu tshigs can/_/rmo ba zhing sa sa gzhi tshogs/_/bong ba dang ni sa sgong dang /_/ko Ti ra dang ko Ti dang /_/
[\[145a.2\]]she loSh+Ta sogs dbye ba'o/_/lcag pa dbyig pa to tri dang /_/pra dza na dang gzir byed do/_/zor ba dang ni rnga byed do/_/tog tse dang ni rko byed do/_/gshol dang thong pa rmod byed dang /_/ri rI shaM dang lang+ga la/_/pha laM phung po can ha laM/_/sa 'joms dang ni ku dA la/_/ma ni rnam par
[\[145a.3\]]'joms pa'o/_/gshol chen dzit+pa ha lI dang /_/sA mya'o gnya' shing gnya' phur dang /_/gshol mda' gshol gyi dbyig pa'o/_/dor dang rmo glang bar+t+ta ti/_/pags dang skul byed dam pa las/_/srab dang 'dzin spyad ces pa yang /_/brtod phur dang ni 'dogs pa'i shing /_/

[\[145a.6\]]mung+khA dang /_/tsa na ka dang 'phrog byed spu po/_/mung+ga dang ni 'phrog byed do/_/mu ta nag po nags skye dang /_/dpyid skyes nags kyi mung+ga dang /_/mung+ga brkyang ba dag mtshungs te/_/til skyes dang ni dgos pa'i til/_/til gyi phung po dzA TI la/_/ko Da pa dang ko tra pa/_/gyin
[\[145a.7\]]'joms de nas yungs nag la/_/tshogs can sa ri pa ba dang /_/tsha ba'i snum can tan tu b+ha/_/yungs kar don grub zas gtsang dang /_/'byung po 'jigs byed ces pa'o/_/ske tshe/_k+Shu d+ha mngon skyed dang /_/A shwa rI dang nag mo dang /_/k+Sha pa dang ni yungs kar rgyal/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ku lat+tha dang nges snum dang /_/zangs kyi gtsug phud kul+la Sha/_/ya ba ka rnams mtshungs pa'o/_/mA tu lA ni b+hang+gA'o/_/zar ma u muk+Shu mI'o/_/tsaN+Di kA ni/_tsang+ga TI/_/gaM geShI zhes bya ba ni/_/sha Ta sharka rA zhes so/_/rtsa dang so ba des sgrib dang /_sngo bsangs kA
[\[145b.2\]]sh+ya thun 'gro mtshungs/_/lo thog rtse mo kaM sha ru/_lo tog snye ma ka ne shaM/_so ba 'bru dang skogs can dang /_/stam+ba guts+tsha rtswa sogs 'bru/_/za byed tsha ba'i 'joms pa ni/_/lo tog rnams kyi gcod byed do/_/mgul ba dar pa sdong bu dang /_/pA la lA dang 'bras bu

[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ba'i snod/_/lcags can rtsub pa sol+la dang /_/ko tu ko sbubs snum gyi snod/_/de nyid chung ma kut+ta ya/_/shing dang lcags las byas pa yi/_/gzar bu kau pi kA ma le/_/su da Da dang zan ma dang /_/g.yos ma dang ni lag bde ba/_/mchod byed pa

[\[147a.1\]]pA ka laM/_/pA tsa lam rnams mtshungs pa'o/_/rtse byas/_bsreg sha shul ma bya'o/_/btsos pa'i sha ni bai tha raM/_/sid+d+ha zho yis bsres pa'o/_/'o ma mar sar dag kho na/_/lA ba ni kaM_/sA r+b+bi twaM/_/zhag lon til gyi bza' ba la/_/au da kri Sha/_

[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]ba lang ma he la sogs pa/_/gson pa'i nor dang rkang pa'i no/_/ba lang za dang gsol ba'i gnas/_/ba lang za gnas gang zhig la/_/zhi ba'i skye mched ut+p+r-iSh+Ta/_/mtshams dang khyu mchog dkyil 'khor/_/sgrub byed ma dang dri bzang skyes/_/gro

[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]lo'i mgrin dang mang po sgril/_/ra sa lA d+h+wa rlung la dga'/_/d+hu ri d+ha ra rol pa bkram/_/rde'u dang ni rnga phrug go_/rde'u 'dogs thag shing kha la/_/shing la rkang pa 'dogs pa'o/_/ra dang lto 'phyang ts+tsha ga dang /_/bo tsang bya lhan cig rangs pa dang /_/lha rnams dga' dang me nA

[\[148b.3\]]dkar dang /_/bal ldan/_a bi/_e Da ka_/lto 'phyang dang ni u ra b+ha/_/gnas bcas yu mang 'joms byed ma/_/maN+De/_b+ha Na/_u gi lu/_/me Shi dra ba can dang ni/_/bzhon lug a b+hI mA rI dang /_/sha te bi dang sau D+ha bi/_/be du kha dang 'dra ba'o/_/rnga
[\[148b.4\]]mo brang 'gro tshogs dang khyu/_/rnga khyu gsus 'phyang rnga mo'i khyu/_/bong bu dang ni 'khor lo can/_/sna chen/_skad chen/_rA su b+ha/_/kha ra grong du 'dren pa dang /_/dran pa dran bya phur bu'i rna/_/lam 'gro byed dang /_rnga ma can/_/chu ba ring dang byin pa gtsang /_/
[\[148b.5\]]sbyong byed phyugs dang rtswa A ru/_/tri Na sai hi b+ha zhes dang /_/tsha Ta 'i khyu mchog lam ba dang /_/bzod pa'i mu khyud sa la nyal/_/k+Sha ra zhes pa rnams yin no/_24_/lus 'phags skyes dang ded dpon dang /_/tshong dpon tshong pa nges 'gro dang /_/zong dang tshong gi ka yi ka_/zong

[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]phreng bcu swa ts+tsha zhes bya ste/_/grangs dang bgrang bya bcu la sogs/_/grangs dang bgrang bya bgrang byed kyi/_/nyi shu la sogs rtag tu gcig_/grangs don gnyis dang mang po nyid/_/de rnams la yang dgu bcu'o/_/bcu gnyis grangs kyi rkang pa ste/_/
[\[149a.2\]]gcig bcu brgya yi rim pa las/_/stong dang khri 'bum sa ya dang /_/bye ba dung phyur nirbu dang /_/pad+ma la sogs thams cad ni/_/phyi ma phyi ma bcu 'gyur ro/_/'jal bar byed dang tshad du byed/_/mnyam byed ces pa tshad kyi don/_/'jal byed srang dang sor dang bre/_/
[\[149a.3\]]ma ru lnga rnams mA sha ka_/de rnams bcu drug zho yin te/_/zho bzhi la ni srang gang ngo /_/gser 'jal zho cha gser mig ste/_/ku ru bi sta de yi srang /_/'degs byed dang ni snyoms byed do/_/srang brgya khur yin nyi shu srang /_/yA tsi tri ni khur bcu'o/_/shing rta khur
[\[149a.4\]]ta A tsi rta/_/kaR+ShA pa Ni dong tshe yin/_/zangs kyi dong tshe pa Na 'o/_/bzhi cha bzhi pa dag dang ni/_/bcu drug nyi shu kuny+tsa ka_/u Da ba dang bre la sogs/_/yongs su 'jal byed so so ko_/rkang pa zhes pa bzhi cha yin/_/cha dang cha shas dgod pa'o/_/
[\[149a.5\]]longs spyod/_zang zing /_rdzas rang dbang /_/nor dang /_ba su/_a n+wa dang /_/dbyig dang rin chen yo byad rnams/_/'byor pa/_mdud pa/_snying por re/_/r-i k+ShaM/_r-i ts+tsha sgrub byed rnams/_18_/mdzod dang rin chen gser gzugs dang /_/sgrom dang snod
[\[149a.6\]]ces bya ba yang /_/de dag las gzhan spa bya dang /_/dngul dang de gnyis ma hA ti/_/mkha' lding gshog pa margad dang /_/rdo yi snying po nor bu ljang /_/pad+ma rA ga dmar po dang /_/ku ru bin+da/_sh+me nAsma/_ri bzang can dang rin chen dmar/_/ya ba rbo la/_
[\[149a.7\]]dpal me tog_/nor bu chen po byu ru dang /_/'khri shing nor bu tsa kr-i kan/_/lus dmar 'dab dang gser can 'dab/_/byu ru dang ni rtsi dmar ro/_/mu tig nya phyis sa bon dang /_/grol ba can dang mu tig 'bras/_/nya phyis skye bar sbubs skyes dang /_/ba ra sa yi u
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]ba laM/_7_/mu men rgyal po 'khyil ba dang /_/rgyal po'i cod pan rnam gsal skyes/_4_/shel la arka ga lwarka/_/me shel 'od gsal nyi ma dang /_/rdo ba 'od gsal ri skyes dang /_/sreg byed rdo ba shA li 'phye/_/sbyangs pa'i rdo ba dri ldan dang /_/tsa ma'i snying po
[\[149b.2\]]dngas pa dang /_/dag pa'i rdo dkar zla ba'i bri/_/rdo ba dkar po zhes pa rnams/_12_/nyi bzhon la ni beDUR+YaM/_/sprin chen dang ni gzhon nu skyes/_7_/rdo rje la ni zho ldan gnas/_/hI ra ka dang nor bu'i dbye/_/chu shel ma ni pa sA ma/_/ma Ni tsa ka dbus na 'dzag_/mig
[\[149b.3\]]la phan dang rin chen che/_/bsil ba'i char ba ldan zhes pa'ang /_7_/dbang po sngon po nor bu sngo/_/nor bu'i snying po rjes 'brang ba/_/sarga se 'bru'i sa bon mdog_/nor bu las skyes thod du 'dod/_/rdo skyes mu tig la sogs kyang /_/nor bu mdzes bzang rol pa
[\[149b.4\]]dang /_/rin po che dang 'gyur byed dang /_/'ching bu 'di dag mtshungs pa'o/_/puSh+pa ra ga sa yi chi la/_/baM sha rA ga la sogs gzhan/_/gser la swar+Na/_ka na ka_/he ma zangs mchog kAny+tsa naM/_/dug+ma dang ni tsam sa skyes/_/gaM gA skyes dang bsreg bya dang /_/A li
[\[149b.5\]]dang ni karbu raM/_/sa le spra ma dang skyes gzugs dang /_/bum brgya skyes dang ri las skyes/_/b+harmA/_'od byed 'dzam bu'i gser/_/rkang brgyad pa dang hi ra Ni/_/cha shas sbyangs dang mtsho'i sa bon/_/gzi brjid skyes dang rin chen che/_/skyes dang tsa ku ra skyes dang /_/
[\[149b.6\]]'tsho bsgrol dang sa'i zla ba/_/lcags mchog mdog ldan su rA b+hi/_27_/rwa can rgyan gser/_rwa can gser/_/mi zad gser la ka l+yAM naM/_/dngul la tshon can/_arga DaM/_/khardzu ra dkar mdog ngan dang /_/'khyog po'i sa bon tA ra'o/_7_/zangs ma shuwaM nyi ma yi/_/
[\[149b.7\]]ljon dmar u dum+bA ra dang /_/dmar po kla klo'i kha gnyis brgyad/_/bi raSh+Tha dang thub mkhris 'dzin/_/lcags dmar dang ni yong skyob kyang /_/ra gan/_ri'i kA ri med/_/mkhris 'dzin A ra ku Ta dang /_/ri ti dang ni zhu bya'o/_/rga ba 'khyog dang lus 'jam dang /_/su re
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]b+ha dang /_pits+tsha Ta/_/tra su zhes bya ba rnams so/_/zha nye/_sI pa/_ka sbyor 'dod/_/tra pu dang ni des 'dod can/_/pr-i ts+tsha ta dang sI pa'i bdag/_/ba d+h+raM/_'jam pa'i gzugs can no/_/gser gyi dgra dang /_stobs mang po/_/ma d+hu kAM dang stobs po
[\[150a.2\]]che/_/lcags dang mtshon cha can rnon po/_/gong bu/_nag po/_lcags gong dang /_/ri yi snying po rdo yi snying /_/sa ra sa pa zhes pa yang /_/lcags kyi rnam 'gyur phra mo 'di/_/thams cad kyang ni lcags su 'gyur/_/lcags snyigs so thog lcags dreg dang /_/
[\[150a.3\]]lcags kyi dri ma tsha tsha'i zhag_/'khar ba kaM s+ya kaM sa s+thi/_/zangs skyes bsil ba'i chu skyes so/_/zha nye skyes dang zangs skyes dang /_/sa rAShI kaM tsa ra NaM/_/rgyug byed dngul chu 'dang byed dang /_/khu ba'i dbang po zhes grags dang /_/'phrog byed sa bon khams chen po/_/

[\[150a.5\]]ming can/_/piny+dza ra dang bI ta naM/_/tA la mA lam/_gar gyi rgyan/_/ser po/_pI tAM/_byi la'i mig_/ro ma pra ta naM zhes so/_11_/ldong ros dang ni gar ngan ma/_/yid 'bod ma dang klu lce ma'o/_/bal mo sa yi gor ma dang /_/go la dri rno mu zi'i dri/_/dri bzangs dang ni
[\[150a.6\]]mig la phan/_/rigs can ku la r+thi kA'o/_/dus kyi me tog me tog ze/_/pau Sh+ya kaM dang ku shu'i khams/_/kA shi shaM dang many+dza naM/_/dus kyi pad+mo las skyes dang /_/phug ron skyes dang dpal bzang skyes/_/chu srol mig sman sau nI rA/_/mig sman ga tis ya mu naM/_/mig sman
[\[150a.7\]]nag po chu klung skyes/_/rgyun gyi mig sman mig gi rgyan/_/spang ma'i mig sman rtse can mgrin/_/sngon po dang ni rma bya can/_/btsos pa las byung spang ma'o/_/spang ma brtul ba da rbi ka_/mig sman sngon po bya khyung rdo/_/khu ba'i mig sman khu ba'i snying /_/kA shi Sha
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]khams kA shI khams/_/le brgan ka ma lus dang mchog_/yang dag tshon dang me'i rtse mo/_/grong gi gur gum zhes pa rnams/_/brag zhum don phan rin skyes dang /_/rdo skyes shi lA dza tu dang /_/rdo ba'i nad ces bya ba'o/_/dbyar rtsi gong bu dri sbyin dang /_/ri bong gos

[\[150b.3\]]skyes dang /_/s+tha b+h+ra kA mA la rnams so/_/sbrang dang mngar ldan mA k+Shi ka_/sa ra g+ha byung sA ra g+haM/_/pra tshil dang ni sbrang rtsi'i snyigs/_/shing rtsa smyig rkang sa yi spu/_/nA pat+ta si 'byung po'i skra/_/tsan+dan dmar po tsha ba gsum/_/drod gsum skyon dang smin pa dang /_/'bras
[\[150b.4\]]gsum pha laM kr-i kaM dang /_/tri pha lA dang dri pha lA/_/ri bong bal dang ri bong spu/_/lug skyes lwa ba lug pa la dang /_/lug can lto 'phyang can zhes pa'ang /_/zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba

[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gyis ni shas nyan can/_/blo gros can dang bzo bo'i rigs/_/rigs ldan dang ni rigs kyi gtso/_/grong brtsegs pa dang chen po'o/_/phreng rgyud mkhan dang me tog gcod/_/me tog gis 'tsho me tog can/_/de la me tog ya bA ShI/_/

[\[151a.3\]]phyugs sogs las/_/tan+ta ba ya thags mkhan no/_/gos bzo ba dang tshem bu mkhan/_/dung mkhan dang ni drung 'bud pa/_/zangs mkhan dang ni zangs mgar ba/_/gser mkhan dang ni gser byed pa/_/gser bzo ba dang gser mgar dang /_/gauny+dzi kA dang dmar ba can/_/

[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]khur pa dang ni khur 'dren pa/_/shaub+hi ka dang mig 'phrul ba/_/na b+ha shra ma dbang po'i rta/_/sgyu ma pa dang sgyu ma mkhan/_/ngan g.yo ba dang slu byed pa/_/sgyu ma byed dang dga' byed pa/_/byed pa sbyor dang kham smra ba/_/lha yis 'tsho dang lha bzo ba/_/'byung ba las skyes tshangs pa mkha'/_/tshangs pa las byung

[\[151b.4\]]dra ba'o/_/a tsau da naMA khe Ta/_/ri dgas sdig pa gnyis kyang ngo /_/un+ma na dang 'dab can brtsegs/_/bI ta sastu nye bar byed/_/bya dang ri dgas 'ching ba'o/_/dak+ShI NA ka bsnun pa nyid/_/de ni ri dgas g.yas rmas can/_/A khe Ta dang 'ching ba dang /_/zhags pa dang ni
[\[151b.5\]]shu raM b+ha/_rgyud can/_shu m+ba/_thag pa dang /_/mri Shub TI gu Ni 'o/_/phal pa/_/dman pa/_ngan rigs dang /_/dzal ma cig shos so so skyes/_/ngan pa dmangs rigs ris med dang /_/khol dang byed pas gnas pa'o/_/bran dang 'bangs dang g.yog po dang /_/gla mi
[\[151b.6\]]dang ni tsi tra ka_/mngag gzhug bsgo bya sbed pa dang /_/sngags pa zhags thogs yongs gcod pa/_/gzhan sos dang ni tsal+lu dang /_/gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyi skyong /_/luSh+NA mtshams 'khyogs man+tha ra/_/nges bzo dang ni bems po'o/_/tha shal lto 'gengs shI ta ka_/
[\[151b.7\]]'dar ba lan glan le lo can/_/sgren po khram pa mkhas pa dang /_/gsal po drung po spyang po'o/_/gtum po gdol pa mtho ris so/_/sdig can gsong por 'gro byed dang /_/nges 'jigs byed dang ma taM ga_/ngan thabs can dang nyal med pa/_/mthar gnas dang ni mi 'dod pa/_/dbye ba mon pa ri khrod pa/_/shin
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]shun pa ni kla klo skyes/_/chom po rkun ma rkun po dang /_/srang ba sha dim ta mdog can/_/jag pa gzhan rku ar pa dang /_/rku jag chom rkun 'jab bu ba/_/yangs 'phyag so sor rku byed do/_/bum pa can 'gebs skyes bu 'gebs/_/mtshams

[\[152a.3\]]rkun zla ba'i rdul/_/ka pra/_bcang bya/_rko byed do/_/sa rung+ga mtshams de dbye ba/_/dpal be'u ba lang kha sogs/_/na sh+Ti sti sU tra no Sh+To/_/rkun nor rkun rdzas chom rkun can/_/rku bya zhes bya chom rkun la/_/bcings pa zhes ni kha cig go_/khyi dang sA ra me ya dang /_/ser skya
[\[152a.4\]]dang ni ri dgas za/_/shu na ka dang smra byed dang /_/shrA dang /_in+t+ra man dang /_/'dod can dkyil 'khor ring po dang /_/rab dga' ban+ta/_dar dang /_/kau me su ka nA li ha/_/rdo rje'i mjug ma nyal ldan dang /_/dga' gsum ra ta pra la dang /_/bcud 'thung dga' dang bco ba
[\[152a.5\]]dang /_/dga' mtha' shA la pr-i ka dang /_/grong gi ri dgas ku ku ra/_/phra ma can dang gso bya dang /_/rus pa za dang khrel can dang /_/rol pa lce sgril zhi ba'i sgra/_/bshes byed/_dgra byed/_ri dgas dgra/_/skye ba'i cha can 'dod dbang dang /_/dga' ba'i phur bu zhes
