[\[152a.7\]]sdigs byed ma dang sred can ma/_/bud med rnams kyi 'jug pa la/_/srad bu gcod byed ni Sh+pi ta/_/rtog pa khri'u pany+dzi ka_/shing bal dang ni nA ki kA/_/tU la pi tsu shing bal 'jam/_/'jam po las skyes tU la kaM/_/ras bal dang ni brta raM/_/shing bal 'khal ba piny+dza
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]na/_/nges 'thag nA ri bI ra me/_/shing bal shing ldan karka rI/_/zla ba can dang kushA Na/_/kU la sa ka ja l+lo la/_/srad bu thags rgyud han+pA na/_/snal ma srad bu thags kyi rgyu/_/thags bzang dang ni rtag ma'o/_/sa rI dang ni thags mkhan dang /_/thags 'thag b+hu ti
[\[152b.2\]]blu ti/_/zhes so/_/ta rI mdog gnyis shing yin no/_/sgam dang /_sgrom dang /_snod dang mdzod/_/'jog sa dang ni bang ba'o/_/bzo bo las dang sgyu rtsal lo/_/kan+da bA sa khur 'dzin dang /_/khur shing de 'phyang thag pa dang /_/kA tsa'o sa de nas bi bad+ha/_/bi ba d+ha dang
[\[152b.3\]]khur yongs 'dren/_/lham dang chag dang bcag lham dang /_/mthil lham dang ni srog phan dang /_/mdzod ldan rkang pa'i shing rta dang /_/rkang mchog skye dang rkang khri dang /_/rkang rten zla ba gcig pa dang /_/zhabs stegs dang ni rkang stegs so/_/'breng thag_/
[\[152b.4\]]'bring zhags ko thag go_/gser gcod rngo ni ka Sha ste/_/nA rA tsI dang zho cha'o/_/mchan gri dang ni gri gug mtshungs/_/sog le gcod byed 'dab ma 'dzin/_/gsor dang 'bigs byed ces bya'o/_/snyung dang ko ba 'bigs byed do/_/shing za gzong dang shing 'bigs dang /_/
[\[152b.5\]]TaM ka rdo ba'i gzong yin no/_/chan gri paT pa ra shu/_/grags ldan dang ni za byed do/_/'od can lugs kong mU la'o/_/sbud pa dang ni ko ba'i sbud/_/khra bo 'dri byed pir dang ni/_/bris smyug dang ni tu li kA/_/kA bA ri dang dza la hA/_/skye 'gro'i cod pan kharba rA/_/b+ha med
[\[152b.6\]]da TI mgo bo'i zhwa/_/chu skyob mgo ras mgo bo 'ching /_/pa lA sha yi 'dab ma dang /_/'dab ma pi tsA tsi ka'o/_/gtum po rnams kyi pi wang ni/_/tsaN+Da la dang pal+la kI/_/sku gzugs gzugs brnyan pra ti ma/_/lder bzo dang ni slar grib ma/_/slar byas 'dra dang so
[\[152b.7\]]sor mtshungs/_/slar gzugs dang ni sku 'dra dang /_/'dra bar bzhengs dang 'dra 'bag dang /_/pra phab bzhin dang legs par bzhengs/_/nye bar 'jal dang dpe rnams so/_/brjod bya'i rtags can mnyam dang mtshungs/_/de 'dra de mnyam de dang mtshungs/_/de yi
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gzhi 'dzin rab tu 'dra/_/mtshungs pa dang ni slar gzugs bzhin/_/de nas kun gsal nges par gsal/_/so sor gsal dang rab gsal bzhin/_/nges snang nges snang grib ma dang /_/mnyam dang mchog gi gnas su brjod/_/las gla/_
[\[153a.2\]]sgrub gla/_rngan pa dang /_/bya dga'/_gla dang /_dge dang ni/_/khur gla gla dang rin dang ni/_/yon dang snyed pa zhes bya'o/_/chang dang myos 'gyur myos byed dang /_/bshol ldan mnyes dang bcud rab dang /_/spos ngad ldang dang so sor thos/_/myos par byed dang
[\[153a.3\]]yongs su thos/_/ka pi shi dang kun 'dzin ma/_/chu ma bshol ma tshogs ldan pa/_/ka sh+yaM/_ka l+yAM chu bdag skyes/_/dpa' mo dri mchog gnod sbyin bcud/_/A li kA dang shaR+Ya ni/_/shuN+Da/_nying khu/_kaM l+yaM dang /_/kan+to yaM dang lha min mo/_/ka tsa mA li kA
[\[153a.4\]]dang ni/_/'gro byed chags ldan myos gnas dang /_/a biSh+TaM zhes bya ba yang /_32_/shun pa'i chang ni shing shun chu/_/bur chang bu ram las byung ba/_/ba nu kar+Na mArtI kaM/_/sbrang chang sbrang rtsi las skyes pa/_/sdong bu ldan pa sdong bu'i bcud/_/chang 'degs dang ni tA la tI/_/
[\[153a.5\]]me tog sbrang chang ma d+ha ga_/mngar ldan dang ni sbrang gi chang /_/me re ya dang me tog chang /_/bur chang ma d+ha ka dang ni/_/sbyar chang dang ni mtshungs pa'o/_/sma rA sa bo/[ x ]bde byed/_/ma d+hu bA rA sbrang gi chang /_/nye bar za dang kun tu za/_/chang spags dang ni chang zas so/_/chang
[\[153a.6\]]khang chang mal btung ba'i gnas/_/chang ra dang ni chang 'thung gnas/_/chang skyogs dang ni chang snod dang /_/kha phor dang ni tshim byed do/_/pA rI dang ni ga lu ka_/phab dang chang rtsi zhes bya'o/_/nying khu bdud rtsi'i snying po dang /_/san+d+ha na dang chang bsnyal pa'o/_/cho lo rgyan po sho
[\[153a.7\]]dang ni/_/rgyan 'byed kr-iSh+Na ko ha la/_/sho rgyan rtse dang gnya' bo dang /_/rtse dang ma lA Na dang ni/_/khab len mgo 'thu cha 'dzin no/_/sho rtsed cho lo ldan pa dang /_/rgyan 'gyed du to da raM dang /_/pa Na zhags ldan cho lo'i mig_/rgyud rtse pa Na cho lo'i skugs/_/'breng byed lcags
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]sgrog pany+dza nI/_/yongs 'dren brkyang pa khyi dang d+ho/_/kun nas skyed ba zhes bya'o/_/rkang brgyad re mig 'bras bu can/_/de yang gnas can dgu nyid do/_/tsa ny+dzu ri dang tin+ti DI/_/srog chags skugs sho rgyal zhes bya/_/don can ba Ta ts+tshi d+d+ha n+na/_/dza du pu TA kA yin no/_/twan+ma bI kA tsho

[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]shes/_/yid gzhungs pa dang blo gtsang mtshungs/_/yid dga' mgu dang yid rab bde/_/sems ni rangs par byed pa'o/_/mig ngan dang ni yang ngan dang /_/yid nang chud dang yid mi bde/_/blo chud zos dang sems myos pa/_/sot+kaN+Thi dang

[\[157a.1\]]tsub lcag gi rgyu/_/g.yo ba dang ni mi brtan pa'o/_/mi shes blun po mngon par ston/_/sun 'byin pa dang /_byi ba shor ro/_/kha rgyal ba dang shags rgyal ba/_/lag yangs pa ni/_ster 'dod mtshungs/_/'jigs pa med dang kun shes

[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ba rab sbyong lam kha'o/_/gtsang ba dri ma med pa dang /_/ye dag rang bzhin dri med don/_/tshogs pa sbyar dang byi dor byas/_/bkrus dang dri ma med par byas/_/nges sbyangs/_khrus dang /_dag pa dang /_/dag byas rab tu bkrus pa dang /_/rnyog pa med dang dri ma bral/_/

[\[157b.3\]]dang ni/_/che shos/_rtse mo/_mchog gyur dang /_/gong ma'i gong dang /_mchog rab mchog_/rab rtse chen po phul byung dang /_/ches che ba dang /_phul byung dang /_/mchog gi mchog dang rtse mor 'gro/_/legs pa legs gnas mchog ldan dang /_/mchog gnas dang ni/_rab mchog
[\[157b.4\]]rab/_/phul byung gya nom/_shin tu mchog_/bla na med dang shin tu mdzes/_/gong ma ma yin dman pa gnyis/_/'og ma dang ni ma rabs so/_/che dang /_rgya che ba traM dang /_/yangs dang yangs ldan yangs pa dang /_/ma ha ta/_rnam yangs/_dbyes che dang /_/mur blu du/_gu
[\[157b.5\]]ru'o/_/phra mo bag tsam chung ngu ma/_/chung bar gnas dang a lI ya/_/chung dang /_nyung dang /_cung zad pa/_/phra ma/_'jam pa/_rtsa phran tshogs/_/srab dang /_char nye bag tsam dang /_/zegs ma dang ni 'thor ma'o/_/sa tu phran tshigs thun tshigs so/_/dpag med/_tshan che/_mang po dang /_
[\[157b.6\]]rab mang dpung che phal che dang /_/mang rab dang ni b+hu ti'o/_/gang ba/_brtan pa/_khengs pa dang /_/rgyas pa dang ni gtams pa'o/_/nges par sgrub dang nges par 'jug_/btsas pa dang ni smin pa'o/_/byas pa dang ni bcos pa mtshungs/_/sbyin pa/_byin dang /_byin pa'o/_/bde byed dang ni
[\[157b.7\]]'dod pa med/_/ma TaM ka ra bde byed do/_/rgyud dang /_dge ba/_sbyin byed dang /_/dge ba sbyin sogs de byed pa'o/_/gong du 'pho dang zhi ba pa/_/sangs rgyas pa dang rnam 'jig mtshungs/_/lnga 'dzin pa dang /_phyugs bdag skyes/_/kaun sta dang 'dren 'dod pa/_/zas byed pa dang dbye ba
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]dang /_/'dzem med gos med phyogs gos can/_/gcer bu/_ba lang /_lus gcer tshogs/_/bsod snyoms za dang /_dri ma 'dzin/_/'tsho ba pa dang thos byed pa/_/'khogs dang /_btsun ba/_srid 'dul byed/_15_/che phan bgrod pa nges 'gro ba/_/rab grags pa
[\[158a.2\]]dang pha mes 'dod/_/dkar po ldan dang /_'phags pa 'dres/_/mchod bya dang ni 'gron 'ongs mtshungs/_/de 'tsho bsam 'dod re ba dang /_/sbyin byed dang ni nges 'dzoms so/_/nyin mo dga' dang 'dod pa dang /_/'joms byed ban+d+hu/_dak+ta bta/_/rab tu thal sbyor drang po dang /_/ni ran+da
[\[158a.3\]]la gnod las rgyal/_/'dor 'dod/_snang 'dod/_rab gnas dang /_/mchog gnas/_sgros gnas/_phyi rol gnas/_/myur dang /_phra dang /_shin tu 'dod/_/rgya tshe sbom ma/_/rab byed don/_/legs dang /_ring dang /_rgyas pa dang /_/shin tu lci dang /_shin tu thung /_/'phel dang che dang yangs pa dang /_/
[\[158a.4\]]mang dang /_brling dang /_thung ba dang /_/tshogs ldan shin tu phul byung ngo /_/thams cad sna tshogs ma lus dang /_/zad par lhag med lus pa med/_/ni khi ma dang /_mtha' dag dang /_/sa ma gra dang /_sa masta/_/rdzogs dang mtshang med pa dang /_/kun dang dum bu min zhes bya/_14_/brgya las pha rol
[\[158a.5\]]stong la sogs/_/brgya sogs pha rol grangs gyur pa/_/gang de grangs te brtsis te gzhal/_/bgrang ba dang ni brtsi ba'o/_/bsdus dang /_bsgyur dang /_bsnun pa dang /_/kun tu bsnun pa zhes par 'gyur/_/rnam par bcad pas khyad par byas/_/stug po bar med/_mtshams med dang /_/tho
[\[158a.6\]]re ba dang /_co le ba/_/nye logs/_nye 'khor drung na mo/_/glo dang mtho 'khor 'dra ba mo/_/nye ba'i mgrin dang /_lugs bcas pa/_/phyogs mthun pa dang mtshungs par spyod/_/sa nI i dang nye ba dang /_/ma zad pa ni a bya yaM/_/logs dang /_mtha' dang nye ba'o/_18_/phyogs 'dra ba dang /_phyogs
[\[158a.7\]]mtshungs 'dod/_/yang dag chags pa 'byar ba dang /_/shin tu 'thams pa zhes kyang ngo /_/'gyangs dang mchog tu ring ba dang /_/a rang bya ba haM taM mtshungs/_/shin tu ring 'gyangs ches ring dang /_/ring po dang ni/_rgya che ba/_/zlum po ril po/_zur med/_sgong /_/mtho dang mthon po ring
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]po dang /_/dma' ba thung ngu /_mi mtho ba/_/mchu thung ba'o/_/de nas mtho/_/ring dang rtse mo bsgreng ba dang /_/tung+ge dang ni uts+tshai pa'o/_/bak+Shu raM dang /_gug dang /_dud/_/rtse min dma' dang /_thung ba'o/_/'khyog po yon po/_kyog pa dang /_/mi drang 'khyus dang /_sgur po dang /_/yo can kyag kyog
[\[158b.2\]]'khyog can dang /_/gya gyu/_dgye dgu/_b+ha sgu ra/_/yan lag ma tshang /_rtsi taM dang /_/ka lA la dang sa sto mtshungs/_/drang po dang ni 'khyog med dang /_/pra gu Na dang /_sha ra la/_4_/rtag pa rtag tu nges pa dang /_/rtag tu gtan du chags med dang /_/gzugs gcig nyid kyi dus khyab
[\[158b.3\]]dang /_/ther zug par ni brjod par bya/_7_/don med don bral mo gsham dang /_/'bras med/_cha med/_swA hA'o/_/ka raM bi taM spras pa dang /_/khros pa b+hu ru kuN+Di taM/_/gnas dang /_ches brtan/_gnas bya dang /_/brtan dang cig shos g.yo ba'o/_/spyod dang /_g.yo ba/_spyod byed dang /_/
[\[158b.4\]]g.yo ba/_ldeg pa/_'gul ba dang /_/bskyod pa 'khyams pa yam yom dang /_/ldag ldeg/_shig shig pag pig dang /_/'gul dang bskyod pa nyid dang ni/_/yongs su 'gul dang yongs su 'khyol/_/'gro dang /_rkyal dang /_rab g.yo 'degs/_/rnying pa dang ni rab rgan dang /_/sngon
[\[158b.5\]]dus ma dang /_yun ring ma/_/sngon skyes dang po rgas pa'o/_/bzang po sar pa/_mngon par sar/_/so ma/_slar byung /_rab gzhon dang /_/thog ma yag ma gsar byung ngo /_/rab 'phel dar ma me d+hi ta/_/rab gsal snang ba gsal ba dang /_/rab sgang /_rab gsal/_smu Ta'o/_/
[\[158b.6\]]rtse gcig dang ni bgrod gcig dang /_/lus gcig pa dang gzhan min 'jug_/bgrod gcig 'gro dang gcig 'gro ba/_/mchog gcig dang ni der 'gro'o/_/rting pa dang ni phyi mo'o/_/gcig gcig pa yang re re ba/_/thog ma/_sngon ma/_snga ma dang /_/dang po mgo ma la sogs so/_/
[\[158b.7\]]tha ma tha shal/_rjes ma/_mtha'/_/phyi ma dang ni mjug ma'o/_/tha dad don dang /_gcig gzhan dang /_/ches gzhan pa dang cig shos so/_/be+e tsa gi ka chags bral 'os/_/ma lus dor ba zhes bya gnyis/_/dbang po can dang bar lta ba/_/mngon sum la ni phyi zhes kyang /_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]dbang po las 'das nang dang phyi/_/bar na gnas pa don med can/_/bi swats+tshastu s+thi re shu/_Sh+ke bA na mA s+ya na nI ra saM/_/suts+tshaN+Da ti rnam 'phyang min/_/a laM ga TaM/_rab 'phyang min/_/shing rta dang ni saM pA d+ha/_/'dres pa dang ni
[\[159a.2\]]'chol ba'o/_/sa byaM lus kyi g.yon la 'gyur/_/a pa sa byaM g.yas la'o/_/pra sa byaM ni go bzlog 'gyur/_/a paSh+Shu yang g.yas la'o/_/mi mthun pra ti lo ma dang /_/pra ti ku laM/_a paSh+Thu laM/_/phan dang mnyes gshin gces pa'o/_/mthong bya pa
[\[159a.3\]]sho hr-i ta'o/_/lcags sgrog a narla na'o/_/tshig mang gcig gis dbye ba dang /_/skra bregs pa dang /_bzhar ba'o/_/mnyes pa bsub pa 'phur ba dang /_/rnam bab 'gro dang 'gyur ba'o/_/bar du song dang brjed pa dang /_/rab tu song dang bar dag mtshungs/_/
[\[159a.4\]]'phul ba 'ded pa bskul ba dang /_/bskyed pa/_'phul ba/_'phen par 'dod/_/ni gA Da dang shA ta dang /_/brdar bas rno byas rnon por byas/_/rgya btab pa dang /_ab btab pa/_/bsgo ba dang ni brjod pa dang /_/slong ba dang ni/_zhu ba'o/_/rab tu bkab dang
[\[159a.5\]]sam+bI taM/_/khebs dang bkab pa zhes pa yang /_/nges pa dang ni ni ya ta/_/gang ba dang ni rdzogs pa'o/_/rdzogs la khad dang /_zin la khad/_/bsregs dang /_tshig dang /_tshig ma'o/_/bzhogs dang /_bzhur dang /_chung ngur byas/_/nyon mongs dang ni sems sdug go/_/
[\[159a.6\]]phug dang /_rtol dang /_bug pa byas/_/rnam dpyad/_brtag dpyad/_rnam par phye/_/stug po/_'thug po/_dru ta'o/_/grub pa/_zin pa/_rdzogs pa'o/_/gses pa/_phye ba/_dbye ba'o/_/'khor ba 'jug pa 'khyil ba'o/_/yang dag 'byor dang nye bar 'byor/_/
[\[159a.7\]]'ching ba/_'khyigs pa/_bsdoms dang /_'dogs/_/brtod pa dang ni dkris pa'o/_/dog pa/_snal ma/_ran ma snas/_/thags kyi rgyu rnams byed pa'o/_/nye bar gnas dang nye bar btud/_/nye bar dong dang nye bar son/_/nges mchod sogs dang 'phar dang por/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ster dang shin tu mchong pa dang /_/grol dang yongs su 'jam pa mtshungs/_/'thob dang /_rnyed pa gnyis dag go_/'dogs pa 'khyor ba 'gul ba dang /_/g.yo ldeg pa dang /_'dar ba'o/_/gsher can rlan can/_rlon pa dang /_/'das po skal min thag can blon/_/

[\[159b.3\]]ba dang ni/_slob pa'o/_/mchod dang /_rjed dang /_gsol rim 'gro/_/phA Ta dang ni ma nA yang /_/bkur sti 'gro dang /_mar 'o ma/_/chu yis smin pa zhes pa'o/_/sna dang /_snom dang /_bsnam pa dang /_/sna mang /_snom nyan/_sgo chos pa/_/khrel dang ngo tsha 'dzem bag dang /_/
[\[159b.4\]]'thob bya/_'dud bya/_bsdu ba sogs/_/g.yogs pa dang ni byibs pa'o/_/'gro ba/_'bab pa 'gyur dang 'jug_/zhar byung ba ni zur gyis brjod/_/yongs su gyur dang brjod pa'o/_/rnam sgrub mang byed sna tshogs dang /_/gzugs ni so sor sgrub pa mtshungs/_/
[\[159b.5\]]bsdoms nas brjod dang bsdu yig go_/sa mun+na r+ha nges par smad/_/myang 'das thub pa'i me la sogs/_/myang 'das rlung mi 'jug pa'o/_/bshang ba/_lci ba bcag byas pa/_/rgyas pa dang ni gang ba'o/_/kha slang ba dang rang gir byas/_/kun thos so sor bzod pa
[\[159b.6\]]dang /_/yang dag thos dang rig pa dang /_/nye bar thos dang chad byas dang /_/mnyam par bzhag dang nye bar son/_/phyag 'tshal 'dud dang /_mchod pa dang /_/bkur sti rim gro/_ri mor byas/_/nye bar spyod dang /_nye bar gnas/_/zhabs thog zhabs 'bring bkur ba'o/_/
[\[159b.7\]]snyan brjod bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_/bstod pa/_brjod pa/_sgrogs pa dang /_/ngag snyan/_tshig snyan/_bsgrags pa dang /_/legs brjod/_grags brjod/_yon tan brjod/_/yang dag gdung dang /_sems sdug dang /_/sdug bsngal dang ni tshab dang /_/gdung dang kun tu gdung

[\[160a.1\]]ba'o/_/mi mdzes bzod dang dul ba dang /_/dul 'gyur/_zhi dang /_zhi bar 'gyur/_/bcad pa/_gtubs pa/_bregs pa dang /_/bkas pa/_bral ba/_gas pa dang /_/'thub pa dang ni/_gcod pa'o/_/yid dga'/_sems dga'/_tshim dang
[\[160a.2\]]dngas/_/rab tu dga' dang mnyes pa'o/_/bcom dang zhig dang nyams pa dang /_/brlag pa chud zos zhig pa nyams/_/thob pa rnyed pa/_'phrad pa dang /_/dngos rnyed/_'thob pa rnyed pa'o/_/lam rtog pa dang lam nyul dang /_/tshol dang rjes tshol rta rjes 'brang /_/rjes su dgongs dang
[\[160a.3\]]kun tu brjod/_/'chab dang sbed pa mtshungs pa'o/_/brnyas pa/_sngan can/_khog chud dang /_/tshod yod/_ha sa ha sti taM/_/btang ba bor ba spangs pa dang /_/'phangs pa bskyur ba por ba'o/_/dben pa dang ni bral ba dang /_/bcom dang bzhag pa med pa'o/_/skyabs dang

[\[160b.1\]]rdzogs pa dang /_/khyab dang bkab par yang brjod do/_/rtsad nas bton dang drung phyung dang /_/gnad nas phyung ba zhes pa yang /_/bkag pa dang ni bsal ba dang /_khor dang spangs dang yongs su spang /_/spang byas yongs su bsnun pa yang /_/chag grum dang

[\[160b.3\]]dang ni btsir ba'o/_/ji lta ji ltar sbyin gyur dang /_/gang gi de la ma gus las/_/'bad dang rab 'bad nges par bkab/_/nges par gtam 'dod brtan pa dang /_/su nI tha dang lugs dag mtshungs/_/spyod pa ngan dang bsam pa 'khyog_/'gro
[\[160b.4\]]byed gso byed 'gro dang rgyug_/phyag dar ba dang sun 'byin pa/_/so sor brtan dang Na daM ka/_phrag dog can dang tshul 'chos mtshungs/_/rtsal nyid gang du 'gro yon tan/_/phra ma dang ni byed pa'o/_/de 'gyur rtse mor son pa pa/_/ba dan dang ni mda'
[\[160b.5\]]zhes pa'ang /_/zhes pa dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs mig ces bya ba'i mngon brjod las khyad par can gyi sde rdzogs so//_//rang bzhin rkyen la sogs don gyi/_/'dren pa'i rtags rnams drang bar bya/_/las
[\[160b.6\]]dang bya ba byed pa yi/_/cho ga sgrub par byed pa yi/_/cho ga'i las ni rtag tu 'phro/_/phan tshun gzhom par byed pa rnams/_/mtha' dag tshig la mchog tu 'gro/_/las dang sgrub byed bya ba la/_/song dang kun tu 'gro bar byed/_/rtag tu dbang bya sbyin pa dang /_/
[\[160b.7\]]dbang du byed pa zhes pa yang /_/nu ma longs spyod nU ma 'dzin/_/gzhan gyi tshe dang rang gi 'byor/_/yongs su thob dang yongs su skyob/_/chog pa dang ni lag pa 'gebs/_/g.yo ba dang ni 'dar bra byed/_/ngom pa dang ni tshim pa'o/_/'tshem pa dang ni tshem
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]bu'o/_/'dra ba gcod pa gtubs pa'o/_/rol ba dang ni kun tu brtse/_/bsten dang kun tu bsten pa'o/_/de nas skyob dang mnyam gnyis rdzas/_/sa many+dza saM gzhan min bcas/_/gcig 'gro ba dang phyogs gcig pa/_/grags ldan

[\[161a.3\]]snod/_/ba lang /_ba dang nye bar byug_/dbye ba brjod dang brjod brten dang /_/snyan brjod mkhas dang mkhas ldan dang /_/byams ldan dang ni mdza' bshes ldan/_/yongs su yan lag kun tu gnas/_/rtogs pa dang ni byang chub po/_/kun nas shes dang
[\[161a.4\]]kun tu 'gro/_/bab chol dang ni 'gro byed de/_/nor dang dpal yon bA Ta baM/_/yangs pa can dang byed pa can/_/gzhan dngos byed dang rgyal ba'o/_/zhi dang dul dang nges pa dang /_/bzod dang nus dang thub pa'o/_/nor dang 'khrul dang 'khor ba'o/_/spyod pa
[\[161a.5\]]dang ni spyod tshul lo/_/rigs pa dang ni lugs dang tshul/_/sbyin pa sbyin byed 'debs dang stong /_/'byor dang reg pa 'bod pa sbron/_/grags dang rab grags bab dang ltung /_/'phel ba dang ni rgyas pa'o/_/'tshed pa phreng ba smin pa'o/_/gnon pa dang ni brtson
[\[161a.6\]]pa'o/_/tshig pa bsregs pa bzung pa blangs/_/'bugs dang 'bigs dang zad dang rdzogs/_/bsrung ba dang ni skyob pa dang /_/rgyu dang ni gsal ba yi sgra/_/brten pa dang ni rten byed 'dod/_/rab 'jal tshad ma 'jal byed do/_/yang dag 'phel dang sgrub pa mtshungs/_/
[\[161a.7\]]'phel byed gcod rtogs bse ba'o/_/brgyal ba dang ni mngon par khyab/_/slong ba bsod snyoms don 'dod slong /_/khro ba dang ni mngon par khro/_/tshor ba myong ba nyams su myong /_/dri ba dang ni rmed pa dang /_/khams bde ba dang 'dri ba'o/_/rab tu 'gro dang rab tu skye/_/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'gyur byed rab tu srung byed 'dor/_/ri dang ri bo rgas dang 'khogs/_/rgyas pa dang ni 'phro ba'o/_/brjod dang dbyangs sogs rgyags dang khengs/_/byed sgrub gyen bskyod steng du bskyod/_/shin tu phul phyin sbyar dang 'khyud/_/yul dag dang ni bsam pa'o/_/
[\[161b.2\]]mtshe ma zung dang phrug ma dang /_/bubs dang ro zhes bya ba'o/_/nyams pa dang ni rmas pa'o/_/bsdu ba dang ni btus pa dang /_/rjes su 'gying dang rjes su sgrub/_/bsdu ba dang ni mngon par len/_/mngon par bsdu dang mngon par 'dzin/_/gnas dang yongs su
[\[161b.3\]]rgyu ba'o/_/so sor bsdu dang nye bar len/_/sdod dang gnas par byed pa'o/_/yongs su 'gro dang yongs su 'brang /_/rjes su byed dang yongs su byed/_/'chags pa bsti gnas ngal bso dang /_/dri byug pa dang mtshon byed do/_/ltung ba lhung ba ltung byed ltung /_/
[\[161b.4\]]'gro byed dang ni 'gro ba'o/_/nges tshig dang ni rab tu nges/_/nye 'khor nye logs dag dang ni/_/khu tshur bcings dang yang dag gzung /_/mngon par bskyed dang rjes su 'dzin/_/mi 'dzin de dang 'gal ba'o/_/mngon par sbyor dang mngon par 'dzin/_/rnam par
[\[161b.5\]]nye dang yongs su nyid/_/nges par 'jug dang nye bar spyod/_/bgegs dang par gcod grub pa'i bgegs/_/'byung po nyer 'dug 'khod cing 'dug_/rab tu 'bebs dang 'jug pa dang /_/'byung dang 'jug dang 'gyur ba'o/_/'brel ba skyigs pa gcod
[\[161b.6\]]pa'o/_/nad pa reg bya rlung nad can/_/spyod byed zlum po byed pa dang /_/phyir byed pa dang 'jig dang bred/_/yengs 'gyur rnam par 'gyur ba dang /_/gnyis mtshungs ma med log par byed/_/rnam 'tshe'i las dang mngon spyod dang /_/de nas song zin zad
[\[161b.7\]]pa'o/_/lhan cig mi gnas spangs te 'gal/_/mi mthun pa dang 'gal ba'o/_/mdor bsdus pa dang bsdus pa'o/_/nyes pa dang ni mthong ba med/_/rnam par khyed dang khyed pa dang /_/tshogs pa bsdoms pa mtshungs pa'o/_/gnas skabs dang ni skabs
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]yin no/_/lan cig dang ni skad cig kyang /_/sha sbyor mngon par 'khrig pa'o/_/thags yun bkri rdzong snal ma ba kri/_/rnga ba 'dreg pa 'bal ba'o/_/nges par 'phyar ba 'khrab pa'o/_/yang dag bstod dang kun tu spyod/_/blo nus
[\[162a.2\]]dang ni chu srol lo/_/'khrug phyir 'jug dang rab sbyor don/_/rtsom pa dang ni mgo 'ju ba/_/sho ma dang mgo zug a raM bA/_/sbyin pa dang ni gsal bar byed/_/bar chad dang ni bgegs byed do/_/myur rtsol mgyogs su byed pa'o/_/nye bar dmigs dang nyams su
[\[162a.3\]]myong /_/sku byug dang ni byug pa'o/_/rjes chags dang ni sbyor ba'o/_/rnam par dmigs dang shin tu 'dor/_/lus kyi rgyas pa pI stA rA/_/sgra yi rgyas pa bista ra/_/kun zhum zag pa nyon mongs so/_/tshogs pa 'dus pa 'phung ba'o/_/lta ba tshol ba rtogs pa dang /_/
[\[162a.4\]]nyung dang tshol ba zhes bya'o/_/rnam grangs dang ni ming gzhan dang /_/ming gi rim pa rnams mtshungs so/_/phyir rgol dang ni bzlog pa dang /_/bkag pa dang ni bsal ba'o/_/ldog pa dang ni phyir lag dang /_/nyal sar log dang phyin ci log_/'gongs pa dang ni
[\[162a.5\]]mchongs pa dang /_/'phro ba go rims 'das pa'o/_/rnam par grags dang rab tu grags/_/legs 'bab dang ni nyed pa'o/_/des klog nges brjod 'don pa dang /_/nges par 'dren dang nges tshig go_/dbyibs dang de yi gnas tshul dang /_/yang dag 'gro ba
[\[162a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/skyug bro ba dang zhe mer dang /_/btsog skyug lta log don dag go_/ring po'i dus dang nyin zhag ring /_/u da dza ni phyugs 'ded pa/_/shing stegs shing 'jog gang dag tu/_/shing stan shing gi ut+g+ha na/_/gang gi sdong po 'bigs shing za/_/sdong
[\[162a.7\]]po 'joms dang sdong 'joms so/_/de la kun mnyam gang zhig gis/_/de skyes pa ni mtho ba'o/_/glo lu lud pa 'bod pa dang /_/glo 'khogs pa dang lud pa 'khogs/_/rims dang tshad pa'o rgyug dang 'khyu/_/bIr ra ti dang A ra ti/_/ngal bso dang ni nye bar
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]dga'/_/phur bu dang ni phung po dang /_/bso ba steng du 'phen pa'i don/_/nI kA ra ni sgregs pa ste/_/gyen log lung pa sgregs pa'o/_/so sor sgrigs pa las byung ba/_/glo dang zas dag rim pa las/_/rab byung brtul zhugs sbyin pa dang /_/dka' thub

[\[162b.3\]]'dod dang za bar byed pa'o/_/dus su chad dang yang dag rdzogs/_/dum bu mu khyud mi zad pa/_/gsol dang yongs su bshad pa dang /_/ri ldan rta dang mnyam byed dang /_/pra ti pA ni tshigs so so/_/dga' ba'i sgra dang ca cor 'gyur/_/byed pa med dang 'phrog skyed

[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]ang+gi'i gzhung ni gsal ba yi/_/gnas 'dir yang ni yang dag bsdus/_/tshigs bcad so so so so'i gnas/_/phan tshun brjod pa'i nang las so/_/sargas bcings pa snyan ngag che/_/gzugs can chen po zlos gar du'o/_/drang srong

[\[166b.1\]]shing gla gor/_/mdzod dang mgo bo'i gos la'o/_/ga na ka ni skar mkhan dang /_/grangs mkhan tshong pa'i bud med la'o/_/ga Ni ka ni tshogs can ma/_/rtog can mo dang glang chen mo/_/gaN+Da ka ni bse ru dang /_/grangs dang rig pa'i rab dbye dang /_/rnam par
[\[166b.2\]]dpyod pa'i khyad par la'o/_/'bab chu'i khyad par gaN+Da tI/_/gAN+Di ka ni dri bzang po/_/le ka ka ni tha snyad byed/_/guN+Da ka ni dri ma btul/_/cha shas brjod dang snum gye snod/_/gu hra ka ni sbed pa dang /_/gsang ba pa yi snod sbyin dang /_/tshe ka dres par brnags pa
[\[166b.3\]]la/_/gi ri ki ni khams bye brag_/khams spyi tsam dang gser la'o//go ra~M` ka ni/_bya yi rigs/_/na gu ka dang sA Tha ka_/go la ka ni nor bu can//rlung gi tshul dang phru ba la/_/gradzre ka ni/_ka rI ra/_/lha shes/_gu gul rim pa dang /_/gradzre bar+Na/_mdza'
[\[166b.4\]]bo'i bu/_/pi pi li yi rtsa ba la'o/_/gra ha ka ni snang ba dang /_/mkha' 'go/_gza' yi cig shos la/_/tsa Ta ka ni/_ka la dzi ka_/de yi bu mo chung ma la/_/tsa tung+gA ni/_ma sha ka_/smyug ma'i myu gu/_'phrog byed mchod sdong /_khyem bye brag_/tsa lu
[\[166b.5\]]ka ni/_rab 'thor dang /_/snod kyi /khyad par dag la'o/_/tsa Sha ka ni chang gi snod/_/chang dang chang gi rab dbye la/_/tsA ra ka ni skyong byed dang /_/btson rar bcings pa dag la'o/_/tsi tra kai ni thig le la/_/tsi tra ka ni me yi ming /_/e raN+Da chu shing dang byis pa
[\[166b.6\]]dang /_/gcan gzan gye ni khyad par stag la/_/tsi ra ka ni lhag par byed/_/yi ge la yang brjod bya ldan/_/tsi ri kA ni bung ba la/_/tsum+ba ka ni khab len dang /_/khram pa//_rig pas nyer 'tsho dang /_/'dod ldan la'o tsu lu ka_/rab 'thor snod kyi khyad
[\[166b.7\]]par la/_/tsu lu tI na byis pa gsod/_/snod dbye/_cha shas/_khyad par la/_/tsU Da ka ni/_gtsug phud dang /_/bcud len/_spre'u mdun/_shing ka spru ta/_/tsU yi kA ni zlos gar lus/_/rna ba'i rtsa ba glang po la'o/_/dza tu ka ni pags pa'i 'dab/_/'khrul
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]'khor/_mtshal dang /_mig dag la/_/dza na ka ni pha skyed byed/_/rgyal po'i drang srong rgyu'i khyad par/_/dzam+bu ka ni ce spyang dang /_/dman pa nub phyogs bdag po la/_/dzA la kai ni byed pa po/_/ngan g.yo'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_/dra ba
[\[167a.2\]]can dang 'bras bu la/_/dzA la kA ni dra ba dang /_/rigs su 'gro dang rol mtsho la/_/dzA li ka ni nya pa dang /_/khram pa'o grong rtsegs dz+ha li kai/_/dzA li kA ni/_gos bye brag_/dra ba can dang 'bras bu dang /_/ri yi snying po chu gnas dang /_/shor ba rnams kyi rdo
[\[167a.3\]]ba dang /_/lus 'thug pa dang srin mo la'o/_/dzA ha ka ni/_g+ho bye dang /_/byi la khri dang /_ka ruN+Di/_/dzre ba ka ni/_shing bye brag_/srog ldan dang ni sbrul khas sdeg_/ser po'i ra ba zad byed pa/_/rgan po'i 'tsho ba bsnyen bkur ba/_/dzre bi kA ni rgyal 'dra'i lo/_/dz+hai li ke
[\[167a.4\]]ni bung ba dang /_/byug pa dang ni dri ma dang /_/dz+hai ru kA dang sbyin dang mdzes/_/Tuklu ka ni/_dri gtsang khang /_/bla gab med pa'i gtsug lag khang /_/TuN+Da ka ni dmar ba dang /_/cung zad _mu stegs _khro ba la yang brjod/_/DiN+Di ka ni na gru ka_/chom rkun dga' ba lhur byed la'o/_/Dim+bi
[\[167a.5\]]kA ni chu'i gzugs brnyan/_/nga rgyal can dang 'dod ldan no/_/taN+Da ka ni shing phung dang /_/brjod pa mang po bsdus pa dang /_/khyem gyi shing dang dbu ba dang /_/rkang 'theng dang ni sgyu ma can/_/tak+Sha ka ni thu klu'i bye brag_/'phel ba can dang shing bye brag_/tA ra ka ni lha min dang /_/rlung yor 'dzin dang
[\[167a.6\]]mthong bas sgrol/_/skar ma/_ka nI/_ni kA'o/_/tA ra kaM ni sgrol ba po/_/ti la ka ni shing dang nad/_/sme ba rta yi bye brag go/_/tI la kaM/_sau brtsa la/_/ngal ba dang ni kha chu la'o/_/ti la kA ni khra bo la/_/tu na kA ni sde ris dang /_/zho can dang ni 'dab _gru'i/_chags la/_/
[\[167a.7\]]tu ruSh+ka ni/_spos si h+la/_/gar log_/kla klo'i bye brag dpal gyi gnas/_/tU li kA zhes bya ba ni/_/rnam bkod bkra ba'i ri _kha ru tsha_mo can/_/tU la talpa dag _mal stan/_la'o/_/tri shaM ku phye ma leb ni sha la b+ha/_/mi bdag dbye ba glang gis so/_/daR+sha ka ni
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]mchod pa dang /_/pha mes slabs dang pra pi Na/_/dA ra ka ni 'byed pa dang /_/bu rgyud/_bag ma'i las la'o/_/dI pa ka ni/_ngag gi rgyan/_/sgron me 'bar bar byed pa'o/_/dI bya kaM ni gtsug phud dang /_/a dza mo da ya bA nI/_/dru Shi kA mig dri ma dang /_/tU li kA'o dra ba ka_/rdo yi bye brag
[\[167b.2\]]rnam par tshig_/dbyangs ldan la'o _pi wang bgreng /_d+ha ni ka_/legs pa dang ni dpal yon can/_/d+ha ni kA ni rgyug pa la'o/_/d+h+wa ba ka ni/_rdul can dang /_/rgyal po 'gro ba'i las rnal 'byor/_sman ra dga' ba/_legs ldan ma/_d+ha nu ka ni ba bzhon ma/_/glang mo phru gu btsas pa la/_/
[\[167b.3\]]d+he nu kaM ni/_bud med kyis/_/byed pa dang ni gzhon ma'i tshogs/_/nasna ka ni gcer bu pa/_/gos med _'gro _mdud pa med pa'o/_/nisna kA ni gcer mo zhon/_/nan+da ka ni 'phrog byed dang /_/khab+dza dga' byed rigs skyong ba/_/na ra ka ni dmyal ba dang /_/lha ma yin
[\[167b.4\]]gyi khyad par la/_/brta ka ni gar dang rtse/_/spyod dang pho Ta ga la ka/_sgeg mo glang mo narta tI/_/nA ya ka ni 'dren pa gtso/_/mchod 'os dang ni dbus ma la/_/'dam skyes mi shes nA li ka_/mda' dang zug rngu nA lI ka_/mtsho skyes/_pad sdong /_nA li shaM/_/bi pA ka ni
[\[167b.5\]]'chos pa dang /_/rdul dang las kyi 'bras bu la/_/gru'i 'gram pa/_/ni rmo ka ni nam mkha' dang /_/go cha thar pa sbrul shun brjes/_/bA ra ka_/rta/_blon po che/_/glang po dang ni dung la'o/_/nI ka dang ni dI li kA/_/rams dang phra mo'i nad dang ni/_/she pha li ka'i don can no/_/pa tA
[\[167b.6\]]kA ni rnam rgyal dang /_/skal bzang mtshan ma'i _rnam smin/_rgyal mtshan la/_/pad+ma kaM ni/_pad+ma'i shing /_/glang mo rig can 'dam skyes la/_/pa rI ka ni brtul zhugs dang /_/ral gri skyil krung talba khri/_/glang mo paR+Ya ti kA la'o/_/tshon rtsi/_/pak+Sha ka ni ngos logs phyogs/_/phyogs kyi sgo dang logs
[\[167b.7\]]bcas dang /_/ka Ta ka yi khyad par dang /_/pA Ta ka zhes bya rnams dang /_/mig sogs blta dang rtsa ba'i rdzas/_/nye bar bsags dang kU la dang /_ma hA kiSh+ku rol mo dang /_/bstan gyi/_/grong gi dbye ba la yang blta/_/bArta ka ni g.yang sa dang /_/lhung ba skyong chu'i glang po la'o/_/pA lang+ka
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]yal ga'i bye brag_/sha khru tI ta 'dab chags la'o/_/pA ba ka mi rtag tu spyod/_/b+hal+la ta ga bye dong ka_/tsi tra ka dang me bsrub dang /_/dag par byed pa rnams la'o/_/pi sgyu ka ni kang+ga la/_/mtshal dang se h+la/_til snyigs ma/_/si nA ka ni 'phrog byed dbyug_/mdung dang legs
[\[168a.2\]]par char 'bab la/_/siSh+Taka ni tsa ma sa/_/nas kyi so ba mig gi nas/_/pu tra ka ni/_sha ra b+ha/_/bu _bse shing gi 'bras bu/_shing /_khram pa ri'i khyad par/_/pu tri kA ni bu 'dzin ma/_/yA ba ka dang tU ka'o/_/pu la ka ni 'bu'i bye brag_/nor bu'i skyon dang rdo'i bye brag_/glang po'i zan changs
[\[168a.3\]]ba spu langs/_/ga lwarka dang bab la'o/_/pu khA ka ni sban she stong dang /_/bsdus dang zas kyi snyigs ma'o/_/dut+pa ke ni lus ngan po'i/_/gzhal med khang dang rin chen zegs/_/mig nad sha tsha ra gan dang /_/mig sman khu ba rnams dang ni/_/rnga zlum/_ra sa ka TI dang /_/
[\[168a.4\]]lcags dang 'khar ba rnams la'o/_/thra thu ka ni/_byis/_sna nyag_/pU dA ku ni srog chags pra/_/br-i dA ku ni/_sdig spu dang /_/stag dang khra bo dag la yang /_/be tsa ka ni/_'ug pa dang /_/glang po'i mjug ma'i rtsa dang rtse/_/pe Ta ka ni po ti yi/_/sgam dang tshogs
[\[168a.5\]]pa can la'o/_/pra tI ka ni mi mthun dang /_/phyogs re ba dag go zlog dang /_/cha shas la'o pra be+e ka_/'khrus dang shi pa dag la'o/_/pA Na ka ni sems can rigs/_/po la ka dang 'tsho byed shing /_/pri ya ka ni ka dadza/_/a li tsi tra lus ngan dang /_/dr-i ya~M` ku dang
[\[168a.6\]]ljang ser dang /_/gur rku dang ni dga' byed la'o/_/pha la ka ni bkod pa bkra/_/dar dpyangs lus kyi rab dbye dag_/pa rA ka ni brjod bya ldan/_/spyang dang rjes rtse sang+ka ra/_/ba su ka ni/_zhi ba'i gyad/_/arka'i 'dab dang spu can dang /_/nyi ma dang ni
[\[168a.7\]]sbal pa can/_/dA tru ha dang khron pa la/_/bA ra ka ni rta'i bye brag_/rta yi 'gros dang dgag pa la/_/bAr+ng+ha kaM ni rgan po'i tshogs/_/rgan po nyid dang rgan po'i las/_/bA la ka ni mi shes byis/_/skra dang /_rta dang /_glang po dang /_/sgra can rnams la blta bar
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]bya/_/bA la ka ni/_ngo tsha dang /_/bA ri haR+Ya sor gdub la/_/bA li kA ni bye ma byis/_/bo la kA ni rgyan la'o/_/bA lu kA ni bye ma la/_/bA lu ka ni e la'i bye/_/br-iSh+tsi ka ni sdig srin dang /_/shing dang khyem dang de bzhin sman/_b+hasma ka ni thal nad dang /_/byi dang ga dang cha yi gter/_/
[\[168b.2\]]tA lAM ka ni dmar po dang /_/sngo yi bye brag rus sbal dang /_/'phrog byed mtshan nyid chen po rdzogs/_/skyes bu lag pa'i 'dab ma'o/_/b+hU ti shaM ni/_b+hU nin+ba/_/'bar byed ga pur gcod byed dang /_/sa can/_bkod pa sa yi ni/_/khyad par yongs su bzung ba'o/_/ju ma ka ni ce spyang dang /_/
[\[168b.3\]]khram pa nyi 'khyims rdo'i bye brag_/maN+DU ka ni sbal sprul dang /_/'ching ba'i rab dbye dmar po la/_/lo ma la yang maN+DU ka_/maN+DU tI ni sbrang rtsi can/_/shing mngar zhes kyang bod pa dang /_/phyag dang phyogs kyi khyad par dang /_/shing mngar lo ma la yang ngo /_/mil+la ka dang mal+li kA/_/ngang
[\[168b.4\]]pa'i rgyal po'i khyad par la/_/mil+la kA ni rtsa stod dang /_/nya dang sa yi smod dag la/_/ma pa ka ni srog chags phra/_/rab dbye 'gro ba'i khyad par la/_/mA tro kA ni ma mo dang /_/tshangs ma sogs dang lha la yang /_/'dzin ma dang ni byed pa la'ang /_/mA ma ka ni zhang por
[\[168b.5\]]brjod/_/mA sa kai ni mnyam nyid ldan/_/phreng ba dang ni mgul rgyan dang /_/do shal me tog phreng ba dang /_/mkha' lding chu klung khyad par la/_/me tsa ka ni sngo bsangs dang /_/rma bya'i mdongs dang mun pa la/_/me tsa shaM ni/_brjod bya bzhin/_/kha dog nag po la 'gyur ro/_/mo tsa ka
[\[168b.6\]]ni chu shing 'bras/_/de las skyes dang se gru la/_/nirmo tsa ka chags bral can/_/mo da ga ni bca' ba yi/_/bye brag dga' byed gzhan bzhin no/_/ya ma shaM ni/_yang dag sdom/_/sgra yi rgyan dang mtshe ma skyes/_/dzA ga ka ni 'gro ba'i tshul/_/rgyal po'i glang po mchod pa can/_/yAdz+hai
[\[168b.7\]]ka ni mchod sbyin dang /_/ku sha mchod sbyin nyer spyor la/_/su ta shaM ni byes pa dang /_/sum+ma/_rkang rtse/_je tshom dang /_/gos dbye/_bu mo'i gos g.yo dang /_/ldan pa la ni brjod bya ldan/_/mu thi ka ni 'dod pa dang /_/khyu dang /_nad med me tog 'ga'/_/rak+ta ka ni nad gred dang /_/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gnyen byed/_gos dmar rdzas chags la/_/ra dza ka ni/_rgyug pa dang /_/ne tso pho dang btso lag mkhan/_/ra sbo kA ni bcud ldan dang /_/gser dang ske rags dag la'o/_/rA dzi kA ni springs yig dang /_/nya pa/_ske tshe/_yungs kar la'o/_/rA tri ka ni rje rigs kyi/_/khyem dang
[\[169a.2\]]lo ni 'gro ba'o/_/rA tro kai rgo ma/tshan mo la'o/_/ru tsa rka ni mgul rgyan dang /_/byi dong ga dang bkra shis rdzas/_/bshang ba/_phreng ba de'i rked dang /_/rus rgyan gi wang lha shing dang /_/skyur rtsi bI dzA phUr dang /_/gser la sogs pa'i dong tse la'o/_/ruN+Di kA ni 'thab pa dang /_/sgo dang bsdus pa
[\[169a.3\]]pho nya mo/_/re Na kA ni glang mo dang /_/ya mang ag+na'i dga' ma la/_/lam+bu ka ni/_yul/_rgyan gos/_/lA sa ka ni rol pa dang /_/sgeg pa'i byed po ma rdzogs pa/_/phru na ka ni/_phyugs tha dang /_/lo tsa ka ni mig 'bras dang /_/sha yi gong bu bsdus pa dang /_/btsun mo dang ni byis pa'i rgyan/_/
[\[169a.4\]]dud pa sngon po 'dres pa dang /_/maurbI/_smin ma/_pags pa lhod/_/chu shing dang ni rna ba gang /_/nges pa'i blo gros rnams la'o/_/ngany+tsa ka ni grol ba dang /_/khram pa dang ni khyem pa dang /_/rta sreb dang ce spyang la/_/ban+d+ha ka ni brje ba la/_/ban+d+ha ki ni g.yo bcas ma/_/ban+tu kai ni rtsa
[\[169a.5\]]lag 'tsho/_/ban+tu ka ni gdong ser la/_/brta ka ni zlum po dang /_/bya yi bye brag rta'i rmig pa/_/bar+Na ka dang bar+Na shaM/_/phyag dang spyod dang snyan ngag mkhan//byug pa dang ni ri mo mkhan/_/yi ga dang ni tsan dan la/'o/_/nga rja kA dI sra ba dang /_/be'u dang ni smyu gu la'o/_/bal+lI ka
[\[169a.6\]]ni grog mkhar dang /_/thub pa nad kyi bye brag la/_/bI R+Sha kaM ni skyob pa la/_/baR+ShA dus la gzhan bzhin 'gyur/_/bA sgo ka ni me ldan dang /_/yul gyi khyad par dang ni rta/_/bA d+ng+ha ni me lda na dang //dpa' bo dang ni tshal dag la//_/be+e tarka ni the tshom dang /_/rtog dang dpyod la 'ga'
[\[169a.7\]]zhig 'dod/_/bi sA ka ni yongs 'gyur dang /_/rdul dang ro myang ngan 'gro la'o/_/be+e be ka ni rnam dpyod dang /_/chu yi sno da dang dben nga /_/thra ShAng+ka ni bde byed dang /_/lcags dang b+halbA ta ka dang /_/gzhi chen la'o/_/bi dza kai/_/shaM gru'i byu ma dang rgyu dang ni/_/'phral du phyung ba'i myu
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]gul/_/bya lI shaM ni mi dzi'i las/_/mtshan gzhi bral dang gzir ba dang /_/grong khyer nga /'o shaM kha ka_/mgo bo'i nad la'o/_/shaM kha kaM_/gdu bu dung la'o/_/shaM pU kA/_/lha ma yin gyi khyad par dang /_/dbyangs ldan glang po'i bum mtha' la//_/shaM bu ka ni chu'i nya phyis/_/sha khA kA ni
[\[169b.2\]]mda' nyid dang /_/zug rngu dang ni gdugs kyi gur/_/tarku shing bal ri skegs myos/_/thob pa min pa dag la yang /_/shAl+la kI nI khyi dang bya/_/shA ya ka ni ral gre mda'/_/shA karka ni/shA rka ra'i/_/gong bu 'o ma'i dbu ba la/_/shi shu ka ni byes pa dang /_/byis pa gsod dang byis
[\[169b.3\]]pa'i tshig_/shi ta ka be+e legs gnas dang /_/grang ba'i dus dang ma 'ongs mthong /_/shi ka ka ni/_dbyar ka yi/_/'bru dang /_dngul chu dag la'o/_/sas+thA ki ni phreng bar byas/_/rgyal cho kar/_tarku d+h+riSh+Ta dag la'o/_/saM brka ni sbyangs stobs dang /_/'du 'dzi dang ni reg pa la/_/
[\[169b.4\]]bar ka ni ma tshang dang /_/lam dang /_gral dang mtsho dang ni/_/sI d+hu'i btung /_snod sI d+hu la'o/_/sa s+ye ka ni pa ta sogs/_/snying po ral gri nor bu la'o/_/sU tsa ka ni ngan pa dang /_/bya rog khab dang khye dang rtogs/_/sru ta kai ni skye ba la/_/sru ta kai ni/_dngul chu la/_/sre dA ku ni
[\[169b.5\]]nags tshal dang /_/nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan rdo rje rlung /_/'khrud byed/_chu sbyin/_pe tsa ka_/se pa ka ni/_bal+ma kI/_/rab mtha' shing 'khyog rjes su 'tsho/_/s+thA ka ni spyod pa dang /_/pha ra sogs dang chu bur la 'o/_/su byA kA ni/_rams la 'gyur/_/grog mkhar/_shing dag
[\[169b.6\]]su m+bi kA/_/swa ste ka ni bkra shis rdzas/_/dga' dang khyem gyi bye brag dang /_/phye ma'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_/dga' ba'i se' snyan dag la'o/_/hA ra ka ni g.yo can dang /_/chom rkun tshigs bcad rnam shes dbye/_/du Tu ka ni/_sil snyan dbye/_/myos pa'i ca co dA t+yu ha'o/_/he ru
[\[169b.7\]]ka ni sangs rgyas dbye/_/de bzhin nag po chen po'i tshogs/_/k+ShA ra ka ni/_dra ba can/_/bya dang nya sogs rgya dad dol/_/k+Shu ra ka ni khu byug mig/_/ba lang rmig pa sbum can shing /_/ang+gar ka sol ba dang /_gza' mig dmar/_sa skyes kaN+Da ka la'o/_/i gA ri ka/_/bur shing
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]mda'/_/kiM shu ka'i kor ka'o/_/A ma la ka//_sbal pa dang /_/sbrang can/_chu skyes/_ge sar la'o/_/a li ba ka_/gral dang ni/_pi ka dga' ba'i khyad par ma/_asma n+ta kaM/_ur+ng+hAn/_/mA lu ka dang 'gems pa la/_/A palpa ka/_/mun pa dang /_/rmongs
[\[170a.2\]]dang mdud pa/_'phyang dang dga'/_/'jug pa'o/_/A kha ni ka ni/_/byi ba/_chom rkun/_phag dag la/_/A k+She pa ka//rlung nad dang /_/nad dang rmod pa la 'gyur ro/_/ung+ka li ka/_/rtsed mi dang /_/mgrin pa bteg dang rgyun mang chu/_/e Da mU ka g.yo dang ni/_/dag dad thos pa
[\[170a.3\]]spangs pa la/_ka thil+la ka/_/nab so dang /_/kA ra bel+la ral gri 'dab/_/ka ni ka ni mthe chung gi_/sor mo dang ni/_mig 'bras la/_/ka parta ka/_ral pa bcings/_/dzo Ti rga dang /_lte ba la/_/karko ta ke/_dbal 'bras dad/_/glu yi rab tu dbye ba la/_/ka la bing+ka grong gi byi'u/_/
[\[170a.4\]]ku ling+ga ka dag la'o/_/kA ka rU ka/_/'ug pa rta/_/rgyal byed mkhas pa/_mkha' gos can/_/'jigs dang dbul ba rnams la'o/_/kA ya Ti ka gzhan gnad shes/_/gdugs dang /_dus dang /_yul la'o/_/kur pa ka 'dod pa dang /_siN+Di kA dang /_nang bye byag_/kr-i ka
[\[170a.5\]]bA ku khyim bya dang /_/sgeg byed dang ni rma bya'o/_/koShA ta ka sgra dang ni/_/snang ldan/_sprin dmar sgra sgrogs so/_/kau k+kuTi ngan g.yo can/_/ring du bskul dang dal med pa'o/_/'dod chen hI lI na dag la'o/_/khA rA li ka grong gi gtso/_/gnyer dang
[\[170a.6\]]lcags mda' nyer 'jog la/_/gu Na ni kA goms pa dang /_/yan lag stong ba klog byang dang /_/gang la'o shA kaN+Da ka ni/_/ba lang yan lag dri ma dang /_/legs byung skam gnas pur ma la'ang /_/ga ku li ka ke ka ra/_/'dam gnas ba lang
[\[170a.7\]]phyogs can la/_/gau med ka nor bu ser/_/kA ko la dang 'dab chags la'ang /_/g+ha r+g+ha ri kA/_dril chung dang /_/rol mo'i bye brag dag la dran/_/de bzhin 'bras kyi so ba 'dzin/_/chu klung gi ni bye brag dang /_/rol mo'i dbyug gu dag la'o/_/tsaN+DA li kA sman bye brag_/go rI ka ni
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]mi'am ci/_/dzaT ru ka/_/klu shing dang /_/chu'i a nU ka ral pa can/_/de bzhin yal ga 'phrog byed dang /_/tu lAng+haT rnams la'o/_/dzar+dz+dza ri ka rI mo mang /_/hrul bor gyur pa dag la'o/_/dzI ban+ti kA/_'tsho bar bshad/_/yal ga/_/phyag 'tshal gu DU tsi/_/dzi ba tri ka ri bong can/_/
[\[170b.2\]]tshe ldan lha rdzas sman zhing las/_/tartu rI ka mchog tu gyur/_/tartu rI kaM snod la'o/_/tuk+ta shA ka/_/chu lha dang /_seng lding lam dang /_mdzes pa la/_/tri par+Na kaM ni/_tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu gsum dang gzem la/_/ngan+ta shri ka lag 'gro dang /_/gnod sbyin la 'gyur de
[\[170b.3\]]nas ni/_/A Ta ka/_/rang skyes dang /_/nA ga ge sar til dbu ba/_/kun+da shi rI Sha dris lan/_/rlung dang 'obs dang sgrol ba che/_/btsag dang glang mo'i rna ba dang /_/me dad gzegs ma'i tshogs dang ni/_/bre dang bya ba'i phung po la/_/dA se ra ka 'bangs mo'i bu/_/glang
[\[170b.4\]]po'i phru gu nya pa'o//ni yA ma ka gru 'dren dang /_/bla ma glo gros rlung g.yor 'dzin/_'khrul 'khor byed pa rnams la'o/_/nir+g+ran+tha ka brad byad pa/_/cha med/_gos med spyod med dang /_/rlung dang rang dbang bshang ba'i zad/_/pany+dzu laM kA/_gos/_bu mo/_glu yi bye
[\[170b.5\]]brag dag la'o/_/paN+DI ta ka spos dang dregs/_/dbu ba rdos dang nu ma'i dngos/_/bisba li ka ma ning dang /_/sI ba na dang srin bal can/_/puN+Da rI ka_/me/_phyogs/_glang /_/stag dang bud shing bye brag la/_/puN+Da ri kaM gdugs dkar dang /_/chu skyes dkar dang sman
[\[170b.6\]]la'o/_/puSh+ka la ka ri dgas dri/_/phur bu dang ni zad byed la/_/pUr+Napa ka snod gad pa/_/pa Ta ha yi snod dag la/_/po tI na kaM po ta kI/_/rnam g.yo/_po tAng+ha na la'o/_/pra kIr+Na kaM mdud pa'i dbye/_/bkra shis rnga yab rta la'o/_/pra tsa lI ka mda' 'phen dang /_/rma bya gnod sbyin lag
[\[170b.7\]]'gro la/_/pharka rI ka tsa pe Ta/_/pharka ri kaM 'dam po la/_/ba ge ru ka 'khyogs po'i dbye/_/rlung med pa dang lcugs ma la/_/ka parda ka mig 'bras dag_/brad po sa bon mdzod lte ba/_/ba raN+Da ka glang po yi/_/tshor reg lang tsho'i tsher ma dang /_/de bzhin kun nas zlum po la/_/brta rU ka chu klung dbye/_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dza le ba Da bya rog tshang /_/sgo nga'i gnas la yang 'dod do/_/barbA rI ka nag po che/_/skra yi bkod pa yal ga la/_/ba lA hA ka chu 'dren dang /_/klu dang lha min khyad par rig_/pA Ni dza ga tshong pa'i rtags/_/ri dgas mtshan ma 'dod ldan ma/_/Dau rba ngang ni/_rjes chags tshig_/brin+dA ra ka lha dang
[\[171a.2\]]gtso/_/yid du 'ong dang tshogs par dran/_/bri ha hi kA stag ldan dang /_/gos kyi khyad par dag la'o/_/b+haT+TA ra ka lha dang ni/_/sa skyong dka' thub nor can la/_/b+ha yA na ka stag dang ni/_/seng ge dang ni 'jigs rung la/_/b+hAR+YA Ti ka chung ma dang /_/nges rgyal 'phrog byed khyad par la/_/b+h+ra ma ra ka sprin
[\[171a.3\]]sbrang chang /_/adz+dzA na dang phye ma dang /_/mdung 'dzin zhes pa rnams la'o/_/maN+Do da kaM sems chags dang /_/kun tu byug pa dag la'o/_/maN+Da la kaM gzugs dang ni/_/mdze yi bye brag dregs pa la/_/bai de ha ka tshong pa dang /_/srad bu rje rigs bu la'o/_/bai nA shi ka skad cig pa/_/gzhan
[\[171a.4\]]dbang dang ni lte ba'i bal/_/sha tA ni ka thub pa'i dbye/_/rgan po sdong po spyang ki khyi/_/ce spyang dang ni sbre'u la/_/shi lA Ta ka snum dang drag_/shring+ga Ta ka sgo'i lcog dang /_/lam gyi bzhi mdo dag la'o/_/saM g+hA Ti kA snam sbyar dang /_/sna dang chu snod kuT+Ta nI/_/san+ta ni ka 'o zho'i mtsho/_/spre'u'i
[\[171a.5\]]dra ba dag la'o/_/saM daM shi ka rkaM pa dang /_/lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor rab dbye la/_/a pra tI ka dbang ldan dang /_/phyogs kyi glang po lha yi gzugs/_/shri ga li ka ce spyang mo/_/skrag pa dang ni 'bros pa la/_/shai ka ti kaM ma yi snod/_/bkra shis srad bu dag la ni/_/de bkod dang ni the tshom
[\[171a.6\]]la'o/_/ma yU ra ka spangs ma dang /_/a pA mArga'i shing la'o/_/ma ru ba ka myos byed dang /_/me tog dbye ba dbu ba sngos/_/bA Na ba ka do shal dbye/_/byis pa skyes ngan mkhas pa la/_/mr-iSh+Ta'i ru ka smra byed ma/_/mr-iSh+TA shin dang 'gron po'i dgra/_/ra ta r+d+hi kaM bde ba'i 'khrus/_/bkra shis brgyad
[\[171a.7\]]pa dang nyin mo/_/rA tshon rtsi dang /_d+ha rang+ka rgan la nyan/_/shis byed sprin gyi rdo pa'o/_/la tA li ka a mra'i lcug_/rdo rje'i khu tshur la yang dran/_/lA lA Ti ka bya la bzod/_/'khyud pa'i khyad par dag dang ni/_/gtso bo'i dpral ba blta ba dang /_/mthong ba med pa yang brjod do/_/le k+Sha'i ra ka phrin yig
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]khyer/_/ke yash+tsa yi phrin yig la/_/le khI la ka gzhan lag nas/_/rang gi lag gi phrin yig la/_/bi tu n+na kaM dpal yon can/_/dz+ha Ta ma la la yang ngo /_/bi dU Sha ka mkhas pa dang /_/gzhan smos pa dang cho ga byed/_/bi nA ya ka rgyal ba mgon/_/bya khyung khyab 'jug bgegs bla ma/_/bi mA na ki
[\[171b.2\]]nga rgyal gyis/_/stong pa dang ni mngon par sems/_/lha yi theg dang sa bdun khyim/_/bi she Sha ka thig le dang /_/khyad par du ni byed pa la/_/bai ta li ka rtogs byed pa'i/_/ri mo dang ni grags pa dang /_/Di tA la dang bu dang ni/_/phye ma gnyis pa phreng gnyis pa/_/rnam par skyod byed rnams la'o/_/
[\[171b.3\]]sai ka ti ka dri gtsang khang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni khrus la'o/_/rang gi chung ma gzhan la gnas/_/gang zhig sgrub par ma nus pa/_/de la der bkod tsam gyis ni/_/bkres par byas pa'i bza' ba la'o/_/so ma balka shun pa dang /_/seng ldeng dkar po dag la'o/_/sau gan+d+hi
[\[171b.4\]]ka gdung dang /_/pad+ma rA ga gcod byed dang /_/dri can dri ldan so b+hA rgyA/_dag la'o/_/ba da/_tasta/_s+thI/_a ne yo/_na/_Da mU ka zhes pa/_/bId+ha yi tuHshak+Sha ma/_ki ta ba dang /_ngag thos spangs/_/mA tre Na/_k+Shu b+ha/_/Ats+tshu rtagr-i ta/_b+ho dza na/_ri ta ka zhes pa/_/dgong dang sen mo 'joms bye brag_/u pa kA ri kA zhes pa/_/rgyal
[\[171b.5\]]po'i chibs kyi ra ba dang /_/piSh+Ta'i dgon pa bur shing byed/_/ka Ta ko bar byed pa dang /_/'ching bu'i bum pa dag dang ni/_/gtor mas rgyas dang ce spyang la'o/_/kak+Shu pek+Shu ka zhes pa/_/brtan dang dag pa'i mtha' dang ni/_/skyed tshal skyong bar byed pa dang /_/'khrud dang tsang+gA 'tsho sgo skyong /_/
[\[171b.6\]]kr-i mi kaN+Da kaM zhes/_/ri mo/_/spyo ba/_byi tang ga//sho dza ga ri ko zhes pa/_/bkra shis brjod dang thab byed pa'o/_/ci li m+bi li kA zhes pa/_/mgrin pa can gyi bye brag dang /_/mkha' snang dang ni klog rnams la'o/_/dza la kung+dza ka zhes pa/_/lcog dang chu khang pra shI'o/_/dza la tA yi ka zhes pa/_/
[\[171b.7\]]il+lI sha dang kA kA tsi/_/nya dag la ni/_sman/_'dod pa yin/_/na ba ka rang+ka zhes pa/_/be ta'i 'bras bu dang ni sprin/_/na ba pha li kA zhes pa/_/dung dang chu yi khri shing dang /_/gru dang gsar du skyes pa dang /_/dang por gsar skyed bud med rdul/_/nA ga pA ri kaM zhes pa/_/rgyal po'i glang mor
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]glang po skyes/_/bya khyung dang ni grangs gnas dang /_/ske rags ri mo can la'o/_/bya ba hA ri kA zhes pa/_/sbyang bar bya ba dang ni mtshal/_/'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad do/_/brI hi rA dzi ka zhes pa/_/krA ma nI dang rgya yi 'bras/_/sha ta sa rbi kA/_/dU rbA/_shI ta tsam+ba ka yi sgra/_gshin rje
[\[172a.2\]]tshim byed sgron me la/_/su ga san+ta kaM dpyid la'o/_/rgyags pa'i ngag ston la yang 'gyur/_/he ma puSh+pe ka dang ni/_/he ma puSh+pa ka zhes pa/_/me tog tsam pa ka'i phung po'o/_/grA ma mang+ku ri kA lcog_/grang gi 'thab mo la yang blta'o/_/ma nga na Na lA kA ni/_/sbrul dang 'dod pa skyes la'o/_/mA tu la
[\[172a.3\]]su tra ka ni/_/zhang po skyes dang khram pa'i 'bras/_/la tA markA Ta ka ni/_/bu mo me tog spre'u'o/_/bar+Na bi lo Da ka ni/_/tshigs bcad grib ma 'phrog bcom rkun/_/sin+dU ra ti la ka ni/_/klu dang sin+dU ra'i thig le/_/sna tA tse ki t+sa ka ni/_/zla ba bzhi pa'i bsnyen gnas la/_/snA ta tsi ki t+sa kaM ni/_/dka'
[\[172a.4\]]thub bud med me tog la'o/_/zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes pa/_ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las/_ka dbyangs bcas ka mtha'i sde'o//_//kha ni nam mkha' lha yul sde/_/bla dang yang dag
[\[172a.5\]]rig dang grong /_/stong pa thig le dbang po zhing /_/ku NA ha la'i 'bras bu la'o/_/nag sen mo gaN+Dal/_/na khI/_na khA dri yi rdzas/_/oM kha snyan tshig yid 'ong /_/snyan tshig oM yig drug pa la'o/_/phreng+khA paR+Ya Ta la dang /_/gar dang 'gros dang rta yi 'gros/_/sing+khA 'gro ba'i khyad par dang /_/
[\[172a.6\]]gar dang sr-i ka shi kya la/_/mu khaM kha dang nges 'byung sgo/_/thabs dang rtsom pa dag la'o/_/le kha spring yig lha min la/_/le khA ri mo gral yi ge/_shaM kha dung dang dpral rus la/_/na khI gter gyi bye brag la/_/sA khA lcug ma rig byed che/_/mtha' can lag dang phyogs kyi bar/_/shi khA yal
[\[172a.7\]]ga gtsug phud rtse/_/phud bu 'bar ba mjug ma la/_/sA kha mdza' bo grogs po la/_/su khaM skyid dang mtho ris la/_/su khA grong dang rab sems so/_/go mu kha ni kha chung dang /_/rol mo'i snod dang nyer byug dang /_/tri shI dri shA khA b+he ka thal+la ko/_/bi shI kha ni mda' bo che/_/mda' dang rko byed shing rta dang /_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]sdong bu la'o/_/bi shi gA+o/_sa ga sgrub byed/_bsrub pa la'o/_/bra mu kha ni dang po/_gtso/_/'od chags 'bar ba/_nad lag pa'o/_/bi shA khA ni skems byed rtog_/ag+ni mu kha lha dang ni/_/gnyis skyes dang ni rlung gi ming /_/ag+ni mu khI zhes pa dang /_/'ga' zhig ag+ni mu kha ste/_/bal+lAM ta ka'i shing la'o/_/ag+ni shi
[\[172b.2\]]khA mjug ma can/_ag+ni shi khaM gur kum brjod/_/in+d+ra le khA zla ba'i cha/_/la tA su kha zla ba'i bcud/_/ag+ni na kha rus sbal dang /_/glang po 'gar ni ba lang sogs/_/bar+d+hA ye khA bskrad pa la/_/bar+d+hA shi kha byis pa la/_/ma hA saM kha mi rus dang /_/gter dang dung gi rab dbye la/_/byA g+h+ran kha kan+da ste/_/dri
[\[172b.3\]]yi rdzas kyi bye brag go/_/parba dza mu khaM zhes pa/_/nam mkha' dang ni lam la'o/_/sarba te mu khA zhes pa/_/zhing shes cho ga drag po la'o/_/sna tshogs gsal ba las kha mtha'i sde'o//_//gaHni dri za tshogs bdag nyid/_/gaM/_glu/_gA ni/_glu mkhan la/_/go ni glang dang mtho ris dang /_/mkha'
[\[172b.4\]]'od rdo rje dz+la pa ri/_/ba lang sa phyogs mig dang ngag_/mda' dang chu rnams la ni pho/_/a ga 'gro med shing ri bo/_/nyi ma lag 'gro dag la'o/_/ang+ga chang gi rab dbye la/_/a gaM lus dang gtso bo dang /_/thabs dang 'gan zla nye ba dang /_/yan lag ldan pa rnams la'o/_/ang+ga kun tu bod pa dang /_/
[\[172b.5\]]grangs pho'o//_mid zlos don rab dga' la/_/ing+ga sur dang shes pa dang /_/'gro dang rmad byung dag la'o/_/kha ga bya dang mda' dang ni/_/nyi ma lha dang gza' la'o/_/khang+ga ral gri tsher ma dang /_/rwa can rgyal ba'i khyad par la/_/gAng+gA gdong drug 'jigs byed la/_/gaM gA 'byung ba brjod
[\[172b.6\]]byar ldan/_/tsang+ga mdzes dang mkhas pa dang /_/chags dang rnam par sgeg pa la/_/Tang+ga mtshon cha'i khyad par dang /_/byin pa dang ni rko byed la/_/t+yA ga sbyin dang yongs gtong la/_/tung+ga mtho ba brjod byar ldan/_/tuM gaM klu shing ri bo la/_/tuM gi sgra dang mtshan mo'o/_/durga bgrod dka' du rga ni/_/
[\[172b.7\]]gtum mo dang ni rams la'o/_/na ga ri shing 'gro med dang /_/nyi ma lag 'gro dag la'o/_/na ga klu dang klu shing dang /_/nA ga ge sar so dang ni/_/glang po dang ni char sprin 'khrug_/'khrug las lus kyi rlung bye brag_/gtso bo nyid dang mchog gnas dang /_/zha nye mtshon dang bud med kyi/_/'chi bar
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]byed pa'i khyad par la'o/_/sing+ga dmar ser sing+ga ni/_/mA sI'o sing+ga skra can la/_/sing+gA ra ma tha dang rtsa/_/u mA dang ni gi wang la/_/pU ga ni ku ru m+ba dang /_/rkang 'thung kra mu ka la'o/_/phalgu dri ma 'bras bu med/_/b+ha gaM ye shes skye gnas 'dod/_/grags pa bdag nyid tshe dang
[\[173a.2\]]grol/_/dbang phyug brtson 'grus tshigs bral chos/_/dpal dang 'bad pa nyi ma la'o/_/b+hang+ga chu rlabs nang lus gyi/_lha mo/_bye brag_/dbye ba rgyal ba go rims bzlog_/b+h+riM ga sha na'i lo tog la/_/b+hA ga cha dang rnam par dbye/_/phyogs gcig dang ni bgo skal la'o/_/b+h+r-i gu pa sangs pi nA kin/_/
[\[173a.3\]]g.yang sa ya mang ag+ni la/_/b+h+r-ing ga_/bud ga_/Shang+ga dang /_/du ba 'tshub ma la'o b+h+r-ing+gi ni/_/skra yi rgyal dang bu ram shun/_/b+ho ga bde dang /_sprul gyi ni/_/gdengs ka dang ni lus dag la/_/'dus la blta dang bud med kyi/_/bza' ba skyong byed nor la'o/_/mA rga lo yi thog ma dang /_/sil
[\[173a.4\]]snyan dang ni rjes tshol la/_/mr-i ga ri dgas phyugs glang chags thogs/_po/_/rgyu skar gyi ni dbye ba la/_/mr-i gI tshol dang ri dgas 'gros/_/'dren pa'i khyad par dag la'o/_/yu ga_/san mo/_sI rAng+ga/_/yu gaM rdzogs ldan la sogs dus/_/gru bzhi 'phel dang ming dang sman/_/yo ga go cha gyon pa
[\[173a.5\]]dang /_/sbyar ba bsam gtan las dang ni/_/khyon la sogs dang srad bu rdzas/_/kun 'joms mchog dang sngar med rnyed/_/sman dang thabs dang rigs rnams la/_/ro ga sman rul ba dang nang /_/laM ga mdzes dang bi lga la'o/_/liM gaM mtshan ma rjes su dpag/_/'khrug dang /_'thor dang /_grangs dang ni/_/
[\[173a.6\]]ku pra kr-i ti rnams la'o/_/bang+ga yul gyi khyad par dang /_/b+haN+Ta ta kI ras bal la/_/bang+gaM mtshon la'ang blta bar bya/_/byang+ga spal ba lus dman la/_/byang+ge gzhan bzhin ma ning ngo /_/shAD+gaM mda' yi stan la'o/_/shAD+ga khyab 'jug mda' stan la/_/shr-ing+gaM rwa dang rtse mo dang /_/gtso bo mtho dang zhi ba la/_/
[\[173a.7\]]de bzhin ngan pa/_shr-ing+ga rtse mo'i chu 'bab ma/_/mtshan ma sa yi mag pa la/_/shr-ing+gA rwa dang khyu mchog dang /_/nya dang gser gyi khyad par la/_/swarga/_rang bzhin nges grol dang /_/nges pa sbyo dang blta ba dang /_/rmongs dang le'u rnams la'o/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang p+la k+Sha dag_/ser po la ni sing+gA 'o/_/a
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ni ga ni/_/yid srubs dang /_/lus med nam mkha' yid la 'dod/_/a naM gaM ni lus dman dang /_/lus kyi 'byung ba bzlog pa la/_/a sAng+gaM ni lus khral dang /_/mig gi mtha' dang thig le la/_/a yo ga ni brtson gral brtsegs/_/phral dang khregs dang skyed
[\[173b.2\]]mos tshal/_/A b+ho ga ni kun 'gro 'bad/_/gdugs dang rab sems gang ba dang /_/kun sbyor dri dang phreng ba sbyin/_/rtsol ba sgrib pa rnams la'o/_/A shu ga ni mda' dang rlung /_/ut+parga ni 'dor dang gtong /_/thun mong ba dang phyir sbyin pa'o/_/urba ga ni skyo ba
[\[173b.3\]]dang /_/shin tu mang po can la'o/_/urba gaM ni shin tu 'gro/_/kra mu kI yi 'bras bu la'o/_/ka ling+ga ni sen mo rul/_/du ba 'tshubs dang tshong bye brag/_/yul gyi dbye ba mkhas pa dang /_/bsregs dang ko Da ka'i 'bras bu/_/ka li gA ni btsun mo'o/_/kA liM gA ni grul bum
[\[173b.4\]]pa/_/glang po dang ni sprul dag go/_/ka liM kI ni sbal pa'i rgyag_/tsa krAM ga ni 'dab chags te/_/tsa kraM gI ni/_ku Du'i nya/_/dzi h+ma ga ni/_/sprul 'grol mang /_/tA Da ka ni chu klung dang /_/'dab ma'i phung po'o tA Da gu/_/thu lu tA ta/_skyed bu mo/_/tu ra gI ni rta bon po/_/tu ra gA ni/_
[\[173b.5\]]rta dang sems/_trI brga ni/_chos 'dod don/_/tshogs dang /_che ba gsum dang ni/_/snying stobs/_rdul mun gsum 'dus dang /_/'phel dang gnas dang zad pa rnams/_/lhan cig brjod la yongs su grags/_/mu stegs/_ral gri d+hA rAng+ga/_/na rang+ga ni pho'i
[\[173b.6\]]rtags dang /_ba raN+Da ga phur bu zlum/_/nA rang+ga ni zha nye'i mtshon/_/bshang ba/_skye bo/_zung du skyes/_bisbi li'i khu ba la'o/_/ni ShaM ga ni/_mda' dong grogs/_/ni saM ga ni/_tshul khrims le'u/_/ni lang+ga ni/_'bu srin dang /_/b+haM b+ha ra NI snying po can/_/pa taM ga ni phye ma leg_/
[\[173b.7\]]nyi ma bya dang /_'bras bye brag_/sa bang+ga ni ro bcud la/_/ba trAng+ga ni tsan da na dmar/_/gro ga dang ni shug pa la/_/ban+na ga/_/sbrul/_pad+ma shing /_/pa rA ga ni me tog rdul/_/khrus chal sogs dang rdul la'o/_/nye bar chags dang /_tsan+dan dang /_/ri bo'i khyad par dag la'ang
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]bshad/_/sun+nA ga ni skyes bu gtso/_/shing gi khyad par ut+pal dkar/_/dzA ti pha la dag dang ni/_/skya bo'i sprul la'ang blta bar bya/_/bra ya ga ni 'jug ngogs dbye/_/arga 'bab dang khyab stobs la/_/pa yo ga ni las rab sbyor/_/des bstan la'o praM yaM
[\[174a.2\]]gu/_/kaM guM rA dzi kA dang ni/_/'bras ldan dang ni bispi lI/_/sla ba ga ni/_spre'u dang /_/sbal ba/_me lce/_kha lo pa/_/b+hU dzaM ga ni/_sprul/_Shilga/_/khyi 'tshed glang po mA taM ga_/mr-i taM/_ga ni rnga dang dbyangs/_/lus dmar 'tsho byed sman la'o/_/ra k+taM ga ni bkra shis dang /_/
[\[174a.3\]]brtan pa/_brtse ldan rnam gnon la/_/rA thA ga ni/_gnyis med dang /_/'khor lo dang ni 'khor lo'i 'dab/_/shing rta'i yan lag rnams la'o/_/pa rang+ga ni mgo skyes gnas/_/bu ram shun pa glang po la'o/_/bA ti ga ni bcu smin pa/_/sgyur ba po gang gser 'gyur mkhan/_/
[\[174a.4\]]bi DaM ga ni srin 'joms dang /_/nA ga ra'o pi ha ga_/mkha' 'gro dang ni rtse mor 'gro/_/bi sarga ni dman pa dang /_/gtong dang dri ma 'dor ba dang /_/rnam par 'dor dang grol ba dang /_/'od dang sel ba'i khyad par la/_/saM b+ho ga ni dga' ba dang /_/longs spyod dang ni rgyal
[\[174a.5\]]ba'i bstan/_/sarba gaM ni chu la'o/_/khyab bdag bde byed sarba gaH/_/sA raM ga ni ri dgas dang /_/glang po bye'u mkha' 'gro'i dbye/_/bung ba dang ni khra bo la/_/bya khyung /_tshangs pa/_he mAng+ga/_/a nu Shang+ga brtsams dang /_/snying rje la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/a ba
[\[174a.6\]]brga thar pa dang /_/'bras bcas bya ba byas pa la/_/a b+hi ShaM ga 'du 'dzi dang /_/mna' dang /_/sbyor ba mdzod dang ni/_/g.yo ba pa dang spyang ki dang /_/skye bo gzugs kyi rab dbye la'o/_/a pa rA ga mtho ris snang /_/gza' dang me tog ldan pa dang /_/du lU la yang /_gza'
[\[174a.7\]]rna can/_/yongs su smra ba rnams la'o/_/u pa sarga nad kyi dbye/_/nye bar 'gro ba dag la'o/_/ka Da b+haM ga lo thog rnams/_/sen gcod/_br-i ya t+ya ya'o/_/in+d+ra b+haM ga zla ba skyes/_/rang dbang can dang mi bdag sna/_/dIr+g+ha d+h+wa ka glang chen dang /_/phrin yig khyer ba dag la brjod/_/mal+lanA ga glang
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]chen dkar/_/bat+sa'i bu dang thub pa la'o/_/rA dza shrIM ga gser gyi ni/_/dbyug pa dang ni mang+gu ra/_/sa mA yo gaM/_/kun sbyor dang /_/'du ba dang ni dgos pa la/_/saM pra/_yo ga rab dga' dang /_/las dang rjes su 'gro ba la/_/ka thA pra sang+ga zhes pa/_/rlung gi tshogs
[\[174b.2\]]dang dug gi nad/_/'chos pa'i sman pa dag la brjod/_/nA DI ta raM gA zhes pa/_/kA ko chu bya rog_/la dang /_hiN+Da ka/_/ra ta hiN+Da ka la'o/_/ga mtha'i sde'o//_//g+ha ni dril bu'i dbang po la/_/g+hA ni dril chung 'joms byed la/_/g+hu ni bud med sgra la'o/_/a
[\[174b.3\]]g+haM sdig pa sdug bsngal phongs/_/aM g+h+r-i rkang pa shing gi rtsa/_/ar+g+ha mchod byed rin thang la/_/ud+g+ha lag pa kha sbyar dang /_/lus kyi rlung dang smin pa la/_/o g+ha phan tshun rgyug pa dang /_/myur dang gar gyi man ngag dang /_/tshogs dang lam dang rab 'bab la/_/ma
[\[174b.4\]]g+hI sman gyi bye brag la/_/ma g+hA rgyu skar bcu pa la/_/me g+ha sprin dang musta la/_/mo g+ha 'bras med dman pa la/_/mo g+hA rkang 'thung skya nar la/_/la g+hu yid 'ong snying po med/_/a gu ru dang sr-ik+kA dang /_/a gu ru nag cig car la/_/sh+lA g+hA rab bsngags bsnyen bkur la/_/mngon
[\[174b.5\]]par 'dod pa dag la'o/_/a na g+hA ni sdig pas stong /_/dri ma med dang yid dga' la/_/a mo g+ha ni 'bras bur bcas/_/a mo g+hA ni kun bshad dang /_/phan pa dang ni byi dang ga/_/ul+lA g+hA ni nad med dang /_/mkhas dang gtsang dang dga' ba ldan/_/kA rtsi g+ha ni gser dang ni/_/byi
[\[174b.6\]]ga dkyil 'khor shin tu dngas/_/ni drA g+ha ni tsha ba'i dus/_/gdung tshad dang ni rdul gyi chu/_/sa ri g+ha ni tho ba dang /_/rnal 'byor dbye ba yan lag 'dzin/_/'joms dang 'ching bu'i bum pa dang /_/bum pa rab ba lang grong /_/pra ti g+ha ni khong khro khro/_/ma hA r+g+ha ni rin thang che/_/
[\[174b.7\]]rin thang med dang lA ba ka_/sarbo g+ha ni bla ma dang /_/shugs don/_go cha kun don bdag_/g+ha mtha'i sde'o//_//nga ni 'jigs par byed dang yul/_/nga mtha'i sde'o//_//tsa ni chom rkun zla ba dag_/a tsa mchod dang /_gzugs brnyan dag_/uts+tsha che dang mtho ba la/_/ka tsa skra dang bla ma dang /_/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]khu ba dang rma chings skam/_/ka tsa glang po mo la'o/_/kA tsa nor bu dra ba dang /_/mig nad dang ni sa'i khyad par/_/kAsbyi ske rags chun po dang /_/guny+dza dang ni tshangs bye brag_/kUrtsa smin ma'i dbus dang ni/_/bsgrub bya smar mi bsngags pa'o/_/kruny+tsa bya yi bye brag
[\[175a.2\]]dang /_/ri dang gling gi rab dbye la/_/tsany+tsa sprul pa 'dam bu sogs/_/tsany+tsA rtswa yi mi la'o/_/tsany+tsu sor lA tro TI dang /_/ba lang rtsa dang ki lIny+tsa/_/tsartsA gnas dang /_los ma si/_rtog pa dang /_/spyod dang sems pa dag dang ni/_/pags pa dang ni shing shun dang /_/khrung khrung /_pags pa
[\[175a.3\]]tsam dang bu ram shun/_/nI tsa sA ma ra dang gzhol/_/mi'u thung 'bab phyogs dma' ba dang /_/mtha' dag 'jam po shing bal dang /_/ru rta lha min bye brag dang /_/zhing las 'jigs dang gzhan bye brag/_/prA tse dus dang phyogs dang yul/_/mo tsa mig sman bzang po la/_/mo tsa
[\[175a.4\]]shAl+la li chu shing /_/ru tsi mdzes dang 'od dang 'dong /_/mngon par chags dang bzang ba la/_/ba tsa ne tso bA tsa ni/_/dri dang sA ri ka la brjod/_/bA tsa dbyangs can tshig dang ni/_/shin tu chung ba'i dba' rlabs dang /_/go skabs dang ni bde ba la/_/sa tsI dbang mo brgya byin ma/_/shu
[\[175a.5\]]rtsi'i nyer 'dzin dag pa dang /_/sngags pa chu dang rma bya dang /_/sgeg pa dang ni so ga'i dus/_/dkar ba dang ni ma nyams pa'o/_/sU tsi lag sogs tshul dang ni/_/snum pa dang ni rtse mo la'o/_/sU tsI mtshams ldan rnams dang ni/_/brjod dang byed pa'i khyad par la/_/a bI tsa ni
[\[175a.6\]]dmyal ba dang /_/chu yi rba klong ba ha ra/_/u dU tsi ni chu dang phyogs/_/yul dang dus la brjod bya ldan/_/ka ni tsi ni rgyas pa dang /_/'khri shing guny+dza shing rta la'o/_/ka ba tsa ni phub ma 'da'o/_/rda dang khong bu sgong la'o/_/kra ka tsa ni sog le dang /_/mdud pa can dang sa skyes
[\[175a.7\]]so/_/na mu ci ni mos byed dang /_/bral ba dang /_lha ma ni klu chu glang po la'o/_/nA rA tsa ni lcags mda' ma/_/nA rA tsI ni 'dogs bye brag/_/pra tI tsi ni phyogs dus yul/_/pra pany+tsa ni rgya che dang /_/kun bsags dang ni spros pa'o/_/ma ri tsi ni 'bar ba dang /_/thub pa dang ni kr-i pa Na/_/rta dang
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]ral gri dang bkren pa dang gsum la 'jug go/_/mA rA tsi ni mchod sbyin can/_/glang po che dang kak+ko la/_/srin po'i khyad par rnams la'o/_/mA ri tsI ni lha mo'i dbye/_/bi ka tsa ni rab rgyas la/_/bi pany+tsi ni ngo tsha can/_/rol rtsed pi wang phong can gza'/_/saM ko tsa ni 'ching ba dang /_/nya yi bye brag
[\[175b.2\]]dag la'o/_/saM ko tsam ni gur kum dang /_/yang dag grogs po bzang bo la'o/_/kA kA tsiny+tsi/_srad/_sa bon/_/chu yi 'bu dang /_di li ra/_/dza la sU tsi chu'i srin bu/_/rwa can dang ni byis pa gsod/_/kaM ka tro Di dz+haka'o/_/ma limU tsa/_/chom rkun mi/_/ta ra nA rU tsa yi sgra/_/khyi dang dga'
[\[175b.3\]]ba'i yal 'dab dang /_/bud med mchog dang yongs brtsams las/_/kun tu byung ba'i bya ba la'o/_/tsa mtha'i sde'o//_//tsha ni gcod dang bya rog la/_/tshA ni gcod dang 'dod pa dang /_/mtshan ma dang ni dang ba la/_/ats+tshe mi zad pa dang ni/_/dom dang shel dang mngon du phyogs/_/
[\[175b.4\]]ats+tsha shin tu dang ba la/_/kats+tsha brag la sogs mtshams la/_/gru yi yan lag na ka la/_/ma min bdag dang yongs gnas dang /_/g.yo ba'i khyad par rnams la'o/_/kats+tsha tsa'i ri kA dang ni/_/phag mo la yang blta bar bya/_/guts+tsha phon po do shal dbye/_/sdong po dang ni
[\[175b.5\]]bsags pa la/_/bits+tsha mjug ma bits+tsha ni/_/shal+ma li yis bkris pa dang /_/rdul dang pU gats+tsha Ta'i sbubs/_/mA bA'i mdun khang phreng ba dang /_/skye bo bral ba la puts+tsha/_/bits+tsha phyi ma phyogs dag go/_/m+lets+tsha skad mi gsal ba dang /_/rigs kyi bye brag sdig la dga'/_/

[\[175b.7\]]gzhu yi khyad par dang /_/zla ba chu skyes ni tsu la/_/shing /_dung la'o a dzi sa mnyam/_g.yul/_/urdza spro dang /_byed pa po/_/U rdzA brtson 'grus dang ni stobs/_/kany+dza skra dang tshangs pa la/_/kany+dzi bdud rtsi pad+ma la/_/ku dzi/_dmyal ba/_sol ba la/_/kuny+dza spre'u sdong
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]po dang /_/glang po dang ni so la yang /_/kuny+dza/_sgur 'khyog_/shing bye brag_/brdzu 'bra go'i shing dang ni/_/g.ya' ba dang ni srin bu'o/_/gany+dza lha khang /_gur kha ri/_/mdzod la'o/_/gardzA/_bsrub pa la/_/gardza pra hasta la'o/_/guny+dza/_kA ka ma tsi ri
[\[176a.2\]]dang /_pa Ta ha dang sgra yi cha/_/dwi dza/_bram ze/_sgong skyes so/_/dwi dzA ngan spong /_bu rdul bzang /_/d+h+wa dza/_rtags mtshan khri rkang dang /_/ba dan mtshan rtags/_shoN+Di ka_/ni dza bdag po/_rtags pa dang /_/n+yub+dza na byis pa thos par brjod/_/n+Yub+baM mtshon gyi las mon sman nu/_
[\[176a.3\]]la 'gyur/_/kub+dza/_'og tu phyogs pa la/_/piny+dza gnod pa/_piny+dzi g.yo/_/be+er+sA shing bal/_yur ba la/_/pany+dza 'khrugs la brjod bya ldan/_/pra dzA rgyud dang 'jig rten la/_/pra dzA 'gro ba tshogs pa dang /_/tshA ba ka dang lam la'o/_/b+hu dza dang ni b+hu dza dag_/dpung pa

[\[176a.5\]]'bras so ba/_/lA dza gsher ba'i 'bras la'o/_/lA dzi/_pu shel rtse la brjod/_/bA dza phyogs la yang 'gyur te/_/sgra dang thub pa'i bye/_thags pa/_brag la'ang /_/b+'aM dzaM mchod sbyin don dang la/_/mar la'o bI dzi rgyud dang ni/_/nye bar len dang khu ba la/_/byA dza kun

[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dang /_/stag sen dang ni sen mo la'o/_/kAM po dza ni/_zla ba'i shun/_dung dang klu shing rta rnams la'o/_/kaM bo dzI ni sran ma'i 'dab/_/shing kun lo ma la yang 'dod/_/kA ru dza ni bzo bo dang /_/ri mo dang ni rang skyes snum/_/grog mkhar btsag dang dbu ba dang /_/glang phrug nA ga ge sar
[\[176b.2\]]la'o/_/ku Ta dza ni shing bye brag_/bra bo che dang bum pa skyes/_/gi ri dza ni ri yi bu/_/zhang po/_kho ru dA hr-i dA/_/gi ri dzaM ni lhang tsher dang /_/lcags dang brag zhun dri bzang la/_/dza la dzaM ni 'dam skyes dang /_/chu skyes pad+ma ru rta dung /_/pa rany+dza ni til 'khrul 'khor/_/ral gri dbu ba bor
[\[176b.3\]]ba'i 'dab/_/pA Ni dz+ya ni tshong pa dang /_/'tsho byed byed pa'i khyad par la/_/ba la dzA ni tshong tshong zong /_/kha dog ldan pa'i bud med la/_/ba la dzaM ni sa dang zhing /_/lo tog yul dang ba lang lhas/_/b+hU mi dzA sprul la a na kI/_/dmyal ba ngan skyes b+hU mi dza/_/murga'i lo ma ba na dzA/_/
[\[176b.4\]]kha na dza ni glang po stag_/'dam skyes nags byung ba na dzaM/_/ba hu dza ni rgyal rigs bshad/_/thig le khu ba spa yaM dzA/_/sa ha dza ni grogs med la/_/gzhan gyi rtags can sa ha dzA/_/sA ma dza na snyan tshig byung /_/brjod bya'i rtags can glang po la'o/_/hi ma dzA dang hi ma dza/_/ri yi
[\[176b.5\]]sras ma legs brjod ma/_/de bzhin mai nA ka la'o/_/a hi b+hU dza rnam 'dul bu/_/'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la'o/_/kA smi ra da bong nga dkar/_/ru rta gur kum pad+ma la/_/gra ha rA dza zla nyi ma/_/dza g+ha n+ya dza zhes pa ni/_/nu bo dang ni dmangs rigs la/_/dwi dza ra dzA ma chen mo'i mgon/_/
[\[176b.6\]]'dul byed bdag skyes khyad par la/_/d+harma rA dza gshin rje dang /_/bde bar khyung /_rma bya/_gshegs dang g.yul ngor brtan/_/b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bla ma'i bu/_/stag gi tshogs dang thub pa la/_/b+hA ra dwA dza bre bo dang /_/shing bal gyi ni khyad par la'o/_/b+h+r-i ga rA dza sbrang rtsi'i btung /_/sbre'u dang ni bya'i bye
[\[176b.7\]]brag_/yak+Sha rA dza mig gsum grogs/_/rA dza rA dza nor sbyin dang /_/sa kun dbang dang ri dgas mtshan/_/k+Shi rA b+d+hi dzaM ri bong can/_/k+ShI rA b+d+hi dzA dpal mo la/_/k+ShA rA b+d+hi dzaM nya phyis dang /_/rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dag la'o/_/r-iSha b+ha ra d+hA dz+wa'i sgra/_/bde byed mchod pa'i khyad par skye ga_
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]la/_/de nas mu ni b+hai Sha dzi/_/drang srong ri byi/_a ru ra/_/'gom pa la ste dza mtha'i sde'o//_//dz+ha ni spyod pa rlung dag la/_/zhig pa la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/dz+haM dz+ha sgra yi bye brag la/_/dz+hai ni chu 'khyags char pa la'o/_/dz+ha mtha'i sde'o//_//
[\[177a.2\]]nya ni dbye kha'i sgra dang ni/_/glu len pa la 'ga' yis bshad/_/dz+nyA ni mkhas dang blo la'o/_/bi d+ha'i sgra ni rmongs sems po/_/prA dz+nyA blo la pra dzanyA mkhas/_/saM dz+nyA ming dang glu len dang /_/sems pa drang srong bud med dang /_/long ba'i lag pa mgo dang ni/_/mig rnams kyi ni mtshon
[\[177a.3\]]byed la'o/_/kr-i ta dz+nyA ni byas pa shes/_/snying po gzhal bya brjod bya ldan/_/bud med rnams kyi lta ba la/_/dai ba dz+nyA ni tshogs can la/_/bde gshegs bde 'byung sarba dz+nya/_/bdag dang grong khyer k+She tra dz+nyA/_/nya mtha'i sde'o//_//TA ni sa la'o/_Ta ni sgra/_/TaM ni spyi blugs
[\[177a.4\]]la 'gyur ro/_/aT+TaM khyim gyi khyad par dang /_/zar ma/_skam po/_zas dag la'o/_/iSh+Ta rmi dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_/'du byed rnal 'byor mchod sbyin las/_/mchod dang mchog tu dga' dang bsngags/_/iSh+Ti mchod sbyin mchod dang 'dod/_/bsdus dang tshig bcas srad bu
[\[177a.5\]]dag_/ka Ta sked pa sha ka dang /_/shin tu'i don dang lte ba dang /_/glang po'i 'gram pa dam tshig dang /_/bya yi rnam pa rmad du byung /_/ka TI/_ka TiM/_A ka d+hi/_/kaD+Tha kA ni sun 'byin dang /_/pr-i yaM gu dang /_ske tshe dang /_mya ngan med dang dmar po dang /_/tsha ba rnams la lta bar bya/_/ka
[\[177a.6\]]Tu bcud dang ser sna dga'/_/dri bzangs rnon po dag la'o/_/kaSh+TaM thibs po dka' 'tshegs la/_/kuT/_bum pa/_rdo gzhong dang /_ko Ta dang ni/_khyi la'o/_/ko TI/_'o ma 'bangs mo chang /_/ri mo dang ni guts+tsha ka/_/kUT/_phung po dang ni shar/_/rtsibs dang tshul 'chos sgyu ma gar/_/
[\[177a.7\]]sbun pa/_rtse gsum/_sI rAM ga_/'khrul 'khor lcags gong g.yo med la/_/kr-iSh+Ti/_rtogs dang mi dang 'gugs/_/ko Ti grangs kyi bye brag dang /_/mchog dang shin tu phul byung rab/_/rtse mo gzhu yi mchog ma la/_/kruSh+TaM du dang sgra sgrog la/_/kha TaM bad kan thal lcag la/_/mun
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]pa dang ni khron pa la/_/khA Ti/_sa ba ra tha dang /_/kr-i Na e ka_/gra ha la'o/_/ke Ta smod dang nor la dga'/_/ka pha grong gi dbye ba la/_/kr-iSh+Ta sman gyi khyad par dang /_/a ka pra sa ban+d+ha la'o/_/g+ha Ta bum pa glang po'i 'gram/_/ting 'dzin gyi ni bye brag dang /_/ba lang gnas dang byed
[\[177b.2\]]pa la/_/g+ha TA'ang bum pa glang po'i 'gram/_/g+h+r-iSh+Ti phag dang kun tu sgrogs/_/khyab 'jug gnon dang sgrogs bad kan/_byed la'o/_/gyoN+DA rgya shug_/pU ga'o/_/tsa Tu/_tsA Tu/_pi tsiN+Da/_/gdan gyi bye brag_/brtul zhugs la/_/dza TA/_gcer bur skra rtsa ba/_/spang
[\[177b.3\]]spos la'o dza TI ni/_/lus dang dgon pa ni rkuny+dza/_/rma yi byi dor/_nags tshal la/_/tru Ti/_'god dang cha shas dang /_/sug smel dang ni kun tu gdung /_/dus kyi tshad la'o tro Ti ni/_/kaT+pa la dang /_chu dang nya/_/twaSh+Ta 'phel dang /_/tshig mda' dang /_/bzo bo dang ni rnon po dang /_/
[\[177b.4\]]diSh+Ti khu tshur yongs su 'jal/_/diSh+Ta/_dus dang nyer bstan dag_/driSh+TaM skal pa/_triSh+Ti ni/_/mig dang lta ba blo rnams la/_/d+ha Ta dag tha 'jal ba la/_/d+ha TI dum bu dang ni gos/_/na tang sel/_TI/_lag pa'i rnam rol la/_/na Ta/_shol/_shai lU Sha/_/pha Ta/_gos
[\[177b.5\]]bzang yo byad skyong /_/pa Tu smra mkhas nad med dang /_/rno dang mkhas dang gsal ba dang /_/pa To la dang /_gdug dang sgrogs/_/pa TU/_phye ma rdo ba dang /_/spang leb/_bzhi mdo/_rma sogs 'ching /_/rgyal po'i lugs dang stan gyi dbye/_/pa tA rna rgyan rgyan
[\[177b.6\]]cha dang /_/rgya skyegs dang par byed pa la/_/baT+Ti gos kyi bye brag dang /_/ngag gi 'dren dang lug khur ma/_bum can shing /_/puSh+Ti 'phil dang gso bar byed/_/paT gdengs ka tshul 'chos dang /_/'gram la'o ngal gso byas pa la/_/pAN+TaM de nas pa Ta ni/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang ba rI
[\[177b.7\]]Ta/_/brti co ga kA dang /_ma TIr 'dod/_/b+ha Ta/_pA ma ra yi dbye/_/dpa' bo la'o b+ha Ti ni/_/rab tu 'gro ba nyid la'o/_/b+h+r-iSh+Ta zhes pa spyo ba dang /_/stong ba'i ba Ti kA la'o/_/muSh+Ti 'bras bu khu tshur bcings/_/m+liSh+Ta mi gsal smra ba la/_/nad brjod pa la m+liSh+TaM'o/_/yaSh+Ti mda' dang mtshon cha'i dbye/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]do shal mchog dang do shal che/_/'khri shing rgyal mtshan dbyug pa dang /_/b+hA rgI'o riSh+Ti ni/_/'byor pa dang ni ral gri la/_/riSh+TaM bde dang mi dge med/_/la Ta ral gri rab myos skyon/_/lA Ta yul dang gos phyogs la/_/bA Ta lam dang tshul la'o/_/bA DI khyim dang niSh+ku
[\[178a.2\]]Ta/_/bi Ta Shilga lan tshwa dang /_/grangs dang byi ba mda' dang sprul/_/biSh+Ti las byed bzang po dang /_/pe ta na dang mngag pa la/_/khruSh+Ti nyin mo tho rangs dang /_/'bras bu yongs su smyung ba la/_/bluSh+Ti 'byor pa rigs pa dang /_/nges pa la sogs 'bras bu la/_/sha TA ral pa seng ge la/_/
[\[178a.3\]]bring+TaM sprul dang sbyar ba dang /_/rnam par nges byas bskyed pa la/_/br-iSh+Ti sprul pa le'u la/_/s+phu Ta gsal dang rgyas dang khyab/_/s+phu Ti gsal dang sbal pa mo/_/rkang sgrogs la'o hriSh+Ta ni/_/s+phu long dga' skyes rab bsnun la'o/_/a ba Ta ni bu ga can/_/khron pa lhag ma dong la'o/_/ba Tu
[\[178a.4\]]dong dang khron pa la/_/bum pa ya ma ku Ta dang /_/lcags sgrog dang ni 'ching ba la/_/a riSh+Ta ni spu ba can/_/gzhol 'phyang bya rog kaM ka'o/_/a riSh+TaM ni bcas pa'i khyim/_/ta kra dge dang mi dge'i mtshan/_/ut+ga Ta ni shas che dang /_/dar ba bdo ba dregs pa'o/_/ka ra Ta ni 'tsho ba
[\[178a.5\]]smad/_/shing zan nyi ma bcu gcig pa/_/bya rog sil snyan khyad par dang /_/bram ze ngan dang le brgan rtsi/_/gdul dka' glang po'i 'gram pa dag_/karka Ta ni bud med kyi/_/byed pa khyim gyi bye brag dang /_/sbal pa dang ni bya la'o/_/karka TI ni skra can ma/_/shAl+ma li yi
[\[178a.6\]]'bras bu la'o/_/karta Ta ni 'dam dang ni/_/'dam rtsibs ka ra hA Tar grags/_/kA rba Ta ni ras bal dang /_/rgya skyegs la'o kI ka Ta/_/'jal 'tshed nor med rta la'o/_/kur+k+ku Ta ni ma ga d+ha/_/zangs kyi gtsug phud can dang ni/_/gding ba srad bu 'khru dang ni/_/ku ku
[\[178a.7\]]b+ha dang rdo can la'o/_/kuk+ku TI ni rna rgyan dbus/_/se gol dga' ba dman pa'i dbye/_/zangs kyi gtsug phud can ma dang /_/bud med log par spyod pa la/_/shA la b+hany+dzi ku ruN+DI/_/dz+nyi ny+dzi kA yi dbye kuN+Da/_/kr-i sI Ta ni dga' ba dang /_/chu dang sgra tshogs 'byung gnas
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dang /_/'phrog byed rnams so tsakrA Ta/_/dman dang khram pa dug sel ma/_/tsarba Ta ni khyab pa dang /_/rgya che ba dang thal lcag dang /_/sarba Ta la'o tsarba TI/_/phye ma'i bye brag la 'gyur ro/_/ci bi Ta ni sna leb dang /_/sna nyeg dang ni ri sri ta/_/tsi riN+TI legs gnas ma/_/lang tso gnyis
[\[178b.2\]]pa'i bud med dang /_/spyod pa me tog ngan pa la'o/_/dza ku TI ni dza ku TI/_/ri dang khyim la'o dza kU TaM/_/rgya mtsho yi ni lan tsha la/_/tri kU Ta ni dus bzangs la/_/tri pu Ta ni zhen pa dang /_/sa tI na ga la yang 'gyur/_/tri pu TA ni me tog gi/_/dbye ba sug smel dur byid la/_/traM go ni dra ba'i dbye/_/
[\[178b.3\]]b+hau tAny+tsa lI ma yang 'dod/_/tro hA Ta ni rngon pa dang /_/tshigs bcad rab dbye la 'dod do/_/bA ra Ti/_rta/_tsa ta ka/_/ro langs brtul zhugs can la'o/_/nirta Ta ni brtse med dang /_/gzhan snod khrag dang 'bras bu med/_/ni rkuT ni skyed tshal khyim/_/nya pa dang ni sgo glegs la/_/parba Ta ni phye
[\[178b.4\]]ma yi/_/rnam 'gyur dang ni sman bye brag_/pa riSh+Ta ni bsnyen bkur dang /_/rab tu gsal dang 'tshol ba la/_/brka TI ni sla k+Sha dang /_/sA ka li yi shing dag la/_/ras bal zhing las pA tra Ta/_/pits+tsha Ta/_mig_/ki TI rdul/_/pits+tsha TaM ni zha nye sogs/_/ba ra TA ni
[\[178b.5\]]dad pa gso/_/pa ra TA ni gan+d+ho lI/_/parba Ti ni rje rigs 'bru/_/bArba Ta ni chu srin la/_/bA ruN+Da ni byis pa la/_/b+hA kU Ta ni nya dang brag_/b+hArlu Ta ni rngas 'tsho ba/_/chags dang rang gi bud med phrad/_/b+hA bA Ta ni 'dod ldan dang /_/legs dang cha lugs lus dang gar/_/marka
[\[178b.6\]]Ta ni spre'u sdom/_/bud med kyi ni byed pa la/_/marka Ti ni spre'u mo/_/sdom mo ne tso dra ba dang /_/lag pa lag skyes khyad par la/_/mArka Ta ni sa bon dang /_/ka rka Ta yi rgyal ba tsi na/_/skyu ru ra dang ba lang dang /_/d+hu ka'i 'bras la'ang blta bar bya/_/mo tsa Ta ni tsan dan dang /_/nag
[\[178b.7\]]pos 'tsho dang chu shing gi/_/rus dang nye bar byed pa la/_/mo ra ti ni rtsa ba dang /_/aM ko Ti ni me tog la/_/mo ra Ta ni zhag bdun dang /_/'o ma mchog dang mUrbi kA/_/bal+lA Ta ni glu mkhan dang /_/'dod can ri mo tog tses 'tsho/_/bi ka Ta ni rnam gtsigs dang /_/yangs dang
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]mdzes dang mchog la'o/_/be ka Ta ni rnam mdzes dang /_/nya dang lang tshog sar pa la/_/be ra Ta ni 'dres dang dman/_/rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu la/_/shai mA Ta ni lha yi gzhi/_/seng ge skra skar mon yul lo/_/saM sr-iSh+Ta ni bAn+ti sogs/_/legs par dag dang
[\[179a.2\]]'grogs pa'o/_/harma Ta ni/_sA+o ma dang /_/khang bzang /_baM gaM/_rus sbal la'o/_/uts+tshing+ga nya'i dbye dang /_/skyes bu khro bar byed la'o/_/ga ra hA Ta chu skyes rtsa/_/sha l+ya/_dru dang me tog dbye/_/kA ma kU Ta tshogs can ma/_/rnam par 'khyams dang tshogs can dga'/_/
[\[179a.3\]]kar+p+pa pu Na ngo tsha med/_/smyo dang long bar byed pa la/_/ka TaM/_na TaM/_nya pa dang /_/gla sgang dang ni dmar po la'o/_/kuN+Da kI Ta long ba dang /_/ngag dang mngon shes g.yo ba dang /_/dzA ra dza yi bram ze ma/_/bu dang 'bangs mo 'dod can la/_/baT+ka rI Ta spang leb dang /_/
[\[179a.4\]]ral gri'i so dang brtul zhugs spyod/_/gA D+ha muSh+Ti ser sna dang /_/ral gri dang ni chu gri sogs/_/tsakra bA Ta/_kra ya dang /_/chu zheng mtha' dang /_gtsug phud shing /_/tsa tuH ShaSh+Ti grangs mang cha/_/nA ra ki Ta rdo ba'i bu/_/legs byin sha bi/_han+t+r-i la'o/_/
[\[179a.5\]]ba ra buSh+Ta gzhan 'dzin dang /_/gzhan gyis gsos dang tshong zong la/_/pra ti/_kr-iSh+TaM gsang ba dang /_/zhing rmed las ni gnyis pa la'o/_/pra ti shiSh+TaM zhes pa ni/_/so sor bshad dang bsngags pa la/_/parkA rA Ta zur mig dang /_/nyi ma gzhon nu
[\[179a.6\]]'od 'bar dang /_/mi'u thung chu 'dzin phang pa dang /_/kAn+ta dat+ta sen mo nyams/_/shi ba'i biSh+Ta ngan pa dang /_/pags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che/_/prAny+tsa lo ha rnams la'o/_/shru ti ka Ta/_sems mang sprul/_/siM ha ts+tsha Ta zhes pa ni/_/klu shing dang ni ge
[\[179a.7\]]sar la'o/_/da sha no ts+tshiSh+Ta zhes pa/_kha sbyor dang ni dbugs 'byin rten/_/pA tA tsam+pa Ta zhes pa/_/lcags dang 'khar ba rda zlum dang /_/'thab dang rked pa rin chen zegs/_/rlung dang /_rnga chen/_rgya shug la'o/_/Ta mtha'i sde'o//_//
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]Tha ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/stong pa bde byed mtho ba'i sgra/_/ka Tha thub pa nges brjod dbye/_/lhag par de klog de rig lha/_/kaN+Tha mgrin pa rtsib logs dang /_/zug rngu 'joms dang sgra dag la/_/kAN+thA phyogs dang rab 'gyur gnas/_/dus kyi 'jal byed mtshams
[\[179b.2\]]dang ni/_/thang shing la'o kASh+ThaM ni/_/bud shing kuN+Tha rmongs las med/_/kuSh+ThaM nad dang nad mtshon byed/_/goSh+Tha nang dang lto ba khyim/_/kU shUl khyem/_/ku shul dang rang gi ba'o/_/goSh+Thi 'dun sa gtam gyi sa/_/goSh+ThaM ba lang lha sa la 'dod/_/dz+yaSh+Tha zla ba'i bye brag dang /_/gtso bo dang ni rgan pa
[\[179b.3\]]la/_/dz+yeSh+Tha zhes pa skar ma dang /_/gtun shing sor mo'i khyad par la/_/duSh+Thu nyam chung tha ma la'o/_/niSh+ThA nges thob rdzogs pa dang /_/nyams dang mtha' dang phul byung dang /_/slong ba dang ni nyon mongs la'o/_/yA ShA ma'i gnas/_pA Tha klog_/pr-iSh+ThaM lus kyi rgyab phyi ma/_/
[\[179b.4\]]phraSh+Tha sngon 'gro gtso bo la/_/prASh+Tha gtum mo dang ni sman/_/baN+Tham+sa byas kun thob dang /_/gdung gi so dang mi'u thung /_/sha Tha ngan pa khram pa dang /_/bar du gnas pa dag la'o/_/shA Tha le lo rmongs pa la/_/shreSh+Tha mchog dang ku be ra/_/ShaSh+Thi drug rnams rdzogs
[\[179b.5\]]pa dang /_/'phrog byed kyi ni btsun mo la/_/ha Tha stobs kyi byed pa dang /_/pA ri pa li dag la'o/_/a praSh+Tha ni dus byis pa/_/a baSh+Tha ni rje rigs kyi/_/bu dang gnyis skyes yul phyogs la/_/a m+baSh+ThA ni gaM gA skyes/_/ma'i gnas dang ni tshogs la'o/_/ka niSh+Tha ni chung
[\[179b.6\]]ngu dang /_/no go na chung nyam chung dang /_/mthe'u chung dang ni sor mo la'o/_/ka ma Tha ni rus sbal la/_/ka ma ThaM ni snod bye brang /_/dza ra Tha ni sra pa dang /_/skya bo dang ni gseg mar brjod/_/narma Tha ni tsU tsu ka_/grong khyer la'o bra koSh+Tha/_/rgyas par byed dang ras bal gzhi/_/mi yi bdag po'i
[\[179b.7\]]khra ma'o/_/pra tiSh+Tha ni zhe sar 'dod/_/mchod sbyin sgrub dang gnas gzhi dang /_yi ge tshigs bcad dag la'o/_/ba riSh+Tha ni rab mchog mdzes/_/tin+ti ri la'o ba ri Sh+ThaM/_/na le shaM dang zangs la'o/_/ma kuSh+Tha ni bsrub pa dang /_/'bru dang phar 'gro dag la'o/_/la g+hiSh+Tha gos shin tu chung /_/
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]be kuSh+Tha ni/_/skra can dang /_/brgya byin la'o/_shrI kaN+Tha/_/ri sras bdag dang /_sgra ngan dang /_/dug sel la yang 'gyur ba'o/_/sA d+hiSh+Tha 'phags shin tu brtan/_/ka la kaN+Tha pi ka dang /_/phug ron dang pa/_sgra snyan dang /_/kaM
[\[180a.2\]]ka ri dgas khyad par la/_/kA la/_pr-iSh+Tha/_rna ba gzhu/_/dan+ta sha tha skyur rtsi dang /_/ka pit+Tha dang /_mtshon gyi las/_/nA rAng+ga dang ts+tsa kri ka'o/_/nI la kaN+Tha dA t+yu h+'+ao/_/gyol po dang ni rab g.yo dang /_/ki ni ka la piM ka dang /_/ser po'i snying po'i can dag la'o/_/
[\[180a.3\]]kA la kaN+Tha bzhin du 'jug_/pU ti kASh+ThaM thang shing dang /_/lha shing dang ni/_sa skyes la'o/_/sU tra kaN+Tha phug ron dang /_/gnyis skyes khany+dza ri Ta la/_/hA ri kaN+Tha/_khu byug dang /_/mgrin pa do shal bcas la'o/_/Tha mtha'i sde'o//_//Da ni ri yi
[\[180a.4\]]mgon po dang /_/skrag pa'i sgra la'ang blta bar bya/_/aN+Da bya dang /_nya sogs mdzod/_/'dom gyi sgo nga /_brtson 'grus la/_/I DA rtogs pa bu mo dag_/i lA bzhin du sa ba lang /_/kAN+Da sde chen/_mda' dang don/_/sdong bu/_skabs dang chu/_dbyug pa/_/
[\[180a.5\]]mtshams dang /_kut+bA/_sdong po dang /_/'phrog dang /_smad dang bdag ldan ma/_/bu dang dzA rA ta rnams so/_/kuN+Di spyi blugs lo/_/kuN+DaM/_lha yi dra ba'i gzhi/_/pha ma yang ni 'dod pa'o/_/kr-I DA/_rtsed mo smod brnyas dang /_/ku rel 'o kro Da ni/_/dal ba
[\[180a.6\]]dang ni phag pa'o/_/kro DaM phag dang bak+Shas la/_/khaN+Da phyed ma bur shing gi/_/rnam 'gyur nor bu sun 'byin la/_/ga Da/_nya dang par la 'gro/_/gu Du/_sgur rgyab/_/bu raM la/_/gaN+Da/_bre dang sbyor ba'i dbye/_/bse ru dang ni khur tshos dang /_/mchog dang rab dpa'
[\[180a.7\]]mtshan ma dang /_/rta dang rgyan dang chu bor la'o/_/gu Da glang po'i go cha dang /_/phru ba bur shing rnam 'gyur la'o/_/gu Da/_sgu tI/_ri lu dang /_/ma d+h+wA na la yang 'dod pa'o/_/goN+Da pA ma ra'i dbye ba/_/rgan po'i lte ba la brjod do/_/tsaN+Da drag po lha min dbye/_/gshin
[\[180b\]]
