[\[180b.1\]]rje'i 'bangs dang shin tu khro/_/tsaN+Da nor 'phrog ma dang ni/_/dung gi me tog can dag la/_/tsi N+DI ri yi bu mo dang /_/'tshe byed btsun mo khro byed ma/_/tsU DA gdu bu'i dbye ba dang /_/gtsug phud dang ni ba Da b+hU/_/tsau Da yul dang /_gos bye brag_/dza Da/_rmongs/_lkugs
[\[180b.2\]]grang bas gzir/_/kuN+Du sman la'o b+hA Da ni/_/khu tshur sogs dang yang dag 'jal/_/rtsa la sogs dar rdeg pa la/_/tA DI thal mo dang ni shing /_/daN+Da gtum mo'i cha shas kyis/_/yongs bskor dmag dang dpung bye brag_/nga rgyal dbye ba gshin rje 'dul/_/
[\[180b.3\]]mngon pa'i nga rgyal srub dang rta/_/zur gyi dbyug pa mtshams dang ni/_/gza' gdon mi bdag gdugs dang ni/_/la gu Da la 'dod pa'o/_/nA DI/_sbubs rtsa rma rnams kyi/_/gaN+Da/_tur+b+ba dag dang ni/_/skad cig drug gi dus dang ni/_/spyod pa dang ni/_ku ha na'o/_/ni
[\[180b.4\]]DaM gnas dang rigs su 'gro/_/nye ba dang ni snga ba bcas/_/baN+Da blo dkar baN+DA dang /_/baN+Da kad+hI'i bdag dang dkar/_/biN+Di lus kyi cha ngag dang /_/gnas dang si h+la ka'o/_/piN+Da nas las skyes pa'o/_/gong bur byas pa dag la'o/_/piN+Di rgyun dang stobs po
[\[180b.5\]]la/_/khyem gyi cha dang 'tsho ba dang /_/piN+Di A lA bu dang ni/_/'bra go dang ni sbos bye brag_/pi DA 'joms dang brtse ba dang /_/thang shing dang ni mgo'i me tog_/tsaN+DA rigs rnams tshogs pa la/_/tsaN+Da lag sogs bor ba la/_/b+haN+Da snod dang /_rtsa ba chod
[\[180b.6\]]pa yi/_/nor dang /_rgyan dang rta yi rgyan/_/chu klung snod la'ang 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/kuN+Da grul bum sbal mo la'o/_/maN+Da snying po mjug ma dang /_/raN+Da dang ni rgyan dag la/_/maN+DA ma ma'oN+DaM ni/_/phal pa'i dbye ba la yang ngo /_/muN+Da/_sgra gcan mgo bo dang /_/lha ma
[\[180b.7\]]yin gyi bye brag la/_/raN+DA bya ba'i lo ma dang /_/sman dang bi d+ha ba la'o/_/byA Da phyug la 'tshe dang sprul/_/shuN+Da myos dang gya tshom la/_/buN+Da chang dang rje rigs dang /_/sdong bu glang po'i lag pa la/_/shuN+DA chu yi glang mo la/_/shauN+Da myos pa mngon par brjod/_/shoN+Di
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]zegs ma tsa bi ka_/Sha Da btung ba'i khyad par dang /_/pad+ma sogs kyi tshal la'o/_/ShaN+Da/_bang rim bdag_/po sogs/_/k+She Da sgra dang ka ra la/_/rna bar byur dang rtsub pa dang /_/'khyog po'i k+She DA glang mo dang /_/dpa' bo rnams kyi seng
[\[181a.2\]]ge'i sgra/_/rgyab kyi zug rngu la yang ngo /_/dAk+Sh+we DaM/_arka dmar po'i 'bras/_/dbyangs dang me tog du ra sang /_/ka ra Na Ni sgrang rtsi can/_/pA si ka raN+Da ba dang /_/'dab chags da lA Ta ka'o/_/kuSh+maN+Da ni tshogs kyi dbye/_srin bu karkA ru dang mang la/_/kuSh+mAN+Di ni
[\[181a.3\]]gtum mo sman/_/ko daN+Da ni smin ma gzhu/_/yul gyi bye brag la yang ngo /_/gA ru Di ni bstan bcos dang /_/dug dang ma ra ka ta la/_/ta raN+Da ni/_snum can dang /_/mchil pa/_srad bu bcings pa dang /_/dngos po dang ni grub la'o/_/tin+ti Da ni lha min dbye/_/
[\[181a.4\]]tin+ti Di ni gshin rje'i bran/_/shing dbye mu tsany+tsa yi shing /_/dra ba'i Da ni dbye ba'i sgo/_/tshang gi khyad par mkha' dag la/_/nirguN+DA ni tra Ni kA_/sngon po'i rtags dang chung ba dang /_/'dzin dang /_kar+hA Ta ka la'o/_/pi tsiN+Da ni sra ba dang /_/phyugs kyi yan lag
[\[181a.5\]]la yang ngo /_/pu T+yaN+Da sprul ri dgas dri/_/gan+d+ha kI Ta ka la'o/_/pra kaN+Da ni bkra shis dang /_/rtsa ba yal ga'i mtshams shing dang /_/yal ga'i tshogs pa la yang ngo /_/pra tsaN+Da ni rab gdung dang /_/ngan 'bab/_lugs dang dpa' bo'i lag_/ba raN+Da ni chod
[\[181a.6\]]pa dang /_/yu ba gaN+Da ka dang ni/_/bar gyi kha khyer dag la'o/_/bArtaN+Da ni mche can bya/_/pA ruN+Di ni sgo'i piN+Da/_/bA ruN+Da thabs mig dri ma/_/gaN+Di sta yi rgyal po la/_/khrus kyi snod dang tha ba la/_/b+he ruN+DA ni 'dab chags mo/_/lha mo dbye dang 'jigs ma la/_/
[\[181a.7\]]mArtaN+Da ni gtum mo'i 'od/_/phag la'o ma raN+Da ni sprul/_/lam dang /_ba byung dkyil 'khor la/_/bi tsaN+DA ni ri skegs dang /_/ral gri gzhon ma gnas la 'jug_/bi taN+Da ni rlung dbye dang /_/ka ra bI rI rdo yi ming /_/kats+tshi sA ka sAdz+nyA+e la'o/_/shi khaN+Da ni/_rma bya
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]gtsug_/sa piN+Da ni bgo skal dang /_/gong bu dang bcas nu ma la/_/sa raN+Da ni sa ra Ta/_/khram pa rgyan gyi khyad par la/_/a po gaN+Da byis pa can/_/lus ma tshad dang shin tu 'jigs/_/tsakra pA Da ri'i dbye ba/_/tsakra pA DAM zlum po'o/_/dza ga raN+Da chu sgyur
[\[181b.2\]]ba/_/chu rdul dang ni sprul dag la/_/de ba tA rA lha yi nyi/_/mtho ris sgang byed dbyangs ldan ma/_/bA tAH_khu Da rlung dmar dang /_/bat+yA lcags sgrog mjug ma can/_/gnas tsam la yang blta bar bya/_/Da mtha'i sde'o//_//b+hA ni rda dang yon tan med/_/mi zad pa
[\[181b.3\]]yi sgra la'o/_/g+hU D+ha dben dang gsang ba sgrib/_/kAD+ha 'che ba 'dod pa la/_/dr-i D+ha sbom po stobs ldan la//dr-i D+haM/_bA D+ha/_bra ba/_D+ha/_/mA D+hi 'dab sogs bcom pa dang /_/nor dang /_zhan dang gsal ba la/_/mU D+ha le lo/_/rmongs pa la/_/rA D+ha tshangs
[\[181b.4\]]pa bzang dang mdzes/_/ba D+hi des dang dam bca' la/_/dau D+ha rgyas dang skyes pa la/_/khyub+hA rgya che rnam pa bkod tshogs/_/ShaN+D+ha/_sgrib/_char skyes bu bcings/_/so D+ha bzod pa dang nus pa la/_/sho zwa yang ni bzod pa la/_/azlu zwa ni dbang phyug la'o/_/azlu T+wA ni
[\[181b.5\]]btsun mo dang /_/kr-i ta pA ban+h+ya la'o/_/A ShA D+ha ni brtul zhugs kyi/_/dbyug pa zla ba/_dri ma slong /_/a bU D+ha ni/_phung po sbo ma/_/u bo D+ha ni bkod pa tshogs/_/pra gI D+ha ni brtan dang dga'/_/pra mI D+ha Ni/_dri chu 'thug_/pra rU D+ha ni rtsa ba bcings/_/mkhregs
[\[181b.6\]]pa dang ni gur la'o/_/bA rU D+ha ni rgyags dang me/_/gos dang g.yo ba sgo glegs la/_/bi g+hu D+ha ni/_smad dang sbed/_/bi rU D+ha ni sol ba skyed/_/sa mU dA ni sarba dang /_/b+hug+na/_nye bar 'gro ba dang /_/phung po byas pa'o/_/saM rU D+ha/_/dar ma dang ni myu gu la'o/_/a
[\[181b.7\]]d+h+ya ru D+ha/_zhon pa dang /_/lhag pa la ste rtags gsum pa/_/D+ha mtha'i sde rdzogs so//_//Na ni gtan la phab dang shes/_/Nu ni phra dang bram ze'i dbye/_/a Ni mchog tu mkhas pa dang /_/phur bu mtshams dang zur la'o/_/uSh+Na chad pa gdung ba dang /_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]bsregs pa dang ni mkhas pa'o/_/Ur+Na mdzod spu lug sogs pa la/_ka Na/_pra zegs so ba'i cha/_/kaNA dzi ra bi spa li/_/chu srin dang ni mak+Shi kA_/kar+Na/_rna ba pr-i thA'i bu/_/mdog bzang dang ni lta ba la/_kA Na/_mau kr-i/_lA ba dang /_/lta
[\[182a.2\]]ba'o ki Na/_rma mtshan rtags/_/pra no rma dang yon tan la'o/_/kIr+NaM khebs dang yongs khyab dang /_/'tshe ba mngon par brjod pa'o/_/ku Ni khyi dang gzir ba la/_/kr-iSh+Na khyab 'jug srid sgrub/_spre'u/_/rgyas pa la'o/_kr-iSh+Ni ni/_/na le shaM dang /_lcags la'o/_/kr-i Shu/_
[\[182a.3\]]dzrau pa dI nI dang /_/ba mo/_/d+hU rA/_pispa li/_/ko Na mchi mar dbyug pa dang /_/rol mo'i dbye ba karka skyes/_/pi waM la sogs sbyor thabs dang /_/phyogs gcig dang ni khyim rnams so/_/ga Na tshogs dang 'dzoms byed grangs/_/dmag gi rab tu dbye ba la/_/gu Na gzugs
[\[182a.4\]]sogs/_snying stobs sogs/_/rig pa sogs dang ljang gu sogs/_/'dod dang gtso bo min pa dang /_/mtshams sogs/_thag pa/_maurbI dang /_/spyang ki'i lto ba rnams la'o/_/geSh+Nu gar dang glu len la/_/g+h+r-i NA/_snying rje smad pa la/_/g+hA NaM/_sna dang /_g+hA ta la'o/_/
[\[182a.5\]]tsUr+NaM phye mar gyur pa la/_/tsUr+Na k+Sho da 'gyur byed dbye/_/tsur+NA dri yi sbyor ba la/_/dzer+Na shing dang cha shas zla ba/_gter/_/dziSh+Na/_sa dang /_dbang po mi/_/rgyal byed la'o dzI r+NaM ni/_/smin dang rgan dang mchog tu rgas/_/ri Ni/_bU ga gdug pa'i lha/_/thos pa dang ni mkhregs
[\[182a.6\]]pa la/_/tI k+ShA 'gyur byed lhag par rno/_/rno ba'i bdag nyid la sogs la/_/tIk+Sh+NaM lcags dang dug dang ni/_/rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa 'thab pa dang /_/nas kyi rtse dang swo ka ka'o/_/tU Ni sngon mo/_tU Na chags/_/triSh+Na sred dang 'dod pa la/_/tA NaM skyob dang bsrub pa dang /_/skyong
[\[182a.7\]]dang skyob par byed pa la/_/rIr+NaM/_bcom dang 'jigs pa la/_/deSh+Nu 'joms byed gdul dka' la/_/dru Na sdig pa bung pa la/_/dru NI rus sbal mo dang ni/_/chu yi sbal mo la yang ngo /_/dru NaM ral gri la yang ngo /_/dro Na bya rog_/kr-i pI'i bdag_/lung pa bzhi mdo 'brog
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]la'o/_/dro NI shing dang 'bab 'bab dang /_/ba lang za dang sa dang ni/_/shing /_khyim ri dang mtshams dang ni/_/tshong gi dbye ba la yang ngo /_/d+har+Na gser dang mchod sbyin dang /_/pa Na/_zong dang /_glad dang sbad/_/brgyad cu dang ni ba rA Ta/_/kAR+ShA pa Na dang ni nor/_/tshong dang
[\[182b.2\]]shing rta cho lo dang /_/tha snyad la yang dran par bya/_/khu tshur bcings pa la yang ngo /_/par+Na/_ljang gu/_kiM shu ka_/par+NaM 'dab ma/_lo ma la/_/sAR+Sh+Ni zhes pa phyi yi cha/_/dmag rgyab sa 'og_/smyo ba la/_/prAr+Na chog dang gang ba la/_/prA NA gnas dang prA Na ni/_/rlung mchog
[\[182b.3\]]rlung dang g.yo ba la/_/prA NaM/_snyan ngag 'tsho ba dang /_/po la dang ni/_gang ba la/_/pha ni/_bu raM byed pa la/_/pA Ni/_bkod pa dang ni ngag_/pA Ni sprin dang /_rin thang la/_/b+hU Na/_bud med mngal dang byis/_/ma Ni rin chen rtags kyi rtse/_/rwa dang mgrin pa nu ma dang /_/a liny+dza
[\[182b.4\]]ra/_mu tig sogs/_/mo Na pa Ta kut+sa ka_/nags dang /_chu srin kum+b+hI ra/_/ma k+Shi ka/_/rkang pa'i rting pa/_sprul za ma tog_/ra Na zur/_sgra/_'thab pa la'o/_/ra Na/_rdul dang /_nag po dang /_bar+pa Ta la par+pa Ni/_/bstod pa gzugs/_dud 'gro/_grags yon tan dang /_/chags
[\[182b.5\]]dang bram ze la sogs dang /_/dkar po sogs dang mdzes pa dang /_/la ba khra bo brtul zhugs dbyangs/_/shing dang /_cha byad/_mdog mig go/_/bA Na sa yi bu dang /_rta/_/rta yi lus dang 'ba' zhig pa/_/mdangs dang dz+hiN+Da can la'o/_/biSh+Nu sred med bu nyi ma/_/blin nor
[\[182b.6\]]lha'i dbye ba dang /_/pi wang dang ni glog dag la/_/pr-iSh+Na yA da ba dang lug_/sA ShaN+Di dang gtum pa la/_/be Ni chu klung ri mo dang /_/skra bcings pa yi khyad par dang /_/lha la sogs pa la yang ngo /_/be Nu 'od ma mi bdag dbye/_/shA Na phyed 'degs zhing las dang /_/
[\[182b.7\]]'tshe ba dang ni sog le dang /_/grang ba skyob pa'i khyad par la/_/shA NI/_snyigs dang chung ngu dang /_/rnam par snyigs pa rnams la'o/_/sho Na dga' ba chu klung dmar/_/ngang pa bya khra rma bya dang /_/rta dmar la'o shrA NA ni/_kA cho ma'i/_/thug pa lan brjod bya ldan/_/shrA NaM/_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'tshed pa shre Ni ni/_/phreng ba dang ni khrus la'o/_/s+thA Nu bzo yi tshogs dang ni/_/'phrog byed brtan pa nges pa'o/_/s+thu NA lcags kyi gzugs brnyan dang /_/ka ba dag la'o k+Sha Na ni/_/dga' ston dus dbye/_skabs dang tshigs/_/a b+hI k+ShA nges pa dang /_/
[\[183a.2\]]shin tu'i don la'o a ru Na/_/skya rengs dang ni nyi ma dang /_/ru rta/_mi gsal dmar ba dang /_/thun mtshams dmar ba chu 'dra dang /_/dmar dang ser skya 'dres pa la'o/_/a ru Na ni dur byid dang /_/bong nga /_sngo bsangs le brgan la/_/a ra Ni ni mi bsrub dang /_/
[\[183a.3\]]srub par byed pa'i dbyug pa la/_/in+d+ra Ni ni bde sogs ma/_sman/_/sin+d+hu wAr byed pa la/_/byA ra NaM ni ma mo stong /_/I k+Sha naM ni mthong dang blta/_/u Sha NA ni zegs ma la/_/u Sha NaM ni/_sman/_na le sham/_/e ShANi ni rma dang lam/_/rjes su 'brang dang srang gi dbye/_/
[\[183a.4\]]e Sha Ni ni lcags mda' dang /_/rjes su 'tshol dang sngar rjes can/_/kaM ka NaM ni lag pa'i rgyan/_/lag pa'i srad bu mgo thod la/_/kar+t+ri ni ni/_rtsa'i bye brag_/chu yi lo ma la yang ngo /_/ka ra Na Ni rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs dang ni rjes skyes la/_/ka ra Ni ni
[\[183a.5\]]sgrub po mchog_/lus dang lus gnas las dang ni/_/bya ba dang ni dbang po zhing /_/byis pa'i smra ba dbyangs kyi lus/_/do shal kun tu 'jug pa dang /_/bya ba'i khyad par la yang 'dod/_/ka ru Na dang /_ka ru NA/_/brtse ba ro nyams shing la'o/_/ka ru Na ni dbang dang
[\[183a.6\]]ni/_/lta ba glang mo dag la'o/_/ka l+ya Na ni dge ba dang /_/gser dang bkra shis mi zad la/_/kA ka NI ni bzhi cha dang /_/srang dang tshad kyi dbyug pa la/_/kA ka Ni ni guny+dza dang /_/pa Ta tsam dang /_mdze'i bye brag_/kA ra NaM ni bsnun dang bsad/_/gzir dang gnod
[\[183a.7\]]pa'i byed pa la/_/kA ra NA ni 'bad pa la/_/karma NaM ni 'tshe ba'i las/_/gzhan lus rab 'jug shes pa dang /_/sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor la/_/kurbA Na ni glang mi byed/_/kr-i pa Na ni smod dang 'bu/_/kr-i pA Na ni/_ral gri la/_/mtshan dang byed po kr-i pA Ni/_kong+ga
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]Na ni yul bye brag_/kong+ka NaM ni mtshon bye brag_/ko kar+Na ni dre'u dang /_/sbrul dang ri dgas dbye ba dang /_/tshogs kyi khyad par mthe bo dang /_/ming med tshad sman mUrbi kA_/gra ha Na ni mi bdag thob/_/rang gir byas dang byed pa la/_/bza' dang /_nyer tshags/_phyag
[\[183b.2\]]'tshal dang /_/rkyen dang gus pa dag la yang /_/grA ma NI ni/_nA si ta/_/gtso bo bdag po longs spyod can/_/tshogs can/_grong dpon/_rim rnams la'o/_/tsa ra NaM ni/_a brku/_/'gros dang rin dang rkang pa rigs/_/tsA ra NaM ni 'khor ba dang /_/mtha' dang /_rgyu ba
[\[183b.3\]]za ba dang /_/zi ra/_go snyod mtshal dang ni/_/sau brtsal 'dod do/_/tA ra Ni ni sgrol byed nyi/_/gzhon nu ma dang gru mkhan la/_/ta ru Na ni na chung dang /_/gsar pa 'khyog po'i me tog dang /_/ce spyang chen po dag la'o/_/dak+Shi Na ni/_thang shing dang /_/g.yon min
[\[183b.4\]]gzhan 'dun rjes su 'jug_/a pA tsi las byung la 'dod/_/dak+Shi Na ni mchod sbyin/_sbyin/_/rab gnas a pA tsI la'o/_/dur+b+ba r+N+Na ni bye ma can/_/gzung dang mdog ngan la yang brjod/_/daurbA NaM ni mr-iSh+Ti'i 'dab/_/dUrbA'i khu ba la yang ngo /_/dru g+ha Na ni thob
[\[183b.5\]]dang /_/pa ra/_sU d+ha 'tshe ba la/_/dra bi NaM ni pha rol gnon/_/gser dang 'byor pa la yang ngo /_/d+ha ra NaM ni 'dzin pa dang /_/nga rgyal dbye ba dag la'o/_/d+ha ra NI ni sa la'o/_/d+ha ru Ni ni chu dang ni/_/mtho ris dang ni mchog la gnas/_/d+harmA Na ni sprul bye brag_/rkang
[\[183b.6\]]'thung khyad par dag la yang /_/d+haR+Sha NI ni rigs tshogs ma/_/d+haR+Sha NaM ni mdzod dang dag/_/d+hA ra NI ni sangs rgyas gsung /_/sngags kyi bye brag zlos gar la/_/d+hi Sha Na ni lha'i slob dpon/_/d+hi Sha NA ni blo dang gnyid/_/ni rmA NaM ni sprul pa dang /_/snying po dang ni
[\[183b.7\]]bkod pa dang /_/sa many+dza pa zhes pa la/_/niR+Ya Ni ni ni nges 'byung thar/_/mdzod dang a/_pAng+ka dang bcings/_/nirbA Ni ni myang 'das thar/_/nub dang glang po skyes bu dam/_/niH_shre Ni ni them skas dang /_/'bra go'i rkang 'thung dag la'o/_/ba tror+Ni ni sbyangs pa'i
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dar/_/bat+t+ror+Na ni/_shA na'i shing /_/bak+Shi NI ni kun 'gro dang /_/da ltar ba dang nyin mtshan ldan/_/phyogs mtha' dang ni nya gang ba/_/yal ga can gyi dbye ba la/_/pu rA kA kaR+ShA pa Na'o/_/pu rA NaM ni mtshan nyid lnga/_/dus rings lon pa'i rdzas la
[\[184a.2\]]brjod/_/pU ra Na ni rdzogs byed dang /_/ba skong phye ma'i khyad par la/_/pU ra NI/_shal+ma li/_/gos dang rtsom dang srad bu'i dbye/_/phra g+ha Na ni zangs bum dang /_/a lin+da dang lcags tho la/_/bra ma Na ni/_bden smra dang /_/rgyu mtshan gtan tshigs bstan bcos dang /_/
[\[184a.3\]]lcags dang gcig skyob ra ba 'jal/_/rgyu mtshan 'di snyed ces pa la'o/_/pra ba Na ni rab tu sbyangs/_/'bod dang rim gzhol/_sa/_skad cig_/bzhi mdo la'o/_pra be ni/_/'dres dang rul ba dag la'o/_/prok+Sha Ni ni khrus dang 'ching /_/ba ra Na ni ra ba la'o/_/ba ru Na
[\[184a.4\]]ni tshul la'o/_/ba ru NaM ni shing dbye dang /_/lo ma kha ba chu bdag dang /_/nyi ma dang ni chu la'o/_/bA ra Na ni glang por bshad/_/bA ra NaM ni dgag pa la/_/bA ru NI nub phyogs dang /_/mai re ya dang durbA tri/_/prAh+ma NI ni rten byed ma/_/gnyis skyes chung ma gnyis
[\[184a.5\]]skyes ma/_/pr-ik+kA rnams so/_/prAh+ma Na/_/de bzhin prAh+ma Ni zhes pa/_/sngags rigs dang ni gnyis skyes tshogs/_/b+ha ra Ni ni dmar po dam/_/b+ha ra NAM ni rigs dang bla/_/mi bzad mche ba/_b+hI Sha Na/_/shal+la Shi'i bcud b+hI Sha NaM/_/b+h+ra ma Ni ni tsher ma dang /_/dbang phyug rol
[\[184a.6\]]pa g.yo ba la'o/_/mat+ku Na ni rmar dang /_/kun tu dor ba'i mi dang ni/_/so med glang po che dang ni/_/mthon po dang ni be ta la'o/_/ma sr-i Na ni karka sha /snum pa dang ni 'jam pa la/_/ma sri NA ni k+Shu mA la'o/_/mArga Ni ni slong ba dang /_/mda' dang sems can Shats+nya la'o/_/
[\[184a.7\]]yan+t+ra NaM ni nges dang 'ching /_/srung la'o/_pa To la'i rtsa ba/_/ra pa NaM do/_ra ma Na/_/dga' ba dang ni rtsub pa la/_/ra pa NaM ni sgra sgrogs sgra/_/ro Sha Na ni khro byed dang /_/gzhan skyon sbyin dang gser brdar ba'o/_/ro hi Ni pa skar ma dang /_/rna ba'i nad kyi dbye ba dang /_/dmar
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]po so ma bla dang /_/ka Tu ro h+ni Ni la'o/_/la ba NaM ni gnyis 'thung dbye/_/la ba Na ni ro bcud bsrung /_/rgya mtsho'i dbye ba mdzes dang gsal/_/lak+Sha NaM ni ming mtshan ma/_/la k+Sha NaM ni dga' byed dpun/_/lak+Sha ma NaM ni/_zla ba dbang /_/lag+h+ra khaM ni ming mtshan byed/_/
[\[184b.2\]]lag+h+ra Na ni mtsho skyes ma/_/'od ldan ma dang dpal ldan ma'o/_/bi ba NaM ni/_tshong khang zong /_/A pa Na ni tshong zong la/_/bi ShA Ni ni phyugs kyi rwa/_/mche ba/_sna dang /_so dag la'o/_/bi ShA Ni ni lug rwA can/_/sha ra NaM ni/_srung dang 'ching /_/sa ra NaM ni khyim gyi g.yabs/_/
[\[184b.3\]]saM g+ha NaM ni sna'i dri ma/_/shiM g+hA NaM ni lcags kyi rtsa/_/'ching bu'i snod la'ang blta bar bya/_/shra ma Na ni sdom brtson dbye/_/smad pa'i 'tsho ba legs mthong dang /_/snag tsha/_chang ma/_dge slong ma'o/_/shra ba Na ni rgyu skar la/_/shra ma NaM ni/_rna ba thos/_/shrA ba Na Ni
[\[184b.4\]]mA si dang /_/saSh+Da dang /_da d+h+yA lI'o/_/shrI bar+NI ni bum pa can dang /_/gam+b+ha ri dang /_pad+ma dang /_me srub byed pa rnams la'o/_saM/_kAr+Ni ni 'dres ma dang /_/ma dag pa'o pa ra Ni/_/phreng ba dang ni lam la'o/_/sA ra Na ni 'bod sgrogs kyi/_/blon po dang ni chang nad
[\[184b.5\]]la'o/_/sA ra NI ni 'bab chu chung /_/rab tu 'bab pa dag la'o/_/su bar+N+Ni ni gtsug phud gser/_/bya khyung dang ni phreng ba la/_/su bar+NA ni pad+ma can/_/bya khyung gi ni ma la'o/_/su bar+Na ni gser ldan ma/_/a gu ru nag sog po'i dbye/_/su bar+NaM ni/_mdog gser
[\[184b.6\]]zho/_/su She Na ni seng ge dang /_/mgrin bzang rig pa lag nyid la/_/ha ra NaM ni gru yi rdzas/_/lus kyi do shal lag pa snying /_/ha ri Na ni ri dgas skye/_/hi ra Ni ni ljang gu dang /_/ri dgas bud med kun spyod dbye/_/haR+Sha Na ni gzer gyi sa gzugs/_/rab dga'
[\[184b.7\]]lto ba'i nad bye brag_/lha la dad pa las byung ba/_/he ru Nu ni bud med rigs/_/bud med rdul dang sha tI la/_/hi ra Na dang /_ti ra N+ya/_/lte ba gser dang khu ba'o/_/k+She pa NI ni gru'i dbyug pa/_/dra ba'i khyad par dag la yang /_/ang+gA r-i NI/_ha san+tI/_/nyi ma dang ni bor
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ba la/_/A tarba Na NaM tshim pa dang /_/kun tu byug pa la yang ngo /_/A thar+b+ya Na srid bsrungs shes/_/bram ze dang ni mdun na 'don/_/A ro ha NaM them skas dang /_/yang dag 'dzeg dang rab tu 'dzegs/_/ut+k+She pa ni rlung yab dang /_/so ba nyed
[\[185a.2\]]dang dngos po la/_/skyugs dang drungs nas 'byin dang sel/_/steng du 'dren dang /_'byin la 'dod/_/kA me gu Na chags pa dang /_longs spyod dang ni yul la yang /_/kA R+Sha pa NA snying po dang /_/rko bar byed pa la yang ngo /_/hrIr+Na par+Na 'bra go shing /_/bi tsu marda'i shing
[\[185a.3\]]la'o/_/tsU Da ma Ni mgo'i rin chen/_/bya rog mchu dang 'bras bu la/_/dzu hu pA Na me 'bras/_gu/_/taN+Du rI Na 'bu dang ni/_/gshin rje'i yul la/_brka ba/_/te la par+Ni ri skyes dang /_/sih+ma dang ni dpal gyi gnas/_/dAk+ShA ya ni bgrod dka' ma/_/snar ma dang ni shing
[\[185a.4\]]sgrol ma la/_/de ba ma Ni zhes pa ni/_/zhi ba nor bu gaustu b+ha/_/rgyal po'i mgrin par 'khyil pa la/_/nArle ya Na mi nyams dang /_/'jigs byed dkar mo sred med ma/_/ni ga ra Na zas dang mid/_/ni rU pa Ni rnam spyad dang /_/snang ba dang ni lta ba la/_/ni sti ra NaM nges
[\[185a.5\]]sgrol dang /_/thabs dang nges par 'gro ba la/_/niH_sa ra Ni sgo dang grol/_/nges 'byung thabs dang 'chi ba la/_/ba rI ra Na rus sbal dang /_/dbyug pa pa Ta/_bla Ta ka_/sarba rla Na/rdo leb dang /_/mad dang la bdag dang ni/_/lo ma phye ma'i khu ba dang /_/dkar po dri zhim
[\[185a.6\]]tshogs rnams la/_/pa ra pa Ni bshad pa dang /_/chos kyi sbyin pa be'u la/_/pa rA ya NaM lhur len dang /_/mngon 'dod dang ni rten la'o/_/pA rA ma Ni pha rol bgrod/_/yang dag kun chags la bar ba dang /_/bI lu/_bar+NA mUr+b+ra dang /_/gzugs dang sman gyi dbye ba
[\[185a.7\]]la/_/puSh+ka ri ni mtsho skyes dang /_/lag ldan dang ni chu'i gzhi la/_/pra ti pa Na 'du byed dang /_/nye bar 'dzin dang 'dod pa la/_/pra bA ra NaM 'gog pa dang /_/'dod bya sbyin dang sgrib pa la/_/pA ra bA Na ya lad dang /_/go cha thams cad la yang ngo /_/mI nA mI Na rkang
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]'theng dang /_/sprul gyi shun pa dag la'o/_/rak+Sha ra tu'i l+ri dang /_/bA la sha yi me tog rdul/_/rA ga tsUN+Da dran pa dang /_/khrag dang bya ma so rgyug pa'o/_/re re hA Na/_phyugs bdag mkha'/_/lam+ba kar+Na ra dang ni/_/ang+ko tha dang sa skyes la'o/_/pi dA ra Ni 'thab
[\[185b.2\]]pa dang /_/'byang ba dang ni spyo ba la/_/bai te rA NI zhes bya ba/_/yi dgas chu klung srin po'i ma/_/shi ra pA Ni mda' yi ltong rka_/_/sA ye kyang dmangs 'tsho ba'o/_/si la ri Ni spyod pa yi/_/dbye ba dang ni ta kri'i dbye/_/rin po che dang mal+li kA/_/ba spu'i phreng ba la
[\[185b.3\]]yang brjod/_/sa mI ra Na rlung dang ni/_/pri ba me tog bam la'o/_/saM pa ra NaM 'khor ba dang /_/slar yang 'gro dang ba lang grong /_/lam po che dang 'thab mo rtsom/_/bsru ba dang ni 'chol ba'o/_/ha sti kar+Na sa lA ba/_/e raN+Da dang tshogs kyi dbye/_/a ba gra
[\[185b.4\]]ha NaM zhes pa/_/lo sar 'go dang ma rtsom pa/_/a ba hA ra Ne zhes so/_/'byung po 'bebs dang any+tsal mchod/_/a pa tA ra NA zhes pa/_/kun bshad cha dang mchod pa'i tshogs/_/pa ri b+hASha NaM zhes pa/_/smod dang nyer dmigs nyid dang smra/_/bra birla ra Na zhes pa/_/
[\[185b.5\]]'dzin sa dang 'khrugs pa dag la'o/_/moN+DA ka bar+Na pa shing /_/kash+yan ka dang a rA li/_/ka bA ta ra dag la'o/_/maN+DU ka pir+Ni zhes pa/_/le brgan tshangs ma pa yang lce'o/_/mat+ta nA ra r+Na zhes pa/_/myos shing gdul dka'i glang po dang /_/khang bzang dang ni tshad gang gi ba
[\[185b.6\]]raN+Da dang phyi rten dang /_/pa ru ra yi shing la'o/_/ra ma harla NaM/_bu leng /_/pA ta rA ya ti ni smyo/_/rtsegs pa dang ni 'tshol ba dang /_/bzhad kyi gom pa lag pa'i 'dog_/cung zad byed pa med pa la'o/_/de ha da lak+Sha NaM ni/_/na tshod mtshams dang mngal la'o/_/yau ba
[\[185b.7\]]ya lam+ba NaM ni/_/'o ma 'dzin dang mdzes par 'dod/_/sna tshogs gsal ba las Na mtha'i sde'o//_//tA ni skyong byed skyong ba po/_/ta ni tshems kun phag gi mjug/_/aM ka rnam dag khyab pa la/_/an+ta 'jig dang yid 'phrog dang /_/rang bzhin la'o a na/_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rab mtha' dang ni nya ba la/_/arti gzir ba gzhu dang rtse/_/asta nub kyi ri bo la/_/asta 'phangs dang song ba la/_/Asta/_'dun sa bzung ba la/_A b+hi sdom dang 'thob pa la/_/a taM mkhas dang /_rtogs pa la/_/I ti char ches la sogs
[\[186a.2\]]drug_/Di sba dang ni sra bA sa/_/usti smra dang yi ge gcig_/'dun pa'o U ti zhes bya ba/_/srung bar byed dang /_/s+thu ti'o/_/ri ta nu nya'o rdo dang chu/_/ri ti bden dang 'gro ba dang /_/'bar ba dang ni mngon par mchod/_/ra ti 'gro dang smad pa dang /_/'gran pa dang ni bkra
[\[186a.3\]]shis la/_/ni nI dus skyes snang ba dang /_/dpyid la sogs dang brtan pa la/_/kan+ta 'gro ba zal po dang /_/yid du 'ong dang dga' ba dang /_/rdo ba la'o kAn+tA naM/_pri yang ku dang /_/dgon pa la/_/kAn+ti mdzes dang mngon 'dod la/_/kIrti grags pa bstar ba dang /_/
[\[186a.4\]]khang bzang dang ni rgya chen la/_/kun+tu brA sa ba lang 'jo/_/rang bzhin srog chags chung ngu la/_/kun+ti skyab seng btsun mo la/_/kr-i traM/_gu gu la shing dang ni/_/shal+la ki dang bden pa zung /_/'bras bu med dang rnam grangs 'thob/_/byas dang kun tu phan pa la/_/kr-i ti 'ching
[\[186a.5\]]dang byed pa la/_/kr-i ti dzi la dang ni gnas/_/kr-i ti/_/ru sbal grog dang /_/byas pa can la rab tu brjod/_/ke tu bza' yi bye brag dang /_/gyen du 'gro dang 'od mtshon byed/_/rgyal mtshan dang ni sgra la'o/_/kra tu/_/mchod sbyin thub b+he lu/_/ga ti 'du shes dka' thub
[\[186a.6\]]la/_/ga ti bcu dang 'gro ba dang /_/ye shes lam dang khas blangs dang /_/rtsa yi rma yi 'gro ba dang /_/skye bo'i khyad par lto ba la/_/gar+t+ta dong gsum bye brag dang /_/ku kun+du ra/_sa'i g.yangs/_/gA ru tri la 'khor dang 'phyang /_/khro byed khu byug pho la'o/_/gi ti/_/sdeb
[\[186a.7\]]sbyor bye brag glu/_/gI taM/_/glu dang sgra la'o/_/gup+ta bsrung dang sbed pa la/_/dmangs rigs zla ba snga ma can/_/gun+ti yi ge'i khyim dong dang /_/ba lang skyong bsrung /_/gshin rje'o/_/gra sti zos dang byas pa la/_/lup+ta mdog dang rkang pa 'byung /_/b+hA ta/_/bsnun dang tsher ma la/_/
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]g+haraM taM gsal dang /_snang ba chu/_/tsi ti tshogs dang /_bsags pa la/_/tsi ti 'dus dang /_/tshogs pa dang /_skabs dang sgyed pu la yang ngo /_/dza tsaM/_skye pa tshogs dang skye/_/dza ti spyi dang phreng ba can/_/sdeb sbyor dbye ba rigs dang skye/_/dzA ti pha la la yang ngo /_/'gro byed
[\[186b.2\]]g.yo ba sgyed pu la'ang /_/dz+nyA ti rigs bzang pa la'o/_/ta ta rlung la'o/_/ta taM ni/_/pi wang la sogs rol mo la/_/prap+ta rnam par rgyas pa la/_/tA ta rjes brtse/_skyed pa po/_/kik+ta ro dang dri bzangs la/_/tik+tA ku Tu ro hi NI/_/tik+taM parba la 'dod/_/tre tA dus dang
[\[186b.3\]]mi gsum la/_/dat+taM bI shrA bi ta dang /_/a bi ta'o dan+ta ni/_/so dang glang po dag la'o/_/dan+ti sman gyi bye brag dang /_/dAn+ta dka' thub nyon mongs bzod/_/dul bar gyur ba la yang ngo /_/di ti/_/sbyin dang dum bu la/_/dIp+ta 'bar dang bsregs pa dang /_nges par
[\[186b.4\]]gsal ba la yang 'gyur/_/tr-i ti pags pa sbyar dang /_/nya/_/grip+ta ma sgribs nus pa la/_/rlu ti 'bar dang /_/mdzes dag_/dru taM/_myur dang rnam par 'gro/_/rnam par zhum dang myur 'gro la/_/d+hA ru tshangs pa yongs su skyong /_/bya ba'i don dang khu ba dang /_/bad kan
[\[186b.5\]]sogs dang khrag sogs bcud/_/'byung ba sogs dang sa sogs dang /_/ldong ros sogs dang ko lA hwa/_/khyad par btsag dang mig rnams la'o/_/d+hu ti/_/rnam par gsal dang dor/_/d+hi ta bsgul dang bcos pa la/_/d+hU d+haM/_/lan tshwa'i dum bu dang /_/ngan pa dang
[\[186b.6\]]ni g.yo can la/_/d+h+r-i 'dzin dang mchog shes dang /_/brtan dang rnal 'byor bye brag la/_/na ta/_/ti ga ra yi shing /_/'khyog po dang ni 'dam bu la/_/nA ti/_/tshul dang thob pa la/_nr-i tu/_/'bu dang gar mkhan la/_/bak+ti 'tsheng dang gus pa la/_/ping+kA phreng dang bcu pa dang /_/
[\[186b.7\]]yi ge bcu pa'i br-it+ta la/_/pa ti khyab bdag rtsa ba dang /_/'gro ba la'o bat+ti ni/_/rkang thang dpa' bo dmag bye brag_/pa ti ltung dang skyob pa la/_/bI ti/_/ser dang yA tsAn+ta/_/skyong ba dang ni yung ba la/_/pI tA/_btung ba dang ni/_/rta/_/pI tI/_/btud pa'o/_/pi staM ni/_/rnam shes dang
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ni glegs bam bris/_/bU taM gtsang byed sha Ti ta/_/bkangs dang bkab dang shar bu byas/_/pUrti grang ba 'obs sogs las/_/po ta byis pa dang ni gu/_/prA ti/_/gang ba phyogs gcig la/_/brAp+ti cher 'byung thob pa la/_/prAb+taM thob dang mnyam
[\[187a.2\]]skyes dang /_/prI ti rnal 'byor dbye ba dang /_/dran pa/_/bu dang /_/dga' dang /_/rangs/_/prI ti dga' dang rtsed 'jo la/_/pra ta/_/ro dang 'byung po'i dbye/_/pi ti gos dang phreng bar rgyus/_/p+lu ta phyi mo gsum la'o/_/blu taM/_myur ba'i 'gros dang ni/_/chu la rkyal gyis 'gro
[\[187a.3\]]ba'o/_/b+hak+ti rnam par dbye dang gus/_/b+hartA rje bo 'dzin pa po/_/b+hit+ti rtsig pa dbye ba dang /_/go skabs cha dang phyogs re ba/_/b+hi taM 'jigs dang 'jigs bcas la/_/b+hI ti/_/sA d+h+wa/_/ba kr-i m+ba/_b+hU ta lha yi skye gnas kyi/_dbye ba dang ni lha ldan pa/_/thob dang spyod pa
[\[187a.4\]]la yang ngo /_/b+hA taM rigs dang bden pa dang /_/nye par mjal dang sa sogs la/_/sha za la'ang brjod par bya/_/b+hU ti glang po sgeg pa dang /_/'byor pa thal ba skye ba dang /_/b+hi ti 'dzin thob rin dag la/_/b+h+ran+ti 'khrul dang log pa'i blo/_/mi gnas dpa' bo ma ta ni/_
[\[187a.5\]]mchod dang rjes su 'gro ba la/_/mi ti/_blo dang dran dang 'dod/_/man+ta shed bu mchog gnas la/_/mA tA kha lang tshang ma sogs/_/snyan ngag mkhan dang bcas pa dang /_/dkar mo dang ni sa la'o/_/gzhan yang g.yang bdag mA pA ka/_/rab tu rngam can rnams la'o/_/
[\[187a.6\]]mi ti/_/tshang dang kun nas spyod/_/kuk+tu thar dang grol ba la/_/muk+ta thar bar gyur dang dor/_/muk+ta mu tig nyid la'o/_/mUrtaM/_mkhregs pa ldan pa la/_/mUr+ts+tsha rmongs brgyal sra ba la/_/murti lus dang sra ba la/_/mr-i rtA 'chi dang blo gros dang /_/mr-i taM/_slod dang shi ba la/_/
[\[187a.7\]]ya ti klog gcod sdom brtson dang /_/nges 'byed la'o yan+tA ni/_/srad bu dang ni 'dug pa la/_/yuk+ti sbyor ba rigs tshul la/_/yang dag ldan pa yu ta ste/_/yu taM tho bzhi ba la yang /_/rak+taM khrag dang rjes su chags/_/dmar po dang ni tshong la ste/_/nub phyogs
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]skyu ru ra dang ni/_/gur gum dang ni zangs la yang /_/ra tI gser dang nags tshal chags/_/yid bsrub dang ni btsun mo la/_/ra ti rab dga' gsang ba la/_/ra tU 'bab chu dang ni lam/_/rak+taM stong pa nags tshal la/_/rI ti tshig dang lam la'o/_/rI ti rta dang
[\[187b.2\]]rab spyod dang /_/lcags kyi rtsa dang ther zug min/_/sa tA sbrang rtsi skyes lcug ma/_/yal ga br-i kA pr-i yang+ku/_/la tA 'od ldan ma dang ni/_/gla rtsi dang ni durba'o/_/lup+taM rnam par phyug pa dang /_/dug chang dang ni 'khyogs sog la/_lU tA srog chags sdom dang ni/_/grog
[\[187b.3\]]ma chu klung khyad par ro/_/lo taM chom rkun rlangs pa dang /_/smra byed smra mkhas mkhas pa la'o/_/bsta gnas dang lteng ka dang /_/lus dang sgron me bcu pa dang /_/mar me sman dang sprul ba dang /_/mig dang mig sman yi ge la/_/brti lus dang rjes su byug/_brtaM/_nad
[\[187b.4\]]med snying po med/_/bArtA spyod mtha' zhing las sogs/_/zhing las ma dang /_/spyod pa la/_ma ta/_spyod tshul ni rug dang /_/urba ti'o bit+taM ni/_/'byor pa la ni yang dag 'dod/_/rnam par gcad dang shes pa dang /_/'thob pa la yang brjod par bya/_/shes dang rnyed dang
[\[187b.5\]]'byung ba la'ang /_/bI taM snying po med pa dang /_/glang po rta dang dor ba dang /_/lus la gnas dang las la'o/_/bi ti gtod dang 'gro dang 'bar/_/mchod dang rgyug dang za ba la/_/br-it+ta rnam par 'grel pa dang /_/mtsho bya brgya byin ma la sogs/_/br-it+ta/_zlum po 'das
[\[187b.6\]]pa dang /_/shi dang brtan dang spyod pa la/_/br-it+taM dbul po sdeb sbyor 'jug/_/br-i ti 'dzin dang dam bca' dkris/_/br-i taM sgrib dang rab 'dzag 'ching /_/nu ma'i rtse dang bum pa 'dzin/_/bya k+taM gsal dang shes rab can/_/bya staM khyab dang kun tu 'khrugs/_/byAstaM bshad
[\[187b.7\]]dang yang dag dman/_/byAsti khyab byed rnyed pa la/_/shak+ta sbom dang /_brten pa la/_/shak+ti mthu la sogs dang stobs/_/shastaM bde dang bkra shis la/_/sha ta phra dang rno ba la/_/shA tAM/_/skyid pa shAn+ta nyams/_/dAn+ta shin+tu grol ba la/_/shAn+ti zhi dang dge ba la/_/shAsta
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]ston pa sangs rgyas la/_/shi ti nag_/dkar gro ga la/_/shi taM/_phra dang rno ba la/_/shi ta chu grang 'khor mang la/_/shI taM/_tsaN+Da kha ba skyes/_/'khyags dang grang dang le lo la/_/shuk+ti dung dang ni kha dang /_/nya phyis dang ni dung chung la/_/muk+ti
[\[188a.2\]]mu tig mdzod ring la/_/rta gnas thod pa ka ko la/_/nya phyis/_skyur rtsub rul ba la/_/shru taM bstan bcos 'dzin pa la/_/shru ti/_rna ba rig byed dang /_/gtam dang rna ba'i las la'o/_/shwe taM/_gzugs dang dkar po la/_/shwe ta/_gling dang ri'i bye brag_/
[\[188a.3\]]shwe tA/_lte ba dung can ma/_/ljon shing skye'o legs dang yod/_/bkra shis dang ni mchod pa la/_/sta tI legs ma gtum po la/_/sat+tu bden pa sA sti sbyin/_/pi taM/_dkar po rdzogs pa la/_/shes dang bcings pa la yang ngo /_/si tA bu ram ka ra'o/_/
[\[188a.4\]]shI tA nam mkha'i gang+gA dang /_/skyed byed ma dang mdzes pa'i lam/_/su ta/_sa bdag skyes dang bu/_/sup+ti yid brtan 'joms pa dang /_/nyal dang reg pa shes pa la/_/sU ta kha lo bsgyur ba dang /_/phyag 'tshal khu ba 'jog pa la/_/rgyal rigs bram
[\[188a.5\]]ze mo dang bu/_/rab tu btsas dang ded pa la/_/sU ti 'gro dang lam la'o/_/se tu chu dang bung ba la/_/s+thi ta yang gnas pa dang /_/nges dang dam bca' dang bcas dang /_/'gro ba med dang bcings pa la/_/s+thi ti/_/shing phra ba skye ba'i/_khrims lugs gnas pa
[\[188a.6\]]dang /_/kun tu gnas dang mtshams rnams la'o/_/smr-i ti chos kyi bstan bcos dang /_/dran pa blo dang 'dod pa la/_/s+YUt+pi/_rgyu dang /_sI ba na/_/s+YU tA/_U ta rab tu gus/_/swAn+taM ni/_rang nang /_sems 'thibs so/_/hasta/_rgyu skar/_/glang po dang /_/glang mo
[\[188a.7\]]lag pa byed pa la/_/re mig byed dang skra mchog bsags/_/hi tiM 'gro dang 'dzin dang phan/_/he hi/_/'bar ba nyi ma dang /_/gzi brjid dang ni mtshon cha'o/_/k+Sharti'i kha lo bsgyur ba dang /_/gnyis gnas dang ni gnyis 'dzin dang /_/b+hu 'dzin k+Sha skyes nges sbyor dang /_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]dmangs rigs dang ni rgyal rigs bu/_/k+Shi ti sa dang gnas tsam dang /_/gnas dang zad pa la yang ngo /_/a gasti ni ri byi dang /_/bang+ga'i sde 'joms A hu ti/_/me dang tshangs pa me'i sbyin sreg_/a ts+yu ta/_brtan/_tha gu'i lto/_/khyab 'jug rgyal ka a dzi ta/_/
[\[188b.2\]]a di ti ni lha yi ma/_/brdzun dang zhing las a nri ta/_/khyab 'jug/_klu/_/lhag ma a nan+ta/_/a nan+te ni nam mkha' dang /_/mtha' yas dang ni mtshams med la/_/a nAn+tA ni sa gzhi dang /_/dUrbA mdzes ma ri'i bu mo/_/sA ri bA dang /_glu DU tsi/_/rgya mtsho'i
[\[188b.3\]]mtha' dang yangs pa la'o/_/a mr-i taM ni/_/bdud rtsi chu/_/thar ba dang ni snying 'bab dngos/_/ma slongs pa dang mchod sbyin lhag_/mang dang shin tu mdzes pa la/_/a mr-i ta ni tshig bzang dang /_/d+h+wa nan+ti la 'dod pa yin/_/a mr-i tA ni/_/ga DU tsI/_/skyu ru ra dang /_
[\[188b.4\]]phan pa dang /_/A ga tI rnams la 'dod do/_/a ma ti ni/_zla ba dang /_/dus dang dgra bcom rgyal mchod 'os/_/ardi ta ni rlung nad dang /_/lhung ba dang ni bcom pa la/_/arba tI ni/_/'bangs mo dang /_/mi'u thung ma rta mchod ngan/_/A byak+ta ni/_'phrog byed dang /_
[\[188b.5\]]rdo rje rmongs dang mi gsal brjod/_/ma hA ta ni dang po'i bdag_/a swan+ta ni 'chi dang ngan/_/sgyeng bu shing dang bar med la/_/a k+Sha taM ni rmi med 'bras/_/rang bzhin gsum pa rma yis dman/_/A kr-i ti ni lus dang gzugs/_/de bzhin thun mong ba la yang /_/a
[\[188b.6\]]khyA taM ni kun bshad dang /_/ting gi mtha'i tshig la bshad/_/A g+h+wa taM ni dri snom 'tshed/_a tsi taM ni bsags bkab bzung /_/A tsi ta ni shing rta dang /_/kun tu rje dang spun mi ldan/_/A dr-i ta mchod gus pa thob/_/A d+hA na ni rlung nad dang /_/rtad/_sgra grag pa
[\[188b.7\]]dge la'o/_/A na rta ni gar gyi gnas/_/yul gyi dbye ba sgra skye'o/_/A bat+ti ni thob dang skyon/_/A ba ti ni lhung bar 'dod/_/mtho ba yang ngo /_A blu ta/_/khrus tsam dang ni khrus byed la'o/_/A bat+ti ni gsher ba dang /_/khrims lugs dkar po stobs gnas
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]la'o/_/a ya ti ni yang dag sdom/_/ring po mthu dang dus phyi ma/_/a ya sta naM rno dang 'bangs/_/khro dang nyon mongs gyur kyang bsnun/_/a bArta ni sems dang 'jug_/chu yi klong 'khor la yang ngo /_/A s+pho ta ni/_/arka'i 'dab/_/ljon
[\[189a.2\]]shing yongs 'dus brtol la'o/_/A spo tA ni nags me tog_/ri yi rna ba la yang ngo /_/A ba t+ti ni kun 'gro thob/_/A ha taM ni bzod pa'i don/_/sngon med gos dang gos sar dang /_/nA na ka dang bsnun dang bsgyur/_/id+ga taM ni bkris dang 'gros/_/u tsi taM ni
[\[189a.3\]]mnyam shes la/_/a b+h+ya sta ni mnyam shes la/_/a b+h+yAsta ni rjes su ldan/_/son dang rnam par mkhas pa la/_/uts+tshir taM ni ra ba 'phel/_/kun tu skye dang sgreng ba la/_/ut+ta p+taM ni sha skam dang /_/kun tu gdungs dang yongs su rgyal/_/ut+thi taM ni skye ba dang /_/rab
[\[189a.4\]]tu 'char dang 'phel ldan la/_/u di taM ni 'char dang thob/_/kun tu 'phags dang rab brjod la/_/u t+gA ta ni tho ba dang /_/a t+yA d+hA ni nyer bgrod dang /_/'gro ba 'khrul dang phye ma leb/_/bum can rnams so u dan+taM/_/gtam dang skyes bu dam pa la/_/u dan+ta ni
[\[189a.5\]]yang dag gnon/_/ma myos pa yi glang po la/_/u da ta ni dbyangs bye brag_/snyan ngag dag gi rgyan la'o/_/u dan+ta ni sbyin byed dang /_/chen po 'dod pa'i snying la 'bab/_/ud+h-i taM ni li ta dang /_/zos dang /_/phyung dang gyen du bteg_/bdud rtsi la'i un+na ni/_/'char
[\[189a.6\]]dang rgan dang 'phags pa dang /_/skar mig bu yi chung ma la'o/_/un+mat+ta ni smyo ldan la/_/dan pa mu tsu kun+da la'o/_/u Shi taM ni gnas dang bsregs/_/rta dang bzhag pa sreg byed la/_/e d+ha tu ni skyes bu dang /_/sdig pa/_gtong ba/_/nad dag la/_/ka po ta ni phug
[\[189a.7\]]ron la/_/ka ba kA khya mkha' 'gro la/_/ka li taM ni rig dang shes/_/kA po taM ni phug ron khyu/_/bshad pa mig sman s+t+wa dzA'o/_/kai ra ta ni lus chung dang /_/kla klo sa yi ni m+ba dang /_/rdung byed lha yi yi ge'o/_/ki ra ti ni gnas ngan dang /_/gla mi dang ni las byed la'o/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]kr-i tAn+ta ni bshes gnyen dang /_/grub mtha' gnam brkos dge ba'i las/_/kan+di taM ni du dang 'bod/_/ga b+ha ni 'od nyi ma/_/bsreg za dang ni 'gro byed la'o/_/gardzi ti ni sprin gyi sgra/_/gardzi ta ni glang chen myos/_/bya khyung gser dang yal ga'o/_/go d+han+ti ba bal
[\[189b.2\]]dang /_/ga shi ta dang go cha bgos/_/go pa ti ni sa bdag dang /_/ma ning nyi ma mkha' rtse mo/_/gA ti taM ni/_spel ba dang /_/mnan dang 'tshe ba rnams la'o/_/tsaul+lA ta ni mi g.yo dang /_/gang+gA'i tsi la ring du 'tsho/_/dza gan+ti ni rlung sa 'gro/_/dza ga tA ni 'gro bas/_/sdeb
[\[189b.3\]]sbyor dbye ba chu la'o/_/dza yan+ta ni brgya byin skyes/_/bde 'byung la'o dza yan+tI/_/shing gi dbye ba rgyal mtshan dang /_/gau ri dbang po bu mo la/_/dza mA tA ni bu mo'i bdag_/nyi ma 'khyims dang da yi ta/_/dzai'i mU ta ni brgya byin sprin/_/lha yi chu dang dbyangs ldan dang /_/
[\[189b.4\]]'dzin pa dang ni 'tsho ba la'o/_/dzi wan+ti ni zas dang mtsho/_/'tsho bar byed pa'i sman la'o/_/dzi wan+ti ni 'tsho byed ma/_/shing dang /_/zhi ma/_phyag 'tshal dang /_/bdud rtsi rnams la'o/_/dzim+b+hi taM/_/byed po bud med sbyod pa gsal/_/dz+wa li taM ni 'bar dang bsregs/_/tA ni ta
[\[189b.5\]]ni dngas dang gos/_/rol mo'i snod dang yon tan la/_/tr-i Na ta ni gzhu dang rtsa/_/do dkra grangs kyi khyad par dang /_/tshong gi dbye ba'o traM gartA/_/dril chung dang ni 'dong can no/_/twa ra taM ni rab mgyogs myur/_/ngan 'gro dang ni/_/dmyal ba/_dor/_dbul po yang ngo /_
[\[189b.6\]]durdza taM/_/ngan par skyes dang 'phongs pa la/_/tr-iSh+Ta n+ta ni bstan bcos dang /_/dper brjod bla'o daM shi taM/_/go cha bgos dang /_/sos zin pa'o/_/tra ban+ti ni 'bang chu'i dbye/_/sman la'o de nas dri dzA ti/_/gnyis skyes bya dang blo ldan dang /_/tshig bdag brtan pa blo
[\[189b.7\]]gros can/_/ni tr-i taM ni rab tu thob/_/dman dang rang bzhin bral ba la/_/ni kr-i ti ni spyod dang dor/_/ngan g.yo dang ni g.yo can la/_/ni mit+ta ni mtshan nyid rgyu/_/rgyu mtshan dang ni tshig la'o/_/a gan+ta ni lha yi yul/_/ni ya taM ni yul dang sgrub/_/nir sta ni
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]mngags pa mnga'/_/kun tu dor dang myur dang skye/_/gsal ba dang ni so sor bcom/_/nid+ng+ha ti ni nyer mi 'gro/_/phyogs skyong rna ba nag po la/_/nirbi ti ni legs gnas dang /_/bde dang myang 'das nub gyur dus/_/nirmuk+ti mi grogs spangs
[\[190a.2\]]dang /_/shun pa rjes dang bal+la ga_/ni bA ta ni rlung phral dang /_/gnas dang go cha brtan po la/_/ni shan+ta ni zhi ba la/_/ni shan+taM ni yod dang gnas/_/pany+tsa tA ni shi tsam dang /_lnga pa'i dngos dang lnga pa nyid/_/paN+Di ta ni dkar dang brtan/_/'gro dang 'gro byed 'dab
[\[190a.3\]]chags la/_/bad+d+ha ti ni lam dang gral/_/be re ta ro 'byung po'i dbye/_/barba ta ni char bzang ri/_/pAR+YAp+ta ni glang po dang /_/tshim dang ci 'dod nus dang 'thob/_/'jig dang /_dbyug pa dka' tshegs skyon/_/baR+Yabye ni rab 'dod dang /_/thob dang /_yongs su bsrung
[\[190a.4\]]ba la/_/baR+Yasta ni/_lhung /_'bangs bsnun/_/pa li ta ni sgra dkar dang /_/'dam dang /_tshad gdung ri las skyes/_/ba kA ti ni tshes gcig dang /_/phyogs rtsa dang ni dang po'i tshes/_/bAr+pa tI ni/_dro ba dI/_/rdzong ma/_'tsho ma shal+la kI/_/paN+Di ta ni bsgyur dang bsdus/_/
[\[190a.5\]]dmag 'gro dang pa 'dab chags so/_/pi shi tA ni ba la la/_/pIDI taM ni bud med kyi/_/byed pa 'khrul 'khor rol mo dkrol/_/pu TI taM ni glang po dang /_/sbyar sogs p+lu tA/_/pA Ti t+'+ao/_/pri Sha ta ni bsre po dang /_/thig le tsam dang ri dgas rta/_/dmar dang thig
[\[190a.6\]]le dkar po can/_/pra kr-i ti ni snying stobs dang /_/rdul dang mun pa ci tsam dang /_/rang bzhin blo dang grong dang ni/_/rtags dang skye gnas bdag la'o/_/pr-i ti ta ni rab tu bstod/_/rab byas rang bzhin gnas pa la'o/_/pra tsi ta ni shing rta dang /_/shin tu brje dang
[\[190a.7\]]spur mi ldan/_/pra NI ta ni 'dris dang me/_/rab tu 'bebs dang 'dus byas dang /_nye bar phun tshogs/_nges spel byas/_/pra tI ta ni gus bcas bshad/_/dga' dang mthong dang mkhas pa dang /_/lug dang shes pa la yang ngo /_/pra ta ti ni brtul zhugs byung /_/
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]ta ti'o de nas pra pA ta/_/chu sgra g.yang sa a ba Ta/_/pra bye ta ni the ri ba dang /_/pA bye' de nas pra m+bi ta/_/rab tu song dang shi ba la/_/pra br-it+ti ni/_/'grel pa dang /_/spyad mtha' rab 'bag rab 'jug ma/_/pra sU ti ni rab skyes dang /_/skye dang 'dab na bu mo la/_/
[\[190b.2\]]pra sU ti ni me tog dang /_/lcug ma dang ni skye ba la/_/pra sU tA ni skye dgu dang /_/tha ma dang ni rab skye la/_/pra sr-i ha ni/_/steng thal sbyor/_/de rab 'gro dang /_/'jug rnam des/_/pra ha ti ni/_/k+ShuN+Na mtho/_/prar+thi twaM ni slong ba dang /_/dgra bo 'gog dang rnam par bcom/_
[\[190b.3\]]pro k+Shi ti ni rnam par bcom/_/bar+d+hi ti ni bkangs pa dang /_/bkab dang /_/spel dang /_'bras rgan po/_/pr-i hI h+tI/_/ma hA tI/_/kaN+Da kA rI bum pa can/_/shu dag_/lo rgyus phra mo dang /_/sdeb sbyor dbye ba gong rgyan la/_/b+ha ra ta ni dga' ston skyes/_/gar dang gar gyi bstan
[\[190b.4\]]bcos la/_s+YUni rngon pa dang /_/tha ga pa la rgyas par bshad/_/bA pa tI ni/_/dag dang mda'/_/'dab chags/_/bye brag_/spyod pa'i dbye/_/drang srong rgyas pa'i gzhung las ni/_/'dzam gling d+hAr ta tu bshad/_/b+hA bi taM ni/_/gnas dang thob/_/bsam dang skyed pa
[\[190b.5\]]rnams la'o/_/b+hA san+ta ni snang ba dang /_/mkha' 'gro dang ni mdzes pa dang /_/'od dang /_gsal dang /_nyi ma dang /_/sa 'dzin/_pr-i ba gala'o/_/mthi taM ni/_bsrubs dang /_dkrugs/_/chu med dang ni/_/ba sri ta'o/_/ma ru ti zhes bya ba ni/_/lha dang /_rlung dang /_rgyal srid
[\[190b.6\]]che/_/ma na tI ni mi sbyin gyi/_/pi wang dang ni sa gzhi la'o/_/mA la tI ni/_dzA ti dang /_/na chung yot+s+nA/_nik+Shu dang /_/chu klung gi ni dbye ba la/_/mu Shi taM ni me'i rtse mo/_/kA ka mA tsI dum bu snying /_/mUr+ts+tshi taM ni rmongs par 'gyur/_/de bsgreng pa dang brten pa la/_/ra dza taM ni
[\[190b.7\]]dngul do shal/_/btsun pa dang ni rgyas pa la/_/ra ma ti ni mtho ris 'dren/_/ra si ti ni/_sprin dang sgra/_/gser la sogs pas sbras pa la'o/_/re ba tI ni ma mo dang /_/skar ma'i bye brag 'bras ldan ma'o/_/rai ba ta ni ri'i bye brag_/gser gyi phreng dang mdung can la'o/_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]ro hi taM ni thang shing dang /_/yul du brtan dang khrag la'o/_/ro hi tA nI dang po dang /_/nya dang ri dgas dbye ba la/_/ro hi Ni dang ro hi ta dang /_/nyi ma khri shing dbye ba la/_/la li ti ni mdzes dad 'dod/_/do shal gyi ni khyad par la/_/lo hi taM ni tsan+dan dmar/_/
[\[191a.2\]]sa mchog dang ni/_gur kum dang /_/khrag dang kha dog dmar po la/_/lo hi ta ni/_sa'i 'dab ma/_/chu klung bye brag la yang ngo /_/pa ni tA ni skyed ma dang /_/shin tu chags dang btsun mo la/_/ba ni taM ni/_slong dang bsten/_/ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim/_/kun tu gnas
[\[191a.3\]]dang mchod ngal gso/_/ba ha tu ni khyu mchog lam/_/bas ti/_glang pi tsi ba/_/bi ba taM ni gnyis skyes dang /_/byas dang mgo bo'i cha dag la/_/ba san+ta ni khu byug dang /_/sran ma/_mang+ga glang phrug dang /_/thob pa dang ni yal phran la'o/_/bA san+tI ni/_spang ldan/_khyu/_/ljon
[\[191a.4\]]shing skya nar dag la yang /_/ba si tA ni/_glang po dang /_/bud med la'o bA si taM/_/nam mkhar 'gro ba'i skra dang ni/_/shes dang gos kyis dkris pa dang /_/dri zhim byas pa dag la'o/_/bi kr-i ti ni 'jigs rung dang /_/nad can dang ni 'dus ma byas/_/spyo ba dang ni nad
[\[191a.5\]]la'o/_/pi kri ti/_bral/_'ong med 'gro/_/bi tsit+ti ni lus chags dang /_/rnam par chang dang sgeg pa la/_/bi dzA tA ni rab bcos la/_/rnam par 'gyur dang skyed pa la/_/bi ta taM ni khyab pa dang /_/rgya che ba la mngon par brjod/_/birlu ta ni glog gi 'od/_/thun mtshams
[\[191a.6\]]dad ni 'od med la/_/bi di taM ni/_shes dang don/_/bi d+hA tA ni/_tshangs pa dran/_/pi na ta ni rab 'dud dang /_/nyams pa dang ni lhod pa la/_/bi na tA ni khyung gi ma/_/pha yi khyad par dag la yang /_/be nI taM ni 'dul pa thob/_/legs 'bab rta dang dbang po thul/_/nye bar
[\[191a.7\]]drangs dang khrid pa dang /_/nges par zung dang dag skyes so/_/rgyal po yul can bi ne tA/_/'ongs dang /_slong ba di pat+ti/_/nad dang phran tshegs/_bi pr-i tA/_/bi pr-i tAM ni gsal ba'o/_/bi bat+ti ni kun spyod dang /_/rab tu 'jug dang gar dag la/_/bi bik+taM ni skye bo bral/_/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rul dang 'du 'dzi med dang dben/_/bi shru taM ni shes pa dang /_/mkhas dang kun nas dga' ba la/_/bi sh+bastA ni/_bsgrub pa la/_/bi shwasta ni des 'dzin la/_/rnam par sbyangs pa la yang ngo /_/bi hasta ni dkar skya dang /_/rnam par skrag dang lag med la/_/
[\[191b.2\]]br-it+tan+ta ni srid pa 'dod/_/lo rgyus dang ni khyad par la/_/rab tu byed dang skabs dang ni/_/mtha' gcig la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/bel+li taM ni g.yo ba dang /_/'khor lo skyal dang 'gros la'o/_/beSh+TaM taM ni bud med kyi/_/byed pa sgeg pa spyod pa la'o/_/byA g+hA ta ni
[\[191b.3\]]bar dang ni/_/rnal 'byor dbye ba rab tu 'phrog_/byA ya ti ni che dang ring /_/bya pa dang ni nyal pa la/_/sha kun+ta ni mkha' 'gro dang /_/'dab chags dbye ba 'od/_bde phyogs/_/shu d+hAn+ta ni mtha' grong dang /_/re'u mig dang gsang bar brjod/_/shri ba tin+ni pad dkar
[\[191b.4\]]mig_/dpal gyi bdag dang sa yi bdag_/dpal ldan snum can shing dang ni/_/dbang phyug dang ni yid 'phrog la/_/saM g+hA ta ni 'dus pa dang /_/rab 'joms/_mi yi dgon pa la/_/saM g+ha ta ni 'grogs dang bshes/_/pan+na ti ni 'dud dang /_sgra/_/ban+na ti ni rgyud dang
[\[191b.5\]]bu/_/rigs dang rgya che gral dang ni/_/gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang /_/sa ma sti ni gus dang dga'/_/rjes gnang mngon 'dod saM mi ti/_/sa mi ti ni yang dag gnon/_/mnyam dang 'dun pa 'grogs pa dang /_/yang dag rig dang drang po dang /_/dam bca'
[\[191b.6\]]kun spyod shes pa la/_/sam+bit+ti ni rtsod pa med/_/so sor go byed skye bo la/_/sam+barta ni bskal pa'i mtha'/_/lo dang rtsod pa'i shing la'o/_/si ka tA ni seg ma can/_/yul dang nad kyi khyad par dang /_/bye ma dang ni bu ram la/_/su kr-i taM ni dge ba dang /_/bsod
[\[191b.7\]]nams dang ni legs byas la/_/su nI ti ni bzang po'i tshul/_/lugs bzang des pa phyi mo la/_/su pra tA ni bde ba dang /_/ba lang tshogs dang brtul zhugs bzang /_/su ra staM ni nags tshal dang /_/lha nyid dang ni rab dga' la'o/_/su hi ta ni tshim pa dang /_/
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]smras dang legs par phan pa la/_/sunri taM ni bkra shis dang /_/bden dang mnyam par brjod pa la/_/saM skr-i ta ni mtshan nyid dang /_/ldan dang brtson dang 'dus byas la/_/rgyan dang bkra shis la yang ngo /_/saM ha staM ni 'grogs dang brtan/_/s+kha li dang ni zos
[\[192a.2\]]pa dang /_/'khrul pa dang ni g.yo ba la/_/sti mi taM ni g.yo ba bral/_/ri bo lta bur gyur pa la/_/s+tha sa ti ni bzo bo'i dbye/_/go cha can dang srad bu dang /_/'tsho ba 'dod dang mchod sbyin la/_/s+thA pi ti ni bkod dang nges/_/sra ban+ti ni chu klung dang /_/'dam bu byin dang sman
[\[192a.3\]]gyi dbye/_/ha ri tA ni zlum po dang /_/ljang gu dang ni mdog ldan dang /_/rta dang mdog dang phyogs la'o/_/rtsa yi rab tu dbye ba la'ang /_/harmi taM ni spel dang bsregs/_/ha pan+ti ni sol ba dang /_/so ba dang ni me tog dang /_/yal ga can gyi dbye ba la/_/hA rI ta ni rgyan 'gyed dang /_/
[\[192a.4\]]bya dang thub pa'i dbye ba la/_/hri Shi taM ni rnam par 'dzum/_/thogs dang dga' ba spu long 'dud/_/k+ShA ri ta ni 'dzag pa dang /_/'gyur dang a bi shap+ta la/_/aM ga ri taM tshig pa dang /_/pa lA sha yi yal 'dab la/_/a ti muk+ta dpyid dang shing /_/ti ni pa dang
[\[192a.5\]]cha med la/_/a t+yA hi taM 'jigs chen dang /_/srog la bltos med bya ba la/_/a ti k+Shib+ha gzhan 'gyur dang /_/smon pa'o a na ha ti ni/_/sngon med gos dang gos sar la'o/_/a nu ma ti zla ba nya/_/gang ba dang ni rjes gnang la'o/_/an+targa ta dbus
[\[192a.6\]]dang nang /_/thob dang mi dran pa la'o/_/a pa tsi ti mchod pa dang /_/des byed zad dang nyams pa la/_/a pA br-i ta bkab pa dang /_/rang rgyud a b+hi dzA ta ni/_/bzhad pa rigs pa ku lI na/_/thob pa'i gzugs dag la yang ngo /_/a b+hi yug+ta zhe sdang sdom/_/mngon par
[\[192a.7\]]brtson dang lhur byed pa'o/_/a b+hi nI ta rigs pa dang /_/'dus byas dang ni bzod pa'o/_/a b+hi shasti 'jig rten gyis/_/smod dang slong dang mngon par sbyong /_/ar+tha pa ti sa bdag dang /_/dbang phyug mi 'am ci dang dbyangs/_/a ba gi taM yongs su brjod/_/yang
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]yang lta dang rnam par smod/_/a wa d+hasta yongs su bkrus/_/smad dang kun nas phye mar byas/_/e ba dA taM dkar dang ser/_/rnam par dag dang rab mchog la/_/shes dang bkag pa la yang ngo /_/a wa si taM 'gro dang mtha'/_/tshe dang ldan dang rnal 'byor dbye/_/ring du
[\[192b.2\]]'tsho ba dag la'o/_/udz+dz+rim+b+hi ta spyod pa rgyas/_/u nga s+thi ta spyod pa rgyal/_/smon lam dang ni sgo skyong la/_/a d+g+ra hi ta nyer bkod dang /_/bcings dang bzung ba dag la'o/_/u pA kr-i ta mchod sbyin la/_/gsad bya'i phyugs dang nye bar phan/_/u pa tsi ta mnyam gzhag
[\[192b.3\]]dang /_/bsags dang yang dag 'byor pa la/_/u pA hi ta me dang skyed/_/kun nas btags pa rnams la'o/_/u pa rak+Sha mun pas khyab/_/zla ba nyi ma 'phongs bye brag_/sgra gcan la yang blta bar bya/_/u pa bat+ti bsten pa dang /_/so sor go bar byed pa la/_/
[\[192b.4\]]'grogs pa'o ul+li li taM ni/_/kun tu bkram dang srab mor byas/_/drang srong gis brjod nga rgyal 'doms/_/rtse mo dra ba g.yo ba'i dbye/_/ai rA ba ta glang chen dkar/_/gdeng can mtho ba nA raM ga_/ai rA ba taM ring po dang /_/thang shing dbang dang mda' stan la/_/ai rA ba tI glog
[\[192b.5\]]'od ldan/_/sprin gyi dbye ba nyi ma dang /_/sA la'i 'dab dang 'od ldan pa/_/ka la d+hau ta ca co sgrogs/_/gser dang dngul dag la yang ngo /_/ku murba tI ku mud ldan/_/ku mud mar dang ku mud can/_/ku ha ri taM sgra dang ni/_/ku sha'i 'dab ma la yang 'dod/_/rin chen gser dang tshogs
[\[192b.6\]]can dang /_/phye ma nag dang skya nar dang /_/mA sa'i lo ma la yang ngo /_/gan+d+ha ba tI chang dang sa/_/grong dang chu dang sbyar ba'i dri/_/ga rut+man ta bya khyung bya/_/gri ha pa ti khyim gnas dang /_/ra t+yA d+hA na pa tri Na/_/tsakrA hu tI dpung pa ring /_/'khor dang sreg blugs gang ba la/_/tsan+h+ra kan+ta nor bu
[\[192b.7\]]bu'i dbye/_/zla ba chu shel kai ra ba/_/tsarma nA tI chu klung gi_/dbye ba dang ni chu shing la/_/tsA tu dra tA zhes bya ba/_/chu dang ri yi khyad par dang /_/'bab chu kA ra tI zhes dang /_/zla ba nye bar gnas la brjod/_/tsi tra gup+ta dbyug 'dzin dang /_/de'i yi ge pa la'o/_/de bA kIrti gtum po dang /_/
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]nA pi ta dang bya rog sgra/_/di bA bi ta 'ug pa dang /_/ku muta 'byung gnas chu srin no/_/dwI ba pan+ta mtsho dang chu/_/dwI pa ba tI ri dang sa/_/d+hA ma ge tu nyi chen dang /_/skye dang gza' yi dbye ba la/_/nA ga dan+ta glang po'i so/_/khyim du nges par ston pa'i shing /_/nA ga dan+ti bum pa dang /_/dpal
[\[193a.2\]]gyi lag ldan ma la'ang blta/_/na dI kan+ta chu gter dang /_/rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang 'gro chu la/_/ni dA kan+tA dzam+bu yi/_/khri shing bya rog byin pa dang /_/legs par rnam par grags pa'o/_/nan+d+yA brta khyim bye brag_/ta ba ra yi shing la'o/_/ni rA gri tI kha ton med/_/so sor spong dang spel ba la/_/nistu
[\[193a.3\]]Shi taM phra mor byas/_/btang dang pags pa stong pa la/_/niH ka si ta nges phyin dang /_/ngan par byas dang steng du phan/_/skang ba'i pany+tsa gu p+ta rus sbal dang /_/tsArbA ka yi mthong ba la/_/pa ri ga taM shes dang bskor/_/g.yang sa thob dang rnyed pa la/_/pa ri g+hA ta yongs 'joms g.yul/_/pa ri brta
[\[193a.4\]]'bru dang brje/_/rus sbal rgyal dang 'bros pa la/_/pal+la be taM ta ta dang /_/de rab 'jug dang rgya skyegs dmar/_/pA rA ba ta phug ron dang /_/ri skyes spre'u tin+bu ka_/sA rA ba ti sa skyong dang /_/dbyangs dang mdzes dang 'bras bu la/_/pA ri dzA ta yongs bzang dang /_/man+dA ra dang lha yi shing /_/pA shu
[\[193a.5\]]pa ta phyugs bdag lha'i/_/bu dang pa ka'i me tog can/_/pu ra skr-i taM mdun du byas/_/mngon par mchod pa dga' la'o/_/mtshon cha khrus byas dgras bzung dang /_/bdag gir byas pa la yang ngo /_/puSh+pa dan+ta rigs 'dzin gyi/_/bye brag glang po phyogs kyi glang /_/pra dzA pa ti sa bdag
[\[193a.6\]]dang /_/tshangs pa dang ni skye dgu'i bdag_/pra Ni hi taM bshad dang bkod/_/thob dang mnyam par gzhag pa la/_/pra ti ha ta dgra dang ni/_/so sor 'khrul dang bkag pa la/_/pra ti bat+ti lam dang sems/_/gos byed gnas byed rab 'jug thob/_/spyod yul dang ni rab tu rtogs/_/yang dag rig
[\[193a.7\]]dang cha la'o/_/pra ti kr-i ti bcos pa dang /_/gzugs brnyan dang ni mchod pa la/_/pra ti k+Shi pA so sor thogs/_/mngags pa dang ni sel ba la/_/pra d+hU pi ta nyon mongs dang /_/nyi ma bgrod pa'i phyogs la'o/_/pra bra dzi ta dka' thub mtha'/_/spang spos sman dang mgo zlum mo/_/b+ha ga bAn+ta gau rI dang /_/bud med
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rgyal ba mchod 'os dang /_/zlos gar dang ni gar la'o/_/b+ho ga ban+ta longs spyod can/_/b+ho ga wa tI klu yi grong /_/klu dang chu klung la yang 'dod/_/rang ga ma tA rgya skyegs dang /_/brtsegs ma la yang blta bar bya/_/lak+Sh+mI pa te mi bdag dang /_/khyab 'jug li shi pU
[\[193b.2\]]ga'i 'bras/_/ba na sA ti shing tsam dang /_/me tog 'bras med shing la'o/_/bi dzri m+b+hi taM/_kha 'byed dang /_/spyod pa mngon par 'phags pa la/_/bi ni pA ta lha sogs kyi/_/phongs dang 'og tu ltung ba la/_/bi ba swA ta bA ba su/_/tse na dbang phyug dag la'o/_/ba bak+Shi ti
[\[193b.3\]]smra 'dod bzang /_/bi dza yan+ta rgyal mtshan dang /_/brgya byin khang bzang mda' skyes la/_/bai dzA yan+ti ba dan dang /_/rgyal byed dang ni me bsrub la'o/_/bya ti ba ta rnal 'byor dbye/_/cher 'byung ba dang phyir 'jal dang /_/sha ti d+h+ri ti smin pa 'joms/_/pad+ma'i gdan can la
[\[193b.4\]]yang 'dod/_/shu ba dAn+tI/_glang po/_rlung /_/glang mo dang ni so bzang ma'o/_/saM khyA ban+ta mkhas grangs ldan/_/sa dA ga ti dri bzhon dang /_/rtag pa'i dbang phyug mya ngan 'das/_/sa mu drAn+ta mtha' yas dang /_/ras ba la/_brgya byin/_dang ni spr-i ka'o/_/sa mur+d+ha tA kun
[\[193b.5\]]nas g.yengs/_/ma dul ba dang rgod pa'o/_/sa mA g+hA ta gsod dang 'khrug_/ting 'dzin gnas dang mnyam par gzhag_/bkod dang dam bca' legs grub dang /_/bdag nyid ldan pa rnams la'o/_/sa mA hi taM kun tu 'dzin/_/bkod dang mnyam par bzhag pa la/_/
[\[193b.6\]]sa ra swan+ta mtsho can dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni/_chu klung la/_/swa ra swa tI chu klung dbye/_/chu klung lha mo sa dang ngag_/lha yi ri bo rnams la'o/_/su d+hA sU ti mdzes pa dang /_/lus ngan gzhan pa dag la'o/_/sUR+Ya b+hak+ta nyi ma lha/_/ban+d+hu dzi ba dag la'o/_/se nA ba ti sde dpon
[\[193b.7\]]dang /_/dmag dpon dang ni skems byed la/_/he ma ba tI me nyi ma/_/sla la dang ni kha ba'i dgra/_/ser po dang ni a ru ra/_/gser gyi 'o ma shu dag dkar/_/a byA bi taM dang ni skyes/_/'gro dang rdzu 'phrul spyod pa la/_/a pa rA ni dzi taM zhes/_/dpal mgrin dang ni rtul
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]mo'i bu/_/mchod sbyin dbye ba rnams la'o/_/a pa rAM dzi ta zhes pa/_/rgyal byed ma dang ri'i bu mo/_/khyab 'jug gnon pa rnams dang ni/_/dkar mo dang ni pham pa'o/_/a ba lo ki taM zhes pa/_/lta ba bshad pa 'jig rten mgon/_/spyan ras gzigs
[\[194a.2\]]pa rnams la'o/_/u pa d+hu ba ti zhes pa/_/nye bar 'chi dang yongs su gdung /_/ga NA d+hi pa ti zhes pa/_/dbang phyug dang ni log 'dren la/_/pi pa ti Shan+ta zhes pa/_/lhung 'dod dang ni mkha' 'gro la/_/pr-i thi bI pa ti zhes pa/_/sa bdag_/khyu mchog sman la'o/_/mUr+d+hA b+hi
[\[194a.3\]]Shik+ta zhes pa/_/sa skyong rgyal rigs sngags pa la/_/yA ta pAM pa ti zhes pa/_/chu bdag dang ni nyi ma la/_/ba sand dU ta zhes pa/_/mA kan+da dang bi ka dang /_/lnga pa'i chags pa dag la'o/_/ba sand dU tAM yi sgra/_/skya ngar ldan dang mu tig can/_/gzhan phyed 'debs
[\[194a.4\]]dang mgul ris can/_/tit+ti ri dang mtsho'i mar sar/_/bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i gter la'o/_/sna tshogs gsal ba las ta mtha'i sde'o//_//tha ni rdo ba brtsegs pa la/_/thu ni 'jigs skyob bkra shis la/_/ar+tha/_dgos pa 'byor pa dang /_/rgyu dang byis pa mang
[\[194a.5\]]po'i dngos/_/sgra yi brjod bya'i yul dang ni/_/'jug pa dang ni rnam pa las/_/As+thA dmigs pa/_bltos pa med/_/'bad dang gnas la blta bar bya/_/kAn+thA sa dang rtsig pa dang /_/mgo bo'i khyad par dag la'o/_/ku tha/_mdog dang la ba dang /_/rma bya'o ko tha mig
[\[194a.6\]]nad dbye/_/ras dang /_sgrub par byed pa la/_/kwA tha phongs dang nges smin rdzas/_/sdug bsngal la'o gA thA ni/_/tshigs bcad dang ni ngag dbye la/_/gran+tha bsgrigs dang yi ge ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis nges byas la/_/gran+thi tshigs dang mdud pa dang /_/nad kyi dbye ba dag
[\[194a.7\]]la'o/_/tIr+thaM 'khyog po 'ching ba'i dbye/_/bstan bcos dang ni 'jug pa dang /_/bsod nams zhing dang snod chen dang /_/thabs dang mkhan po lta ba dang /_/drang srong bsten dang chu mchod sbyin/_/pus mo ba ni tA dus mchod/_/tut+tha/_spangs ma sug smel la/_/
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]tut+thaM mig sman tut+thA me/_/duH s+tha ngan 'gro rmongs pa la/_/sar+tha ka ku b+ha srid sgrub/_/pI tha/_nyi ma/_bA thaM chu/_/pr-i thu mi bdag zir nag_/rdzing bu dang ni chen po brjod/_/pras+tha ri ngos tshad dang ni/_/nyung ngur byas pa'i dngos po la/_/pro tharta dang dar zho dkrogs pa'i/_ba dang /_/lam dang
[\[194b.2\]]rked pa snying po la/_/pI thI khyim gyi snying po dang /_/phreng ba/_zlos gar gzugs can lam/_/man+tha/_srub byed/_dbyug gu dang /_/bcu gnyis/_bdag dang /_tsam pa la/_/mig nad kyang ngo /_/pri thaM ni/_/dud 'gro bsags dang /_tshogs pa la/_/pra thI/_zho dkrogs pa'i/_mnyam
[\[194b.3\]]dka' me tog dbye/_/ku ru N+Taka'o/_ra tha ni/_/shing rta lus dang /_be ta sa/_/sgra'o/_sAr+thA tshong pa la/_/'dus dang tshogs tsam la yang blta/_/sik+thaM rams dang sbrang rtsi snyigs/_/zas las byung ba la yang ngo /_/saM s+thA 'jig dang rnam gnas dang /_/gsal dang de
[\[194b.4\]]mthong ba dag la/_/s+thi ti gnas dang grangs du yod dang /_/rjes gnang dang ni spyod pa dang /_/ni dza rASh+Ta dag la'o/_/a ti thi ni gshe ba dang /_/khro ba dang ni ku sha'i bu/_/a bya tha ni nad kyis dman/_/phan dang nad med/_yu nu ka_/a shot+tha ni gang ba dang /_/garda shingab+hAN+Da bispa
[\[194b.5\]]li/_/u da tha ni dbang chen dang /_/'dod chen zangs kyi gtsug phud can/_/un+ma tha ni 'dab brtsegs dang /_/'gro byed dang ni 'joms byed do/_/u pas+tha ni phang pa dang /_/skye gnas dang ni bshang lam mo/_/mi rnams rigs kyi bye brag dang /_shing /_mchog
[\[194b.6\]]gi bdag la ka yas+tha/_/na tshod gnas dang phan pa dang /_/khyim bya/_lus kyi dbyibs la gA yas+thA/_/ba lang lce dang ba lang lhas/_/lci ba sman la go gras+thi/_/da ma tha ni dul ba dang /_/dbyug pa gos med phyogs dang ni/_/nor med dang ni skra nyal pa'o/_/ni shI tha ni
[\[194b.7\]]mtshan phyed dang /_/mtshan mo tsam mo/_pra ma tha/_/bde byed tshogs dang phan pa dang /_/de bzhin rab 'joms la yang ngo /_/ba yas+thA ni shal+ma lI/_/phan da kA ko li skyu ru ra'o/_/pa yas+tha ni gzhon nu dang /_/tshangs ma tru Ti ku DU tsI/_/man+ma tha ni 'dod sems dang /_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'dod pa'i lha dang ka pit+tha/_/ba ma thu ni skyug pa dang /_/glang po che dang dbang byed la'o/_/ba rU tha ni shing rta sbas/_/ba rU thang ni pags pa'i khyim/_/bi da tha ni/_rnal 'byor dang /_/ka Di na'o/_/sha ma tha/_/zhi ba dang ni blon po la/_/shu dag sha Ti ShaT+gan+thA/_/sen mo'i khyad
[\[195a.2\]]par ShaT+g+ran+tha/_/sa mar+tha ni nus pa dang /_/shor ba bcings shing /_pa'i don phan pa/_/sid+d+hAr+tha zhes bya ba ni/_/don kun grub dang yungs kar dkar/_/k+Sha pa thu ni kha bye dang /_/sbrid pa dang ni phun tshogs la/_/a ni kaSh+Tha ngan pa 'thab/_/mtshan rtags pa Ta/_'joms pa dang /_/
[\[195a.3\]]rgyal po bsrung dang lam po che/_/'dus dang mkhas pa rnams la'o/_/i ti ru thA/_grong gtam dang /_/prab+haSh+Ta yi chos la'o/_/pA ti ka thA zhes bya ba/_/sa bdag tshig dang ma dad pa/_/u da ra thi nyi ma mtsho/_/tse tuSh+pa tha bzhi mdo'i lam/_/yang dag
[\[195a.4\]]'gro dang gnyis skyes la/_/tsi tri ra tha rigs 'dzin dang /_/dri za'i bye brag dag la'o/_/da sha mI s+tha nyi ma dang /_/gnas brtan dang ni chags zad la/_/ba na pras+tha sbrang rtsi'i gnas/_/bsti gnas gsum pa/_kiM shu ka'o/_/a pra ti ra tha zhes pa/_/dpa'
[\[195a.5\]]ba dang ni ltad mo dang /_/snyan tshig dang ni bkra shis la/_/tha yig mtha'i sde tshan no//_//da ni dag dang 'bod pa la/_/dA ni ma ma gcod dang /_sbyin/_/an+du rgyan gyi bye brag dang /_/'ching bar byed pa'i dngos po la/_/in+da lo dang sprin dang ni/_/glegs bam
[\[195a.6\]]dang ni ri'i bye brag_/kan+da shing gi rtsa ba dang /_/sprin dang nu ma/_sU ra Na/_/kun+daM mA/_g+h+ya/_'khor lo g.yo/_/ni bi dang ni lha yi dgra/_/ga da khyab 'jug spun zla nang /_/gA da mtshon cha'i khyad par la/_/i dA 'dab ma gshog pa dang /_/mdud pa'i lo ma ta mA
[\[195a.7\]]la/_/in+da/_bsam pa 'jug pa la/_/pI dA/_bu mo yid 'dod la/_/na dI 'bab chu /na da mtsho/_/dmar po sogs dang sgra la'o/_/nan+di zhi ba mchod pa dang /_/dga' dang rgyan po 'gyed pa la/_/nan+dA nor bu phun tshogs la/_/nan+di snod dang bkur 'debs dang /_/ba daM
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]tshig dang gnas la'o/_/bya da spyod dang smod pa la/_/bA da/_des mtshon sgra dang ni/_/skyob dang mtshan ma dngos po dang /_/rkang pa rgyu byed rtsa ba dang /_/bzhi cha dang ni 'od zer dang /_/ri yi mtha' dang ri bo la/_/bi dA shes dang 'dod pa dang /_/'byor pa po 'joms dkar po la/_/
[\[195b.2\]]de bi rnam par 'gro ba gsum/_/sor gdub rgya dang blo dang ni/_/legs byas sa yi mthil la'o/_/ban+taM/_grong dpon dge ba la/_/b+he ta/_rnam gnyis/_khyad par la/_/bi dA/_'thag dang /_nye bar smra/_/ma dI/_zhing las/_dngos po la/_/ma dA/_myos 'gyur/_glang rtsi dang /_/sbyin
[\[195b.3\]]dang tho ba mchog la'o/_/man+da rang dbang ngan pa dang /_/dal bar dga' dang rmongs gzhan sbyor/_/gza' spen pa dang skal med dang /_/glang po'i rigs kyi khyad par la'o/_/mri du/_rno med 'jam po la/_/ra da/_so dang myu gu la/_/sha da/_'dzim pa/_sha Sh+yaM'o/_/sU da/_
[\[195b.4\]]gsal byed yon tan la/_/swA du/_zhim dang /_yid 'ong la/_/sbe da/_rdul dang tshong pa la/_/hri di snying la'o k+Sho da ni/_/phye ma dang ni zhib mo la/_/aM ga da ni/_skya dang bu/_/aM ga daM ni dpung rgyan la'o/_/aM ga dA ni lho phyogs kyi/_/glang po che la glang mo la/_/arbu da ni grangs
[\[195b.5\]]bye brag_/sha 'dzer dang ni ri bo la/_/a r+d+han+du ni zla phyed dang /_/lag sor sen mos mtshan ma la/_/A krAn+da ni mi bzad sgras/_/du dang grogs dang dpun zla la/_/a mo da ni dri bzung dga'/_/A spa daM ni bya pa/_/gnas/_/ka ku da ni glang gi lus/_/nog dang rgyal po'i
[\[195b.6\]]mtshon byed la/_/ka pat+da ni dpa' bo dang /_/bde 'byung ral pa'i tshogs dang ni/_/rwa dang gtso bo karkan+da/_/yi ge bcas dang yal ga dang /_/chu yi dra ba phug tu 'gro/_/gyen du 'degs pa rnams la'o/_/kar+Nan+du ni rna/_zhags la/_/kA ma dA ni gzhon ma la/_/'dod
[\[195b.7\]]pa 'jo bar byed pa la/_/ku mu da ni phyogs kyi glang /_/klu dang lha min khyad par dang /_/mtho ris la'o ku mu daM/_/kai ra ba la blta bar bya/_/ku mu daM ni 'dam skyes dkar/_/ku mu dA ni bum can dang /_/gam+b+hA ri yi shing dag la/_/ku mu daM ni/_sa dga' dang /_/mda' dang
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ral gri dag la'o/_/kU si da ni le lo bcas/_/ku sI daM ni 'phel 'tsho byed/_/kau mu da ni smin drug can/_/kau mu dI ni/_zla ba can/_/kra byA da ni ro zan dang /_/sha za dang ni srin po la'o/_/go bin+da ni dbang gzhan skyes/_/ba lang mig dang dbyangs
[\[196a.2\]]bdag la/_/goSh+ba daM ni pa lang gi_/rmig rjes g.yang sa ba lang 'gros/_/spyod yul la'o goSh+pa da/_/brtan pa dang ni sa la'o/_/sprin dang musta dza la dang /_/srang dang sman pa dzI pa dang /_/ngur ba rkyal byed/_u ra dang /_/sprin dang ma sta/_to ya dang /_/to ya de ni
[\[196a.3\]]mar la 'dod/_/da ra da ni 'jigs g.yang sa/_/gnya'o shes dang bu dag la/_/dA ra da ni dngul chu dang /_/rgya mtsho/_mtshal dang dug bye brag_/tri sha dang ni/_zhib btags dang /_/dro ba dar dpyangs grong dpon la/_/sbyin byed dpal sbyin/_/d+ha na dang /_/narma da ni rtsed
[\[196a.4\]]mo ldan/_/rtsed 'jo byed ma/_narma dA/_/nam gru ma la yang de bzhin/_/na la di ni chu srin sbyin/_/spang spos can dang pu shel tse/_/no r+pI da ni yongs su rgol/_/yongs su mthar phyin smra ba la/_/ni ShA da ni dbyangs kyi dbye/_/khyi sha 'tshed pa la yang ngo /_/pra NA da
[\[196a.5\]]ni/_nad dbye dang /_/shin tu mtho ba'i sgra la'o/_/pa ma da ni 'dod mo myos/_/bra ma da ni snyems dang dga'/_/pra pa da ni rab dang pa/_/snyan ngag rgyan gyi khyad par dang /_/shin tu dad dang rjes su 'dzin/_/sgra sgrogs lha min/_pra hA dang /_/prA sA da ni lha mi dang /_/
[\[196a.6\]]lha yi bskyod pa dag la'o/_/ma ra da ni bu mo zhi/_/ba ra da ni rab dang la'o/_/b+ha sa da ni/_dus dang spyod/_/sha dang 'od gsal ba la'o/_/maR+YA dA ni gnas dang mtshams/_/khrims lugs dang ni spyod pa la'o/_/ma kan+da ni ro bcud 'dzin/_/mA kan+d+hI dang /_skyu ru'i
[\[196a.7\]]'bras/_/me nA da ni/_ri byi la/_/'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la/_/ba tan+di ni parka ra/_/shing lcags dang ni stegs bu la'o/_/bi sha da ni skye bo kha dog/_dang /_gsal ba dang ni sa ra ta/_/'dam bu dang ni lo dag la/_/shA ra dI chu'i bispa lI/_/'dab ma bdun pa'o sha ra dang /_/sA
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]li dang ni murga ser/_/bar+pa lo dang sgrub dang mngags/_/sam+pad/_yon tan bstod pa dang /_/'byor ba do shal rab dbye la/_/sam+bid/_/dam bca' ba dang brda/_/ye shes kun spyod ming dang ni/_/chu dang bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_/'thab dang yang dag 'chad pa la/_/saM b+he da ni/_rnam phye dang /_/rgya mtsho yang dag 'grogs pa
[\[196b.2\]]la/_/su nan+dA ni sred/_bud med/_/k+Sha Na da ni tshogs can dang /_/dga' ston sbyin pa'o k+ShaN dam/_/chu la'o k+Sha Na dA mtshan mo/_/a pa pA da smod pa dang /_/bka' dang /_yid brtan dag la'o/_/a b+hi s+yan+da mngon par 'phel/_/'dzag pa dang ni mig la yang /_
[\[196b.3\]]a b+hi ma d+ha/_sgra bsrub shing /_/aSh+TA pa dA shA ri'i 'bras/_/sha ra b+ha dang /_spre'u dang /_/zla ba'i phreng ba la yang ngo /_/e ka pa dam dus dang lam/_/rkang gcig la'o de nas ni/_/ka Tu kan+da sdig pa dang /_/shi gru'i khu ba dag la'o/_/ku ru bin+da musta dang /_/pul+mA Sha
[\[196b.4\]]dang /_'bru'i dbye ba/_/ku ru ban+di tho ba dang /_/pad+ma rA ga mtshal dag la/_/ko ka na da pad+ma dmar/_/dmar po'i ke ra ba la'o/_/tsakra tsun+da 'od phung dang /_/rwa byas nya yi bye brag la/_/tsa tuSh+pa dA rta glang sogs/_/bud med byed pa'i khyad par la/_/dza na pa da/_yul
[\[196b.5\]]dang ljongs/_/ta mo nu ta mun sel dang /_/zla ba nyi ma me rnams la/_/pa rI bA da smod pa dang /_/pi wang brdung ba'i dngos po la/_/pI Tha mdad a d+hi Sh+Ti/_/gar dang 'dren pa dga' ba la/_/pu Ta b+he dang chu klung khang /_/grong khyer dang ni gzhal med khang /_/lam dang
[\[196b.6\]]dang po'i tshes dang ni/_/yang dag rig pa la yang dran/_/pr-i yam+ba da mkha' spyod dang /_/snyan par smra ba nyid la'o/_/ma hA nA da sgra chen po/_/dbyar dus sprul chen glang po la/_/mu tsu kun+da/_thub pa dang /_/lha min shing gi khyad par la/_/me g+ha nA da/_nyi ma dang /_/
[\[196b.7\]]lang+ka mgrin bcu'i bu la'o/_/bi shA ra da mkhas pa dang /_/spobs ldan 'jigs pa med pa la/_/biSh+Nu pa da/_rgya mtsho dang /_/nam mkha' dang ni chu skyes la/_/biSh+Nu pa dI sgo glegs dang /_/rtsal gyi dbye ba dag la yang /_/sha ta hwA da/_klog ldan sprin/_/rtse mo
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]brgya pa dag la'o/_/sU ka pa daM/_spros pa dang /_/rtse mo'i phung po rtsa la'o/_/sa nye ba dang /_/khrims lugs ldan pa dag la'o/_/sa ha sra bA da zhes pa/_/nyi ma dang ni za ma tog_/chos dang gsang dang nye bar 'gog_/dul dang ngos khyim mchog
[\[197a.2\]]sbyin la/_/da yig mtha'i sde tshan no//_//d+ha ni nor dang nor dbang la/_/d+hA ni 'dzin byed chos nyid la/_/an+d+haM rab rib mthong bas dman/_/long ba mngon par brjod pa'o/_/an+d+hi chu gter mtsho mchog la/_/ar+d+haM cha mnyam/_/phyed/_dum bu/_/a d+hi/_sems dang
[\[197a.3\]]gzir ba dang /_/mi 'dod 'ching dang /_/phongs dang gnas/_/bid+b+ha kun tu gdung dang 'bar/_/r-i d+haM/_'byor dang 'brel ba dang /_/g+han+d+ha dri can yang dag 'brel/_/cha shas 'dod dga' snyems pa la/_/gA d+ha gnas sogs 'dod pa la/_/go d+hA mthil dang ni hA ka_/dag+d+ha
[\[197a.4\]]gnas dang nyi ma shing /_/dag+haM bsregs pa la yang ngo /_/da d+hi dpal stug zho dang ni/_/dpal gnas dang ni gnas la'o/_/dig+d+haM dus dang /_bi shi Sha/_/nip+ta'i don can la yang ngo /_/dug+d+haM 'o ma rab tu dang /_/dog+d+ha be'u ba lang skyong /_/shin tu nyer 'tsho snyan ngag mkhan/_/
[\[197a.5\]]dan+d+haM phyung dang bcings pa la/_/A d+hi 'ching dang tshul dang gnyen/_/pan+d+hU spun zla rtsa lag la/_/gnyen can dang ni shing la yang /_/bA d+hA/_sdug bsngal dgag pa la/_/bud+d+ha bde gshegs bstan dang zhi/_/blo dang ldan pa rnams la'o/_/bud+d+ha mkhas zhi/_rtogs pa dang /_/smin
[\[197a.6\]]pa dang ni de bzhin gshegs/_/bud+d+hi 'phel dang 'byor dang sman/_/dga' ba'i cha shas khyad par la/_/br-id+d+ha skyes dang snyan ngag mkhan/_/rgas 'khogs la'o br-id+d+haM ni/_/ri las skyes pa la yang ngo /_/bo d+hi ting 'dzin dbye ba dang /_/byang chub rtogs pa/_sa la skyes/_/
[\[197a.7\]]ma d+hu me tog bcud dang ni/_/sbrang skyes chang chu 'o ma la/_/mngar dang sbrang rtsi can dri zhim/_/ri mo lha min khyad par la/_/'tsho ba yal ga la yang ngo /_/mi d+haM/_la lo/_bshes gnyen dang /_/bsam pa mngon phyogs/_mdzes dang gnas/_/me d+ha mchod sbyin blo gros
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]gtsang /_/me b+hi ngan pa mi bzad pa/_/rA d+hA/_lcug ma'i dbye ba dang /_/ri mo'i dbye dang gzhu can dang /_/sa ga/_klog dang khyab 'jug gnon/_/rgyal gyi 'bras bu rnams la'o/_/rA d+hA/_sa ga skyes la'o/_/lup+d+ha/_rngon pa 'dod can la/_/ba d+hU/_bu mo chung ma dang /_/
[\[197b.2\]]btsun mo mna' ma sar pa dang /_/ras dang ri skegs spos rnams la/_/bi d+hi/_de 'dra 'phangs dang bcug_/bi d+hi byed po cho ga dang /_/dus dang /_nges pa rnams la'o/_/ba d+ha rnams pa rdzu 'phrul dang /_/glang po'i zas dang thob dang sgrub/_/bi d+hu ri bong mtshan ma dang /_/
[\[197b.3\]]khyab 'jug_/ga pur srin po'i dbye/_/byA d+hi/_nad dang khyab pa dang /_/bsnun dang /_rngon pa/_gdug pa can/_/shud+d+ha 'ba' zhig gtsang ba la/_/shrad+d+ha dad pa nyid dang 'dod/_/shrAd+d+haM nges par gnas pa la/_/shrAd+d+ha dad dang ldan pa la/_/san+d+hA gnas dang dam bcas
[\[197b.4\]]dang /_/kun tu 'dzin pa la yang ngo /_/sin+d+hi/_dbye ba mtshon legs dang /_/bu g.yang dag spyod pa la/_/sA d+hu/_legs mdzes skyes bu dam/_/sed+ha rtag pa rdzogs pa dang /_/rab tu grags dang lha dag la/_/grub dang mngon par rab 'dzin dang /_/sgrub dang
[\[197b.5\]]sbyor ba la yang ngo /_/sin+d+hu chu gter chu klung yul/_/rgyags pa dang ni 'bab chu la/_/su d+hA/_bdud rtsi/_ts+tshU d+hA ni/_/dUrbA/_sgu hi /gaM ga ra gnas/_/sri d+hu blo dang bu ram la/_/skan+d+ha/_lus dang skabs dang ni/_/dpung pa'i rtsa ba/_tshogs dang 'dus/_/sa bdag mi dang glang
[\[197b.6\]]po che/_/rta rnams yang dag bsdus pa la/_/snig+b+ha/_mnyes gshin/_phun tshogs dang /_/ci ska Na la mngon par brjod/_/s+sar+d+hA yang dag dga' dang mtshungs/_/'gran dang rim pa kun nas mtho/_/aM gA d+ha ni mthil reg min/_/a ba d+hi ni kun tu 'dzin/_/mtshams
[\[197b.7\]]dus khung bu gnas la'o/_/a nad+d+haM ni bcings pa dang /_/kun tu bcings dang rdza rnga sogs/_/A ban+d+ha ni dga' ma'i rgyan/_/brtan par bcings pa la yang brjod/_/A bid+d+ha ni rab bsnun dang /_/'khyog po/_dgag pa/_lus 'greng dang /_/zol byed pa dang 'khor lo
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]la/_/u pa d+hi ni nye bar 'dzin/_/khyad par rgyan 'gyed chos sems dang /_/bu bza'i bya ba la yang ngo /_/ka ban+d+ha ni da ra dang /_/sgra gcan srin po'i dbye ba la/_/ka ban+d+ha ni/_chu dang 'gro/_/spyi bo dang ni lus la'o/_/dUrbi d+ha ni/_sdug bsngal
[\[198a.2\]]dman/_/na ro d+ha ni 'gog dang bsam/_/ni kha d+ha ni ri dang yul/_/de yi rgyal po mkhregs pa la/_/n+ya gro d+ha ni/_b+ha Ta'i shing /_/sa mi 'dom gang mnyam pa la/_/n+ya gro d+hi ni/_dug lo ma/_/rmongs byed ma dang b+h-i d+h+ra'o/_/ba ra d+hi ni mchod sbyin spyod/_/nyi ma'i
[\[198a.3\]]nye bar bskor ba la/_/yal ga_/mchod sbyin/_shing la yang /_/pra si d+d+ha ni grags dang rgyan/_/mA ga d+hA ni yul dbus nas/_/byung dang rgyal rigs rje rigs skyes/_/phyag 'tshal 'tsho ba dag la'o/_/mA ga d+hA ni zegs ma khyu/_/bi ba d+ha ni yongs su za/_/lam la
[\[198a.4\]]'khor dang bI ba d+hi/_/bi bu d+ha ni mkhas dang lha/_/rnam par sbyangs dang nges bdag nyid/_/bi shrad+d+ha ni zhi ba dang /_/thams cad sgrol dang dpa' ba la/_/san+nad+d+ha ni go cha bgos/_/yal ga/_go ling /_rnam skyes la/_/san+ni d+ha ni kun tu 'dzin/_/pho mo'i dbang po'i
[\[198a.5\]]spyod yul la/_/sa mA d+hi ni bsam gtan dang /_/ngag med nges pa/_/nus pa la/_/sam+bA d+ha ni/_shaM ka Ta/_/skye gnas dri bzangs shaM ga ra/_/saM ro d+ha ni mngon 'dod dri/_/sug smel skyes dang 'phangs dang 'gog_/saM sid+d+hi ni 'dod pa dang /_/mtshams ldan ma dang rang
[\[198a.6\]]bzhin grub/_/a ni rud+d+ha dran pa'i bu/_/spyod dang lus med skyes la'o/_/a nu ban+d+ha gtso bo yi/_/rjes su 'brang dang rtag pa dang /_/skyon bskyed pa dang rang bzhin sbyin/_/rab tu 'jug dang nges 'jug la'o/_/a nu bin+d+hi skyigs bu dang /_/sred pa la yang blta bar
[\[198a.7\]]bya/_/a b+ha ro d+ha dag pa'i mtha'/_/rgyal po'i khab dang an+ta r+d+hi/_/a baSh+Da b+d+haM/_mnan pa dang /_/ring ba dang ni 'phyang ba la/_/A ban+d+ha ni dbugs dbyung dang /_/spre'u'i gnas dang dra ba can/_/i k+Shu gan+dA/_spu gri dang /_/glo dang khro ba gze ma la/_/u gra gan+d+ha shu dag dang /_/
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]dza ma ni dang /_sbrid 'byung sman/_/u pa la b+d+hi 'thob pa dang /_/blo gros shes rab mtshan nyid ma/_/kA la kan+d+ha ta mA la/_/tsin+du ka dang 'tsho byed shing /_/b+hIk+Sh+Na gan+d+ha shu dag dang /_/ske tshe ma ta sh+li gru'o/_/tr-i NaM go d+hA tsi tra ka_/rgya skyegs dang ni rtsangs pa'o/_/ba ri bya d+ha 'dod
[\[198b.2\]]chung dang /_/ut+ta la'i shing la'o/_/brah+ma/_/ban+d+hu lhag par 'dor/_/nges par ston dang gnyis skyes mchog_/ma hau ra Sha dug bca' sga/_/shr-ing+ga ba ra/_ro bcud do/_/sa mun+nad+d+ha kun tu 'byung /_/mkhas par rlom dang tshim pa la/_/yo dza na gan+b+ha/_glang rtsi/_/rgyas pas spros dang
[\[198b.3\]]bsil ba la'ang /_/d+ha mtha'i snge'o//_//nI ni 'dren pa dang ni gru/_/na ni rgyal dang /_mchod pa la/_/nau ni/_/gru dang skyes pa la/_/nu ni/_bstod pa stong byed la/_/an+naM zas brjod pa la'o/_/i na sa bdag nyi ma bdag_/un+ni yul dang byed skyod la/_/U naM sgra dang skyed
[\[198b.4\]]mos tshal/_/dman pa la'o kr-iSh+Na ni/_/thams cad lto ba chu la'o/_/g+hu NaM/_'khar ba'i pheg rdob dang /_/sil snyan bar ma'i gar la'o/_/g+ha na/_sprin dang /_/mus+t+wa dang /_/rgya chen lcags kyi thob la/_/sra dang /_mkhregs dang /_gsher bcas la'o/_/tsi t+naM rgyal
[\[198b.5\]]mtshan tsam dang ni/_/mtshan ma dang ni ba dan la/_/tsI na yul dang gos dang 'bru/_/ri dgas khyad par rgyud kyi dbye/_/ts+tshan+naM bkab dang gsang ba la/_/ts+tshin+naM dbye ba/_ts+tshin+nA gi/_/shi g.yo thal mo sA ma ra/_/dza na 'jig rten 'jig rten che/_/'jig rten gzhan yang blta
[\[198b.6\]]bar bya/_/dza nI bu mo mtshams ldan ma/_/dza ni 'byung ba'o dzi na ni/_/dgra bcom sangs rgyas shin tu rgan/_/rgyal po'i lta bu phra ba dang /_/byi la dang ni/_chung ngu tsam/_/dA naM/_/gtong ba glang po/_myos/_/gcod dang dag dang /_/bsrung ba la/_/dA nu sbyin byed rnam gnon
[\[198b.7\]]la/_/dI nA byi ba btsun mo la/_/dI na ngan 'gro kA ta ra/_/rlum+nA/_'byor pa pha rol gnon/_/d+ha nu gzhu dang dra ba dang /_/khyim gyi dbye ba la yang ngo /_/d+ha naM nor dang 'byor pa la/_/d+hA nA b+h+r-iSh+Ta ya ba dang /_/so ba myu gu chu gter la/_/d+he na 'jo ba chu bo la/_/nag+na/_gcer bu
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gos bral dang /_/zad byed pa dang mchod 'os so/_/yU naM dman pa smod pa la/_/bA nI/_btung ba srung ba la/_/ba naM nags tshal chu dang ni/_/dga' ston dang ni rab gnas la/_/biSh+naM gos dang rin dang ni/_/be ta na dang rdzas dag la/_/ba d+ha/_si tA/_
[\[199a.2\]]dbang ldan dang /_/d+hA nu/_nyi ma 'od 'bar la/_/b+hIn+ni bcom dang /_grogs dang /_gsal/_/mA ni tshod ma/_bre sogs dang /_/'jal dang /_/sems dang /_/'dzin pa dang /_/mchod pa'o/_mI na zhes bya ba/_/nya dang khyim gyi dbye ba la/_/mu ni/_ngag bcad sangs rgyas dang /_/ri
[\[199a.3\]]byi dang ni kiM shu ka_/ang+gu dI dang /_/mr-it+s+na dang /_/tu pa ri dang sa dag la/_ya naM phyi dang 'gro ba la/_/yo ni 'byung gnas bud med dbang /_/rat+naM nor bu gtso bo'o/_/raSh+na sman dang /_gtum po'o/_/raSh+nA sprul mig e la'i 'dab/_/lag+naM khyim rnams 'chang ba ste/_/yang
[\[199a.4\]]dag chags dang dam pa rgyal/_/bA ni/_'bras bu skam po dang /_/skam po'i rgun po myA ni/_/su rung+ga dang /_/chu rlabs dang /_/dri zhim/_ka Ta 'gro ba la/_/bin+naM shes dang gnas dang thob/_/shI na gnyid log rmongs pa dang /_/sh+ye na dkar dang /_bya ba'i bye brag_/rwa dang mkhas
[\[199a.5\]]dang /_lam la'o/_/ba na lcug ma/_bA t+ya la/_/sU nu nyi ma/_phu nu'o/_/sU naM bcas dang rab tu skyes/_/sU na/_/muts+tsha dkar po la/_/sU n+yA/_bu mo 'ching gnas dang /_/ga la shuN+Di la yang 'dod/_/s+t+yA na le lo dud pa dang /_/snum dang pra ti/_shru d+ya la/_/s+thA ni/_gnas de 'dra ba
[\[199a.6\]]dang /_/nges par 'jug dang go skabs dang /_/rigs pa'i don dang byed don dang /_/sru na/_nyi ma 'od zer la/_/swa sna/_gnyid log_/blo brel mthong /_/ha gu 'gram pa yan lag dang /_/'chi dang mtshon cha be con dang /_/tshong dus dang ni sgeg mo la/_/hI naM/_smad dang
[\[199a.7\]]dman pa la/_/ang+ga naM ni yan lag mchog_/theg pa dang ni lus ma dang /_/nA paM kA yaM khyad par la/_/any+dza na ni phyogs byed dbang /_/any+dza naM ni mig sman bcud/_/sud+kI dud pa so so pIr/_/shing gi dbye ba la yang ngo /_/any+dza na ni thu bo'i dbye/_/rlung dang
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]sa lI'o/_/any+dza nA/_/byug pa dang ni btsun mo la/_/s+thA na ni dus dang lam/_/kun nas nyon mongs phung po dus/_/a pA na ni/_bshang lam rlung /_/a sA naM ni bshang lam 'dod/_/am+nA na ni chen po grogs/_/a ya na ni/_lam nyi ma/_/lho dang byang du bgrod
[\[199b.2\]]pa la/_/na rat+ni ka Ta'i 'bras/_/tang+gu la dang re mig bcas/_/ardzu na ni sa bdag dang /_/ka ku b+ha dang /_brtson 'grus byed/_/gtsug phud phyed dang /_dkar po la/_/ardzu nI ni ba lang gnas/_/bang chung dang ni lag chu la/_/ardzu ni ni/_rtsa mig nad/_/don
[\[199b.3\]]dang /_slong dang gnod sbyin dang /_/bstan dang /_rnam par brtsod pa dang /_/chu khams smod dang rta dang glang /_/rna ba dang ni dbang chen la/_/aR+sho g+hI/_tA la'i 'dab/_/'brum bu 'joms dang dpa' byed do/_/a ba naM ni srung byed dang /_/sdig pa/_bung ba/_a lA dga'/_/
[\[199b.4\]]a sha ni ni rdo rje dang /_/glog dang gnam lcags la 'dod do/_/a bik+nI ni 'bab chu dang /_/mngags pa dag mtha'/rgan btsun ma/_/bdag dang tshangs pa yid dang lus/_/rang bzhin/_brtan pa/_blo rnams la/_/A dA naM ni bdag dang mad/_/rab bsnun rgyal po'i rgyan
[\[199b.5\]]la'o/_/A ban+na ni phongs gyur pa'o/_/A sa ni/_ni glang po che'o/_/phrag pa gdan dang gdan la gnas/_/a sa nI ni tshong zong ngo /_/A sa na ni mgyogs byed shing /_/ut+tA naM ni gan rkyal dang /_/gnyid log pa dang zab pa'o/_/ut+thA naM ni ldang ba dang /_/rgyud dang /_skyed
[\[199b.6\]]tshal dga' dang 'thob/_/rab lus zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_/gyad kyi shugs dang glegs bam la/_/u dA naM ni mgrin pa'i rlung /_/rgya shug 'khyil dang rlung bye brag_/ud+dA naM ni sgyed pu dang /_/de bzhin gyen du 'gro ba'o/_/u dA naM ni skyed tshal dang /_/rtsed mo'i
[\[199b.7\]]sa dang des spro la/_/ka Thi nA ni/_snod dang ni/_/bu ram ka ra'i gong bu la/_/ka Thi nAM ni thod le skor/_/ka thi naM ni gya tshom mo/_/ka da naM ni 'khrug sdig 'dod/_/kA ma na 'dod mya ngan med/_/'dod pa can dang gzugs bzang ngo /_/kam+pa naM ni g.yo ba dang /_/'gul
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]ba khyab pa/_bya ba la/_/karta naM ni gcod pa dang /_/shing bal rgyud dang las btsun mo/_/kalpa naM ni gtsod dang nus/_/glang po skyes mchog kalpa nA/_/kA ki nI ni/_/tshong zong dang /_/tshad kyi shing bu bzhi cha la/_/kany+tsa na ni klu shing dang /_/nA ga ge sar
[\[200a.2\]]tsadza ka_/u dum+bA ra/_kA ny+dza nA/_/kAny+tsa nAM ni yung ba la/_/kAny+tsa naM ni/_ge sar/_gser/_/kA na nAM ni/_nags dang khyim/_/gdong bzhi'i gdong la'o/_/kA nI na/_/rgyas pa dang ni rna ba can/_/ka n+ya kA yi bu dag la/_/'jigs dang phyag 'tshal kA mi nI/_/kA ma ni/_'dod
[\[200a.3\]]tsam ka ka dang /_/phug ron la'o kun+nA naM/_/'ching bu'i snod dang /_phru'i bye brag_/ku ha nA ni ngan g.yo'i spyod/_/phrag dog dang ni tshul 'chos so/_/kri ti na mkhas dang rung ba la/_/ke ta naM ni mtshon ma khyim/_/pa dan las dang 'bod pa la/_/mdzes dang yul
[\[200a.4\]]gcig kau bi ni/_/smod dang ngan las gsad dang 'thab/_/ku lI na dang bcud lag 'gro/_/phyugs dang 'dab chags rnams la yang /_/kran+da A+oM ni 'bod pa dang /_/mchi ma dang ni/_rnam grol la'o/_/khang+gAn bse dang /_bse ru dang /_/ral gri'i mtshon cha la yang
[\[200a.5\]]ngo /_/gan+dA naM ni mtshon byed dang /_/'tshe dang spro dang /_rab gsal la/_/gardza ni ni khro dang sgra/_/sgra med pa yi sprin la'o/_/ga ha ne ni nags tshal dang /_/sdug bsngal/_tshang tshing /_rtsod ldan la/_/dug shing gis bsregs phyugs kyi sha'o/_/guny+dza naM Ni rtags can
[\[200a.6\]]la/_/go mIn sa yi dbang phyug dang /_/'phrog byed dge bsnyen chen po la/_/gau sta nI ni do shal 'khrugs/_/do shal dbye ba/_ba'i nu ma/_/grA bAn/_rdo ba/_/ri chu/_brtse/_/g+hat+ta nA ni g.yo ba dang /_/kun tu 'jug dang 'khor lo can/_/'phrog byed sprul dang ku lA la/_/
[\[200a.7\]]ko ka grong gi dra ba la/_/spal ba'i dbye ba tsan da na/_/ma la ya skyes tsan dan ni/_/tsa n+da ni chu klung dbye/_/tsar+m+lin ba bas pa/_'bras bu'i shing /_/'bras bu'i lag dang 'jam pa yi/_/pags dang b+h+r-ing+ga/_rI Ta la/_/tsa la naM ni g.yo dang 'gul/_/g.yo ba'i sa la la
[\[200b\]]
