[\[200b.1\]]yang ngo /_/tsa ma nI/_gos/_g+haN+ta rAM/_/tsA bI'i dbye ba la yang blta/_/tse ta na ni sems dang rigs/_/yang dag rigs pa rnams la'o/_/ts+tshe da naM ni 'dab ma gdugs/_/khang pa g.yo dang /_ka was/_/grangs/_/'bun la yang ngo ts+tshe da na/_/snod dang 'phyang dang /_/skyug
[\[200b.2\]]pa la/_/ts+tsha da naM ni/_'byed dang /_gcod/_/'gro ba skye bo/_shuSh+ma Na/_/dza g+ha naM ni/_bud med dang /_/ska rags dang ni sngon ma'i cha/_/ka TI da ka rnams la'o/_/dzA ya naM ni rgyal ba rta/_/glang po sogs dang go cha la/_/dza ba na ni myur tsam dang /_/lhag par myur dang
[\[200b.3\]]mgyogs 'gro la/_/yul gyi dbye dang /_tu rulka/_/rab tu phye ba la yang ngo /_/dza ba nI ni/_sman dbye dang /_/dzI phreng ba/_phan nI/_bo de tse/_/dzI bi naM ni/_myur tsam la'ang /_/gnas pa dang ni chu la yang /_/dzi ba nA ni/_tshil la 'dod/_/dzi ba nI ni 'tsho byed shing /_/dz+nyA nI na/_lha shes
[\[200b.4\]]ye shes can/_/ye shes ldan pa rnams la'o/_/ta paN ni nyi ma dang /_/kun tu gdung dang b+ha bla ta/_/dmyal ba'i dbye ba dag la'o/_/ta mo g+h+na zla nyi me/_/blo dang dpal mgrin khyab 'jug dang /_/ta li ni ni byi la dang /_/chung ngu dang ba/_zab pa la/_/ta lu na
[\[200b.5\]]chung lang tsho can/_/ta lu nI ni na chung ma/_/te ma nA ni tshod ma gsher/_/te ma nI ni/_sgyed bu'i dbye/_/to da naM ni/_gzir dang bsnun/_/da ma na ni/_gtong dang 'deng /_/sbyin byed me tog dpa' bo'o/_/dar n+shaM ni mthong me long /_/rmi lam pi dang bstan bcos dang /_/chos
[\[200b.6\]]dang nye bar dmigs pa la/_/da sha na ni/_rtse mo la/_/da sha ni ni go chas so/_/da ha na ni/_gdug spyod dang /_/dro bau b+hal+lA ta dang me/_/dr-i shA na ni gza' yi bdag_/dr-i shA naM ni skar mar brjod/_/de ba na ni zhags pa can/_/de ba naM ni smra 'dod dang /_/rtse ba dang ni tha snyad
[\[200b.7\]]la/_/da sha naM ni/_so/_go cha/_/rlu bAn nyin mo'i mgon dang ni/_/mngon par 'gro ba'o/_a d+h+wan+ni/_/mya ngan thang dang gzhu dang mdung /_/d+han+DIn/_gzhu 'dzin/_Shilga dang /_/srid sgrub shing la'o d+ha ma na/_/me dang smin sbyor 'khrug pa la/_/d+ha ma nI ni g.yo ba dang /_/yung ba
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dang ni mgo dag la/_/d+hA ba ni ni/_sbyor 'od zer/_/khyim lus/_mthu/_gnas/_skye dang rgyug_/dag dang /_dri ba lo ma la/_/sbyangs g.yo/_tshos mkhan tha ga pa'o/_/d+h+wa 'dzin gnyis skyes shing rta dang /_/ri skyes rta dang sbrul la'o/_/nan+da rmA peni dga' dang bu/_/
[\[201a.2\]]nan+da rna ni/_'dres tshal la/_/rtsed bskyod rtse dga' nan+da dI/_/nan+di dga' ba'i dbang phyug go/_/ljon shing /_n+ya gro d+ha bong sgong /_/na li nI ni/_mtsho skyes ma/_/mtsho las skyes dang mtsho mchog dang /_/nam mkha'i gang+gA rgyun can la/_/na li na ni chu chu skyes/_/nAM dA naM ni nad dang
[\[201a.3\]]des/_/dang po'i rgyu dang gnas dag la/_/phrug gu/_phreng ba ni d+ta naM/_/'di b+ha naM tsa/_bum pa 'jig_/ba twI na/_mda' dang /_mkha' 'gro khra/_/ri/_shing /_shing rta/_shing rta can/_/pad+mi nI na/_pad+ma dang /_/pad can mtsho dang /_bud med dbye/_/sarban/_dga' ston dus tshigs
[\[201a.4\]]dang /_/bi Shu bta dang rab 'dzin dang /_/tshes gcig mthong dang tshigs skabs dang /_/mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par la/_/ba ba na/_nI ku lA la'i/_/'tshed gnas rlung dang rnam rtog med/_/bak+Sh+ma na/_mig gi sman dang ni/_/skra dang /_cha phra srad bu sogs/_/bA tsa naM ni
[\[201a.5\]]chu dang /_rka/_/'tshed pa'i gnas dang mkhas pa la/_/pA ShI na ni 'joms pa dang /_/bkra ba dang ni/_/'joms byed dang /_/klog mkhan dang ni gu gul shing /_/pA tsa na ni/_si hA ma/_/pA tsa naM ni/_'tshed byed la/_/pA pa naM ni mang du sems/_/pA ba nI ni a ru ra/_/
[\[201a.6\]]zhags pa can dang /_zhags pa 'dzin/_/bi shu na ni/_ngan pa dang /_/phra ma can dang nA ra dang /_/bi shu naM ni gur kum la/_/pi shu nA ni pr-ik+kA la/_/pI ta na/_ka pi tsU ta'o/_/bi ta naM ni thang shing dang /_/gur gum dang ni bab la'o/_/pU na nA ni srin mo'i dbye/_/phan pa
[\[201a.7\]]a nI ki nI dang /_/dmag gi dbye ba/_sde dang dmag_/pradz+nyA naM ni mtshan ma shes/_/blo'o de nas pra d+ha naM/_/'joms byed dang ni grangs la'o/_/pra d+hA naM ni mchog bdag nyid/_/zhing shes blo dang ma chen dang /_/gcig nyid mchog dang rtag tu ba'o/_/pra sU naM ni
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]skyes pa la/_/pra sU naM ni me tog 'bras/_/pra san+nA ni ma di rA/_/rab tu dang ba dang bcas pa'o/_/pre twan/_bzhad dang rlung la'o/_/pre man mdangs dang rtsed 'jo la/_/phalgu nA ni dka' thub dang /_/sgrub dang ardzu na yi shing /_/phalgu na ni chu klung skyes/_/phAlgu ni ni
[\[201b.2\]]zla ba'i dbye/_/b+han+d+ha ni ni gsod dang 'ching /_/bar+d+ha nA ni/_chu'i dpal yon/_/bar+d+ha naM ni gcod dang 'phel/_/ba si naM ni khebs dang gos/_/ba nA ni/_myos/_mkhas/_gar ma/_/ba sa naM ni gos dang stan/_/'khor dang shes dang gdugs pa la/_/bA hi nI ni dmag gi dbye/_/
[\[201b.3\]]a nI ki nI chu klung dang /_/lci ba la'o bud+d+hA na/_/rtogs pa dang ni mkhas pa la/_/bo d+ha nI ni byang chub dang /_/spi spi lI 'o bod+ha naM/_/spos dang mar me dag la'o/_/byon man lha yi lam dang ni/_/bA ri Ni la brjod par bya/_/bra h+man tshangs pa bram ze dang /_/dus mchod
[\[201b.4\]]zla nyi sbyor ba la/_/thos shes/_/nad dang dka' thub la'ang /_/b+haT+Ti nI ni btsun mo dang /_/zlos gar mkhan dang btsun mo'i rgyal/_/tshangs ma mi pham go cha bgos/_/b+haN+Da naM ni ngan byas la/_/b+harman/_gser dang /_glu gar khur/_/b+ha ba naM ni/_khang pa/_lus/_/b+hA dza naM ni/_/snod
[\[201b.5\]]rung ba/_/b+hA ga nAM ni/_bsam gtan/_byug_/b+hu ba naM ni/_'jig rten chu/_/nam mkha' dang ni 'gro ba la/_/b+ho gin/_gdengs ka ldan pa dang /_/sbrul dang /_grong dpon rgyal po dang /_nA si tA'o/_/b+ho gi nI/_/dbang bskur ma dang rang rigs ma/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams la'o/_/
[\[201b.6\]]maN+Da naM/_rgyan/_rgyan byed pa'o/_/ma da naM ni/_dran pa dang /_/ngan pa/_dpyid/_shing /_pra tshil la/_/ma la na ni lcags gos la/_/ma la naM ni 'joms pa la/_/ma li nI ni me tog can/_/ma li naM ni dga' dang nag_/mAr+dz+dza naM ni byi lar 'dod/_/mar+dz+dza na ni rgya skyegs shing /_/mA li
[\[201b.7\]]nI ni tshigs bcad dbye/_/b+hAM gA phreng ldan btsun mo dang /_/dkar mo tsam+pA'i grong khyer la/_/mi thu nA ni khyim la'o/_/mi thu naM ni/_khyo shug dang /_/chung dang grong dang 'brel chos la/_/mgo zlum yid skyob muN+Da ni/_/me ha naM ni/_dri chu dang /_/shish+na'o mai thu naM zhes pa/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]ni d+hu ba na'o/_/me thu naM/_/yang dag 'grogs pa'o ya ma naM/_/mchog dang 'ching dang zung la'o/_/yA ba naM ni 'jug dus 'dod/_/ser bar byed pa la yang ngo /_/yu dza na ni bram ze dang /_/shA ra tha'o yu ban ni/_/gzhon nu/_gtso bo nges 'dor
[\[202a.2\]]dang /_/stobs dang yangs pa rnams la'o/_/yo dza naM ni rgyang grags bzhi/_/rnal 'byor dang ni mchog bdag la/_/rA dzAM nI ni yung ba dang /_/rgya skyegs 'dam bu/_mtshan mo la'o/_/rany+dza na ni/_chags skyes byed/_/tshos dang mngar dang tsan+dan la/_/rany+dza nI ni
[\[202a.3\]]rams/_/guN+DA/_/le brgan dang ni gsal ba la/_/dza hwan gser dang /_ro shes dang /_/ro ma dang ni ro myong la/_/swa da nAM ni brdzun pa dang /_/spud pa'i rlung dang sbubs kyi rlung /_/rA dzan /zla ba/_mi bdag dang /_/brgya byin/_rgyal rigs/_gnod sbyin gtso/_/dA
[\[202a.4\]]gIn 'dod ldan/_/chags ldan no/_/rA d+ha naM ni/_/sgrub thob mgu/_/ro tsa nI ni/_dur byid/_/sga/_/ro tsa ni ni so ldan dang /_/mun can ma'o/_/ro tsa na/_/shAl+ma li yi shing phung dang /_/rak+ta ka/_h+lA ra/_zhes pa/_/ro tsa nA ni gi wang dang /_/bkra shis dang ni mdzes pa la/_/
[\[202a.5\]]ro da naM ni du ba dang /_/mchi ma 'dzeg pa tsam la yang /_/ro ha ni sna chen ro hi ta/_/byang chub shing dang n+ya gro d+hA/_/lam g+ha naM ni gom pa dang /_/phyin dang byas dang lhung dang rkyal/_/la la na ni bud med dang /_/lce dang rtsa yi khyad par la/_/lak+Shan mtshan ma
[\[202a.6\]]gtso bo la/_/lAny+tsa naM ni ming mtshan ma/_/le kha ne ni yi ger dgod/_/tshod dang /_gro ba dag la ni/_/shu dag bram ze tshig ngan no/_/ba pa naM ni mgo zlum gnas/_/ba ma naM ni/_skyugs dbyibs/_slong /_/b+r+dz+ra naM ni gtong dang 'tshe/_/b+r+dz+ra naM ni nags tshal dang /_/
[\[202a.7\]]'tsho ba dang ni shing bal rgyun/_/brta na ni/_rtogs/_bsdus nyid/_/brta nA ni lam la'o/_/par+Ni na ri mo byed pa dang /_/tshangs par spyod dang yi ge pa'o/_/brtan lus dang shin tu mdzes/_/tshad ma rnam pa dag la'o/_/bA g+min tshig bdag snam bu la/_/bA dzin
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rta dang /_mkha' 'gro mda'/_/bA ma na ni/_khyab 'jug dbye/_/oM ko Tha dang yA mye dang /_/mi'u thung dang phyogs kyi glang /_/rnam par rul dang mi g.yo dang /_/snyigs dang rgas dang 'khogs la yang /_/bi ts+tshen+na ni yang dag thob/_/rnam dbye dang ni 'khyog po la/_/bi dz+nyA
[\[202b.2\]]naM ni las dang shes/_/bi tA naM ni gtong ba dal/_/gyen mig bla re mchod sbyin las/_/tshigs bcad dbye dang /_skad cig dang /_skabs dang 'khrug pa dag la'o/_/bi ban+na ni lag 'gro dang /_/pi pang+ga ta zhig pa la/_bi ma na ni nam mkha'i thog_/sa bdun dang ni shing
[\[202b.3\]]la yang /_/bi lag+na/_ni lus dbus dang /_kun tu chags dang dus sbyor la/_/bi Sha g+h+na ni/_shi rI Sha/_/gu DU tsi da/_dur byid la/_/br-i dzi naM ni/_/rnyog pa dang /_/'khyog po dang ni skra la'o/_/br-i Shan/_rna ba lha'i dbang phyug_/ba da naM ni shes pa seng /_/beSh+Ta nang ni/_rna ba
[\[202b.4\]]dang /_/shaSh+ku lI dang gtsug tor dang /_/cod pan dang ni/_bkrid pa la/_/byany+dza naM ni tshod ma dang /_/sma ra dang ni mtshan rtags dang /_/yan lag can la sogs pa dang /_/rang dbang du ni byas pa la/_/o d+h+wo naM ni 'gog spyod la/_/bya sa naM ni mi dge sdig_/btung ba
[\[202b.5\]]dang ni ri dgas sogs/_/lha yi mi 'dod 'bras bu dang /_/nus pa rgud pa 'bras med la/_/sha ku naM ni bkra shis dang /_/'dod pa dang ni rgyu mtshan la/_/sha kun ni bya la'o/_/sha ku ni ni mkha' 'gro dang /_/stobs bzang bu dang byed pa'i dbye/_/shaM khi nI ni dung gi
[\[202b.6\]]tshogs/_/sprul dang bud med rab dbye dang /_/dkar dang tso ra'i me tog la/_/sha ta g+h+nI mtshon cha'i dbye/_/ka rany+dza dang sdig pa la/_/sha ma sha ni gshin rje dang /_/mdzes pa dang ni gsod byed la/_/shi ma naM yang de ltar 'dod/_/sha ma naM ni/_mal tsam dang /_/gnyid dang
[\[202b.7\]]rab dga' dag la yang /_/sha khin shing dang rig byed dang /_/tu ruSh+ka dang /_skye bo la/_/sha sa naM ni bstan bcos dka'/_/rgyal pos byin dang chen po dang /_/bstan pa dang ni yi ge la/_/shi khin rgyal mtshan gza' dang me/_/rma bya dang ni bya gag mda'/_/glang
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]dang ba ka/_ljon shing dang /_/gtsug phud ldan pa rnams la'o/_/shilpin/_shing bzo ba la'o/_/shilpi ni ni sna can ma'o/_/shrang+gin/_klu dang khyu mchog dang /_/ri bo shing dang mdzes pa dang /_/rnal 'byor dbye ba rnams la'o/_/shri g+ha na ni bde
[\[203a.2\]]gshegs dang /_/dge slong la'o shrI g+ha ni/_/zho dang ni rda dag la'o/_/sh+leSh+ma g+han+ni/_mal+li kA/_/g.yo ldan dang ni dbu ba skyes/_/shA sa na ni rlung dang dbugs/_/myos byed shing la'o sadz+dza na/_/legs pa'o sadz+dza nA ni rtog_/sadz+dza naM ni gel pa byed/_/sa da naM ni
[\[203a.3\]]rta ra chu/_/lus dang khang pa btung ba khyim/_/san+tA na ni rgyud dang rigs/_/pha dang lha yi shing la'o/_/saM d+hA naM ni mngon skye dang /_/yang dag byed pa la yang ngo /_/san+d+hi ni ni lus dang mdzes/_/dus dang ba bzhon dag la dran/_/sa ma ni ni mngon 'gro min/_/sa
[\[203a.4\]]ma de ka dang mtshungs pa la/_/sam+pan+na ni phun tshogs dang /_/ldan pa dang ni bsgrubs pa la/_/saM byA naM ni bla gos khebs/_/saM pa naM ni mchod pa dang /_/zla ba nges par 'joms pa la 'dod/_/sA dI na shing rta/_rta can/_/gding ba la yang de bzhin no/_/sA d+hA naM ni
[\[203a.5\]]mjug ma dang /_/zla skyes/_tshar zin shin tu grub/_/byed dang nye bar byed pa dang /_/shi ba'i 'du byed gsod pa dang /_/'gro byed kyi tshangs pa dang /_/thabs dang sbyin du 'jug dang nags/_/sA d+hA na ni mchod sbyin dang /_/las kyi mtha' dang mchod sbyin byed/_/rab sems
[\[203a.6\]]khrims lugs mtshams dang zhing /_/bum pa dang ni gnas la'o/_/sU tsam ni/_tshul dr-iSh+ka/_/dri dang /_bsnun pa la yang ngo /_/se tsa naM ni/_khrus gzhong dang /_/khrus dang 'gyur ba dag la yang /_/se nA nI ni dmag dpon dang /_/'dam bu skyes la'o se tsa nAM/_/khrus
[\[203a.7\]]byed pa dang /_bstan pa la/_/saM s+thA naM ni dbyibs dang ni/_/khyim dang shing dang /_bzhi mdo la/_/sta na naM ni 'brug sgra dang /_/sgra tsam dang ni gaM chaM na'o/_/s+thA ba naM ni nags tshal dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang gtad pa la/_/spaR+sha naM ni reg dang bu/_/san+da rna ni 'dzag dang chu/_/ti ni
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ba dang shing rta la/_/swa min khyab bdag sa ga'o/_/ta lin/_zhing rmod pa dang stobs/_/ha sa ni ni sol ba dang /_/so ba'o/_/ha sa naM dgod pa/_/hasti ni ni gtso mo yi/_/dbye ba glang po'i chung ma la/_/hA ya na ni lo tshigs dang /_/'bru yi dbye ba'i don dag la/_/
[\[203b.2\]]hiN+Da naM ni rab dga' rtse/_/hrA di naM ni rdo rje glog_/a tharba ni srid bsrung dang /_/bram ze'i bye brag dag la'o/_/ad+hiSh+Tha na mthu dang grong /_/lhag par gnas dang 'khor lo la/_/a nu tsa na dul ba dang /_/'grogs dang rig byed mkhas pa dang /_/rtse mo gug dang pho nyid la'ang /_/
[\[203b.3\]]a nA sa naM bstan pa dang /_/gos gshar ba dang nye ba'i stan/_/a bA tsi naM go zlog dang /_/lho dang phyogs ngos skye nges la/_/a b+hi dze na rigs su grags/_/kyi rgyal mtshan dag la'o/_/a b+hi pan+na mngon par sgrub/_/mngon par sod dang zos dang rgud/_/lto dang rang
[\[203b.4\]]gis byas pa la/_/a b+hi mA na skyes bu'i snyems/_/shes dang /_pra Na ya dang 'tshe/_/'gro byed nyi ma nyi ma'i zas/_/pha mes rnams kyi lha la'o/_/a ba dA ni/_las de dag_/de lta bu byung rtogs brjod dum/_/lus dbugs dang ni kun sbyor dang /_/kun nas sbyor ba mngon
[\[203b.5\]]par brjod/_/A ka la ni som nyi dang /_/yongs su bgrang dang rnam par 'ching /_/Ats+tsha da naM kha chod dang /_/gos dang /_sgrib par byed pa la/_/A ta naM ni so sor gnas/_/rgyug par byed dang bgrod par 'dod/_/At+ma yo ni rnam spro byed/_/yid las byung ba mngon
[\[203b.6\]]par brjod/_/A ba sha naM/_bzo khang dang /_/'byung po'i gnas dang rab 'jug pa/_/A yo d+ha no 'khrug dang gsod/_/'thab par byed pa la 'dod do/_/A ra d+ha naM mchod pa dang /_/'tshed dang 'thab pa dag la yang /_/a skan+da ni mi mngon dang /_kun nas skems dang
[\[203b.7\]]sgra la'o/_/ut+pa ta naM kun nas skyes/_/'byung dang gyen du bgrod pa la/_/ut+pa da ni kun nas bris/_/legs par 'jug dang /_'byung don can/_/u da yan zhes bya ba la/_pat+sa'i rgyal dang bum pa skyes/_/ud brta naM kun skyes dang /_/rnam par 'jug dang rnam par bris/_/
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]ubye ha ni/_theg pa dang /_/gyen du 'dren dang dwi sI t+ya/_/u pa d+hA naM/_gaN+Da'i tog_/khyad par dang ni pra Na ya/_/u bA sa naM/_'da' goms dang /_/nyan par 'dod dang 'tshe ba la/_/kany+tsu ki ni legs 'dul skyes/_/sbrul dang dmar ser 'gro byed la/_/
[\[204a.2\]]ka pI ta ni shi rI Sha/_/A mra dang ni khyad par gnas/_/gar+d+ha b+haN+Da'i shing rnams la'o/_/ka la d+h+wa ni/_ca co sgrogs/_/phug ron ne rtso rma bya'o/_/ka la sin ni/_bya dang shing /_/'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la/_/kA t+yA ya na mchog sred dang /_/dkar mo kA t+ya'i bya
[\[204a.3\]]mo dang /_/rgan po'i rnam pa ngur smrig gos/_/ku tsan+da rna/_tsan+dan dmar/_/'dab ma ri lus dang shing dbye la/_/kuN+Da lin+ma chu lha nyid/_/rma bya ri dgas sprul rna rgyan/_/bum pa skyes ni ri byi dang /_/srid sgrub dang ni phur bu la/_/ke sha ran ni/_seng ge/_/klu/_/nA ga
[\[204a.4\]]ge sar rta rnams la/_/krony+tsa da naM/_/g+hiny+tsu lI/_/tsin+to ta ka pad+ma'i rtsa/_/kha kA ma nI nges brtan dang /_/spyod byed ma dang bud med gzhon/_/khaD+ga d+he nu bu mo'i gri/_/de bzhin sdong po can la'o/_/go da yid+gu smra byed dang /_/'dod dang 'dod ldan rnams la'o/_/ga bA da naM chu
[\[204a.5\]]lha'i dbang /_/lus ldan dbyangs kyi rten la'o/_/g+ha nA g+ha na/_char sprin dang /_/brgya byin dang ni glang po myos/_/g+ho Sha yi t+gu zhes bya ba/_/ne tso dang ni bram ze la/_/tsi tra b+hA nu bya dang me/_tsol kin ni zha nye dang /_/laM ba dang ni kiSh+ku'i tshigs/_/dza lA Ta na 'jug pa dang /_/
[\[204a.6\]]kraM ka_/kaM ka khrag gi rgyun/_/dza la Ta ni chu 'khor la/_/dza lA Ta ni chu gnas la/_/na la mI na nya'i bye brag_/iny+tsA ka dang byis pa gsod/_/ta pa swi ni dka' thub can/_/dka' thub dang ni rjes su rtse/_/ta bo ba lang gi/_/d+ha na dka' thub la/_/snag can tsha ba skye ba
[\[204a.7\]]la/_/ta bo d+ha na mgo zlum ma/_/nang ma khyim dang dpa' ba la/_/durbA man ni 'dam gyi ni/_/nya phyis dang ni 'brum sran no/_/deb se ni lha yi dmag_/gnas dang rtogs pa dag la'o/_/dwi dzan+man/_so/_bya bram ze/_/glang po tho ba/_klu shing klu/_/ni d+hU ba naM/_bskyod dang dga'/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gsod dang mthar byed nags tshal la/_/nirbA sa ni gnas med dang /_/'tshe dang 'go ba'i gnas la'o/_/nir+g+hat+sa ni ngan byed dang /_/a la k+ta ka zhes pa la/_/niR+YA ta naM sbyin pa dang /_bkod dang gtor dang sgra dag la/_/ni ba ma ni/_thos dang mthong /_/na shA ma ni/_lta dang
[\[204b.2\]]mthong /_/pa ya swa ni ba bzhon dang /_/mun can ma dang sprin la'o/_/ba ri dzran ni mchod sbyin can/_/mchod sbyin las dang yongs byed la/_/pu N+ya dza na srin po dang /_/ljon shing sA lA sha dang ni/_/srung dang skyes mchod bya rnams la/_/pr-i thag+dzan rmongs dang dman/_/
[\[204b.3\]]pra dza na ni skye gnas dang /_/skye pa dang ni rab 'gro la/_/pa Ni d+hA naM rab 'bad dang /_/rab tu 'jug dang mnyam gzhag la/_/pra ti mA naM gzugs brnyan dang /_/ngag glang po'i mche ba'i bar la'o/_/bra ti ban dam bca' dang /_/rnam par shes dang zhugs pa'o/_/pra
[\[204b.4\]]ti yat+na 'du byed dang /_/so sor 'dzin dang 'dod pa'o/_/pra t+yar+thin ni brjod bya'i rtags/_/gnyis gnyis so sor smra ba'o/_/pra yo dza naM/_dgos pa rgyu/_/pra ba tsa ni bzang po dang /_rang bzhin brjod pa la yang ngo /_/pra spo tra naM/_nyi ma dang /_/rab tu kha bye bsnun pa la/_/
[\[204b.5\]]pra sA d+ha nI grub pa dang /_/ka ka ti kA zhes pa la/_/pra sA d+ha ni/_'bebs pa la/_/pra ha sa naM 'joms pa dang /_/rab tu bzhad dang kun bskyod la/_/pha la kin ni 'bras bu can/_/i l+li shi zhes bya ba la/_/bar+d+ha mA na 'dam bu dang /_/nyams pa med pa dang e raN+Da/_/
[\[204b.6\]]dri ba'i bye brag rnams la'o/_/bA Da gin+ni sdang ba dang /_/lam dang lo mas 'tsho ba dang /_/rta yi khyad par rnams la'o/_/bA rA sha naM 'gro 'joms dang /_/dung dang sgo skyong dag la'o/_/b+hA tat+ma na ni tshangs pa dang /_/gang zag ma da yid+gu ni/_/chang dang sI d+hu'i btung
[\[204b.7\]]bal/_/mad+ha d+ha naM/_bdud rtsi che/_/gos bzang dang ni si h+la'o/_/ma hA mu ni ri byi dang /_/dpal yon dang ni ri byi'i bu/_/ma hA se na sa ga dang /_/dmag dpon chen po dag la'o/_/mA tu lA nI b+hA dgA dang /_/cha shas bgrod dang zhang po la/_/mA lu d+hA na ka sprul khra bo/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pad+ma chen po dag la'o/_/mA lu d+hA nI 'khri shing dbye/_/yid gzhungs can dang yid gzhungs ldan/_/me d+ha po nI bram ze mo/_/ra sA ya na mkha' lding la/_/ra sA ya ni ru ra dang /_/nad 'phrog dug dang /_phyi dong ka_/rA dzad ni bdag 'dzin shing /_/'o ma
[\[205a.2\]]can dang kaM shu ka_/la lA la dang la lA man/_/rtags mtshan nyams dga' rgyan dang ni/_/rwa dang gtso bo mjug ma dang /_mthu dang rgyal mtshan rta rnams la/_/laM ga lin+na/_puN+Da'i shing /_/'be ta sha'i dang gshol mtshon no/_/ba naSh+tsa ni ce spyang dang /_/dzam+bu ka dang stag
[\[205a.3\]]dang ni/_dred dang byi la rnams la'o/_/bi ro tsa na nyi ma me/_/zla ba rab bde/_/dga' ba la/_/bi Sha yin ni dbang po dang /_/yul can yid las skyes dang sreg_/yul las skyes dang mi yi bdag_/'bar ba dang ni rang dbang can/_/bi ShA Ni ni rwa can 'jig_/bi la pa nI ta rA
[\[205a.4\]]lA/_/la sad+d+ha dang gAM ga nA/_/bi la sin ni gdengs can dang /_/dug sbrul dag la blta bar bya/_/bai shrak+se nA mi nyams la/_/bi shra k+se nA/_'bras ldan shing /_/bi badzra na yongs su gtong /_/sbyin dang /_/mdangs dang gsod pa la/_/bi smA sa ni dri za'i grong /_/bu ga can dang dran
[\[205a.5\]]pa la/_/bi ha na ni 'joms pa dang /_/bi ny+dza na dang shing bal bskyod/_/bi he Tha ni 'tshe dang 'joms/_/br-i k+ShA da nI shing skyes dang /_/rnam par 'joms dang dri dag la/_/br-i k+ShA da naM sprang yab dang /_/dgra sta dang ni a shwat+tha/_/bai ro tsa na/_bde gshegs kyi/_/bye brag nyi ma stobs
[\[205a.6\]]ldan bu/_/bya bA yin ni 'dod ldan dang /_/rdzas kyi dbye ba brjod par byed/_/shi khaN+Di na ni mda'i bye brag_/'jigs med sgra dang rma bya tshogs/_/shi khaN+Di nA/_gu ny+dza dang /_/khyu dang yal ga dag la'o/_/shi kha rin ni ri rtse dang /_/sdeb sbyor a bA mArga'i shing /_/shrId+gA rin
[\[205a.7\]]ni/_dkris bzang dang /_/'dod pa can dang glang po che/_/sh+le Sha g+ha nA/_mal+lI dang /_/ka ta kI dang tik+ta'i bcud/_/sa dA da na/_glang chen dkar/_/ha la gnas dang spel gyispos kyi glang /_/sa nA ta na 'phrog byed dang /_/khyab 'jug pha mes 'gron po brtan/_/rtag pa'o/_sa
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]ma pan+naM ni/_/gsang ba thob pa rul ba rdzogs/_/sa mA sa naM yang dag thob/_/yongs su gcod dang mnyam gzhag gzung /_/sA ma dA naM mthun pa dang /_/'dzin dang rtag pa'i las la'o/_/sa mut+thu naM nad langs dang /_/kun 'gog_/sa mu r+ts+tsha naM ni/_/mngon khyab yang
[\[205b.2\]]dag 'dod dang rmongs/_/sam+bA ha naM/_khur la sogs/_/'dren dang yan lag nyed pa la/_/sam+ba da nAM lta ba dang /_/bslu dang dbang du byed pa la/_/sa ro dzi nI pad+ma can/_/mtsho las skyes dang mtsho mchog la/_/sA ma yo ni ting nge 'dzin/_/glang po che dang mchog
[\[205b.3\]]gnas la/_/sa mA d+hi ni nges brjod dang /_/sbyin sreg byed pa'i shing grangs la/_/sA ra sa nAM gser la'o/_/ta nu tri naM grang skyob la/_/su ka rman ni rnal 'byor dbye/_/zas bzang lha yi bzo bo la/_/su daR+sha ni/_lha grong dang /_/khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lo la/_/
[\[205b.4\]]su daR+Sha nA bka' dang ni/_/lhun po'i dzam+bA sman gyi dbye/_/mig gi dga' bar byed pa la/_/sU dA min+ni/_sprin dang ri/_/su d+ha n+wan ni/_brtan pa dang /_/gzhu can sna tshogs las la'o/_/su barban ni skabs gsum dang /_/'od ma 'da' dang du ba tshigs/_/su yA mu
[\[205b.5\]]na khyab 'jug dang /_/nad dang bat+sa'i rgyal po dang /_/blo bzang skyes pa rnams la'o/_/sau rA ma ni glog dbye dang /_/rnam gsal chu skyes khyad par la/_/saM ya ma nI gshin rje'i grong /_/brtul zhugs dang ni yang dag sdom/_/sta na yid+gu sprin dang ni/_/'brug sgra
[\[205b.6\]]shi dang dbyug pa la/_/haR+Sha yit+ku pu dang gser/_/a gra dzan+ma na tshangs pa dang /_spun zla'i mthu bo bram ze dang /_gsod dang /_sbyin dang gtong ba la/_/a nu bA san zhes pa/_/snum pa'i las dang bdug pa la/_/an+da bA shin/_gtum po dang /_/slob ma nye gnas dag
[\[205b.7\]]la'o/_/a pa brdza ni zhes pa/_/yongs su gtong dang mya ngan 'das/_/bi shrA Na na zhes pa la/_/a ba sardza naM zhes pa/_/sbyin dang yongs su 'dor ba la/_/a b+hi niSh+Ta na yi ge/_/rnam par gtod pa dag la'o/_/u pa sparla naM/_reg pa dang /_/khrus dang zhal bsil la yang ngo /_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]u pa sam+ban+naM ni byas/_/legs par 'dus byas pa la'o/_/kA ma tsa ri na tsa Ta ka_/'dod ldan dang ni rang 'dod la/_/kA ran+d+ha mi 'khar ba mkhan/_/gser 'gyur mkhan la'ang blta bar bya/_/kiSh+ku barban 'od ma dang /_/dar gyi srin bu dang ni me/_/kriSh+Na bar+t+man bsreg
[\[206a.2\]]za dang /_/kun spyod ngan dang /_sgra gcan la/_/kha ra b+hA dza naM zhes pa/_/'jam dang 'khar ba sol+la dang /_/'jug pa la'o de nas ni/_/gan+d+ha mAM d+ha na ra'i dbye/_/bung ba dang ni dri ldan ma/_/gan+d+ha mA da nI/_ni chang /_/'khri shing ri dgas dbye ba la/_/tsa kra tsA rin byis pa dang /_/
[\[206a.3\]]nor can grong gi dra ba can/_/tsi ra dzI bin/_tshe ring dang /_/khyab 'jug dang ni lhan cig skyes/_/tik+ta barban gu DU tsi/_/shing mngar hi la mo tsI'o/_/d+hA ma ke ta na yi sgra/_/me dang du ba mjug rings la/_/pad+ma lAny+tsa na nyi ma/_/'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin tshangs/_/pad+ma
[\[206a.4\]]lAny+tsa na sgrol ma/_/dbyangs can ma dang pad+ma ma/_/sI da tsan+dan naM zhes pa/_/nag mo can dang yung ba la/_/pr-iSh+Tha shr-id+gin/_/shaN+D+ha dang /_/'jigs bcu pa dang ce spyang lto/_/pra tsa lA kin/_lam 'gro dang /_/'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la/_/pra ti pA da ni sbyin pa/_/
[\[206a.5\]]khro dang go bar byed pa la/_/ba na mA lin sgra 'greng pa/_/ba na mA li ni phag mo/_/pa bar+Ni nI 'bras bu ldan/_/bud med rin chen mtshon byed ma/_/sred pa dang ni yung ba la/_/bar tsan+da dz+wa lha'i shing /_/nag mo can la'ang blta bar bya/_/byom tsA rin mkha'
[\[206a.6\]]'gro dang /_/lha dang rig pa 'dzin pa la/_/ma dU sU da na phag mo/_/spu 'chad par ni rnam shes bya/_/ma hA ra dza naM zhes pa/_/bum pa dang ni bum brgya pa/_/mri t+yu prany+tsa na dpal 'bras/_/kA ko la dang /_gzigs gos can/_/big+h+Na kA rin 'jigs mthong dang /_/
[\[206a.7\]]rnam par 'joms par byed pa la/_/bi shwa karman lha bzo dang /_/mArtaN+Da dang thub pa'i dbye/_/br-i ShA sarban 'phrog byed dang /_/lha min/_sgeg ldan gro ma'o/_/sha ku lA da nI zhes pa/_/sha can chu yi bi spa li/_/g+hiny+tsu lAM dang /_tshangs pa can/_/shA laM k+Sha ya na yi
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]sgra/_/rdo yi dbye ba dga' byed la/_/she pa ki rta na 'dod ldan/_/b+t+ring+gi ri ti pad+mA'o/_/shwe ta bA ha na srid sgrub/_/bdud rtsi sbyor bar byed pa la/_/shweta bAn/_na bdud rtsi sbyor/_/rgya mtsho'i dbu ba sprin gyi snying /_/ShaSh+Tha hA ya na zhes pa/_/'bras kyi dbye ba sin+d+hu ra/_/
[\[206b.2\]]saM pra yo gin cha yis rtse/_/'dod ldan dang ni rab sbyor la/_/ha ri tsan+dan ni ba mchog_/lha yi shing dang 'od ldan ma/_/gur gum pad+ma rA ga la'o/_/ha ri bA ha na zhes pa/_/nyin mor byed dang sprin gyi bzhon/_/an+tA pa shA yin khyi 'tshod/_/nA bi te dang thub
[\[206b.3\]]pa'i dbye/_/kA lA nu mA din zhes pa/_/ka la biM ka ro lam+ba/_/ka bany+dzil rnams la'o/_/dzA yA nu dzI bi na zhes pa/_/rgyas dang ngan 'gro 'dul dang che/_/sa ha sra de d+hin zhes pa/_/dga' byed 'joms dang ro sgyur shing /_/na mtha'i sde rdzogs so/_/kha ni rlung do kU dag byed/_/
[\[206b.4\]]pA ni btung ba skyong byed la/_/kalpa tshangs pa'i nyin zhag dang /_/rigs pa/_'jigs pa/_bstan bcos sgrub/_/kU pa chu yi dngo dang ni/_/shi ba byi dor byed pa'i khung /_/kr-i pA rtse ba zhes bshad do/_/kl-i pa rgyas pa de'i yang ni/_/b+hA ra tA'i skyes bu la/_/
[\[206b.5\]]khaSh+pa stobs kyi byed pa dang /_/khro ba la yang grags pa yin/_/go ba lcug ma ba lang gnas/_/grong la sogs pa'i bdag po yang /_/go bI sa skyong sa 'dzin dang /_/srung ba pa dang snying po can/_/chu pa reg dang k+Shu pa dang /_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang rlung dmar la/_/talpaM chung
[\[206b.6\]]ma mal dang ni/_/dgra khang la'o tA pa ni/_/kun tu gdung dang da ba thu/_/tA bI chu yi khyad par la/_/tra pA ngo tsha rig la'o/_/tra pu zha nye mtshon dag la/_/darbu nga rgyal dregs pa dang /_/ri dgas myos pa la yang ngo /_/nI pa rtul dang tshogs la 'gyur/_/pany+tsa la sngon gzhu dag
[\[206b.7\]]la/_/buSh+pe me tog bud med rdul/_/rgyas dang kha bye ba la'o/_/rU paM rnam pa mdzes rang bzhin/_/tshigs su bcad dang nA na ka_/gar mkhan sogs dad ri dgas mdung /_/spyod pa phyugs dang sgra la'o/_/re ba snod dang 'khrug pa la/_/ro pa mda' dang 'dogs pa la/_/le
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa byug dang bdud rtsi la/_/dze ma na'o/_pa bA ni/_/bu ga dang ni tshem bu la/_/pat+pa /mig chu rlangs ba la/_/shaSh+pa rtsa gzhon so sor zas/_/shA pa mna' dang sbyor ba la/_/sU ba byed pa mchod ma'i dbye/_/swA ba nyal dang mi shes nyid/_/reg pa mi
[\[207a.2\]]shes don can no/_/k+Shi pa thogs pa rnam par 'god/_/ku re 'phen dang 'dzin pa la/_/byug dang snyoms pa la yang ngo /_/ar+Na pa Ni/_sai ri b+ha/_/chu rnams yang dag 'khrugs pa la/_/A kalpa ni khyim tsam dang /_/rtog par byed pa la yang ngo /_/A bA ba ni 'dod dang
[\[207a.3\]]smin/_/yongs 'dor a la/_bA la'o/_/a k+She pa ni smod dang gtong /_/'gugs dang snyan dngags rgyan la'o/_/a Du pa ni zla ba gos/_/u la ba ni/_rtsa'i dbye ba/_/a la baM ni gel par 'dod/_/kats+tsha ba ni ru sbal dang /_/gyad kyi 'ching ba'i khyad par la/_/kats+tsha
[\[207a.4\]]bI ni/_ru sbal mo/_/phra mo'i nad kyi dbye ba dang /_/shing shun dbye ba dag la'o/_/ka lA pa ni tshogs rma bya/_/gser dang tu NI ra dang /_zas/_/gos dang ka si sU ra dang /_/kau hi gnyis ka dag la'o/_/kA sh+ya pI ni sa dang nya/_/k+Sha sh+yi pa ni/_thub pa'i dbye/_/ku Ta pa
[\[207a.5\]]ni nga rgyal dbye/_/niSh+ku Ta dang thub pa la/_/baT+sI ri kA la yang ngo /_/ku Na pa ni ro rul dri/_/ku ta pa ni tsha mo dang /_/nyi ma'i brgyad cha/_tshad pa ra/_/la ba ku sha rol mo la'o/_/dzi hwA ba ni khyi byi la/_/stag dang khra bo dag la'o/_/bA da pa shing /_bri rkang /_l+h+wam/_/bA tA ba ni
[\[207a.6\]]gzi brjid/_rdul/_/rak+ta ba ni mtshan mo rgyu/_/rak+ta bA ni pad+ma dang /_/rnam rtog 'khrul dang phyogs rnams la/_/bi Ta pa ni khri shing sdong /_/Shilga rgya chen lcug ma'o/_/a pa lA ba ngan smras dang /_/yid gcugs sel ba dag la'o/_/a b+hi rU pa rtogs bya dang /_/
[\[207a.7\]]dga' dang rab thob gzugs la'o/_/a ba le ba skyon dang snyoms/_/byug pa yang dag 'gro ba la/_/u pa tA ba smra nyer gdung /_/myur ba'i don can du 'dod do/_/u pa dza ma khyad par dang /_/dbye dang rnam par 'joms pa la/_/dza la kU bI rtsing bu dang /_/khron
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa'i snying po dga' la'o/_/nA ga/_puSh+pa/_klu shing dang /_/nA ga ge sar tsam+pa ka_/pa ri kam+pa 'jigs pa dang /_/yongs su 'gul dang rab bskyod la/_/pa rI bA ba chu gnas dang /_/yongs su thob pa dang kun tu 'gebs/_/biN+Da puSh+pa mya ngan med/_/dza ba'i me tog 'dam
[\[207b.2\]]skyes la/_/ba hu rU pa dran pa dang /_/rdo rje rang byung mda' tshogs/_bskyod/_/me g+hA puSh+pa/_/lhang tsher gong /_/chu dang chu la skyes pa la/_/bi bra lA ba 'gal brjod dang /_/don dang bral ba'i tshig ga la/_/ba dza puSh+pa myos byed dang /_/de bzhin ma ru ba ka la'o/_/
[\[207b.3\]]bri ka d+hU pa shing ser dang /_/bcos ma'i bdug pa dag la'o/_/pr-iShA ka'i lha chen po/_/'bar byed nag po dag la'o/_/he ma puSh+pa mya ngan med/_/dza ba'i me tog tsam+pa ka_/tsa ma ra puSh+pa ni gsal/_/tsU ta dang ni ke ka'o/_/pa mtha'i sde'o//_//phu ni
[\[207b.4\]]sngags dang phe ni sgra/_/grangs med spA ni rgan dang 'phel/_/s+pha ni/_/g+hany+dza'i rlung dang khyab/_/s+phu ni s+phung byed balgu'i dngos/_/gum+pha dpung pa'i rgyan dang /_/tshig_/lugs dang brjod pa dag la'o/_/re pha ra yig smod pa brjod/_/ba phe ba lang sogs rmig pa/_/ljon
[\[207b.5\]]shing sogs kyi sgra la'o/_/shing phA ral pa chu klung dang /_/sha can dang ni ma ma la'o/_/pha mtha'i sde'o//_//ba ni chu lha nyer mjal rdzas/_/kam+bi/_kha dzA kA dang ni/_/'od ma'i cha'o kaM bu ni/_/glang bo gdu bu dung /_/dung phran/_/mgrin pa dang ni spubs can la'o/_/bA rA
[\[207b.6\]]gzugs thung /_grangs bye brag_/tsArbI mdzes dang blo dag la/_dzam+bu ri dang chu klung dang /_/gling dang shing gi dbye ba la/_/Dim+bi ca co 'jigs pa dang /_/glo ba mchin pa/_rnam 'gro dang /_/e raN+Da la'o darbI ni/_/kha dzA kA dang 'bras bu la/_/dwI shing ser/_yung ba dang /_/
[\[207b.7\]]lha shing /_sa ldan/_sngon skyes la/_/pUrbA sngon dang sngar rtse mo/_/tum+bI tik+ta lam+bA dpal/_/bim+pa gzugs can 'bras bu dang /_/dkyil 'khor dang ni gzugs brnyan la/_/sham+ba dge dang yangs pa dang /_/gtun shing rtse gnas lcags snying ldan/_/rdo rje rnams so stam+ba
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]ni/_/rtswa dang gel pa shing rnams so/_/ka dam+baM ni don grub dang /_ni ku rum+ba nI pa'o/_/sdong bu yal ga ka lam+bI/_/ka lam+bi ni sdong bu mda'/_/nI sa la'o kA dam+ba/_/dang po'i tshogs dang mda' la'o/_/ga dzA hwA glang po biSh+pa la'i/_/glang po 'gran dang
[\[208a.2\]]glang po'i grong /_/gan+d+har+b+ba ni/_ri dgas dbye/_/glung mkhan dang ni mkha' spyod dang /_/srid pa bar ma'i sems can la/_/khu byug rta dang bcud len grub/_/lha yi glu mkhan rnams la'o//gu Dum+ba ni snying dang 'bras/_/prin+ta dang ni ba lang zas/_/dwi dzi hrA ni sprul phra
[\[208a.3\]]mo/_/ka Tir ka'o ni taMpa/_/rtse mo phrag pa lus byed do/_/bra la ma ni/_'phyang ba dang /_/lha min tA la'i myu gu dang /_/yal ga la'o prA lcam pa/_/khyab 'jug dbye ba gsum rgyas dang /_/'o ma 'dzin pa'o b+hU dzam+bu/_/bi kaM ka ta'i 'bras bu dang /_/go DUm+ba la'i he ram+ba/_/
[\[208a.4\]]ma he lto 'phyang dpa' dang snyems/_/dza ra dzam+bU dzam+bU 'byed/_/'bra go'i 'bras bu dag la'o/_/la la dzI hA 'tshe ba dang /_/rim pas 'gro dang khyim la'o/_/sha ta barbA durbA dang /_/ngan spang bu dang btsun mo la/_/go rak+Sha dzam+bu ni gro/_/de bzhin sa bsrungs 'bras
[\[208a.5\]]la'o/_d+hU lI ka dam+ba ni shing /_/ti ni sha dang ka dam+ba/_/chu la'i shing la blta bar bya/_/shri gA la dzam+bU zhes pa/_/go Dum+ba'o 'ga' zhig ni/_/rgya shug 'bras bu zhes 'dod do/_/ba mtha'i sde tshan no//_//b+ha ni 'dri bu chags pa dang ni/_/dkar dang rgyas
[\[208a.6\]]pa'i don la yang /_/b+hA ni 'bar dang gnas tsam la/_/b+haM ni skal ma b+hI ni 'jigs/_/b+hU ni sa dang gnas tsam la/_/'byung bar byed pa rnams la'o/_/b+ho ni bod pa mi zad pa'o/_/kum+b+ha bum pa khyim gyi dbye/_/bi Ta glang po'i mgo'i yan lag_/bum rna
[\[208a.7\]]can gyi bu la yang /_/kum+bI skya nar chu'i 'dab ma/_/bi Tha ra ka ta 'bras bu'o/_/kum+b+ha gu gul shing dur byid/_/gar+b+ha/_mngal dang byis pa dang /_/nag phyogs la ste rtags/_tsher can/_pa nas/_/dzam+b+ha/_so dang /_sgyur rtsi dang /_/lha min dbye dang za ba la/_/dzrin+b+ha/_kha gdangs
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]kha bya glal/_/Da m+b+hi/_bA li sha dang byis/_/dam+b+ha tog can shing shun la/_/dr-ik+b+hU sprul dang bdag po la/_/nA b+he/_/rgyu skar 'khor lo sgyur/_gtso bo 'khor lo'i mtha' dang ni/_/srog chags yan lag myos pa la/_/ni b+ha 'dra ba thol la'o/_/ram+b+ha 'od ma'i dbyugs pa la/_/ram+b+ha
[\[208b.2\]]chu shing chu skyes ma/_/bi b+hu sum rtsen dbang khyab bdag_/sham+b+hu dbang phyug tshangs pa dang /_/mchod 'os dang ni skra can ma/_/shu b+ha grub pa shu b+haM bde/_/sho b+ha mdzes dang grib ma la/_/sa b+ha/_mdun/_pa/_ba/_ba lang gnas/_/rgyan po 'gyed pa rta rag go/_/stam+b+ha bems po/_ka ba
[\[208b.3\]]la/_/sa b+hU khyab 'jug tshangs pa la/_/a shu b+ha ni 'chi ltas sdig_/mi 'dod/_maM bzang /_sdig can no/_/At+mA b+hU ni/_'dod lha tshangs/_/a ram+b+ha ni/_/skyed tshal dang /_/dregs dang myur dang gsod pa la/_/r-i Sha b+ha ni/_khyu mchog gtso bo/_/sde tshan brgyad dang sman bye brag_/
[\[208b.4\]]dbyangs kyi khyad par phag pa'i 'jug_/bu ga rna ba dag la'o/_/r-iSha b+hA mi yi rnam pa/_/bud med rnam mang btsun mo dang /_/rtse mo/_byi la mchog gnas gtso/_/ka ku pa ni srid sgrub shing /_/'dod chags dbye ba rab bsten dang /_/phyogs mdzes bstan bcos la ba dang /_/
[\[208b.5\]]tsam+pa ka yi phreng ba la'o/_/ka ra b+hi ni 'khrig ma dang /_/mthe'u chung cha dang rim pas 'gro/_/rkang pa brgyad pa sha ra b+ha/_/ri dgas bye brag dag la'o/_/ku sum+b+ha ni/_gser tshos/_/chen/_/ril ba spyi blugs/_/gard b+ha/_/bong bu/_dri yi dbye ba dang /_/ki bar+Na dang kai ra ba/_/garda d+d+hA ni nad
[\[208b.6\]]nyung dang /_/skye ba'i khyad par dag la'o/_/dun+du b+hi ni rnga bo che/_/sbyin skyes dbang pos thig le la/_/durma b+ha ni rnyed dka' dang /_/yid gcugs/_sa/_khyi rngo/_nad can la/_/ni kum+pa ni so ldan ma/_/bum rna can gyi bur yang dran/_/pal+la b+ha ni rig ldan dang /_/brtse ba can dang
[\[208b.7\]]dbang po la/_/baR+ShA b+hU ni slar skye dang /_/kany+tsi li dang sbal pa la/_/biSh+kam+b+ha ni sbyor ba'i dbye/_/rgya khyon so sor bcings pa dang /_/gzugs can yan lag so sor 'bad/_/'ching ba'i dbye dang rnal 'byor can/_/biSh+Tam+b+ha ni so sor 'ching /_/rnam 'phel ba dang rnam par/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'phel/_/bi sram+b+ha ni rol pa can/_/'thab mo dbugs 'byin 'dren dang gsod/_/pri Sha b+ha ni/_khyu mchog dang /_/dkar po khu ba/_skyes mchog la'ang /_/bai d+har+b+ha ni ngag 'khyog po/_/nyid dang mtshams pa'i khyad par la/_/sha ra b+ha ni/_seng ge'i dbye/_/
[\[209a.2\]]rkang pa brgyad pa ka ra b+ha/_/sa nA b+hi ni rang skye mtshungs/_/su ra b+hi ni tsam+pa ka_/khra bo dpyid dang dri ldan la/_/gser dang dzA ti phal dang /_/yid 'ong dri bzangs dag la'o/_/shar b+hi ni shal+la ki/_/ma mo'i dbye ba dag la'o/_/a nu Sh+Thu b+ha mda' dang ni/_/sdeb sbyor rab dbye
[\[209a.3\]]dag la dran/_/a paSh+Ta m+b+ha gser dang ni/_/rab rtsom dka' ba dag la yang /_/shA ta kum+b+haM gser la ste/_/shA ta kum+b+ha rta gsod pa'o/_/b+h+ya mtha'i sde tshan no//_//ma ni zhi ba mA zla ba dang /_/sgra gcan dang ni ma mo dang /_/dga' dang nga rgyal 'ching ba dang /_/dgag
[\[209a.4\]]pa la ste mi zad pa'o/_/me dang maM zhes pa'ang /_don de'o/_/A ma nad dang de dbye phyogs/_/iSh+ma 'dod dang /_dpyid la'o/_/u mA go rI dang ni ser/_/mdzes dang grags dang dga' ba la/_/U ma grong dang byed pa la/_/urmi rlabs dang dba' klong dang /_/'jug pa dang ni
[\[209a.5\]]gsal ba la/_/gos khums pa dang rtsigs pa dang /_mgrin pa bteg dang btsir ba la/_/kA ma dran pa grib ma la/_/ka maM 'dod bya dga' nges 'dod/_/A ma rjes su 'dod pa la/_/kA mI 'dod dang bud med btsun/_/kA mi 'dod can skyes bur 'gyur/_/sarba nA
[\[209a.6\]]ma'i kaM zhes pa/_/rnam par rtog dang dri ba dang /_/'dor dang smod dang rnam pa la/_/ki mi gser dang bu mo dang /_/phreng ba A b+hA lA la'o/_/kri srin bu kI Ta dang /_/rgya skyegs dang ni srin bu'i dbang /_/gnyis ma nub pa rin pa dang /_/g.yo ba dang ni 'gul ba la/_/kharma zer
[\[209a.7\]]na'i rab dbye la/_/ga ma a nA lo tsi ta/_/lam dang rgyan 'gyed khyad par la/_/gul+ma sdong po tsa mU ni/_/bsrung dang dmag sde mchin nad dbye/_/gul+mI A ma la kya dang /_/yol ba dang ni gos kyi khyim/_/brA ma dbyangs dang 'dug gnas dang /_/tshogs dang sgra sogs snga ma can/_/
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]g+harma tshad gdung sos ka dang /_/drod dang rdul gyi chu la'o/_/dzAl+ma sA ma ra dang 'khrus/_/yang dag lta bar byed pa mo/_/dzi h+ma gya gyu ta ga ra/_/dal ba dang ni 'khor lo'o/_/yung ba dang ni ljang gu la'ang /_/tok+ma to k+maM/_thos dri ma/_/da ma 'du byed/_dbyug pa dang /_/dul dang
[\[209b.2\]]zhal zhal la yang ngo /_/dasma mi dang /_chom rkun dang /_/skye bo'i nga rgyal la yang dran/_/dru ma/_rkang 'thung yongs 'du dang /_/mi'am rgya spos/_/ci yi dbang phyug la/_/d+harma 'tshe med bsod nams dang /_/rigs pa mchod sbyin rang bzhin dang /_/dpe dang /_/sdom dang kun spyod
[\[209b.3\]]dang /_/rigs byed mtha' dang gzhu rna ba 'byor/_/zhi ba'i btung ba sman bdag nyid/_/dri yi rtsa dang bsil ba dang /_/'dul byed ming dang gzhan bstod la/_/na mi khron pa'i kha skor dang /_/ti ni sha shing 'khor lo'i mtha'/_/ne ma dus dang mtshams dang dor/_/ra ba dang ni
[\[209b.4\]]kai ta ka'o/_/pad+ma pad+ma'i tshogs dang ni/_/chu skyes bkod pa grangs bye brag_/gter dang pad+ma can klu'i dbye/_/pad+mA b+hA shIr dang ni dpal/_/brAt+mI dbyangs can 'dam skyes gdong /_/tshangs pa'i nus ma pany+dzi kA/_/zla ba'i lcug ma yal ga'i dbye/_/b+hA ma khro ba sgra dang 'od/_/
[\[209b.5\]]b+hI ma bde 'byung spyang ka lto/_/a mA be ta sa'i shing dang /_/drag po dang ni 'jigs rung la/_/b+hISh+ma 'phrog byed gAM ga skyes/_/srin po dang ni 'jigs byed ma/_/b+hU mi sa dang gnas tsam la/_/b+hau ma/_dmyal ba sa skyes la/_/b+hA ma 'khrul dang kun+d+ra dang /_/zad dang chu yi
[\[209b.6\]]nges 'gro la/_/ya ma gshin rje chos kyi rgyal/_/zung dang yang dag sdom dang khwa/_/mtshe ma skyes dang /_lus dang sgrub/_/bltos pa med gang dag pa'i las/_/yA ma mtshon cha yang dag 'gog_/yA mi gza'/_srin mo bud med rigs/_/yud+h+ma gzhu dang g.yul 'gyed
[\[209b.7\]]pa/_/ra yA/_sbrang rtsi'i lha ma yin/_chung ma la/_/ra ma yid bsrubs mdzes pa dang /_/sa skyes mya ngan med pa la/_/rasmi 'od dang rta'i srab dang /_/mig gi rma dag la'o/_/rA ma da g+hu'i bu dang ni/_/drang srong ya mang ag+ni dang /_/shol 'dzin phyugs kyi dbye ba dang /_/shin
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]tu yid du 'ong rnams la'o/_/rA mA bud med dang shing kun/_/rA maM gnas can ru rta'o/_/ruk+mi gser dang lcags la ste/_/ma swa tsal tsa NA ka re/_/ru mA mgrin bzang mdzes pa la/_/lak+Sh+mi dpal dang phun tshogs la/_/pad+ma br-i yang ku dang mdzes/_/ba mi nad
[\[210a.2\]]can skyugs ba la/_/nA ma g.yon dang 'phrog byed dang /_/'dod dang sprin dang pra tI ba/_/bA maM gcod byed bA mA mdzes/_/sha mi phye dang 'bras bu dang /_/shim+b+ha dang ni ngag mtshungs pa/_/shuSh+mi nyin mo'i bdag po la/_/shuSh+maM gzi brjid la 'dod do/_/sh+yA ma ljang gu nag po dang /_/rab sbyor ba
[\[210a.3\]]Ta'i shing dang ni/_/sbal pa sprin dang byis pa rgan/_/sh+yA mA kha dog ljang gu dang /_/sngo bsangs tsA grA li dang ni/_/rab tu 'gro min bud med dang /_/zla ba'i 'khri shing sman dur byid/_/sI ri pa dang guN+DA dang /_/mtshan mo rams dang pr-i yang+ku'o/_/sh+yA ma ma lan tshwa'i dbye ba dang /_/na le shaM
[\[210a.4\]]la'o/_shrA ma ni/_/thub pa dus dang snga ma min/_/dal ba sel ba'o ma lA ni/_/'gugs dang 'dra dang /_tsA gu'i zer ba'i mchan bu snang /_/skye bo kun/_/sI ma mtshams dang dus dang ni/_/zhing dang dbye ba gnas la'o/_/sra ma mkha' dang 'o ma la/_/sraSh+maM chung du mngon par brjod/_/sri Sh+ma phra dang nang dag la/_
[\[210a.5\]]sUk+Sh+ma phra dang phyi mo la/_/so ma 'od dkar bu gar 'gro/_/pha mes dang ni lha dag la/_/s+yA ma lha'i sman/_gri shing dang /_/nor gyi dbye ba rlung spre'u/_/hi maM kha ba ba mo dang /_/tsan bsil dang 'khyags pa la/_/ho mi dang ba dang ni mar/_/k+Sha ma sa dang bzod pa la/_/k+Sha ma bzod pa ldan pa la/_/k+Sha ma
[\[210a.6\]]zar ma phreng ba can/_/k+She ma 'thob dang bsrung ba dang /_/bkra shis dang ni chom rkun la/_/k+Shai mA gtum po 'phrog byed la/_/k+Shau mi zar ma'i gos dang ni/_/du kU la yi ras la'o/_/a da ma ni smad dang dman/_/A ga ma ni bstan bcos lung /_/A shra ma ni tshangs spyod sogs/_/thub
[\[210a.7\]]pa'i gnas dang tshogs khang la/_/ut+ta ma dang ut+ta maM/_/mchog dang phul du byung ba'o/_/kA la ma ni sA li 'dzin/_/brko bya 'bras dang rgya skyegs bcud/_/ku su maM ni me tog 'bras/_/dus su skyes dang mig nad la/_/kr-i tri maM ni lan tshwa dang /_/sih+la ka dang bcos pa dang /_/god+hU
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]na ni/_'bru'i bye brag_/na rang+ga dang sman gyi dbye/_/go mi mi ni/_dUrbA dkar/_/'khor dang shu dag la yang ngo /_/gau ta ma ni thub pa'i dbye/_/shAkya seng ge'o/_/gau d+ha mI/_/bgrod dka' dang ni gsal ba la/_/ta ni maM ni ral mal dang /_/bla re dang ni zhal zhal la/_/kra Di ma ni se 'bru dang /_/ka ra ka
[\[210b.2\]]dang e la'o/_/ni ga ma ni tshong dral dang /_/pUrbi dka Ta lu N+TI/_/tshong pa'o ni ga ma na des/_/'ching ba dam bca' 'khrul 'khor skyob/_/nirga ma ni des 'gro blo/_/phun sum tshogs dang rigs ngan la/_/ni ga ma ni lha'i mtha' dang /_/tshong ba'i grong khyer nA si ta/_/pany+tsa ma ni 'dod chags dbye/_/
[\[210b.3\]]lnga rnams dang ni rdzogs byed la/_/mkhas pa dang ni khong chud la'ang /_/pany+tsa me ni skyabs seng bu/_/ba ra ni mi phul byung gtso/_/snang ba'o ba ra ma o mdzad/_/rjes gnang dang ni grangs med can/_/pra kra ma ni skabs go rims/_/nye ba'i rim dang rim pa'o/_/pra tA ba ni rjes su byed/_/so 'ching ma
[\[210b.4\]]dang so ldan ma/_/bra tha ma ni dang po gtso/_/bra harma ni khang brtsegs dang /_/bum pa dang ni ri yi stod/_/ma d+h+ya ma ni yul dbus dang /_/mchog dang gung dang dbus su skyes/_/ma dz+ya mA ni gnam stong dang /_/rdul mthong bud med dag dang ni/_/rna ba can dang yang gsum gyi/_/sdeb sbyor la gsor
[\[210b.5\]]dbus ma la/_/bi kra ma ni rnam gnon mdzes/_/bzo dang nus pa phun tshogs la/_/be dru ma ni rin chen shing /_/bi ru dang ni lcug ma sar/_/bi sbra ma ni rnam sgeg dang /_/'khrul dang sgeg pa'i bya ba la/_/bi lo ma ni go bzlog dang /_/lag 'gro khyi dang zhags pa la/_/bi lo mI na na tshod gnas/_/
[\[210b.6\]]bzlog dang gsod par byed pa la/_/byA ya ma ni bgrod dka' ba'i/_/kun spyod rnam 'gog skyes bu'i rtsal/_/saM kra ma ni 'gro byed dang /_/chu las yang dag sgrol ba yi/_/kun spyod 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/_/sat+ta ma ni ches mchod 'os/_/mchog dang legs pa la yang ngo /_/saM b+h+ra ma ni gus pa dang /_/
[\[210b.7\]]skyong dang legs pa la yang ngo /_/suSha maM ni mdzes dang 'dus/_/su Sha mA ni gsal ba dang /_/mngon par gsal ba la yang ngo /_/su Shi ma ni sbrul bye brag_/su ShI ma ni rlung ser bu/_/mdzes dang 'khyags pa dag la'o/_/a nu pa ma mdzes pa dang /_/stod pa dang ni srin po yi/_/phyogs kyi glang mo
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]la 'dod do/_/a b+h+yA ga ma mthar byed dang /_/shan pa 'gal byed khas blangs mtshon/_/u pa kra ma gso sbyong dang /_/nyer 'dzin tsam dang rnam par gnon/_/u pa kra ma logs su 'gro/_/rang gir byas pa dag la'o/_/dza la ga ma chu'i gong dang /_/chu yi bzhi mdo rus
[\[211a.2\]]sal la/_/daN+Da yA na nyin mo dang /_/bum pa skyes dang kA+o nA sa/_/ba ra kra ma nus pa dang /_/rnam gnon brtson pa dag la'o/_/sA bang+ga ma spal ba spre'u/_/na hA pad+ma nga rgyal can/_/ma hA pad+ma grangs dang gter/_/klu yi khyad par la yang 'dod/_/mAt+ta bA ma 'khogs pa dang /_/yongs
[\[211a.3\]]su zos dang por ba la/_/sarba b+hau ma phyogs glang dbye/_/sa kun pa la yang 'dod do/_/ma mtha'i sde'o//_//ya ni rlung dang grags pa dang /_/thob byed gtod dang 'gro byed la/_/yA ni sa dang ma mo dang /_/me dang rnga yab mUrbI dang /_/mur+b+ba h+lA rnams la'o/_/dro ni lha gnas skabs gsum
[\[211a.4\]]lam/_/a nu mtshungs med dbye ba dang /_/gzhan du 'gyur dang tha ma la/_/ar+th+ya blo dang rig pa dang /_/brag zhun la'o ar+b+h+yaM naM ni/_/rin thang don dang mchod dang 'os/_/ar+g+h+ya sbyor ba tsam la yang /_/aR+sh+ya rje bo rje rigs la/_/A byA gnas dang gtso bo la/_/A byaM gdong
[\[211a.5\]]dbus kha las byung /_/i h+ya bA ma 'dod dang sbyin/_/mchod dang 'grogs dang gnas la'o/_/i b+h+ya phyug por gyur pa la/_/i b+h+yA glang po sha laM kI/_/ka n+yA bud med chung du dang /_/gzhon nu ma dang khyim gyi dbye/_/sman gyi bye brag dag la'o/_/ka l+yaM tho rangs snang ba dang /_/
[\[211a.6\]]nyin mo'i ka l+ye nad med mkhas/_/ka khyA skyes mchog dge pa 'chang /_/ka byaM chad dang lcag 'os dang /_/bar ma dang ni lcags rnams la/_/ka k+Sh+ya chen po dang ni gser/_/sked chings dang ni glang po'i so/_/kaM s+yaM khang bzang la sogs kyi/_/re mig dang ni btung ba'i snod/_
[\[211a.7\]]gzi brjid skyes dang rdzas kyi dbye/_/rol mo'i bye brag la yang ngo /_/kA ya lus dang rang bzhin 'dus/_/'bum dang lha las byung ba'o/_/kaR+YaM rgyu dang dgos pa la/_/kA bya ba sangs gza' la'o/_/ka bya gtsang byed blo dag la/_/kAM byaM gzhung gi khyad par la/_/ku T+yaM rtsig pa
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]byug pa la/_/ku l+ya mA t+ya rigs byung dang /_/rigs la shin tu phan pa dang /_/sha dang nyi ma khrus gzhong dang /_/kI ka sha'o ku l+yA ni/_/chung ngu bcos ma chu klung dang /_/chu bo 'tsho gsil sgra sgrogs/_/kr-i t+yA/_bya ba lha dag dang /_/nor la sogs pa bgo bya dang /_/'phel
[\[211b.2\]]ba'i bya ba dag la 'di/_/kr-i t+yA ta bya sogs su brjod/_/kr-i yA las dang bya ba dang /_/byed pa rab tu bzung dang thabs/_/rtsom pa dang ni bslab pa mchod/_/gso dpyad dang ni nges byed la/_/ga byaM rgyal bya ba lang gi/_/'o ma sogs dang mchod sbyin rdzas/_/ga bya ba lang
[\[211b.3\]]rigs pa phan/_/gu h+yaM gsang ba nyer gnas dang /_/sba bya khyo shug rus sbal la/_/gu h+yA yal ga'i grong dang phug_/bya dang ri dgas tshang dag dang /_/bshang lam rang dbang min dang phyogs/_/ge ya glu mkhan glu dang dbyangs/_/go h+yi yon tan sbyin dang bu/_/grwa mya skyed ma bud
[\[211b.4\]]med dang /_/grA myaM dga' 'brel a sh+lA la/_/tsas gdung ba tshogs dang ni/_/rtsa bar 'ching ba'o/_/tsa bya dben ba tsa byA ni/_chen po dang ni dri yi mchog_/tsit+yA ro yi kha dang ma/_/tsi t+yaM gshin po'i mchod rten la/_/tsai t+yaM gnas gzhi tsi t+yA ni/_/gtsang khang phyur bu la yang ngo /_
[\[211b.5\]]tsi t+ya sangs rgyas sku gzugs dang /_/shing la yang ni shin tu bsten/_/tsai t+ya dri ba rmad byung la/_/tsA t+ya brjod bya bzhin tso la/_/dpal gnas ma'o/_/tshA bA ni//tsha gdung med dang bkur ste dang /_/shin tu bskums dang mdzes pa dang /_/gzugs brnyan me shel gral skyong ba/_/dzan
[\[211b.6\]]ma dang mna' ma sar/_/bshes dang khol po dga' dang phan/_/skyed byed ma'o dza n+yaM ni/_/kun sbyor yongs smod tshong dus la/_dzan+yA ma dang grogs mo dga'/_/dzarlu srog chags me mchog gnas/_/dza ya rgyal byed rnam rgyal la/_/dza ya chos kyi dbye ba nad/_/u ma'i grogs mo
[\[211b.7\]]rgyal byed ma/_/phan pa dang ni ma bsrung la/_/dzA t+yaM rigs can gtso bo la/_/tAr+sh+yA bya khyung nyi ma yi/_/kha lo pa dang shing rta rta/_/rta rna la sogs la 'dod do/_/ta k+Sh+yaM mig sman khu ba la/_/tiSh+ya me tog cha shas la/_/'dzin pa la'o tra yI ni/_/de gsum rigs byed gsum pa dang /_/
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]rdzogs pa la ni yang dag 'dod/_/dras+Yu dgra dang chom rkun la/_/dA ya sol+luN+Tha bshad dang /_/yau ta ka sogs nor dang sbyin/_/cha sogs rin dang ba yi dngos/_/di byaM/_lam bcas/_li shi dang /_/me tog la'o di bya ni/_/skyu ru ra'o/_/di byaM ni/_/kha dog la sogs 'byor pa
[\[212a.2\]]la/_/dA th+yA gos khyim gos la ste/_/dai t+ya lha min de t+yA ni/_/chang dang gtum po sman pa yang /_/dra byaM bi ru la dang 'byor/_/shing gi rnam 'gyur skyed pa dang /_/sman dang sa sogs 'jig dang 'dul/_/d+ha n+ya 'bras dang skyu ru ra/_/d+ha n+ya bsod nams ldan pa la/_/d+hA naM 'bru dang so ba la/_/
[\[212a.3\]]d+hiSh+t+yaM/_rgyu skar khang pa la/_/na ya nus pa gnas dang ma/_/lugs dang pho nya'i khyad par la/_/nA T+yaM sil snyan gsum pa sgeg_/ni t+yaM stag dang des pa la/_/pa th+yA a ru ral 'dod/_/pa th+yAM phan pa nyid la'o/_/ba d+ya dmangs rigs pa d+yaM ni/_/tshigs bcad pa d+yA mi yi lam/_/pa d+ya kun tu rnams 'gyur dang /_/bi ting+gi'o yAM yaM ni/_/smod
[\[212a.4\]]pa dang ni btung ba la/_/pI yu nyi ma 'ug pa dus/_/pu N+yaM legs byas chos dang ni/_/bsod nams ldan dang yid 'ong la/_/pU dz+ye dang phyag 'os la/_/pe yaM btung bya'o thug la/_/de yA/_'tshed bya dang ba snying /_/prA ya phal che mang dang mtshungs/_/mal dang 'chi bdag dag_/
[\[212a.5\]]la'o/_/pri ya/_dga' dang myur/_rgan sman/_/ba n+yaM/_/nags tshal las byung la/_/ba n+yA+e tshogs dang nags kyi chu/_/ban+d+h+yaM/_bud med mo gsham la/_/ban+d+h+ya/_rgyal dang 'bras med shing /_/pa l+yaM gtso bo stobs byed 'dzin/_/brlu/_mchog ldan mtsho lnga pa/_/bin+d+h+yA gcod byed mdzes
[\[212a.6\]]pa la/_/bin+d+h+ya/_snum dang sun 'byed la/_/bIng+gi/_mthu dang khu ba dang /_/gzi brjid dang ni nus pa la/_/ba sh+yA tshogs can ma la'o/_/be sh+yAM rje rigs ke ta na/_/b+ha yang dag po so sor 'jigs/_/rab deng /_sgur 'khyogs dga' ba dang /_/las dang tshon gyi shing dag la/_/b+ha bya
[\[212a.7\]]legs dang skal ldan byed/_/b+ha bye bden dang dge ba dang /_/rung ba dang ni ngo bo can/_/b+hA gyAM dge ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/sgrub dang dge dang mi dge'i las/_/b+h+ri t+yA 'bangs dang gla mi la/_/ma t+b+ya nya dang nga'i dbye ba/_/shing gi rgyal po la yang ngo /_/ma d+h+yaM 'byar byed kun tu 'byar/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]rigs dang go skabs tha ma la/_/ma n+yu lha min mchod sbyin khro/_/ma ya bzo bo lha min dang /_/glang po che dang rta la'o/_/ma yu ri dgas mi 'am ci/_/mA ya gos sar can lha mi/_/ma ya ngan g.yo brtse ba dang /_/sAM pa rI dang blo dag la/_/mA l+yaM me tog phreng ba la/_/mU l+yaM
[\[212b.2\]]rin dang dngos po la/_/mri t+yu mched dang lha dag la/_/me d+h+yaM me du ra la'o/_/me d+h+yA zas dang shu dag la/_/bAR+Ya/_gtsang pa me d+h+yaM rten/_/ba yu rta dang mchod sbyin rta/_/yA myA smin byed rgyas pa la/_/yA myA ri byi tsan+dan la/_/ya gya pi wang mchog dag la/_/gA r+d+h+ya nus dang sdig pa
[\[212b.3\]]can/_/yo gya sma sa me shel lo/_/yo gya 'byor dang sman dag la/_/ra th+ya 'khyog dang bzhi mdo dang /_/laM dang shing rta dag la'o/_/ra th+ya shing rta 'dren pa la/_/ra myaM yid dga' ra myA ni/_/mchog tu rnam par bsams pa'o/_/ra mya tsam+ba ka yi shing /_/rU byaM gus dang
[\[212b.4\]]gser dang dngul/_/rab bzhi'i tshul dang thob bya dang /_/thob pa dang ni rigs pa la/_/la ya gar sogs mtshungs pa dang /_/rnam par sgeg dang ma 'dres pa/_/lak+Sh+yaM grangs dang mda' zad pa/_/khang pa la'o/_/lA byAM ni/_/sil snyan gsum pa bud med gar/_/bik+Sh+ya
[\[212b.5\]]rta yi rol pa dang /_/mthong bya rmad du byung ba la/_/brah+m+yA sde tshan rab gnas dang /_/baR+Ya Ta na la yang ngo /_/shA ya/_mal stan/_/sbrul lag pa/_/mal dang ldan pa nyid dang yang /_/sgra yi gum+p+ha la yang ngo /_/shal+ya shwA bi Ta/_myos byed shing /_/sha mya phur bu mda' dang ni/_/'od
[\[212b.6\]]ma'i ka m+bi kA mda' chen/_/shU n+yA sbubs can/_/shU n+yaM ni/_/skye bo med pa la 'dod do/_/sau rmyaM dpa' ba nyid dang ni/_/spyod dang shor ba la yang ngo /_/saM khyaM yang dag 'gro dang grangs/_/gcig nyid sogs dang 'dor ba la'o/_/ta ya 'jig rten las pha rol/_/sa t+ya bden pa bden
[\[212b.7\]]ba zung /_/lha rdzas la'o sa t+yA skad/_/sa t+yaM de ldan mtshams dang bsags/_/chu klung dbye ba kun 'dzin dang /_/dam bca' bsam pa khrims lugs la/_/sa bya g.yon phyogs nye ba la/_/sha byaM mtshon cha 'bras yon tan/_/rdo ba bdun dang sauD+ha bya/_/nai ru dz+ya dang bzod pa la/_/sa d+h+ya rnal 'byor
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dbye ba la/_/tshogs dang lha'o bsgrub bya la'ang /_/sA ya mda' dang phyi dro la/_/sruR+Ya nyin mo'i de'i dga' ma/_/sman gyi dbye ba la suR+YA/_/se byaM bsten 'os 'dam bu byings/_/bsten pa'o so myA mdzes 'khri shing /_/s+the ya mdun na 'don la'o/_/smaya rtsod pa'i tshig gtan 'bebs/_/
[\[213a.2\]]sgrol ba snyems dang rmad du byung /_/hAR+Ya pa ru ra yi shing /_/'phrog bya la'o hri d+ya ni/_/dbang du byed dang rig byed sngags/_/rig pa dang ni sman la'o/_/hr-i d+ya 'tsho ba brgya pa dang /_/snying dga' ba dang snying po la/_/k+Sha ya 'god dang bskal ba'i mtha'/_/gnas dang skyes bu'i khyad par la/_/ad+ya ya ni sun
[\[213a.3\]]'byin dang /_/bka' dang rim 'das 'jig pa'i dbyug_/a d+hi Sh+ya ni tshugs pa med/_/spungs chen chu klung khyad par la/_/a na ya ni phongs pa dang /_/skal ba lugs dang mi dge'i gnas/_/a pa taM ni bu mo gu/_/a b+ha ya ni 'jigs pa med/_/ab+ha ni ya'o ba na pa la/_/a b+hi ya ni u shIr/_/
[\[213a.4\]]a b+hi khyA ni/_/snyan dang grags/_/bzang po rnams grags ming rnams la/_/a ba d+yaM ni bsad 'os dang /_/don ma yin dang spyo ba la/_/a shwI ya ni rta'i tshogs dang /_/rta la phan pa'o a ha l+ya/_/lha dang dpal mo'i dbye ba dang /_/gau ta ma yi btsun mo'o/_/ma hA rma ni ri dang brtan/_/A ti thugs ni
[\[213a.5\]]shen pa'i bu/_/shen pa la'o A ter yI/_/me tog can dang rgyun shes bu/_/'bab chu'i khyad par dag la'o/_/A trai ya ni thub pa'i dbye/_/A di t+ya ni nyi ma lha/_/am+na ya ni man ngag thos/_/A sha ya ni bsam pa dang /_/gzhi rten gzhan la brten pa'o/_/A shra ya ni bang mdzod dang /_/margas pa
[\[213a.6\]]dang ci 'chad ma'o/_/in+d+ri yang ni sems la ste/_/in+d+ri ya ni yul dbang byed/_/u da ya ni shar ri 'char/_/a bA ya ni mnyam 'byed sogs/_/thabs dang nye bar bgrod pa la/_Ur+NA yu ni ba la ldan lug_/lwa ba skad cig 'jig pa la/_/ai n+ya yaM ni e n+yI lpags/_/dga' ba 'ching ba'i
[\[213a.7\]]khyad par la/_/au tsi bye ni grol de nyid/_/bden pa dang ni rung ba la/_/kam+ba ya ni niR+Ya ma/_/bcud kyi dbye ba byug pa dang /_/'dod chags yan lag dri bzang dmar/_/kA le ya ni lha min dbye/_/kA me yaM ni dus dum bu/_/ku lA ya ni sngon po bzhin/_/'dab chags sngon po dang ni gnas/_/
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]kau kr-i t+ya ni rjes su gdung /_/mi rig byed pa dag la'o/_/gAM ge yaM ni mu sta ka_/gser dang ka ste ru Sha'o/_/gAM ge ya ni sde tshan dang /_/'jigs sde dang ni gAM ga'i bu/_/tsak+Shu She ni ka Ti ka_/pad dkar shing dang mig sman bcud/_/ku sha l+yaM ni skal bzang dang /_/mig la phan pa'o tsa m+bi
[\[213b.2\]]ya/_/sh+ya pa ka dang 'jig byed mda'/_/me tog ge ser gser la'o/_/dza g+ha nyaM ni tha ma smod/_/lhag ma'o dza TA yu bya'i dbye/_/gu gul shing ngo ta pa s+yA/_/tshangs spyod dka' thub skar ma dbo/_/de ba yu ni chos ldan dang /_/de ba yA tri ka la'o/_/dwi tI yA ni ches dbye dang /_/sa le
[\[213b.3\]]rdzogs par byed pa la'o/_/nA de yi ni rgyal ma dang /_/sba yi dzam+bu chu'i lcang ma/_/nI ka ya ni bdag nyid khyim/_/dza bA ni rang+ga gi guSh+Tha/_/chos mthun nges 'bab mtshon cha dang /_/'dus pa dang ni 'dres pa la'o/_/nyai pa th+yaM ni tshos byed pa/_/rab tu sgrub par byed pa la/_/ba ya s+ya ni'o
[\[213b.4\]]thug dang /_/mdog bzang 'o ma bzhon ma dang /_/'o ma phan nga'o baR+Ya dang /_/gnas dang 'brug sgra sgra 'byin la/_/ngaR+YA ya ni rnam grangs dang /_/sprul pa rab 'byed mda' la'o/_/sA nI ya ni btung bya chu/_/bA ru Sha ni phur bu la/_/bA ru Sh+yaM ni rtsub pa dang /_/brgya byin gyi ni tshal la'ang
[\[213b.5\]]yang /_/pu lap+d+ya ni mi ci'i dbang /_/'od yangs tsha'o mgrin bcu la/_/bra tIrle ni lag skyes rul/_/cho ga nges par bkram pa la/_/pra na ya ni dga' ba dang /_/bi shram+b+ha dang slong ba la/_/pra NA ya ni sreg la 'dor/_/yang dag mi 'dod mngon par brjod/_/pra t+ya ya ni mna' gtan
[\[213b.6\]]tshigs/_/shes dang yid rton nges pa dang /_/sI n+tA di khyA ta tA dang /_/bu ga gnas spyod rag las la'o/_/pra ma ya mchi bskal pa'i mtha'/_/brgyal bar gyur pa rnams la'o/_/pra pa bya ni lam mthun dang /_/rang bzhin ldan pa'o/_/pa la ya/_/gdu bum mgul nad/_kaM ka Na/_/
[\[213b.7\]]bA le ya ni bany+dzi kA/_/bong bu ba si hi ta pa/_/bra h+ma n+ya ni sa nu dang /_/br-i Sha tshangs pa'i legs pa la/_/brah+ma N+yaM ni bram ze dang /_/bram ze rnams kyi tshogs pa la/_/b+hu dzi Sh+ya ni grogs ngan dang /_/lag pa'i srad bu'o b+hu dzi Sh+yA/_/rag lus man dang rje rigs bran/_/b+hU ShA ts+yu ni 'od
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]chen 'dod/_/bsil pa'i 'od zer rnams la'o/_/b+h+rA tri bya ni/_spun zla'i/_thu/_/maM ga l+yaM ni zho bkra shis/_/yid 'ong la'o mang+ga l+yAM/_/dpal 'bras dang ni a shwa d+tha/_/ma sU rA dang skyob byed la/_/maM ga l+yAM ni gsal ma dang /_/me tog brgya pa br-i yang
[\[214a.2\]]gu/_/thur bltas me tog zhi ma dkar/_/dung gi me tog shu dag rnams/_/ma la ya ni yul ri'i dbye/_/kun dga' ra dang ri yi cha/_/dur byid la yang ma la yA/_/mr-i g.yu ni bram zer brjod/_/go ma mu ni nad dag la/_/ra ha s+ya ni sba bya la/_/ra ha s+yA ni chu
[\[214a.3\]]bo'i dbye/_/lo hi d+yaM ni dmar po dang /_/'bru dang chu bo'i khyad par la/_/bak+ta bya ni smod dang dman/_/rag las pa'o ma dA h+ya/_/ngag bzang po dang gcod byed dang /_/rnam par rgyal dang rgyal ba'i lam/_/bi dza ya ni gau rI dang /_/de yi grogs mo chos dbye la/_/bi
[\[214a.4\]]na ya ni drul dang lugs/_/dra ba la'o bi sha l+ya/_/mo yi gtsug phud glang po dang /_/gu DU tsi dang dur byid dang /_/zug rngu bral ba la yang ngo /_/bisma ya ni rmad byung snyems/_/bi Sha ya ni spyod lam yul/_/dbang po'i don la'ang nges par 'jug_/'brel pa sogs kyi shes
[\[214a.5\]]pa'ang dran/_/bya bA ya ni rab dga' dang /_/mi snang ba la yang dag dran/_/bya bA yaM ni gzi brjid la/_/shiN+Da yaM ni/_/thub pa'i dbye/_/dpal 'bras dag byed khyad par la/_/shA l+ya yaM ni me tog brgya/_/sha'o skyes pa la yang ngo /_/shrIR+Sha n+ya ni rnam par rgyas/_/skra dang rtse mo
[\[214a.6\]]can la'o/_/shai le yaM ni rgya mtsho'i tsha/_/ta la'i 'dab dang brag skyes la/_/shwa shurlu sgyug mo dang /_/bum pa dang ni sh+yA le ka_/pan+na ya ni rgyab gnas dang /_/stobs dang lugs dang 'du ba'o/_/sa ma ya ni grub mtha' dang /_/mna' dang kun spyod yang dag rig_/des bstan
[\[214a.7\]]bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_/dus dang brda rnams la yang ngo /_/sa raN+D+Yu ni chu sbyin dang /_/rlung dang nus pa/_rung ba stobs/_/bau ni a nA ya pa/_/phag gi bya ba la yang ngo /_/sau ra b+h+yaM ni dri bzang dang /_/mdzes dang yon tan gus pa la'o/_/saM s+t+ya ya ni kun tu 'jug_/dbyibs
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dang rgya che mgrin pa la/_/tir N+yaM ni mi zad rdzas/_/mchog dang gser dang khu ba dang /_/nga rgyal dbye ba la yang ngo /_/hri de yaM ni snying po snying /_/k+Shi pa N+yaM ni dri zhim lus/_/k+Shi tra ya ni gzhan lus dang /_/gso spyad 'os dang zhing dang rtsa/_/gzhan gyi chung ma dga' ba
[\[214b.2\]]dang /_/bsgrub bya dang ni nad dag la/_/a nu sha ya rjes su gdung /_/rjes su 'brel dang zhe sdang la/_/an+ta sha yA 'chi ba dang /_/sa yi mal dang dur khrod ma/_/g.yas bral g.yas min mi mthun pa/_/a ba bya na snyems ni na/_/u pa kAR+Ya ltami bdag gnas/_/phan
[\[214b.3\]]par byed pa'i dbye ba la/_/kA tra be ya zha nye dang /_/sha tshe dang ni mtshon dag la/_/u ba kra ya gso spyad dang /_/rtsom pa dang ni gsod pa la/_/zla ba'i na tshod bla re dang /_/bdag nyid dang ni sman gyi dbye/_/dzA lA sha ya chu yi gzhi/_/dza la sha yaM 'dam bu sbyin/_/
[\[214b.4\]]taN+Tu li ya byi dong ga'i/_/shing dang chung du mA ri la/_/gdung ba rtsa dang stong pa dang /_/ka ta ka'i 'bras phreng ba yangs/_/d+ha naM dza ya rta dang lus/_/glang po rlung me ka ku b+ha/_/ni ra ma ya skyon med rtog_/pa ri bA ma chu yi gnas/_/naM ta m+ba dang /_/yongs su bkab/_/pAny+tsa
[\[214b.5\]]dze n+ya hri ThI ka sha_/dung dang bA Ta ga la'o/_/bau ru She ya skyes bu'i rtsal/_/tshig dbye tshogs ba gsod pa dang /_/skyes bus byas pa rnams la'o/_/bi ta bA yaM 'jigs pa dang /_/'jigs rung pra ti shra ma ni/_/'dun sa dang ni gnas la'o/_/pha laM da ya 'bras
[\[214b.6\]]bu rnams/_/'byung dang rnyed dang sum rtsen la/_/pi le sha ya byis ba sprul/_/b+hA ga d+he yaM skal ba dang /_/lag pa dang ni cha la'o/_/b+h+ri tan+d+r-i ya byed pa dang /_/sgra dang spyod yul 'dus pa la/_/ma hod bo yekun 'byung dang /_/byang grol du mo rgur mo la/_/ya hA lam gtsug
[\[214b.7\]]lag khang /_/mu stegs khang dang mchog bdag la/_/ma hA mU l+yi rin thang che/_/pad+ma rA ga la sogs la/_/mAdzA ri ya dmangs rigs dang /_/byi la bya ba spyod pa la/_/ra te N+ya ya rab 'phyang gsod/_/lhag pa dang ni ne'u le/_/sa muts+tsha ya sbring dang 'gog_/sa mu dA ya
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]tshogs pa dang /_/kun tu sbyor dang nye ba'i rim/_/sa mU dA ya tshogs brid sgra/_/sam+ba ra ya g.yul 'gyed dang /_/rgud dang phyi ma'i dus dag la/_/sa lang+ga ya sgra dang ming /_/rol rtsed phyugs dang bya dag la/_/s+thu'u lots+tsha ya mtha' dag ni/_/shing dum rdo ba za ma tog_/glang po rnams kyi bar ma la/_/
[\[215a.2\]]a ku to b+ha yaM zhes pa/_/lha khang a kIn+di shIka_/kA lA nu pAR+YaM ni shing /_/shi sha ba dang dus skyes dang /_/ri las skyes pa rnams la'o/_/dug+b+ha tA lI yang zhes pa/_/A ma'i 'o ma 'o ma'is/_/dbu ba can dang de nas ni/_/'o ma'i tsam sa dang ni/_/ta ta paN+Da kI Ta'o/_/pra ba tsa nI ya zhes pa/_/brjod bya'i
[\[215a.3\]]rab dang rjod byed rab/_/pr-i Sha ka bA yI zhes pa/_/dpal mo go rim 'tsho byed ma/_/brgya las mchog tu gyur ma'o/_/pa t+yung+ga ma nI yaM ni/_/nye bar gnas bya sbyang pa'i gos/_/bi shwa k+sen bri yA ni/_/pad+ma ma dang skyob byed la/_/ya mtha'i sde'o//_//ra ni 'dod me me dang rno/_/rwa ni a rtog ser dag la/_/
[\[215a.4\]]ru ni sgra dang 'jigs dang cha/_/ri ni nyin byed sa la'o/_/gro ni bcod bya 'tshod byed la/_/g+h+rA ni sna dang snom byed dang /_/dra ni shing dang nyin mo dang /_/gser dang 'dod pa'i gzugs can la/_/shrI ni dpal mo dbyangs can dang /_/mdzes dang shes rab thang shing dang /_/'jug pa sde gsum phun
[\[215a.5\]]tshogs dang /_/cha lugs dang ni phan byed dang /_/sru ni 'dzag dang chu 'bab sgra/_/hri ni/_bi Da ngo tsha la/_/a graM gtso bo mchog dang ni/_/rtse mor gyur dang lhag pa sogs/_/mdun dang stobs dang nga rgyal dang /_/bram ze mdzes dang 'od dag la/_/mchod dang 'degs pa dag la'o/_/ang+ga ma
[\[215a.6\]]sri m+be khAN+Di swa rno/_/ma d+ho ri he ri skyes la'ang ngo /_/ran+t+ra myur ba 'khyogs lus dang /_/myur bar 'gro ba dag la'o/_/a shraM dmar dang gsol la'o/_/a shra zur dang skra la'o/_/a s+t+raM mtshon cha gzhu gnas phyin/_/A rA pags pa 'bigs pa la/_/A rA sa skyes spen pa la/_/
[\[215a.7\]]a ru shing gi dbye ba dang /_/spe'u dang ni mche ba can/_/in+d+ra brgya byin mun pa nyid/_/rnal 'byor dbang po gdengs ka la/_/i ra bcud dang 'khor dang 'dzin/_/mi mnyam pa yis rnams la/_/u gra drag go bod pa dang /_/dmangs rigs bu dang 'phrog byed la/_/u gra shu nag sbrid pa
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dang /_/rnga mo glang mo che mo la/_/uSh+Ti pa lang skyong ma la/_/u sra 'od la u srA ni/_/ba lang steng skyob dag la'o/_/ai n+d+ri bya rog rgyal byed la/_/e dra dza pA'i shing dang ni/_/chang gi khyad par dag la'o/_/aMg+h+r-i rkang pa praM thu bo/_/ka dru gser dang ser skya la/_/ka ri lag pa 'od char rdo/_/kA ra bsad
[\[215b.2\]]pa ma mo ri/_/nges dang so sor 'bad pa dang /_/stobs ldan la'o sA rA ni/_/gnyen dang grong khyer 'ching ba dang /_/gser dang byas pa gzir ba dang /_/pho nya mo dang rab bsten pa/_/kA ru bzab dang /_/byed pa po dang las kun pa/_/kA ri bya ba nA pi ta/_/kI ra ljongs dang ne tso
[\[215b.3\]]la/_ku ru mi bdag khyad par zas/_/dpal mgrin dang ni dug sel la/_/kr-i ts+tshaM dka' tshegs sdig pa dang /_/kun tu gdung ba la sogs la/_/kru ra drag po rtse med do/_/kroSh+Ti/_ce spyang 'o ma dang /_/rnam par 'joms dang be da'i shing /_/kha re bong bu lha seg dang /_/
[\[215b.4\]]rnon po'i kha ru so med sbrul/_/dkar po lhan cig ko la'i 'dab/_/ga ra nad kyi khyad par la/_/ga raM dug dang nye dug byed/_/gA traM glang po mchog dang lus/_/byin pa la sogs yan lag dbye/_/gi ri ri dang ri ldan dang /_/'dzin khri mig dang 'jig pa dang /_/skad dang
[\[215b.5\]]tshig dang dbyangs la yang /_/ku ru bsten bya sogs byed dang /_/bram ze sogs dang lha sngags pa/_/chen po g.yo ba du rdzar/_/guN+d+ra gzi brjid can la'o/_/gun+dA 'bras gang bla sgang dang /_/br-i yang ku dang gar 'khyog la/_/gr-id+h+ra lu ba'i bye brag go/_/go tra sa 'dzin go traM
[\[215b.6\]]rigs/_/k+Sha tra dang ni ming la yang /_/sred pa gnod pa zla ba dang /_/lam dang nags tshal dag la yang /_/go drA ba dang ba lang tshogs/_/go ra mtshan mor byed pa dang /_/skya rengs re dkar rnam dag la/_/go ri ri yi bu mo dang /_/chu lha mo dang 'jigs pa'i skal/_/
[\[215b.7\]]chu klung /_ri mo skyed ma dang /_/dmar ser gsal 'dod pr-i yang ku/_/gau raM/_rnam 'jig_/dkar po dang /_/yungs kar pad+ma can dang mtsho/_/g+ha pra nyin mo 'tshe ba la/_/g+ho ri 'jigs pa mngon par brjod/_/u ma'i ming /_/g+ho ra mdud can/_/tsa kra naM/_/dur pa dang ni tshogs pa la/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]tsa kre shing rta'i yan lag dmag_/grong gi dra ba chu yi 'khor/_/ku la la dang bya ba sgrub/_/snod dang yul 'khor mtshon cha'i dbye/_/rtsi traM sna tshogs rmad byung dang /_/kun nas bris dang thig le mkha'/_/tsi tA/_rgyu skar thos byed ma/_/lag 'gro
[\[216a.2\]]dang ni lha mo'i dbye/_/byi ba'i lo ma go Tu mab/_/bzang mo dang ni glang mo'o/_/rtsi raM wa sta gtsug phud dang /_/zha nye dang ni ba'i nu ma/_/tsi ri kats+tsha Ti dang ni/_/kA pi ni dang /_tsi kra dang /_/skyur ba chu yi lcang ma 'o/_/tsu shrI/_tsag dang /_tsu gri ni/_/skyu ru ra yi shing la 'dod/_/tsi tra zla
[\[216a.3\]]ba ri'i dbye ba/_/shi ba dang ni mchod rten la/_/tso ra chom rkun dung bzang po/_/r+ts+tsha che gdung sgrib pa la/_/che trA sbrang rtsi can dang ni/_/g.yer ma dang ni dbang po'i brag_/dzA ra tshim byed bdag po la/_/rdzA ri nges dang sman bye brag_/dzI ra zir ral gri dang /_/TA ra
[\[216a.4\]]mtshon dang mgyogs 'gro la/_/tin+t+ri gtso po grub mtha' dang /_/thos pa yal ga'i khyad par dang /_/bran bza' 'dzin dang bstan bcos dang /_/rgyu dang yongs su 'gebs pa dang /_/srad bu ldan dang /_rkyang pa mchog_/grub pa dang ni sgrub byed thabs/_/tan+t+ri
[\[216a.5\]]rig dang yon tan dang /_/tshig dang /_gu DU rtsI dang ni/_/mig dang rab tu rings pa la/_/ta ri gos sogs sgrom/_gru/_sgam/_/tA naM zangs dang skya rengs dmar/_/tA ra shin tu mtho dang gzhu/_/mu tig la sogs legs dag dang /_/sgrol dang dag dang grol ba la/_/tA raM
[\[216a.6\]]dngul dang skar ma dang /_/mgrin bzang bla ma bud med dang /_/sangs rgyas can 'khrungs lha mo dang /_/mig gi dbus kyi 'bras bu la'o/_/tI ra dka' thub 'gram ngogs dang /_/shar dang nub kyi de dag go/_/tI praM shin tu bod pa dang /_/tshang ba dang ni mig de ldan/_/
[\[216a.7\]]hI bri dur ba'i ta zer dang /_/dri yi du rbA dag dang ni/_/'od ma can dang rab skyes la/_/to traM 'joms byed skrag dang dor/_/da ri ri sul cung zad don/_/da pra bong bu rta dag la/_/da ru lha yi shing dang shing /_/dwa raM sgo dang khas len la/_/d+hu ra rus sbal phyugs dang gsod/_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]ras bal d+ha ra 'dzin ma dang /_/snying po'i gzhi dang sa la'o/_/d+hA drI sgyur dang sha ma/_/nye ba'i ma dang ke ta tI/_/d+h+wa ra 'dzin ma phun tshogs char/_/dwa na phreng ba/'tshe ba rdzas/_/'gro ba rta 'gros rnga pa can/_/ral gri sogs kyi kha dang ni/_/dmag rtse mig
[\[216b.2\]]deng gong bye brag_/yung ba dang ni mtshan mo la/_/d+hi ra mkhas brtan yangs dang 'jam/_/d+hI raM/_gur gum na bkra ni/_/zab mo la'o na tra ni/_/sna yi rtse mo drag po la/_/nA ras dang rgyal ba mi/_/mA rA ma dang ga bur la/_/nA ra rgyud bA na chu nA pra/_/mtshan
[\[216b.3\]]mo'i bdag po'i ni pri ni/_/stobs can dang ni mu khyud dang /_/nam gru dang ni nags tshal la/_/ne traM mig dang shing gi rtsa/_/gos dang yon tan shing rta gar/_/ne rta dar dang 'dren byed brjod/_/pat+t+ri lo ma 'dab ma mnga'/_/phyogs dang 'dren pa'o pa ra mchog_/bdag
[\[216b.4\]]nyid 'di dang lkog tu gyur/_/pa raM mi zad 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/pA tri snod dang blon po dang /_/rung dang 'gram gnyis khyad par dang /_/blugs gzar sogs kyi 'dab ma dang /_/phan tshun 'gram gyi khyad par la/_/pA rI sdig srin rdzogs pa dang /_/bAn+ta dang ni pA ra ba/_/
[\[216b.5\]]glang po'i rkang pa'i thag pa la'o/_/pun+ta lha min bur shing dbye/_/pad+ma dkar po dang ni 'bu/_/khra bo dang ni gnas ma dang /_/sa dang chang la'o su raM ni/_/grong khyer skya nar bu dang khyir/_/steng khyim grong dang lus la'o/_/pu ra gu gul bu rA ni/_/sngon dus pu ru mtho ris dang /_/mi bdag khyad par bra h+ya'o/_/
[\[216b.6\]]pa rA chom rkun pu ra ni/_/phye ma'i bye brag chu 'bab dang /_/rma ni yang dag 'khrud pa la/_/bo traM gos dang gdong gi rtse/_/phag pa'i mchu la'ang dang ba ltar bar bya/_/paur grong na brjod par byed/_/pau raM rtsa'o/_/ba kra ni/_/dal bal 'gro ba'o ba kraM naM/_/'phar ma'i dbye ba rjod par byed/_/ba kra 'khyog dang khro ba la/_/ba d+h+ru grong
[\[216b.7\]]dang mig dag la/_/ba d+hu thub pa phra mo dang /_/ne'u le rkang ga/_/rdo rje dang /_/dmar ser dang ni yangs pa la/_/bar bu mo'i bdag po dang /_/Shi lga lha la sogs dang /_/bslu/_/yongs su bskor ba la 'gyur ro/_/ba raM gur gum la 'dod do/_/gtso bo yid kyi khyad par la'ang /_/bi rA 'bras bu gsum dang gru/_/ba rI ba rgyal las 'doms ma'o/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bA ra nyi ma sogs nyin dang /_/sgo dang /_skabs dang 'phrog byed la/_/b+ha ra shir sgur chang snod tshogs/_/bA ri glang po'i chings sogs lus/_/bA ri lha mo dbyangs can ma/_/ba ri ngo tsha shes dang chu/_/bA sra nyin mo/_/ba saM ni/_/myos byed yan lag bzhi mdo'i lam/_/bI
[\[217a.2\]]ra shin tu dpa' dang rdzogs/_/bi raM rtsa dang ba'i raM mi/_/chu shing gam+ha rI dang ni/_/tA ma la dang la bA lu/_/k+ShI rI pI dang /_kA ko lI/_/'o ma bdag po bu ldan ma/_/u dum+ba ri ba lang lhas/_/'o ma rnam par 'joms pa la/_/bren+ta sbyin byed/_/brgya byin sogs/_/'joms dang sprin dang
[\[217a.3\]]sgra rnams la/_/b+ha dra 'phrog byed dga' spyod dang /_/shing dang ma ru ka dan+d+ha/_/glang po gtso bo legs pa la/_/b+ha dri byed pa'i dbye ba dang /_/bla sgang bde ba gser rnams la/_/b+ha drA 'dor byed/_/sman dang phra/_/ma gug pa dang kaT+pha la/_/b+ha ra shin tu phul byung bur/_/b+ha ru spun zla
[\[217a.4\]]gser la'o/_/b+hA ra gsod bral/_ba lA ni/_/gser dang khri phrag gnyis la'o/_/b+hi ru dbang por 'dam pa dang /_/'jigs dang nA si ka'i bye brag_/b+hU ri brA r+dz+ya/_/gser dang /_/tshangs/_dbang po dang ni dpa' ba la/_/man+tA rig byed khyad par dang /_/gsang ba smra dang
[\[217a.5\]]lha sogs sgrub/_/ma ru mya ngam ri skyes la/_/mA traM mtha' dang des bzung la/_/mA traM yongs su 'gebs dang 'byor/_/nga rgyal nyung dang rna rgyan dang /_/yi ge'i lus so mA ra ni/_/bgegs dang 'chi dang lha br-i Sha/_/mA ri gtum po skye ba zad/_/mi tra grogs po nyi ma la/_/
[\[217a.6\]]mI ra/_'od zer ri bo chu/_/mu ra/_lha min/_/gsod pa la/_/yA tA ltad mo 'gro dang 'gro/_/lha yi dga' ston dag la'o/_/rA Sh+TaM yul skyed pa dag la/_/ru ru ri dgas lha min dbye/_/re traM/_khu ga bdud rtsi dang /_/dngul chu gos kyi gnas la'o/_/ro d+hA/_rngon
[\[217a.7\]]pa'i bu/_lo d+haM/_/rgya skyegs/_/sdig pa/_/sgrub pa bral/_/ro trAM gtum mo/_/rau tra ni/_/drag po dang ni 'jigs su rung /_/dbang po'i dbye ba dang ni sgo/_/bkraM badzra rgyud can smad/_/badzra dbyig dang /_rgyags dang ni/_/byis pa dag dang skyu ru ra'o/_/ra bra pa dang
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]'gram la'o/_/k+She tra yid dang rdul dag la/_/geraM lus dang kha bye rlung /_/bya gra go bzlog yang dag la brugs/_/byA g+h+ra gud dang ka rany+dza/_/khrag ldan sgo nga'o/_/bya g+hi ni/_/reg dang gtso bo gzhan gnas so/_/sha bkra brgya byin/_srid sgrub shing /_/rta tri bde sogs
[\[217b.2\]]bdag po sprin/_/ga ru/_rdo rje khro bo la/_/tsA ra gzi brjid cher ma la/_/sha ri chu dang gri la'o/_/sastI gri dang mtshon cha lcags/_/shar khra bo dang ni rlung /_/shA ri bya dang mdog dmar ser/_/'thab dang glang po bgrod pa dang /_/'dogs dang byed pa dag la'o/_/shA traM
[\[217b.3\]]ka dang bstan pa la/_/shi gru som nyi yal ga la/_/badzra lus dang snying po la/_/shi g+h+ra myur dang sgrol ba la/_/shu kra pa sangs ma gtso bo/_/shu kraM ku ba mig nad dang /_/dkar po la'o shub+h+raM sprin/_/sgron me dang ni dkar po'o/_/shu ra mdzes dang dpa' bar bshad/_/
[\[217b.4\]]sU ra nyi ma la yang blta/_/sha traM mchod sbyin rtag tu sbyin/_/ke ta ba dang gnas dang nags/_/sa ra do shal stag pa'i rtser/_/sAM traM 'thug po dang ni sa/_/nags tshal rnams la'o bA raM ni/_/rigs pa chu dang nor la'o/_/sA ra rkang mar cha shas rags/_/pi bra tshad gdung dang
[\[217b.5\]]ni chu/_/pi pra chu klung khyad par la/_/sI ra thong gshol nyin mo'i bdag_/su ra lha'o su rA ni/_/chang dang btung ba snod dag la/_/sU traM mtshon byed dang ni gzhu/_/snal ma dang ni rnam gnas la/_/s+thi raM g.yo med thar pa dang /_/shala'i 'dab ma sa la'o/_/s+phar rnam par gtsigs pa
[\[217b.6\]]dang /_/spyi blugs sogs dang chu bur bdag_/sa ra a yig la sogs dang /_/mtho ba sogs dang bar ma sogs/_/sgra med 'jigs dang rlung la'o/_/swa ri rang 'dod dang ni dal/_/swa ru rdo rje mchod sbyin 'da'/_/khur ba dang ni dum bu la'o/_/ha ri khyab 'jug yongs dbang dang /_/zla
[\[217b.7\]]ba rlung dang dbang po me/_/gshin rje sbrul dang sbal pa spre'u/_/rta dang ne tso 'jig rten dbye/_/dmar ser dang ni 'phrog byed do/_/hA ra mu tig phreng mtshon cha/_/hi sraM/_bya rog 'bras bu sha/_hi praM 'joms par byed pa la/_/hI ra pI sI li kA dang /_/dpal dang rdo rje bde byed la/_/ho bA ri mo'i
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bye brag dang /_/bstan bcos dbye ba khyim dang ni/_/dus sbyor phyed pa rnams la'o/_/k+Sha ra sprin dang k+Sha raM chu/_/k+Sha ra 'chir bu thal ba dang /_/bcud dang ngan pa lan tshwa la/_/k+Shi raM 'o ma chu dag la/_/k+Shu tra chung ngu tha ma dang /_/khro dang ser sna
[\[218a.2\]]dag la'o/_/k+Shu trA rje rigs ma gar ma/_/lus bral bcud 'joms chen mo'o/_/ho shA kaN+Da kA ri dang /_/caM ge rI dang ma k+Shi ka_/k+Shu ra nA si ta phan byed/_/bze ma dang ni a mab ra/_/k+She traM lus dang chung ma dang /_/zor ba grub pa gnas rnams la/_/k+Shau tra 'o
[\[218a.3\]]ma la yang ngo /_/aM gu ra ni shing sha pa/_/yang+ka ke dang yang ba'o/_/ang+ku ra ni myu gu dang /_/sbu dang chu dang khrag la'o/_/aM gA ra ni mi shes dang /_/bkra shis dang ni ma po ba/_/a dzaM ra ni rlung bud med/_/lus kyi yul dang da rdar/_/an+di ra ni skyes bu
[\[218a.4\]]nus/_/a d+ha ra ni so dang gnas/_/dma' ba dang ni brla med la/_/a d+ha ra ni sa'i bye brag_/mi shes pa dang lhur len la/_/an+ta ri ni khyad par dang /_/khyad par can dang go skabs dang /_/bdag dang bdag gi bral ba dang /_/nang dang phyi dang bar dang mtshams/_/
[\[218a.5\]]de yi don ched skabs bu ga_/sa pa raM ni dus bab don/_/glang po phyi nas lus la yang /_/a nA tse dang ne tra brjod/_/a ba ra ni dga' ba dang /_/srid pa ma dang tha mar brjod/_/a ba ri ni glang po che'i/_/byin pa'i mtha' dang phyi ma bsal/_/a ba ra ni lha rus pa/_/
[\[218a.6\]]bsdus pa rdo rje ljon shing la/_/a mA rA ni dbang po'i grong /_/du rbA ka ba gu TU ci/_/am+ba ri ni gos ras bal/_/nam mkha' chags pa dri bzangs la/_/sgrib byed sgo glegs a ra raM/_/a su ra ni srin po me/_/lha min nyi ma dag la'o/_/a k+Sha raM Ni
[\[218a.7\]]tshangs pa dang /_/mkha' dang yi ge dag la'o/_/A ka ra ni skye dang gnas/_/des 'bab gtso bo 'dod par bshad/_/A kA ra ni zur gyis mtshon/_/dbyibs dang 'bod pa dag la'o/_A dA ra ni rten gzhi dang /_/gzhi dang chu 'dzin rnams la'o/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]A sA ra ni rab 'byams dang /_/'dzin ma dang ni char ba dang /_/mdza' bshes dang ni stobs la'o/_/aM gu ri ni rab rib dang /_/'khrugs dang rab stobs legs pa la/_/A hA ra ni bza' ba dang /_/za ba 'phrog dang sdud pa la/_/i ta da ni sA ma ra/_/gzhan
[\[218b.2\]]dang grub dang nad med myur/_/i twa ra ni rwa 'bigs dang /_/dma' ba lam pa 'khrugs pa'i las/_/i shwa ra ni nor phun tshogs/_/zhi ba/_rje bo yid srub la/_/I shwa rI ni rje mo dang /_/dkar mo dbang mo skem byed ma/_/at+ta ra ni tshig tha dad/_/
[\[218b.3\]]rgyal po'i sras dag la yang ngo /_/ut+ta ra ni byang dang steng /_/phyi ma dang ni bla ma'o/_/u da ra ni lto ba dang /_/'thab dang ngos 'dzin spyod skad cig_/u dA ra ni gcod byed la/_/chen po yon gnas rigs pa la/_/an+da rA ni sa gzhi dang /_/lo
[\[218b.4\]]thog thams cad za ba la/_/chu rgyun/_dus mchod dri k+Sha riM/_/au shI ri ni rtse gcig dang /_/tA na gcig dang ma 'khrugs pa/_/rnga yab yu ba gcig brjod dang /_/mal stan dag la'o/_/kats+tshu ri/_/sA ma na dang g.yo ba 'o/_/ka ts+tshu rA ni/_/ngan pa rnyed/_/
[\[218b.5\]]ngan rig/_/rtse mo/_shi m+bi dang /_/sa rI'o kany+dza ra ni sgra/_/nyi ma tshangs pa thub pa lto/_/ka T+wa ri ni 'khor lo 'dod/_/smad pa'o de nas ka T+wa sU/_/ram+baM shI pa mig sbyin dang /_/bden bral dang ni lang tsho can/_/ka Ti traM ni skyed gos dang /_/gser can pags pa'i
[\[218b.6\]]yan lag la/_/ka DA ra ni dmar ser dang /_/'bangs dang dmar ser mdog dag la/_/ka Ni ru ni dong ka dang /_/glang mo dang ni 'jug pa la/_/ga ne ru yang de nyid la/_/ka da ra ni seng ldeng gi_/bye brag sog le nad dag la/_/shre na/_ri sul kan+da ra/_/kan+da ra dang /_/kan+d+hA rA/_/sprin dang
[\[218b.7\]]mgrin pa dag la'o/_/ku ra ra ni bya dbye khyi/_/sog le long ba/_ka rI ra/_/'od ma'i myu gu bum pa dang /_/shing gi dbye ba la yang ngo /_/ka ba rI ni skra'i bkod pa/_/yal ga'i dbye ba la yang ngo /_/ka ba raM Ni lan tshwa dang /_/skyur dang gser dang ras yug la/_/kar+par na ni khur ba dang /_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]mtshon cha'i bye brag gzhong pa la/_/karka rI ni ga lan+ti/_/srin bu me long brtan pa la/_/ka rI rI ni sbrang chung dang /_/so yi rtsa ba glang po che/_/karbu ra ni srin po dang /_/sdig pa chung dang /_gser la'o/_/karbu rI ni nag_/po'i tshogs/_/karbu
[\[219a.2\]]ra ni khra bo la/_/karbu rA ni ce spyang la/_/ka rbu raM ni stag la'o/_/ka la traM ni yang yang za/_/bgrod dka'i gnas dang chung ma sked/_/kAn+ta ra ni nyer 'tshe sogs/_/mdzod dang byed pa'i khyad par la/_/kA n+tA raM ni bgrod dka'i lam/_/dgon pa chen po la yang ngo /_/kA be re
[\[219a.3\]]ni chu klung dbye/_/yung ba lta ba/_/bud med do/_/kA smI ri n-i gur kuM la'o/_/tsi ku ra ni g.yo ba 'od/_/khyim dang yangs pa lag 'gro dang /_/ri byi shing gi khyad par la/_/tshi twa raM Ni gcod byed rdzas/_/ngan pa dang ni sdang ba la/_/tshi di ra ni snang ba che/_/pa bash+gu d+ha dang ral
[\[219a.4\]]gri/_/thag pa la'o dza Tha raM/_/lto ba/_/srab bcings pa la/_/rdzaM bi rang bzhin/_/dza m+bi ri'i/_/shing dang bre dang me tog dag_/dzardza ra ni rnying pa dang /_/hrul po gnas kyi rgyal mtshan la/_/rdza len+tA ni chu lha dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni rmugs 'dzin dang /_/dza su ri ni rdo rje thog_/dz+ha dz+ha ra ni
[\[219a.5\]]rtsod pa'i dus/_/rol mo'i dbye ba shing khyad par/_/dz+ha la rI ni sil khrol dang /_/bcings dang rol mo hu DU ga/_byis pa 'khor lo 'dzin la'o/_/Da ga ra ni/_TaM gan+Da/_/Ti ra dang ni/_ku re dang /_/rnam par 'khor ba spyod yul la/_/TaM gA ra ni siM dza nI/_/sgra dang rab grags
[\[219a.6\]]ngo mtshar la/_/bring+gi ra ni dor bya la/_/tiM ga ra ni skyug pa dang /_/Ta T+Tha rI ni 'phyang ba dang /_/dmag rda/_rol mo brdzun smra la/_/ta mi pha raM Ni rab rib khro/_/ta mi shrA ni/_/mun mtshan mo/_/mun pa bstod pa'o/_/tit+ti ri/_/bye'u dang ni thub pa la/_/ti mi raM ni mun 'tshub
[\[219a.7\]]dang /_/mun pa dang ni thibs po dang /_/sred pa dang ni sprin nag la'o/_/tam+bu tI ni shu lI dang /_/A DU dpal yon dag la'o/_/tu ShA rang bzhin kha ba'i dbye/_/bsil bar byed pa dag la'o/_/b+hU pa ra ni bska ba dang /_/rwa dang chu mchog smra ra mi/_/twa kyan+t+rA ni lag pa tsan/_/
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ta kyan+ta ni yan lag mchog_/dan+d+ha ra ni rdza mkhan gyi/_/'khor lo 'dren dang glang po myos/_/mda'i 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/_/dan+tu ra ni mi mnyam dang /_/mtho dman can gyi so dag la/_/da ha ra ni/_rdzun can dang /_/no bo dang ni nag po can/_/da rta ra ni ri yi dbye/_/
[\[219b.2\]]cung zad zhig pa brjod par byed/_/dardu ra ni sA la pa dang /_/ma la ya dang sil snyan dang /_/b+haM dra ri yi dbye ba la/_/da ru rA ni dbyig dang shel/_/grong gi dra ba/_durdu ra/_/dA se ra ni 'bangs 'os bu/_/du rdu raM Ni gzung dka' dang /_/khyu mchog sman dang /_/lha min
[\[219b.3\]]sogs/_/sum rtsen khyab 'jug_/gnyis ldan dang /_/the tshom dang ni zung la'o/_/d+hU pa ra ni khong bu dang /_/nyung ngu dang ni rab mtha' la/_/na ren+d+ra ni sa yi mgon/_/dug gi sman pa gcod byed pa/_/narma ra ni nyi ma rta/_/dbu ba/_rus sbal ba mo me/_/narma rI thuni/_glang
[\[219b.4\]]po dang /_/ri sul cha med/_mu ra lA/_/nA ga ra ni/_grong khyer 'dzin/_/mkhas dang /_/yangs pa dag la'o/_/nA ga raM ni gla sgang dang /_/bca' sga/_dga' ba 'ching ba la/_/ni ka ra ni/_tshogs snying po/_/rigs kyi sbyin bya tshogs bye brag_/ni ka ra ni 'byor pa dang /_/
[\[219b.5\]]dpal yon dang ni rnam 'god la/_/nirdza rA ni rgas med dang /_/pi sha ga dang rgas 'dor dang /_/ta la'i 'dab dang gu DU rtsi/_/nirba ra ni 'dzem med dang /_/'jigs med/_snying po mkhregs pa la/_/ni Sh+Thu ra ni 'dzem med swa/_/ni ba ra ni tshong pa dang /_/dngos po
[\[219b.6\]]can no buM ku ra/_/zam pa them skas/_chu bal dang /_/chu yi sgur 'khyog dag la'o/_buM dza ra ni lus la ste/_/pany+dza raM ni bya yi snod/_/pa dA ra ni rkang pa'i rdul/_/rkang par gos pa rnams la'o/_/pa bi traM ni/_zangs dang chu/_/chos ldan dang ni gtsang byed dang /_/gtsang
[\[219b.7\]]ma la'o/_/ba TI ra/_/zor ba dang ni rtsa/_ba can/_/mchil pa 'od ma rdul snying spyod/_/bA n+Du raM ni kha dog dang /_/ma ru ba kaM de ldan la/_/sA ma ra ni dman dang rmongs/_/mkha' la gnas pa la yang ngo /_/parba ra ni rgyal po yi/_/mchod sbyin 'jigs dang zan snyigs la/_/
[\[220a\]]
