[\[220a.1\]]pidze+e ni thal pa dang /_/mI tra ral pa/_ni pa ka_/mnga' rnams la'o piny+dzi raM/_/gser dang ser po rta'i khyad par/_/bi Tha ra ni snas la'o/_/pi Tha raM n-i bsrub pa dang /_/mu sta'o/_/piN+DI ra zhes pa/_/ma he skyod dang yal ga 'dor/_/pI pa ra ni
[\[220a.2\]]rus sbal rgyab/_/puSh+ka raM Ni mkha' dang /_chu/_/glang po/_/lag rtse pad+ma dang /_/chags pa mtshon dang sa dang sman/_/gling dang 'gram gyi dbye ba dang /_/mtsho mda' ral gri 'bras bu dang /_/rol mo snod dang /_kha rnams la'o/_/pra ka ra ni/_ku ru m+ba/_/rab bkram
[\[220a.3\]]me tog la sogs la/_/pra ka raM ni/_dzong+ga ka_/shes bya'o pra ka rI zhes pa/_/bzhi mdo dang ni nags tshal la/_/pra kA ra ni 'dra ba dbye/_/prA kha ra ni shin tu rtsub/_/rta la sogs dang go cha dang /_/dre'u dang ni khyi la'o/_/pra da ra ni nang dbye ba dang /_/
[\[220a.4\]]sha ra b+ha dang /_glu dag la/_/prAn+ta raM ni ring dang gtong /_/lam dang nags tshal bas mtha' la/_/pra ba rang ni rgyud dang rigs/_/pra ba ra ni mchog la'o/_/pra sa ra ni yang dag gsal/_/shugs dang rab tu 'dren pa la/_/pra sta ra ni nor bu thob/_/pany+tsa ra ni lci ba
[\[220a.5\]]dang /_/sbubs dang /_tA la'i lcug ma la/_/pra sa ra ni ba ko Ta/_/s+Tha shi kA rany+dza dang rigs/_/pa da raM Ni rgya shug dang /_/shing bal dang ni 'bras bu la/_/ba da rA ni e la'i 'dab/_/khyab 'jug gnon dang sman la'o/_/ban+d+hu ra ni 'ching ba dang /_/dga' dang so sor
[\[220a.6\]]'ching ba la/_/ba d+hu rA ni mkha' 'gro la/_/ngang pa dang ni bud med mchog_/ba ra tA na mtshan khung dang /_/'jug pa tsam la'o barba ra/_/skra'i bkod par sig dman pa la/_/barba rA ni pany+dzi kA/_/yal ga me tog dag la'o/_/bA ga ra ni mi med dang /_/shA
[\[220a.7\]]g+ha spyod pa rlung dkris dang /_/smra 'dod dang ni 'jigs med la/_/bA sa ra ni nyin mo chags/_/pA su rA sa dbang ni k+Shu/_/b+hArlo ru ni rtse mo la/_/gang gi_/su pa mchog bud med/_/de ni ri dgas ri'i dbye ba/_/b+hA ska ra ni nyi ma me/_/b+h+raM gA ri ni bung ba la/_/b+h+r-i ga ra ni gser
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]spyi blugs/_/'dod can bung ba b+ha ra'o/_/rdo ba sbrang bu b+h+ra ma ra/_/ma ka ra ni mi la 'dzin/_/gter dang /_khyim gyi rab dbye la/_/bas ku ra ni mu ku ra/_/me long ba ku ra yi shing /_/sdong bu me tog ku lA la'i/_/bal+lA ka'o/_/many+dza rI/_/snye ma mu tig sbom po dang /_/
[\[220b.2\]]ti la ga yi ljon shing la/_/ma t+sa ra ni dge dang sdang /_/lam dang 'thab mo 'o ma t+sa rA/_/ser sna dang ni sbrang bu la/_/ma dA ra ni sin+d+hi pa/_/ngan pa la'o mad+d+hu tra/_/bung ba dang ni 'od ldan la/_/ma d+hu ra ni ma sha ste/_/ma d+hu raM N-i dug bye brag_/ma d+hu ra ni bcud phra mo/_/mi dga'
[\[220b.3\]]ba'o ma d+hu rA/_/sbrang gi spal mo me tog brgya/_/grong gi dbye ba dag la'o/_/de bzhin sbrang ldan shing dang ni/_/ni ste yA dang tshem bu la'o/_/man+da ra ni mtshon byed dang /_/mdzod dang srub par byed pa la/_/man+d+ra ra~M` ni le brgan rtsi/_/man+tha ra ni myos byed dang /_/'khor
[\[220b.4\]]lo dang ni yangs pa la/_/man+da ra ni mtho ris dang /_/man+dA ra dang srub byed ri/_/man+da ra ni dal dang 'bras/_/man+da ra~M` ni grong khyer dang /_/khang pa'o man+da ra zhes pa/_/chu srin gnas la'o man+dA ra/_/lha shing yongs bzangs/_/arka'i 'dab/_/maM du rA ni rta'i ra ba/_/nye
[\[220b.5\]]ba'i don can dngos po la/_/ma yu ra ni gtsug phud ldan/_/marma ra ni gos sgra med/_/lo ma sgra mang gos kyi dbye/_/marma rI ni shing ser po/_/ma sU ra ni sran chung dang /_/mtshungs pa dang ni bud med do/_/ma hi ra ni tha snyad rgan/_/ma han+d+ra ni gnas dang ri/_/ma Tha
[\[220b.6\]]ra ni nyi ma yi/_/'od skor dang ni bya'i bye brag_/mAr+sA rA ni byi la dang /_/kha d+dza sha'o mu di ra/_/'od ldan dang ni sprin la'o/_/mung+ga ra ni bong ba sogs/_/'joms dang thabs min me tog dbye/_/mur mu ra ni nyi ma ta/_/ba mo med dang zhi gnas la/_/mu hi ra ni rgyags
[\[220b.7\]]dang rmongs/_/ru d+hi ra ni gur rku khrag_/ru d+hir ra ni sa dga' byed/_/ba Tha ra ni sra ba dang /_/g.yo ba baSh+Ta dag la'o/_/bak+ka ra ni bzhon pa lug/_/ba l+lu ra ni sha skam sha_/mche ba can no ba l+lu raM/_/nags kyi zhing dang 'bab pa la/_/bal+la rI ni snye ma dang /_/sha skam la'o ba l+la
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]ra/_/ne'u gsing dang ni chu mdo gnas/_/tsi lu'i zhing dang sman ljongs la/_/ba shi raM ni rgya mtsho'i tsha/_/b+ha ga NaM d+ha ka dang ni/_/ki Ni hI'o ba rAM raM/_/chu dang g.yas 'khyil dung la'o/_/guny+dza dmar po'i sa bon dang /_/'bu skyes la yang blta bar
[\[221a.2\]]bya/_/bas ru ni bdug pa dang /_/bya yi gnas dang khyim bum pa'o/_/bi kA ra ni mi sdug nad/_/rnam par 'joms dang 'joms byed sgra/_/bi du ra ni paN+Di ta/_/Shilga ko ra bA na'o/_/bi d+hu ri ni so sor 'gro/_/phral ba dang ni ma tshang ba/_/bi du ra ni bcud len la/_/bI ba ra ni
[\[221a.3\]]khung bu ga_/'jug pa ro dang dong la'o/_/pi sa ra ni rab 'byams 'gro/_/bsti ra ni rgya che spros/_/yangs pa'i bi stA ra zhes pa/_/lo 'dab rgya chen khebs pa'o/_/biSh+Ta ra ni ku sha'i khres/_/stan dang sa la skyes pa'o/_/bI hA ra ni 'khor ba dang /_/phung po bde gshegs
[\[221a.4\]]rol pa'i gnas/_/sha kA rI ni sdeb sbyor dbye/_/chu bo'i dbye ba ska rags la/_/sha shA raM ni chu dbus sgang /_/dun+d+ra rI ni 'gram la'o/_/shaM ka raM ni ri sras ma/_/mgon mo dge ba byed pa'o/_/sharka rA ni gseg ma dang /_/ldan pa'i yul dang ras bal can/_/bu ram/_
[\[221a.5\]]dum bu/_rnam 'gyur dang /_/rdo ba mdzes pa'i dbye ba la/_/sarba rI ni thun gsum ma/_/yung ba dang ni bud med la'o/_/sha wa ra ni kla klo'i dbye/_/bde byed dang ni chu la'o/_/sha kA ra ni glang la ste/_/shA kA raM ni sdeb sbyor dbye/_/shAM ka ri ni bgegs kyi bdag_/
[\[221a.6\]]skems byed la'o shA rI ra/_/lus skyes dang ni glang la'o/_/'o ma'i lbu ba sharka ra/_/'joms byed mun nag sharba raM/_/shA rA raM ni 'doms sen mo/_/skas dang 'dab chags gzeb la'o/_/shA ba ra ni rgya skyegs shing /_/sdig pa dang ni sgrub bral la/_/shA ba rI ni gra
[\[221a.7\]]ma yi/_/shim+ba zhes bya'o shA ba raM/_/de yi ngo bo la yang ngo /_/sha kha raM ni ri shing rtsa/_/mchan khung thal mo mtha' rnams la/_/se 'bru smin pa'i sa bon dang /_/nor bu can dang mtha' dag la'ang /_/shi lin+da ni nya'i dbye dang /_/shing gi dbye ba dag la'o/_/shI
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]lIn+d+ri ni ka ra ke/_/dngos po'i me tog grong gsum pa'o/_/shI lIn+d+ri ni bya mo'i dbye/_/rkang rings dang ni sA la'o/_/shi shi ra ni dus las te/_/ba mo can dang 'khyags pa la'o/_/shI ka ra ni khra bo dang /_/rlung dang 'gro med/_chu can la'o/_/shu Shi raM ni khung bu
[\[221b.2\]]can/_/nIg+na dang ni/_bu ga can/_/shrIM gA ra ni rab dga' dang /_/gar gyi nyams dang glang po'i rgyan/_/priM gA raM ni phyi ma dang /_/sin+d+hU ra dang li shi yi/_/me tog la ni 'jug par 'dod/_/shwa shu ra ni khyo shug gnas/_/shwa shu rA ni tshangs ldan sman/_/saM
[\[221b.3\]]ka ra ni me de byes/_/kun nas byi dor byi dor bral/_/mi sun 'brin pa'i bu mo la/_/sa kA ra ni zhes 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/saM ga ra ni mdangs dam bca'/_/bya ba'i rnam pa dug dang phongs/_/saM ga raM ni/_bgrod bya 'bras/_/sa b+hA ra ni bsags dang tshogs/_am+ba
[\[221b.4\]]ra ni ri dgas dang /_/sa 'dzin lha min nya dang ni/_/rgyal ba'i khyad par dag la'o/_/saM bA raM ni chu dang ni/_/sangs rgyas pa yi brtul zhugs nor/_/saM ba rI sman dbye ba la/_/sa mu draM ni lus mtshan nyid/_/sa mu TI ya mdzes sogs la/_/sA baM trI ni lha yi dbye/_/sA bi
[\[221b.5\]]tri/_sA ban+tI'i bdag_/sin+d+hU raM ni shing gi dbye/_/sin+d+hU raM ni bye ma dmar/_/sin+d+hU ri ni d+hA ha kI/_/slag pa dmar po mdzes pa la/_/sun+da ri ni gtso mo'i dbye/_/su nA ra ni khyi'i nu ma/_/sbrul gyi rgyan dang bi ka'o/_/se ri n+t+rI ni gzhan khyim gzhan/_/shi bya kring dang /_rang dbang
[\[221b.6\]]ngo /_/saM ka raM ni kha dog byed/_/rgan po chen po'o/_/sau bI raM/_/kI dzi kaM dang mig sman rgyu/_/rgya shug dag gi yul la'o/_/saM ska ra ni nyams myong dang /_/kun tu rtogs dang so sor 'bad/_/saMsta ra ni gral mchod sbyin/_/tiN+DI ra ni dbu ba dang /_/bA na phiM ga na zhes pa'o/_/
[\[221b.7\]]a klu pA ra chu yi/_/mgon dang rus sbal rgyal po la/_ag+ni hA+o tra me la ni/_/me yi sbyin sreg sbyin pa la/_/a nut+ta ra gtso bo dang /_/so so'i tshig ni rnams sangs la/_/a gro pa ni byang phyogs dang /_/go bzlog pa dang bla na med pa/_a ti sa ra bcings dang 'khrug_/rang stobs
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]dang ni 'jigs bcas la/_/a b+hi hA ra mngon sbyor dang /_/chom rkun dang ni bzod pa la/_/a ru ska ra/_b+hal+lA te/_/rma byed shing dag rjod par byed/_/ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra zla dum dang /_/mgrin par lag pa mda'i bye brag_/zla phyed zla/_kham dur byed dbye/_/a laM kA ra
[\[222a.2\]]rgyan dang ni/_/dpe dang yon tan dag la'o/_/a ba sa raM sngags kyi dbye/_/rab tu stong dang char dag la/_/a ba tA ra 'jug pa dang /_/mu 'gri dang ni 'obs la sogs/_/a b+ha ra gdon chom rkun/_/'khrug pa rgyan po sogs rnams 'khor/_/a ba ska ra bshang lam
[\[222a.3\]]dang /_/gsang ba nges 'bod nyer 'gro la/_/a sha ta ra be'u dang /_/glang po rta yi khyad par la/_/a si pa tra dar gying bu/_/dmyal ba'i khyad par dag la'o/_/a Dam+ba ra glang po che'i/_/dbang po'i sgra dang sil snyan sgra/_/pra bany+tse ra tsa nA dang /_/yang dag brtsams
[\[222a.4\]]pa dag la dran/_/at+ma bi ra srog chen po/_/sh+ya la'i bu dang sun 'byin la/_/in+dI pa ri ut+pal/_/in+dI pa rA/_/ba b+h+yi mo/_/u dum+ba ra skye bo'i 'bras/_/lus 'dzin yangs ba'i grogs po la/_/u dum+ba ri zangs dang ni/_/ru rta'i dbye ba dag la'o/_/u dum+ba ra shin tu
[\[222a.5\]]mtho/_/gcig pa dang ni mi bzad pa'o/_/u pa ga ra me tog sogs/_/'thor dang phan par byed pa la/_/u pa ka ra nye ba dang /_/yongs su bgegs dang phan byed la/_/au dum+ba ra shing zan lnga/_/nad kyi dbye ba la yang ngo /_/ka TaM b+ha ra rab 'bab dang /_/snar ma glang
[\[222a.6\]]po bud med do/_/ka lim+ba ka zlum po dang /_/char skyes dang ni mUr ba la/_/ka ra bI ra rta gsod pa/_/lha min dbye ba rta dag la'o/_/bu bcas lha skyes gtso bo dang /_/ba lang rnams la'ang de bzhin no/_/rgan chen ma dang mchod pa la/_/ka ra bI rI 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/
[\[222a.7\]]kar+Na kA ra gi mA ka'i/_/shing dang u tA la la'o/_/kar+Nu pU ra ut+pa la/_/snyan gyi gong rgyan phal cher dang /_/rgyan mchog rnams la blta bar bya/_/karma ka ra gla mi dang /_/glas 'tsho ba dang las pa'o/_/marbA dang ni gzugs can la/_/karma kA rI 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/ka li kA dang
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]d+hu ma pa Ta/_sen mo dang ni lag skyes so/_/kA dAm+pa rI gzhan gzung ma/_/bur chang dbyangs dang bya ri skegs/_/kA li dza ra rnal 'byor pa'i/_/'khor lo 'du dang 'jigs byed dbyangs/_/kum+b+ha kA ra rdza mkhan rigs/_/kr-iSh+Na sa ri ri dgas dang /_/snum pa dang ni ne sha ba/_/gi
[\[222b.2\]]ga d+ha rA ri yi bu mo/_/mgon po dang ni chu'i mgon po/_/gi ri sA ra lcags skyas dang /_/ma la ya yi ri bo la/_/gr-i hA rI ra la bas 'gebs/_/'degs dang ru rta'i yan lag la/_/ga na sA ra ga bur dang /_/dngul chu g.yas su 'khyil ba la/_/tsa kra d+ha ra khyab 'jug dang /_/lag
[\[222b.3\]]'gro grong gi dra ba la/_/tsa rA tsa ra sa gzhi dang /_/zur gyis shes dang 'gro ba la/_/tsarma kA ra l+h+wa ma mkhan dang /_/pags pa'i las can sman la'o/_/tsi tra T+ri ra mtshan mo'i bdag_/dril bu'i rna ba don nges 'joms/_/'gro byed zur gyi thig le can/_/dza Ta TI ra ral
[\[222b.4\]]pa dang /_/ko ka Na dang ri sras bdag_/rkang 'thung rnams kyi mdun skyes dang /_/snyan tshig rigs byed sa skyes la/_/ta la pa trI raN+Da la/_tA la pa tri rna rgyan la/_/tung+ga b+ha dra chu'i bye brag_/tuM ga b+ha dra myos shing gtsigs/_/tuN+Ta ki TI ras bla dang /_/gzugs can
[\[222b.5\]]la'o/_/de nas ni/_tu lA d+hA ra mtshungs pa'i khyim/_/tshong pa'o to ya d+ha ra ni/_/sprin dang /_/gla sgang gser bzang po'o/_/daN+Da d+ha ra gshin rje dang /_/sa dag daN+Ta d+hA ra ni/_/gshin rje mi bdag dbyug pa yi/_/sol khang sogs dang phreng ba dang /_/them skas dang ni yol khang
[\[222b.6\]]mchog_/da sha pu ra yul dang grong /_/ba lang gi ni sgra dag la'o/_/di gam+pa ra zang byed pa/_/gcer bu/_/mun pa mdung can no/_/du ro da raM tha snyad dang /_/cho lo rgyan po 'gyed pa la/_/de ha yA tra/_gnam lcags 'chi/_/de ma tu ra glang po'i gdong /_/sems can
[\[222b.7\]]rgan po'o de nas ni/_/d+ha ra d+ha ra ri khyab 'jug_/pA ra d+ha ra chu'i bzhon pa/_/ral gri'o d+ha raM ku raM ni/_/ka ra kA dang pI ka ra/_/shI ra 'o d+hArtu raSh+Ta na/_/mchu rkang nag po'i dang ba dang /_/ko ra ba dang sprul pa la yang /_/d+hu raM d+ha ra zhes pa ni/_/d+ha ba'i shing dang d+h+ru rba ha/_/d+hUn+d+hu
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mar brgya byin dang /_/tshig bsrung khyim dang du ba dang /_/rkang pa ldan pa rnams la'o/_/d+hi ta rASh+Ta ma can dang /_/bya yi bye brag rgyal po bzang /_/d+h+ri ta rASh+Ti ngang pa dang /_/gnas rnams dang ni sman la yang /_/na b+haSh+tsa ra sprin dang rlung /_/bya dang /_/rig
[\[223a.2\]]pa 'dzin pa la/_/ni shA tsa ra sbrul dang ni/_/nor dang he ra rdo rje ma/_/ni shA tsa rI 'ug pa la/_ni Shad+d+ha ra za byed sbrul/_/ni Shad+d+ha ri 'dam mtshan mo/_/nI lAm+ba ra gdug pa la/_/spyan log mdzad dang rab 'phyang gsod/_/ro za'o pa yo d+ha ra ni/_/chu 'dzin dang ni be
[\[223a.3\]]ta'i shing /_/ku ba zegs ma/_ru li dang /_/kA sha byed pa rnams la'o/_/pa re ba ra che'o sogs/_/ri dgas dbye ba dag la'o/_/pa ri pa rA rgyud dang ni/_/yongs su rgyud dang gnod pa la/_/pa ri ka ra brtul zhugs dang /_/skyil krung dang ni 'khor rnams dang /_/rtsom dang
[\[223a.4\]]lus ldan 'ching ba dang /_/yongs su 'gebs dang dben pa la/_/pa ri bA ra 'khor dang ni/_/ral gri'i shubs dang yongs 'gebs la/_pa ri pa ra lha dang ni/_/brin pa 'chi ba phyogs re ba/_/pak+Sha tsa ra zla ba dang /_/khyu smin yangs pa/_/rims glang po/_/pA Ta TI ra chu snod
[\[223a.5\]]dang /_/sho gam pa yi bya ba dang /_/lcags kyi sil khrol sha yi zas/_/dza hu'i snod dang dag byed la/_/bA rA bA ra chu klung mgon/_/pha rol tshu rol 'gram dag la/_/pA ri b+ha dra ni m+ba'i shing /_/man+dA ra yi rkang 'thung la/_/bI tAm+ba ra khyab 'jug gar/_/pI ta pA ra ba lang tshim/_/
[\[223a.6\]]nor bu ma la ya skyes la/_/pUr+Na pA trA yongs gang snod/_/'o ma skyes pa la sogs dang /_/smod dang /_/rnga dang /_spel byed la/_/pra tI hA ra cho 'phrul mchod/_/sgo dang sgor gnas bar med la/_/pra ti sa ra/_sde dang rgyab/_/kaM kar+Na dang rma khru dang /_/sngags dbye chen po dang ni
[\[223a.7\]]rgyan/_/lag pa'i srad bu ngas shes bsrung /_/pra tI kA ra/_phyir bcos dpe'i/_/pra b+hA ka ra nyi ma ma/_/ba kra na kra ne tso ngan/_/pa la b+ha drA gzhon nu ma/_/skyob byed dang ni stobs la'o/_/barba Ti ra ka thub pa'i/_/phyur bu'i gnas kyi myu gu dang /_/tshogs can ma yi bu mo la/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bA ra kI ra mchu rnon dang /_/nges par rgyas dang rta la'o/_/bi ra b+ha dra/_/rta yid gzhungs/_/rta dang dpa' bo chen po dang /_/dpa' byed bIng ta ra ni/_/dpal gtso dpa' byed guN+Ta la/_/ma Nits+tshi tra tshil bu dang /_/khyu mchog zhes bya'i sman la yang /_/ma hA pI ra mkha' lding dang /_
[\[223b.2\]]dpa' bo mgrin ldan sgra dang thog_/spre'u nyi ma mkha' yi me/_/dza rA Ta ka rnams la'o/_/ma hA mA tra/_glang po skyed/_/yan lag 'byor dang blon po la/_/ra tha kA ra ma he dang /_/glang mo skyes dang de'i skad cig_/rAg sU traM ras bal skud/_/dar skud dpyid dang cha shas dang /_/
[\[223b.3\]]dung dang ga Ni pa tri ka'o/_/lang+ga kha ru mar me tshig_/da shAM she Sha dag la'o/_/lam+bo da ra 'ching byed dang /_/ha la gnas dang lto ba 'chang /_/lag+mI pu tra 'dod rdzogs rta/_/bA ta pu tra khram chen dang /_/ha nU man dang 'jigs sde la/_/ban+du tan+d+ra snying po yi/_/'bras bu can dang
[\[223b.4\]]yan lag bzhi/_/bi b+hA ka ra 'od chen dang /_/rnam par snang byed dag la'o/_/bi b+hA ka rI mun sel ma/_/yung ba dang ni rnam gsal byed/_/rgol ba'i gos dang /_luN+TI dang /_/kaT+Ta li dang bud med 'khyog/_/bi shwam+b+hA ra 'phrog byed dang /_/brgya byin bi shwam+b+hA ra sa/_/bi shwa
[\[223b.5\]]ka dru ngan pa sgra/_/kun nas rko dang khyi la'o/_/bI ti ho ta nyi ma che/_/bi tra ho tri nyin mor byed/_/bya ti ka ra phongs pa dang /_rnam par thogs pa dag la'o/_/bya ba hA ra tha snyad dang /_/shing gi bye brag gnas la yang /_/sha ta pa tra gyes pa'i brgyal/_/shing ldan bum pa gtsug
[\[223b.6\]]phud can/_/sha ta pa tri rgyal 'dra ba/_/sha tA pa rI legs spyod dbang /_/shi lu mA ra chu'i spre'u/_/bdag sgrol ba dang 'phrog byed la/_/sa mu drA ru zam pa 'ching /_/'dzin bri ti miM gi la'o/_/saM pra hA ra 'gro dang 'chag_/sa ha tsa rI dz+hi N+TA'o/_/sa ha tsa ra lang tso dang /_/so sor
[\[223b.7\]]byed pa dag la'o/_/sA la sA ra/_shing kun shing /_/su ku mA ra 'jam pa la/_/sU tra d+hA ra/_shing mkhan bzo/_/a nan+t+rar pho ba gar/_/snod kyi dbye ba brgya byin la/_/s+thi ra daMSh+T+ra lag 'gro dang /_/phag gi dbyibs 'dra'i seng ge la/_/ut+pa la ba ni zhes pa/_/ut+pa la'i tshogs
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]mnyam pa/_/mtho ris gar ma ser skya 'dzin/_/mu stegs can gyi khyad par la/_/tA mA lA ba tri zhes pa/_/thig le tA pany+tsi 'dab can/_/tA lA shi pa traM zhes pa/_/tA ma la kI tI lA pa/_/pA da cau dwa ra zhes pa/_/pi spa la dang /_ka ra ka_/
[\[224a.2\]]ra dang /_/shaika rta la'o/_/gzhan skyon gcig tu gsal byed dang /_/de la brtson dang mi la 'dod/_/pI ta kA pa raM zhes pa/_/mkhris pa 'dzin dang gur kum la/_/pA shu tsA ma ra zhes pa/_/rdul sel ba dang rab bstod la/_/ra sa ke pa ra zhes pa/_/ba ku la dad be d+ha ka_/klu
[\[224a.3\]]shing me tog rnams la'o/_/rA dza pa dA raM zhes pa/_/la pa l+li'i 'bras skyu ru dmar/_/ro ma ke sa ra zhes pa/_/ba spu langs pa la 'dod do/_/ba swo kasma rA zhes pa/_/dpal sbyin gyi ni pad+ma can/_/lcang lo can gyi grong khyer la/_/pi pra tI sa ra zhes pa/_/'gyod dang /_
[\[224a.4\]]khro dang phra rgyas la/_/sa ma b+hi hA ra zhes pa/_/yang nas yang du nges don can/_/sarba to b+ha dra zhes pa/_/snyan ngag sgra dang phug bye brag_/sarbo to b+ha dra zhes pa/_/dma' dang zas dang bud med gar/_/zhes pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las re
[\[224a.5\]]pha'i mtha' can gyi sde'o//_//la ni dbang po lA zhes pa/_/sbyin pa dang ni 'byor pa la/_/li ni thiM pa la yang ngo /_/lu dang lU ni gcod pa la/_/Am+la ro yi rab dbye dang /_/Am+bI tsAd+ge ri ka sman/_/a li bung ba dang ni tshang /_/A li bsod snyoms len pa la/_/Am+bI btung
[\[224a.6\]]ba bsam pa yang /_/a lu ga ya ni ka'o/_/b+he la ka kaM nga la'o/_/i lA ba lang sa bdud rtsi/_/dbyangs can zla ba bud med la/_/Do la 'dod dang 'gro ba la/_/ka la snyan dang gsal ba'i sgra/_/ma rnyings cha dang dkar ba la/_/ki lA bcu drug cha phyi mo/_/rU la don dang rgan
[\[224a.7\]]po dang /_/bzo bo dang po'i cha dang ni/_/dus kyi khyad par can la'o/_/ka li nang gi mchod sbyin dang /_/'khrug pa rtsa ldan dge sbyin la/_/kA la dus dang 'chi ba dang /_/nag po che dang gshin rje dang /_/za byed dang ni nag po la'o/_/kA lI nag mo ma mo'i dbye/_/dkar
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]mo sprin sar/_legs 'gyur dang /_/kA Ta dang ni pa bA da'o/_/kA la dur byid nag po dang /_/rams dang le brgan dag la'o/_/ki lA ka pha/_nges 'joms dang /_/'bar dang yang dag skum pa dang /_/ku li/_rang skyes mchod sbyin dang /_/dus kyi yan lag
[\[224b.2\]]khyim dang tshang /_/kU laM mthun pa sde dang ni/_/rgyab bcas sri pa lteng ka la/_/ko la mtshon byed skyong ba dang /_/phangs pa ko Da b+he la byed/_/gyol po'o ka laM ut+pa la/_/ko la drod sman dbyibs mo dag_/ka la g.yon can tha shal dman/_/kha laM pa dang gnas
[\[224b.3\]]la yang /_/rnyog pa dang ni lo thog la 'ang /_/kha lu pags pa gzhol ba dang /_/gos dbye khye'u tsA ta ka_/khal+lI lag pa rkang pa dag_/nyer ba dang ni nad la'o/_/khi laM ma thogs snying po dang /_/kun tu bcug dang 'bigs pa la/_/ga la mgrin pa/_spos dkar
[\[224b.4\]]bcu/_/sA la'i pung po sa skyes la/_/go lA po dA ba rI yi/_/grogs dang go la'i 'dab mig sman/_/go laM riM pa'i tshogs dang ni/_/nor bu can dang dkyil 'khor la/_/tsa lA g.yo 'gul pad+ma/_glog_/khebs la'o/_/kIl+la ma nyams dang /_/rgyal ba dang ni gos la'o/_/
[\[224b.5\]]tsal+lI rigs dang gzhi can la/_/kIl+lA gos dang g.yo ba la/_/tsa lu/_rul tsul+lI ni/_/bsag pa bsam gtan rol mo la/_/tsA+ol+la/_gos dman/_smad pa la/_/tshal+lI me tog dbye ba dang /_/ba ku la/_rgyud rnams sgrogs so/_/tshal+la 'degs dang /_zol dang g.yo/_/dza laM
[\[224b.6\]]chu mer/_chu/_'khyil/_'khyogs/_/dzA laM/_ko ra kA/_dra mig_/dam+b+ha/_prind dag la'o/_/dzA li khebs kyi dra ba dang /_/nye ba'i dra ba shing dag la/_/dz+hA lA/_tshad gdung rlabs lu mo/_/'jigs pa'o dz+hal+lI tshad pa'i nad/_/dz+hi ru ka dang /_'jug dang /_nyal/_/ta la rol mo ta la ni/_/
[\[224b.7\]]ral gri'i chang zung 'joms byed glang /_/nags dang byi'u dbyangs chu 'dzi/_/tal+lI bye ma ta lu khung /_/to lA shing gi khyad par dang /_/mthe bong /_gung mo dag la 'dod/_/tA la dbyangs kyi bya dus chang /_/ral gri sogs kyi chang zung dang /_/khar ba las bkod rol mo yi/_/snod kyi
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]khyad par dag dang ni/_/lag pa'i 'bras bu lag mthil dang /_/tA saM dang ni bab la'i tshogs/_/tu lA khyim dang srang brgyad dang /_/'jal byed tshad kyi dbye ba dang /_/'ching ba 'dzin byed mi bzad pa/_/khre'u dang ni snod la'o/_/tU la 'jam po/_rtsa
[\[225a.2\]]dang ni/_/nam mkha' tshangs pa'i shing la'o/_/da laM rdzas dang /_grib ma dang /_/mtshon cha 'dab ma dum bu min/_/da li 'dab ldan dbye ba'o/_/du li ka ma bI la'o/_/do lA theg pa'i khyad par dang /_/rams la'o/_/d+hU li rdul dang ni/_/tshad kyi khyad par dag la'o/_/
[\[225a.3\]]na la/_po Ta ga la dang /_/rgyal po can dang /_sI sa dang /_/pi dU di pa ta la'o/_/na lI ldong ros grib ma la/_/na laM mtsho skyes pad sdong la/_/ne lA nA lA nI lI rnams/_/yal ga ka TaM ba ka_/la/_/nA lA btung bar byed sogs don/_/gur la'o nI la mdog nag dang /_/spre'u'i
[\[225a.4\]]dbang phyug ri yi bye brag_/nag po'o/_/nA lI shing mtshan dbye/_/pa laM mI pa/_bdag nyid la/_/ba lU sbom po ku su ma/_/khang chung 'khor lo'i grong la'o/_/sA la/_gral dang /_phyogs re dang /_/g.yang sa'o/_/ka luM 'khri shing rtse/_/cha shas shig dang sma ra la'o/_/sa lU
[\[225a.5\]]skyur dang mtshan ma la/_/kI lu 'khrus la'o/_/pI lu ni/_/shing dang /_glang po me tog dang /_/mda' dang tA la rus dum la/_/bu la don tsam thal mo yangs/_/pha laM lo thog rgyus bskrun dang /_/'bras bu rnam skyed rnyed pa dang /_/dzA ti pha la bak+kal/_/tshol bar byed pa'i
[\[225a.6\]]phud la yang /_/'bras gsum/_'bras ldan/_/'bras bu can/_/bA laM snying po'i 'jig rten dang /_/ras bal sogs dang gos dang ni/_/stobs ldan gshol ldan lha min dang /_/lus dang bya rog_/gtor ldan la/_/ba laM/_dri ro dmag dang ni/_/mthu dang /_rags pa
[\[225a.7\]]gzugs dga' la/_/pa lA ba T+ya la kar brjod/_/ba li lta min khyad par dang /_/rdal pa so dang /_'od zer dang /_/rnag dang /_phan pa rgya mtsho skyes/_/rga ba/_bshang lam pags pa dang /_/lta ba bcom pa khyad par dang /_/khyim/_dang shing gi khyad par la/_/
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pal+li/_dzo mo pA dang ni/_/ta tA me tog khyad par la/_/bA la byis pa skra dang /_rta/_/glang po che dang mgo bo la/_/bA li/_rmongs dang /_byis pa khrel/_/pi lam phug dang bu ga dang /_/khung dang /_tshang dang /_khyim la'o/_/pai lA/_dus dang /_mtshams dang ni/_/dbang phyug
[\[225b.2\]]rnams kyi ston mo dang /_/so yi rnyil dang 'o ma'i dkris/_/chu gter dang ni de yi chu/_/nyon mongs yod par shi ba dang /_/chags dang tshig dang /_blo rnams so/_/b+hal+la mda' dang dom la'o/_/b+hal+lI b+hal+lA ta dang mda'/_/b+hA laM dpral ba nyin mo'o/_/b+ha laM 'jigs
[\[225b.3\]]dag snying dang ni/_/smyung ba'i bye brag rgyal byed la'o/_/b+he la dri ma bshang 'bu sdig_/mal+la kun tu ser sna dang /_/snod dang thod pa can la'o/_/mA lu nya'i dbye ba la Ti/_/bu dang /_'khri shing dag la'o/_/ma lam zhing dang chu la'o/_/mA la me tog chun po phrad/_/mU
[\[225b.4\]]laM dang po rtsa ba dang /_/rgyu skar/_glang po chul/_sogs dag la/_/mau lI 'dus dang /_'dres pa dang /_/chos ldan dang ni gtsug phud dang /_/mya ngan med pa'i shing cod pan/_/rol dang rtse dang /_sgeg pa la/_/sgeg par gyur pa'i gtso bo dang /_/'khor lo ma lus pa
[\[225b.5\]]la yang /_/lo lA lce rtse g.yo ba la/_/lo la yang dag sred dang g.yo/_/byA la/_ma rungs/_lag 'gro dang /_/gcan gzan gdug pa'i so can la/_/sha la/_shal+la ka'i lo ma/_/bung ba'i tshogs kyi bya ba las/_/shA la nya yi khyad par dang /_/shing dang spyi dang 'bras
[\[225b.6\]]dang za/_/shA lA khyim dang khang pa dang /_/phyogs gcig skems byed yal ga la/_/shA lu ga ti rdzas/_chom rkun sman/_/shA li dri dang phyi la dang /_/'bras bu la sogs rnams la'o/_/shi lA/_chu klung chung ngu dang /_/rdo ba/_mi bzad 'khor lo 'dzin/_/shi laM mtho ba/_rdo ba la/_/
[\[225b.7\]]shi li'i srog chags mangs la/_/shI laM b+hi dpyod pa mchog_/khu ba/_dkar po rnal 'byor la/_/shuklaM gzugs can dkar po dang /_/yon tan ldan pa nyid la'o/_/shu laM shi dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_/rnal 'byor dang ni nang la'o/_/shU lA tshong zong yo Sha dang /_/lta ba 'jigs dang /_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]phur bu la/_/she la ri bo shai laM ni/_/ri skyes bya khyung ri bong can/_/shA la sa shing spos dkar shing /_/s+thA la snod kyi dbye ba la/_/s+thA lI/_skya nar nam mkha' dang /_/s+thA la/_/sbom rtsegs shes rab dman/_/hA lA chang dag mi yi bdag_/
[\[226a.2\]]ha la ku re brnyas dang /_sgeg/_/aM gu la ni glang po che/_/rna rgyan lag pa'i yal ga'o/_/a tsa la ni ri phur bu/_/g.yo med a tsa lA ni sa/_/any+dza li ni ku ta pa/_/lag pa kha sbyar thal mo la/_/a na la ni nor lha me/_/a ni la ni nor dang rlung /_/a be la ni go la'i
[\[226a.3\]]phye/_/a ma lA ni pad+ma la/_/a ma laM ni rnam 'jig dang /_/sprin la'o a rA la zhes pa/_/thang chu/_glang chen myos dang /_'khyog_/a ku laM nA/_/a ka ka'i/_/gos dang /_dbyug pa'i rna can la/_/a b+hI lam ni 'jigs rung gnas/_/sU lU lAM rigs kyi ma/_/mgo
[\[226a.4\]]dang spyi bos sgrol ba la/_/i twa la ni nya dang ni/_/lha min rab dbye sgeg dang 'bar/_/udz+dza la ni 'bar gsal la rgyas/_/ut+tA ni spre'u dang /_/gtso bo rnam 'gyur steng du 'gro/_/ut+pa' la laM ni ut+pal dang /_/ru rta dang ni sha med la/_/ut+phul+la ni bud med kyi/_/byed pa kha bye steng
[\[226a.5\]]'gro la/_/un+nA la ni 'phags pa dang /_/gtso bo steng du 'gro ba la/_/u pa lA ni gseg ma dang /_/rdo ba/_shag ma/_rin chen la/_/ka ta lI ni ba dan dang /_/b+ha pa tA kA ri dgas dbye/_/rtsom byed chu shing /_'dri byed dang /_/DaM spyaM dang ni shAl+la lI'o/_/kan+da lo ni nyer chags dang /_/
[\[226a.6\]]myu gu sar dang thod pa la'o/_/ka dA lI ni sgra snyan dang /_/ljon shing dang ni ri dgas dbye/_/ka pi la ni thub pa'i dbye/_/me dang /_khyi dang /_ser skya'o/_/ka pi lA ni me'i phyogs kyi/_/glang po/_glang mo/_phyugs bye brag_/kA pA la ni mgo bo'i rus/_/shiM sha pa dang rdul can dang /_
[\[226a.7\]]bum pa sogs dang bu raM dang /_ru rta nad dbye 'gro ba la'o/_/ka ma la ni chu skyes dang /_/chu dang /_klo min/_zangs dang sman/_/ka ma la ni ri dgas dbye/_/ka ma lA ni dpal mo la/_/ka ma la ni klu yi rgyal/_/sna can/_rul dang /_'bu la'o/_/kam+ba la ni gregs mchog chu/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ka pa lA dang dan+ta ra/_/mtho dang 'jigs su rung ba la/_/ka rA paM ni/_/dgra sta can/_/gtsigs pa 'bad pa til mar la/_kal+lo la ni ul+lo la/_/rab tu dga' dang lam la'o/_/kA ko la ni/_lung pa yi/_/bya rog rdza'i dbye/_/rdza mkhan la/_/kA kI la ni cha shas 'tsho/_/
[\[226b.2\]]'dod pa'i rtsen dang /_pra NA la/_/brtan bral yid 'phrog shing grib don/_/kA mA lA ni 'dod ldan dang /_/'dod chags dbye ba mya ngam can/_/kAr+ha li ni gzhon nu ma/_/ko ha lAM ni nges dang skraM/_/kA ha lA ni sil snyan gyi/_/snod kyi khyad par dag la'o/_/kA ha la ni ngan pa la'o/_/kiT+Ta
[\[226b.3\]]la ni zangs bum dang /_/lcags kyi tshogs la yang brjod do/_/kI lA laM ni khrag dang chu/_/ku d+hU laM ni phur bu 'dris/_/g.yang sa dang ni phur ma'i me/_/ku tsi lA ni rnam ma phug_/gos ngan dri ma ldan gos la/_/ku TI le min gser ldan 'khyog/_/ku Ti lA ni 'bab chu'i dbye/_/kuN+Da
[\[226b.4\]]laM ni rna rgyan dang /_/de bzhin gdu bu sra yab dag_/gser shing dang ni gu/_/DU tsI/_/rigs la yang ni nges par 'jug/_/kud+dA la ni tog tse dang /_/sa 'joms dang ni sa 'byed la/_/kun+ta la'i ni yul ljongs dang /_/yul gyi sgra dang lan bu lhas/_/kun+da la ni shog shing dang /_/nas
[\[226b.5\]]dang b+hA la la yang ngo /_/kum+b+hi la ni tshigs bcad dang /_/grib ma 'phrog byed chom rkun dang /_/gral dang nya dag la yang ngo /_/ku lA la ni rdza mkhan dang /_/kuk+ku b+ha dang ko shi ka'o/_/ku ba laM ni ut+pa la/_/mu tig 'bras bu rgya shug 'bras/_/ku sha la ni yongs 'thob dag_/
[\[226b.6\]]bsod nams dang ni bslab pa la/_ke ba la ni gcig byas dang /_/'ba' zhig pa dang ku ha na/_/ke ba laM ni gtan phan dang /_/ye shes dbye ba dag la'o/_/ke pi la ni shing dang skye/_/ko ra ri ka ke ma'o/_/ko ma la ni 'jam dang chu/_/ko ha la ni thub pa chang /_/gan+d+ho lI ni ba ra TA/_/
[\[226b.7\]]bzang po'i gnas so ga ra laM/_/dug dang nga rgyal rtswa dang ni/_/pu la ka'o go ki la/_/kha 'dzin snying po ba lang skyong /_/nye ba'i sa skyong dag la'o/_/gau ri la ni lcags phye dang /_/gai ra la dang yungs kar dkar/_/gran+thi la ni smyug ma dang /_/bi kang+ka ta/_sa d+ya n+thi/_/tsany+tsa la ni/_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]glog dpal mo/_/tsany+tsa la g.yo 'dod ldan la/_/tsa twA la rlung /_snying po la/_/rmongs dang sbyin sreg thab la'o/_/tsan+di la ni/_zla ba min/_/tsa pa la ni skad cig dang /_/myur ba dang ni g.yo ba la/_/dngul chu nya dang chom rkun dang /_/rdo yi bye brag
[\[227a.2\]]la yang ngo /_/tsha ba lA ni pad+ma dang /_/glog dang /_bisba li rnams la/_/tsU DU la ni 'khor lo 'dzin/_/gtsug phud 'dzin dang /_gtsug phud ldan/_/tsag la ni da yo ShA/_/rgan po dang ni byis pa la/_/ts+tsha ga la ni ta ma ta/_/ra dang sngon po'i gos la'o/_/dzag la ni da da
[\[227a.3\]]ka/_chang dang /_dang byed myos byed shing /_/dza ga la ni chu med pa'i/_/yul dang /_dgon dung sa la'o/_/dza Ti la ni ral pa ldan/_/ral pa 'dzin dang spang spos sman/_/dzam+b+ha la ni dzam+b+hir/_/lha yi khyad par la yang ngo /_/dzam+bu lA ni shing dzam+bU'i/_/yal
[\[227a.4\]]'dab dang ni 'dab mas khebs/_/dzam+b+ha la ni chub la dang /_/'dam la'o/_/de nas dzA ga la/_/ka piny+dza la'o dzi gu rI/_/dzang+ga la las skyes pa dang /_/rtse mo dang ni sham+b+hi dang /_/dug gi sman pa'o dzaM ga laM/_/dra ba can dang 'bras bu'o/_/taN+Du la ni 'bras so ba/_/la
[\[227a.5\]]sogs tshogs dang ping+ga ka_/tu mu la ni byed pa dang /_/rtsod pa'i shing ngo tai ti la/_/gaN+Da ka dang byed pa'i dbye/_/du kU laM ni phyed pa dang /_/zar ma'i ras dang gos phra mo/_/d+ha ba la ni mdzes dang dkar/_/ma hA bri Sha dag la'o/_/d+ha ba lI ni bzang skyes/_/na ku la ni
[\[227a.6\]]skya bseng bu'i/_/bye brag dang ni bse mo'o/_/na ku lI ni bya gag dang /_/spang spos dang ni sman la'o/_/nu ku li ni bya gag mi/_/rtsa ba/_rtsa bya ra swa lo/_/nA b+hI laM ni lte ba yi/_/snying po'i gnas dang tsak+Shi na/_/tsa maM la'o ni tsu la/_/gos med dang ni chu shing la/_/nirma lam ni dri med
[\[227a.7\]]dang /_/sprin dkar dang ni dri ma bral/_/niSh+ka la ni chas stong dang /_/sa bon nyams dang cha med do/_/ni sta laM ni ni zlum po la/_/de bA lI ni phreng ba gsar/_/sa yi ga ram legs byed ma/_/pany+tsA lI ni glu/_/bum/_/pany+tsA lA ni yul skye bo/_/pa Ti laM ni los min nad/_/nag
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]nog dang ni yongs khebs la/_/pa Ti la ni don med dang /_/karka sha yi gos la'o/_/pa To la ni gos dbye dang /_/'od ldan ma dang bgo ba la/_/ba la lam ni til gyi dbye/_/sha dang 'dam dang srin po la/_/pA ga lo ni ru rta sman/_/sA ma laM ni/_chu ngan rig_/brtsegs
[\[227b.2\]]pa sngon ma yang de nyid/_/pA ga li ni sa rtsi sar/_/pA lA ni gnod byed rdzas/_/srid byed la'o de nas ni/_/bA Ta lA dang bA Ta lI/_/shing dang me tog dag la'o/_/bA Ta laM ni skya nar la/_/pA Ta la ni 'bru mar dang /_/bkra zhing dmar ba la 'gyur ro/_/bA ti lI ni shi ba dang /_/
[\[227b.3\]]snod dbye g.yon dang nya dol la/_/sngon dus sa 'og pA ta laM/_/pA dang 'ching byed bA shu la/_/pI shu laM ni khri rkang mdung /_/bi ga la ni thub pa'i dbye/_/me dang 'od gtum 'od kor dang /_/gter gyi dbye ba spre'u la'o ska/_/sing+ga la ni 'od zer dang /_/gnod pa 'jug gi bya
[\[227b.4\]]mi'u thung /_/pi tsu la ni dz+ha bu ka_/ni tsu la dang tshul bya rog_/pi ts+tsha lI ni shAt+ma li/_/rgya mtsho'i dbye ba shing sha pa'o/_/rkang steng /_chu med/_pits+tsha la/_/kuny+dza laM ni sha yi bu/_/piny+dza laM ni gnod pa la/_/pit+tA laM ni gzi brjid skyes/_/rdzas dang 'khris pa ldan pa la/_/pit+ta lI
[\[227b.5\]]chu pip+pa lI/_/pap+pi laM ni/_byang chub shing /_/bya'i dbye ni ri shu b+ha'o/_/pip+pa laM ni chu la'o/_/pib+pi li ni gnas dang gcod/_/dbye ba dang ni zeg ma la/_/pud ga la ni gang zag bdag_/lus dang rnam pa mdzes pa la/_/bi sha la ni mdzes dang mkhas/_/bzang ba dang ni tshul khrims
[\[227b.6\]]la/_/bra kha la ni rta go cha/_/myos pa/_/ngan dang tha chad la/_/tA bA la ni 'jig rten 'og_/bstod pa/_sor mo lag pa la/_/bra pA la ni byu ru dang /_/bi ldang dbyug gu/_lcug ma gsar//phe ni la ni lung tai shing /_/phe ni laM ni rgya shug 'bras/_/myos byed shing 'bras phe ni lA/_/b+han+d+ha
[\[227b.7\]]la ni skyur ba dang /_/mgo ldum dang ni ba lwa ra/_/glang po grol ba rnams la'o/_/ba hu laM ni nam mkha' la/_/bA hu lA ni e lA dang /_/nI lAM kA dang sa la'o/_/byed pa can dang nag phyogs dang /_/me la ya ni b+ha hu ma/_/prA h+ya mdog nag ba hu la/_/bad+hI la ni nyon mongs na/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ma sI bsam gtan brgA la/_/maM ga lA ni durbA dkar/_/me ga la ni sa yi bu/_/mang+ga laM ni legs bkra shis/_/de bzhin nor gsar bsrung ba la/_/many+dza la ni dza la rad+ku /_/many+dzu la ni 'jam pa la/_/many+dzi la~M` ni chu bal la/_/maN+Da li ni glang po'i
[\[228a.2\]]gzugs/_/ni ku rusba rgyal khams dang /_/rgyal po gza' mig dmar/_bcu gnyis can dang ni/_/ru rta sbrul dang /_dbye ba dang /_/yongs su khyams dang 'khor yug la/_/maN+Da la ni dkyil 'khor zhes/_/snying po gzhal bya la yang ngo /_/ma hi lA ni sa chen mas/_/
[\[228a.3\]]mchod ldan 'jigs byed/_shun+d+ra'o/_/mA tsa la ni thigs pa dang /_/chom rkun A ma ya dang ni/_/'dzin pa dang ni yA da sa'o/_/mA tu la ni ngan pa dang /_/zhang po 'bru dang myos byed shing /_/mu kha lI ni tA la dang /_/rin chen byi ba'i rna ba la'o/_/mu shA lI ni khyem la'o/_/
[\[228a.4\]]da byid la'o mu kha le/_/gtun shing lcags kyi rtse mo can/_/me Sha la ni gser gyi ri/_/ri stod dang ni ral gri 'ching /_/me/_kha lA ni rked pa'i phyogs/_/ro ldan dang ni ska rags la/_/ra sa lA ni bur shing dang /_/gtsug phud thang shing sA la'i bcud/_/ra sha lA ni byi dor dang /_/
[\[228a.5\]]lce dang /_durbA sogs dang shing /_/rA mi la ni dga' byed dang /_/'dod pa/_rnga ma ba lang mjug_/lAd+ku lI chu'i yi sba lI/_/shog shing me tog khyad par la/_/lA ng+ga laM ni khyem shing gi/_/bye brag shA ra/_rta la'o/_/lo ha la ni lcags sgrog dang /_/da rigs mi gsal smra ba la/_/
[\[228a.6\]]many+dzu la ni shing ke la/_/lcang ma dang ni tai ti sa/_/baN+Da la ni dpa' bo dang /_/g.yul 'khrug dang ni 'jig rten dang /_/a pa ni tra ka zhes pa'o/_/bA tu la ni/_rlung can dang /_/rlung tshogs dang ni rlung bcas la'o/_/bA ta laM ni rgyal po dang /_/kuSh+ThaN+Da yi sa bon dang /_/ko lA s+tha yi
[\[228a.7\]]sa bon la/_/bA mi la ni ngan g.yo dang /_/g.yo la'o/_bi DA la byi la/_/mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyad par la'o/_/be+e bu la ni yangs pa la/_/gting zab ri bo nub ri la/_/si ma lA ni dri med bsel/_/sa yi dbye ba dag la yang /_/bi shu la ni shing dbye dang /_/yangs pa dang ni rgya che la/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bi shA la ni dbang mchog skyes/_/'phags rgyal la yang blta bar bya/_/bri Sha la ni dmangs rigs dang /_/rta dang /_zla ba sras pa la/_/sha ka la ni shing shun dang /_/dum bu chags pa'i dngos po la/_/li rigs ser sna/_sha mA laM/_/sa ya lu ni gnyid mi sad/_/sbrul dang khyi la brjod bya
[\[228b.2\]]ldan/_/sha ya lu ni tshul khrims gnyid/_/shArdU la ni srin po'i dbyes/_/seng ge rkang pa brgyad pa dang //stag dang gtso bo mchog la'ang /_/gnas/_shA l+ma lI ni shing dbye dang /_/gnyis 'thung gi ni khyad par la'ang /_/shI ta li ni ri skyes dang /_/me tog chung dang ri las
[\[228b.3\]]byung /_/bsil ba dang ni lo ma'i sran/_/nI b+ha ra zhes rnams la'o/_/chu bal/_ri skyes/_shI ba la/_/ce spyang 'jigs ma/_shri gA li/_/wa dang lha min shri gA la/_/shaM ka la ni lcags sgog dang /_/sked pa'i gos kyi 'ching ba la/_/shai ba lam ni chu bal dang /_/pad+ma'i
[\[228b.4\]]shing dang mchod pa la/_/shoSh+ka la ni sha'i zong dang /_/bsil ba'i zas la'o/_sh+yA ma la/_/dkar min dang ni a shwat+tha/_/sngo sangs dang ni nag lhang ngo /_/shad+d+hA ru ni dang ldan dang /_/mi zad pA la gzhol ba la/_/shrI pha la ni dpal 'bras dang /_/sngon po/_skyu ru/_mA lU
[\[228b.5\]]ra/_/ShaN+DA li ni mtsho skyes dang /_/'dod ldan til mar nga rgyal la/_/saM ku lo ni brjod bya bzhin/_/khyab dang 'di don brjod byed la/_/san+d+h+ri la ni su ruM gA/_/dga' dang myos pa dag la'o/_/ni pA lI ni skya nar dang /_/pags las sa b+ha lA guny+dza/_/sa ra la ni shing rul dang /_/
[\[228b.6\]]rgya che ba dang 'khyog pa la/_/se d+h+ya lA ni nya phye ma/_/ki lA si naM rnams la'o/_/su ta la/_uT+wA/_se kA/_/'ching ba sa 'og gnas bye brag_/su re la ni/_ri'i dbye ba/_/zhi dang rab tu 'dud pa la/_/te ma la ni gser mkhan dang /_/rtsangs ba dang ni rdo'i bye brag_/ang+ka pA li yongs
[\[228b.7\]]su rtsom/_/mtha' dang 'jigs byed dag la'o/_/a ti pa lA stobs kyi dbye/_/rab stobs dang ni/_shin tu stobs/_/ak+Sha mA laM rnam skyed bya/_/da run+d+ha ni bgrang phreng la/_/u lU/_kha la/_gu gul dang /_/u dU kha la dag la'o/_/e kASh+Thi la sdig pa'i gos/_/tsu ka la
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ni rim pas so/_/ka tsa mA la/_mya ngam byed/_/klu'i dbye/_ral pa'i khyad par la/_/kaM dI la ni bong bu dang /_/sgo nga can dang /_blaM k+Sha'i shing /_/ka maN+Da lu spyi blugs dang /_/brka TI'i rkang 'thung la'o/_/karma pha laM las kyi bsgyur/_/las
[\[229a.2\]]kyi rnam par smin pa la/_/ka la ka lu ko lA ha la/_/de bzhin sardza na sa la'o/_/ku rU ha laM mtshan mkhan mtshon/_/kha ta mA la/_du ba sprin/_/gaN+Da shi ma ra smin pa/_/s+thu lo pa la/_thod pa la/_/gan pha lI 'bras can dang /_/tsam+wa ka'i ko ra ka'o/_/rak+ta pA la
[\[229a.3\]]ri'i dbye ba/_/tsa kra ba laM 'khor yug ba'o/_/dza lAM tsa laM chu bal dang /_/chu la nges par 'gro ba la/_/da mA ma laM ma ru ka_/'dul bar byed pa la yang ngo /_/d+h+wa ni nA lA pi wang dang /_/gling bu ko ha la dag go/_/pa ri ma la rnam nyid dri/_/'phrog byed bkra ba dag la'o/_/
[\[229a.4\]]sa mu n+mIl dag 'joms dang /_/yan lag chags sogs dri zhim la/_/sI tha ke li khri'u nyid/_/byed pa can dang mig zur la/_/dka' bas bgod ke dang chu 'bab dang /_/rkang pas mngon par rgyug pa'ang /_/Sho Da ga la gsal ba dang /_/sbubs dang nya yi khyad par
[\[229a.5\]]la/_/ba hu pha lA dri ma dang /_/bdag byed dang ni 'o ma la/_/br-i han+na la skra chas dang /_/ma hA po Ta ka la'ang /_/b+ha Ta kA li'i/_ri sras la/_/gan+d+ho lI dang sman dbye la/_/b+hasma tU laM kha ba'i rdul/_/char dang grong gi kunA la/_/ma Ni lA lA btsun mo dang /_/rgyu skar bcu pa/_'phrog
[\[229a.6\]]byed la/_/ma da ka la glang po myos/_/dregs dang mi gsal brjod pa la/_/ma hA kA la lha chen po/_/kim+sa ka dang rab 'joms byed/_/ma hA dI la/_klu'i bye brag_/ba mA kA ra nor bu'i dbye/_/ma hA ba la sI sha ka_/dar ma'i stobs la brjod par bya/_/ma hA ba lA ba lang rji/_/
[\[229a.7\]]'bras la'o/_/mak+tA pha laM mi ni/_/mu tig ga pur/_ba li'i 'bras_/mr-i t+yu pha li'i Arka'i 'dab/_/dus chen po yi shing la'o/_/ba hu pha la/_be+e NI dang /_/dug mo nyungs dang spang spos dang /_/ra dza swa la bud med la/_/ra dza swa lA rdul ldan ma/_/ba ta ki li/_ka lA lA sa/_/gyol
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]po rnams kyi dbyug dum la/_/pa ta pha laM brgya byin gzhu/_/dro ba'i chags pa la yang ngo /_ma tsi ki la/_mal+li dbye/_/'dul bar byed pa la yang ngo /_/sa dA pa la be+e ta'i shing /_/u du mA ra 'bras bu'i phung /_/ha ri tA lI na kha'i ri mo/_/ral gri du rdA rnams la'o/_/ha
[\[229b.2\]]khA ha la'i tshangs pa'i sbrul/_/thu bo dang ni dug gi dbye /_/ha ste ma la sa bsrungs bu/_/ki ni ya ka zhes pa la'o/_/a su tI ba la yi sgra/_/mchod sbyin dang ni chang 'tshong la/_/du rdaN+Da pA la zhes nga //_/nya dang sbrul gyi rab dbye dang /_/rgyal po'i rgyal po la yang ngo /_/e
[\[229b.3\]]ka kuN+Da la zhes pa/_/kA li n+dI 'joms byed pa la/_/klu TA pa ka la zhes pa/_/glang po'i mkhris pa'i rims dang ni/_/smin dang dag par byed pa la/_/kr-i bI Ta pA la zhes pa/_/chu phrad pa dang rgya mtsho la/_/pany+tsa kasba la zhes pa/_/la ba dkar dang rdo'i khyad par/_/man+d+ra
[\[229b.4\]]tsU rna la zhes pa/_/dbang byed rig sngags la 'dod de/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi don med sngags/_/shes dang ku sha'i chu skad cig_/su ra ta tA li zhes pa/_/pho nya ma yi mgo phreng dang /_/bag ma'i nyin mo dang 'brel ba'i/_/mgo bo'i mre tog phreng la 'dod/_/zhes pa sna
[\[229b.5\]]tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan du mu tig phreng ba las la yig mtha'i sde rdzogs so//_//wa ni bum pa/_chu lha dang /_/nyin mo dang ni rang dbang la/_/bA ni rlung dang /_mda' dang mdung /_/bi ni bya dang nam mkha' la/_/swa ni/_shes dang /_bdag legs
[\[229b.6\]]gcod/_/bdag gi ba yi nor la'o/_/a bi lug dang nyi ma ri/_/byi ba dang ni bal la'o/_/a bI me tog ldan ma dang /_/rta dang lcags dang skyes bu'i dbye/_/U r+d+h+waM steng dang an+d+h+ya dang /_/ka N+waM sdig dang /_thub pa la/_/ka Na ngan pa ldan pa la/_/ka bi snyan dang gas
[\[229b.7\]]mkhan po dang /_/pa ba sangs dang grog mkhar dang /_/khyi dang snyan dngags byed pa la/_/ki N+waM sdig pa rgyal po skyes/_/skye bo dang ni rnam gnon la/_/kharba thung ngu dang ni dri/_/gri ba mgrin pa/_mgul pa la/_/ts+tsha bi bzang dang mdzes pa la/_/dza bA Do d+d+hA'i me tog
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]shugs/_/dza ba shugs can la yang ngo /_/dzI ba tshig bdag shing gi dbye/_/srog chags tsam la'ang lta bar bya/_/dzI bA 'tsho bar byed pa la/_/mau rbI sa dang spyod pa dang /_/piny+dzi ta dang 'dod pa la/_/dzI biM 'tsho ba la yang ngo /_/ta twaM rang bzhin
[\[230a.2\]]rtag pa'i dbye/_/mchog bdag la'o nga ba ni/_nags dang nags tshal/_/nags klung la/_/di paM mtho ris bar snang dang /_/'od 'gro/_gnam dang /_mkha' la'o/_/de ba/_rgyal po lha dang sprin/_/de baM dbang po la 'dod do/_/de bI rje btsun ma dang ni/_/gzi
[\[230a.3\]]brjid can ma br-ik+ka dang /_gar mar tshangs pas dbang bskur dang /_/mi yi bdag po'i bud med la/_/dra ba/_bcud dang pra dA ba/_/rnam par zhu bar gyur pa la/_/dwa n+dAM log par spyod pa la/_/dwan+d+ra zung dang 'thab dang gsad/_/d+ha ba bdag po shing dbye dang /_/khram
[\[230a.4\]]pa dang ni mi la'o/_/b+hU pa cha shas 'jug pa dang /_/thub pa rnal 'byor/_ba Ta/_nor/_/b+hu paM nges pa rtog pa dang /_/rtag pa dang ni g.yo med la/_/b+h+ru bA/_mUr+pA ra/_ba dang /_/'dab ma g.yengs dang phreng ba'i dbye/_/na ba bya rog bstod pa dang /_/gsar du bstod
[\[230a.5\]]par bya ba la/_/nI bI/_sked pa'i gos mdud pa/_/rtsa ba dang ni tha ma la/_/paM kwa yongs su 'dud pa dang /_/rnam par 'jig dang mngon phyogs la/_/mar+sh+wa mchan khung gzhi dang ni/_/'khor lo/_mtha' nye phyugs tshogs la/_/pr-i th+wI sa gzhi sa dang ni/_/
[\[230a.6\]]shing kun bu mo zi ra nag_/prA d+h+waM 'ching dang bsdam pa dang /_/gzir dang ring du gdon byos la/_/bla ba/_kA raN+Da ba dang /_/sbal pa dang ni/_b+he la ka_/chu yi bya rog pA k+Sha'i shing /_/ring du 'gro dang /_sgra gding ba/_/rigs can dang ni spre'u la'o/_/bla baM/_dmag dang
[\[230a.7\]]mtho ba dang /_/dri dang /_rtsa dang /_ba lang 'tshe/_/b+ha ba/_dpal mgrin 'khor ba dang /_/dpal dang /_legs 'thob skye ba la/_/b+hA ba rang bzhin byed pa dang /_/bsam pa sems can bdag skye dang /_/bya ba rol pa dngos po dang /_/tshig don gnas kyi khyad par
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]la/_/skye bo/_rtogs pa 'byor pa dang /_/gar dang /_khrus dang mkhas pa la'ang /_/re bA dza m+bA li ni'i dbye/_/raMs dang /_dran pa yangs pa dang /_/thung ngu rab byed rta dang ni/_/gar dang san mo'i dbye ba dang /_/'bras bu kha na ma tho dang /_/bya'i khyad par
[\[230b.2\]]dag la'o/_/la ba/_/cha shas sgeg pa dang /_/gcod dang sbyin dang dga' byed dga'/_/dpal 'bras dang ni pi ba li/_/bi l+l+baM sna tshogs/_lha grong khyer/_/biM shwa/_sna tshogs thams cad dug_/phye ma'i btung ba la yang ngo /sha ba ro dang btung ba la/_/shi bi/_
[\[230b.3\]]gro ga mi bdag dbye/_/shi ba 'phrog byed/_rnal 'byor dbye/_/lha dang phur bu phye ma dang /_/gu gul dang ni bang kar shing /_/si ba/_thar pa/_sgo dang chu/_/dge ba'o shi bA/_dkar mo dang /_/dri ma med dang ka ke ru/_/dz+hA TA ma lA laM dang ni/_/rnga mo dang ni sha k+shu'i 'bras/_/
[\[230b.4\]]sa tI/_skye bo/_sems can dang /_/srid pa/_srog chags bdag dang dngos/_/rdzas dang stobs dang sha za sogs/_/yod dang yon tan 'byor pa dang /_/rang bzhin dang ni mtha' la'o/_/sa ba/_kun 'dzin mchod sbyin dang /_/khrus dang zhi ba yon gnas mtshungs/_
[\[230b.5\]]shru bA/_shru gA dbye ba dang /_/shal+le ki dang murbA la/_/ha ba laM dang /_'bod pa dang /_/nges par bstan pa rnams la'o/_/hra sra/_thung ngu dma' ba'i don/_/k+Sha ba/_ske tshe/_k+Shu DA'o/_/a b+hA ba ni yod min dang /_/dngos med dang ni shi ba la/_/a kli ba ni yod min
[\[230b.6\]]gnas/_/arta baM ni me tog dang /_/rdul dang dus dang 'byung po la/_/A pra ba ni dam bca' dang /_/nyon mongs tshig dang gnas pa la/_/A hi ba ni mchod sbyin dang /_/yang dag gnon pa la yang ngo /_/ut+pa ba ni dga' ston dang /_/'dod dang /_rab 'byams khro ba
[\[230b.7\]]la/_/ud+d+ha pa ni dga' ston dang //khyab 'jug zhang po mchod sbyin dang /_/dag byed byed pa gsal ba dang /_/pags pa zi ra nag po la'o/_/ki ta pa ni ngan pa dang /_/myos dang slu byed dag la yang /_/ke sha ba ni klu shing dang /_/spang skyes dang ni skra can la/_/kai ta baM ni/_ts+tsha
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]la dang /_/snang ba dang ni/_ku mu da/_/dgra bo dang ni ngan pa'o/_/kai ra paM ni/_ku mu da/_/zla ba can dang kai ra bI/_/gaN+D+wi dang ni gA Di dang /_/gzhu dang srid sgrub gzhu la'o/_/gA la ba ni rgya skyegs thub/_/tAN+Da baM ni gar dang rtsa/_/mtho ris/_bar
[\[231a.2\]]snang sum rtsen dang /_/sum rtsen ma dang rig byed dbye/_/dI di bi ni blo ldan dang /_/bsam pa dang ni bdag la yang /_/dI dzeM hwa ni sbrul dag dang /_/phra ma can la mngon par brjod/_/naM Sh+pApa ni nyi ma rlung /_/ka Da m+pang+ga ra dang ni/_/rnam par rtog pa mad pa dang /_/sim+bi
[\[231a.3\]]kA ra dza mA ShA/_/nit+na ba ni ngan smras dang /_/mi mkhas pa dang yid brtan min/_/pany+tsa twaM ni lnga lan dang /_/dngos po dang ni gter la'o/_/bal+la ba ni/_rgya chen gyol/_/skag dang /_rgya skyegs tshon dag la/_/bIr+tha bI ni g.yo ba dang /_/ki sha la dang yal 'dab
[\[231a.4\]]ma/_/pI r+tha ba ni ma zab dang /_/sa dag sa yi rnam 'gyur la/_/pung+ga ba ni khyu mchog dang /_/gtso skye sa mchog sman bye brag_/pra b+ha ba ni/_skye ba pa/_/chu yi rtsa ba pha rol gnon/_/rgol ba nad rung thams cad kyi/_/kun spyod rtogs par byed pa la/_/pra b+hA ba ni/_
[\[231a.5\]]nus gzi brjid/_/dang po/_dmigs dang gnas la'o/_/pra b+ha wa ni mngal nas mthar/_/bram ze rnams kyi me tog 'bras/_/phan tshun grogs dang /_'jig rten skyes/_/pra sa ba ni/_lcug ma can/_/rdo rje'i shing dang s+yU ta'o/_/pe ra bi ni srin mo dang /_/ce
[\[231a.6\]]spyang la'o bal+la ba/_/'joms pa dang ni ba lang skyong /_/'jigs sde la'o/_/ban+d+ha pa/_/gnyen dang mdza' bshes dag la'o/_/brga ba ni pa sangs dang /_/glang po dga' byed dgra sta can/_/gzhu bzang la'o/_/b+hArga/_bI/_/ri sras/_dpal mo/_dur+pA dkar/_/b+hai ra
[\[231a.7\]]ba ni ngan spong bu/_/bai ra baM ni 'jigs par byed/_/mA d+ha ba ni skra can dang /_/sgrub byed dang ni dpyid la'o/_/mA d+ha bI na/_sbrang rtsi la'ang /_/ka ra chang dang rdung byed ma/_/shin tu grol ba rnams la'o/_/rA g+ha ba na nya chen gye/_/rab dbye rag+hu yi rigs la/_/rA dzI
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ba ni nya ri dwags/_/rgyal po nye bar 'tsho ba la/_/sU ba ba ni/_bum pa 'bangs so/_/bud med khyad par bram ze la/_/bA Da baM ni rgod ma'i tshogs/_/bud med byed pa'i khyad par dang /_/sa 'og aurba bram ze la/_/be+e tra ba ni 'bros su 'jug_/blo la'o de nas bi b+ha ba/_/
[\[231b.2\]]nor dang mya ngan 'das pa la/_/pi b+hA pa ni/_yongs bsags dang /_/'dod pa dang ni gsal byed dang /_/dgra rnams kyi dngos 'joms pa la/_/shA trA baM ni zhe sdang dang /_/dgra las skyes pa nyid la'o/_/shu Sha bI ni ral gri dang /_/zi ra dang ni zi ra nag_/ShA Da ba ni ro
[\[231b.3\]]bcud glu/_/myur ba'i 'bu dang rab skye dang /_/gru dang kha dog dag la'o/_/sartsi ba ni g.yo ba dang 'bod/_/sam+b+ha ba ni 'byung ba dang /_/dran pa rgyu dang /_slong ba dang /_/'dus dang shin+tu tha dad dang /_/rten dang brten pa dag la'o/_/su grI ba ni bdud kyi bdag_/
[\[231b.4\]]mgrin pa mdzes pa rjod par byed/_/sain+d+hA ba ni nor bu bsrub/_/rta dang /_sin+d+hA'i yul byung la'o/_/a nu b+hA ba mthu dang ni/_/rten dang dngos po mtshon pa la/_/a bat+na ba/_ngan smras dang /_/smod dang skur pa 'debs pa la/_/a b+he Sha ba gnas dang ni/_/tshang
[\[231b.5\]]dang /_mchod sbyin yang dag 'jog_/A dI na pa nyes dmigs skyon/_/yongs su nyon mongs mtha' ngan no/_/u ba bla pa skyed pa dang /_/rnam 'phyo chom rkun seng ge la/_/ku shI tse ba grog mkhar skyes/_/gar dang slong ba rnams la'o/_/ku shI la ba gcig 'thob dang /_/
[\[231b.6\]]bzod ldan dga' byed bu la'o/_/dza lwa bi lwa 'dod pa dang /_/rus sbal/_sbal pa chu'i bzhi mdo/_/dzi baM dza ba tsa ko ra/_/bya'i dbye shing gi khyad par la/_/do lA dzre pa bun skyed dang /_/log shes dang ni rab dga' la'o/_/d+ha mArga pa zhes pa ni/_/a pA marga'i shing dang
[\[231b.7\]]ni/_/de ba dA lI la yang brjod/_/pa ri sla ba g.yo ba dang /_/'khrug pa dang ni brjod bya'i rtags/_/ba rA b+ha ba mi snang dang /_/rnam par nyams dang gzhan du gyur/_/ba ra ba sa gzhan skyob dang /_/dmangs rigs bu dang gnyis skyes la/_/pu Ta grI ba mtshon cha laM/_/garga
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]rI dang /_/zangs bum la/_/ba la de bA/_char can dang /_/stobs lha stobs dang /_rlung dang ni/_/rta dmar dang ni 'phrog byed rta/_/mthil skyes dang ni rig byed la'o/_/shI ta shi ba brag spos lam/_/rgyam tsha dang ni mi sI la/_/sa te de ba
[\[232a.2\]]stobs dang ni/_/ut+pal yu ba/_sA ri ba/_/bum sman dang ni lhar bcas la/_/sbrul mig dang ni skya bo la/_/sred ldan a si ti b+ha ba/_/chu klung A si taM b+ha bi/_/wa mtha'i sde'o//_//sha ni mtshon cha brgya dang 'tshe/_/shaM ni chos dang shA ston pa/_/shI ni gnyid log pa
[\[232a.3\]]dang ni/_/rtag tu gnyid log pa la'o/_/A sha 'dod dang sred pa la/_/A shu 'bru dang myur ba la/_/i sha_/ku sha_/ga la'i dbyug_/dbang phyug dang ni gtso bo la/_/aM shu 'od dang nyi ma tsha/_/kA sha klo sgra rtsa la'o/_/kA shI wA rA Na sI dang /_/glang phrug spre'u gcer bu
[\[232a.4\]]la/_/ku sha dga' byed bu dang gling /_/sbyor ba'i dbye ba dag la'o/_/ku sha myos dang sdig can dang /_/glang po la'o ku shA ni/_/yi ge'o ku shI dus rab bsgrags/_/ke sha skra dang ngo tsha can/_/lha min dbye ba chu lha la/_/kle sha sdug bsngal chags sogs dang /_/bya ba sA ya
[\[232a.5\]]la yang blta/_/daR+sha mthong ba nyi zla 'grogs/_/phyogs mtha' kha khyer zla ba la/_/da shA dbang byed/_cha shas dang /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_/stobs med pa yi gnas skabs la/_/dr-i sha blo dang mthong ba mig_/shes dang mthong ba spo dag la/_/daM sha go cha
[\[232a.6\]]sbrul gyi rma/_/rtsed mo dum bu skyon la'o/_/nA sha_/bros dang byer ba dang /_/thim dang /_mi dmigs pa la'o/_/ni shA mtshan mo yung ba dang /_/shing dang ser po dag la'o/_/ba shu rab 'joms ri dwags sogs/_/rab dang /_snod dang bsreg bya'i don/_/sAM shu rdul
[\[232a.7\]]dang lo thog dang /_/nor dang ring bsag pa byung la'o/_/pA shA phyogs la sogs pa dang /_/'chi ba g.yo ba'i don dang skra/_/dbang sogs mtha' dang smod don dang /_/rna ba'i mtha' dang mdzes don can/_/be+e shI sha dang gong bu dang /_/sha ldan ral gri'i shubs dang ni/_/khye
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'tshong bag phye thug pa'i dbye/_/rA shi phung po lug dang skyon/_/mtshon cha dang ni dbang bral la'o/_/pa shA/_sgyu ma/_dat+ta dang /_/'dod pa dang ni gtso bo la/_/ba shA/_yo Sha'i bu mo gsham/_/ba dang glang mo rnams la'o/_/be+e sha rje rigs yid skyes dang /_/rab tu 'jug la yang dag
[\[232b.2\]]'dod/_/be sha tshong khang 'jug pa dang /_/'jug bya'i khyem dang khang pa la/_/baM shing 'od ma rigs dang sre/_/rgyab kyi cha shas rus pa la/_/ba shu phyugs dang dri yi bcud/_/skyes bu'i khyad par lo d+h+ra la/_/paR+ga rig byed sbyin pa dang /_/nad dang /_reg pa po la
[\[232b.3\]]yang /_/g.yul dang smon lam la yang 'dod/_/A daR+sha ni me long dang /_/rgyas bshad so so'i glegs baM la/_/ud+hI sha ni ri'i bu mo/_/mdzes dang gzhung gi khyad par la/_/u pAM shu ni skyes bye brag_/rdul dang skye bos dben pa la/_/ka pi shI ni ma d+h+wa
[\[232b.4\]]lbi/_/sngo sangs dang ni se h+la/_/karka sha ni/_ka m+wi la/_/kA shA 'joms dang /_bur shing rta/_/brtse med skyes bu 'khrug pa dang /_/brtan dang /_bab chol can la'o/_/kA nA sha ni zhi byed dang /_/'khrug dang /_rtsub po/_rdul 'joms la/_/ku li sha nya'i dbye ba
[\[232b.5\]]dang /_/A li dang ni rdo rjer 'dod/_/go ri sha ni dbang phyug dang /_/tshig bdag dang ni ri yi bdag_/tAd+gI sha ni seng ge zla/_/duHduR+sha ni nad kyi gnas/_/tsher ma dang ni reg rtsub po/_/ni re sha ni mtha' nye dang /_/ston pa dang ni 'chad pa la/_/nirbe sha ni 'jug pa
[\[232b.6\]]dang /_/longs spyod dang ni rmongs pa la/_/ni pe sha ni zhi ba dang /_/de bzhin byed dang rnam sel la/_/ni ste sha ni brtse med dang /_/ral gri gsal ba des dang mnyam/_/ba lA sha ni ki shu ka_/sha TI dang ni ljang ser dang /_/ni ka sha las skyes pa'o/_/pa lA shaM
[\[232b.7\]]ni gos la yang /_/bak+Shi shA ni mkha' lding dang /_/nag po/_dmar ser/_legs skyer/_ser/_/nya dang /_lcug ma'i bdag po la/_/ping+gA shI ni rams dang /_sman/_/pra kA sha ni rab grags pa/_/rab tu bzhad dang dka' thub gsal/_/pra de sha ni/_yul
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'dzin byed/_/mdzub mo mthe bong /_yang dag 'dod/_/b+hU ke shI ni bal ba dza/_/ban+dU sha ni tshu bal gar/_/'o ma sha ni lug bal la/_/shri gA lI ni spre'u dang /_/spang spos/_gra ma/_shilda la'o/_/lo ma shA ni bya rog byin/_/kA shI sha dang
[\[233a.2\]]kA shI'i dbye/_/tshil chen dang ni shin tu stobs/_/rnam par rgyas dang nges skye la/_/bi ke shI ni gsal ba dang /_/rnam par dbye dang rnam rgyas skra/_/bi bA shA ni gos ldan dang /_/chu rlung zhag grol ba la'o/_/be+e ba sha ni mang 'dzin bdag_/bI kA sha ni rnam gsal dang /_/
[\[233a.3\]]gsal dang rnam par brjod pa la/_/saM kA sha ni/_kun tu 'dzin/_/mtshungs dang 'dra dang 'gro dang mnyam/_/pa de sha ni yang dag 'dzin/_/yul la'o su/_khA sha zhes pa/_/mdzes pa dang ni 'jig pa la/_/sa ba sha ni mal stan dang /_/chu lha rgyal po ti mi sa/_/ha tA sha ni
[\[233a.4\]]'khrug pa dang /_/brtse med 'jig dang 'dod pa la/_/a ba de sha_/tshig mtshon cha/_/zol dang mtshan ma dag la'o/_/a ba b+h+raM sha skad kyi dbye/_/zur chag sgra dang go dka' ba/_/A shra yA sha snang ba che/_/lus dang 'jig par byed pa la/_/u pa raM sha me da dang /_/
[\[233a.5\]]gnod pa dang ni za byed la/_/u pa sbaR+sha nye reg dang /_/kun tu reg_/khrus/_kha bshal ba'o/_/paN+Da par+shu/_pI nA ki/_/ma rungs mig dang ngan dang 'khyog_/sgra gcan dum bu ma la ka_/byug byed dga' byed/_sgra sta can/_/dzI be+i ta sha dpe/_mtha' gcig_/'tsho ba'i
[\[233a.6\]]mtha' dang mtsho dbang phyug_/nA ba/_bA sha dran pa dang /_/bud med rnams kyi byed pa dang /_/chu lha'i zhags pa dbang phyug gi dgra sta'i ming /_rnams la'o/_/pany+tsa da shi zla nya dang /_/gnam stong dag la 'dod pa yin/_/pa ri bi sha zlum dkyil 'khor/_/pA da yA shi/_ba DU ka_/
[\[233a.7\]]lcags sgrog dang ni gdu bu'o/_/pu ro Da sha nam mkha'i dbye/_/zla ba khri shing bcud dang ni/_/phye ma dang ni ma sI dang /_/khrus kyi rnam pa la yang 'dod/_/lo rgyus mchod pa grong son dang /_/grogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang /_/rje rigs sa reg rjes skyes la'ang /_/sha
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]mtha'i sde'o//_//Sha ni/_gtso bo la 'dod de/_/Shi ni mngal nas grol ba la'o/_/u ShI mda' dang bu dag dang /_/mtshan mo dang ni tho rangs la'o/_/u Sha 'dod ldan gu gul la'o/_/r-i Shi 'od 'bar rig byed dang /_/drang srong gnas 'jog la sogs la'o/_/kar+Sha ko
[\[233b.2\]]dang ba rgyal la/_/karlU lci ba me dag dang /_/khyim dag mngon par rjod byed la'o/_/ko Sha lha rdzas/_nor/_don mthun/_/sgra sgrogs yang dag 'dzin pa dang /_/sbubs skye ba dang kha ma bye/_/snod dang ral gri kha chod la/_/g+ho Sha me tog brgya pa dang /_/dbyangs ldan dang
[\[233b.3\]]ni 'brug sgra la/_/g+ho Sha/_sgra ldan 'jigs pa dang /_/su nA b+hI ra/_lcug ma la/_/dz+ha ShA klu yi stobs ma la/_/dz+ha ShA rnam par 'phyo bar brjod/_/tar+Sha 'dod pa skom pa la/_/tu Sha/_so ba/_pags pa mig_/tI Sha 'dod dang skom pa la/_/tI Sha/_'od mdzes
[\[233b.4\]]dbyangs can dang /_/mtha' dang /_dzi gI Sha la'o/_/do Sha sun 'byin sdig pa skyon/_/mtshan mo dang ni lag pa la/_/po Sha zla ba'i bye brag dang /_/rgyal dang grub pa zla bral la/_/pau ShI rgyal dang rgyas pa la/_/pre Sha mdag pa byed pa dang /_/'joms par byed dang nyon
[\[233b.5\]]mongs la/_/b+ha ShA skad dang tshig dag la/_/mA Sha 'bru yi khyad par dang /_nga rgyal/_rmongs/_lpags/_sun 'byin dbye/_/ma Shi 'gran par byed dang zol/_/me Sha 'dzin par byed pa la/_/ba r+Sha khyim dang sman bye brag_/dbyar gyi dus so bar+ShaM ni/_/char 'be+ebs chu
[\[233b.6\]]skyes 'dzam gling sprin/_/bi ShaM bong nga dkar po la/_/bi Sha ga ra la dang chu/_/bi Sha khyab byed bshad pa la/_/br-i Sha chos dang /_byi ba la/_/b+h+ri Sha 'dzin gnas gtso bo khyim/_/lcags sgrog dang ni khu ba 'dzin/_/dr-i ShA spre'u khyi rngo la/_/br-i ShI brtul zhugs ming dang
[\[233b.7\]]gdan/_/shu Shi skems dang khung bu la/_/she Sha spyi blugs lhag ma la/_/she Sha mtha' yas khyad par dang /_/dri med dbyer med la yang ngo /_/a b+he Shu ni snang ba la/_/u b+hi ShU ni rang so bzung /_/A kar+Sha na rang dbang bshad/_/rgyan po 'gyed par byed pa la'ang /_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]zhags pa dang ni mda' gzhu la/_/goms pa'i dngos po la yang ngo /_/A mi Sha ni skra brdzes dang /_/sha dang longs spyod 'dod pa dang /_/A mi Shi ni mdzes pa yi/_/rnam pa'i gzugs sogs yul la yang /_/uSh+TI Sha ni mgo dkris dang /_/
[\[234a.2\]]cod pan mtshan nyid khyad par la/_/kal+maSha ni srin po dang /_/nag po skya bo dag la yang /_/kalpa ShaM ni rnyog sdig pa/_/kilpi She ni spong byed nad/_/sgrub tu med pa'o kusmA ShaM/_/kAny+dzi ka dang nas can no/_/gan+DU Sha ni Sha skong dang /_/rab 'byams dang ni dkar min
[\[234a.3\]]dang /_/glang po dang ni lag sor la/_/dzi gI Sha ni rgyal 'dod dang /_/cung zad rgod pa dag dang ni/_/phul du byung dang mtha' la'o/_/ta rI Sha ni dbyibs mdzes dang /_b+he la chu gter mtha' la'o_/tI bi Sha ni gser dang sprin/_/na g+tu Sha ni rgyal dbye
[\[234a.4\]]dang /_/sbrul gyi bye brag dag la'ang /_/ni Sha ka_/kar+Sha pA Na/_/ni ka ShA ni rgya skyegs ma/_/ni me Sha ni mig 'dzums dang /_/dus dbye dang ni mig 'dres la/_/ba ru Shi ni bkra ba rtsub/_/bab chol rjod par byed pa'o/_/pu ru Sha ni klu shing dang /_/sbrang rtsi skyes dang
[\[234a.5\]]mchog dag la/_/sau ru ShaM ni gzi brjid dang /_/bsam pa dang ni las la yang /_/steng dang /_rgya chen dpung pa dang /_/lag pa mi dang btung ba la/_/pra t+yu Sha ni nyin mo'i sgo/_/tho rangs dang ni nor lha'o/_/pra do Sha naM skyon ldan ma/_/srod dang mtshan mo'i sgo
[\[234a.6\]]la'o/_/ma hi ShI ni sa skyong gi/_/btsun mor dbang bskur byin la'o/_/mA ri ShA ni dri zhim dang /_/sman dbye gsal ba'i ma ma'o/_/mA ri Sha ni sdo'i dbye ba/_/gar ma dang ni 'gyur byed ma'o/_/ro hi ShaM ni gtsang byed nya/_/ro hi Sha ni ri dwags dbye/_/bi She Sha ni dbye ba
[\[234a.7\]]tsam/_/bi She Sha ni thig le la/_/beshA+eSha ni ma 'byer dang /_/kha bral ba dang ring du gyur/_/byA kar+Sha ni snying po can/_/sa la ka dang rgyan 'gyed 'gugs/_/shu shru Sha ni nyan 'dod dang /_/bsnyen bkur dang ni gtam dag la/_/shai lu Sha ni bil ba'i shing /_/ku shI
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gcod pa la yang ngo /_/saM har+Sha ni 'gran pa dang /_/a nu kaR+Sha shing rta yi/_/'og shing dang ni rjes su 'gugs/_/lha yi btung ba sred pa dang /_/mngon par 'dod pa dag la'o/_/a rdzi mi Sha lha dang nya/_/alba ri Sha ri'i bye brag_/nyi ma dgra sta dum bu can/_/pI ta na
[\[234b.2\]]dang /_ki sho ra/_/am+bu rI ShaM sgra yul 'khor/_/a lam+bu Sha/_sgyug byed la//a lam+bu ShA gaN+Di rI/_/mtho ris dang ni rje rigs dang /_/kim+bu ru Sha lta gdong can/_/'jig rten dbye ba la yang ngo /_/nan+di g+hoSha pha rol gnas/_/bstod pa 'don pa dbyangs byed pa/_/
[\[234b.3\]]pa ri g+ho Sha brjod bya dang /_/nges par sgogs dang 'brug sgra la/_/pa laM bzang ba za ma dang /_/rgya skyegs gu gul kiM shu ka_/ba laM ka Sha mgo zlum dang /_/sman dang srin po nyid la'o/_/ma hA g+ho ShA rwa yi dbye /_/tshong dus kyis ni glag gcor la/_/bA ta ra rU Sha/_rlung tshub dang /_/
[\[234b.4\]]skra 'greng pa dang brgya byin gzhu/_/Sha mtha'i sde'o//_//sA na don dang dpal la'o/_/sI ni kha lo sgyur ba la/_/se ni dpal mo'i bu dang dga'/_/so ni skems byed ma ma la/_/aM sa cha dang 'ching ba la/_/kA su nus pa dang mtshon cha/_/ma tshang gos dang 'khar ba dang /_/lha mi
[\[234b.5\]]'khar ba dag la'o/_/'khar ba'i snod dang /_tshad dang yang /_/gud+ba ta pa kA hA ra/_/sdong bu/_gran+b+ri par+Na la/_/go sa tho rangs po la dag_/tsA sa/_gser dang gtsug phud dang /_rab dbye khru dang tshig rnams la'o/_/dA sa nor bu skyon 'jigs pa/_/dA sa gla mi nya pa
[\[234b.6\]]dang /_/dad dang sbyin pa tsam dang ni/_/bran dang bud pa rnams la'o/_/nA sa/_sna dang /_sna yi sgo/_/steng gi shing dag la yang ngo /_/pra sU ma ma gzhal ba dang /_/rta dang 'gal ba rnams la'o/_/ba sU dpal sbyin bu ga me/_/rigs dang 'od dang lha'i khyad par/_/shing
[\[234b.7\]]dang sman dang rin chen dang /_/steng dang tshong dus nor dang ni/_/snyan ngag khur dang mthu dang mdzes/_/b+ha se sa yi bya rgod dang /_/goSh+To dang ni bya gag la/_/maM saM sha dang spang spos dang /_/kak+ko li dang ral pa la/_/mA sa/_zla ba mjal byed dang /_/mA sI/_sbrang rtsi 'o mi se
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]ni/_/me tog brgya pa dzA mA ni/_/mri dwA gnas can sa mchog dang /_/ra sa/_ro bcud/_tik+tA sogs/_/sgog pa sogs dang khu ba dug_/dngul chu khams dang chang /_/bo la mar dang lus la'o/_/ra sA/_lce dang /_rta pho dang /_/'don dang shal+la
[\[235a.2\]]kI kaM gu/_/rA sa gla rtsi rtse ba dang /_/skad dang lcags sgrog la yang ngo /_/phat+sa/_bu sogs tal+la ka_/tshar ba dang ni za ba la/_/bA sA/_khyim dang gnas skabs dang /_/a Ti/_rUl ka zhes la'o/_/bya sa thub pa rgya che la/_/shaM sa brjod dang 'dod pa la/_/hiM sa chom
[\[235a.3\]]rkun sogs dang gnod/_/haM sa nyi ma/_ma dA la/_/nag po lus kyi rlung dang ni/_/chags med mi bdag mchog gi bdag_/rnal 'byor sngags sogs dbye ba dang /_/ser sna rta yi khyad par la/_/a b+h+yA+e sa ni/_deng 'di gzhan/_/yang dag bzhag dang yon tan dang /_/
[\[235a.4\]]phongs dang 'od dang ma lus la/_/a li sa ni bya ba dal/_/rkang nang shing gi khyad par la/_/a la sA ni dad pa'i bdag_/rtag 'gro sdig pa gzhan la gnod//A shis sbrul byi mche ba dang /_/gnod pa byed dang mtshungs pa la/_/A sh+bA sa ni kun bshad dang /_/yongs
[\[235a.5\]]su gcod dang nges 'jug_/nyi/_/ts+ma shwA sa ni 'ching ba tsam/_/g.yo ba dang ni gzhu la'o/_/uts+tsha sa ni dbugs rngub dang /_/dbugs 'byin rkyang ba 'ching ba dang /_/yon tan gyi ni khyad par la/_/ut+taM sa ni/_rna rgyan dang /_/rna ba gang dang thod dkris la/_/u ras bong
[\[235a.6\]]dang sgrib pa la/_/ru shas/_dgongs mthun/_tho rangs dag_/e nas gzhan dbang sdig pa dang /_/lus dang khang pa dag la'o/_/o rdzas gzi brjid khams rnams ni/_/kun nas brdas dang /_rab gsal la/_/nye bar 'dzin dang gcod pa'ang /_/kI ka saM ni
[\[235a.7\]]rus pa la/_/kIka sa ni 'bu phran la/_/ts+tshan+das tshigs bcad thos pa 'dod/_/rang dbang dang ni kun spyod la/_/tsa ma sa ni kun 'gro/_gser/_/rgyags dang phyi ma'i dbye ba la/_/dz+yA yas/_thu bo/_phul byung la/_/dz+yo tis/_sgra dang me rab gsal/_/mthong ba dang ni
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]mig gi 'bras/_/dka' thub 'jig rten khyad par dang /_/brtul zhugs/_tsan+d+rA yA na sogs/_/dka' thub dregs dang bgrang ba la/_/ta mas mtho ris snang dang khro /_/yon tan khyad par don byed la/_/ta ras stobs dang shugs dag la/_/ta ma sa ni mun can
[\[235b.2\]]dang /_/gtum mo ngan dang yang 'gro la/_/te dzas pha rol gnon pa dang /_/gsal dang mthu dang stobs khu ba/_/d+ha nus mda' sten khyem dang gzhu/_/gzhu can dang ni pi yA laM/_/gzhu mchog_/gzhu rgyud sa skyes la/_/na b+h+yes nam mkha'/_na b+hAs sprin/_/pad rtsa'i
[\[235b.3\]]'bras bu 'gro ba 'dzin/_/pa na sa ni/_char/_rdo ba/_/sna dang spre'u nad kyi dbye/_/char ldan/_tsher ldan 'bras bu la/_/ba yas 'o ma chu dag la/_/pA ya sa ni dpal gnas la/_/pA ya saM ni zas kyi mchog_/puSh+ka sI ni nag mo sngo/_/khyi 'tshed/_tha shal/_
[\[235b.4\]]puSh+ka sa/_/b+hU yas slar don mang po la/_/ma nas/_sems dang nye ba la/_/ma nis/_dga' ston gzi brjid dag_/mA na sa ni rang nad 'tsho/_/ra dzas mtsho dang /_yon tan dang /_/ri dang mchog dang skyes pa la/_/ra b+ha ra ni de nyid dang /_/dga' ba dang ni
[\[235b.5\]]shugs la yang /_/ra ha sa/_gsang dang dga' ba la/_/srin po mche ldan rAk+Sha sa/_/re ta sa khu ba ro bcud dang /_/'khrug dang ser sna tha ma'o/_/ro nga sa dang /_ro di pI/_/mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la'o/_/lA la sa ni lhan cig brjod/_/spro ba dang ni slong
[\[235b.6\]]ba dang /_/sred pa dang ni lhag pa la/_/ba spu lus dang smin byas la/_/ba yas lang tsho dang byis pa/_/sogs dang mkha' la 'gro ba la/_/bi rdis me dang rma bya dang /_/ku sha'o brtsas bshang 'dor dang /_/'bar ba/_bshad pa gzugs la 'o/_/bA yas ni
[\[235b.7\]]shrI bA sa/_/gtor mas rgyas dang bya rog dang /_/u dusba ri kA dang ni/_/kA ka mA tsI na tshod gnas/_/ma ha sa ni gnyid can sbrul/_/chu las nges 'byung rim la legs/_/bi dwad+ma ni brtan bdag nyid/_/shes rab can dang rnam rol dang /_/bsam pa rol
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa rnams la'o/_/bA tas bya dang ri dwags rnams/_/'ching bar byed pa'i thabs la'o/_/bi shA sa ni gos 'bral la/_/bi b+hAt+sA ni/_srid sgrub dang /_/mi sdug_/btsog dang 'tshe ba la/_/be+e d+has khyab 'jug_/gza' lha du
[\[236a.2\]]rtogs/_/ri ras mgo bo sde'i mchog cha/_/mchog dang gtso bo dag la'o/_/shro tas/_chu shugs/_rna ba la/_/shre yan+sa ni shis dang zhi/_/shre ya sbi ni/_blang mo dang /_/pi spa lI dang khrus la yang /_/she yas chos dang /_bkra shis dang /_/dpal dang gnas
[\[236a.3\]]khyab 'jug pad+ma dag_/sa ma sa ni mdor bsdus dang /_/snying dang bdug spos nus pa la/_/sa ras chu dang /_lhan cig dgun dang /_/lam dag la/_/sa ha sa rnam pa/_rnam g.yo la/_/sA ha sa ni dul bar 'dod/_/stobs las bya ba byed pa la'o/_/sA ri pa ni zla ba
[\[236a.4\]]bya/_/sA+e' saM ni 'di ma skyes la/_/ha bis mar dang bsreg bya la/_/a gau klas dang na gau kAs/_/sa ra b+ha dang seng ge bya/_/a d+hi ba sa gnas 'du byed/_/bdug spos la sogs rnams la'o/_/a ba d+h+wad+ma smod pa dang /_/yongs gtong /_kun tu phye ba la/_/u da rtsis
[\[236a.5\]]ni mi dang ni/_/steng du me lce gyen 'od can/_/ki ni yad+ma/_rjes skyes dang /_/shin tu chung dang nu bo la/_/ka la haM sa/_tshogs can dang /_/ngang pa'i rgyal po mi dag mchog_/kum+b+hI na sa/_dug 'bar dang /_/rigs lta ba dang lag 'gro la/_/kum+b+hI na sI lan tshwa'i ma/_/
[\[236a.6\]]g+ha ni ra sa chu dang ni/_/dngul chu g.yas su 'khyel ba la/_/saM tra niR+YA/_sa/_ga pur/_/su mo ra Ta sbo lu'i 'dab/_/tsan+d+ra hA sa mgrin bcu pa'i/_/ral gri ral gri gzhan la yang /_/b+hA sa ra sa zangs dang ni/_/gser dang chu skyes la yang ngo /_/tri shro ta sa naM/_lha'i chu klung /_/
[\[236a.7\]]dza h+nu'i bu mo mtho ris 'dab/_/dIr+g+ha yus ni mda' can dang /_/ka shAsma yi 'tsho byed la/_/niHgre ya saM dge ba dang /_/grol ba nges legs 'phrog byed la/_/nI lany+dza sa lha mo'i dbye/_/chu klung /_bye brag glog la yang /_/pu narba su skar ma dang /_/nag po/_kA t+yA ya na
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]la'o/_/baur+Na mA sI/_nya gang dang /_/zla ba nya dang mchod sbyin la/_/pra che tas ni/_thub pa dang /_/chu lha dang ni/_nag po la/_/yo ba rI yan+sa/_gtso bo dang /_/mchog gnas dang ni ches gzhon la/_/ma d+hu ra sA/_mUrbI dang /_/rgun 'brum 'o ma can dag la/_/ma lI
[\[236b.2\]]ma sa/_slu ma dang /_/lcags dang me tog tshur dag la/_/ma hA ra sa 'bra go dang /_/mdzod byed dang ni/_go ma la/_/ra se ra sa bcud skyes dang /_/bcud grub pa dang stobs la'o/_/pi b+hA ba su/_'od chen dang /_/nyi ma 'phrog byed khyad par la/_/bi sho pa su
[\[236b.3\]]dri za yi/_/bye brag dang mi mtshan mo la/_/bi hA yas ni mkha' 'gro dang /_/mkha' dang lha yi lam la'o/_/shwa shre ya saM dge ba dang /_/gzhan dga' ba dang skyid pa la/_/sas+t+tA rtsis ni sreg byed dang /_/gdung ba'i 'od dang sar mig la/_/sa many+dza sa ri mo goms/_/
[\[236b.4\]]brdza ra sa pi wang gi_/rab dbye dang ni d+hU na ka_/sa d+hI yan+sa shin tu legs/_/shin tu b+haD+Ta la yang ngo /_/sed+d+ha rA sa ro bcud dang /_/sbrul gdug sogs so sum nA sa/_/me tog phreng dang brtan dang dbyangs/_/su me d+hAs ni gsal ldan dang /_/blo gros bzang po dbang la'o/_/
[\[236b.5\]]di bya tsak+Shus don dang ni/_/dri bzang dang ni mig mdzes la/_/na b+ha/_shra mos ri mo dang /_/sU pa zla ba dra ba la/_/haM gu ni rlA saM'i sgra 'di/_/nilba dang ni shing kun ro/_/hi ra N+T+ya ra has zhes pa/_/me lce bdun dang de nas yang /_/res gza' spen pa nas bzlog ste phri ba'i/_/bdun gyi bdun pa dag la'o/_/sa
[\[236b.6\]]mtha'i sde'o//_//ha ni khro mdangs bcas pa yi/_/glang po dang ni rdo rje la/_/hi ni dbang po bu la'o/_/a hi lha min/_br-i ha/_sprul/_/yI hA grib ma u d+Ya ma/_/u hu zla ba cha nyams dang /_/mthong ba dang ni/_tshogs pa la/_/gu ha/_tshang
[\[236b.7\]]tshing /_seng ge'i/_mjug_/phug dang phung po rnams la'o/_/gr-i ha khyem dang /_bal+lI dang /_/'dzin khri 'dzin pa do shal la/_/gra ha nyi ma la sogs dang /_/'ching ba nye bar chags pa dang /_/skra dang at+Ya ma dang ni/_/'dzin byed dga' byed la sogs dang /_/seng
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ge ma'i bu mun pa 'dzin/_/na hA 'ching ba brtsegs pa dang /_/yangs pa glang po rkang pa tshigs/_/spro ha to/_ge byang ba dang /_/sde tshan dang ni yangs pa la/_/gsum sogs grangs la de bzhin no/_/pA ta khyu mchog nga rgyal dang /_/
[\[237a.2\]]rta la'o/_/bA ha bzhon pa la'o/_/ma ha dga' ston gzi brjid la/_/ma tI sa dang chu klung dang /_/rmongs dang dga' ba dag la'o/_/a haM blo gros rmongs pa la/_/lo he mtshon cha dzong+ga ka_/me las skyes pa thams cad la/_/bar+haM rma bya'i mjug 'ad+ba ba gshog_/
[\[237a.3\]]ya hA dri bzhon phung po yul/_/khyu mchog rnams so b+Yu ha ni/_/dpung gi bkod pa tshogs dang ni/_/sprul pa dang ni rtogs pa la/_/sa ha stobs dang bzod pa sa/_/mung+ga par+Ni na Sha sman/_/sa ha lha mo gzhon nu ma/_/bzod pa dang ni ldan pa'o/_/siMha
[\[237a.4\]]mgrin pa'i sgra can dang /_/khyem gyi dbye ba gtso bo gnas/_/mo tI chen po lo rgyus dang /_/kau rang+ga dang ma ma be lu/_/sna ha mar dang til la sogs/_/khu ba'i rdzas dang mdza' bshes la/_/a t+yU hA ni rma bya dang /_/ha d+yU ho dang rams dang sman/_/A gra ha ni rjes
[\[237a.5\]]'dzin nus/_/'dzin byed dang ni rim pa la/_/A ro ha ni ri ngos dang /_/ring po nyid dang kun nas bsgreng /_/mchu zheng dang ni glang po 'dul/_/nga rgyal dbye ba la yang 'gyur/_/u ha ni spro ba dang /_/srad bu dang ni rgyud la yang /_/ka Da hA ma ra ti la sogs/_/
[\[237a.6\]]snod dang ga pur rnams dang ni/_/mchod rten dang ni rus sbal rgyab/_/ma he'i phrug gu rnams la'o/_/ka la ha ni/_'tshong 'bu/_'thag_/ral gri'i shubs dang ze 'bru la/_/dA t+yA ha ni/_sbrul nag dang /_/phyag 'tshal dang ni mkha' 'gro la/_/na pA ha ni dang
[\[237a.7\]]po dang /_/nyin mo laM dang cha sa la'o/_/na gra ha ni brgyad bkag dang /_/bcing ba dang ni khrims lugs la/_/niR+Yu ha ni/_sgo khyud dang /_/thod dang glang po'i mche ba la/_/nir+Shu ha ni 'doms kyi dbye/_/rtog dang nges pa dag la yang /_/pa Ta ha ni yang dag
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rtsom/_/dmag gi rnga chen dag la'o/_/pra gra ta ni srang thag dang /_/dz+yA bAn+d+ha dang /_nges dang lag_/rash+mi rta sogs srab dang ni/_/mo gsham gser ldan ni ba la/_/pra ga ha ni srad bu dang /_/char la sogs pa'i tshad la yang /_/bra bA ha ni tha snyad
[\[237b.2\]]dang /_/'o ma dang ni chu rgyun la/_/pa rA ha ni/_phag mustA/_/dri bi slu sprin/_rnga chen la/_/pA ra hi ni ma mo dang /_/sangs rgyas lha mor blta bar bshad/_/sman la yang ngo /_/bi gra ha/_/lus dang g.yal dang rgya che la/_/rab tu rnam par char dbye dang /_/
[\[237b.3\]]bsdus dang lus 'phags mi thi la'o/_/bi de ha ni mi thI lA/_/lus kyi sa stong pa la yang /_/brjod pa'i de hI ni gsal ba dang /_/dkar mo tshangs pa'i bud med dang /_/pispa lI'o saM gra ha/_/rgya che mtshon dang khu tshur bsdus/_/mdor bsdus rnams so su ba ha/_/
[\[237b.4\]]ya dag 'bab pa la 'dod do/_/su ba hA ni/_e le'i 'dab/_/shal+lU kI dang sman dag la/_/lcug ma dang ni dang rkang dang /_/se pha li kA rnams la'o/_/a b+he gra ha mngon par 'dzin/_/mngon par sbyor dang zhe sa la/_/a ba gra ha char 'gog dang /_/so sor 'ching
[\[237b.5\]]dang glang po'i gral/_/a ba ro ba rang dbang min/_/rtsa ba/_lU ta steng 'gro dang /_/yal ga dang ni shi pa lA/_/sum rtsen de bzhin 'bab pa'o/_/a shwa ro hA dri la ste/_/a shwa ro ha rta res pa/_/u pa ga ha mo gsham dang /_/nye bar sbyor dang rjes mthun la/_/u pA nA
[\[237b.6\]]ha pi waM dang /_/'ching byed rma dang byug pa la/_/gan+d+ha ba hA sna can ma/_/gan+d+ha ba ha rlung la'o/_/ta nU ru haM mkha' lding dang /_/spu can ta mo pha ha na/_/rgyal gnyi ma/_mi dang ni/_/ri dwags mtshan ma rnams la'o/_/de ba sa ha sru ta dang /_/ut+pal sdong bu sman la'o/_/pa ri gra ha yongs skye dang /_/
[\[237b.7\]]sa laM rang byed mna' la'o/_/pa ri bA he rin dang ni/_/rgyal po/_rung ba/_yongs bgebs la/_/ba rI bA ha/_chu dbugs 'byung /_/sa skyong dngos po thug pa la'o/_/pi tA ma ha pha jo bo/_/tshangs pa dang ni mes po la/_/pa ti gra ha rang gir byed/_/dmag dang rgyab dang
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gza'i bye brag_/chen po rnams dang bi pa dang /_/rlung dang de 'dzin gnas 'dzin la/_/ma hA ro hA sked pa dang /_/bud med dbye ba nyin dang mtshan/_/kun 'bab ma hA sa hA ni/_/na ba sran ma'i lo ma la'o/_/pra bit+Sha ma haM zhes pa/_/mes po/_tshangs
[\[238a.2\]]pa/_pha yi pha_/ha mtha'i sde'o//_//k+Sha ni/_srin po/_zhing tsam la/_/ak+Sha 'khor lo zhags pa can/_/shing rta ba ru ra dang ni/_/kun spyod tha snyad bsam pa dang /_/dAd+mAng+gaR+sha dag la'o/_/ak+Sh-i ra dbang po spangs ma dang /_/sau brtse la la yang ngo /_/ri k+ShaM b+ha l+lu dom
[\[238a.3\]]dang dmar po dang /_/byas pa dang ni nor la'o/_/r-i k+shaM drang srong bye brag dang /_/skar ma dang ni 'gro ba'i dbye/_/kak+Sha se ra b+ha dang ni/_/lag pa'i rtsa ba glo dang ni/_/nags tshal skam dang rtswa dang ni/_/gel pa la'o ka k+Shu ni//khyem dang gser ldan bang mdzod dang /_/yongs
[\[238a.4\]]'gebs lcug ma g.yo ba dang /_/'dren dang 'dzin dang snod dang ni/_/shing rta'i yan lag glang po rdul/_/tsauk+Sh-i/_bsil/_zlum po dang /_/snod dang /_gtsang dang yid 'ong la/_/dak+Shau thub pa 'phrog byed dang /_/shing dang bya gag_/me 'dzin byed/_/dak+Sho spobs
[\[238a.5\]]pa can dang me/_/dak+Sha sa gzhi'o/_d+d+haM k+Sha ni/_/bya rog dang ni kaM ka dang /_/slong ba po dang rtog ge khyim/_/d+hUk+ShAk+ka i ka dang /_/n+ya k+Sha mtha' dag nag po dang /_/dgra sta rA ma la yang ngo /_/bak+Sha phyogs dang ngos gcig dang /_/khyim dang /_rtsig pa zla bla mi/_/grogs po
[\[238a.6\]]rgyal po/_glang po stobs/_/bsgrub bya/_mkha' lding lus yan lag_/sgyed pu/_bu ga 'gal ba dang /_/skra sogs mchog dang tshogs la'o/_/prek+Sha/_blo gros gar skad cig_/pak+Sha bispa la ral pa/_/khyem gyi logs la yang /_/mar me'i bye brag da rda'i snod/_/b+haMk+ShA
[\[238a.7\]]'dzin dang mun pa 'jig_/nyal dang /_slong ba'i dngos po la/_/mo kA byad grol/_grol ba thar/_/muSh+ka ka yi rkang 'thung la'o/_/yak+Sha/_lus ngan/_gsang ba pa/_/srung ba srung byed mtshon pa la/_/rU k+Sha shing gi khyad par dang /_/rtsub pa dga' ba stong pa'o/_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]lak+She/_grangs dang /_/khang pa mda'/_/ngo mtshar byed dang ngo mtshar la/_/a d+h+yak+Sha ni dbang byed pa/_/pa d+yuk+Sha ni mngon sum dang ni/_/mi 'gyur ba dang skad cig pa/_/mgo bo gnad dang so rnams la/_/usbrek+Sha ni snyan dngags rgyan/_/a na d+hA dag la'o/_/ga
[\[238b.2\]]bAk+Shu ni dbang po dang /_/chu lha/_dA bA/_kIkI sha_/go rak+Sha ni zha nye'i mtshan/_/ba lang rnams ni yongs bsrung la/_/mr-i gA k+Shi ni ri dwags mig_/dbang po/_chu lha 'dod ldan la/_/rak+tA kla ni/_sai ri tha/_/'khrug dang phug ron tsa go ra/_/sa mIk+Sha ni de nyid dang /_/
[\[238b.3\]]blo dang gzhung gi dbye ba dang /_/ni b+ha la na rnams la'o/_/de bi br-ik+Sha lo ma bdun/_/gu gul man+dA ra sogs la/_/bI ra br-ik+Sha b+ha l+lA ta'i/_/rkang 'thung ka ku b+ha yi shing /_/byu ta br-ik+Sha/_shA/_bo Ta'i/_/shing dang rkang 'thung dmar po'o/_/dza rA br-ik+Sha rma med dang /_/
[\[238b.4\]]gser can dang ni saM tha la/_/bi shA lak+Sha 'phrog byed mig_/yangs pa'i mig mchog ces bya'o/_/sha ka TAk+Sha shing d+ha ba/_/zur mig dang bcas zhes bya'o/_/a Na sogs dang ta bya yon tan sogs sbyor las/_/'khyog po'i tshig gi 'bras bur gyur rnams
[\[238b.5\]]blta bya ste/_/ma brjod rtags kyi tshogs rnams kyang ni drang ste/_/gal te 'ga' zhig yangs pas 'jigs la 'dir byas min/_/sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las k+Sha yig mtha' yi sde rnams rdzogs so//_//da ni a
[\[238b.6\]]yig la sogs pa'ang /_/de lta'i yang dag rim pa la_/sna tshogs don gyi skabs 'dir ni/_/bdag gis mi zad rnams kyang brjod/_/a ni dpal mgrin/_Am saM po/_/dran pa dag dang mngon khyab dang /_/nye ba khams dang lhag ma'i don/_/kun tu
[\[238b.7\]]gdung dang khro ba la/_/de dag mtshams sbyor mi bya'o/_/i ni 'dod pa skyo ba dang /_/dpal dang sdug bsngal/_dngos khro ba/_/zhi ba rdzogs sangs rgyas dang /_skad/_/A ni srung ba srung byed dang /_/gtsang ba bya ba/_rtsom grangs med/_/r-i ni lha yi tshig smad
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]pa/_/r-i ni lha min ma tshig smad/_/'-i yang lha yi ma la'o/_/e ni lag pa bzhi po dang /_/dran pa bod pa glu dag la/_/i ni zhi ba la bshad de/_/dran pa/_bod pa 'gran pa la'ang /_/aM ni tshangs pa 'od dang 'gran/_/au ni nam
[\[239a.2\]]mkha' bod pa 'gran/_/chos mchog rjes su 'dod pa la/_/aHni phyag dar la bshad do/_/ku ni smod dang /_cung zad don/_/kiM ni/_bye brag sgrib pa dang /_/spyo dang smod pa la yang ngo /_/ki ni ma 'ongs pa dang ngal/_/ang+ga kun tu bod pa dang /_/dga' dang /_slar don
[\[239a.3\]]la yang blta/_/kiny+dza rtsom dang /_mtha' dag la/_/tsa ni rgyud dang /_rnam nges dang /_/rkang pa kha skong mchan par dang /_/kun las btus dang zhar byung bsdu/_/phan tshun don dang dmigs 'dzin dang /_/thad ka dang ni mi snang don/_/'khyog dang mkha' 'gro la sogs
[\[239a.4\]]la/_/na nu tsa ni dri ba dang /_/lha dang rtog dang yang dag brtan/_/rab tu bsngags pa dag la'o/_/prany+tsa mchog dang /_'das pa sngon/_/tho rangs dang ni bar skabs la'o/_/phyogs dang /_yul dus he ru ka_/dbus dang /_bi nar+tha dag la'o/_/na nya med dang dgag
[\[239a.5\]]pa dang /_/de dang 'gal dang de las gzhan/_/'dra ba dang ni cung zad don/_/rang bzhin don dang rim pa la'o/_/[\[]puSh+bU[\]] rab tu bsngags pa dang /_/shin tu don dang legs pa dang /_/bzang dang kha na ma tho med/_/a ti bar dang med pa dang /_/dbus kyi don dang bstos pa
[\[239a.6\]]dang /_/'dra ba nyid dang da ltar 'dor/_/phul du byung dang gong ba la'o/_/a tas dmigs kyis ston pa dang /_/nges bstan lnga pa'i don dang byed/_/an+ta tas ni bstan pa dang /_/lnga pa'i don dang sgom yan lag_/rjes shes phra ma gnod pa la'ang /_/a ho/_ngo mtshar
[\[239a.7\]]'dod pa dang /_/skyo dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/rjes su brtse ba dag la'o/_/A rang ring dang nye ba la/_/i tas nges pa cha dag dang /_/lnga pa'i don la yang bshad do/_/a ti rgyu dang rdzogs pa dang /_/gleng gzhi rab dbye gsal byed sogs/_/rjes su 'gugs pa
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]rnams dang ni/_/rnam pa 'on te'i don rnam rtog_/u ni/_'dri dang rnam rtog don/_/ki ni dri dang 'dod pa dag_/ki mu ta ni/_phul byung dang /_/dri dang rnam rtog don la'ang grags/_/ku tas rtogs dang 'dri ba dang /_/lnga pa'i don la yang dran no/_/he ni khyod don sbyin
[\[239b.2\]]byin don/_/me ni bdag don bdag gi ba/_/tu ni rkang pa kha skong dang /_/dbye ba dmigs 'dzin kun sdud pa/_/ta tas dang po yongs su 'dri/_/lnga pa'i don dang gtam bzhin no/_/ta pas bas me chad dang chad/_/mig 'dzin pa dang cung zad yod/_/yongs
[\[239b.3\]]'bebs la'o/_/pab+tsa ta ni/_/nub dang phyi ma la yang ngo /_/pu ra stang ni shar dang /_sngar/_/snga ma'i don dang dang po la/_/pra ti slar sbyin dang po dang /_/so sor nges par 'dzin pa dang /_/gtso bo 'byung dang thob 'dod dang /_/mtshan nyid sogs dang rab sbyor dang /_/
[\[239b.4\]]tsam gyi don dang mngon phyogs dang /_/rab tu gsal dang brjod pa la'ang /_/ba ta skyo dang rtse dang /_smod/_/mgu dang 'bod dang rmad byung la/_/ya tas sgra ni nges pa dang /_/lnga ma'i don dang rnam 'byed la/_/yad+ba ta tri dang rnam rtog la/_/ya ta bdag dang nges bzung
[\[239b.5\]]la/_/sI man/_le'u ka ta ste/_/shwa twata yang dang rtag tu'i don/_/shi ti ni/_dri dang rnam rtog la/_/sa kr-ita lhan cig lan cig la/_/sA k+Shata mngon sum mtshungs pa dag_/swaste smon dge bsod nams dang /_/bde legs bde ba la sogs la/_/han+ta dga'
[\[239b.6\]]dang rjes su brtse /_/dag dang rtsom pa dug la sogs/_/dug sogs bzang ba'i don la yang /_/han+ta'i sgra ni rab tu sbyor/_/a tha/_a tho dge ba dang /_/dri dang rtsom dang the tshom dang /_/bar ma chad la'o a n+ya thA/_/de bzhin min dang rnam gzhan don/_/ta thA/_de 'dra
[\[239b.7\]]nges bstan dang /_/nges dang kun sdud pa dang ni/_/rgyud dang /_skyed par byed pa dang /_/mdor bstan dang ni so so'i dag_/ya thA rjes dpag de 'dra dang /_/nges bstan mdor bstan dag dang ni/_/rgyu dang skyed byed dag la yang /_/dr-i thA nad dang bor ba dang /_/rgyu med
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]mo gsham thams cad du/_/rgyu des dag la blta bar bya/_/ud gtso bo rab gsal dang /_/thar pa 'ching ba steng gi las/_/byu ru thob pa dngos po dang /_/bral ba rang rus nus med la/_/a nu rim pa dman pa dang /_/rjes kyi don dang
[\[240a.2\]]lhan cig don/_/zheng che ba dang nye ba'i don/_/'dra ba mtshan nyid la sogs la/_/ki nu dri dang rnam rtog la/_/na nu dri dang dmigs 'dzin dang /_/'bod pa rjes khrid rjes gnang dang /_/nA nA/_du ma bor don dang /_/gnyi ga'i don rnams la yang ngo /_/ni na/_rtag dang
[\[240a.3\]]nges pa dang /_/ngo mtshar rnam bkod mdor phung po/_/nang gi dngos dang dngos po dang /_/mthong ba dang ni sbyin pa po/_/'ching dang mchog tu zhi ba dang /_/thar dang dge ba/_the tshom dang /_/gnas la'o nu ni/_rjes khrid don/_/gnas dang rigs dang 'dra ba dang /_/
