[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]oM badzra DA ka ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ha ha ha haH_kha kha kha kha/_ya ya ya ya/_a a a aH_ma ma sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha hUM phaT swA hA/_shrI ma da dwa ya pA dA ya badzra yo gi nA ba liH_(26)_oM a ra pa tsa nA ya ku ma ti da ha na dak+ShA ya tsan+t+ra kAn+ta ma Ni pra b+hA ya khaD+ga pusta ka bya grA ha stA ya
[\[259b.2\]]many+dzu bA NI bar/_'jam par gsung ba/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_pra dA ya many+dzu bu d+hi sid+d+hi da dA ya i daM ba liM gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM ma d+hu/_dpal gnyis med zhabs kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/_/sharka rA di sa hi taM 'khor ba sreg par byed pa/_blo gros ngan pa sreg par mkhas pa/_nor bu chu shel gyi 'od can/_ral gri dang_
[\[259b.3\]]glegs bam phyag na bsnams pa/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas dngos grub mchog stsol ba/_ma ma shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+tiM ku ru ku ru/_oM AHd+hIHhUM swA hA/_sbrang rtsi dang ka ra la sogs dang bcas pa/_a ra pa tsa na ba liH/_(19)_oM ma hA shri ye trI hUM hrI oM i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_trai lo kya
[\[259b.4\]]saM sA rA ya dA ri byA ga dzaM bi dA ra ya sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA na b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_a gats+tsha agats+tsha/_b+ha ga ba ti ma ma ni d+hiM de hi swA hA/_mahA shri tA rA ba liH(28)_oM ba ga ba ti ASh+Ta ma hA/_a ra pa tsa na'i gtor ma'o/_/b+ha ya tA ri Ni/_dpal chen mo/_shan+tiM puSh+TiM ba sh+yAM kA ri Na pa ra yan+t+ra
[\[259b.5\]]'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor ba'i dbul ba'i glang po rnam par 'joms ma/_gdug pa dang gdug pa rnams thams cad nyes/_bcom ldan 'das ma bdag la gter stsol cig/_dpal chen sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol la/_zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du mdzad ma/_
[\[259b.6\]]man+t+ra bi ShA tsUr+Na bi nA shi ni ma hA yo ge shwa ri rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo/_/ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+ShAM ku ru aSh+Ta ma hA dA ru Na b+ha ye b+h+ya stA ra ya tA ra ya/_di bya rU pi Ni sau me mu khi i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_swA hA/_aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA ra ba liH/_
[\[259b.7\]]gzhan gyi 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rdug phye ma rnam par sel ma/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung bar mdzod cig_/'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las sgrol cig sgrol cig_/lha'i gzugs can zhi ba'i zhal ma/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba'i gtor ma'o/_(29)_/oM b+ha ga ba ti
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ts+tshin+na ma ste pra shaste/_oM sarba bud+d+ha TA ki nI ye ba dzra bai ro tsa nI ye rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_ma ma bi rud+d+ha rtsi t+ta kA na b+ha smi ku ru sa p+ta pA tA la ga ta sha trun pA da ta laM ku ru sarba tra ma ma shin+tiM pu Sh+Ti rak+ShA ba ra na gu b+ti ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT_
[\[260a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma dbu bcad ma/_rab bsngags ma/_sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/_s+w+'a hA/_tri kA ya badzra yo gi ni bdag la 'gal bar sems pa rnams thal bar mdzod cig/_ba liH/_sa 'og rim bdun du gnas pa'i dgra rnams rkang 'og tu gyis/_thams cad du bdag la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang
[\[260a.3\]]spa bar mdzod/_(30)_oM sarba d+ha rma ba dzrA d+hi kA ra badzra ma hA kA la shA sa na ta la ga ma no pa ka ra ha hUM hriM k+ShiM i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_sarba du Sh+Ta sa tA da ma/_sku gsum rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/_/ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haMhaHphaT swA hA/_oM badzra ma hA kA la ba liH/_(31)_oM ma hA pra t+yaM gi re sarba shu
[\[260a.4\]]b+ha shAn+ti ka re a shI chos thams cad rdo rje lhag par byed pa rdo rje nag po chen po bstan pa'i gzhi la 'gro ba'i yid nye bar byed pa/_ti yo ga sha ta sa ha sra kA ra ri daM ba liM gan+d+haM/_pu Sh+paM/_d+hU paM/_dI paM/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ye na ke na rtsi n+ma ma/_rdo rje nag po chen po'i gtor ma'o/_/phyir bzlog ma chen mo dge ba dang zhi ba kun
[\[260a.5\]]byid ma sbyor ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu byed ma/_yan+t+ra man+t+ra tan+t+ra bi Sha tsU rna pra yo ga di kaM kr-i ku rban+tu taM ta t+sa rbaM ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha/_gardza gardza/_tardza tardza/_ta s+yai ba ma sta ke ni pa ta tu swA hA/_ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra ba liH/_(32)_oM ma hA pra ti sA ri ma hA sA hA sra pra marda ni ma hA mA
[\[260a.6\]]yu ri ma hA/_gang la la dag bdag 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud dang drug gi phye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa byas pa dang byed du bcug pa de thams cad/_de nyid kyi mgo lhung bar gyis shig/_phyir bzlog ma chen mo'i gtor ma'o/_/so so 'brang chen mo/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa/_
[\[260a.7\]]rma bya chen mo/_/shI ta pa ni bsil ba'i tshal chen mo/_/ma hA man+t+ra nu sA ri ni gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma bud+d+hi sh+tsai ba ma hA t+mA no bi d+yA de byo ma hA ba lIH_sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po dang /_/rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen ma/_mA ma kI b+h+r-i ku TI tsai/_mA ma kI dang khro gnyer can/_/btA rA bI tA thAM ku
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]shI badzra shr-iM kha lA shwe tA ta the tsa de bzhin dkar mo dkar chen ma/_ma hA kA lI tsa pU t+ya stsa badzra dU t+ya sta thA ba raH/_/su pA shI badzra pA shI tsa badzra pA Ni rma hA ba lA/_/badzra ma lA ma hA bi d+yA ta thai bA mr-i ta kuN+Da liH/_/a pa rA dzi tA ma hA de bI kA la ka r+NI ma hA ba la/_
[\[260b.2\]]lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu ma/_de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/_nag mo che dang pho nya mo/_/de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan/_/gzhag bzang rdo rje zhags pa ma/_/phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ma/_/rdo rje phreng ba rig ma che/_/de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /_/gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/_/sme ba nag po stobs chen ma/_/
[\[260b.3\]]ta thA d+ha n+ya ma hA b+hA gA pad+ma kuN+Da li re ba tsa/_/pu Sh+pa daN+DI ma ni tsU TA sba n+ya ke shI tsa piM ga lA/_/ma hA te dzA ta thA de bI d+ha n+yA tsa biR+Yu n+mA li nI/_/rA k+Sha s+yai ka dza TI rtse ba bud+d+hA k+Shi ti ka nA yi kAH/_/kA pA li nI ma hA b+hA gA d+ha n+yA lang+ke shwa rI ta thA/_
[\[260b.4\]]de bzhin dpal yon skal chen ma/_/pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid dang yang /_/me tog so ma bcud ster ma/_/gser gyi skra ma dmar ser ma/_/de bzhin lha mo gzi brjid can/_/dpal mo klog gi phreng ldan ma/_/srin mo ral pa gcig ma dang /_/sangs rgyas sa yi 'dren pa mo/_/thod pa can ma skal chen ma/_/de bzhin dpal mo lang+ka'i dbang /_/
[\[260b.5\]]a n+yA sh+tsa ba ha bo bi d+yAHsa twA nu gra ka ri kAH/_tad+ya thA/_kA li ka rA li kum+b+ha n+D-i shaM khi ni/_ka ma lA k+Shi/_hA rI ti/_ha ri ke shi/_shrI ma ti/_ha ri sing+ga le/_lam+be/_pra lam+be/_kA la pA she/_ka la sho da ri/_ya ma du ti/_ya ma rA k+Sha/_
[\[260b.6\]]gzhan yang rig pa mang po ni/_/sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ma/_/'di lta ste/_nag mo mche gtsigs ma grul bum ma dung can ma/_pad+ma'i mig ma/_'phrog ma/_skra ljang gu ma/_dpal ldan ma/_'phrog ma dmar ser ma/_'phyang ma/_rab tu 'phyang ma/_zhags pa nag po/_/bum pa'i lto ma/_gshin rje'i pho nya ma/_gshin rje'i srin mo/_/
[\[260b.7\]]si b+hU ta gra sa ni/_'byung po za byed ma/_pra tI ts+tshe mi gan+daM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM ba liM tsa dA s+yA maM ra k+ShI ku ru/_gtor ma dri dang me tog bdug spos mar me dang ldan pa 'di 'bul gyis bzhes shig srung bar mdzod/_ma ma sarba satwa nA ny+tsa sarba b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yo dzA ba tu/_bdag dang sems can/_
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]thams cad 'jigs pa dang nye bar 'tshe ba 'di las lo brgya 'tsho bar shog cig_/paR+Sha sha taM pa sh+ya tu sa ra dI sha taM/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu ma n+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/_pany+tsa rak+Sha pa liH/_(33)_oM na mo b+ha ga bti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te \u0f85_/mi te ma hA pI te/_ma hA shwe te/_ma hA nI la rat+na pang+ga dza pusta ka ha ste/_
[\[261a.2\]]i maM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM b+huny+dza dzig+h+ra/_oM pi tsu pitsu/_'jam pa 'jam pa/_ston brgya mthong bar shog cig_/gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnams grub par gyur cig_/bsrung ba lnga'i gtor ma'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/_dpag med ma/_ser chen ma/_dkar chen ma/_rin po che'i 'dam skyes sngon po chen pos glegs bam bsnams ma/_
[\[261a.3\]]pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bu d+hi bar+b+ha ni swA hA/_oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye/_d+hIHd+hAr NI yi swAhA/_blo 'dzin ma/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ba liH/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtor ma'o/_(34)/_oM ba su d+hA ri Ni dA ri d+h+ya duHkha b+ha ya ha ri Ni/_
[\[261a.4\]]shes rab 'phel ma/_'bar ma 'bar ma/_yid gzhungs 'phel ma/_blo 'phel ma/_oM d+hIHshru ti smr-i ti ma hA bi dza ye swA hA zer/_thos pa dran pa rnam rgyal ma/_sarba yak+Shi Ni sa me tA shI g+h+raM A gats+tshan+tu/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_nor rgyun ma dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa 'phrog ma/_
[\[261a.5\]]oM d+har Ni d+ha ra Ni swA hA/_ba su d+hA ra ba liH/_(35)_oM pra san+na tA re a mr-i ta mu khi a mr-i ta lo tsa ne/_ma masarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni/_gnod sbyin ma thams cad dang ldan pa myur du tshur byon/_sarba satwAM shaM ka ri/_i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_hUM phaT hrIM hrIM swA hA/_
[\[261a.6\]]pra san+na tA ra ba liH/_nor rgyun ma'i gtor ma'o/_/rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma bdud rtsi'i zhal ma bdud rtsi'i spyan ma/_bdag gi don thams cad sgrub pa/_(36)_/_oM na maH_sha ba ri ku mA rI bi Sha dUSha NI ye/_sems can thams cad bde byed ma/_bi Sha b+hak+Sha NI ye tsA la ya/_saM g+haT+Ta ya/_
[\[261a.7\]]rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/_/man+ta mA taM ga//_glang po myos pa/_a bi d+he he/_dug 'joms ma/_i daM ba li b+huny+dza dzi g+h+ra oM dzAHdzaHswAhA/_ri khrid ma gzhon nu ma dug sun 'byin ma/_AR+YaM gu lI ba liH/_'phags ma sor mo can gyi gtor ma'o/_/dug za byed ma skyod cig/_zung du brdungs shig/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]](37)_oM na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_badzra g+dA n+d+ha R+Ya/_a ne ka sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta te dzA yai u dra kI ra NA/_b+ha yA na kA yai/_a h+ye hi/_tra yANAM rat+nA nAM sa t+ya na de bA dI kaM/_ye tsA n+ye sa ma ye na tiSh+Shi te tA na ba b+hu Shi swA mi shI g+h+ra/_mi daM ba li gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na/_
[\[261b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rjes 'dzin ma/_'od dang gzi brjid brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar ma rab tu 'bar ma 'od zer drag mo/_/'jigs rung ma la/_tshur byon tshur byon/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang lha la sogs pa dang /_gang gzhan dam tshig la gnas pa de rnams snang bar byed pa'i rje mo myur du/_
[\[261b.3\]]oM ma la ma la/_tu lu tu lu/_mu lu mu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_rang+ga rang+ga/_rang+ga ya rang+ga pa ya/_pU ra ya pU ra ya/_A shAM me b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAn+d+hA ri/_sid+d+hi tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_badzra gAn+d+hA ri ba liH/_(38)_oM d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU re/_
[\[261b.4\]]dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_dza yA ba hi ni/_tshos tshos/_tshos shig tshos shig/_gang bar gyis gang bar gyis/_bdag bsam pa bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rjes 'dzin chen mo/_grub pa gtum po phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin gyis/_rdo rjes 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'o/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan/_
[\[261b.5\]]rgyal ba rgyal ba/_rnam par rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba/_rgyal ba thob ma/_ma ma sarba shatrUM dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_ma tha ma tha/_gra sa gra sa/_hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM b+ha ga wAM/_i maM ba liM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_pa ra sai n+yaM bi d+h+wan+sA ya bid+h+wan+sA ya/_sha trUn sha trUn tsa la tsa la tsi li tsi li/_dgra rnams skyod skyod/_
[\[261b.6\]]tu lu tu lu/_ga la ga la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_bdag gi dgra thams cad rmugs par gyis rmugs par gyis/_sarba ta thA ga tA ba lo ki te swA hA/_guN rA dza prA b+hA se swA hA/_tsan+d+rA rka bi ma le swA hA/_sarba nak+Sha tra tsa mi ka ri Ne swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_gzhan gyi dmag rnams rnam par choms choms/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH_swA hA/_d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU rA ba liH/_
[\[261b.7\]](39)_oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti uSh+Ni Sha bi dza ye/_bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs ma/_yon tan rgyal po rab snang ma/_zla ba nyi ma dri med ma/_rgyu skar thams cad gsal bar byed ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnams la/_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gtor ma'o/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ma ma mr-i t+yu nA sha ya nA sha ya/_bi nA shA ya bi nA shA ya/_bi d+h+wan+sA ya pi d+h+wan+sAn+sA ya/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_dI r+g+hA yuSh+ka mi ku ru swA sti swA hA/_uSh+Ni Sha bi dza yA ba liH/_(40)/_oM sid+d+hai ka bI rA ya pI re shA ya ka ru NA pe sha la hr-i da yA ya ni lo twa la hastA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na
[\[262a.2\]]bdag gi 'chi bdag nyams par gyis nyams par gyis/_rnam par nyams par gyis rnam par nyams par gyis/_rnam par choms choms/_bdag gi tshe bsrings shig bde legs gzhi tshugs/_gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma'i gtor ma'o/_/dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa la/_dpa' bo'i dbang po la/_snying rje dang nges pa'i thugs can la/_ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams pa la/_
[\[262a.3\]]tI tA ba b+hu dze shAn+tiM ku ru sarba sid+d+haM ku ru hUM hUM phaT swA hA/_sid+d+hai ka bI ra ba liH/_(41)_/oM ya mAn+ta kA ya ya ma b+hI Sha NA ya hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na nA ya nA gA b+ha ra NA ya trai lo kya bi marda na daN+Da hastA ya sarba mA ra ba la bi nA sha nA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_
[\[262a.4\]]bzung ste longs spyad de/_ma ma big+h+nan ha ra ha ra tsa dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa'i gtor ma'o/_/gshin rje mthar byed/_gshin rje 'jigs par byed pa/_rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can klu'i rgyun can/_'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa/_bdud dpung rnam par 'joms pa/_
[\[262a.5\]]turmA rA na ni bA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_ya mAn+ta ka ba liH/_(42)_/oM big+h+nAn+ta ka la hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la pa rA kra ma i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_ma ma sarba big+h+nAn ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/_b+he da b+he da/_dru taM/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha/_AH
[\[262a.6\]]big+h+nAn kaM ta hUM swA hA/_big+h+nAn+ta ga ba liH/_gshin rje mthar byed kyi gtor ma'o/_/bgegs mthar byed khro bo chen po stobs po che pha rol gnon pa/_(43)_/oM b+ha ga ba ti gra ha mA tri ke sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra b+ha ya nA shi ni sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha di b+ha ya byu yu pa sha ma ni rA dza tsau ra 'i di b+ha ya
[\[262a.7\]]bid+h+wan+sa bgegs mthar byed kyi gtor ma'o/_ni b+ha ga rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'joms ma/_bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum/_gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad sel ma/_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar zhi byed ma/_
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ba ti gra hA mA tr-i ke sarba gra ha nak+Sha trA di b+hiH_shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ma ma sarba big+h+nAn ha ra ha ra/_shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShAny+tsa me ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/_bra ha mA tr-i kA ba liH/(44)_oM na mo lo ka nA thA ya de bA su ra na
[\[262b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum/_gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa thams cad lhan cig tu myur du byon/_ra yak+Sha rAk+Sha de b+hirban+di ta pA da pad+ma ya a she Sha nA ra ka sa twod+d+ha ra gza' yum gyi gtor ma'o/_/'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/Na tsan+tI
[\[262b.3\]]tat+pa pA ya ma hA kA ku Ni kA ya thugs rje chen po can la/_i daM ba liM du g+d+hA di sa hi haM lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang /_gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la phyag bya ba/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_mAMsarba satwA sh+tsa na ra kA di duHkhA dut+ta ra ya khA dut+ta ra ya/_ud+d+ha ra/_
[\[262b.4\]]ud+d+ha ra/_dmyal ba'i sems can ma lus 'don par dgongs pa lhur mdzad pa/_samud+d+ha ra sa mud+d+ha ra/_bud+d+ha sa t+yai na d+harma sa t+yai na saM g+ha sa t+yai na sa t+ya bA de sa t+ya na oM IHhrIHhUM phaT 'o ma sogs dang bcas pa'i gtor ma 'di zung zung /_bdag dang sems can thams cad dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las sgrol sgrol/_
[\[262b.5\]]phyung phyung /_swA hA/_sarba lo ke shwa ra ba lIH/_(45)_oM na maH_kun nas phyung phyung /_sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pas/_shrIkha sar+b+ba NA ya trai lo kya da r+b+ba NA ya/_e kA gra ci t+ta ya/_sa ka la ro ga dA ri d+h+ya duH/_duHkha du ri to pa zer te 'og ma don bzang /_
[\[262b.6\]]'jig rten dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtor ma'o/_/kha dru ta mu pa sha ma nA ya i daM ba liM dug+d+ha di sa hi daM gr-i hI two pa b+hu dz+ya phyag 'tshal dpal mkha' la gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi me long /_shAn+taM puSh+TiM nad dang dbul ba dang /_saMha duH_rak+ShAny+tsa me ku ru oM AH_hrIH
[\[262b.7\]]hUM phaT swA hA/_bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag myur du zhi bar mdzad pa/_bzung ste long spyad nas/_kha sar+p+pa NA ba liH/_mkha' la gshegs pa'i gtor ma'o//_(46)_oM na mo bud+d+ha ya/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_ma hA ka ru NA b+hA ra b+ha
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ri ta hr-i da yA ya/_pa rArma ba tA ga ta tsit+tA ya gzhan gyi don mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i thugs can/_trai d+ha tu kai ka mUr+t+ta ye sa twAr+tha ma hA duHka ra kA ri Ne i daM ba liM di bya gan+d+ha bar+Na ra swa pe taM mu pa b+hu dz+yaM zer te don gcig_/bu byu dz+ya mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsA nut+tA rA yAM samyag+saM
[\[263a.2\]]snying rje chen po'i khur gyis gang ba'i thugs can/_bo d+hau pra tiSh+ThA ba ya oM AH_su ga ta badzra tu Sh+ya khams gsum pa'i sku gcig pu rang gi don don chen po mdzad pa mdzad pa/_lha'i dri dang kha dog dang /_hoHhUM swA hA/_shri bud+d+ha b+hat+ta ra ka ba liH/_rgya dpe gcig na 'di gnyis par bya snang pa/_
[\[263a.3\]]ro dang ldan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes te bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu khod cig_/(47)_oM mr-i t+yu pany+tsa ni tA re kA lA kA la mr-i t+yu ha re dA re d+ya duHkha/_bde gshegs rdo rje dgyes pa/_dpal sangs rgyas rje btsun gyi gtor ma'o/_b+ha yaM ka re aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya ha re
[\[263a.4\]]khaD+gAny+dza na pA du ka b+ha dra g+ha TA di sid+d+hi de/_b+ha ga ba ti tA re i daM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ma ma 'chi ba bslu ba'i sgrol ma/_dus dang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'phrog ma dbul ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa 'jig par byed ma/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad 'phrog ma/_
[\[263a.5\]]ral gri dang mig sman dang lham dang bum pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol ma/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma/_mr-i t+yuM nA sha ya nA sha ya/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_mr-i t+yu pany+tsa nI tA rA ba liH/_(48)_oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_oM
[\[263a.6\]]uts+tshuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la dza len+t+ra ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_ma hA ba su ma me de hi da dA ya swA hA/_sdug bsngal myur du sgrol ba'i sgrol ma/_'chi ba bslu ba'i sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal nor bu bzang po la/_/gnon sbyin sde dpon chen po la/_/
[\[263a.7\]]'chol pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la/_/bdag la nor chen po sbyin du chug cig_/uts+tsu Sh+ma dzam+b+ha la ba liH/_'chol pa rmugs 'dzin gyi gtor ma'o/_/(47)_oM AH_hrIM hUM shuklai ka dza TI/_ral gcig ma dkar mo/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_g+hA Ta ya sarba
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]duSh+TAn hUM phaT swA hA/_sarba mA ra ba la bi nA sha nA shAnA shAr+thaM da d+yA ta/_shuklai ka dza Ti ba liH/_(50)_/oM na maHka ya wAk+tsit+ta b+h+yaH/_karko Ta shaM kha pA la a nan+ta pA su ki tak+Sha ka/_ku li ka pad+ma ma hA pad+me b+h+yo nA ga rA dze b+h+ya i daM pa liM nA no pa ka ra Na duH/_khA/_
[\[263b.2\]]phyis shig gdug pa can thams cad/_rnam par gshegs pa'i phyir du sbyin par bya ste/_ral gcig ma dkar mo'i gtor ma'o/_/phyag 'tshal sku gsung thugs rnams la/_stobs rgyu/_dung skyong mtha' yas dang /_nor rgyas bu dang /_'jog po dang /_rigs ldan pad+ma pad+ma chen po ste klu'i rgyal po rnams nyer spyod dang bcas pa'i gtor ma 'di/_
[\[263b.3\]]sa hi taM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_ma ma na sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/_nA ga ba liH/_(51)_oM na maHshrI mai tre ya nA thA ya/_b+hA bi bi d+yA tsa ra Na sam+pan+na samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_sarba sa twA r+the Na bA bud+d+h+ri t+yA nu t+ta rA yAMsamyak+saM/_dra bi ta tsit+tA ya/_
[\[263b.4\]]i daM ba liM di bya gan+d+ha bar+Na ra so pe daM u pa b+hu dz+ya mAM/_sarba satwaMsh+tsa saM sA duHkhAr+Na bA t+saM klu'i gtor ma'o/_/bo d+hau pra tiSh+ThA pa yi Sh+ya si byams pa mgon po la/_sgom pa'i rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_dud+h+r-i t+yA nut+ta rA lAM samya k+saM zer/_sems can thams cad kyi don gyis brlan
[\[263b.5\]]pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha rdzas kyi dri dang kha dog dang ro dang ldan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes te/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'khod par mdzod cig_/oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/_mai tri ya ba liH/_
[\[263b.6\]](52)_oM in+d+ra dza ma dza la dza dzakla b+hU ta bah+ni bA u rak+kha tsan+d+ra sudz+dza mA da bap+pa tA li aT+Tha sAp+pa swA hA/_i daM ba liM b+huny+dza dzi g+ha phu l+ma d+hU pa mAM sa piM g+ha am+ma sap+pa sA d+ha khAn+ti khu Ni phe Da gA da hUM swA hA/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/_byams pa'i gtor ma'o/_/
[\[263b.7\]]dbang po/_gshin rje/_chu lha/_gnod sbyin/_'byung po/_me lha/_rlung lha/_srin po/_zla ba/_nyi ma/_myos ma/_mthil/_'og na/_sbrul brgyad/_'di snoms/_me tog_/_bdug pa sha//_nya sha bdag gi thams cad bsgrubs bzod par gsol gnod pa sol/_da 'di dpe shas cher mi 'dug/_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]A d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/_shrI he ru ka ba liH/_(53)_/oM sa ha dza sam+ba ra AHhUM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_shI g+h+raM i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_b+huk+t+wA tr-ip+tiM kr-i twA sarba satwA nAM shAn+tiM kr-i twA/_swa s+thA naM gats+tsa gats+tsha swA hA/_shrI sa ha dza sam+ba ra ba liH/_(54)_/oM tA re sarba b+ha
[\[264a.2\]]ya ha re ma ma kr-i te duSh+Ta/_sarba duSh+Ta sa twA na dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_dpal he ru ka'i gtor ma'o/_/lhan skyes sdom pa/_sta m+b+ha ya sta b+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_ma ma shIn+taM ku ru gsol zhing 'thung ste tshims nas sems can thams cad la zhi bar mdzod/_rang gi nang du gshegs/_dpal ldan skyes sdom pa'i gtor ma'o/_/sgrol ma 'jigs pa kun
[\[264a.3\]]'phrog ma/_bdag la byed ma gdug pa can dang rnam par gdug pa'i sems can thams cad/_sarba bi g+ha na shAn+tiM ka re pra kr-i ti pra b+ha swa re/_i daM ba liM pany+tsa mr-i ta sa hi raM gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_puSh+TiM ku ru rak+Sha ba ra Na gup+ti ku ru sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM hUM phaT phaT/_sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ni tA re swA hA/_Ad+ya tA ri ba liH/_
[\[264a.4\]](55)_oM badzra g+haN+Ti AHoM badzra g+haN+Te ra Na ra Na/_pra ra Na pra ra Na/_saM pra ra Na saM pra ra Na/_bgegs kun zhi bar byed ma/_rang bzhin rang 'od/_sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsA ri Ni/_prany+dzA pA ra mi te nA da swa b+ha be/_badzra sa twa hr-i da ya san+to Sha na ka ri hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_rengs byed sgrol ma/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/_/
[\[264a.5\]]sad+d+harma pA ThAr+thaM g+han+daM bA da rdo rje dril bu/_'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur/_yan+na ne na man+t+re na da d+yA ta/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rab tu rgyu bar byed ma/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin/_rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kun tu mnyes par byed ma/_dI pa d+hU paM gan+d+he nai bi d+ya puSh+pa tAm+bu
[\[264a.6\]]laM tsa ya thA bi d+hi mA dA taM bya/_ta taHkr-i to baH_sarba satwAr+tha i t+yA di nA/_oM badzra muHswa he t+ya dam pa'i chos klog pa'i don gyis dril bu gsil zhing sngags 'dis dbul bar bya zhing /_ne na bi sardza ye ta/_sad+d+har+m+ma ba liH/_(56)_/_oM bra h+mA d+yA de ba tAH_sarbe in+da d+ya/_mar me dang bdug pa dang dri dang zhal zas dang me tog dang so rtsi
[\[264a.7\]]yang cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /_oM badzra muHswA hA zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/_dam pa'i chos kyi gtor ma'o/_tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang dbang po la sogs pa bdag bsrung ba'i klu dang /_
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ma ma rak+Sha kAHnA ga_/gan+d+ha yak+Sha sh+tsa saM tristA ba li nA sa dA/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/_sarba kArmI ka ba liH/_(57)_/oM AHrA hu kA mA g+ni tsan+d+ra sUmaM ga la bu d+ha br-i haspa ti shu kra ke tu she ni sh+tsa re b+h+yo nya \u0f85b+h+yaH/_
[\[264b.2\]]dri za dang gnod sbyin rnams rtag tu gtor mas tshim par mdzod/_tsa de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan+d+harbA su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra gA di b+h+ya i daM ba liM las thams cad pa'i gtor ma'o/_/sgra gcan/_dus me/_zla ba/_nyi ma/_bkra shis gza' lhag_/phur bu/_pa sangs/_mjug rings/_spen pa/_
[\[264b.3\]]gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_hUM phaT swA hA/_sarba gra ha ba liMH/_gzhan yang /_lha klu/_gnod sbyin/_dri za/_lha ma yin nam mkha' lding /_mi 'am ci/_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams/_(58)_/oM ma hA sA ha sra pra marda ni bi d+yA radz+nyi sarba sha trUM bi dA ra Ni ma ma sarba sa twA nany+tsa shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru
[\[264b.4\]]pa sh+yaM ku ru sarba da nA ga gan+b+harbA/_gza' thams cad kyi gtor ma'o/_/su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra ga b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA dI na da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/_dgra thams cad rnam par 'joms ma/_bi d+h+wA n+sa ya ma hA
[\[264b.5\]]sA ha sra pra mard nI i daM ba liM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na maM sarba satwAM sh+tsa rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_ma hA sA ha sra pra mardi ni ba liH/_(59)_/oM ma hA mA yu ri bi d+yA rA dz+nyi sarba bi Sha pra sha ma ni ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan+d+harbA su ra
[\[264b.6\]]ga ru Da/_kin+na ra ma ho ra gA d+Yu pa dra bA na ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_gardza ya gardza ya/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i gtor ma'o/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/_dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/_i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_mAM sarba
[\[264b.7\]]satwAM sh+tsa rak+Sha rak+Sha/_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i he bar 'tshe ba rnams/_hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_ma hA mA yu ri bA liH/_rma bya chen mo'i gtor ma'o/_/(60)_/_oM ma hA shI ta ba ni bi d+yA rA dz+nyi sarba duSh+Ta pra marda ni rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba tshal chen po gdug pa thams cad rab tu 'joms ma/_ma ma sarba
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]satwA nAny+ta shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA di na mA ra ya mA ra ya kA ra ya kA ra ya kA ra ya tardza ya tardza ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na rak+Sha rak+Sha hUm hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_mahA shAti ba ni ba liH/_(61)_oM ma hA pra ti sa re sarba bi d+ya d+hi pa te i daM liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa shAn+tiM ku
[\[265a.2\]]ru puSh+TiM ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa dI na mA ra ya mA ra ya marda ya marda ya mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa/_rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_ma hA pra ti sa rA ba liH/_bsil ba tshal chen mo'i gtor ma'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so so 'brang chen mo/_(62)_/oM ma hA man+t+ra nu pA ri Ni i d+yu pa dra bA nA shi ni i daM
[\[265a.3\]]ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba twA nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+TiM ku ru pa sh+yaM ku ru ma ma sarba sha truM mA ra ya mA ra ya hrIM haHhUM phaT swA hA/_ma ha man+t+ra nu pA ri NI ba liH/_so so 'brang chen mo'i gtor ma'o/_(63)_/kr-i ti ri ya mA tsaR+Ya su ma ti siM ha pA dA nAM ba li mA li kA sa mAp+ta/_gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma/_yams dang nye bar
[\[265a.4\]]'tshe ba sel ma/_gtor ma 'di zung zung /_bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi bar mdzod/_rgyas par mdzod/_dbang du mdzod/_gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'o/_/slob dpon blo bzang seng ge'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i gtor ma'i phreng ba 'di rdzogs so//_//bde bar gshegs pa'i ring lugs dam
[\[265a.5\]]pa mchog tu gces spras mdzad pa'i rje btsun mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi zhal snga nas dang /_sa skyong chos kyi spyan ldan gyi bka' bzhin rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dge slong d+harmA dI paM ka ra dang /_lo tsA ba d+harmA pa la b+ha dras dpal e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur ba'o//_//![{D4457}]bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa skye ba
[\[265a.6\]]dran ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo b+ha ga wa te sid+d+hi sid+d+he mo tsa ni mo k+Sha Ni muk+t+re a ma le bi ma le nirma le aN+Da re paN+Da re mang+ga laM/_hi ra N+ye gar+b+he sarba trA pra ti ha te swA hA/_gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang ston pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_gzungs 'di'i mthus de bskal ba brgyad
[\[265a.7\]]khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa dgu khrir gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa skye ba dran pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya dpe gser gyis bris pa las d+harmA b+ha dras bsgyur ba'o//_//[{D4458}]#/_/tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel ba gsar
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'gyur ba zhugs/_/@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsan+d+ra byA ka ra Na baN+Di sU tra Ni br-itrIH/_bod skad du/_lung ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu rgyal dka' bdud kyi stobs bcom ste/_/rnyed dka'i go 'phang nyams pa med brnyes pa/_/gzhan don legs
[\[265b.2\]]mdzad rgud pa mi mnga' ba'i/_/mi mchog kun mkhyen de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/sgra yi bstan bcos mngon par mi shes shing /_/rang gi don ni tshol bar 'dod pa la/_/yi ge'i mdo yi rnam par 'grel pa ni/_/bdag gis mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya/_/bdud kyis nyer sgyur skye bo ngan/_/yid ni phrag
[\[265b.3\]]dog gis bcom phyir/_/yon tan skyon dag mi shes pas/_/skyon med pa yang rtag tu skyon/_/skye bo dam pa ring nas bcom na yang /_/da ltar gzhan kyi skyon dag rgyas mi byed/_/skye dgu rnams la nam yang mi brnyas pa'i/_/yon tan phyogs su lhung ba der phyag 'tshal/_/de la re
[\[265b.4\]]zhig dang por sgra'i mtshan nyid nye bar brjod par bya ba ni/_/nam mkha' rlung las byung dang lus las dang /_/brjod dang kha dang nye ba nA da ste/_gnas gzhan rnams su dbye bar byed pa yis/_/yi ge nyid du 'byung gang sgra yin no/_/nam mkha' dang rlung dang zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang
[\[265b.5\]]rlung dag las de dag 'byung ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de nam mkha' 'gyur rnyed zhig na/_nam mkha' rlung las rab tu byung zhing lus las ni/_/yang dga'i ma pas gyen bskyod kha nang sgra ring 'di/_/gnas rnams de ma thag par rab tu rnam rtsol ldan/_/yi ge nyid du kun du 'gro ba gang de'i sgra/_/zhes pa snang ste 'gyur mi bde/_dang rlung las
[\[265b.6\]]byung ba'o/_/yang na nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung ba ni skye ba ste skye'o zhes pa'i don to/_/lus las zhes pa ni lus kyi phyogs gcig lte ba'i phyogs las so/_/brjod pa zhes pa ni yang dag par steng nas phyir 'byung ba'i bar du 'gro'o zhes pa'o/_/kha dang nye ba ni 'ong ba ste thob
[\[265b.7\]]po zhes pa'i don no/_/ci yis de ni nA da'i sgrar 'gyur zhe na mi gsol ba'i sgra zhes pa'o/_/gnas gzhan rnams ni brgyad de/_khog pa/_mgrin pa/_spyi bo/_lce rtsa/_so/_sna/_mchu/_rkan rnams te/_de skad du'ang /_yi ge'i gnas ni brgyad yin te/_/khog pa mgrin pa spyi bo
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dang /_/de bzhin lce rtse so dang sna/_/mchu dag dang ni rkan rnams so/_/de rnams kyang gang la ma ltos pa'i gnas gzhan du brjod pa'o/_/khog pa'i gnas ni mgrin pa la ma ltos pa'i gnas te gnas gzhan mgrin pa'i gnas las mi brjod pas khog
[\[266a.2\]]par blta'o/_/gnas gzhan rnams kyang gzhan kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/des na de nyid gnas gzhan rnams su dbye bar byed pas so sor bya ba yin no/_/gang yi ge a yig la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs su 'byung ba de ni sgra zhes gsal bar rtogs par bya'o/_/sgra gang gi mtshan nyid nye
[\[266a.3\]]bar brjod pa de ni spyi'i bdag nyid do/_/ci ste yi ge de rnams ci las skye bar 'gyur zhe na smras pa/_gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams las yi ge rnams skye'o zhes pa ste/_gnas ni sngar bshad pa'i khog pa dang mgrin pa la sogs pa'o/_/byed pa ni lce'i rtsa ba la sogs
[\[266a.4\]]pa'o/_/rtsol ba ni 'phrad pa la sogs pa'o/_/gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba ni/_gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams so/_/de rnams las yi ge a yig la sogs pa rnams skye ba ste mngon par 'byung ba'o/_/de rnams kyi nang nas yi ge rnams
[\[266a.5\]]ci/_gnas ni ci/_rtsol ba ni ci/_rnam par gzhag pa ci zhe na/_smras pa/_de la zhes pa ni nges gzung la bdun pa ste/_re zhig gnas rnam par bshad pa'ang 'di'o zhes bsams pa'o/_/a ku ha rnam par bcad pa rnams kyi mgrin pa'o/_/mgrin pa las byung ba ni mgrin pa'i
[\[266a.6\]]gnas te mgrin pa'i gnas nas brjod pa'o/_/de dag ci zhe na/_a ku ha rnam par bcad pa rnams so/_/a ni a yig go/_/ku ni ka sde'o/_/ha ni ha yig go/_/rnam par bcad pa'i yang a sbyar ba ni brjod pa'i rten no/_/de rnams mgrin pa'i gnas las 'byung bar shes par
[\[266a.7\]]bya'o/_/ita eta ai ta rnams kyi mgrin pa dang rkan no/_/rkan las gyur pa ni rkan can no/_/mgrin pa dang rkan dang zhes pa ni mgrin rkan gyi gnas so/_/ci rnams kyi zhe na ita ni i yin no/_/eta ni e yin no/_/ita ni i yin no/_/ita eta aita de rnams so/_/ta pha rol
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]tu byed pa ni brjod bde ba'i don du'o/_/uta ota auta rnams kyi mgrin mchu'o/_/mgrin pa dang mchu ni mgrin mchu'i gnas so/_/uta ni ci zhe na u yig go/_/ota ni i yig go/_/auta ni au yig go/_/uta auta ste de rnams so/_/ta pha rol tu byed pa tsam kyang snga
[\[266b.2\]]ma bzhin no/_/ri Tu ra Sha rnams kyi spyi bo'o/_/r-i ni r-i yin no/_/Tu ni Ta sde'o/_/ra ni re pa'o/_/Sha ni Sha yig gi don no/_/r-i Tu ra Sha rnams kyi gnas ni spyi bo'o/_/'dir sngon med pa bsam par bya ba ni 'di yin te zhes re pha 'di ra yig gi dang po'am 'on te dbus sam
[\[266b.3\]]mthar gnas/_de la gal te re zhig dang por dam 'cha' na/_ag+gir/_r-i ta dr-i Sh+ye zhes pa 'di la r-i yig de/_gang ni dang por zhes pa 'di'i phyir/_asniH_ste r-i ta ces pa 'di la/_ra'i ra la zhes pa 'dis dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yang yang na ra
[\[266b.4\]]dbyi bas ring bor thal lo/_/de'i phyir dang bor mi spyor te/_'on te/_mthar nges par gzung ba de ltar yod na/_ho tri ra than+ta ri zhes pa 'dir/_ra'i ra la dbyi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de yang ma yin no/_/de nas nges par bya ba ni de bzhin du/_nr-i NAM zhes pa 'dir mtshon
[\[266b.5\]]bya ra Sha las na'i Na'o zhes pa 'dir mtshon bya ra Sha las na'i Na'o zhes pa'i sbyor ba 'dis Na nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes so /_/bar du mi thob pa kho na yod pa 'di ni ma nges pa'i gnas kyi bya ba'i dbang las kyang rnam par shes so/_/des na ji ltar bya ba rnams bsgrub pa'i skyon
[\[266b.6\]]rnams kyang spang bar bya'o/_/dper na bya rog lta ba bzhin du 'di khas blang bar bya ste/_bya rog lta bar byed pa de ni nang dgang gi logs lta bar byed pa de dang de nyid du 'di'i dbang po 'gro'o/_/de skad du'ang /_dang por am+biHr-i ti mthong /_/de nas ho tri ra than bzhag_/
[\[266b.7\]]bar du rw-i NAM gzhag par bya/_/de phyir bya rog lta bzhin brjod/_/ces so/_/so no l-i tu la sa rnams kyi'o/_/l-i ni l-i yin no/_tu ni ta sde'o/_/la ni la yig go/_/sa ni sa yig go/_/l-i tu la sa rnams so/_/'di rnams kyi gnas ni so yin par rtogs par
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bya'o/_/sna ni rjes su nga ro'i 'o/_/i zhes pa rjes su nga ro ste zla ba phyed pa can no/_/de'i gnas ni sna'o/_/nga nya Na na ma rnams ni rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan no/_/rang gi zhes pa ni mgrin pa rkan/_spyi so/_mchu dag go/_/
[\[267a.2\]]gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang dag sna dang rjes su 'brel ba'i mtha' can nam/_rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan pa'o/_/nga yig gi rang gi gnas ni mgrin pa ste/_ka sde yin pa'i phyir ro/_/nya yig gi rang gnas ni rkan te/_tsa sde yin pa'i phyir ro/_/Na
[\[267a.3\]]yig gi rang gi gnas ni spyi bo ste Ta sde yin pa'i phyir ro/_/na yig gi rang gi gnas ni so ste/_ta sde yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ma yig gi rang gi gnas ni mchu dag ste/_pa sde yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du bshad par 'gyur ba ni/_da yig la sogs pa re re
[\[267a.4\]]'ang /_mgrin pa la sogs pa re re'i gnas nye bar mtshon pas na/_gnas zhes pa'o/_/i tsu ya sha rnams kyi rkan no/_/i ta ni i yig go/_/tsu ni tsa sde'o/_/ya ni ya yig go/_/sha ni sha yig go/_/de rnams i tsu ya sha rnams so/_/de rnams kyi gnas ni rkan
[\[267a.5\]]no/_/mchu dag ni u dang pu dang mchu dang nye ba can rnams kyi'o/_/u ni u yig go/_/pu ni pa sde'o/_/mchu dang nye bar can ni pa yig dang pha yig gi steng du bzhag pa'i yi ge glang po che'i bum pa'i rnam pa can no/_/'di ni mchu dang nye ba can te mchu las 'byung bar blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[267a.6\]]so dang mchu ni wa yig gi'o/_/so dang mchu ste wa yig gi gnas su rtogs par bya'o/_/de ltar yi ge'i rim pa ji lta bas gnas kyi spros pa mngon par brjod de/_byed pa nas brtsams nas smras pa/_byed pa ni lce'i rtsa ba can gyi lce'i rtsa ba'o zhes pa la sogs
[\[267a.7\]]pa'o/_/ka yig dang kha yig dag gi steng du bzhag pa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa'i yi ge'o/_/lce'i rtsa ba can de'i byed pa ni lce'i rtsa bas byed do/_/'dis ni 'di'i byed pa dang gnas kyang 'di nyid du rtogs par bya'o/_/lce dbus rnams kyi ni rkan gyi gnas las
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]byung ba sngar bshad pa rnams kyi lce'i dbus byed par gzung ngo /_/lce'i rtse mo dang nye ba ni/_/spyi bo las byung ba rnams kyi'o/_/spyi bo'i gnas nas byung ba rnams kyi ni/_lce'i rtse mo dang nye ba goms pa ste/_rtse mo dang nye ba ni byed par rtogs par bya'o/_/so las byung ba
[\[267b.2\]]rnams kyi ni lce'i rtse mo'o/_/lce rtse'i mtha' thug pa ni so'i gnas las byung ba rnams kyi byed par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni rang gi gnas kyi byed pa can no/_/gang lhag ma rnams kyi byed pa ni rang gi gnas kho na byed pa ste rang gi gnas byed pa yin pa 'dis ni byed pa bzhi
[\[267b.3\]]mngon par sgrub pa gzhan ma bshad pa'i gnas las byung ba rnams rang gi gnas kho na las rtogs par bya'o/_/de ltar byed pa mngon par brjod nas rtsol ba nye bar bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/_rtsol ba rnam pa gnyis te zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_ches rab tu 'bad pas na rtsol ba
[\[267b.4\]]ste byed pa rnams kyi nang du gtogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par las nges par byung ba'i rang bzhin te/_nam du'ang 'di'i rang bzhin mtha' dag par nges par mi nus so/_/des na 'dir yang de bzhin kho nar rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya zhes pa'o/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_ji ltar zhe na/_nang
[\[267b.5\]]dang phyi rol gyi rab tu byed pa gnyis so/_/nang ni nang du 'jug pa'i byed pa'i nang du son par ro/_/de las bzlog pa ni phyi rol lo/_/de la'i sgra ni 'dir nges gzung la 'jug go/_/nang ni ji srid ma nor ba brjod do zhes pa de srid du'o/_/nang gi rtsol ba 'di la'ang btsums pa dang phye ba dang phrad
[\[267b.6\]]pa dang cung zad phrad pa'i dbye bas phye ba rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/btsums pa ni a yig gi'o/_/mgrin pa phye ba ma yin pas brjod pa ni btsums pa ste/_a yig gi yin par bzhag go/_/de las phye ba ni dbyangs rnams dang dro ba rnams kyi'o/_/phye ba zhes pa ni mgrin pa ma bsdams
[\[267b.7\]]pas brjod pa'i yi ge A yig dang e yig dang o yig ste/_dbyangs yig rnams dang sde pa'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang sha Sha sa ha rnams te dro ba rnams so/_/de rnams las phye ba nyid ni eta aita dag gi'o/_/de rnams las kyang lhag par phye ba ni/_e yig dang ai yig dag
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]gi'o/_/de dag las ota auta dag gi'o/_/e yig dang i yig de rnams las kyang ches cher phye ba ni/_o yig dang au yig dag go/_/de dag las kyang A yig gi'o/_/o yig dang au yig de dag las kyang lhag par phye ba yin pa
[\[268a.2\]]A yig gi'o/_/phrad pa ni reg pa rnams kyi'o/_/phrad pa ni gnas gang du yi ge de rnams mthon por brjod pa rtsol ba chen pos btsir nas 'phrad pa de rnams te/_ka sde dang /_tsa sde dang /_Ta sde dang /_ta sde dang /_pa sde rnams su bshad pa ni phrad pa mngon par brjod
[\[268a.3\]]do/_/cung zad phrad pa ni mthar gnas kyi'o/_/bshad ma thag pa las bzlog pa/_mthar gnas te/_ya ra la wa rnams nang du cung zad phrad pa mngon par brjod do/_/phyi rol ni sde pa rnams kyi dang po dang gnyis pa rnams dang sha dang Sha dang sa dang rnam par bcad pa dang lce rtsa can
[\[268a.4\]]dang mchu dang nye ba'ang phyi rol du byung ba ni phyi'i rtsol ba'o/_/ci rnams kyi zhe na/_sde pa lnga po rnams kyi dang po dang gnyis pa rnams te/_ka kha tsa tsha Ta Tha ta tha pa pha zhes bya ba de rnams dang /_gang yang sha yig dang /_Sha yig dang sa yig dang rnam par bcad pa dang lce rtsa
[\[268a.5\]]can dang mchu dang nye ba can rnams kyang ste/_khyad par ci zhe na/_mgrin pa phye bas sgra rjes su rtogs pa ni sgra med pa rnams yin la/_phye ba ni mgrin pa'i bu ga ma bsdams pas brjod pa gang dag mgrin pa phye bas sgra rjes su ste/_phyi nas grag pa gang yin pa de rnams ni
[\[268a.6\]]sgra rjes su rtogs pa'o/_/sgra zhes bya ba'i yon tan gang la med pa de rnams sgra med rnams so/_/dang po dang gsum pa rnams dang /_lnga pa rnams dang mthar gnas rnams srog chung ba'o/_/gang sde pa rnams kyi dang po dang gsum pa dang lnga pa rnams te/_ka ga nga tsa dza
[\[268a.7\]]Ta Da Na ta da na pa ba ma zhes bya ba rnams so/_/gang yang mthar gnas ya ra la wa 'di rnams thams cad srog chung ba rnams nyid do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung 'di rnams la chung zhing phra bas so/_/cig shos rnams srog che ba'o/_/cig shos ni sngar ma
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]brjod pa'i sde pa lnga'i gnyis pa rnams dang bzhi pa rnams te/_kha g+ha tsha p+ta Tha d+ha pha b+ha zhes bya ba rnams so/_/sha Sha sa ha 'di rnams kyang brjod ma thag pa las bzlog pa sa nges par gzung ngo /_/gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa rjes su nga ro dang bcas pa rnams dang
[\[268b.2\]]mthar gnas dang ha yig rnams so/_/sde pa lnga'i gsum pa rnams dang bzhi pa rnams dang lnga pa rnams te/_ga g+ha nga dza dz+ha nya Da D+ha Na da d+ha na ba b+ha ma zhes bya ba rnams rjes su nga ror bcas pas rjes su nga ro dang bcas pa'i ya yig dang re pha dang la yig dang wa yig dang ha yig
[\[268b.3\]]rnams kyang ste/_mgrin pa btsums pas sgra rjes su rtogs pa 'di dag ni sgra dang ldan pa'o/_/btsums pa ni phye ba ma yin pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin yin la/_sgra'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir sgra ldan no/_/gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang sha Sha sa rnams dro ba'o/_/gang dag
[\[268b.4\]]sde pa lnga'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa ste/_gnyis pa dang bzhi pa rnams ni kha g+ha tsha dz+ha Tha zwa tha d+ha pha b+ha rnams su mngon par brjod pa rnams dang sha Sha sa ha rnams kyang ste/_'di dag thams cad dro ba nyid kyi yon tan dang ldan pas dro ba rnams kyi ming can du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ni phyi'i
[\[268b.5\]]rtsol ba'o/_/de ltar bar ma chad du brjod pa de rnams ni phyi'i rtsol bar rig par bya'o/_/'dir yang a yig ni thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po zhes pa rnam pa gsum du dbye'o/_/'dir zhes pa yi ge'i rab tu byed pa 'di la ste/_a yig ni a'i yi ge'o/_/de yang
[\[268b.6\]]thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po'i rab tu byed pas gsum mo/_/dbye ba ni/_eta dang ita tu 'gyur ro/_/bar+Na smos pas gnas skabs thams cad du ldan pa nyid de/_a'i rigs 'dzin zhing /_de ltar gzhan du'ang ngo /_/te te la u dAt+ta dang /_a nu dAt+ta dang swa ri tas
[\[268b.7\]]phye ba dang rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pas rjes su sna ldan med pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/te te ba ste/_thung ngu la sogs pa re re la u dAt+ta dang a nu dAt+ta dang swa ri tas phye bas rnam pa gsum du dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/thung ngu la sogs pa re re po de nyid slar yang rjes su
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]sna ldan dang bcas pa dang rjes su sna ldan med pa nyid kyis nyams su phye bas de ltar gsum po rnams so sor rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa drug po ni bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar i'i yi ge dang u'i yi ge dang r-i'i yi ge'ang ngo /_/ji ltar
[\[269a.2\]]a yig la thung ngu la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa phye bas rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ba de ltar e yig la sogs pa'i yi ge'ang dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/lo'i yi ge la ring po yod pa ma yin te/_de nas rnam pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/l-i yig thung ngu dang shin tu ring
[\[269a.3\]]por phye bas bcu gnyis kho na yin te/_ring por dbye ba'i rab tu byed pa drug pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams la thung ngu yod pa ma yin te/_de na de rnams kyang rnam pa bcu gnyis rnams su 'gyur ro/_/e yig la sogs pa yi ge bzhi rnams ni mtshams
[\[269a.4\]]sbyor yi ge rnams te/_de la'ang thung ngu drug rnams med pas ring po dang shin tu ring po rgyas par bya bas re re la bcu gnyis kho na'o/_/yi ge gnyis rnams kyang ngo /_/kyang gi sgra ni mtshams sbyor yi ge rnams su mngon par 'brel lo/_/de rnams kyang yi ge re re ba nyid du 'gyur
[\[269a.5\]]ro/_/ci a yig dag dang r-i yig dang lo yig rnams kyi ches gzhan pa tshogs pa la e yig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du e yig dag kyang i yig ste 'di dag kyang u yig dang U yig rnams kyi ches gzhan pa tshogs pa la o yig tu 'gyur ba yod pa de bzhin du o yig kun tu brjod pa
[\[269a.6\]]la'ang au yig go/_/'di dag i yig dang A+e yig dang /_U yig dang /_u yig rnams kyi cig shos phrad pa la'ang e yig dang o yig dag 'byung ba yod pa ma yin nam zhe na/_yod pa bden te/_de rnams e yig dang o yig smos pas gzung ba'i phyir 'di dag so sor
[\[269a.7\]]brjod do/_/phyi mo gcig pa thung ngu'o/_/thung ngu'i yi ge ni phyi mo gcig can du bstan to/_/phyi mo gnyis pa ring po'o/_/ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa can du brjod do/_/phyi mo gsum pa d+lu ta'o/_/phyi mo gnyis pa'i rigs pas p+lu ta mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/_/mthon po rnams kyis u dAt+ta'o/_/gang dag
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]nga ro mthon pos mngon par brjod pa'i yi ge de ni u dAt+ta'o/_/dma' ba rnams kyis a nu dAt+ta'o/_/yi ge gang gi nga ro dma' bas brjod par bya ba de ni a nu dAt+ta'o/_/de dag par ma swa ri ta'o/_/u dAt+ta dang /_a nu dAt+ta de dag las/_bar ma'am bsdus pa dang
[\[269b.2\]]ro mnyam pa ni swa ri tar 'gyur ba nyid de/_de'i tshe 'dis mngon par brjod pa las mtho ba dang dma' ba'i nga ro ma gtogs pa'i nga ros yi ge gang mngon par brjod par byed pa de ni swa ri tar brjod do/_/rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan dang rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[269b.3\]]rang gi ni bdag nyid kyi gnas dang /_sna dang ldan pa'i gnas ni yi ge gang /_/rang gi gnas kyi rjes su sna dang ldan pa dang /_rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa ni sna'i gnas dang bral ba'o/_/mthar gnas ni rab tu dbye ba gnyis pa'o/_/rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis
[\[269b.4\]]rtogs pa/_ya ra la wa rnams so/_/ci ltar zhe na/_rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa dang /_rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa rnams kyang ste sngar smos pa bzhin no/_/phrag dog ser snas rig pa yi/_/rjes su legs par 'brang ba dag_/yang dag lta ba'i dngos po yi/_/mtshan nyid
[\[269b.5\]]mi ldan dor bar bya/_/gang phyir gzhan gyi don tshol ba'i/_/bla ma'i mkhyen pa las thob pa/_/mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i/_/dge ba blang bya nyid yin no/_/gang 'dir yi ge'i mdo ni 'grel byas pa'i/_/dge ba cung zad bsags pa de dag gis/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen
[\[269b.6\]]por 'phyan gyur pa'i/_/skye bo'i sdug bsngal sbyor ba zhi gyur cig_/lung ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//_//'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag snyan grags kyi gdugs dkar po dri ma med pa gcig gis khebs pa dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i slob dpon
[\[269b.7\]]chen bo tsan+d+ra go mi'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa ste/_sngon bod du ma 'gyur snang bas/_gangs can gyi skye bo kun gyi mig gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa zha lu lo tsA ba chen po d+har+m+ma pA la b+ha dra'i bka' drin las rnam dpyod kyi skal ba'i cha shas thob pa skyogs ston lo tsA'i ming tsam 'chad pa ngag
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dbang rin chen bkra shis dpal bzang pos 'dzin byed ces bya ba me pho phyi ba'i rgyal can gyi nya la dpal gra thang gi gzims khang du bla ma dam pa nyid kyis bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin dpang lo chen po'i phyag dpe rgya dpe las bsgyur cing ma rtogs
[\[270a.2\]]pa dang log par rtogs pa thams cad rje lo tsA ba chen po'i gsung la gtugs nas dag par byas pa'o/_/slar yang kha ra zhes bya ba lcags mo yos kyi dbo'i zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa la nyang po'i yul gyi ljongs phrag zur du gdong gi dpal kar+m+ma pa'i chos kyi sde
[\[270a.3\]]chen po 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su rgya dpe la gtugs te bsgyur ba po nyid kyis cung zad zhus shing gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni sgra rig smra ba A nan+da badzra zhes bya ba'o/_/'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang lus can dpag tu med pa la phan par gyur
[\[270a.4\]]cig_/[{D4459}]@/_/sdeb spyor rin chen 'byung gnas stag tshang lo tsha bas bsgyur ba bzhugs so//_//rgya gar skad du/_ts+tshan+da rat+na a ka ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/_'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[270a.6\]]sdod rnams yon tan yin/_/tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de la yang /_/br-it+ta dzA ti zhes rnam gnyis/_/yi ge bgrang ba br-it+ta ste/_/phyi mo bgrang ba dzA ti yin/_/gsal byed rnams ni sum cu bdun/_/'dir ni dbyangs yig nyi shu gnyis/_/'di rnams yi ge lnga bcu dgu/_/dbyangs

[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gar bsgyur bud med lha yi lus/_/dbang po me nus rtse mo thob/_/gsum gyi thog ma lci ba b+ha/_/dbus lci dza yin mtha' lci sa/_/thams cad lci ba ma zhes bya/_/thog ma yang ba ya yin te/_/dbus yang ra dang mtha' snga ta/_/thams cad yang ba na te brgyad/_/
[\[270b.2\]]thog ma bar mtha' kun lci ba/_/b+ha dang dza dang sa dang ma/_/thog ma bar mtha' kun yang ba/_/ya dang ra dang ta dang ni/_/bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad do/_/drug pa nas brtsams re re 'phel/_/rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs byed/_/dbyangs sgrog rab dga' rjes
[\[270b.3\]]bsngags dang /_/br-i ha tI dang 'phreng ldan dang /_/de bzhin gsum bsngags zhes bya'o/_/skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod dang /_/bstan 'dzin rnams la so sor ni/_/re re'ang phyi mar shin tu'o/_/byed ldan dag pa'o rab dang kun/_/rnam dang legs dang shin tu dang /_/lhag
[\[270b.4\]]pa rnams las phyi mo yang /_/de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/_/mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/_br-it+ta rnam pa gsum du rab bshad bya/_/de ni dbus phra sogs dang nye bkra sogs/_/kha sgo la sogs rnams dang go rims bzhin/_/'dod pa rnams kyi
[\[270b.5\]]gnas pa sdod/_/'gram pa'i rdul sel mig mdzes ma/_/rna ba'i ut+pal nyams byed dang /_/yon tan zung byas gtsug na bzlas/_/zhabs sen zer la rab tu 'dud/_/tshogs chen stug por gyur pa la/_/gang gi rgyal mtshan tog dag gi/_/grags pa 'phro ba 'di nyid
[\[270b.6\]]ni/_/sa skyong nyid du rnam par bshad/_/rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' la'o/_/b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/_/rkang pa so so rnams la ni/_/lci ba ba yin yang ba ka_/gal te ta ya dbus phra ba'o/_/gzhon nu rol pa dza sa ga_/1_/lci yang bzhi pa de 'dra mtshungs/_2_/la ga bzhi
[\[270b.7\]]pa de gzhal dpag_/3_/gal te/_b+ha ga gnyis rkang bkra/_4/gal te ma gzung klog 'phreng /_5_/b+ha las ta dang la dang ni/_/ga rnams yod pa bram ze'i bu/_1_/gal te ra las na dang ni/_/sa dag yod pa gshol gdong ngo /_2_/na gnyis dang ni ma yod pa/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]lag 'gro khye'u'i bu yin no/_1_/ma dang sa dang dza dang ga_/dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/_2_/ma dang na dang ya rnams las/_/lci ba nges par 'khar rdar bshad/_2_/ra dang dza dang ra rnams ni/_/ga rnams rma bya'i 'gros yin no/_/4_/
[\[271a.2\]]gang la b+ha dang ma dang sa/_/gang yod de ni gser ldan no/_5_/ma dang b+ha dang sa dang gas/_/bskyed ma myos mar shes par bya/_1_/ta las dza gnyis ga dang ga_/zhes pa 'di ni nye ra 'khod 'gyur/_2_/gal te ta gnyis dza dang ni/_/lci gnyis dbang po'i rdo rje'o/_2_/dza dang ta

[\[271a.4\]]ga gnyis pa/_/de ni 'dod pa 'jo ba'o/_6_/ma dang ba dang ra gnyis pa/_/rig byed 'jig rten shA li nI/_7_/gal te ma dang ba dang sa/_/ra dang ba ni chu rlabs 'phreng /_8_/ma dang ba dang na dag dang /_/ba ni bung ba rol pa'o/_9_/ra las pha rol na dang ni/_/ra la ga
[\[271a.5\]]rnams shing rta dregs/_10_/ra dang na dang b+ha dang ga_/rnams dang lci bar legs 'ongs so/_11/na dang na dang sa dang ga_/ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/_12_/na dang na dang ra dang la/_/ga zhes bya ba bzang ldan nyid/_13_/ra dang dza dang ra dang ni/_/la dang lci ba dkar mor
[\[271a.6\]]brjod/_14_/dza dang sa dang ta dang ni/_/ga ga rnams ni nyer gnas 'gyur/_1_/ra dang na dang b+ha dang sas/_/rgyu zhing 'khor ba zlo ba'i lam/_2_/dza dang ta dang dza dang ra/_/'di ni rigs gnas nyid du 'dod/_12_/gang la ta gnyis dza dang ra/_/nges par dbang po'i

[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]smra/_8_/ya yig bzhi pa rnams kyis ni/_/lag 'gro ltung ba nyid yin no/_9_/ra yig bzhi pa de nyid ni/_/me tog phreng can ces grags so/_10_/sa dang dza dang sa dang sa/_/rnams kyis yi ge nyung ngur grags/_11_/ma dang ga ba ra dag pa/_/mda' rtas sna tshogs
[\[271b.2\]]lha mo'o/_12_/ma ba na ya ga ba ste/_/yan lag mtsho yi chu 'dzin phreng /_112_/na na ra ra 'dus pa ni/_/dal gyis 'bab pa nyid yin no/_14_/na dang dza dang dza dang ra/_/ya mu na ru thub pa smra/_15_/gal te 'dir ni na dang dza/_/b+ha ya 'phreng ba gsar ba'o/_1_/mu dang na dang
[\[271b.3\]]dza ra ba/_/gsum dang phyogs kyi rab dga' can/_2_/dza ba na dza ra zhes bya/_/bzhi dang gza' yis dga' mdzes yin/_3_/ma ba b+ha ta ya rnams te/_/de nyid ngal bso rma bya myos/_4_/sa dang dza dang sa dang sa/_/ga ni snyan pa'i dang par bshad/_5_/gal te sa dang dza
[\[271b.4\]]dang sa/_/dza dang ga rnams 'jam pa'i ngag_/2_/ma ga ba dang na gnyis ma/_/lnga dang dgu yis gnod med yin/_2_/na na ba dang dza dza ba/_/dbyangs rnams gzhan gyis mi thub po/_12_/na na ba dang na na ba/_/de rnams mtshon cha kha 'bus yin/_9_/ta b+ha dza dza ga ga dag_/
[\[271b.5\]]dpyid kyi thig ler shes par bya/_5_/sa la wa na gzhan ra dag_/lnga dang gza' yis nor 'dzin yin/_1_/yang ba ma nu'i mthar lci ba/_/'dir ni ri bong can gyi cha/_2_/'di nyid ro dang dgus ngal bsor/_/gyur pa gzhan ni 'phreng ba'o/_3_/de bzhin nor dang thub pa yis/_/

[\[271b.7\]]lci de de tsho le brgan rtsi/_1_/ya mu na sa b+hA la ba/_/ro drag ngal gso gtsug phud can/_2_/dza sa la ba na ra ra/_/nor dang bzang snod yang ldan no/_3/b+ha ra na ba na na ga_/phyogs thub 'od ma'i 'dab lhung ba/_4_/na su ma ba dza dza ba/_/ro chu dbyangs la ri dwags mo/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ma ba na su ra ra ba/_/tshong dus 'dzin de dal gyis gnon/_6_/gal te na dza b+ha dza dza/_/yang lci de tshe bum pa can/_2_/na dza ba na b+hu b+ha ba/_/thub ro chu gter khu byug go/_1_/ma lci ba na su ra gnyis/_/ba rnams dbang dus 'jig rten gyis/_
[\[272a.2\]]me tog g.yo ba'i khri shing yin/_2_/'dir ni na dang na dang ra/_/bzhi sgrigs lcags kyi mda' ru bshad/_1/ya mu na dang su ra dag_/ba rnams drug dus mgyogs 'gro yis/_/sprin rnams sgrog ces bya bar 'gyur/_2_/gal te ma dang sa dza su/_/ta ta ba rnams nyi ma
[\[272a.3\]]dang /_/rta rnams kyis ni stag rnam rtsen/_1_/gal te ma ra ba na dang /_/na ba ta su rnams la ni/_/bdun ta ros phyi zha mdzes yin/_2_/ra dza ra dza ra dza dang /_/lci dang yang ba 'di lta bu/_/zlum po zhes ni bya bar 'dod/_1_/ma ra ba dang na na ba/_/ra ra ba rnams bdun
[\[272a.4\]]gsum gyi/_/sdod pa phreng 'dzin zhes byar 'gyur/_1_/gang la b+ha ra na ba dza/_/sa dza sa phyogs nyi mar ni/_/ngal gso 'di ni zab mo'i dbyangs/_1_/na dza b+ha la ba dza dang /_/sa dang dza su'ang 'phrog byed dang /_/nyi mar tha dad rta rol pa/_2_/'gal te ma ma ga ba na/_/
[\[272a.5\]]la ka na na na ba rnams/_/nor dbang phyogs kyis myos ma rtsen/_/b+ha lci ba ba na na ba/_/b+ha zung na yu rnams la mda'/_/dbyangs gnyis ngal gso lus phrar 'gyur/_1_/b+ha ga ba dang b+ha ga ba/_/na zung la ka na na ba/_/mda' mda' nor dang thub par ni/_/sdong pa
[\[272a.6\]]khrung khrung rkang yin no/_1_/ma zung gang na zung dang /_/la ka su dang dza zung dang /_/ba rnams nor lha myos sred dang /_/thub pas lag 'gro rnam bsgyings so/_/ma na nu dang na nu gnyis/_/sa ga ba zhes bya rnams la/_/dgu dang ro ro byed par ni/_/ngal bso
[\[272a.7\]]bzlog phyogs 'bab par 'gyur/_1_/'di ru rgyun chags dang po ni/_/na gnyis de nas ra bdun gyi/_/gtum pa'i char 'bebs su 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa so sor ra 'phel rnams/_/'dir ni chu rgyun rgya maM tsh+laM sprul+laM/_/char sprin rol pa'i 'byung gnas dang /_/shin tu
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]klu bus dang dung sogs so/_/'dir ni ra yis ji lta bar/_/ya yis rgyun chags rab bsags te/_/na zung dag las ya rnams kyis/_/gtum pa'i char 'bebs sogs ji bzhin/_/mnyam pa'i brit+ta rnams so/_1_/zung min sa gsum la ga dang /_/gal te zung la b+ha gsum
[\[272b.2\]]las/_/ga zung can ni nye bkrar smra/_2_/b+ha gsum can las ga dag ste/_/slar ni na dza dza ya rnams/_/gal te ldan gyur myur ba'i dbus/_3_/sa gsum can la lci ba dang /_/b+ha gsum can la ga dag ni/_/gal te ldan na shugs ldan ma/_4_/zung min ta dza ra lci ba/_/zung las ma sa dza lci
[\[272b.3\]]ba/_/gang la ldan de bzang po'i snod/_5_/mi mnyam pa dza sa lci ba/_/mnyam la b+ha ra na lci ba/_/gal te Da na tog ldan ma/_6_/zung min te zung dza lci ba/_/zung la dza ta dza ga lci/_/gal te ldan na kun bsgrags so/_7_/'dir yang dza ta dza ga ga_/ta zung dza ga lci de ni/_/bzlog pa'i kun
[\[272b.4\]]bsgrags snga ma can/_8_/sa gsum can las la dang ga_/na b+ha b+ha ra rnams kyang ni/_/gal te de tshe ri dgas 'phyong /_7_/gal te na na ra la ga_/gal te na dza dza ra ni/_/de yi tshe na gzhan sgor 'dod/_10_/zung min na zung ra ya dang /_/zung la na dza dza ra ga_/me tog rgyas pa'i rtse mo brjod/_19_/ra
[\[272b.5\]]dza ra dza de bzhin du/_/dza ra dza ra ga rnams las/_/ya ba'i sgra las ma tUs yin/_/bud med mtshungs brjod nas ldan ma/_12_/mi mnyam bcu dang bcu nor yang /_/cig shos bcu dang bcu bcu yang /_/tha ma gnyis ka lcir byas pa/_/rol rkang rnam spro gtsug phud can/_13_/mnyam dang mi mnyam
[\[272b.6\]]rkang pa yis/_/yongs brjod nges gnas nges bral byas/_/'dab mar bkod pa'i nges 'di ni/_/rkang 'khyog 'gros ldan 'theng po dang /_/mtshungs 'drar gyur pa 'theng por brjod/_/phyed mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/_1_/rkang pa yig brgyad dang po las/_/sa dang na min mtsho las ni/_/ya ru gyur
[\[272b.7\]]pa kha sgo'o/_2_/rkang pa zung dag dza yig gis/_/kha sgo phan pa zhes par grags/_3_/dza yis zung min brjod 'di ni/_/zlog pa dang po can gyi de'o/_4_/na yig sbyor las kha sgo de/_/gya gyu can du shes par bya/_/zung la bdun pa yang gyur ba/_/de ni thub pas yangs mar 'dod/_6_/thams cad
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]nas de de nyid de'i/_/mtsho las b+ha yis de'i yangs ma/_2_/ra yis de bzhin de las gzhan/_2_/na yig gis kyang de bzhin yab/_7_/ta yig gis kyang de lta nyid/_10_/ma yig gis kyang de ltar lta/_11_/de las gzhan pa'i bla bre yin/_/rkang pa kun la thog ma las/_/
[\[273a.2\]]sa dang na min rkang zung gi/_/mtsho las dza dang zung min la/_/phal cher ji ltar mdzes sbyor lta/_/kha sgo'i bye brag rnams so/_1_/rkang pa dang po yig brgyad yin/_/'di las phyi mar rim bzhin du/_/bzhi dang mngon 'phel de dang de/_/sna tshogs rnam bkod
[\[273a.3\]]yang dag mdzes/_/rkang pa rkang par rol sgeg ldan/_/rkang bzhi 'phel du mkhas rnams smra/_2_/'dir ni rkang bzhi 'phel de la/_/kun yang rkang mthar ga dang ga_/rol sgeg bcas phan ngal gso'i 'gros/_/'jig rten dga' bskyed AM ldan pa'i/_/pI Tar gyur
[\[273a.4\]]de kun nas bcer/_3_/'dir ni yang dag lhung ba yi/_/rkang pa rnams lam dang po ni/_/nye las pha rol gnas byas kyang /_/de nas dbus su gnas gyur la/_/cig shos gsum rnams g.yo med par/_/des gnas me tog kha ma bye/_4_/yang dag shin tu 'dir
[\[273a.5\]]lhung ba'i/_/rkang pa dang por grags pa de/_/nye ba'i rkang pa zung 'das la/_/cig shos rkang pa gsum rnams ni/_/g.yo med nges gnas yud tsam rol/_5_/'dir ni rkang pa dang po yis/_/cig shos g.yo med gsum 'das par/_/lhung 'gyur rnam mang rol sgeg sdod/_/mngon
[\[273a.6\]]dga' bskyed 'di bdud rtsi'i rgyun/_/rkang bzhi 'phel gyi bye brag rnams so/_1_/snga ma sa dza sa dang la/_/na sa dza lci de ma thag_/de nas b+ha na dza la ga_/de nas sa dza sa dang dza/_/lci 'gyur 'di ni steng 'gro nyid/_2_/gsum ni steng 'gro de 'drar 'gyur/_/gsum pa gzhan du shes bya ste/_/
[\[273a.7\]]ra na b+ha dang lci bsgrigs pa/_/de 'dra dri zhim lan du brjod/_12_/gsum par na zung sa dag 'gyur/_/rkang pa zhes bya gzhan gsum la/_/rab spros tshig bkod rol sgeg ldan/_/rol par snyan ngag mkhan rnams bzhed/_/steng 'gro'i bye phrag rnams so/_1_/dang po ma sa dza b+ha lci/_/de nas
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]sa na dza ra ga_/pha rol na gnyis dang ni sa/_/de nas na gsum dza ya 'di/_/nye bar gnas pa'i ngal 'gror brjod/_2_/rkang pa gsum par na zung dang /_/sa dang na zung sa yin la/_/gzhan kun dal 'gro dang 'dra bar/_/rkang par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/_/bsgrub pa so sor
[\[273b.2\]]nges de ni/_/snyan dngags mkhan gyis 'phel ldan brjod/_/gang tshe gsum par ta dza ra/_/'di yi dang po ngal gso te/_/gzhan gsum dal 'gro dag dang tshogs/_/mtshungs gyur dag pa snang ldan gyis/_/khyad par rab mchog ldan du brjod/_/mi mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/_/
[\[273b.3\]]br-it+ta'i rnam par brtag pa bshad zin te/_/phyi nas dzA ti mngon brjod bya/_/yang ba phyi mo gcig yin te/_/lci gnyis gsal byed dag gis min/_/b+ha dza sa dang lci ba zung /_/yang ba bzhi tshogs de lnga po/_/phyi mo bzhi pa'o tsa yin la/_/yang ba bzhi po kha yang yin/_/phyi mo gcig
[\[273b.4\]]gnyis ka dang nga /_/'dab ma 'dab mar tshogs brgyad sa/_/mi mnyam rnams la dza spangs shing /_/phyi mo phyed la drug pa ka_/gnyis ka'i brgyad pa nga yin la/_/lhag ma tsa rnams 'phags mar 'gyur/_31_/phyed spang drug pa dza'am kha/_/kha la sngon du yang ba'i sdod/_/pha rol kha la drug pa'i
[\[273b.5\]]mthar/_/'dab ma phyi mar bzhi pa 'ang /_/zung min rkang pa tsa gsum gyis/_/rdzogs pa de tshe 'phrod par 'gyur/_2_/zung min gcig kyang rdzogs min pa/_/de rnams kyi tshe yangs ma yin/_3_/gal te gnyis pa bzhi pa'i tshogs/_/lci gnyis dbus bzhugs dza dag bshad/_/
[\[273b.6\]]phyed pa gnyis la gyur de tshe/_/kun nas g.yo bar gyur pa yin/_1_/gal te snga phyed 'ba' zhig nyid/_/g.yo ba yis ni mtshan nyid gyur/_/slar yang phyi phyed la gyur min/_/de tshe de sgo g.yo bar 'gyur/_5_/gang la bstan pa'i g.yo mtshan nyid/_/snga ma phyed la spangs nas kyang /_/
[\[273b.7\]]phyi mar gcig pur bstan nas bzhugs/_/de ni lus bstan g.yo ba'o/_1_/gang du 'dab ma gnyis ka yang /_/drug tshogs dza 'am kha yig gyur/_/phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma yang /_/so sor nges gyur de dbyangs 'gyur/_1_/gang gi 'dab ma gnyis ka'i yang /_/drug pa'i
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]tshogs ni ka nyid gyur/_/phyed phyi bzhin dang lhag nges pa/_/de ni nye ba'i dbyangs su smra/_2_/gang du snga phyed drug gyur ka_/phyi phyed la ni dza 'am kha/_/lhag nges 'dab ma log pa las/_/gyur pa de ni mchog dbyangs yin/_3_/'dab ma 'dab mar
[\[274a.2\]]brgyad rnams tsa/_/drug pa'i tshogs ni dza 'am kha/_/phyed snga bzhin dang lhag so sor/_/des de 'phags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur/_/'phags ma'i dzA ti rnams so/_/zung min dang po da gsum pa/_/zung la da bzhi phyi ma la/_/ra la ga ste yang ba drug_/bar ma chad du ma
[\[274a.3\]]yin pa/_/de ni ro langs can du brjod/_12_/dang po ro langs can lta bu/_/phyi ma ra ya nye sdeb sbyor/_/dang po ro langs can mtshungs 'dir/_/b+ha ga ga mtha' kun nas srab/_/zung thog da las phyis dza dang /_/lhag ma sngon 'dra rab 'phel yin/_/zung min dang
[\[274a.4\]]po dza da dag_/lhag ma sngon 'dra phyi 'phel yin/_/zung min cha ni phyi 'phel gyi/_/zung cha rab 'phel kun 'phel lo/_/kun 'phel zung ni gzhan mtha' can/_/zung min rkang pas mdzes rgod ma/_/ro langs can gyi dzA ti rnams so/_/rkang pa rkang par chu gter tsa/_/lci med
[\[274a.5\]]mi g.yo brtan pa'o/_/'dab las yang zhing mtha' lcig_/phyi mo mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/tsa gnyis las b+ha nyer bkra yin/_/tsa las kha'am dza nyid ni/_/khyad par tshigs bcad nyid yin no/_/phyed las kha 'am dza nyid ni/_/nags khrod gnas pa nyid yin no/_/gal
[\[274a.6\]]te tsa zhes bya ba las/_/sa gnyis pa de bkra ba'o/_/bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid rten/_/phyi mo mnyam sogs rkang pa dkrugs/_/br-it+ta'i tshad rnams rtogs med pa/_/rkang dkrugs su ni thub pas brjod/_/gang gi phyed la brgyad brgyad pa/_/phyi ma gzhan kun yang ba
[\[274a.7\]]ni/_/chu gter nor bsgyur rkang pa spro/_/de ni lus med rtsen du brjod/_/'dab rer bcu bcu bcu yang ba/_/bkod mthar lci byas gsal mdzes ma/_/dza med rang gi thog min par/_/b+ha bral tsa da ka da ka_/tsa gsum dza ga zhes dum bu/_/phyi mo mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]dzA ti rnams bshad zin to//_//br-it+ta'i dang por thams cad lci/_/lci gtso'i 'og yang phyi rnams 'dra/_/snga mar lci 'di prastA ra/_/ji srid thams cad yang de srid/_/sdeb sbyor so sor nyis 'gyur gyi/_/phreng ring steng lci 'og yang ba/_/nyis 'gyur lci yang tshogs
[\[274b.2\]]rnams kyis/_/re rer rim spel prastA ra/_/'di 'dra 'di lta ci zhes pas/_/de bkod 'bras las 'da' ma bya/_/gcig bcas mi mnyam 'dab ma lci/_/'dir mnyam yang 'bras naSh+Ta'o/_/steng du gcig sogs rim pas ni/_/nyis 'gyur bris te yang ba'i steng /_/
[\[274b.3\]]bsdoms pas gcig dang bcas 'di lta/_/nyid yin ces pa ud diSh+Ta/_/gzugs bkod yi ge'i grangs kyis bslangs/_/mnyam pa steng du bcug pa yis/_/langs pa rim pas thung du ste/_/br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/_/dang por gzugs ni ma byas
[\[274b.4\]]kyang /_/steng bzhugs gang bri de nas 'og_/gnas pa'i rang rang 'og mnyam bsre/_/br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/_/br-it+ta rnams kyi grangs kyi gzugs/_/zung gi yi ge'i grangs su bsgyur/_/ud diSh+Ta'i am ka'i mtha'/_/gnyis 'gyur yang
[\[274b.5\]]ba'i bya ba bsdu/_/grangs nyid yi ges bsgyur de nas/_/de phyed de nas gnyi ga'ang sdom/_/dang por yi ge dbus lci yang /_/de nas phyi ma rnams yin no/_/yi ge br-it+ta gnyis kyis bsgyur/_/gcig dman a d+h+wa 'phreng dang 'og_/lci yang rnams kyi sa dang ni/_/
[\[274b.6\]]de la bar yang mtshungs pa'o/_/mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams kyi brastA ra/_/mtha' dag la rtogs byed drug po rnams bshad zin to//_//br-i t+ta'am dzA ti re re la/_/lci yang yi ge phyi mo rnams/_/grangs ni shes pa brjod bya ste/_/dper brjod tshigs bcad 'di gnyis so/_/
[\[274b.7\]]gang zhig mchog dang gang zhig dam pa'i don/_/ma lus don dam las 'bras rtogs gyur cing /_/skye bo gang yang der ni bskyed mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas chos tshogs de rnams rgyal gyur cig_/rgyal chos nang las rgyal ba rgyal gyur cig_/de yi lhan cig spyod ma shes rab
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]kyang /_/gnyis las lhag mos sa bon las byung ba/_/lus can 'phags pa'i tshogs kyang rgyal gyur cig_/yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor/_/phyi mo'i yang ba dor mnga' ma/_/yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang /_/de rnams ji sted 'dir lci ba/_/
[\[275a.2\]]lci ba'i grangs so/_/lci ba gnyis 'gyur gyi phyi mo/_/yi ge gnyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs/_/lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams/_/ji snyed de rnams 'dir yang ba/_/yang ba'i grangs so/_/ci yang bsdoms pa ji snyed de/_/phyi mo lci bral ji snyed do/_/ji snyed phyi mo yang
[\[275a.3\]]bsdoms 'dab/_/de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams/_/yi ge'i grangs so/_/lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor/_/lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams/_/ji snyed de rnams 'dir phyi mo/_/phyi mo'i grangs so/_/rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad
[\[275a.4\]]pa'i/_/bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa/_/de yis 'gro rnams dam pa'i lam dang ni/_/rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i sdeb sbyor rin chen
[\[275a.5\]]'byung gnas zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//'di rang 'grel dang bcas pa la chos ldan ras pa dang /_yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan dang /_lo chen byad rtse ba rnams kyis sum rim du bsgyur ba'i mthar/_/lo tsA ba nam mkha' bzang
[\[275a.6\]]pos dag par bsgyur ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi dper brjod ston pa rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa/_sdeb sbyor so so'i rkang pa'i yig grangs su byas 'dug pas/_bod skad la shin tu mi bde ba cig byung zhing /_bod skad la la sdeb sbyor zhig pas
[\[275a.7\]]lci yang sogs kyi rim pa mi dgos pa bzhin du/_yig grangs kyang mi dgos/_mdo'i dper brjod ston pa rgya skad kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas/_bod la go bde zhing gzung sla bar/_stag tshang pa shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]{D4460}]skyes rabs kyi TI ka bzhugs so/_/@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_dza ta ka ma la s+ya pany+tsi ka/_bod skad du/_skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje'i stobs kyis thabs kyi
[\[275b.2\]]spyod pa rgya che dang /_/shes rab kyis ni de nyid don gzigs chags bral ba/_/mtha' gnyis mi gnas yon tan rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i/_/'gro ba kun skyob rgyal dang de sras rnams la 'dud/_/gang zhig 'gro ba mtha' dag yongs su skyob pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan zhing /_shes
[\[275b.3\]]rab kyis 'gro ba'i bya ba la rab tu ma rmongs pa/_brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtshungs pa med pas sems can gyi don spyod pa la rab tu mi ngal ba/_bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing bag yod pa spyir la rab tu gnas pa/_yon tan rin po che'i gter sdud par byed pa'i byang chub sems
[\[275b.4\]]dpa' de tshogs gnyis kyi bdag nyid/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de nyid bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir gyur pas gzhan sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyod pa yin
[\[275b.5\]]la/_khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa/_slob dpon 'di'i bzhed pas sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la/_bsam gtan dang shes rab gnyis ni ye shes kyi tshogs yin la brtson 'grus gnyi gar gtogs pa'o/_/shAkya thub pas kyang sngon de lta bu'i spyod pa rnam pa du ma mdzad do/_/de'i phyogs shig
[\[275b.6\]]tsam slob dpon dpa' bos sbyar ba yin la/_/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po gang dag gi bdag nyid yin pa dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sar gsungs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par gang dang gang yin pa
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par la sogs par gyur pa'i don phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o/_/de la g.yung drung shes rab grags/_kha cig na re gzhung 'di ni slob dpon gyis yongs su ma rdzogs par mngon te/_lhag lus par/_de ltar bstan mchod brjod dang dgos 'brel la sogs pa/_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bcos rtsom pa dang 'brel ba'i yan lag yod kyang mjug tu dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba la sogs pa/_bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba ma byas pa'i phyir dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum la bcu bcu yod kyang /_brtson 'grus kyi bcu tshan yang ma tshad la bsam
[\[276a.2\]]gtan dang shes rab kyi dbang du byas pa'i gzhung ma snang ba'i phyir dang /_dang po gsum la/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pas mjug bsdus pa la mtha'i bzhi tshan la sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te dpyad dgos so/_/de la bcu tshan dang pos ni sbyin pa bstan to/_/la bzhi tsam las/_bcu tshan gnyis
[\[276a.3\]]pas tshul khrims bstan to/_/bcu tshan gsum pas ni bzod pa bstan to/_/de la bcu tshan dang po las dang pos ni lus ril gyis sbyin pa bstan te/_/brtson 'grus/_gnyis pas ni yan lag gi mchog sbyin zhing mthong ba'i chos nyid la 'bras bu rgya 'grel las rgyal bu zla ba'i skyes rabs brtson 'grus so lcags kyi khyim dang ma he gnyis bsam
[\[276a.4\]]gtan no bya shing rta mo shes rab tu gsung ba 'thad par snang ngo /_/chen po thob pa bstan to/_/gsum pas ni longs spyod dman pa sbyin pa yang rnam par sbyin pa dang rgyu mthun pa rgya cher bstan to/_/mig/_/slar yang spyan thob pa'i/_bzhi pas sbyin pa la bdud kyis mi phrogs par bstan to/_/lnga pas ni
[\[276a.5\]]yo byad nyung bas sbyin pa las mi ldog par bstan to/_/drug pas ni rten dman yang sbyin pa las mi zan changs/_ldog pa 'byor ba chen po/_/bstan to/_/bdun pa las longs spyod yongs su mi 'dzin yang gtong ba mi zad par bstan to/_/brgyad pas ni sbyin pa la brten
[\[276a.6\]]nas gtan du thar pa thob par bstan to/_/dgu pas ni longs ri bong dud 'gro'i/_/spyod mchog la ma chags par bstan to/_/bcu pas ni 'tsho ba spong zhing gzhan mang po dag gi sdig pa spong ba thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par bstan to/_/de dag ni phyogs re re'i dbang du byas pa ste/_
[\[276a.7\]]rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du'ang dpyad du yod do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa ni gnyis te/_lus sbyin pa dang longs spyod sbyin pa'o/_/dang po ni le'u bzhis bstan te/_dang po dang gnyis pa dang /_drug pa dang /_brgyad pa'o/_/lhag ma drug ni longs spyod sbyin pa'o/_/zhing gi khyad
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]par gang la sbyin pa'i dbang du byas na/_bzhi pa dang bcu pas ni yon tan gyi zhing la sbyin pa'o/_/lhag ma ni sdug bsngal ba'i zhing la sbyin pa'o/_/bcu po thams cad la yang legs par bshad pa'i khyad par ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin la/_dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_drug pa dang /_
[\[276b.2\]]brgyad pa dang /_lhag ma drug ni longs spyod sbyin pa'o/_/zhing gi khyad par gang la sbyin pa'i dbang du byas na/_bzhi pa dang /_bcu pas ni yon tan gyi zhing la sbyin pa'o/_/dgu pa dang /_bcu pas ni gzhan sdug bsngal ba las skyob pa mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa yang yin no/_/gtsor sbyin pa yin
[\[276b.3\]]gyi/_ni lus sbyin pa dge ba/_/gzhan lnga dang yang ldan te/_'di ltar thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims yin la/_ci rigs par gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyang yod do/_/sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni don gyi
[\[276b.4\]]rten nyid du rnam par pha rol tu phyin pa/_gnas pa ste/_rab tu byung ba'i rten la ni rab tu byung ba'i dge ba/_sdom pa yod la/_gzhan thams cad la dge bsnyen sdom pas bsdus pa'o/_/thams cad la sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa yod la/_dang po dang gsum pa dang /_bcu pa sa snga ma gnyis gyi/_
[\[276b.5\]]ma gtogs pa lhag ma bdun la ni gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa yod do/_/thams cad la yang sems can gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus yod la/_de'i rgyur dgos pas dge ba bsgrub pa dang go cha'i brtson 'grus dag kyang yod do/_/theg pa dman par mi g.yeng bas bsam gtan
[\[276b.6\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la/_de ni byang chub chen por smon pas na phal cher gzhung na snang ngo /_/shes rab las kyang kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba la dmigs pa ni shes rab ste rgyu'i sgo nas don dam pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab ste rgyu'i sgo nas don dam pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyang yod do/_/'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin
[\[276b.7\]]pa'i phan tshun rnam par nges pa'o/_/gzhan yang bdun pa ni chos smon lam/_kyi sbyin pa gtso che ba yin te/_brgya byin legs par bshad pas tshim par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/bcu pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa gtso che ba yin te/_dud 'gro rnams gsod pa las bskyabs shing mi rnams rgyu bzlog pas/_sdig pa/_
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ngan 'gro las bskyab pa'i phyir ro/_/lhag ma ni zang zing gi sbyin pa gtso che zhes bya bar yang rung ngo /_/bcu tshan 'di la grangs nges pa dang go rims nges par mi bsam mo/_/tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bcu tshan ni/_/don gnyis kyi dbang du byas te/_lus ngag gi
[\[277a.2\]]las yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'o/_/dang po ni bdun no/_/gnyis pa ni lhag ma gsum mo/_/dang po la yang gnyis te/_/rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba spang ba dang /_bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spang bas te/_dang po drug dang /_gnyis pa bdun pa'o/_/dang po la gnyis te/_
[\[277a.3\]]lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bden pa'i tshig brjod pa ste/_gsum dang go rims bzhin no/_/lus kyi las yongs su dag pa la gsum ste/_srog gcod pa spong bas rab tu phye ba dang po dang /_ma byin par len pa spong bas rab tu phye ba gnyis pa dang /_
[\[277a.4\]]log pa'i g.yem pa spong bas rab tu phye ba gsum pa'o/_/tha ma gsum yid kyi las yongs su dag pas/_/gsum/_rab tu phye ba ji ltar gzhag ce na/_go rims bzhin sdig pa'i grogs pos bzlog kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas yang mi 'phrogs pa dang /_smon nas
[\[277a.5\]]tshangs par spyod pa spangs pa dang /_rab tu byung ba'i bar chad kyis mi brdzi bas ma chags pa la sogs pa shas che ba'i phyir ro/_/dang po bdun pos ni phongs pa'i dus na yang brtan par ston te/_phongs kyang rang nyid sdig pa la mi 'jug pa ni dang po gsum gyis ston la/_rang gzhan gnyi
[\[277a.6\]]ga phongs pa las skyob pa ni bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang drug pas ston to/_/gzhan tshul khrims la dgod pa bdun pas ston to/_/dang po drug gis ni lus kyi rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs pa ston la/_tha ma gsum gyis ni sdig pa'i grogs pos mi 'phrogs par ston to/_/de lta bu'i rnam par gzhag
[\[277a.7\]]pa ni mang du dpyad du yod do/_/gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa spong ba thams cad kyang sdom pa'i tshul khrims so/_/dge ba bsgrub pa'i bya ba yin pas thams cad kyang dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so/_/bdun pa ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pas gtsor sems can gyi don bya ba'i
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]tshul khrims so/_/dang po gsum yang gzhan la gnod pa spong bas sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims yin no/_/gzhan gsum ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pas rtogs par sla'o/_/tha ma gsum dag kyang rgyur gyur pas sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims zhes byar rung ngo /_/phan
[\[277b.2\]]tshun rnam par nges pa'i dbang du byas na tshul khrims thams cad kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i grogs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang /_bye brag tu legs pas bshad pa thams cad ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/dang po drug ni sdug bsngal gyis mi 'khrugs pas sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa'o/_/
[\[277b.3\]]tha ma bzhi ni gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ste/_sems can gyi don legs par bsgrub pa la mi khro ba'i sgo nas so/_/thams cad kyang dge ba bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te/_bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyang yod do/_/
[\[277b.4\]]go cha'i brtson 'grus ni de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/bsam gtan dang shes rab ni snga ma bzhin no/_/bzod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i bcu tshan ni gtsor bzod pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas pa ste/_sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang /_gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod
[\[277b.5\]]pa'o/_/chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod/_theg pa dman par sems mi g.yeng ba/_kun rdzob dang sems can gyi don shes pa'i shes rab/_pa yang de dag gi rgyu nyid du don gyis gnas so/_/de la gsum pa dang dgu pa ni sems can gyi log par bsgrub pa 'ba' zhig bzod pas gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam
[\[277b.6\]]pa'i bzod pa'o/_/bcu pa ni sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ste/_gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa ni med kyi gzhan la phan/_/gnyis po/_/'dogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyid bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/lhag ma bdun ni bzod pa gnyis kas bsdus te/_sems can gyi log par bsgrub pa dang des
[\[277b.7\]]byas pa'i sdug bsngal gnyis ka bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/dang po ni nang gi khro ba nye bar zhi bas phyi rol gyi gnod pa bzlog pa'i phan yon dang ldan pa ston to/_/gnyis pa ni rten dman pa la yang yon tan dang bzod pa yod par ston to/_/gsum pa dang bdun pa ni byas pa gzo bas gzhan yal bar mi
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'dor ba ston to/_/gzhan gyis brnyas kyang yal bar mi 'dor ba dang /_phongs kyang yal bar mi 'dor ba'o/_/yang na tshe gzhan gyi don dang tshe 'di'i don yal bar mi 'dor ba ston pa'o/_/bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa ni gnod byed nyam nyes par gyur pa yal bar
[\[278a.2\]]mi 'dor ba ston to/_/brgyad pas ni log par bsgrub pa la tshe 'di'i don bya bar ma nus kyang /_bdag gi bzod pa'i 'bras bu de la thob par smon pa ston to/_/dgu pas ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la gnas pa shin tu brtse ba'i gnas yin pa dang /_gtso bo dge ba la bkod pas gzhan du ma'i don du
[\[278a.3\]]gyur pas thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par ston to/_/bcu pas ni ngan 'gro'i rten la gzhan du ma'i sdug bsngal skyob pas rten dman pas bzod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mi 'dor ba ston to/_/de lta bu'i dgos pa rnam pa du ma dpyad du yod do/_/bzod pa de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan lnga dang ldan te/_
[\[278a.4\]]legs par bshad pa thams cad chos kyi sbyin pa yin la bye brag tu dgu pa la sogs pa chos kyi sbyin pa shin tu yang gtso che'o/_/bcu pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/_/bcu po thams cad ni dge ba chos sdud la ci rigs par sems can gyi don byed pa dang sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni snga ma gnyis kyi rten du don gyis byed pas/_tshul khrims su
[\[278a.5\]]gyur pa'i don ni snga ma bzhin no/_/bcu po thams cad ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus yin la/_de'i rgyur dge ba sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang go cha'i brtson 'grus kyang yod pa'o/_/kun rdzob dang sems can gyi don byed pa shes pa'i shes rab/_/brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi don yang snga ma bzhin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang du
[\[278a.6\]]byas pa'i bzhi tshan ni/_/sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_rang nyid kyis dge ba bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te/_dang po dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa ni dang po yin la/_gnyis pa theg dman par sems ma g.yeng ba'i/_ni gnyis pa yin no/_/dang po yang gnyis te/_tshe 'di
[\[278a.7\]]dang gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_tshe 'di'i don bsgrub pa ste/_dang po ni dang po yin no/_/tshe 'di'i don bsgrub pa la gnyis te/_mi gnod pa bsgrub ba dang phan pa bsgrub pa ste/_gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni rim pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang dang po de nyid dang gzhan du ma la
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]phan 'dogs pa yin la/_gsum pa dang bzhi pa de nyid la phan pa tsam bsgrub pa'o/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal bzlog pa dang de'i rgyu bzlog pa la sogs pa rnam pa mang du dpyad du yod do/_/brtson 'grus de yang gzhan la legs par bshad pas sbyin pa yin la/_thams cad kyang sems can
[\[278b.2\]]don byed kyi tshul khrims yin la/_bden par smra ba dang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba dang 'tsho ba spong ba dag ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyang yin no/_/dang po gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa yin la/_gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal dang du len pa ste/_mngon par 'byung bas 'dod pa'i bde ba gtong
[\[278b.3\]]zhing dka' thub kyi gnod pa bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni gtsor gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'o/_/bsam gtan dang shes rab ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la sogs pa de nyid gzhan du rjes su 'dzin pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i grangs su 'gro ste/_sbyin pa ni
[\[278b.4\]]zang zing gi sbyin pa nyid gzung gi chos kyi sbyin pa ni snyan par smra ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su kun rdzob dang don dam sems can gyi don byed pa shes pa'i shes rab/_theg pa dman par sems mi g.yeng ba'i/_'gro'o/_/mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'ang don spyod pa'am don mthun pa zhes bya bar brjod do/_/gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[278b.5\]]la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'o/_/tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snyan par smra ba'o/_/brtson 'grus ni don spyod pa'o/_/bsam gtan dang shes rab ni don mthun pa'o/_/gzhan la chos ston pa'i khyad par snyan par smra ba de dag gis chos kyi don ni bsdus na 'di
