[\[319a.1\]]sogs pa/_byang phyogs nas byang phyogs su zla ba drug tu bgrod par bya ste/_de dag gi pha rol na chu bo chen po sa tru zhes bya ba dang /_ka kA ri zhes bya ba gangs kyi ri yod de de dag las kyang brgal bar bya'o/_/yul 'khor de rnams na gnas pa'i mi
[\[319a.2\]]rnams ni/_drang po'i rang bzhin can gyi phyir/_bgrod par dka' ba ma yin zhing 'jigs pa yang med do/_/ri de las tu dza na ya zhes bya ba'i sman ro mchog tu mngar ba dang /_tI la ka zhes bya ba shin tu kha ba ste de dag kyang 'o ma ltar 'dzag pa dag yod do/_/gang gi me tog
[\[319a.3\]]nyi ma 'char ka'i mdangs ltar rab tu dmar ba de'i 'dab ma yang dgra sta'i so lta bu/_tsher ma rnon po can/_lho ngos su mngon du phyogs pa'i brag las byung ba de ni tu dza na yang yin no/_/ngam grog dag gi ngos la 'phyang zhing 'phyang ba ma he mo'i nu ma lta bu'i me tog dkar po dang
[\[319a.4\]]ldan pa ni tI la ka'o/_/de dag gi phyogs bzhir rdo rje srin po stobs po che'i rig sngags lan bdun bzlas bzhin du/_shing ba ta la'i phur bus btab nas de dag gi ba thag dbyung bar bya'o/_/zhag bdun du de dag yongs su bskams par byas nas/_brag gi phug par bdud rtsi
[\[319a.5\]]thab sbyor bzlas pas bsrung zhing sba bar bya'o/_/phyogs de na btsag kha dog lnga po dag yod de/_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_nag po dang ljang khu dag go/_/de dag blangs nas gangs kyi chu bos khrus byas nas rdo leb dkar po'i gzhi la lha mo 'od zer can
[\[319a.6\]]ma'i sku gzugs bri bar bya ste/_mdog gser btso ma lta bu/_ka ra bI ra'i me tog ltar dmar ba'i spyan gsum pa/_g.yas kyi zhal dmar po g.yon gyi zhal ni phag gi gdong nag po rab tu khros pa/_dar sngon po'i ga sha 'phyang ba/_nam mkha'i phyag rgya cung zad gsal
[\[319a.7\]]bar byed pas/_lha dang lha ma yin dang phyugs rnams dbang du byed pa/_phyag dang po gnyis kyis me tog gis mang dang gzhu 'gengs pa/_bar ma gnyis kyis khab dang skud pa dang mya ngan med pa'i shing bsnams pa/_tha ma gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga lte ba'i
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas g.yon du 'dzin pa/_phag gi steng na sdang ba dang gdug pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa/_'di lta bu bris nas cho ga ji lta bas mchod pa dang bzlas pa bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM btA la bi dA li/_ba ra li ba ra ha
[\[319b.2\]]mu khA+e sarba du Sh+TA na pra duSh+TAn/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha mu khaM swA hA/_zhes pa 'dis a shwo ka'i shing dang /_me tog dmar po brgya phrag lngas sbyin sreg bya'o/_/snying po'i sngags 'di yang khri phrag bzlas pa bya ste/_oM badzra be ta lI hUM phaT/_tshangs par spyod la legs gnas pa/_snying rjes sgrub pa
[\[319b.3\]]legs pa ste/_/gdug la gdug pa nges sbyor ba/_/rtag tu byams pa'i yid kyis so/_/gang gang 'dul la de dang de/_/sngags pas rab sbyor de de'o/_/nyon mongs spyod las nam yang min/_/nang gi bdag nyid dul bas so/_/de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i sman de dag btags
[\[319b.4\]]te/_gangs kyi ba men dag gi 'o ma lhung ba la yongs su bskol nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o/_/snying po'i mthar bdud rtsi thigs bsgrubs shing ces spel bas/_lan stong du bzlas par byas nas/_lha mo la yang dag par mchod de dngos grub blangs
[\[319b.5\]]nas/_sman btung bar bya'o/_/phyi nas sku gzugs de yang byang phyogs la bltas te bzhag la me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pas spa bar bya'o/_/des ni bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_dub pa med de/_lha mo'i mthu las bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang
[\[319b.6\]]bdag gi dbang du byad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang phyogs su bltas nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gro bar bya ste/_lam de la ni rtswa yang med/_shing gel pa yang med/_chu yang med do/_/de'i pha rol na nags 'thug po dag yod de/_sbrul dang stag la sogs pa gnas
[\[319b.7\]]pa'i 'brog dgon pa'i lam la nyi ma bcu gnyis 'gro bar bya'o/_/de'i pha rol na ri'i rgyal po gan+d+ha ra zhes bya ba yod de/_dpangs su ni dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/ri de ni sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba yin no/_/de na ni seng ge gshog pa can dag gnas te/_nyi ma re re ra yang srog chags
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]mang po dag gsod par byed do/_/der ri dgas kyi khyad par zhig lus sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod do/_/de lus kyi cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs par bsgyur ba yin te/_seng ge des gsad pa'i khrag las/_rdo leb nag po la srin mo man de ha zhes bya ba rnam par gtsigs shing
[\[320a.2\]]'jigs su rung ba'i lus can/_kha dog dmar ba mi'i pags pas smad dkris shing /_lag pa g.yon pa na ral gri 'dzin pa/_g.yas pa na ni ba lang gi pags pa gsar pa'i nang du sha khrag dang snying gis gang ba 'dzin cing za ba bris te/_snod dag tu sha dang khrag gi gtor ma
[\[320a.3\]]bsham par bya'o/_/bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed mi bzad pa dbyug pa dang zhags pa thogs pa ma he la gnas par byas nas/_oM hrIHkA la rU pa hUM khaM swA hA/_/kreM ka re kre ka re/_man+d+hai ha rak+Sha sI/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hrIH/_dzaHzhes stong phrag bcur bzlas pas de mngon sum du 'ong
[\[320a.4\]]bar 'gyur la/_khrag gi mchod yon dang sha'i gtor ma dag sbyin nas thod pa'i phyag rgya ston te/_khro bo chen po'i stobs kyis gzir bar bya'o/_/des kyang sgrub pa po ci 'dod cis smra bar 'gyur ro/_/kye srin mo bdag sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa dang bde bar 'dod pas/_
[\[320a.5\]]grong khyer ka lA par 'gro'i/_yul stongs pa 'di rnams su kha zas 'byor bar gyis shig_/des kyang de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas de mi snang bar 'gyur te/_shing ardzu na'i rtsa ba na rab tu chags pa/_me tog kun da ltar kha dog dkar ba'i bcud ro sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dag_/nub mo dang
[\[320a.6\]]nub mo gnas pa'i sa dag dog la ster bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang ngos su gangs can chen po zhes bya ba'i ri yod de/_dpag tshad brgya phrag gsum gyi khor yug can/_de ni gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dka' thub can rnams dang /_grub pa rnams dang /_mi'am ci dag gis yongs su
[\[320a.7\]]gang ba yin no/_/ci ste sgrub pa po pha rol gnon pa'i 'phrul dang ldan pa yin na ni/_der song nas dga' bar bya/_rtse bar bya/_longs spyod dag kyang bya ste/_de nas mthar gyis de dag gi phrag pa la thogs nas grong khyer ka lA bar yud kyis phyin par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste pha rol gnon
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]pa'i stobs de med na ni der 'gro bar mi bya ste/_rlung gi phyogs kyi lam chen po rab tu gsal ba la nye bar brten te myur bar 'gro bar bya'o/_/srid gsum gnas kyi rgyud rnams ni/_/bsod nams chung yang 'grub par bla/_/tshangs 'joms de yi grogs kyang ste/_/che ba'i che ba'ang
[\[320b.2\]]rnyed ma yin/_/rtag tu dge ba'i stobs dang ldan/_/bag med don gyi de nyid rig_/byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/_/mchog gi rig sngags de yis 'grub/_/gangs ri de las shar dang nub tu chu bo rab tu 'bab pa/_sa'i gzhi la lu ma chen po stong phrag brgyad cu dang yongs
[\[320b.3\]]su 'dres te/_mtsho ltar snang zhing rgyu ba yang mi mngon pa/_kha dog dkar por snang ba yod de/_de la 'di ni chu bo sI ta zhes bya'o/_/chu rlung 'di ni dkyus su dpag tshad stong phrag phyed dang gsum pa/_shar dang nub tu rgya mtsho dug can pa la yongs su 'jug pa/_zheng du ni dpag
[\[320b.4\]]tshad tsam mo/_/chu 'di ni shin tu grang ba yin te/_dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ma gtogs pa/_bya dang nya dang chu srin la sogs pa srog chags 'ga' yang med do/_/chu bo de'i tshur 'gram na zangs kyi mdog ces bya ba'i ri phug pa stong dang ldan pa dag yod de/_shin ri Sha ka dang /_ku
[\[320b.5\]]lum ka dang /_ta ma ru dang /_de ba da tu dang /_shug pas yongs su gang ba yin no/_/ri de la ni srin mo glog 'gyu ma zhes bya ba gnas te/_de'i cho ga yang snga ma dang mtshungs pa las/_lag na ni gtun shing 'dzin pa/_glang po che'i lus la za ba/_char sprin gyi mdog can te/_
[\[320b.6\]]gany+tsa dang /_ta ri na dang /_nags kyi ba lang dang /_glang po che'i khrag rnams kyis bri bar bya zhing /_gtor ma yang de dag rnams nyid do/_/bdag gi rnal 'byor ni khro bo gshin rje gshed po zhal drug pa dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa/_zhabs drug pa/_phyag bcu gnyis pa/_ral
[\[320b.7\]]gri dang dgra sta dang /_gri gug dang /_ga da dang /_'khor lo dang /_tri shU la rnams g.yas na 'dzin pa'o/_/gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang /_dus kyi zhags pa dang /_kha T+wAM ga dang /_lcags kyu dang /_thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang /_sdigs mdzub rnams ni g.yon pa na'o/_/rnam
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]pa 'di lta bu las sngags ni 'di yin te/_oM sarba duSh+Tu na staM b+ha ya hUM/_na di wa rA thA ra Ni ku mA da krI Da tA pi Ne ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sa ma ya ma nu sa ma phaT phaT swA hA/_zhes pa'o/_/p+Yi+u rung tsa la tsa la/_pra tsa la pra tsa la/_p+Yi+u rud dzi hwa/_sa ha sra mu kha sa ha sra ba
[\[321a.2\]]ha we/_ra ra ra ra ra k+Sha si b+h+yoHb+h+yoHA kAR+Sha ya jeH/_zhes pa ni srin mo'i sngags so/_/de la sgrub pa pos lam ston cig ces brjod par bya ste/_des kyang chu bo sI ta la lam ston par 'gyur ro/_/chu klung de'i rab tu grang bas ni/_sa'i steng gi gangs dang rlung po'i reg pa thams cad
[\[321a.3\]]kyang zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_dgun zla 'bring po la yang chab brom chags pa med na/_srin mo 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/dbyar zla ba dang po la yang chab brom shin tu brtan par chags nas/_sgrub pa po 'jigs pa med pa nyid kyis chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[321a.4\]]chu bo 'di ni b+ha ra ta'i dum bu zhes bya ba/_gling 'di'i phyed kyi dbus la gyu ba yin te/_lho dang byang du yul chen po dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /_dgu bcu rtsa drug dag gnas pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang shar nub tu ni byang phyogs lhag par yangs pa yin no/_/chu bo de'i pha rol na/_shing ke ta
[\[321a.5\]]ka dang /_be la dang /_ka b+hi ta dang /_ba tu sha dang /_ba da ra dang /_ka pi ta dang /_a rdzu na dang /_tA la'i nags tshal dag yod de/_der zla ba gcig tu ngal gso bar bya/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag kyang bza' bar bya ste/_gang 'di'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang lo ma dang me tog dag ni bcud dang
[\[321a.6\]]ldan pa dang mthu dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/der lha mo skul byed ma'i rig pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_yi ge dgu pa'i gzungs sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas pas sgrub pa po rang gi yan lag las/_khrag nag po nag por snang ba dag zag par
[\[321a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ci ste rmi lam du de ltar gyur na yang rung ste/_lus yang med cing stobs dang ldan pa dang shin tu yang bar 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig rnam par spangs dang bla ma smod/_/dus min 'chi dang dmyal ba brgyad par 'gro/_/dkyil 'khor ma mthong dbang bskur dman pa yang /_
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]rig sngags sbyor ba nam yang grub pa med/_/khengs zhing nga rgyal khro la mi bden pa/_/dngos grub thob ces rgyal ba mi gsung ste/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa'i don sems pa/_/mi de dag ni myur 'grub 'phags rnams gsungs/_/rigs dang gzugs dang nor dang
[\[321b.2\]]dbang phyug dang /_chos dang rig pa sngags kyis myos pa spang /_/rmi lam gzugs brnyan dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/_/byed po bya ba dang ni las rnams mthong /_/ma chags dul dang yang dag mnyen pa'i sems/_/mchod dang sbyin pa bzod dang brtson 'grus
[\[321b.3\]]bskyed/_/bdag dang bdag gir spong la mngon dga' ba/_/de dag dngos grub mchog la reg par 'gyur/_/yang de nas nags tshal de las kha TU dza'i 'bras bu gser gyi mdog dang mnyam pa dag blangs te/_lam rgyags su 'khur bar bya'o/_/'dir
[\[321b.4\]]ni sgrub pa po rang nyid kyis ji tsam lan nus pa de 'khur bar bya yi/_/nam yang lcid kyis non par mi 'gyur bas/_/mi thegs pa'i dogs pa mi bya'o/_/nags de nyid dang bar mtshams med par gangs kyi ri chung ngu chung ngu dag gral du bsgrigs pas shar
[\[321b.5\]]nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar khyab pa yin no/_/de dag las chu 'bab pa thams cad kyang lho phyogs kyi ngos su 'bab pa yin pas/_de dag tu chu mang po can no/_/ri de dag las brgal nas byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcu tshun chad na ni 'thung ngu rung ba'i chu med pa
[\[321b.6\]]yin no/_/'on kyang sgrub pa po de lus stobs dang ldan pa dang yang ba'i phyir/_zhag bdun du thang chen po de'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur la/_kha TU dza'i 'bras bu de zos pas/_bkres pa yang med skom pa yang med do/_/thang de 'das pa na/_sngon
[\[321b.7\]]mang du khyer du zin yang rung ste/_'bras bu de yang zad par 'gyur ro/_/de'i nub kyi mtshams na/_ri bo shin tu dkar ba nags tshal yid du 'ong ba du mas mdzes pa zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong bar 'gyur mod kyi/_sgrub pa po der 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na ni/_srin mo zangs kyi mchu can lnga brgya dag gnas te/_lha ma yin gyi pho nya mo de dag gis sgrub pa po la 'tshe bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na byang phyogs su dang po'i lam po che bzung nas 'gro bar bya'o/_/nyi ma gcig
[\[322a.2\]]gis ri bo ke ta ra zhes bya bar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/de yang kha dog nag cing ngan pa/_'jigs pa bskyed par byed pa/_ka ba btsugs pa lta bu/_dpag tshad bcu'i dpangs dang ldan pa yod do/_/ri de'i nang ni gser dngul 'ba' zhig gis gang ba yin te/_
[\[322a.3\]]de'i phyogs bzhin ni pad+ma dang /_u tA ga'i mtsho/_ngang pa dang /_tsa kra ba ka dang /_ka ra N+Da la sogs pa chu la rgyu ba'i 'dab chags gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa skad snyan pas gang bdag yod do/_/ri de la 'jig rten skyong ba 'phags skyes po/_/dus dus su
[\[322a.4\]]dga' zhing rtse bar byed pa yin te/_lha min gyi lang tsho ma dag dang /_gdug cing gtum pa'i klu rnams kyi bu mo sdug gu ma stong snyed kyis mchod par byed do/_/de'i 'khor du rtogs pa'i yi dgas mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba mang po dag kyang yod de/_der sgrub pa po de ci ste
[\[322a.5\]]'byor bar gyur na ni/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams dang na ri ka la'i 'bras bu dang /_sha dang nya sha dag gis gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bya'o/_/ci ste 'byor par ma gyur na thams cad yid kyis bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_oM bi bi bi bi ba ru d+hA ka sha sa pa ri wA
[\[322a.6\]]re b+h+yaH/_khu ni khu ni pre to ta k+Shis ta/_i maM ba ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_de bzhin du sbos dkar dang /_thang chu dang sha'i bdug spos dag kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas ni des srung ba byed de mi 'am ci dang /_lha min dang /_srin po dang /_yi dgas
[\[322a.7\]]dang /_sha za dang /_mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/'ga' zhig rnam thar gsum gnas gzhan ni rtse ba'i bdag nyid dpa' bo dang /_/byin rlabs rim pa phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bur mkhas pas rig par bya/_/'dod pa'i dpung 'joms de las
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]dag pa'i lam ste grub pa rjes su 'jug_/mun pa nyams dang dga' ba'i rgyu las rab bde ci phyir thob ma yin/_de nas sgrub pa po byang phyogs su song na mi ring ba na me na ko zhes pa'i ri chen po yod de/_de ni tsam pa ka dang /_karko la dang /_ma ra ka dang /_ke tu ka dang /_kim+pa ka
[\[322b.2\]]dang /_nA ga puSh+pa dang /_tsan dan sa mchog rnams kyi nags kyis bskor ba/_ri de'i khrod na srin po'i bu mo rta'i gdong pa can dang /_lha min mo dag dang /_klu phran gyi bu mo dag gar dang dbyangs dang rol mo sna tshogs pas rtag tu rtse bar byed pa dag yin te/_der sgrub pa
[\[322b.3\]]po bud med de dag la chags par yang mi bya/_glu dang rol mo de dag la dga' bar yang mi bya ste/_gzhan du na bsod snyoms dag blangs te 'gro bar bya'o/_/de'i pha rol na chu bo chen po shar nas nub tu 'bab cing /_rba klong 'khrugs pa shin tu bgrod par dka' ba yong de/_
[\[322b.4\]]chu klung de'i ming ni si tA lo ta na zhes bya'o/_/de la ni nya rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa dang /_gdong rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag yod de/_stag dang /_seng ge dang /_gung dang /_ba lang dang /_sbre'u dang /_ne tso dang /_khra dang /_mi'i gdong la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[322b.5\]]chu klung de'i skabs 'ga' na ni/_rdo las skyes pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i sdong po yal gas phan tshun gyi 'gram du khyab pa dag yod de/_shing de la brten nas sgrub pa po 'gro bar bya'o/_/yang na ni nya'i stobs kyis 'gro bar bya ste/_phyogs de dang nye ba na/_lo hi ta zhes bya ba'i
[\[322b.6\]]ri dmar po chung ngu mang po dag yod de/_de dag la ni sA lu dmar po dang /_mud ga dang /_man Du pa dag ma rmos par skye ba yin te/_de las blangs nas zan du bcos te/_phyogs phyogs su shing las sbrang rtsi mang po lhung ba dag kyang blangs shing /_de dag bsres
[\[322b.7\]]te nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'phags pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par spel zhing sbyangs la/_sngags 'dis nya'i tshogs rnams la gtor mar sbyin no/_/oM maM maM maM maM maM ma ta s+ya rA dza/_ma ra s+ya ga Na sa hi ta b+hu ny+dza ho b+ha k+Sha ho/_/sarba ma ta s+ya de wa tA i maM ba liM
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na ka ra ka ra ki ri ki ri ku ru ku ru ma ra ma ra mi ri mi ri mu ru mu ru/_ma ma kA t+yaM s+ya d+ha ya/_sarba bud+d+ha adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_de ltar lan lnga brgyar gtor ma sbyin cing /_'dod pa'i lha la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/der
[\[323a.2\]]nya rnams kyang rgyal po sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'ongs pa la/_sgrub pa pos smras pa/_kye nya'i rgyal po/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_bde ba'i don du kho bo ni grong khyer ka lA par 'gro'i/_chu bo'i pha rol tu bsgral bar mdzod cig_/gnas
[\[323a.3\]]'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang po'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas nya'i rgyal po des sgrub pa po de rgyab tu khur nas chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ka ka ra'i gangs kyi byang phyogs nas chu bo 'di'i bar gyi lam gang yin pa de dag na ni/_
[\[323a.4\]]mi'i 'gro ba gnas pa med de/_gang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba dang /_gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad pa dag gnas pa yin no/_/'on kyang lam 'di dag gi shar dang nub tu dpag tshad lnga brgyas bcad pa'i pha rol na ni/_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dag kyang yod
[\[323a.5\]]mod kyi/_lam de dag nas song na ni/_lo brgya phrag gis kyang grong khyer ka lA par phyin par mi 'gyur te kun tu 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/chu klung sI ti'i byang phyogs de'i bar mtshams thams cad ni ri kha ba can mang pos kun tu gang ba yin no/_/'on kyang
[\[323a.6\]]gangs kyi ri bar bcad pa ni med de/_/de nas chu klung de yongs su brgal ba'i byang phyogs na ni/_'dzam bu'i gling gi byang phyogs kyi grong khyer rnams yod de/_yul dang grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dag gis gang ba/_rab tu 'byor ba dang bde ba dang lo
[\[323a.7\]]legs pa yin no/_/gang la snying rje'i bdag po ni/_/mig gsum gzugs kyis gnas pa ste/_/de yi gnas kyi mtshan pas na/_/sham+b+ha la zhes rab tu grags/_/gang la sham+b+ha las mtshan pa/_/seng ges mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni/_/seng ge'i rgyal
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]mtshan rab grags ltar/_/sham+b+ha'i yul zhes de la brjod/_/gang na kla klo med pa dang /_/bden smra brdzun pa ma yin dang /_/mun pa'i stobs ni nyams gyur la/_/snying stobs yon tan rgyas pa yin/_/chu bo de dang kai la sha'i bar gyi yul ni rnam pa mang
[\[323b.2\]]po ste/_nya zhes bya ba'i yul dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/bu la ni do zhes bya ba yang dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/b+hang s+ye na zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgya'o/_/tsIn zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong ste dbus kyi cha la'o/_/dar do zhes bya ba zhi dag tshad brgya'o/_/ku ru zhes bya ba
[\[323b.3\]]yang dpag tshad brgya'o/_/b+ha dri ka zhes bya ba dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/de dag gi pha rol na/_gan+d+ha ra zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/kA sha zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/b+ha tra zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/ma hA tsI na zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong ste dbus
[\[323b.4\]]kyi cha la'o/_/b+ha ra d+hau zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgya ste ri'i ngos la gnas pa'o/_/pr-i gi ka zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/de dag gi yang pha rol na/_/ma hi Sha ka zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/ma hi la ko zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong ste dbus kyi cha la'o/_/
[\[323b.5\]]barba ra zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/pu tA pha la zhes bya ba dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/_/de dag gi pha rol na/_ka Du ka zhes bya ba dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/khA ra zhes bya ba dpag tshad lnga brgya ste/_dbus kyi cha la'o/_/kam+po dzi zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgya'o/_/
[\[323b.6\]]de dag gi shar dang nub kyi cha dag la yang /_yul 'khor dang grong khyer gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/de dag chu ni mang po dang /_/mtsho dang mtsho bran du mas brgyan/_/gangs kyi ri dang ri bo bzang /_/sman ljongs nyams dga' du ma dang /_/nags dang kun dga' yid
[\[323b.7\]]'ong dang /_/sman rnams dag gis gang ba yin/_/rgyal po'i pho brang sna tshogs dang /_/tshong 'dus dang ni tshong khang dang /_/zong rnams rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/yo byad rab tu rgyas pa yod/_/de na 'jigs pa 'ga' yang med/_/nyam ngar gyur pa yod ma yin/_/
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]'on kyang de la mi lta ste/_/sred pas sgrub po'i gegs byed do/_/grong khyer mchog ni ka lA pa/_/'ba' zhig bsams te 'gro bar bya/_/rgya yul rgya yul chen po dang /_/ba yi la go kha ra rnams/_/byang nas byang du bgrod bya ste/_/
[\[324a.2\]]lam de shin tu ring ba yin/_/stong phrag mang po de dag kyang /_/sngags kyi shugs 'chang de yis ni/_/zhags bdun zla ba phyed la sogs/_/zla drug las gzhan lhag pas min/_/de rnams las kyang rab brgal na/_/'byung khungs rnam pa sna tshogs yod/_/
[\[324a.3\]]kha cig la ni dug gi rgyun/_/khyad par khyad par ldan pa babs/_/gser gyi rdul brtsegs ri bo dang /_/de bzhin dngul dang zangs kyi sde/_/kha cig lcags dang a b+ha dang /_/rang ga b+ha da ga de bzhin no/_/de dag sa 'di 'thug po dang /_/bye ma rdo
[\[324a.4\]]bas g.yogs pa yin/_/gseg ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/kha cig rin chen du mas khyab/_/yul de dag gi sa phyogs na/_/rtswa dang ljon shing rnam par spangs/_/nor bu dzi bAn+ti dang ni/_/byu ru rnam pa du ma skyes/_/gser las 'chi bar byed
[\[324a.5\]]pa'i chu/_/smyo bar byed pa dngul las te/_/gzhan ni spu dang pags pa lhung /_/kha cig du ma'i nad rnams so/_/'byung khungs dag nas dpag tshad gsum/_/'das na dri bral chu nyid de/_/sgrub po sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/de kun yon tan byed pa
[\[324a.6\]]las/_/gser gyis tshe ni ring po ste/_/dngul gyis de bzhin mdangs bzang ba/_/lhag ma gang rnams de rnams kyi/_/nad kun 'jig par byed pa yin/_/yang de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na/_ri lnga pa zhes bya ba/_rin po che du mas brgyan pa/_
[\[324a.7\]]shing a d+ha dang /_swa wa la/_shal+ma li dang /_sA la dang /_ta ma la dang /_da shA ma dang /_niSha kA ra dang /_a mra dang /_ka ra bI ra dang /_shi lin dang /_ba gu la dang /_gan+d+ha mod dang /_ma do d+ha ma la sogs pa ljon shing gi rigs brgya phrag du
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]mas gang ba yin no/_/ri de la ni mi'am ci dang /_mi'am ci mo dag 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis rtse bar byed cing rtag tu dga' bas gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams kyis sgrub pa po la 'drid par byed pa'i phyir/_rab tu snyan pa'i glu dang rol mo byed
[\[324b.2\]]pa dag kyang yod/_bsdig pa'i phyir 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byin pa'am/_gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur ba dag kyang yod/_rab tu skyo bar byed pa'i phyir/_dud mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa sbyor bar yang byed do/_/de dag la sgrub pa po chags par mi bya/_
[\[324b.3\]]'jigs par mi bya/_skyo bar mi bya ste/_gzhan du na stong pa nyid kyi gnas pas zil gyis gnan te 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te rnam pa de lta bu la sa gzhan pas 'gro na ni/_sgrub pa po la sdug bsngal chen po ster ro/_/de nas ri bo de yang 'das pa
[\[324b.4\]]na b+ho na dang la su dA b+ho na dang /_sra b+ho na zhes bya ba'i yul chung ngu dag yod do/_/de dag na ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag mi'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul can gyi rnam par gnas so/_/der sgrub pa pos zhag bdun du gnas par bya zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de
[\[324b.5\]]nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_kye sgrub pa po khyod la ci zhig dgos/_sgrub pa pos smras pa/_bdag grong khyer ka lA par myur du bgrod par mdzod cig_/de nas mi mo rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gcig cig gis/_sgrub pa po phrag pa la thogs te/_dpag tshad
[\[324b.6\]]bzhi yis mtho ba'i gangs kyi ri bo chen po dang /_gangs khrod kyi lam dpag tshad brgya phrag lhag pa yang chu tshod gcig gis mngon par bgrod nas/_ri bo tsan+d+ra ka la zhes bya ba shing hi na ta la dang /_ma tA la dang /_ko la ka dang /_sin+d+hu wa ra dang /_na gu ma la
[\[324b.7\]]dang ka dwan dang /_da so ma lar+d+ha dang /_sa ma na dang /_ni tsu la da dang /_bi du rma dang /_ti na bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas yongs su gang ba/_sman ljongs shin tu nyams dga' ba dang bcas pa der phyin par 'gyur ba'o/_/sgeg pa'i gzugs la'ang
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]dga' min te/_/cha byang 'jigs la'ang de bzhin no/_/rdo rje'i mig dang ldan de dag_/dge bar spyod la dges par grags/_/de dang sdig ldan rnams la yang /_/snying rje ldan rnams mnyam par byams/_/sgrub po rang nyid sdig pa
[\[325a.2\]]ni/_/zad pas bde bar snang ba yin/_/ri bo de ni sham+b+ha la'i yul mtha' yin te/_phyogs de na 'phags ma b+h+ri kuTI thor tshugs gcig ma bzhugs so/_/de la me tog kun da dang /_ku sum+b+ha'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad phul nas/_dngos grub
[\[325a.3\]]kyi don du gsol ba btab ste 'gro bar bya'o/_/de las gangs kyi puN+Da rI ka gcig dag blangs te/_oM shwa ta shwe ta shwe ta dzA TI ni shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ya/_b+h+ri swA hA/_zhes pa'i rig pa lnga stong du bzlas nas spyi bor bcings pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin gtum po mtha' dag dbang
[\[325a.4\]]du byed pa dang /_thams cad la 'jug pa'i shes rab thogs pa med pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang phyogs su song ste/_me g+ha ke ru zhes bya ba'i yul lo/_/de'i yang pha rol na sA la dang /_tA la'i nags chen po dag yod de/_nags dang grong khyer de dag
[\[325a.5\]]gi gzhi la dpag tshad brgyas yongs su bcad pa yin no/_/de dag gi yang byang phyogs su song ba na/_shu ni ka ra Na zhes bya ba'i yul dang /_bi bi dza la zhes bya ba/_kha dir dang tsan dan gyi nags chen po dag yod de/_de yang bgrod par bya ba dpag tshad brgya pa
[\[325a.6\]]yin no/_/de'i pha rol tu ljongs chen po sam su kha zhes bya ba yod de/_gang 'dzam bu gling na yod pa'i shing gi rigs gang yin pa de thams cad yul de na yod de/_ma lus shing lus pa med pas brgyan pa'o/_/de'i pha rol na kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i
[\[325a.7\]]nags yod de/_de yang 'das pa'i pha rol na grong khyer ka lA pa yod do/_/der sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi bdag gi rnam pa 'dzin pa de las chos nyan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_pho brang chen po ka lA pa de'i phyogs bzhi kun nas phyag
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]'tshal bar bya/_bdug spos kyang gtul bar bya/_me tog dag kyang gtor bar bya/_bskor ba dag kyang bya ste/_yang na ni zhag gcig_/yang na ni zhag bdun/_yang na ni zla ba phyed/_yang na ni zla ba gcig go/_/de ltar sgrub pa po nyid kyi ji lta ji ltar
[\[325b.2\]]sdig pa zad par gyur pa de lta de ltar/_mi bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bka' yis gnang ba byin te/_gang gi zhabs kyi pad+mo'i drung du 'khrid par byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems dpa' chen po mthong ba de'i tshe/_sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_
[\[325b.3\]]g.yo ba med pa dang /_dang ba'i sems kyis dbyug pa 'gyel ba ltar/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu 'dud pas/_lan brgya stong du mar phyag bya'o/_/rin po che'am me tog dag kyang gtor bar bya'o/_/gal te de sgrib pa shas chung ba zhig yin na ni/_de'i
[\[325b.4\]]zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa tsam gyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i bka' las 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur la/_de bzhin du gzhan yang /_dngos grub phra mo dag dang shes pa dag kyang thob
[\[325b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs su skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du nges par bsams pa yin na ni/_de'i thabs gang yin pa de yang dri bar bya zhing /_des ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na de kho na bzhin du 'grub par
[\[325b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa pos yul gyi mchog dang /_mchog de dag blta bar bya/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i glegs bam dag kyang mngon du bya/_gtsug lag khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_mchod rten rnam pa du ma de dag la yang phyag
[\[325b.7\]]'tshal bar bya/_smon lam dag kyang gdab par bya'o/_/yul de zlum por mnyam pa ste/_/gangs dang ldan pas bskor ba yin/_/'byung po yi ni phyogs cha na/_/dpag tshad lnga bcur 'phags pa ni/_/mchog dang grags pa rab ldan pa/_/'byung po'i
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]dbang po'i mgrin sngon gyis/_/rtag tu brten cing dge ba'i sa/_/ri dbang kai la sha zhes bya'o/_/sna tshogs rig pa sman gyi las/_/sgyu rtsal dbye ba gzhan dang gzhan/_/bzo rnams du ma mtha' yas pa/_/nyin dang nyin la rtag tu
[\[326a.2\]]spyod/_/pho brang mchog ni ka lA pa/_/rin chen sna tshogs las grub cing /_/gru bzhi lham pa'i gzhi la gnas/_/lha yi bzo bos byas pa ste/_/grong khyer de yi g.yas ngos na/_/tsan dan a kar nags kyis khyab/_/dngas shing gsal ba yid 'ong ba'i/_/yid
[\[326a.3\]]kyi mtsho dag yod pa yin/_/gang zhig yul de'i dbus na ni/_/de bshad de dag gnas pa'o/_/nags rnams dang ni ljongs dag gi_/phreng ba rim pa gsum gyis mdzes/_/grong rdal nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_yul phran du mas rnam par brgyan/_/phyogs mtshams
[\[326a.4\]]kyi ni lam dag na/_/rtse mo brgyad dang brtsegs pa yang /_/de rnams la ni go bsgos pa'i/_/srung ba po ni 'bum phrag yod/_/gangs dang ri bo de dag la/_/glang chen spos kyi glang po dang /_/mche ba drug pa mu tig can/_/nags tshal ri dgas du mas
[\[326a.5\]]mdzes/_/gdong lnga pa dang rkang brgyad pa/_/glang po'i gdong dang bya tshogs dang /_/'dab chags skyes bu'i lus can yod/_/dbus las rgyab kyi phyogs cha na/_/rgyang grags tshad kyi ri bo bzang /_/tshar du dngar ba bcu yin te/_/bzang skyong lhun po rtse
[\[326a.6\]]'dzin dang /_/sa yi snying po gtsug phud 'dzin/_/ha lA ha la sgrol mdzad pa/_/lcang lo'i bdag po sgra can ma/_/don dam yang dag 'phags de bzhin/_/bcu pa ma rgyal ba las rgyal/_/de dag rnams kyis brten pa ste/_/bye ba phrag brgya'i chos kyi gnas/_/
[\[326a.7\]]rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/stong phrag bcu bcus bsten pa yin/_/kai la sha yi 'gram ngogs na/_/mkha' khams rdo rje rnam par gnas/_/stong phrag brgyad kyi sman rnams dang /_/mthu ldan srog chags du ma dang /_/me tog 'bras bu'i khyad par kun/_/de na
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]rtag tu spyod pa yin/_/mu tig zla ba chu shel dang /_/dmar po in+d+ra nI la dang /_/mar ta ka dang g.yas su 'khyal/_/puSh+pa ra ga byu ru'i ste/_/a sma gar+b+ha gser la sogs/_/khams rnams sna tshogs mtha' yas yod/_/dngul chu'i khyad par mang pos gang /_/pa
[\[326b.2\]]ru sha ka bai DUR+Ya/_/de na rnyed par dka' min te/_/kha zas ro bcud sna tshogs pa/_/de dag mi 'byung gang yang med/_/sna tshogs gos kyi khyad par ni/_/bsam pa ji bzhin bgo byed de/_/dge min las kyi lam bcu po/_/rtag tu spyod pa'i skye bo nyung /_/phal cher dag la
[\[326b.3\]]gnas pa yin/_/theg pa gsum gyi lam gnas pa'i/_/drang srong dpag tu med pas brten/_/thams cad lha yi skad du smra/_/de na gnas pa'i mi rnams ni/_/tshe ni lo brgya las mi thung /_/dus min 'chi ba nyung ba yin/_/rtag tu 'dod la dga' bar spyod/_/'on kyang dge ba las mi
[\[326b.4\]]nyams/_/chos dang 'dod pa de bzhin gzhan/_/nor dang thar pa'i don zhes pa/_/rdzogs ldan bzhin du rab spyod de/_/'di mtshungs gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/rgyal po'i bu ni gang btsas par/_/nor bu rin chen 'od 'gyur la/_/zhag bdun 'od bzang 'phro 'gyur ba/_/
[\[326b.5\]]de ni byang chub sems dpar shes/_/gang gis sngon chad ma mthong ba'i/_/me tog rab tu rgyas pa che/_/khyim du mngon par skyes gyur pa/_/de ni lha yi yan lag ma'o/_/mi bdag yan lag mar bcas pa/_/rgas pa med cing na med de/_/'jam po'i khrims kyis rtag
[\[326b.6\]]tu 'tsho/_/'khor los sgyur dang mtshungs pa yin/_/rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/drang srong sngags kyi spyod pa can/_/yang dag rig pa nyid ston gyi/_/rtog ges bgrod med de ming tsam/_/las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/grub pa brgyad la sogs
[\[326b.7\]]rnams dang /_/gang gzhan dngos grub sna tshogs dag_/der ni mngon sum rnyed dka' min/_/zla ba re rer sgrub pa po/_/'di de 'dod pa'i dngos grub ces/_/chos kyi dga' ba'i gtam chen pos/_/rtag tu ngo mtshar dga' ba yin/_/chags bral byed dang
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]dga' ba dang /_/spyod pa gcig tu dge ba'i blos/_/dag pa'i sems ni mnyes gshin pa/_/sbyin dang bzod dang dul ba dang /_/mi 'tshe ba dang rtse gcig dang /_/reg dang shes dang legs pa thos/_/bsam gtan bzlas dang mchod de bzhin/_
[\[327a.2\]]yang dag de nyid sgom pa'o/_/de skad gsungs pas 'dus pa de/_/thams cad rjes su yi rang 'gyur/_/skal bzang ldan pa lnga brgya pos/_/yang yang 'dud cing bskor ba byas/_/de nas brtse ldan 'jig rten mgon/_/rab tu bzhad cing legs so legs/_/skye bo
[\[327a.3\]]mang po grol don du/_/don yod lcags kyus 'di bshad do/_/'khor rnams kyis ni 'di bzung nas/_/rtag tu bcang zhing chub par gyis/_/blo gros ldan pa lnga brgya po/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs thob nas/_/grong khyer drug tu yud kyis song /_/theg mchog
[\[327a.4\]]chos ni rab bshad nas/_/rim gyis cho ga 'di nyid kyis/_/grong khyer ka lA par song ngo /_/de las brgya phrag bzhi rnams kyis/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub chen po thob/_/gang ming rnam par mi rtog pa/_/de sogs lhag ma gang yin de/_/zab dang rgya che'i tshul
[\[327a.5\]]rtogs nas/_/grong khyer drug tu slar yang 'ongs/_/don yod zhags pa'i mdo sde ni/_/stong phrag lnga bcu gcig pa dang /_/rig pa mchog gi 'bum sde sogs/_/gzhan yang rig sngags sna tshogs dang /_/ral pa gcig ma'i cho ga dang /_/'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
[\[327a.6\]]rtog pa ni/_/stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa ste/_/cho ga du ma rgyas par byas/_/gang zhig ka lA par 'jug pa'i/_/thabs 'di bris pa'i bsod nams gyis/_/'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba rnams/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs gyur cig_/ces pa dpal ldan ka lA par 'jug pa
[\[327a.7\]]zhes bya ba/_theg pa chen po'i thabs chos kyi rnam grangs ji snyed pa rdzogs so//_//rgyal khams pa tA ra nA thas bal po'i dpe las bsgyur ba ste/_don dka' ba dka' ba rnams bram ze'i paN+Di ta kr-iSh+Na zhes bya ba la dris shing gtan la phab ste zhus dag byas pa'o//_//mang+ga laM/_/
